column2: Burundi: OLUCOME iriyamiriza ingingo yo kwugara ibiryo vy'abavunjayi (bureau de change)
column3: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'itunga ry'igihugu, OLUCOME, aranegura ingingo y'Ibanki Nkuru y'u Burundi yo kwugara amazu adandaza amafaranga  mvamakungu. Mw'itangazo yasohoye kuri uyu wa kabiri, Gabriel Rufyiri arongoye Olucome avuga ko iyo ngingo itazotorera umuti ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafaranga mvamakungu cibonekeza mu gihugu. Ku wa 07 z'uku kwa kabiri, Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yarafashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga mvamakungu mu Burundi. Iyagiriza ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu, nk'uko BRB ibivuga. Mw'iryo tangazo, Bwana Rufyiri avuga ati: "Iyo ata mafaranga y'agaciro ahari, ingingo nk'iyo siyo iza gukemura ikibazo kuko ibiciro vy'amafaranga y'agaciro bivana n'ingene aboneka kw'isoko ryayo". Yibutsa ko iryo kena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro rituma ibidandazwa bimwe bimwe mu gihugu bikena kubera hakenerwa ayo mafaranga kugira ngo hagurwe ibikoresho nkenerwa mu guhingura ivyo bidandazwa. Atanga akarorero k'isima, amafanta, ibiyeri n'ibindi, avuga ko "iyo bibonetse usanga bigurishwa ku biciro vy'umurengera". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyarahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena. Leta y'u Burundi yagiye ifata ingingo mu ntumbero yo kugenzura ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga mvamakungu, ariko cagumye ari ikibazo ngorabahizi, arico catumyeIbanki Nkuru y'igihugu yugara amashirahamwe yose adandaza ayo mafaranga. Olucome isaba leta kuvyura imigenderanire n'ibihugu bitanga imfashanyo, kwongereza ibidandazwa bishorwa hanze, guhimiriza abarwizatunga b'banyamahanga kuzana imitahe yabo mu gihugu, kunagura igisata c'ingenzi, ivyo vyose kugira ngo amafaranga mvamakungu yinjire mu Burundi.

column2: Burundi: CVR yatahuye ibinogo rusangi birenga 4000 vyahambwemwo abantu
column3: Umurwi wo kumenya ukuri n'ukunywanisha Abarundi, CVR, umenyesha ko umaze guharura ibinogo rusangi 4,163 vyahamwembwo abantu bishwe mu magume u Burundi bwagiye bucamwo kuva bwikukira. Ivyo biri mu cegeranyo ca mbere c'umwaka uwo murwi washikirije inama nshingamatekan na nkenguzamateka kuri uyu wa kabiri. Kubwo umurwi CVR, ico gitigiri gishobora no kuzokwiyongera kubera gushika ubu hari "Abarundi benshi bataravuga ibinogo boba bazi n'aho biherereye". Ejo ku wa mbere, uyo murwi washize ahabona  amagufa y'abantu bari hagati ya 250 na 270 yabonywe muri karitiye Kamenge iri mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, bagandaguwe mu 1993. Muri ico cegeranyo, Pierre-Claver Ndayicariye arongoye uwo murwi yabwiye abashingamateka n'abakenguzamateka ko hari ibitaravugwa. Ati: "Ibinogo vyatawemwo abishwe mu gihugu ni vyinshi, hari ivyo Abarundi bataratumenyesha kubera ubwoba canke agahinda bibibutsa. Abarundi benshi bazi vyinshi ntibaravuga ivyo babonye canke bazi". Avuga ko hafi ivyo binogo vyose vyagiye kumenyekana ari uko aho biri "hariko harakorerwa ibikorwa vy'iterambere vy'igihugu, nko kubaka amabarabara, imiserege canke amashure. Icegeranyo cabo cerekana ko mu ntara zose uko ari 18 zirangwamwo ibinogo nk'ivyo, aho intara ya Gitega, ubu ariwo mugwa mukuru mushasha w'u Burundi, yabonywemo ibinogo bishika 640. Intara ya Cankuzo mu buseruko bw'igihugu niyo maze gutorwamwo bike, aho CVR imaze kuronka ibishika 41. Mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abahitanywe n'ayo magume yagiye asinzikaza u Burundi bitazwi neza, Bwana Ndayicariye avuga ko umugwi arongoye  "umaze gutohoza no kumenya ku buryo mfatakibanza igitigiri c'abantu bashika 142,505 bishwe canke bagiye mazi mayongo". Avuga ko ico gitigiri ari ico abantu bafitiye amazina kandi berekana iyo baturuka uhereye ku ntara, ikomine, umutumba canke ikaritiye. Asaba Abarundi bose ko botinyuka bakamenyesha abagize uyo murwi aho bazi hose hari ibinogo vyatawemwo Abarundi n'abanyamahanga muri ayo makuba. Kuva u Burundi bwikukira mu 1962, bwamye burangwamwo ubwicanyi bwa politike bushingiye ku moko, cane cane hagati y'abahutu n'Abatutsi. Ubuzwi cane bukaba ari ubwabaye mu myaka ya 1965, 1969, 1972, 1988, na 1993. Bwana Ndayicariye avuga ko ayo makuba yahitanye abantu benshi n'ibintu vyinshi, asiga mu miryango amaganya, intuntu n'akabonge. Avuga ko kurondera ukuri kuri ayo makuba yose vyofasha Abarundi gushinga inkingi z'ukunywanisha Abarundi ku buryo burama. Avuga ko ibi bizofasha abasaba ikigongwe kwiha  umwanya wo kugisaba, abatanga ikigongwe nabo bakiha umwanya wo kugitanga. Ati: "Ni yo nzira ibereye yo gutegura kazoza keza k'abariho uno musi n'abazovuka. Ivyo tubikora munzira yo kunywanisha atari munzira yo guca imanaza kuko umugwi CVR atari Sentare".

column2: Umugambwe CNL mu Burundi urongowe na Agathon Rwasa usaba ko amabi uvuga ko ukorerwa ahagarara
column3: Umugambwe CNL uriyamiriza ingendo y'ukutihanganiranira mu vya politike uvuga ko ikorwa na "bamwe bamwe mu bategetsi bo mu ntwaro n'umutekano" mu Burundi. Ivyo nivyo biri mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'uwo mugambwe ejo ku wa gatanu i Bujumbura, ni mu gihe havugwa ko abanywanyi b'uwo mugambwe baburabuzwa irya n'ino mu gihugu. Muri iryo tangazo ryatewe ko igikumu n'umushingamateka Simon Bizimungu, umunyamabanga mukuru w'uwo mugambwe ari nawe yarisomye, umugambwe CNL urashikiriza ivyo uvuga ko ari intambamyi zidasanzwe ugira mu bikorwa vyawo mu gihugu. Bimwe mu bibazo abanywanyi bawo bahanganye navyo ku rubuga harimwo "kwandika ibiranga umunywanyi wese agendeye ingoro y'umugambwe ku rwego rw'igihugu, Bwana Bizimungu akavuga ko ivyo bikorwa n'abajejwe umutekano, kandi ko biteye amakenga. Eka ngo umugambwe ntazi intumbero y'izo ntonde n'iherezo ryayo. CNL ivuga kandi ko abanywanyi bayo "bahohoterwa, baterwa ubwoba, bafatwa bagapfungwa ata mategeko yubahirijwe, bagasinzikarizwa ubuzima, eka bagakorerwa amarementanya". Umushingamateka Bizimungu avugako umugamwe CNL "wama uriko urabuzwa uburenganzira bwo kwugurura ingoro zawo mu ntara zimwe zimwe no mu ma komine". Hampande y'ivyo vyose, CNL iriyamiriza ingendo yo "gusibanganya ingoro zawo", umushingamateka Bizimungu akamenyesha ko iyo ngendo yibonekeje mu ma komine Muhuta mu ntara ya Rumonge, Buganda mu ntara ya Cibitoke, be no muri komine Gashikanwa, ni mu ntara ya Ngozi. Kuri ivyo, iryo tangazo ryongera ko riti: "Uko gusibanganya ingoro z'umugambwe vyarenze urugero aho haturiwe hongera harasamburwa ingoro y'umugambwe ku rwego rw'intara ya Bujumbura iri i Nyabiraba mw'ijoro ryo ku wa 15 rishira 16 ruheshi 2019 buca yugururwa". Ivyo biri uko mu gihe Uburundi bwitegurira amatora ategekanijwe mu mwaka uza wa 2020, amatora azotangura ku wa 20 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu nk'uko vyaraye bishikirijwe n'umukuru w'umurwi ujejwe gutuganya amatora muri ico gihugu. Aha, umugambwe CNL ukabona ko ivyo vyose uriko urakorerwa bifise intumbero yo "kugabanya canke kwugara urubuga rwa politike bifise intumbero yo gutoteza abatavuga rumwe na reta muri rusangi, cane cane CNL". Uwo mugambwe urongowe na Agathon Rwasa, icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'Inama Nshingamateka, usaba reta y'Uburundi kurekura abanywanyi bawo uvuga ko bafashwe bagapfungwa  "bazira ivyiyumviro vyabo vya politike". Abajijwe n'abamenyeshamakuru igitigiri c'abapfunzwe gushika ubu mu kiganiro yagiranye nabo kuri uyu wa gatanu ku ngoro yawo i Bujumbura, umushingamateka Bizumungu avuga ko abanywanyi b'uwo mugambwe barenga 60 ari bo bapfungiwe mu busho butandukanye mu gihugu. Bwana Bizimungu yagiriza bamwe mu batware ko bahungabanya ibikorwa vy'imigambwe yemewe n'amategeko kubera ukudatahura ibwirizwa ryerekeye imyiyerekano iba ku mugaragaro, agasaba reta ko yorikwiragiza hose. Abarongoye umugambwe CNL basaba reta ko yohagarika ico bise "ihohoterwa rikorwa na bamwe mu bagize ama komite y'umutekano ahurikiyemwo bose". Umugambwe CNL kandi usaba amakungu n'akarere gukurikiranira hafi uko ibintu vyifashe mu Burundi muri bino bihe. Leta y'Uburundi ntaco irashikiriza kuri ivyo bivugwa n'umugambwe CNL uherutse kwemererwa mu kwezi kwa kabiri uno mwaka, ukaba uboneka ko uri mu migambwe ifise igihagararo kini mu gihugu.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Kane, Areola, Smith Rowe, Zouma, Coutinho, Damsgaard, Umtiti
column3: Manchester United iri imbere ya Chelsea n'umukeba wayo Manchester City mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane w'imyaka 27, ariko Tottenham isaba imiriyoni 139 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika hamwe n'abakinyi babiri bakina mu murwi A wa Man U. (Football Insider) Manchester City yavuganye n'umusatirizi w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30 akina muri Barcelona kugira ngo irabe ko yomugura. (Footmercato - in French) West Ham iri mu biganiro na  Paris St-Germain kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umunyegori w'umufaransa Alphonse Areola w'imyaka 28 yari amaze umwaka wose akina muri Fulham iyo yari yaratijijwe. (Mail) Tottenham yahambije Arsenal, PSG na Atletico Madrid mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  Lyon umufaransa Houssem Aouar w'imyaka 23. (Le10 Sport, via Metro) Arsenal  yongereje amafaranga kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Brighton umwongereza Ben White w'imyaka 23, aho yemeye ko ishobora gutanga imiriyoni 66.7 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika hamwe n'uturusho dushobora kwiyongerako duharurwa mu mamiriyoni umunani z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal Emile Smith Rowe w'imyaka 20 amaze kutangirwa amafaranga incuro zibiri na Aston Villa ariko bikanka, ariteguye gutera igikumu ku yandi masezerano y'imyaka itanu n'abarashi (Gunners). (Birmingham Mail) Napoli na Roma iripfuza kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, umutariyano Emerson Palmieri w'imyaka 26, ariko iyo mirwi ikaba idashaka kurekura imiriyoni 20 z'ama euro zisabwa kuri uyu mukinyi afise amasezerano azorangira mu kwa gatandatu 2022.  (Calciomercato, via Football Italia) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Kurt Zouma w'imyaka 26  yiteze kuva muri  Chelsea muri rino ci, mu gihe  Everton, Tottenham na Roma ya Jose Mourinho yose imwipfuza, akaba aherutse kwanka kuja gukinira Wolves.(Telefoot on Twitter)ya Newcastle United, Tottenham, Wolves na Southampton iriko iregeranya amafaranga mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Schalke umunyamerika Matthew Hoppe w'imyaka 20. (90min) Sampdoria yiyemeje kugumya umusatirizi wayo, umunya Danemark  Mikkel Damsgaard w'imyaka 21 n'imiburiburi mu kiringo w'uwundi mwaka, mu gihe Liverpool na Tottenham, co kimwe na Juventus hamwe na Barcelona iri mu mirwi itari mike imwipfuza.  (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian) Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe umupira w'amaguru ca Tottenham Fabio Paratici abona ko kimwe mu bikorwa nyamukuru ari uko agiriranira ayandi masezerano y'igihe kirekire n'umusatirizi Son Heung-min w'imyaka 29 akomoka muri Korea y'Epfo.  (90min) Manchester United ivugwa ko ifise umunoho mwinshi cane wo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona, umufaransa Samuel Umtiti w'imyaka 27 mu gihe na Arsenal nyo nyene imwipfuza. (El Gol - in Spanish) Everton iri hafi kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma Ryan Bertrand ata mafaranga itanze, inyuma y'aho uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31 yankiye kubandanya akinira Southampton. (Fabrizio Romano, via Leicester Mercury) Barcelona na Tottenham zahambiije Manchester United mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus umunya Argentina Cristian Romero w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina muri Atalanta iyo yatijijwe. Ariko Atalanta nayo ifise uburenganzira bwo gushobora kumugura. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Tottenham na Manchester United iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'inyuma wa Lyon umunya Danemark Joachim Andersen w'imyaka 25, yari amaze umwaka akina muri Fulham iyo yari yaratijijwe.  (Footmercato - in French) Uwahoze ari umusatirizi wa  Manchester City, West Ham hamwe na Manchester United umunya Argentina Carlos Tevez w'imyaka 37, avuga ko ashaka kurangiriza umwuga wiwe w'umupira w'amaguru muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kandi akavuga ko amaze kuronka imirwi itatu imwipfuza, ni inyuma y'aho aviriye mu murwi  Boca Juniors wo mu gihugu ciwe mu kw'indwi.  (ESPN Deportes - in Spanish) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool  Ben Davies w'imyaka 25 ntashaka kuva muri uyu murwi n'aho aronderwa n'imirwi Celtic na Bournemouth. (Mail) Uwahoze akina ku ruhande mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa, Franck Ribery w'imyaka 38,avuga ko bibabaje kubona Fiorentina itashatse kumwongera ayandi masezerano ngo abandanye ayikinira inyuma y'aho ayo yari afitaniye nawe arangiriye mu mpera z'ukwa gatandatu akavuga ko yipfuza kugumua muri uwu murwi w'ihiganwa ry'Ubutariyano, Serie A.  (Toscana TV, via Football Italia)

column2: Qatar 2022: Umubabaro muri Maroc kubera indege zasivye kujana abafana
column3: Abafana amajana n'amajana bo muri Maroc  bababajwe cane n'uko indege zari kubajana kurorera  demi-finale  y'igikombe c'isi muri Qatar zankiwe ku munota wa nyuma kuri uyu wa gatatu. Kompanyi y'indege y'igihugu - Royal Air Maroc - yari yategekanije kwongerako izindi ngendo indwi imbere y'urwo rukino. Yari yafashe iyo ngingo inyuma y'aho urwego rw'umupira w'amaguru muri ico gihugu rwemereye guha abafana itike za gusa 13.000 zo kuja kuraba urwo rukino ruhuza Maroc n'Ubufaransa. Ariko ku wa gatatu, yamenyesheje ko abategetsi ba Qatar banse ko izo ngendo zikorwa. Mw'itangazo yarungikiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters, iyo kompanyi yavuze iti : "Royal Air Maroc  iri n'umubabaro wo kumenyesha abakiriya  ifutwa ry'ingendo zayo zikorwa na Qatar Airways". Ntibiramenyekana icatumye abategetsi ba Qatar banka izo ngendo, kandi ibiro bijejwe amakuru muri reta ntibirishura ubusabe bwa BBC bwo kugira ico bivuze. Mu butunwa bwo ku mbuga hwaniro, iyo kompanyi yari yavuze ko izokwiyambaza izindi ngendo 30  'ku kirangaminsi kidasanzwe" zo gufasha abafana gushika muri Qatar. Ariko ibigo vy'ingendo bikorana n'iyo kompanyi mu nyuma vyamenyesheje ko hazoba ingendo indwi gusa. Guhagarika izo ngendo  vyavunye umutima abafarana bari bamaze kugura ama tike bakanafatisha ivyumba vy'amahoteri. Kompanyi yasavye imbabazi yongera yemera gusubiza amafaranga abari barishe ama tike. Hagati aho abanya-Maroc baba hanze bagumye bashika muri Qatar bashwangamuwe no kuba urwego rw'umupira w'amaguru rwemeye ama tike ya gusa yo kwinjira kuraba urwo rukino. Hagereranywa ko abanya-Maroc bashika 5.000.000  (miriyoni 5) baba mu oahanga, benshi muri abi bakaba baba mu Bufaransa. Ariko benshi mu bashitse mu bibanza vy'abafana kuri stade ya Al Janoub - benshi bitwikiriye amabendera y'igihugu  ca Maroc n'inkofero kugira bikingire izuba n'ubushuhe - barakajwe n'uko ama tike bari bemerewe atabonetse. Umwe mu bafana, Zineb Nfati, yabwiye BBC ko yavuye i Paris aje kuraaba urwo rukino, ariko ko atashoboye kuronka itike. Ati: "Uru ni urukino rw'ikimenyetso gikomeye -n'Ubufaransa bukina na Maroc, nanje ndi  inusu y'umufaransa nkaba inusu y'umunya-Maroc. "Ikibi n'uko ata makuru yo kwizera ahari. Naje ndi kumwe na muszanje none sinzi ico ndi bukore...ndavunitse umutima." Ni ubwa mbere igihugu co muru Afrika gishitse kuri urwo rugero, n'ubwo abakurikirana ivy'umupira w'amaguru baha amahirwe menshi Ubufaransa mu kuzokina urukino rwa nyuma na Argentine. Ariko umumenyereza wa Maroc  Walid Regragui - yakuriye i Paris - avuga ko abakinyi biwe biyumva, kandi badakeneye "kurindira iyindi myaka 40 kugira umugwi wo muri Afrika" usanyangane  mu makungu.

column2: Abavugabutumwa bo muri Africa bariko basabira Trump ngo atsinde amatora
column3: N'aho asanzwe afise imvugo y'agasuzuguro kuri Afrika, Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arakunzwe cane na bamwe mu bihaye Imana bo kuri uyu mugabane. Mu nyigisho ziwe yatanze mu kwa gatandatu, Pasitori wo muri Nijeriya, Chris Oyakhilome, umuvugabutumwa azwi cane ku mboneshakure, yagize ati: "Mumusengere [Trump] kuko iyo Imana ishize imbere umwe mu bana biwe, shetani rimwe na rimwe ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo imusambure". Agabisha kandi ko abanegura uyu mukuru w'igihugu akomoka mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika ariko arondera kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu kwa cumi na rimwe banka urunuka abamushigikiye. Uyu mupasitori akunzwe cane kw'isi yose, harimwo na Amerika avuga ati: "Bafitiye ishavu ryinshi Trump kubera arwanira abakristu/abakristo, ico mukimenye. Rero abankwa ni mwebwe abakristu". Ikigo Pew Research gikora ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y'abantu kivuga ko mu gihe Perezida Trump azwi ko ari umutegetsi yacanishijemwo isi, mu bihugu nka Nijeriya na Kenya arakundwa cane nk'uko amatohoza y'iki kigo yavyerekanye mu kwa mbere uno mwaka. Kivuga ko amajambo yavuze mu 2018 yo kugereranya ibihugu vya Afrika "nk'imisarani" bobo ko ata kibazo ateye. Ibi bihugu vyompi bisanzwe bizwi ko bigendera cane ku madini. Mu bumanuko bwa Nijeriya, igihugu ca Afrika gifise abantu benshi, harangwamwo amashengero menshi, mu gihe muri Kenya naho abanyapolitike bakoresha cane amashengero mu gutanga ubutumwa ku banywanyi babo, ari naco gituma amadini afise ikibanza kinini muri ibi bihugu. Amashengero menshi ya kikristu muri Afrika, asanzwe arwanya cane ivyo gukorora inda, abubakana bahuje ibitsina, bakongera bagashigikira Israyeli, ntibigeze biyumvamwo uwasubiriwe na Trump, umu Democrate Barack Obama, n'aho afise amamuko muri Kenya. Richard Chogo, Pasitori mu rusengero rwa Deliverance ku mugwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwarahimirije umugambi w'ukwigenga (liberalisme) hano muri Afrika, kandi uwu mugambi wateje impungenge mu bategetsi bamwe bamwe b'amadini. Rero kabaye agahengwe ku butegetsi bwa Trump yahisemwo gusubiza ibirenge inyuma". Arashimagiza ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona bwarashoboye guhagarika imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe nka Marie Stopes, yafasha mu buryo bwo kugabanya imvyaro n'ugukoroza inda mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika. Iri shirahamwe ryaraneguye iyi ngingo ya Amerika yo guhagarika izi mfashanyo, rivuga ko rishira "ubuzima bw'abakenyezi mu kaga". Impari ku bijanye no gukoroza inda zimaze imyaka n'imiburiburi irenga 40. Kuva ico gihe, abavugabutumwa b'abazungu bagize uruhara rukomeye mu matora ku ruhande rw'aba Repubulika kandi ivyiyumviro vyabo vyarakwiye kw'isi yose, cane cane muri Afrika. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe Abaporotesanti b'abirabure benshi muri Amerika bashigikiye umugambwe uharanira Demokarasi kandi bakanegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump, nk'uko icegeranyo gishasha ca  Pew Research kivyerekana. Emeka Ezeji, umupasitori mukuru mw'ishengero rya Anglicani mu ntara ya Enugu iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nijeriya, avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vya politike bishingiye "ku vyanditswe" gusa. Avuga ati: "Abakristu ba Afrika bazi ko umukuru w'igihugu w'umu Repubulika ari we mwiza kuri Amerika no kw'isi". Abandanya asengera Perezida Trump ko yotsinda umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi Joe Biden mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe, kandi ko yari yafashe umwanya iminsi yose wo gusengera uyu mukuru w'igihugu ngo akire igihe aheruka mu bitaro  kubera coronavirus. Nk'uko bimeze kuri Pasitori Chogo, na we nyene abona ko "intege nke" za Trump zidategerezwa kurengera "inyungu rusangi". Nk'akarorero, ariyamiriza rya sekeza rya Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), isekeza Trump afata ko ari "ikimenyetso c'urwanko", akavuga ko "ryanyazwe intumbero yaryo". Yibaza ibibazo vyinshi aho avuga ati: "Abandi bantu atari abazungu nta vanguraruhu bakorerwa? Ubuzima bw'umwirabure abayabaye ubu bwoba ari bwiza ugereranije n'imyaka indwi iheze? Canke umwirabure abayabaye ubu yoba ageramiwe ubu kuri Trump gusumba kuri Obama?" Bwana Trump arirata ko ari we mu perezida wa Amerika amaze gukorera ivyiza vyinshi Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika gusumba abandi baperezida bose  mu mateka ya  Amerika, kenshi agafatira ku rugero ruto rw'ubushomeri mu myaka itatu ya mbere y'ubutegetsi bwiwe, ico Bwana Ezeji akenguruka cane. Ubunyamabanga bujejwe akazi buvuga ko igitigiri c'abashomeri b'abirabure mu kw'icenda ari co gitigiri gito cane cabayeho kuva butanguye kwegeranya ibiharuro nk'ibi mu myaka ya 1970, n'aho ibi vyahindutse kubera coronavirus. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji  avuga ko Bwana Trump agifise igikorwa kinini ategerezwa gukora ku neza ya bose, aha akaba afatira ku mwami Cyrus (Kuro) w'umu perse avugwa muri Biblia ko yari yatoranijwe n'Imana kugira ngo yigarurire Babiloni, maze abanya Isirayeli bari bahunze  banona gusubira i Yerusalemu. Avuga ati: "Trump niwe we Kuro wa kino gihe". Bwana Emeka  avuga ati: "Imana irabivuze....ni umusuku wanje azorangura ishaka ryanje". Pasitori Juliet Eyimofe Binite ari mu gisagara ca Lagos muri Nijeriya aremeranya nawe. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Yatowe n'Imana". Buri ku ndwi, uyu mupasitori w'umugore yama asengera  Trump ngo atsinde amatora ku ncuro ya kabiri. Avuga ko Imana yamuhaye ubutumwa imbere y'amatora ya 2016 ko hari umuntu atunze cane yinjiye muri politike kandi ko ashigikiye ubwigenge bw'amadini, abakristu babona ko bubangamiwe. Avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yariko irarondera umukozi, umuntu w'intungane kubera hari ibikorwa bimwe bimwe abantu beza badashobora gukora". "Dukeneye umuntu ashobora kurwanira agateka k'abemera". Avuga kandi ko Trump ataronka amashimwe akwiriye kuri politike yiwe mpuzamakungu, nk'akarorero amasezerano y'amahoro hagati ya Isirayeli na Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abararu (Emirats Arabes Unis). Pasitori Chogo na we nyene niko abibona: "N'aho woba uri Saddam Hussein cane Muammar Gaddafi, ntihabuze nk'ikintu kimwe canke bibiri vyiza wakoreye abanyagihugu bawe". Avuga ko Trump ashigikiwe ku mugabane wa Afrika kubera ukuntu atarya umunwa, aho avuga ko abategetsi ba Afrika bakeneye kubwirwa mu majambo yeruye kugira ngo bashobore gutunganya ibihugu vyabo. Mu butumwa butandukanye yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Bwana Trump aherutse kwibutsa abakristu bamushigikiye ko ubwisanzure mu vyo gusenga hamwe n'urugamba rwo kurwanya umugenzo wo gukoroza inda bishobora gukwama mu gihe atotsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji afata ibintu yishimikije ubuhanuzi bwa Bibiliya buvuga ibihe vya nyuma. Ati: "Ko azotsinda canke atazotsinda, ico si ikibazo ca Trump, ahubwo ni ikibazo c'ivyo Imana ivuga". "Trump ni nka ca giti co muri Biblia abihweza ibirere bafatirako mu kwihweza ibimenyetso vy'ibihe...aramutse atsinze, tuzoba tugifise igihe co kubaho, nayo akaramuka atsinzwe nta gihe tuzoba tugisigaje".

column2: Russia nayo yirukanye abakora mu buserukizi bwa US mu kuyisubiriza mu ndumane
column3: Uburusiya bwirukanye abakora mu buserukizi bwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika 10, abategetsi bakuru umunani ba Amerika nabo bashirwa ku rutonde rw'abatemerewe kwinjira muri ico gihugu, ingingo yafashwe mu kwihora Amerika ku bihano yabufatiye ku wa kane. Muri abo bantu batemerewe kwinjira mu Burusiya harimwo umukuru w'igisata kijejwe igendereza FBI hamwe n'umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Amerika. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika, Maison Blanche/White House bivuga ko Amerika yafatiye ibi bihano Uburusiya kubera igitero co ku nyabwonko za "Solarwinds" mu mwaka uheze, itoteteza buriko bukorera Ukraine hamwe rero no kwivanga mu matora ya 2020. Ibi bihano bije mu gihe hari icuka kibi hagati ya Washington na Moscou. Uburusiya buherutse kwegereza abasirikare ibihumbi n'ibihumbi hafi ya Ukraine, mu gihe Amerika nayo iriko yegereza ibikoresho vy'intambara ku kiyaga cirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea), ivyatumye umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire w'Uburusiya agabisha Amerika. Mu kwezi guheze, Amerika yaragirije abategetsi indwi b'Uburusiya hamwe n'ibisata birenga cumi vya reta ko bifise uruhara mu guha isumu wa munyaporitike atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwa Vladimir Putin, Alexei Navalny. Uburusiya buvuga ko ata ruhara bubifisemwo. Hagati aho, Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika aherutse gusaba mugenziwe w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin ko bobonana - iciyumviro Moscou yakiriye neza ubu ikaba iriko iracihweza. Moscou yategetse abakora mu buserukizi bwa Amerika cumi kuva mu gihugu. Yabujije kandi abategetsi umunani kwinjira mu gihugu. Muri aba harimwo: Abakora mu buserukizi bwa Pologne batanu nabo nyene bategetswe gutekera imizigo yabo bakagenda, inyuma y'aho ico gihugu naco cirukaniye abategetsi batanu b'Uburusiya. Hampande yo kwirukana cumi bakora mu buserukizi bw'Uburusiya, Amerika kandi iragiriza abategetsi hamwe n'inzego zegamiye reta 32 zagirizwa kugerageza kwivanga mu matora ya Amerika mu 2020 "no gukwiragiza amakuru atari yo". Ibigo vya Amerika bijejwe ubutunzi navyo nyene vyabujijwe gusubira kugiriranira imigenderanire y'ubucuruzi n'ibigo bikoresha amafaranga y'ama 'roubles' (akoreshwa mu Burusiya) kuva mu kwa gatandatu.

column2: Nigeria: Uyu muvugabutumwa arindiriye kwumva ijwi ry’Imana kugira yugurure urusengero
column3: Umuvugabutumwa azwi cane muri Nijeriya, Temitope Balogun Joshua, azwi cane mu mpfunyapfunyo nka TB Joshua, avuga ko akirindiriye "ijwi ry'Imana" imbere y'uko yugurura urusengero rwiwe mu gisagara ca Lagos. Abategetsi ba Lagos bamenyesha ko amasengero ashobora gusubira kwugurura ku wa Mungu, akakira igice c'abo yahora yakira, inyuma y'amezi atari make yari amaze yugawe mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Mw'ireresi yashize ku rubuga rwa Twitter,  TB Joshua avuga ko "inyuma y'aho abategetsi baduhereye uruhusha, uru turindiriye ico Imama itubwira". Yongeyeko ati: "Ndabasavye mwizere ko nitwamara kwumva ijwi ry'Imana, tuzobamenyesha igihe ibikorwa vy'urusengero bizotangurira icese". Uyu muvugabutumwa yigize umuhanuzi yateje impari mu gihugu mu ntango z'uyu mwaka igihe atangaza ko coronavirus yategerezwa kuba yazimanganye imbere y'igenekerezo rya 27/03/2020, hasigaye iminsi itari mike ngo ubutegetsi butangaze ingingo zo guhagarika ibikorwa mu bisagara vya Lagos, Ogun n'umugwa mukuru Abuja. Ico gihe yatangarije ishengero ryiwe ati: "Imbere y'uko uku kwezi guhera, twemera canke tutemera, ata kuraba imiti izoba yahinguwe ngo bariko baravura, iyo ndwara izoba yazimanganye uko yaje". Igihe iryo genekerezo rya 27 rirenganiye, uyo muvugabutumwa yarazomerewe yagirizwa "ubuhanuzi bwiwe bw'ikinyoma". Hagati aho, yarisiguye - kandi mbere abanywanyi biwe bamukomera amashi - mu kuvuga ati: "Ico nashaka kuvuga kwari uko uwo mugera uzozimangana harya watanguriye, kandi i Wuhan (mu Bushinwa) umugera warahagaritswe". Ivyatangajwe n'uyo muvugabutumwa TB Joshua ntawe vyatangaje kuko niko abapasitori batari bake muri ico gihugu bameze. Hari bamwe bibaza ko uyo muvugabutumwa ashobora kuba yaramaze kwumva ijwi ry'Imana rimubwira nimba ashobora kwugururua urusengero kuri uyu wa Mungu, ariko abandi nabo bariyorohereza ko ivyo ata vyabaye.

column2: Kenya igiye kuronka miriyoni zafatiwe muri Jersey zifashe kugwanya Covid
column3: Miriyoni z'ama dorari z'amafaranga y'igihugu bivugwa ko zibwe n'abanya-Kenya babiri ba mbere batunze cane zigiye kugarukanwa mu gihugu zigurwemwo ibikoresho  vyo kurokora ubuzima mu kugwanya  indwara ya Covid-19 hisunzwe  amasezerano y'imbonekarimwe yashitsweko i Londres. Ayo mazezerano na Jersey, izinga ryigenga mu ntwaro mu  kiyaga ca Manche (Ensglish Channel) yakiriwe nk'"intsinzi ku banya-Kenya" n'uwuhagarariye ico gihugu mu Bwongereza, Manoah Esipisu. Urufatangane rwahavuye ruvamwo  ayo masezerano rwatanguriye ku rubanza rwo kwahukana. Mu 2006, Samuel Gichuru, umuntuzi afise kompanyi y'umuyagankuba muri Kenya,  n'umugore wiwe Salome Njeri barahukanye. Hageze kugabura ivyo batunze, Madame Njeri yabonye ko ataronse ibikwiye. Yaciye avuga ko bimwe  mu vyo umugabo wiwe atunze vyanyegejwe hanyuma, sentare, ica ikora urutonde rw'ama konte yose umugore yavuze ko ari  aya Gichuru muri Jersey, izinga risanzwe rizwi gushingwamwo amakompanyi ba nyeneyo batamenyekana kandi rigatangisha amakori ari hasi cane. Ivyo vyatumye haba amatohoza yamaze imyaka icenda akorwa n'abategetsi ba Jersey. Muri ayo matohoza, mu 2011, bagirije Gichuru n'uwahoze ari umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta kujana muri kompanyi yari yanditswe muri Jersey amafaranga ya "commissions" bahabwa n'amakompanyi mpuzamakungu. Abategetsi ba Jersey baciye basohora imitahe yo gufatisha abo bagabo bompi,  kuva ico gihe bakaba bakirinridiye ko barungikwa bava aho bari muri Kenya. Ivyaha vy'ubutunzi bagirijwe vyarimwo amasezerano na kompamyi yo muri Finlande yo kwubaka uruganda rw'umuyagankuba hafi ya Mombasa, igisagara kiza ubwa kabiri mu bunini muri Kenya, aho ngo bahawe miriyoni na miriyoni z'amafaranga y'abongereza ya 'commissions'  bayahawe n'amashirahawe yo kwubakisha yo mu Bwongereza, Norvege, Ubudagi na kompanyi y'igihangange mu gutumatumanako yo muri Amerika. N'ubwo BBC yagerageje kenshi kubarondera, abo bagabo bompi n'abashingwamanza babo ntibashimye kugira ico bavuze kuri ivyo bagirizwa. Ariko iyo kompamnyi yanditswe muri Jersey Windward Trading Limited yahavuye yemera ivyaha bine vyo kugira amafaranga y'inkomoko mbi muri sentare yo muri Jersey. Sentare yaciye ishinga ingingo, ko iyo kompanyi, nyeneyo asanzwe ari Gichuru, itegerezwa kwakwa amafaranga arenga miriyoni 4,9 z'ama dorari mu vyo itunze kubera  amafaranga y'inkomoko mbi. Menshi muri ayo mafaranga niyo bivugwa ko yavuye mu biturire muri Kenya hagati ya 1999 na 2002 ubu ariyo agiye kugarukanwa mu gihugu. Ivyo vyashobotse kubera amasezerano yo mu 2018  yashizweko umukono na ministre wa mbere w'Ubwongereza w'ico gihe Theresa May, umukuru wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta hamwe na reta za Jersey n'Ubuswise.  Ayo masezerano yavuga ko amatungo yibwe ashobora gusubizwa muri Kenya ariko agakoreshwa  gusa ku bijanye n'imigambi y'iterambere. Ayo masezerano azwi nka Return of Assets from Corruption and Crime to Kenya (Fracck) aha abategetsi ba Jersey uburenganizra bwo kurekura amafaranga bazi ko yibwe hanyuma akarungikwa imbere y'uko abagirizwa kwiba bashikanwa imbere ya sentare. Ikoreshwa neza ry'ayo mafaranga kizoba ari igikorwa ca Crown Agents, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ridaharanira inyungu ryitaho iterambere. Umukuru waryo Fergus Drake, yabwiye BBC  ko avugana n'abategetsi bajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Kenya kugira bavugane ibikenewe mu kurwanya Covid -19. Drake yiteze gushikiriza ibikoresho vya nkenerwa cane ku bitaro birenga 10 mu mezi ari imbere. Yavuze ko gupima neza bizofasha abanya-Kenya kurwanya ico kiza neza no kumenya ibice bikeneye incanco kurusha ibindi. Gushika ubu  muri Kenya abantu bamaze kuronka incanco ntibarenga 20% mu gihugu cose. Hasigaye amezi make ngo prezida Uhuru ave ku butegetsi, agishika ku butegetsi akaba yari yiyemeje kurwanya ibiturire. Muri iyo ntumbero abategetsi n'abanyaporotike bariko barasabwa kuvuga amatungo  bafise, hagakorwa isuzumwa ry'uko ata biturire yaciyemwo. Drake yavuze ko ayo mafaranga agiye gusohora -miriyoni 3.5 z'ama dorari - atazokora ''ibintu vyinshi cane'' mu gikorwa c'igihugu co kurwanya Covid-19 , ariko yibaza ko bene iyo mfashanyo igenewe ahantu runaka izogira ingaruka zishika kure mu kurwanya uwo mugera. Abaharanira uburenganzira bavuga ko akarorero ka Fracck ari inzira nshasha yo kwerekana ko amafaranga abantu baba baronse mu buryo butari bwiza ashobora gusubizwa. Ubwongereza busanzwe bwaremeje kandi ayandi masezerano -amasezerano ya ONU yo kurwanya ibiturire -gutyo bukaba butegerezwa gusubiza amafaranga yaciye mu vyaha aho ibikenewe biba vyakwiye kugira asubizwe. Ariko ku bwa Steve Goodrich, umukuru w'ubushakashatsi n'amatohoza muri Transparency International (TI) UK, amafaranga asubijwe ava mu Bwongereza akenshi ntaja mu bikorwa vy'iterambere ata handi aciye. Atanga akarorero k'amafaranga yigeze gusubizwa yari ayo inkomoko mbi y'uwahoze ari umukuru w'intara ya Delta muri Nigeria  James Ibori mu 2012 agahabwa reta ya Nigeria. Afise amakenga ko amafaranga asubijwe ashobora guherera mu biturire. Goodrich  avuga ko ivyo vya Jersey ari intambwe mu nzira nziza. Ariko yongerako ko kugirango hajeko "igitururuza cizewe" ku bantu bibaza kuja kunyegeza amafaranga bivye mu Bwongereza, reta "vy'ukuri ikeneye gukaza umukono wayo" ku gusubira ku matungo (aba yibwe). Nk'akarorero, avuga ko Ubwongereza bukwiye gutangura gusuzuma ivyo yibaza ko ari "ibibanza/amazu biciye amafaranga arenga miliyaridi 5 z'ama pound (£ canke pound:amafaranga y'abongereza)  vyaguzwe mu Bwongereza n'amafaranga yo kwinuba. Aha rero hari n'ukuraba neza ikibazo c'ibiturire muri Kenya. Kenya kiza ubugira 128 ku rutonde rwa Transparency International rw'igipimo c'ibiturire kw'isi, abategetsi n'abagwizatunga bakaba  bavugwa cane mu biturire. Hasigaye amezi make ngo prezida Uhuru ave ku butegetsi, agishika ku butegetsi akaba yari yiyemeje kurwanya ibiturire. Muri iyo ntumbero abategetsi n'abanyaporotike bariko barasabwa kuvuga amatungo  bafise, hagakorwa isuzumwa ry'uko ata biturire yaciyemwo. Uwuhagarariye Kenya mu Bwongereza, Esipisu, yigeze kuba umuvugizi w'umukuru w'igihugu, yabwiye BBC ko amasezerano ya Fracck ari "intererano ikomeye cane" ku mugambi w'umukuru w'igihugu kuko atanga ubutumwa ko "abantu bivye amafaranga " batazotekanirwa ngo n'uko gusa banyegeje amafaranga yabo mu mahanga". Yongerako ati "ayo ni amafaranga yibwe abanya-Kenya, yasahuwe abanya-Kenya, kubera ayo masezerano ayo mafaranga agiye kugaruka gufasha abanya-Kenya ari nabo ubwa mbere na mbere yari asanzwe agenewe. Rero iyo ni intsinzi ku banya-Kenya". Ubu amafaranga ari mu nzira ava muri Jersey aja muri Kenya, ubu abantu bazoca bahindukirira kuraba ko abo bagabo bagirizwa barungikwa muri Jersey. Mu kwezi kwa kabiri,  ibikeneye gukorwa kugira barungikwe vyaratanguye gukorwa muri sentare ya Nairobi City  Magistrates Court, inyuma y'imyaka 10 y'impari zo kumenya urwego rwoja imbere mu kubikora. Ubu igisata c'ubushikirizamanza nico kiriko kirabikora kandi icegera c'umuyobozi waco  Victor Mule yavuze ko intahe yitezwe mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Yavuze ko yizeye ko bitazosubira gufata iyindi myaka 10. Igihe BBC yabarondera, abashingwamanza ba Gichuru bahisemwo kutagira ico bavuze ku biriko birakorwa. Umukenguzamateka Ian Gorst, umushikiranganji wa Jersey ajejwe imigenderanire,  aremera ko ubwa mbere hoho hari ibitagenze neza  kugira ayo mafaranga bivugwa ko yibwe abe yarashitse muri iryo zinga. Agabisha abandi bashobora gukora gutyo muri kazoza ko amategeko y'iryo zinga ubu yakajijwe cane ariko kandi ko amafaranga yose yashitseyo aciye mu nzira zitari zo azoronderwa iyo ari kandi ko "tuzoyasubiza ku banyagihugu bo beneyo".

column2: Tanzania: Perezida Magufuli yirukanye umukozi wa leta yatabuye Ikorowani
column3: Perezida John  Magufuli wa Tanzania amenyesha ko yirukanye burundu mu kazi umukozi wa leta yatabuye igitabo ceranda c'Ikorowani, maze akwiragiza isanamu ku mbuga hwaniro ariko arayitabura. Yatangaje iyo ngingo uno munsi mu gihe yari mu birori vyo kwugurura ibiro vy'akarere ka Kigamboni mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. Ati: "Nyakwubahwa Jafo, hirya y'ejo niho numva, ko hari umuntu hariya i Kilosa yatabuye igitabo ceranda". "Ndagushimiye cane kubona warafashe ingingo yo kuba uramuhagarika, ariko jeho ndamwirukanye burundu. Mwandikire ikete ko yirukanywe burundu". "Atsinda urubanza canke atsindwa, uyo ntakiri umukozi wa leta, ntidushobora kubandanya dukorana n'abakozi b'ibijuju nk'abo muri ino leta". Mu ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutegetsi bw'intara n'amakomine, Selemani Jafo, yategetse ko umukozi w'ibiro vy'akarere ka Kilosa mu ntara ya Morogoro, Daniel Elimringi, ahagarikwa, ku caha co gutabura igitabu c'idini rya Isilamu, Ikorowani. Jafo ati: "Ni ukuri, iki kintu cakozwe n'umukozi nk'uyu nta ciza kizanira igihugu cacu kubera abanyagihugu bacu mu madini yose basanzwe babanye mu mahoro kandi bubahana mu butandukane". Iyo ngingo ya Jafo yafashwe inyuma y'aho isanamu yerekana uyo mukozi wa leta mu gisata c'ubudandaji mu biro vy'akarere ka Kilosa ariko aratabagura ico gitabo, ikwiragijwe ku mbuga hwaniro zitandukanye. Ikinyamakuru Mtanzania co muri ico gihugu kimenyesha ko uyo mukozi yamaze kurengutswa muri sentare, kandi ko yankiwe kuburana yidegemvya. Ico kinyamakuru gitangaza ko urwo rubanza ruzosubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 20 z'uku kwa kabiri.

column2: Tanzania: Perezida Samia Suluhu Hassan ariyama abamunegura ku madeni yo hanze
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania Samia Suluhu Hassan ariyamiriza akarwi k'abategetsi bo hejuru b'ico gihugu banegura reta yiwe ku madeni yasavye mu mashirahamwe yo hanze mu ntumbero yo kurangura imigambi y'iterambere. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ari mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu rigacishwa ku mboneshakure, Perezida Samia Hassan arasigura akamaro k'amadeni mu kurangura imigambi y'iterambere ya reta. Yariko arakira icegeranyo kivuye mu bushikiranganji butandukanye c'ukungene amafaranga agenewe kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19 igihugu cahawe n'abatanga imfashanyo y'iterambere ariko arakoreshwa. Perezida Samia avuga ko mu gihe ibindi bihugu bikoresha ayo mafaranga mu kugura ibikoresho vyo kwikingira nk'udupfukantoke n'udupfukamunwa, Tanzania yoyo yakoresheje mu bwitonzi ayo mafaranga mu gukomeza igisata c'amagara y'abantu no mu kwubaka amavuriro mashasha. Aya mafaranga yafashije kandi kwubaka amasomero mashasha y'amashure n'ibigo vy'ukwigiramwo mu turere dutandukanye tw'igihugu. Avuga ko yumva ko yahemukiwe n'abanegura reta yiwe kubona yakiriye aya madeni mvamahanga. Ati: "Birababaje kubona umuntu wari wizigiye afise amabanga nk'ayo akomeye muri reta agukorera ivyo". Ashikirije aya majambo inyuma y'umusi umwe umukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Job Ndugai, asavye imbabazi ku mugaragaro ku majambo yari aherutse gushikiriza, yafashwe ko yayabwiye reta ya Samia Hassan ku bijanye n'amadeni yo hanze. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza iri jambo, Perezida Samia Hassan yavuze ko amwe mu majambo yo kumunegura afitaniye isano n'amatora yo mu 2025, abatari bake bakaba babona ko azorondera kwitoreza ikindi kiringo. Samia Hassan yashitse ku butegetsi mu ntango z'umwaka uheze inyuma y'urupfu rwa Perezida John Pombe Magufuli yari atanguye ikiringo ciwe kigira kabiri kikaba n'ica nyuma gitegekanywa n'ibwirizwashingiro.

column2: Umupfakazi wa TB Joshua mu rugamba rwo kurongora ishengero yasize muri Nigeria
column3: Evelyn Joshua yabaye umurongozi w'imwe mu mashengero akomeye y'abarokore muri Afrika, ariko uwo mupfasoni w'imyaka 52 ahanganye n'ikibazo co kubungabunga iragi ry'umugabo wiwe. Urupfu rwa Joshua rwabaye giturumbuka mu kwezi kwa gatandatu afise imyaka 57 rwatumye hatangura intambara yo kumusubirira yamaze amezi n'amezi kugira ironke inyishu. Ariko imiryango y'iryo shengero ryiwe rya Synagogue Church of All Nations (SCOAN), iri mu gisagara kinini cane muri Nigeria, yasubiriye kwugurugwa kugira yakire abayoboke baryo ubwa mbere mu mezi atanu. Yari rurangiranwa kubera imburi ziwe n'inyigisho, vyatumye ahurumbirwa n'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abayoboke bavuye hirya no hino kw'isi baja Lagos, harimwo n'abanyepolitike bakomeye bo muri Afrika na Amerika y'epfo. Ni gake haba ibiganiro vy'isubirizwa mu mashengero y'abarokore muri Nigeria mbere kenshi uburongozi buca buhabwa umupfakazi w'uwuba yarashinze ishengero. Ariko muri SCOAN, umupfasoni wa Joshua, yari umupasitori yatiwe, ahanganye n'abandi kubera atari mu rwego rukuru rurongoye iryo shengero. Ibi bifatwa n'abo bahanganye ko ari ikimenyetso c'uko umugabo wiwe atigeze amufata nk'uwushobora kumusubirira. Bitandukanye n'abandi bagore b'abapasitori  bo muri Nigeria, ntiyiyerekana cane mu myaka irenga mirongo itatu bari bamaze bubakanye. TB Joshua afatwa n'abayoboke ba SCOAN nk'"intumwa", yakorana n'umugwi  umwegereye cane yita "inararibonye" - umwe muri bo bikaba vyari vyitezwe ko ari we azomusubirira. Ariko inyuma y'urupfu rwiwe, abari begereye umupfasoni wa Joshua barahawe uburenganzira na sentare bwo kumugira umwe mu bagize urwego nshingwantwaro, bica vyorosha kugera ku ntambwe yo gushika kuri ayo mabanga. Iryo shengero ryaciye rimenyesha ko umupfasoni wa Joshua  abaye umurongozi mushasha "Arongowe n'Imana", ivyababaje ayandi mashami ari muri iryo shengero ku kungene bitabaye mu muco. Cane cane umugwi uzwi kw'izina rya Global Congress of SCOAN Members (GCSM), vyitwa ko ushigikiwe n'abayoboke bo mu rwego rwo hejuru, warerekanye amakenga kuri iyo ngingo. Ariko nta madidane yabaye ku mukuru yari kurongora amasengesho ubwa mbere ya SCOAN itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe kuva umugabo wiwe apfuye. Bivugwa ko atahemye kugira yerekane ubutegetsi bwiwe muri iryo shengero, mu gukoresha amezi make ya nyuma mu gusukura iryo shengero. Hari ama Video yagiye ahabona y'abayoboke, benshi b'abanyamahanga, bamaze imyaka baba  muri urwo rupangu runini, bariko baravayo bariko barabazomera. Umwe mu bayoboke yakoresheje imvugo ngereranyo ko "cari icigwa". Abakuwe muri ico kibanza vyavuzwe ko bari abadashigikiye ubutegetsi bw'umupfasoni wa Joshua. Patrick Iwelunmor, yahoze ajejwe kumenyeshamakuru ku muhisi Joshua, yabwiye BBC ati:"Inyuma y'urupfu rw'intumwa, bamwe mu bamugendanira ntibavugisha Evelyn mu rupfasoni." Hari n'inkuru kandi yerekeye igiturire, mbere igisata ca Nigeria kijejwe kugwanya igiturire, EFCC, cemereye BBC ko kiriko kiragira amatohoza ku bivuga ko habaye ubusuma muri iryo shengero. Ntibiramenyekana nimba ibi ari vyo biriko biragirwako amatohoza, kuko ikinyamakuru co muri Nigeria The Punch cari canditse ko iki ari co gituma bamwe mu bayoboke b'iryo shingiro boba banyegeye. Ubu ikigiye kugora cane umupfasoni Joshua n'ugukora ku buryo abayoboke ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bakunda umugabo wiwe biyumvamwo ukwemera kwiwe. Baje kubera igihagararo ciwe n'ubwitonzi hakaba ata co biteze ku mutegetsi mushasha. Gbenga Osinaike, arongoye uruganda rw'abamenyeshamakuru mu kinyamakuru Church Times Nigeria, aremeza ko igenwa ryiwe ryaje giturumbuka. Yabwiye BBC ati:"Yahora asengesha rimwe na rimwe arik TB ntiyigeze amuha icizere." Ariko nk'umuntu atigeze yitabwaho  na benshi, "harimwo n'umugabo wiwe", umupfasoni Joshua yarerekanye " inguvu n'ubushobozi afise mu gutwara iryo shengero." Yaranse ko ahabwa icubahiro c'umugabo wiwe ca " uwujejwe gucungera vyose", avuga ko ari we akibarongoye, ko gusa "atanguriye urugendo aho data yashikanye inkino". Kandi TB Joshua aracafise ikibanza gikomeye muri iryo shengero, amafoto yiwe amanitse hose mu nzu, inyigisho ziwe na zo ziguma zica ku mbuga hwaniro ziwe. Bisa kandi n'uko umupfasoni Joshua yasigaranye iragi ry'ingene umugabo wiwe yigisha - aho yaguma acishamwo indirimbo zo guhimbaza Imana - aho n'umudiho usa n'uwo umugabo wiwe aho yariko arahereza inkuka ari wenyene. Ko ari babiri bahuye ubwa mbere mu 1990 aho yamutangaza mu kumubwira ivyerekeye ubuzima bwiwe, yandika n'izina ryiwe ku rupapuro ata jambo na rimwe amubwiye. Bamaranye iminota 45 incuro ya mbere babonana, aho inyuma y'aho yaciye amusaba ko bokwubakana. 'Impano yo kunywanisha' Ni ihasa akaba n'imfura mu muryango w'abana indwi, yakuriye i Okala Okpuno mu ntara ya Delta mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. N'aho atatanguye ari umupasitori, yaramenyerejwe hanyuma arabuhabwa n'umugabo wiwe. Mu 2009, yavuze ko ari umuntu afise impano zidasanzwe mu kunywanisha - "imigenderanire y'abavyeyi n'abana, abubakanye n'ibindi bintu nk'ivyo." Abasitori bakuru muri Nigeria kenshi bavuga ko baronse umuhamagaro uva muri bibiriya - nk'abahanuzi Samuel na Paul - kugira bakorere Imana. Nk'uko bivugwa na Joshua, umuhamagaro wiwe waje igiye yerekwa mu kiringo c'imisi itatu aho yumva ijwi rigira riti:"Ndi Imana yawe. Ndaguhaye ubutumwa bweranda bwo kugenda gukora igikorwa ceranda c'Imana." Umupfasoni Joshua ntaravuga ko yaronse umuhamagaro nk'uwo, ariko kuri bamwe, kuba bakorana n'umugabo wiwe birakwiye. Iwelunmo agira ati:"TB Joshua yari intumwa kuva avuka, ariko umugore wiwe yamubaye kubera we. Umugabo n'umugore babaye umwe, kubera ubwo bumwe yaciye na we asigwa amavuta." N'aho bamwe mu bapfakazi b'abakuru b'amashengero muri Nigeria, nka Janet Onaolapo wa Abundant Life Gospel Mission na Margaret Idahosa wa Church of God Mission International , barongoye neza amashengero yabo, s'ibintu bisanzwe. Amashengero y'abapantekoti muri Nigeria yubakiye ku gihagararo c'abayashinze, akaba asambuka bamaze gupfa. Osinaike avuga ko ivyo bishobora gushikira na SCOAN. Avuga ati:"Iyo hageze ku bibazo vy'ishengero, abantu baza kurondera inyishu, kurondera ibitangaro, kuraba uwoba yareretswe ibiberekeye. "Icuka gitegerezwa kuzosubira hasi."

column2: Umugabo acuraranga urumbete akoresheje amano
column3: Felix Klieser ni umunyamuziki yavutse atagira amaboko. Uwo mudagi w’imyaka 30 akoresha ukuguru kumwe mu kuvuza urumbete. Ubu ari kumwe na korale Bournemouth Symphony, imwe mu zikomeye cane mu Bwongereza. Felix azoguma akorana ibiteramo na bo muri iyi myaka ibiri iri imbere.

column2: Burundi -Kenya: Jules Ndayishimiye yakora ijoro n'umutaga mu kurondera umutahe wiwe
column3: Umusore Jules Ndayishimiye adandaza amandazi, ibiyoba n'ikawa muri Kenya, umutahe akaba yawukuye mu kazi ko kudandaza ifi ku murango n'ubuzamu mw'ijoro. Yavuye mu Burundi arangije kaminuza mu gisata c'uburunzi. Avuga ko yatahuye kare ko ata kazi reta igifise itanga, afata ingingo hakiri kare kukironderera. Agira ati:"Kuva ndi muri kaminuza, nari namaze gutahura ko akazi ari jewe ntegerezwa kukironderera. "Narabona abahejeje imbere yanje ko ata kazi baronka." Jules Ndayishimiye avuga kandi ko kuva aheza amashure yisumbuye yari yaciye atangura kurondera ico akora. Avuga ati:"Nahejeje amashure yisumbuye nca ntangura gukorera abantu. Narabadandariza. "Mu nyuma naramanutse i Bujumbura nsaba akazi ko gukora ijoro nkaca niga kaminuza ku murango. "Vyari bigoye, kuko nataha nk'isaha icenda z'ijoro, isaha zibiri nkaba ntonze kw'ishure." Uwo musore avuga ko yagerageje no kworora inkoko biranga, araonka umutahe wo kudandaza ntivyagenda neza ariko ko atacitse intege. Jules Ndayishimye avuga ko umugenzi wiwe asanzwe aba i Nairobi muri Kenya, ari we yamuriye akara ko ashobora kuronka akazi kotuma aronka umutahe kuko amahera yo muri ico gihugu ari hejuru gusumba amarundi. Avuga ati:"Naraje uwo mugenzi aranyakira. Nca ndonka akazi ko gukora mw'ishirahamwe rihingura amafi. "Kubera iwacu twakuze batigisha ibintu vy'imyuga, narafasha gusa ababizi bakabikora, ku mugoroba bagaca bampemba. "Sinaca ntaha, ahubwo naca ntonda ku kandi kazi k'izamu iwacu bita akazi k''ubu city'." "Inyuma y'amezi atatu, naciye mfata ingingo yo kwikorera ivyanje ndi kumwe n'uwundi mugenzi wanje. "Tudandaza ibintu bitandukanye harimwo ikawa, amandazi n'ibiyoba. Kandi bigenda neza turashima." Jules Ndayishimiye ahanura urundi rwaruka gukura amaboko mu mpuzu bagakora akazi kose kabonetse, kuko kuri we, ngo n'aho wobura, uba warondeye ntuheza ngo witeko umwikomo. Urwaruka rwinshi ruturuka mu Burundi rwaje muri kenya kurondera ubuzi, benshi bakora muvyo kwubaka, abandi mu kudandaza amandazi n'ibiyoba mu mabarabara. Hari n'abakora akazi k'izamu kazwi nk''igi city'. "
