column2: Imishamirano ya Ukraine: US ivuga ko Russia itegerezwa guhitamwo hagati y'ibiganiro canke guhangana
column3: Icegera c'umunyamabanga wa Reta wa Amerika Wendy Sherman aragabisha Uburusiya ko butegerezwa guhitamwo hagati y'inzira y'ibiganiro canke bugahangana n'Uburengero. Yabivuze inyuma y'ibiganiro hagati ya OTAN/NATO n'Uburusiya, kimwe mu vyaranze ibikorwa vya diplomasi muri ino ndwi mu ntumbero yo kugabanya imishamirano kuri Ukraine. Icegera c'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya Alexander Grushko avuga ko OTAN idashobora kwihitiramwo gusa ibiyorohereza mu vyo Uburusiya busaba. Mu vyo busaba harimwo ko Ukraine itokwigera yinjira muri OTAN. Abasirikare b'Uburusiya bababa 100.000 bavugwa ko biyegeranirije hafi y'urubibe rwa Ukraine, ivyatumye haba ubwoba ko hashobora kuba igitero. Sherman ashimangira ko Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ibindi bihugu vya OTAN bidashobora kwemera ko Ukraine ibuzwa kwinjira muri iri shirahamwe, akerekana ko imiryango y'iri shirahamwe rya gisirikare yugururiwe uw'ari we wese. Intego yo kwinjira muri OTAN iri mw'ibwirizwashingiro rya Ukraine. Ariko avuga ko hakiriho akaryo ko kwumvikana, kandi ko Uburusiya butegerezwa guhitamwo ico bwipfuza ko gikurikira. Ati: "Uburusiya, cane cane buzotegerezwa guhitamwo nimba koko bushaka umutekano, aha naho bugategerezwa gufata inzira, canke nimba ibi vyose vyari urwitwazo. Kandi bashobora kuba batarabimenya". Avuga ko Amerika na OTAN bariko bitegurira ico cose coshobora gushika. Uburusiya bwarasohoye urutonde rw'ivyo bwipfuza bifise intumbero yo kubuza OTAN ko ibandanya yiyagurira akarere amaja mu buseruko, hanyuma iri huriro rikagabanya akariro ko gusugereza imbibe z'Uburusiya. OTAN iriyamiriza yivuye inyuma ibisabwa n'Uburusiya ariko ikavuga ko yiteguye kuganira ku bindi bibazo harimwo kugenzura ibirwanisho no kugabanya imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare. OTAN/NATO (Organisation du Traité de l'Atlantique Nord/North Atlantic Treaty Organisation), ni ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe rigizwe n'ibihugu 30, rikaba ryashinzwe mu 1949. Avugira Uburusiya inyuma y'ibiganiro vy'ejo ku wa gatatu i Buruseri (Bruxelles/Brussels) mu Bubirigi, Grushko yagabishije ko mu gihe umubano wokwononeraka bishobora kugira ingaruka umuntu atazi ku mutekano wa Bulaya. Iri gabisha risa n'amajambo y'umunyamabanga mukuru wa OTAN Jens Stoltenberg avuga ko "hashobora kwaduka iyindi ntambara i Bulaya". Irungikwa ry'ingabo z'Uburusiya hafi y'urubibe buhana na Ukraine ryateje ubwoba ko buriko butegura igitero. Mu 2014, Uburusiya bwarigaruriye akarere ka Crimea kegukira Ukraine, inyuma y'aho abanya Ukraine batembagarije umukuru w'igihugu cabo yari yegamiye ku ruhande rw'Uburusiya. Inyuma y'aho, muri uyo mwaka nyene, inyeshamba zishaka kwiyonkora zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya zarigaruriye uturere tutari duto two mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Uburusiya bushimangira ko iri rungikwa ry'ingabo ridakwiye gutera ubwoba umuntu n'umwe. Ariko Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya avuga ko azofata "ingingo za gisirikare" mu gihe Uburengero bwobandanya poritike y'"agasotoro". Kuri uyu wa kane, hari ibiganiro biza kubera ku cicaro c'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya rijejwe umutekano n'imigenderanire (Organisation for Security and Co-operation in Europe) i Vienne muri Autriche, ubwa mbere muri ino ndwi Ukraine ikaba iza kuronka ikibanza muri iyo nama.

column2: Icegeranyo ku rwego rw'isi kivuga yuko amamiriyoni y'abantu bicwa n'ubwandu budakorwako n'imiti
column3: Mu 2019, abantu barenga umuliyoni n'ibihumbi 200 bahitanywe n'ubwandu buterwa n'udukoko twa bacterie tutagikorwako n'imiti ya antibiotics, nk'uko biri mu cigwa kinini kimaze gukorwa gushika ubu. Abo bantu barenze abahitanwa na malaria canke SIDA ku mwaka. Icegeranyo kivuga yuko ibihugu bikenye ari vyo vyakozweko gusumvya, ngo ariko ikibazo c'udukoko turinda imiti gihanze amagara ya buri wese. Kwongera ubu bwa vuba amafaranga mu guhingura imiti mishasha hamwe no gukoresha iyihasanzweho mu buryo bubereye, nivyo bihanurwa gukorwa kugira twese twikingire. Gukoresha ku buryo bw'umurengera imiti ya antibiotics muri iyi myaka ya vuba mu kuvura ubwandu buto vyatumye iyo miti ata kamaro igira ku bwandu bukomeye. Abantu bariko barahitanwa n'ubwandu busanzwe bwahora buvurwa, bitewe n'uko udukoko tubutera twashitse aho turinda iyo miti. Abajejwe ivy'amagara mu Bwongereza baheruka gugabisha yuko ikibazo c'udukoko turinda imiti (antimicrobial resistance [AMR]) ari ikiza cinyegeje gishobora kuzokwiserura nyuma ya Covid-19, kiretse imiti ya antibiotic itanzwe mu buryo bubereye. Ingereranyo y'abahitanywe na AMR kw'isi, yatangajwe mu kinyamakuru the Lancet, yafatiye ku mwihwezo wavuye mu bihugu 204 wakozwe n'abashakashatsi mpuzamakungu, barongowe na Kamunuza ya Washington muri Amerika. Baharuye ko abantu bashika imiriyon zitanu bapfuye mu 2019 bahitanywe n'indwara AMR yagizemwo uruhara - bakiyongera ku muriyoni 1,2 y'impfu zatewe na AMR ubwayo. Uyo mwaka nyene, bivugwa ko SIDA yahitanye abantu 860.000, malariya nayo 640.000. Benshi mu bapfuye kubera AMR bahitanywe n'ubwandu bw'imbere mw'ihemero, nk'umusonga, hamwe n'ubwandu bw'imihora y'amaraso, ishobora gutuma umuntu agira umuriro w'umurengera (septic). Ikindi kibazo kizwi nka MRSA (methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus) carahitanye benshi kurusha, mu gihe agakoko wa E. coli, hamwe n'utundi dukoko twinshi, natwo twagize uruha mu kurinda imiti kwa cane. Hifashishijwe amakuru yakuwe ku barwayi abitswe mu bitaro, ivyigwa hamwe n'ayandi masoko y'amakuru, abashakasha bavuga yuko abana ari bo babangamiwe cane, mu gihe urupfu rumwe muri zitanu zitewe na AMR rushika mu bana bari munsi y'imyaka itanu. Impfu zitewe na AMR zigereranywa ko ari: Deaths from AMR were estimated to be: Impfu zivuye kudakora kwa antibiotic vyari vyitezwe kuba: Prof Chris Murray, wo mu kigo kijejwe ibiharuro mu vy'amagara n'ubugenduzi kuri Kaminuza ya Washington, yavuze ko ibiharuro bishasha vyerekana isura y'ukuri y'ikibazo c'udukoko turinda imiti kw'isi kandi ko ari imburi yuko hakwiye kugira igikorwa vuba "nitwaba dushaka gutsinda urugamba rw'udukoko turinda imiti". Abandi bahinga bavuga ko gukurikrana urugero rw'ukurinda imiti mu bihugu bitandukanye n'uturere ari nkenerwa. Muganga Ramanan Laxminarayan, wo mu kigo Centre for Disease Dynamics, Economics and Policy, i Washington, yavuze ko amahera atangwa ku rwego rw'isi yo guhangana n'ikibazo ca AMR akeneye kwongerwa gushika ku rugero rw'ayakoreshwa ku zindi ndwara. Yagize ati "Ubwa mbere na mbere amahera akwiye gushirwa mu gukinga ubwandu, hakarabwa ko antibiotic zihari zikoreshwa neza kandi mu buryo bubereye, hamwe no gushira ku masoko antibiotics nshasha". Muganga Laxminarayan yongeye ati henshi kw'isi hari ikibazo co kubona imiti ya antibiotic izimbutse kanyi ivura neza - kandi ivyo bikwiye gufatwa nkama n'abarongozi mu vy'amagara hamwe n'abanyepolitike aho ari ho hose.

column2: Eritrea ‘yigaruriye ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyegukira katolika’
column3: Amakuru ashikira BBC igisata c'ururimi rwa Tigrinya, amenyesha ko leta y'igihugu ca Eritrea yategetse Ekleziya Katolika gushikiriza ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyose bisanzwe vyegukira iryo dini. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, abategetsi basavye abarongoye ivyo bigo  gutera igikumu ku rwandiko rwemeza ko babishikirije. Ariko abarongoye ivyo bigo nka bose baranse gushira umukono kuri urwo rwandiko, basaba ahubwo ko bovugana n'abarongoye iryo shengero. Inyuma y'aho, abajejwe umutekano bategetse abakozi bavyo gusohoka, baca baravyugara. Nta wuzi igituma ubutegetsi bwa Eritrea bufashe iyo ngingo. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane uno mwaka, abasenyeri ba Ekleziya Katolika muri Eritrea barasavye ko hotanguzwa umugambi w'ukunywanisha mu gihugu, ivyotuma abanyagihugu bose batunganirwa. Mu rwandiko rw'impapuro 30 rwanditswe n'abo basenyeri inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro hagati y'ico gihugu na Ethiopia, bamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko abanyagihugu bonywanishwa kugira ngo igihugu gikire. Basavye ubutegetsi ko bwogira impinduka zotuma abanyagihugu batipfuza guhunga igihugu.

column2: Indyane hagati ya Britney Spears na murumunawe zigeze kure, aho baryanira ku mbuga hwaniro
column3: Britney Spears na mushikiwe we Jamie Lynn bamaze imisi baterana amajambo biturutse ku kiganiro giheruka ku mboneshakure hamwe no ku mubano wabo wo muri kahise. Uyu muririmvyi yagiriza murumunawe ko yaciye ku kiganiro co ku wa gatatu mu kumenyekanisha igitabo ciwe "akoresheje izina ryanje". Britney avuga ko Jamie Lynn ata "kintu na kimwe yigeze akora" kandi umuryango "ukunda kunyononera no kumbabaza". Jamie Lynn avuga ko amajambo ya Britney ari "ibinyoma vyeruye" kandi ko igihe cose yamye hafi ya mukuruwe. Uyu mugore w'imyaka 30 avuga ko buri gihe yama ariko agerageza gusigurira abana biwe "igituma umuryango wacu ubandanya uterwa ubwoba bwo kwicwa, nk'ingaruka y'amajambo yandikwa na inasenge wabo yo kuwagiriza ibintu bidafashe, cane cane mu gihe tuzi ko yetegerezwa kuvugisha ukuri". Britney amaze igihe anegura umuryango wiwe ku kungene wamufashe mu myaka 13 wamaze ari wo ujejwe amatungo yiwe, igihe amafaranga n'ubuzima bwiwe vyari mu minwe ya se wa Jamie. Urubanza rwagiye kurangirira muri sentare mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Jamie Lynn Spears avuga iki? Uyu mutoyi wa Britney yatanze ikiganiro ku mboneshakure ABC mu kiganiro Good Morning America (twogereranya na Mwaramutse Amerika) mu ntango z'iyi ndwi turiko turangiza asigura igitabo ciwe Things I Should Have Said (mu kirundi twovuga tuti: Ivyo nategerezwa kuba navuze). Iki gitabo kivugwa ko gisigura ubuzima bwiwe, harimwo n'isanganya umukobwa wiwe yagize rigahakwa kumutwara ubuzima mu 2017, imigenderanire yiwe na Britney hamwe n'ikibanza yari afise mu kubungabunga umutungo w'uyu muririmvyi. Muri ico kiganiro, Jamie Lynn yiyise "umufasha wa mushikanje akomeye cane" hanyuma avuga ko "yafashe ingingo zo gufasha" guhagarika ivyo kumubikira umutungo. Ariko nk'uko bivugwa na ABC, yavuze ko inyifato ya Britney muri kahise "itari itomoye", "irangwa n'ubwoba butagira ishingiro"  kandi ko yari "mahindagu". Yabwiye iki kiganiro ati: "Igihe hafatwa ingingo yo kumubikira amatungo yiwe, jewe nari mfise imyaka 17, nari hafi yo kwibaruka, rero jewe sinatahura ivyariko biraba, kandi sinavyitaho". Jamie Lynn abandanya avuga ko mushikiwe yamwegereye akamusaba nimba "yoshobora kumukurikiranira abahungu biwe bakaronka ivyo bakeneye", ivyo yamwemereye. Abandanya ati: "Ariko, urazi ko maze kumenya ko abikiwe umutungo, numva umengo sinashaka kubigiramwo uruhara gushika kumbure aho azobiviramwo. Rero si jewe namucungira amafaranga yiwe canke ibintu nk'ivyo, rero nimba vyari bimeze uko harabaya ukutumvikana, ariko gusa uko vyoba vyaragenze kwose, nta ngingo nafashe yo kuvyinjiramwo". Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Britney yanditse ati: "Naravye muri terefone nca mbona ko mushikanje yatanze ico kiganiro mu kumenyekanisha igitabo ciwe. "Ibintu bibiri vyambabaje mushikanje yavuze ni ingene avuga ko inyifato yanje yari iy'ubutabanga. "Ntiyigeze aba hafi yanje mu myaka 15 iheze ico gihe... none mbega ni kubera iki twobizana atari uko ashaka kugurisha igitabo ciwe akoresheje izina ryanje". Britney avuga kandi ko akibabajwe n'ingene Jamie Lynn aherutse gusubiramwo indirimbo ziwe zamamaye. Uyu muririmvyi rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa pop w'imyaka 40 yanditse ati: "Ndazi ko abatari bake bashobora kuvyumva nk'ibitagira mvura, ariko nanditse indirimbo zanje nyinshi kandi mushikanje yari akiri uruhinja. Nta kintu na kimwe yari ashoboye gukora. Yama ahabwa ibintu vyose". "Namye ndi umuntu mukuru. Vyose barabikoze barankinisha, nkiyicarira aho hanyuma nkabifata uko". Yongerako ati: "Jamie Lynn, ndibaza ko ibintu ari vyiza n'igitabo cane". Jamie Lynn Spears nawe yahavuye yishura ku nyishu yatanzwe wa Britney, aho abwira abamukurikirana ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "N'ukuri, mvugishije ukuri, ibintu bivugwa nta kuri na gutoya kurimwo". Avuga ko igitabo ciwe kiterekeye Britney gusa, ariko akongerako ati: "Gusa sinohava mpakana ngo mvuge ko ntari mwene Spears, kandi ko bimwe mu vyo nzi mushikanje abifisemwo uruhara". Jamie Lynn, yamenyekanye canke mu rukurikirane rw'ibiganiro All That and Zoey 101 vy'imboneskakure Nickelodeon akaba yaranasohoye indirimbo yiwe, agaruka ku buzima bwiwe avuga ko bwabayemwo ibibazo bikomeye igihe kitari gito. Yandika ati: "Namye nkorana umwete udasanzwe kuva mbere nkiri umuyabaga, kandi narashoboye kwubaka umwuga wanje n'aho nitwa ko ndi mutoya wa mushikanje. "Si ndiko ndiyemera canke nishira hejuru, ariko ndiko mvuga ukuri kwanje kugira ngo nkire ibisebe mfise ku mutima, kugira ngo ibi bintu birangire hanyuma mbandanye nja imbere, kandi nipfuza ko na mushikanje yokora uko".

column2: 338 barishwe muri Ethiopia mu ndyane z'amoko kuno kwezi
column3: Leta ya Ethiopia ivuga yuko abantu amajana atatu na mirongo itatu n'umunani bishwe mu ntango za kuno kwezi. Ni bwo bwicanyi bwa mbere bubi bushingiye ku moko butaheruka muri ico gihugu mu kiringo c'imyaka myinshi. Vyari vyavuzwe mbere yuko abantu bashika n'imiburiburi amajana abiri na mirongo itanu, bagizwe ahanini n'abo mu bwoko bw'aba-Amhara, biciwe mu gitero mu ntara ya Oromia. Umuvugizi wo mu biro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere yavuze yuko igipolisi kikiriko kirakora amatohoza. Leta yanse ivyasabwe - na ONU irimwo mu babisaba - vy'uko hakorwa itohoza ryigenga kuri ubwo bwicanyi. Umugwi witwaje ibirwanisho uzwi nka Oromia Liberation Army waragirijwe kugaba ico gitero ariko warabihakanye. Mu myaka ibiri iheze, iyindi ntara ya Tigrinya nayo yarabayemwo imirwano ikomeye hagati y'abarwanyi b'umuhari TPLF wo muri ako karere n'abasirikare ba leta. Naho ubu hasa n'ahari agahengwe, umutekano nturahagaruka neza kandi iyo mirwano yasizemwo ubuzima ibihumbi vy'abantu abandi benshi barahunga.

column2: Haribonekeza ubukene bwa Amstel ndende na bock mu Burundi
column3: Haraciye igihe mu Burundi hibonekeza ubukene bw'ikinyobwa ca Amstel ndende, hamwe na Amstel ngufi bita bock nk'uko abakunzi b'izi nzoga babivuga. Abihereza ivyo binyobwa bavuga ko bisigaye ari umuzi w'ibuye, bikaba ngombwa ko bihereza Primus canke Royal badakunda, canke bakanywa za skol bavuga ko ziva mu gihugu c'u Rwanda, zigurishwa ku giciro kiri hejuru. Umwe ati: "Si benshi bashoboye kwigurira skol kuko zirazimvye". Hampande y'inzoga za Amstel, haranavugwa kandi n'ikena ry'amafanta yo mu bwoko bwa coca. Ikompanyi Brarudi iremera ko izo nyobwa zikenye, ariko ko ikibazo kiri ahanini ku bakiriya b'umurengera muri kino gihe. Aho ni mu gihe hari abibaza ko vyoba bitumwa n'ikena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro. Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mw'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi, aremeza ko iyo ngorane iriho ariko ko bakora ibishoboka kugira ngo bayitorere umuti. Ati: "Mu gihe nk'iki, turonka abanywanyi b'umurengera, ariko Brarudi iriko irakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ishobore gushimisha abakiriya bayo". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu biteye imbere bimwe vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco. Ibanki y'isi ivuga ko mu 2015 ubutunzi bw'Uburundi bwagabanutse ku rugero rwa -3.9%, mu 2016 bukagabanuka ku rugero rwa -0.6%, mu 2017, ariko bukaduga kuri 0.5% nayo mu 2018 bukaduga kuri 1,6%. Iyi banki ariko ivuga ko iri duga ryo mu myaka ibiri iheze ari rito cane ugereranyije n'ivyo igihugu gikenera, ikena rikomeye ry'amafaranga y'agaciro, ihagarikwa ry'intererano z'amakungu ivyo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku rudandazwa rw'ibiva hanze.

column2: La Haye: Kabuga Felicien yasubiye kumenyesha ko adashaka uwumwunganira
column3: Felicien Kabuga akekwa uruhara muri jonoside yo mu Rwanda yasubiye kubwira sentare ko adashaka uwumwunganira, Maitre Emmanuel Altit. Yabivugiye mu kwumvirizwa kw'uno munsi kwabaye hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa none, kwari ukwo kuraba nimba uruhande rurega n'ururegwa ata nzitizi bagifise zotuma urubanza rudatangura ukuri kwamye. Umucamanza w'igisata c'i La Haye mu Buholandi c'urwego rwasigaranye imanza zasizwe na Sentare Mpanavyaha Mpuzamakungu yashiriweko u Rwanda, Iain Bonomy, yabanje gusubiramwo intambwe zose uru rubanza rumaze gucamwo kuva uwuregwa agifatwa. Yibukije yuko yemerewe kuburanira i La Haye hako yojanwa i Arusha muri Tanzania kubera imvo z'amagara, anavuga yuko sentare ishikirizwa ivyegeranyo vy'ukuntu amagara y'uwuregwa yifashe. Ku nshuro zibiri zose kwumvirizwa kwagomvye gushirwa mu mwiherero bisabwe n'uwunganira Bwana Kabuga ari we Maitre Emmanuel Altit. Ku nshuro ya mbere urubanza rwashizwe mu mwihero igihe umucamanza Iain Bonomy yabaza niba hari inzitizi Bwana Kabuga yoba agise zobuza urubanza gutangura. Maitre Altit yavuze ko hari ikibazo c'amagara adashobora kuvugira ahabona, umucamanza aca ashira urubanza mu bwiherero. Kwumvirizwa kwashizwe mu mwiherero ubugira kabiri nyuma y'aho Kabuga aherewe ijambo ngo avuge inzitizi we abona zoba zikiriho, akavuga yuko gushika ubu atavugana n'uwumwunganira Maitre Altit, ko atamushikiriza amakuru n'amwe akaba ahubwo ashaka yuko yosubirizwa n'uwitwa Peter Robison. Maitre Altit abajijwe ico abivugako, yaciye abwira umucambanza yuko impungenge Bwana Kabuga amufiseko atozivugira ahabona, gutyo ukwumvirizwa gushirwa kandi mu mw'iherero. Twokwibutsa ko iki kibazo co kwanka kwunganirwa na Maitre Altit, Felicien Kabuga be n'umuryango wiwe bagishikirije kuva yashikamwa imbere ya sentare ku nshuro ya mbere mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe 2020, bakavuga yuko ata kwumvikana n'uwo mushingwamanza kuriho. Bwana Kabuga, yarengutse hakoreshejwe uburyo bwa video, yongeyeko yuko kiretse uwo mwunganizi wiwe adashaka, yumva ata kindi comubuza kwitabira urubanza rwiwe. Ubushinjacaha nabwo bwahawe ijambo, buvuga yuko ata nzitizi bobo bafise, kiretse kumenyesha ko hari ingingo zibiri batazokurikirana, ingingo bise ko ari izo mu muce wa 45 A, E hamwe na 64 A mu kirego bashikirije. Kwumvirizwa kwaciye kwimurirwa ku tariki itaciye imenyeshwa. Kabuga Felicien yafatiwe mu Bufaransa itariki 16/05/2020, nyuma y'imyaka irenga 20 aronderwa n'ubutungane ku ruhara yagirizwa muri jenoside yo mu Rwanda mu 1994.

column2: Kenya: Umupasitori yishe umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero
column3: Umupasitori wo muri Kenya yatangaje abakirisu igihe yacumita umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bari gusenga ejo ku wa Mungu, mu rusengero bafatanije gushinga mu gisagara ca Mombasa. Abakirisu bari muri urwo rusengero babwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko Elisha Misiko yari yicaye mu kibanza c'imbere, igihe umugore wiwe nawe, Ann Mghoi, yari kuri arutari ariko arasigura. Niho umugabo wiwe Misiko yamusangayo n'imbugita yari yanyegeje mw'ishati yari yambaye amucumita mu mugongo. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bapfa uburongozi bw'urwo rusengero rwitwa 3 G (Grounds for God's Gospel). Umwe mu bakirisu basengera muri urwo rusengero ati: "Twebwe twibaza ko cari ikintu yari agiye kumubwira, kumbe yari agiye kumucumita imbugita". Uwundi ati: "Uyu mugabo yari yarubakanye n'uyu mupfasoni arongoye uru rusengero, ariko bari barahukanye. Yari amaze kumutera ubwoba incuro nyinshi, kandi yari yanavuze ko azokora ivyo yakoze uno munsi". Ahejeje kumucumitaniho  nawe yaca yicumita mu nda, agerageza no kwikata izosi, mu gihe abakirisu bari bagiye gutabara. Uyo mugabo yaciye apfa ubwo nyene, mu gihe umugore wiwe yagiye gupfira mu bitaro. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bari baratandukanye bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero, aho umwe wese yashaka kuba ari we mukuru, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Daily Nation. Rwari rusigaye ruyobowe n'umugore, ivyo Pasitori Misiko, umugabo wiwe, atashaka kwumva.

column2: USA: Intara ya Oregon yitwariye ubutegetsi bw'igihugu kw’ihohotera rikorerwa abari mu myiyerekano
column3: Umushikirizamanza mukuru mu ntara ya Oregon muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yitwariye ubutegetsi bw'igihugu, abwagiriza ko buriko burahohotera abari mu myiyerekano . Kuva umwirabure George Floyd yicwa, igisagara ca Portland muri iyo ntara kiri mu myiyerekano y'urutavanako y'ijoro. Muri ino ndwi, abapolisi barungitswe n'ubutegetsi bw'igihugu bari mu mamodoka atamenyekana barabonetse bariko bacakira abari mw'ibarabara banabapfunga ataco babagirije. Ubutegetsi bw'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika buvuga ko buriko bugerageza kugarukana umutekano muri ico gisagara. Izo ngabo z'ubutegetsi bwa Amerika zarungitswe na Perezida Donald Trump ziratera abari mu myiyerekano vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi be n'amasasu ya plastiki. Mu minsi iheze, umushikiranganji mfatakibanza w'intwaro yo hagati Chad Wolf yavuze ko abari mu myiyerekano ari imirwi y'abagumutsi. Ejo ku wa gatandatu mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, abari mu myiyerekano barerekanywe bariko basambura uruzitiro ruri hafi ya sentare y'igihugu, ariko haciye amasaha make rurasanurwa. Ibiro vy'umushikirizamanza wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika muri Oregon bwatangaje ku rubuga rwa Twitter ko urwo ruzitiro rwari rufise intumbero yo "kugabanya icuka kibi hagati y'abari mu myiyerekano n'abashinzwe kwubahiriza amategeko, maze asaba abantu kubireka bonyene. Abapolisi batangaje ko hanze y'inyubakwa y'ishirahamwe ry'abapolisi ba Portland mu mburaruko bw'igisagara hateye imidugararo. Igipolisi kivuga ko iyo nyubakwa yaturiwe ariko ko bashoboye kuzimya umucanwa. Muri uru rubanza, umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Oregon, Ellen Rosenblum, asaba ko hafatwa ingingo yo kubuza izi ngabo gusubira guhagarika abantu muri ico gisagara. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, umupfasoni Rosenblum  yavuze ati: "Ibi bintu bitegerezwa guhagarara. Uretse ko vyaka uburenganzira abanyagihugu bwo gukora imyiyerekano, biriko biteza uruhagarara mu mabarabara". Yongerako y'uko uburyo bakoresha "budakenewe namba kandi ntibujanye n'imico y'ubuntu biranga Oregon". Abona ko ubutegetsi bwa Amerika bwahisemwo ico gisagara kugira ngo butere ubwoba abanyagihugu bashe coba, maze bahebe kwiyamiriza ubugome bw'igipolisi n'ugushigikira rya sekeza ryiswe Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'Abirabure ni nkenerwa). Asaba buri munyamerika kwiyamiriza ibi bintu igihe cose abibonye. Ati: "Nimba biriko biraba hano muri Portland uno munsi, ejo bishobora kuba n'ahandi". Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, buramatari w'intara ya Oregon, Kate Brown, yaragirije abajejwe umutekano barungitswe na leta ya Amerika "gukoresha vyenyuje  igikenye". Inkuru yatangajwe n'ikigo ntangamakuru Oregon Public Broadcasting (OPB) mu ntango z'ino ndwi, yari igizwe n'abiboneye ubwabo ingene abo bajejwe umutekano barungitswe n'ubutegetsi bw'igihugu, bambaye impuzu zo kwiyoberanya, bakoroka bava mu mamodoka yiyoberanije, bayora abantu baterera mu modoka baca babatwara igikubikubi. Indwi iheze yaranzwe n'imidugararo ikomeye hagati y'abari mu myiyerekano n'abo bajejwe umutekano barungitswe  mu ndwi zibiri ziheze na Perezida Trump kugira ngo bahagarike iyo myiyerekano. Ireresi yasohowe na OPB yerekana umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano, Mark Pettibone, asigura ingene ku wa 15 z'uku kw'indwi "yajugunywe" mu modoka yarimwo abantu bitwaje ibirwanisho. Bwana Pettibone yavuze ko bamujanye mu gasho ka sentare y'igihugu, aho yasomewe ibijanye n'uburenganzira afise nk'impfungwa. Amaze kwanka kwishura ibibazo, yararekuwe ata dosiye bamwugururije. Nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo ntangamakuru OPB, abajejwe umutekano ku rwego rw'igihugu baramaze gucira urubanza abantu n'imiburiburi 13 ku vyaha bijanye n'iyi myiyerekano. Igihe ashika muri ico gisagara ku wa kane aje kubonana n'abajejwe umutekano, umushikiranganji mfatakibanza w'intwaro yo hagati n'umutekano yavuze ko abajejwe umutekano barungitswe ngo bahagarike "akajagari". Mw'itangazo yasohoye, bwana Wolf yaragirije abategetsi b'intara n'ico gisagara ko bananiwe no "kugarukana umutekano". Avuga ati: "Haciye iminsi 47 yose igisagara ca Portland kirangwamwo uruhagarara" "Buri joro abatera imidugararo baronona amatungo y'igihugu, harimwo n'inyubakwa za sentare, bakanatera n'abajejwe umutekano basanzwe bayacunze". Amajambo ya Wolf niyo asanzwe avugwa na Perezida Trump. Muri ino ndwi nyene, umukuru w'igihugu yashimagije utwigoro tw'izo ngabo z'igihugu zijejwe umutekano i Portland, avuga ko bakoze igikorwa gikomeye.

column2: India: Umupatiri n’umubikira bakatiwe guherayo bagirizwa kugandagura uwundi mubikira
column3: Umupatiri w'umugatorika n'umubikira bo mu Buhindi baciriwe umunyororo w'ubuzima bwose bagiriwe n'icaha co kugandagura uwundi mubikira, haraciye  imyaka irenga 28. Patiri Thomas Kottoorna hamwe n'Umubikira Sephy baciriwe urubanza ku wa kabiri bagiriwe kwica uwundi mubikira yari afise imyaka 21, Umubikira Abhaya mu 1992, maze baca bazimanganya ivyemezo vy'ubu bwicanyi. Aba bantu babiri bagandaguye uyu mubikira mu gihe yari abafashe bari mu busambanyi. Mu ntango, igiporisi cari cibajije ko uyu mubikira yari akiri muto yoba yariyahuye. Ariko haciye hatangura amatohoza yimbitse inyuma y'aho umuryango wiwe n'abaharanira agateka ka muntu berekaniye amakenga ku rupfu rwiwe. Sephy w'imyaka  55 ntaco aravuga kuri uru rubanza, ariko Patiri Kottoor ubu afise imyaka 69 ashimangira ko ari umwere. Ejo k uwa gatatu asomewe urwo rubanza, yabwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri ici o gihugu ati: "Jewe nta caha nakoze. Imana iri kumwe nanje". Hari uwundi mupatiri agira gatatu, Patiri Jose Poothrikkayil, na we yagirijwe n'abashikirizamanza ko yasambanije Umubikira Sephy. Yarahagaitswe mu 2008 kuri ubu bwicanyi ariko mu nyuma ararekurwa kubera habuze ivyemezo. Ikiziga c'uyu mubikira Abhaya catowe mu kinogo hafi y'uburaro bw'ababikira bwitiriwe umweranda Piyo mu gisagara ca Kottayam kiri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi. Sentare yavuze ko imbere y'uko yicwa, Abhaya yaravyutse mu gaturuturu ku wa 27 z'ukwa gatatu 1992, aja mu gikoni c'ubwo buraro bw'ababikira agiye gutora amazi yari muri firigo. Mu gihe yashika mu gikoni, yafashe mpiri Kottoor na Sephy. Sentare ivuga ko ku gutinya ko yohava abamenera ibanga, baciye bamwica hanyuma banyegeza ikiziga. Amatohoza ku rupfu rw'uyu mubikira yari akiri muto yarabaye ikibazo ngorabahizi mu Buhindi. Mu ntango, igiporisi c'akarere n'ic'igihugu vyari vyavuze ko yari yariyahuye. Ariko, mu 1993, ikigo c'Ubuhindi kijejwe igendereza (Central Bureau of Investigation, CBI) caciye gifata mu minwe iki kibazo, maze gisanga yarishwe, ariko nticashoka gitora abamugandaguye. Kw'itegeko rya sentare nkuru y'igihugu mu 2008, CBI yaciye isubira kwugurura amatohoza, irahagarika yongera iragiriza Kottoor, Sephy na Patiri Jose Poothrikkayil, ariko mu nyuma bararekuwe batanze ingwati. Niho haca hakurikira urubanza rwamaze igihe kirekire. Jomon Puthenpurackal aharanira agateka ka zina muntu akaba ari mu baharaniye ko uwakoze aka kabi kabishe akubitwa intahe mu gahanga avuga ati: "Ubutungane burarenganuye Umubikira Abhaya. Agiye kwiruhukira mu mahoro".

column2: France: Umuriro wadutse mw’isengero nkuru rya Nantes
column3: Isengero rikuru Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul  ryo mu gisagara ca Nantes mu Bufaransa ryatewe n'umuriro w'icaduka. Abajejwe kuzimya imiriro y'ivyaduka barenga 60 nibo bashitse kuri iryo sengero kugira bagerageze kuwuzimya nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiyamakuru vyaho. Nta wuzi icateye uwu muriro. Amasanamu ava aho ivyo biriko biba yerekana umuriro n'umwotsi biva muri iyo nyukabwa. Uyu muriro wadutse haciye umwaka umwe gusa uwundi muriro ukoze ibara kw'isengero rikuru Notre-Dame mu gisagara ca Paris, rimwe mu mitungo ya kahise k'u Bufaransa. Televiziyo BFM TV, itangaza ko abapolisi muri ico gisagara ca Nantes kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'u Bufaransa batumweko hafi isaha imwe n'iminota 44 mu gatondo. Umwe mu babibonye avuga ko yashobora kubona uwo mucanwa ari muhira, hafi y'iryo sengero. Avuga ko yakanguwe n'urwamo rudasanzwe rw'inkengeri. Ati: "Ku vyo mbona, ni uko umwotsi utera wongerekana". Iryo sengero sibwo bwa mbere riterwa n'umucanwa. Mu 1972, umuriro warasambuye igisenge caryo, bituma ryugarwa mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu ririko rirasubirwamwo.

column2: Christian Eriksen: 'Yarapfuye hanyuma arazuka' - uwamuvuye aravuga ingene vyagenze
column3: "Vyari vyaheze. Yarapfuye hanyuma arazuka" Muganga ajejwe kuvura umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Danemark, Morten Boesen, avuga aya majambo igihe yariko asigura ivyabaye mw'ijoro ryo ku wa gatandatu ku mukinyi Christian Eriksen. Ku munota wa 43 y'igice ca mbere mu rukino rwa mbere rw'umurwi B mw'ihiganwa rya Euro 2020 hagati ya Danemark na Finland, uyu mukinyi asanzwe akina muri Inter Milan yagiye kwakira umupira wari usubijwe mu kibuga n'amaboko. Mu gihe yari agiye kuwakira, yabanje kuzungagirika incuro zitari nke mu nyuma aca agwa bukumbi. Eriksen yarataye ubwenge mu kiringo c'iminota itari mike, akikijwe n'abakinyi bagenzibe. Iyi minota yabaye mu biringo biteye ubwoba mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru bukeye ku wa Munu, Boesen yavuze ati: "Yari yagiye, vyari vyarangiye. Yarapfuye hanyuma arazuka. Ni indwara y'umutima yari imuhitanye". "Yahatswe kutujana bigenze gute? Nta vyo nzi, ariko twarashoboye kwikora ku buhinga bwacu turamuhembura". Bifashishije ubuhinga bwo guhembura uwaravye, Eriksen yavanywe mu kibuga ari ku nderuzo aca asimbanwa mu bitaro, abarorerezi bakoma amashi mu kumutera intege". Boesen ati: "Ibipimo tumaze kumufata gushika ubu vyerekana ko ata ngorane, nta nsiguro turaronka ku vyamubayeko". Urukino hagati ya Danemark na Finland rwahavuye rubandanya haciye amasaha makeya rubanje guhagarikwa. Ku gitsindo cinjijwe na Joel Pohjanpalo, Finland yatahukanye intsinzi. Yabaye intsinzi ya mbere n'igitsindo ca mbere c'uyu murwi wa Finland mu mateka yayo mw'ihiganwa rya Buraya. Ku ruhande rwiwe, umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Danemark, Kasper Hjulman , avuga ko yavuganye na Eriksen, akaba yamubwiye ko atibuka neza ivyabaye. Hjulmand avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yumva akomeye kandi ko yiteguye gusubira mu myimenyerezo". Ariko, abihweza ibintu n'ibindi batari bake bavuga ko bigoye ko umukinyi ahuye n'ikibazo nk'iki cashikiye Eriksen asubira gukina umupira". Umwe muri aba ni Sanjay Sharma yari umuganga w'indwara z'umutima igihe uyu mukinyi yakina muri Tottenham mu Bwongereza kuva mu 2013 gushika 2020. Sharma  yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru PA ati: "Sinzi ko ashobora gusubira gukina umupira w'amaguru. Mvugishije ukuri, yari yapfuye (ku wa gatandatu), n'aho vyabaye ivyo iminota mikeya, ariko yari yapfuye". "None hari umuganga yosubira kumwemerera gusubira gupfa? Inyishu ni oya". Yongerako ati: "Inkuru nziza ni uko azokira, ariko inkuru mbi ni uko ashitse ku maherezo y'umwuga wiwe". Sharma aremeza ko Eriksen atigeze yerekana ko afise ikibazo na kimwe c'amagara mu gihe cose yamaze akina muri Tottenham cari gushobora gusigura ivyamubayeko i Copenhagen ku wa gatandatu. Ati: "Biragaragara ko hari ikintu cagenze nabi cane. Ariko yarashoboye kurokoka. "Ikibazo ni iki: habaye iki? Hanyuma kandi kubera iki vyabaye? Uyu mukinyi nta kibazo na kimwe yigeze agira mu bipimo vyose yafashwe gushika mu 2019, none wosigura gute iri hagarara ry'umutima?" Aho arwariye, avuga ko ameze neza kandi ko abandany atora mitende. Kuva yinjijwe ibitaro inyuma y'ivyamubayeko ku wa gatandatu, Christian Eriksen yashoboye kugira ico ashikirije ubwa mbere, aho avuga ko azobandanya atera intene bagenziwe muri rino higanwa rya Euro 2020. Yanditse kuri Instagram ati: "Ndashimye cane ku ndamutso n'ubutumwa mbandanya ndonka biva mu mpande zose z'isi". "Bisobanura vyinshi kuri jewe n'umuryango wanje". "Meze neza - inyuma y'ivyabaye. Mbandanya n'ibindi bipimo mu bitaro, ariko meze neza".

column2: Ingabo zidasanzwe za Australia zagirizwa kwica abasivire muri Afghanistani
column3: Hari ivyemezo nyavyo vyerekana ko ingabo zidasanzwe za Australia zishe mu buryo buteye kubiri n'amategeko abantu 39 mu gihe c'intambara muri Afghanistani, nk'uko biri mu cegeranyo cari kirindiranywe igishika. Igisirikare ca Australia, Australian Defence Force (ADF), cerekanye ivyavuye mu matohoza yari amaze imyaka ine ku nyifato itabereye y'ingabo zaco. Kivuga ko igipolisi gitegerezwa gukora amatohoza ku bantu 19 bahoze canke bari mu ngabo zidasanzwe kuri ubu bwicanyi  bwakorewe "impfungwa, abarimyi canke abasivire" hagati ya 2009 na 2013. ADF ivuga ko ibi vyaha vyakozwe kubera "akageso k'uburwanyi" kari mu basirikare bamwe bamwe bananiwe kwigumya. Muri rino tohoza, Jenerali-Majoro Paul Brereton yarikoze yavuganye n'ivyabona birenga 400. Vyabonetse ko: Afghanistani ivuga ko Australia yayijeje ko yiyemeje "gushira imbere y'ubutungane" ababikoze. Dr. Samantha Crompvoets yakoze amatohoza y'intangamarara kuri ibi vyaha, yabwiye BBC ko vyakozwe "n'ibigirankana, bikorwa incuro nyinshi kandi ko ari ivyaha vyo mu ntambara", kandi ko iki cegeranyo camurenganuye. Australia ifise ingabo muri Afghanistani kuva mu 2002, inyuma y'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi bw'abatalibani, mu ntambara yari iyobowe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Mu ntango, igikorwa c'ingabo mpuzamakungu cari ukwigisha ingabo za Afghanistani, ariko rero mu nyuma zikaba zagiye zigira uruhara mu gikorwa co kurwanya inyeshamba. Kivuga ko abasirikare 25 bo mu ngabo zidasanzwe bagize uruhara mu bwicanyi ndengerabutungane bo nyene ubwabo canke "batumye abandi", mu vyaha bitandukanye 23. Kivuga ko ivyaha 36 ari vyo bitegerezwa gukorwako amatohoza. Umukuru w'igisirikare ca Australia, Angus Campbell, avuga ko hari ivyemezo ko abasirikare bamwe bo mu gisata kirwanira mu kirere, Special Air Service (SAS), bakoze ivyo bishakiye bitajanye n'amategeko. Avuga ko ababikoze bari bazi neza ivyo bariko barakora. Ati: "Iki cegeranyo cerekana ko iyi ngeso yatewe intege na bamwe mu ngabo z'inararibonye, kandi zifise igihagararo mu ntumbero yo kwerekana ko bakomeye kandi ari ba kibirengeye". Dr Crompvoets avuga ati: "Ibisongerezi barahimiriza canke bagatera intege abasirikare bakiri bato kugira bice impfungwa kugira ngo bashike ku ntego yabo yo kwica ku ncuro ya mbere, uko niko bahimiriza aba basirikare bakiri bato, mu buryo bwo kubaha urwinjizo muri uru rwego - iki nico cari kibabaje cane". Iri tohoza ryakozwe mu mpisho, vyumvikana ko gushika ubu ari bike bimaze kumenyekana. Mu ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Australia, Scott Morrison, yaragabishije ko iki cegeranyo kirimwo "amakuru aremereye cane kandi agumye ku banya Australia" ku vyerekeye ingabo zayo zidasanzwe. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu wa Afghanistani Ashraf Ghani bivuga ko Bwana Morrison yamuhamagaye kuri telefone amubwira ko "ababajwe cane" n'ibiri muri kino cegeranyo. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'iki gihugu yasubiwemwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP avuga ko ivyaha bivugwa muri iki cegeranyo "bidashobora kubabarirwa", ariko ko kubona vyagiye ahabona ari "intambwe ikomeye yo gushika ku butungane". Umurwi wigenga ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu muri Afghanistani wakiranye igishika kino cegeranyo, ariko ukavuga ko kidatanga ivyemezo bihagije kugira ngo ubutungane bubikorereko. Uvuga ko ari ngombwa ko iki gikorerwako kandi "hagatangwa n'indishi y'akababaro nyayo" bidatevye. Elaine Pearson wo mw'ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch riharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ibi ni ivyemezo nyavyo - ivyemeza neza ko ibi vyaha vyakozwe". Dr Crompvoets avuga ko mu ntango "yarwanijwe cane" igihe icegeranyo ntangamarara gisohokeye, ariko ko vyabonetse y'uko ivyo yavuga atarira busema. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha (ICC) yaratanguye gukora amatohoza ku vyaha bivugwa ko vyakozwe n'abasirikare ba Amerika hamwe n'abandi bagize uruhara mu ntambara ya Afghanistani. Ivyaha vyakozwe n'aba Talibani, ingabo za Afghanistani n'iza Amerika kuva mu 2003 vyitezwe gukorwako amatohoza. Icegeranyo c'iyi sentare co mu 2016 carerekanye ko hari ibimenyetso nyavyo vyerekana ko igisirikare ca Amerika cakoze ivyaha vyo kuboreza igufa abantu vyakorewe mu busho bwo mu kinyegero bw'ikigo kijejwe igendereza CIA. Iki cegeranyo kandi kivuga ko hari ivyemezo vy'uko ingabo za Afghanistani zaboreje igufa impfungwa, kandi ko aba Talibani bakoze ivyaha vyo mu ntambara nk'ubwicanyi bw'agahomerabunwa bwakorewe abasivire. Eka n'Ubwongereza buriko burakora amatohoza mu ntumbero yo kumenya niba ibirego vy'ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane bwakozwe n'ingabo zidasanzwe z'Ubwongereza bwarakorewe amatohoza neza.

column2: Austria: Umuganga yaciwe ihadabu kubera ukwihenda agaca umurwayi ukuguru kutariko
column3: Umuganga abaga muri Autriche (Austria) yaciwe ihadabu kubera yaciye ukuguru kutariko umurwayi mu munsi iheze. Ukuguru kw'i buryo k'uwo murwayi ageze mu za bukuru kwaraciwe kandi yagomba gucibwa ukw'i bubamfu, ikosa rija kubonwa haheze iminsi vyabaye. Ku wa gatatu, sentare yo muri Linz yasanze uwo muganga w'imyaka 43 yagize ikosa ryo gufata ibintu minenerwe cane aca acibwa ihadabu ry'ama dorari hafi 3000 (hafi miriyoni 6 z'amafaranga y'Uburundi). Umupfakazi w'uwo murwayi, yapfuye imbere y'uko urubanza rushika muri sentare, yanahawe amadorari ashika hafi 6.000 y'indishi. Uwo murwayi yagiye muri ivyo bitaro vyo muri  Freistadt mu kwezi kwa Rusama (ukwezi kwa gatanu) kugira acibwe ukuguru ariko umuganga yashize ikimenyetso ku kuguru kwo gucibwa kutariko, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AfFP. Iryo kosa ryagiye kugaragara mu gikorwa ca minsi yose co guhindura pansuma hanyuma umurwayi aca abwirwa ko n'ukundi kuguru gutegerezwa gucibwa. Ico gihe, ibitaro vyari vyavuze ko iryo kosa ryari ryabaye  "biturutse ku rukurikirane rw'ivyashitse bibabaje". Umuyobozi wavyo yarasavye imbabazi  icese mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru. Muri sentare, uwo muganga abaga yavuze ko  habaye ikosa  ku murongo w'ingene hahererekanywa ivyo gukora mu cumba co kubaga. Abajijwe igituma yashize ikimenyetso ku kuguru kw'i buryo aho kugishira ku kuguru kw'i bubamfu, uwo muganga w'umugore yavuze yavuze ati "Ntavyo nzi". Kuva ivyo bibaye, uwo muganga yimukiye mu bindi bitaro. Iigice c'amafaranga y'ihadabu yaciwe yarahagaritswe. Amakosa nkayo  ntakunze gushika ariko vyari bimaze kuba muri kahise. Mu 1995, umuganga wo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yamenye agejeje hagati kubaga ko yariko araca ukuguru kutariko umuntu yari arwaye diabete. Vyabaye  ngombwa ko abandanya kuko yari amaze guhimbura ibitari bike.

column2: Burundi: Abantu 40 batowe umugera Corona inyuma y'amezi abiri ata bwandu mu gihugu
column3: Umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe amagara y'abantu Thadée Ndikumana yatangaje ko abantu 40 batowe umugera wa corona mu bipimo vyakozwe mu minsi ibiri iheze. Ni ubwa mbere abantu bangana gutyo batorewe umugera icarimwe kuva hamenyekanye abantu babiri ba mbere batowe uwo mugera mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu mwaka uheze. Mw'itangazo yasomeye abamenyeshamakuru Dr Ndikumana yavuze ko 10 ba mbere batowe uwo mugera ku wa mbere mu bantu bipimisha mu mw'iteguro wo gufata urugendo mu mahanga. Yagize ati: ''Guhera uwo munsi nyene, umugwi ujejwe kugwanya indwara z'ibiza n'ivyaduka vyihuta waciye urondera abo bose boba bagiye hamwe canke boba baregeranye n'abo 10 bari bahejeje gutorwa uwo mugera''. Haciye hapimwa abantu 284, muri abo 30 baca basanganwa umugera wa corona ''vyumvikana ko muri iyi minsi ibiri iheze abanduye umugera wa corona bashika kuri 40''. Umushikiranganji Ndikumana yamenyesheje ko igitigiri kinini nk'ico c'abantu batowe umugera wa corona cabonetse hari haheze hafi amezi abiri ata muntu yanduye hagati mu gihugu. Yasiguye ko kimwe mu bituma umugera ukwiragira cane ariko hari abantu binjira mu gihugu baciye mu nzira zitazwi. Yamenyesheje ko abo bantu bose baherutse kwandura baba mu gisagara ca Bujumbura n'imicungararo yaco, kandi ko "bariko barakurikiranwa n'abaganga babijejwe kandi amagara yabo yifashe neza." Ndikumana asaba abarundi kwubahiriza ingingo zo kwirinda gukwirakwiza uwo mugera harimwo gukaraba neza intoke kenshi gashoboka, kugira umuziro kuramukanya "dukorana mu minwe canke tugwana mu nda." Izo ngingo zisabwa kwubahirizwa na cane cane ahantu hahurira abantu benshi nk'ibibuga vy'inkino, amashengero, amashuri, uburiro n'ubunywero. Gushika ubu Uburundi buciye buharura abantu barenga 840 bamaze gutorwa umugera wa corona na babiri umaze guhitana, hakurikirijwe ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Ramos, Varane, Camavinga, Coman, Messi, Ronaldo, Griezmann
column3: Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Espagne Sergio Ramos w'imyaka 35 yiteze gupimwa kwa muganga kuri uwu wa kabiri i Paris imbere y'uko yinjira muri Paris St-Germain ata kirinze gusabwa inyuma y'aho amasezerano yari afitaniye na Real Madrid arangiriye. (ESPN) Manchester United iriteguye gutanga imiriyoni hafi 70 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid umufaransa Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28, hamwe n'izindi hafi 35 kugira ngo ironke umukinyi wo hagati wa Rennes umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga w'imyaka 18, kandi iracabandanya irondera n'abandi muri rino ci. (Marca via Mail) Umukuru wa Bayern Munich Oliver Kahn afise "icizere" ko umufaransa akina imbere ku ruhande Kingsley Coman w'imyaka 25 ashobora kuguma muri uyu murwi n'aho Liverpool imwipfuza.  (Mirror) Paris St-Germain yemereye Lionel Messi amasezerano ashobora gutuma uyu musatirizi yimukira mu Bufaransa inyuma y'uko amasezerano yari afitaniye na Barcelona arangiriye mu ndwi iheze. Messi yakoze amateka adasanzwe i Nou Camp yafashije igihugu ciwe gushika mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mw'ihiganwa ry'ibihugu vyo muri Amerika Copa America ni mu gihe bitaboneka neza umurwi ashobora kuja gukinira. (Mail) Tottenham iramaze kuvugana na Southampton kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Danemark Jannik Vestergaard w'imyaka 28. (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Atletico Madrid umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30 niwe aboneka ko ashobora kugurwa na Manchester City muri rino ci mu gihe vyokwanka ko ironka umwongereza Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 akina muri Tottenham Hotspur. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Ariko kandi umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola avuga ko hari amahirwe make y'uko uyu murwi ushobora kugura uwundi musatirizi.  (Mundo Deportivo - via Manchester Evening News) Cristiano Ronaldo ari mu biganiro na Juventus kugira ngo abandanye ayikinira. Hagize imisi hari amakuru yavuga ko uyu munya Portugal w'imyaka 36 aronderwa na Manchester United.(Gazzetta dello Sport - via Mirror) Juventus irashaka kwisubiza umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United Paul Pogba w'imyaka 28 muri rino ci, inyuma y'imyaka itanu avuye muri uyu murwi w'Ubutariyano ku giciro kitari bwigere kibaho ico gihe.  (90Min) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal umufaransa Matteo Guendouzi w'imyaka 22 aboneka ko ashaka gusezera uyu murwi, ni mu gihe Marseille imwipfuza cane. (Mirror) AC Milan iriteguye kuganira na Chelsea kugira ngo ishobore kuyitiza umufaransa akina hagati Tiemoue Bakayoko w'imyaka 26. (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Liverpool iri imbere mu mirwi irondera umusatirizi wa PSG umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22, ni mu gihe kazoza kiwe muri uyu murwi kataboneka neza na rirya amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi asigaje umwaka umwe gusa. (ESPN) Umumenyereza mushasha wa Crystal Palace Patrick Vieira arizeye ko umukinyi wa mbere azoshobora kugura ari umunya Ecosse akina hagati muri Celtic Ryan Christie. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 26 kandi ariko arakurikiranwa n'umurwi Vieira yahoze akinamwo mu Bufaransa, Nice. (Daily Record) Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta aripfuza kugumana umukinyi wo hagati Emile Smith Rowe n'aho yipfuzwa cane na Aston Villa. Uyu murwi witeguye kwongereza amafaranga kugira igure uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 20, inyuma y'aho itangiye imiriyoni zirenga 41.5 z'amadorari ariko bakayiraba utw'ininga.  (Mirror) Umumenyereza mushasha wa Tottenham Hotspur Nuno Espirito Santo ariko ararondera umusatirizi w'Ubuswisi Haris Seferovic w'imyaka 29, mu gihe umurwi wiwe Benfica ushaka kumugurisha muri rino ci. (Mirror) Inter Milan irafise icizere co kugura umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu, umugiriki Kostas Tsimikas wo muri Liverpool. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 25 yinjiye muri uyu murwi mu ci riheze, ariko yashoboye gukinishwa mu nkino indwi zonyene gushika ubu mu mahiganwa yose uyu murwi warimwo.  (Calciomercato, in Italian) Umusatirizi Mario Balotelli w'imyaka 30 yahoze akina muri Manchester City aboneka ko yiteguye kuja gukinira umurwi Adana Demirspor wo muri Turukiya, akaba afise icizere ko ashobora gukinishwa mu nkino mpuzamakungu imbere y'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose ryitezwe mu mwaka uza. (Goal)

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Zaha, Pochettino, Martinez, Conte, Neves, Coutinho, Willian
column3: Tottenham na Everton ziripfuza kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Crystal Palace umunya Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 28 ku miriyoni zirenga 56.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Paris St-Germain Mauricio Pochettino ariko arihweza nimba ari ngombwa ko yosubira mu murwi Tottenham yahoze amenyereza. (Sun) Hagati aho, Tottenham iri mu biganiro n'umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ububirigi, yahoze kandi amenyereza imirwi ya  Everton na Wigan  Roberto Martinez w'imyaka 47,  mu gihe igikorwa co kurondera umusubirizi wa Jose Mourinho kibandanya. (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Inter Milan Antonio Conte yarafashije uyu murwi gutahukana igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A, ariko uyu mugabo yahoze amenyereza Chelsea ategerezwa kuva muri uyo murwi mu masaha 48 ari imbere.  (La Gazzetta dello Sport, via Metro) Wolves iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati, umunya Portugal Ruben Neves ku miriyoni hafi 50 z'amadorari kugira ngo ishobore kuronka amahera yo kwiyubaka ku muntu uwo ari we wese yosubirira umumenyereza Nuno Espirito Santo amaze kugenda. (The Athletic - subscription required) Wolves si ngombwa ngo igurishe uyu mukinyi Neves w'imyaka 24 ari muri uyu murwi kuva mu 2017, ariko izokwakiriza yompi abo bose bazomurondera mu gihe amafaranga bazoshaka gutanga yoba ashobora gufasha mu kwiyubaka.  (Express & Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Brazil Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 28 azoba ari mu bakinyi 10 bari ku rutonde rw'abazogurishwa  n'umurwi Barcelona mu ci riza.  (Star) Barcelona na Manchester City ziri mu mirwi irondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  Atalanta umudagi Robin Gosens w'imyaka 26. (Sport) Arsenal na Aston Villa igiye guhangana bikomeye mu kurondera kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa  Norwich City umunya Argentine Emiliano Buendia w'imyaka 24 . (Telegraph - subscription required) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Arsenal umunya Brazil Willian w'imyaka 32 aripfuza gusubira muri  Chelsea - inyuma y'amezi ari musi ya 12 avuye muri uyu murwi yari amazemwo imyaka indwi.  (Sky Sports) Chelsea ishobora kuba ishaka kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umwongereza Callum Hudson-Odoi w'imyaka 20, agashobora kuja mu murwi  Borussia Dortmund wo mu Budagi. Dortmund ishobora kandi kurondera umukinyi w'imbere wa  Leeds United umunya Brazil Raphinha w'imyaka 24. (Eurosport) West Ham iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa  Spartak Moscow wo muri République tchèque, Alex Kral w'imyaka  23 . (Sky Sports) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Villarreal umunya Espagne Pau Torres w'imyaka 24 yanse kuvuga ku bijanye n'amakuru avuga ko ashobora kwimukira muri Manchester United mu ci riza, imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa Europa League ruhuza iyi mirwi ibiri kuri uyu wa gatatu.  (Metro) Manchester United yashitse ku masezerano n'umunyegori wa Aston Villa umwongereza Tom Heaton w'imyaka 35 akazoshobora kuja muri uyo murwi mu kwezi kuza ataco urinze gutanga. (Express) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool umwongereza Rhys Williams w'imyaka 20, ashobora gutizwa mu mwaka w'inkino uza n'aho yari yashoboye gukina mu murwi mukuru w'uyu murwi mw'ihiganwa rirangiye rya 2020-21. (Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal umunya Uruguay Lucas Torreira avuga ko azofata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe inyuma y'inkino zo kurondera uburenganzira bwo gukinira igikombe c'isi yose mu kwezi kuza. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 25 vyari amaze umwaka wose wa 2020-2021 akina muri Atletico Madrid aho yari yaratijijwe. (Express) Arsenal ishobora kuvyura urugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  Lyon umufaransa Houssem Aouar w'imyaka 22. (Mirror) Roma irashaka kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande umwongereza Demarai Gray w'imyaka 24 yari yinjiye mu murwi Bayer Leverkusen mu kwa mbere mu masezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi hakaba harimwo umurongo uvuga ko uwumukeneye ategerezwa gutanga imiriyoni zibiri z'ama euro.  (Roma Press, via Sky Germany) Umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga arashaka kuja gukinira umurwi Paris St-Germain, umurwi wiwe Rennes ukaba umushakako imiriyoni 100 z'ama euros , mu gihe amasezerano ifitaniye n'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 18 azorangira mu ci ry'umwaka uza. (RMC Sport)

column2: Ubwa mbere mu mateka ya Katolika, Papa yagenye umugore muri sinodi y'abepiskopi
column3: Ubwa mbere mu mateka ya Ekleziya, Papa yagenye umugore nk'icegera c'umunyamabanga w'inama nkuru y'Abeposkopi. Umubikira Nathalie Becquart, ava mu Bufaransa, azoba afise uburenganzira bwo gutora muri iyo nama, isanzwe ihanura Papa kandi ikaganira ku bibazo bimwe bimwe nkoramutima muri Ekleziya Katolika. Umubikira Becquart yari asanzwe akorana n'iyi sinodi y'Abepiskopi (inama nkuru y'abasenyeri yiga ibibazo nkoramutima vya Ekleziya Katolika) kuva mu 2019 nk'umujenama. Umunyamabanga mukuru w'iyi nama nkuru, Kardinali Mario Grech avuga ko iri genwa ryerekana ko "umuryango wuguruye". Avuga ko iyi ngingo yerekana ko Papa yipfuza ko "abagore bagira uruhara runini mu gufata ingingo muri Ekleziya". Umunyamakuru wa BBC John McManus avuga ko iyi ngingo iterekana ko abagore bashobora kwatirwa mw'ibanga ry'ubusaserdoti, n'aho bamwe mu badashima iyi ngingo babona ko ari yo ibintu bitera bija. Luis Marín de San Martín, umupatiri wo muri Esupanye, na we nyene yagenywe kuba icegera c'umunyamabanga w'iyi nama. Muri ino myaka iheze, Sinodi y'Abepiskopi yaraganiriye ku bibazo nkoramutima bijanye n'ukwemera kw'Ekleziya, harimwo ikibazo c'ingene bakwiye gufata Abakatolika bubatse n'abapfakaye. Iyi ngingo ije haciye ikiringo kidashika ukwezi Papa Francis ahinduye itegeko rya Ekleziya kugira ngo yemerere abagore gusangiza no kurangura amabanga ya Arutari, n'aho iri tegeko rishimangira ko ibanga ry'ubusaserdoti ribandanya kuba iry'abagabo gusa. Hagati aho, mu mwaka uheze, Papa yaragenye abagore batandatu mu nama nkuru ijejwe gukurikirana ikigega ca Vaticano.

column2: US yafuse ibihano ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwafatiye umushikirizamanza mukuru wa CPI / ICC
column3: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zakuyeho ibihano vyari vyafatiwe umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha ( CPI/ICC), Fatou Bensouda. Ibi bihano vyari vyafashwe ku butegetsi bw'uwahoze arongoye iki gihugu Donald Trump inyuma y'aho itangarije ko yari igihe gukora amatohoza ku vyaha vyo mu ntambara vyoba vyarakozwe n'abasirikare ba Amerika muri Afghanistan, hamwe n'incuti ya Amerika Israel mu turere twa Palestina. Igihe yamenyesha iyi ngingo, umunyamabanga wa Reta ajejwe imigenderanire wa Amerika, Antony Blinken, yavuze ko ibi bihano "bitari bikwiye gufatwa kandi ko ataco vyari bimaze", aca asaba ko hoba ugukorera hamwe. Amerika ntiri muri sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha. Amerika kandi yakuye ku rutonde rudasanzwe rw'abantu bakurikiranirwa hagufi Phakiso Mochochoko arongoye igisata ca CPI kijejwe imanza, ubwuzuzanye n'ugufashanya, yongera kandi ifuta ingingo yo kwima impusha zo kwinjira muri Amerika abakozi ba CPI yari yafashwe mu 2019. Blinken yavuze ko Amerika ibandanya "yiyamiriza yivuye inyuma ingingo za CPI ku bijanye n'ivyabereye muri Afghanistan hamwe na Palestine", kandi ko yamirira kure "ingendo ya CPI yo gucira imanza abantu bo mu bihugu bitari muri iyo sentare nka Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na Israel". Ati: "Hagati aho, twemera ko impungenge zacu kuri ibi bibazo zotorerwa umuti biciye mu gukorana n'abo bose bafise uruhara mu bikorwa vya CPI aho kubicisha mu bihano". Avuga ko Amerika yakiriza yompi impinduka ziriko zirategurwa kugira ngo CPI ifashwe "kwitaho cane gusumba ivya nkenerwa vyayo no gushika ku ntego yayo nyamukuru yo kuba sentare ya nyuma mu guhana no guhagarika ivyaha vy'agahomerabunwa". Mu mwaka uheze, ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwaragirije CPI kuvogera ubusugire bwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika igihe yatanguza amatohoza ku vyaha vyo mu ntambara bishobora kuba vyarakozwe n'ingazo za Amerika, iz'Abatalibani hamwe n'iza Afghanistani muri Afghanistan. Igihe yatangaza ibi bihano, uwasubiriwe na Blinken, ari we Mike Pompeo, yavuze ko iyi sentare ari "urwego rwapfuye rubi kandi rwamunzwe na ruswa". CPI yishuye ko ibi bihano ari igitero gikozwe ku butungane n'amategeko mpuzamakungu. Umupfasoni Bensouda azorangiza ikiringo ciwe mu kwa gatandatu, akazosubirirwa n'umunyamategeko w'umwongereza Karim Khan asanzwe ari mu baharanira agateka ka kiremwa muntu.

column2: China: Uwakoze urukino rwa video 'Game of Thrones' yishwe ahawe ishano
column3: Igipolisi ca Shanghai kivuga ko umugwizatunga w'umushinwa yapfuye kuri Noheli yahawe ishano. Lin Qi w'imyaka 39 yari arongoye akaba n'umunyamabanga mukuru wa kompanyi ikora inkino zo kuri video Yoozoo izwi cane ku rukino rwa Game of Thrones: Winter is Coming. Itangazo ry'igipolisi ca Shanghai ritunga agatoke uwo bakorana na Lin - azwi kw'izina rimwe gusa rya Xu- ko ari we yikekwa. Lin yoba yarafise ubutunzi bwa miriyaridi 6.8 z'ama Yuan (imiliyoni 980 z'ama pawundi) nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo ca Hurun China Rich List. Kuri uyu wa gatanu, abakozi benshi hamwe n'abahoze bakora muri kompanyi Yoozoo bakoraniye hanze y'ibiro vyayo mu kumugandarira. Uwo mugwizatunga yari rurangiranwa kw'isoko ry'ubushinwa rigurisha inkino za video akaba yari yanatanguye urudandazwa rwo gusohora filime. Yashinze Yoozoo mu 2009, arongora neza iyo kompanyi mu gihe hariko haraba impinduka nyinshi ziganisha ku nkino zo kuri telephone ngendanwa. N'iyo kompanyi yasohoye itangazo ribabaje ku rubuga rwayo rwa Weibo Microblog. Rivuga riti:"Turikebanuye ugiye ukiri muto. Tuzokwama turi kumwe. Tuzogumana ubwitonzi, tubandanye kwemera ubugwaneza kandi tuzokwamirira kure ikintu cose kibi." Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bagize ico bavuze kuri urwo rwandiko, rwarabwe n'abantu incuro zirenga imiliyoni 290 kuri Weibo.

column2: Gukingira ibikorwa mva-bwenge mu Burundi bigeze hehe?
column3: Itariki 26 ukwezi kwa kane ni umunsi ngaruka-mwaka uzwi nka World Intellectual Property Day, canke umunsi wo kuzirikana "ibikorwa mva-bwenge". Ni umunsi ushishikariza inyungu ziva ku bikorwa bishingiye ku bwenge  birimo ubugeni, ubuvanganzo, ubusizi, birimo na muzika. Ikigaragara ni uko, mu bihugu vyinshi bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere, bene abo banyabwenge batabona inyungu z'ibikorwa vyabo n'ubwo hari amategeko abarengera. Akarorero ni  mu Burundi, aho kiretse kugira amategeko, banafise ikigo cashinzwe na leta, OBDA (Office Burundais des droits d'auteurs) co gufasha gutoza utwo turusho. Impamvu ituma ayo mategeko atubahirizwa n'izihe? Florentine Kwizera yavuganye na Francis Muhire, umwe mu bafise ibikorwa mva-bwenge, yanakurikiranye n'ivyirwa vy'amategeko ajanye no gukingira ibikorwa nk'ivyo. Yatanguye kumubaza nimba abafise ivyo bikorwa mva-bwenge bumva ko bakingiwe n'ayo mategeko (umva ico kiganiro aho hejuru). Woraba kandi n'ibi:

column2: Amacakubiri y'akataraboneka mu rukino Ubwongereza bwatsinze Bulgaria 6-0
column3: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Bulgaria, Borislav Mihailov, aratanze imihoho kubera ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ryaraye rikorewe abakinyi b'Ubwongereza. Uno munsi, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Bulgaria yari yamusavye gutanga imihoho kubera iryo abongereza baraye bakorewe mu rukino rwa nijoro ku mugwa  Sofia. Boyko Borissov "ariyamiriza bikomeye" iyo nyifato, yari igizwe n'indamutso y'aba Nazi n'indirimbo z'inguge. Urwo rukino wahagaritswe incuro zibiri zose kubera inyifato y'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba yerekanywe n'abafana ba Bulgaria. Bwana Borisso avuga ati: "Nsavye ko Borislav Mihaylov atanga imihoho mu maguru masha nk'umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Bulgaria. Yari yasavye umushikiranganji w'inkino guhagarika imigenderanire yose n'ishirahamwe, Bulgarian Football Union (BFU), harimwo "n'ayerekeye imfashanyo y'amahera " gushika Borislav Mihaylov atanze imihoho. Muri urwo rukino rw'ukurondera uburenganzira bwo gukinira igikimbe c'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu i Bulaya, Ubwongereza bwatsinze Bulgaria 6-0. Umushikiranganji w'inkino wa Bulgaria Krasen Kralev yavuze ati: "Umushikiranganji wa mbere yampamagaye mu kanya gaheze". "Mu myaka ine iheze, Leta yarakoze ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo umupira w'amaguru muri Bulgaria utere imbere". "Ariko kubera ibiherutse gushika, bafatiye ku kungene umupira w'amaguru wifashe n'ivyaraye bibaye nijoro. "Umushikiranganji wa mbere yantegetse ko kuva uno munsi mpagarika amasezerano yose na BFU, harimwo n'ayerekeye amafaranga, gushika Borislav Mihaylov atanze imihoho". Imbere y'uko urwo rukino rutangura, Mihaylov umukuru wa BFU yahoze ari umunyegori wa Reading, yaritwaye mw'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, UEFA. Yituye iryo shirahamwe avuga ko ivyariko bivugwa kuri urwo rukino vyari gutuma abantu babona ivy'ikumira ry'abakinyi b'abongereza gusumba urukino nyarwo. Iryo tyozwa ry'ejo ku wa mbere, ryari rigizwe n'indamutso z'aba Nazi n'indirimbo zityoza abirabure ko ari inguge, ryakorewe abakinyi b'Abongereza, bituma urukino ruhagarikwa incuro zibiri mu gice ca mbere. Rwatanguye guhagarikwa ku munota wa 28, umuhagarikizi abanza kuvugana n'umumenyereza w'Ubwongereza Gareth Southgate. Haciye nk'iminota itanu urukino rwahagaze, rwarasubiye rurabandanya gushika ku munota wa 43 aho rwongeye guhagarikwa. Ikibuga ca Vasil Levski gisa n'icari cugawe mu gihe c'urwo rukino inyuma y'aho Bulgaria ifatiwe ibihano kubera inyifato y'ivangura  rishingiye ku rukoba mu nkino zayihuje na Kosovo hamwe na  République tchèque

column2: Umuyabaga wa Barcelona ava Guinée-Bissau, Ansu Fati w’imyaka 16, yahawe ubwenegihugu bwa Espagne
column3: Umuyabaga Ansu Fati w'imyaka 16 akinira Barcelona yahawe ubwenegihugu bwa Espanye, ikaba ari inzira yuguruwe ngo ico gihugu gishobore kumukinisha mu nkino mpuzamakungu. Uyo muyabaga w'imyaka 16 afise kandi uburenganzira bw'ugukinira igihugu ciwe c'amavukiro ca  Guinée-Bissau , ariko kandi agashobora n'ugukinira Portugal aho sekuru na inakuru basanzwe bari. Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati nibwo bwafashe ico cemezo c'ukumwemerera igisabo ciwe inyuma y'aho akwirije imyaka 10 aba muri ico gihugu nk'uko bisabwa n'amategeko. Ivyo bivuga ko Fati ashobora gukinira umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Espanye mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi c'umupira w'amaguru w'abatarenza imyaka 17 ryimirije gutangura muri Brezili ku wa 26 z'ukwezi kw'icumi uno mwaka. Ariko n'aho azokinira Espanye mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'abatarenza imyaka 17, amategeko agenga ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi FIFA avuga ko ashobora guhindura agakina mu murwi w'abakuze. Ku munsi wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, Fati yabaye umukinyi wa mbere muto cane akiniye Barcelona mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere mu bihugu vyabo (Champions League), mu rukino rwayihuje na Borussia Dortmund rukarangira ari 0-0. Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 16 ariko yerekana ibintu bidasanzwe mu mupira w'amaguru mu murwi wiwe Barcelona, ibitangaza abatari bake ku myaka yiwe. Mu nkino zine gusa za mbere Barcelona imaze gukina mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Espanye, La Liga, Fati amaze gutsinda ibitsindo bibiri. Yatanguye gukinira Barcelona igihe uyo murwi wahura na Real Betis, akaba yagiye kwinjira mu kibuga ku munota wa 78 asubiriye umukinyi yitwa Perez. Fati yatangujwe mu kibuga ubwa mbere igihe Barcelona yatana mu mitwe na Valencia ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iheze, aho yataye abantu mu gahundwe mu gutsinda igitsindo ca mbere ku munota wa kabiri gusa urukino rutanguye, rukaba rwagiye kurangira Barcelona inyagiye Valencia ibitsindo 5 kuri 2.

column2: Burundi - Miriyaridi 7 ziranyuruzwa buri mwaka mu matagisi y'amasoko ya Bujumbura
column3: Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere rusangi mu Burundi agabisha abatoza amakori (taxes) mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura ko bagiye gufatirwa ingingo hamwe bobandanya kuba intambamyi mu kwinjiza mu kigega c'igisigara amafaranga yose ategegerezwa gutozwa mu masoko. Ingingo ya mbere ija imaze gufatwa. Inyuma y'inama bagirishijwe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura na General Gervais Ndirakobuca, hafashwe ingingo yo guhagarika abari bajejwe gutoza amakori n'ama taxe mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura. General Ndirakobuca yavuze ko  ubushikiranganji bwo nyene bwitoreje ayo mafaranga buca burenzako miriyoni 121 ku ndwi, ''kandi aba commaissaires b'amasoko ntibigeze batworohereza''. Ati: "Mwonsigurira gute ko amafaranga atozwa muri mairie mu ndwi imwe, turavye n'inzitizi twahuye nazo, ubushikiranganji buriko buratoza burenzako miriyoni 121? Ntimwumva ko igihugu capfuye?" Yavuze ko ashobora no gushika miriyoni 150 ku ndwi, bisiguye ku mwaka ko arenga  miriyaridi ndwi (ashika miliyoni $3.5). Mu ma komine yo hagati mu gihugu ho ,  umushikiranganji Ndirakubuca yavuze ko basanze muri rusangi reta itakaza miriyaridi 40  ku mwaka. Yabwiye ibitavye iyo nama harimwo abajejwe gutoza amakori mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura ati: "Inyuma y'iyi nama, uwusubira kuvyivangamwo, ibimushikira ntagire ngo n'ubushikiranganji…..ntavuge ngo reta mvyeyi itwara abantu ku Musaga'', imvugo iciye hirya yo kubagabisha ko bazofatwa, bagapfungwa-ku  Musaga niho hari ibohero rikuru rya Mpimba. Reta y'Uburundi isanzwe ishigikira imirimo y'amakomine ku mafaranga angana na miriyaridi 63  ku mwaka. Umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca  avuga ko hamwe ama komine yokwinjiza amafaranga yose ategerezwa kuboneka, ayo reta itanga yoheza agakora ibindi. Uburundi buri mu bihugu vya mbere kw'isi birangwamwo ibiturire cane, hakurikijwe icegeranyo c'uwu mwaka ca Transparency International, ikigo gikurikirana ibijanye n'ibiturire mu bihugu vyose vyo kw'isi.

column2: 'Bavuga ko ngiye kwiga ububoyi' - Nzitonda Steve Berger
column3: Nzitonda Steve Berger aramaze kugira inzu yiwe y'uburiro (restaurant) mu gisagara ca Bujumbura  kandi yatanguye kwiga guteka bamutwenga ngo ariko ariga ububoyi. Uwo musore w'imyaka 32 avuga ko yatanguye gukunda guteka akiri muto, akaba yabigize umwuga afise imyaka 17. Ubu akoresha abakozi indwi. Ariko uwo musore avuga ko kwiga uwo mwuga mu gisagara bitari vyoroshe kuko benshi bamuca intege. Agira ati:"Guteka mu gisagara uri umuhungu, ntivyoroshe. Bamwe mu bagenzi bavuga ko ndiko ndiga umwuga w'ikiboyi". Nzitonda Steve avuga ko abavyeyi bamushigikiye kuko babona ariko akora ivyo akunda. Ati:"Barababwira amajambo ariko kubera babona ndabikunda barandetse. Aranyuzamwo akavuga ko " nkeka na bo nyene hari aho bashika bagakekeranya n'aho batabivuga". Mu bakiriya ba Steve Berger harimwo abamubona baje kugura imfungurwa bagakanguka babonye ari we ariko arabiteka. Darlene Nahayo ati:"Vyari bitangaje uje kugura ikintu ukabona wakiriwe n'umuhungu  hanyuma ukabona niwe ariko aranagitegura. Ubwa mbere twarakanguka." Ariko avuga ko ari ingendo nziza n'abandi bakwiye gukurikiza, bakabona ko ata mwuga udakiza kandi ata mwuga ugenewe abahungu canke abakobwa gusa.

column2: Burundi: BRB yugaye amashirahamwe agurisha amafaranga
column3: Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yaraye ifashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro yari asanzwe yemewe. Mwitangazo ryasohowe n'umukuru w'iyo banki, Ciza Jean, avuga ko iyo ngingo izotangura kuja mu ngiro mu ndwi iza, igenekerezo rya 15 z'uku kwa kabiri. Yagiriza ayo mashirahamwe ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyo ngo bikaba vyaragize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu. Mu kwezi kw'icenda umwaka uheze, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Muri iryo tangazo, Bwana Ciza ategeka abafise amazu yo kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga y'agaciro gukuraho vuba na bwango ivyapa n'ibindi bimenyetso biyaranga. Amenyesha ko kuva ubu, amazu yemerewe kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga mvamakungu ari ayegukira amabanki. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe ku wa 15 z'ukw'icenda umwaka uheze wa 2019, buri shirahamwe ryategerezwa kuvunja amafaranga ryisunze igiciro cashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu "ritarengeje inyungu y'ibice 15%". Iyo ngingo isa n'iyagoranye gushira mu ngiro, ari co catumye mu kwezi kwa 11 umwaka uheze, BRB isohora itangazo, aho yagabisha ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: Xueli Abbing: Umwana w'umwema yatawe n'abavyeyi ubu yabaye umunyamideli wa Vogue
column3: Xueli akiri uruyoya, abavyeyi biwe bamutaye mu rugo rw'irerero ry'impfuvyi. Mu Bushinwa, kuvyara umwema bifatwa nko guhumana. Iyo ngorane mvukanwa idakunze kuboneka ituma umuntu atagira irangi nk'iryo abandi, yatumye urukoba n'imishatsi vya Xueli vyera cane. Ubwo bumuga kandi bwatumye uwo mwigeme abangamirwa n'umuco w'izuba. Ariko uko kudasa n'abandi vyatumye Xueli bimwugururira imiryango muvyo umudeli. Ubu ku myaka 16, aragaragara mu kinyamakuru Vogue no mw'imenyekanisha ry'abashonyi b'impuzu rurangiranwa. Xueli yaraganiriye n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Jennifer Meierhans. Abakozi bo mw'irerero ry'impfuvyi banyise Xue Li. Xue bisigura urubura (Neige) hanyuma Li bigasigura mwiza. Nagiye kurererwa mu wundi muryango mfise imyaka itatu, nca nja kubana na mawe na benewacu muri Hollande. Mawe yavuze ko ata rindi zina yiyumvira ryoba ryiza nk'iryo aca yiyumvira ko vyoba vyize ngumanye ikintu cerekana amamuko yanje yo mu Bushinwa. Igihe navuka mu Bushinwa, reta yarakajije itegeko ry'uko imiryango ivyara umwana umwe umwe. Nta mahirwe umuntu yaba afise mu gihe avyaye umwana w'umwema. Abana bamwe bamwe nka nje, baratawe, abandi bakugaranwa canke na ho bagiye kw'ishure imishatsi yabo bakayisiga irangi ryirabura. Ariko mu bihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika, barahigwa buhongo, ibihimba vyabo bigahimburwa bakanicwa. Abapfumu bakoresha amagufa yabo mu gukora imiti, abantu bakaba bemera ko ishobora kuvura ingwara, ariko muvyo ukuri, si vyo. Bijanye no kwemera kwa kera. Naragize Imana baranta gusa. Abavyeyi bamvyaye ntibasize ikintu na kimwe kindanga ari na co gituma ntazi igihe navukiye. Ariko nko  mu mwaka umwe uheze, naragirishije ibipimo vya X-ray vy'ikiganza canje kugira ngerageze kumenya imyaka noba mfise hanyuma abaganga bakaba bibajije ko noba mfise imyaka 15. Nagiye muvyo umudeli nk'igihamana mfise imyaka 11. Mawe yari azinanye n'umuntu akora imideli aturuka muri Hong Kong. Yari afise umuhungu afise ubujana (umunwa usatuye), aca afata ingingo yo kumukorera impuzu nziza cane zizotuma abantu batitaho kuraba gusa umunwa wiwe. Iryo sekeza yarise "kugorora ibitameze neza" aca ambaza ko nshaka kuja kwerekana imideli yiwe muri Hong Kong. Vyambereye ibintu vyiza cane. Inyuma y'aho, naratumiwe kwifotoza nk'incuro zibiri, rimwe akaba yari Brock Elbank muri studio yiwe i Londres. Yashize amafoto yanje kuri Instagram. Ikigo c'imideli ca Zebedee Talent carampamagaye kimbaza nimba nshaka kwifatanya na bo mu kurondera abantu bagendana ubumuga bokwerekana imideri yabo. Imwe mu mafoto Brock yamfotoye yashizwe hejuru ku kinyamakuru ca Vogue Italia mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2019 turi kumwe na Lana del Rey. Ico gihe, sinari nzi ko ico kinamyakuru cemewe cane, bikaba vyantwaye akanya kubona ingene abantu vyabanezereje cane. Mu mideli, ukudasa n'abandi n'umuhezagiro s'umuvumo, vyampaye ikibanza co kumenyekanisha ukuba umwema. Isekeza rya Kurt Geiger n'akarorero keza cane k'ingene bandetse nkerekana ubudasa bwanje. Barandetse ndambara uko nshatse hanyuma nereka mwenewacu uko amfotora kubera bivuye ku mategeko yo kwirinda coronavirus, abafata amafoto ntibarekuriwe kuja muri studio. Bisigura ko nifata uko nshatse mu buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose nashaka kandi vy'ukuri naranezerejwe n'ivyavuyemwo. Mu mafoto, abanyamudeli b'abanyamwema bakunze kugereranywa n'abamarayika canke ibisigo, kandi ivyo birambabaza. Na cane cane kubera bibandanya gushigikira imyemerere ituma ubuzima bw'abana b'abanyamwema bugeramirwa mu bihugu nka Tanzania na Malawi. Ukuba umunyamwema kwanje gusigura ko mbona ku bice 8 gushika 10 kw'ijana kand nsinshobora guhangara umuco kuko urababaza amaso yanje. Rimwe na rimwe iyo hari umuco mwinshi ndiko ndifotoza ndasaba nti "Ndashobora gupfunga amaso canke urashobora kugabanya umuco?" Canke nkagira nti "Ok, ushobora gufotora amafoto atatu nuguruye amaso ukoresheje n'umuco ariko nta zindi zirenze izo." Mu ntango bibaza ko bigoye ariko bafashe ifoto ya mbere baratangaye, baranashima cane uko vyagenze. Abankurikirana babwiye abankeneye bati "Nimwaba mudashobora kubitorera inyishu [umuco], ntimushobora kuronka Xueli." Ni ngombwa ko bakora ku buryo niyumva neza. Abantu bambwira ko uko kutabona neza gutuma mbona ukuntu gutandukanye kandi ko mbona ibindi bintu abandi badashobora kubona. Bituma kandi nitaho gake uko ubwiza bubonwa mu mico n'imigenzo. Nkeka kubera ntashobora kubona ibintu vyose neza, nshira inguvu mu kwumviriza amajwi y'abantu n'ivyo bashaka kuvuga. Kubera ivyo, ubwiza bwabo bw'imbere bumfitiye agaciro nta ngere. Ndakunda ivyo umudeli kubera nkunda guhura n'abantu bashasha, kwimenyereza kuvuga icongereza no kubona ingene abantu banezerejwe n'amafoto yanje. Nshaka gukoresha umudeli mu kuvuga ivyerekeye abema, ko ari ingorane ndemanwa atari uguhumana. Uburyo ivugwako n'ukuvuga "umuntu afise ubwema" kubera kuba "umwema" vyumvikana nko kwerekana ico uri. Abantu bambwira ko ntegerezwa kwemera ibintu vyanshikiye muri kahise ariko siko ndabibona. Nemera ko umuntu akeneye kumenya ivyabaye hanyuma agategera igituma ariko ntace avyemera. Sinshobora kwemera ko abana bicwa kubera bavutse ari abema. Nshaka guhindura isi. Nshaka ko abandi bana b'abema - canke bagendana ubundi bumuga canke ibindi bitandukanye - ko bamenya ko bashoboye no kuba ico ari co cose bashaka. Kuri jewe, ndatandukanye n'abandi muri bimwe bimwe ariko  n'abandi n'uko. Ndakunda kwinonora imitsi no kuduga imisozi kandi nshobora kubikora co kimwe n'uwundi uwo ari we wese. Abantu bashobora kuvuga ko udashobora gukora ibi canke biriya, ariko urabishoboye, gerageza guza. Izi foto zose tuzifitiye uburenganzira bwo kuzikoresha

column2: Coronavirus: Ubuhindi bwahagaritse ibikoresho vyo gupima ‘bidakora’ vyaguzwe mu Bushinwa
column3: Ubuhindi  bwahagaritse umuzigo w'ibikoresho vyo gupima coronavirus mu buryo bubangutse vyari vyaguzwe mu Bushinwa bingana hafi igice c'umuliyoni inyuma y'ukuboneka ko "vyapfuye". Leta y'ico gihugu kandi yaciye itegeka ko ivyari vyamaze gutangura gukoreshwa  mu ntara zitandukanye bivanwayo. Ivyo bikoresho bitanga inyishu z'ibipimo mu minota hafi 30, bigashobora kwerekana abantu bashobora kuba baramaze kwandura. Ivyo birafasha abategetsi kumenya igitigiri c'abanyagihugu baba baranduye uwo mugera mu karere kanaka. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe uno munsi, Ji Rong avugira ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bw'Ubushinwa mu Buhindi avuga ati: "Ikintu nyamukuru dushira imbere mu bidandazwa vy'ubuvuzi u Bushinwa bugurisha ni uko biba bikwije ivya ngombwa". "Sivyiza na gato kandi nta n'iteka bitanga kubona hiyadukiza abantu bubahuka kuvuga ko ibidandazwa biva mu Bushinwa 'vyapfuye' mbere ugasanga bamaze no kuvyishiramwo". Ivyo bikoresho vyo gupima mu buryo bubangutse, mu bisanzwe ntibishobora gupima coronavirus ubwayo, ari co gituma abahinga bafise amakenga ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa ryavyo. Intara zitari nke zagumye zisaba zishimitse ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe gupima indwaramu Buhindi, Indian Medical Research Council (ICMR), ko cozirekurira zigakoresha ivyo bikoresho, bitumwe n'uko abanyagihugu bari bafise amakengako igihugu cabo ata kintu kinini kiriko kirakora kugira ngo gipime abantu baco. Mu ntango, ICMR  yagumanye amakenga, ariko ivamwo iragondozwa, iratumako ivyo bikoresho mu makompanyi abiri. Hagati aho, haciye akanya gato gusa, intara zaciye zitangura kwidoga zivuga ko ivyo bikoresho vyari bifise urugero ruto cane rungana n'ibice 5% rwo gutanga inyishu zo nyazo. Izo ntara zimenyesha kandi ko zakoresheje ivyo bikoresho mu gupima abari basanzwe bazwi ko bamaze kwandura ariko inyishu z'ibipimo zisohotse zikerekana ko "ata mugera bafise". Mu nyuma n'ikigo ICMR kikaba cagiye kumenyesha ko ivyo bikoresho bidakwije ivya ngombwa. Ico kibazo cagiye kwunyuka ejo ku wa mbere, inyuma y'aho sentare nkuru igiriye umwihwezo w'amafaranga yarishwe kuri ivyo bipimo ica imenyesha ko leta yatanze amafaranga y'umurengera. Hagati aho, abategetsi babwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu ko leta "atarufaranga na rumwe izotakaza" kubera ko umuzigo wose wahagaritse imbere y'uko banariha amahera.

column2: Whoopi Goldberg yahagaritswe na ABC kubera amajambo yavutse kw’ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abayahudi
column3: Whoopi Goldberg yahagaritswe mu biganiro vyo kuri televiziyo yo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika inyuma y'aho avugiye ko ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abayahudi (rikunze kwitwa "Holocaust")  ryavuye ku "mirwi ibiri y'abazungu". ABC News ivuga ko Goldberg azomara indwi zibiri atabonetse inyuma "y'amajambo yiwe y'ibinyoma kandi ababaje". Uyu munyatugenegene akongera akaba umuntu azwi cane ku mboneshakure yavugiye mu kiganiro ca ABC, The View, ko ihonyabwoko aba Nazi bakoreye Abayahudi ritari "rishingiye ku bwoko". Aba Nazi, bo biyita ko ari "ubwoko busumba amoko yose" bw'aba Aryens/Aryan, bagandaguye Abayahudi bagera ku miriyoni zitandatu muri iryo honyabwoko. Yarasavye imbabazi ariko aca akora ayandi makosa mu gihe yariko agerageza gusigura amajambo yavuze mu kiganiro kindi cabaye mw'ijoro. Mw'itangazo ryaraye ryandikiwe abakozi mw'ijoro ry'ejo ku wa kabiri, umukuru wa ABC News Kim Godwin  yanditse ati: "Kuva ubu nyene, ndahagaritse vy'agateganyo Whoopi Goldberg mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri ku majambo yiwe y'ibinyoma kandi ababaje". "N'aho Whoopi yasavye imbabazi, namusavye afate akanya ko kwiyumvira yongere yige ku nkurikizi z'amajambo yiwe. "Ishirahamwe ryose rya ABC News ririfatanije na bagenzacu bose b'Abayahudi, incuti n'umuryango wose w'Abayahudi". Yongerako ati: "Izi ngingo ntizoroshe na gato, ariko ni nkenerwa", nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru Hollywood Reporter co muri Amerika. "Mu ndwi iheze, namenyesheje ko umuco wa ABC News utomoye, usonera buri muntu, uhuza bose, ugasonera bose kandi ukorera mu muco. Amajambo ya Whoopi ntajanye n'izi ndangagaciro". Mu masaha ya kare y'ejo ku wa kabiri, Goldberg yasavye imbabazi ubugira gatatu. "Mu kiganiro, yavuze ati: "Ejo mu kiganiro naravuze nabi". "Ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abayahudi ubusanzwe rishingiye ku bwoko, kuko Hitler n'aba Nazi bafata ko Abayahudi ari ubwoko bwo hasi". "Ubu, amajambo afise uburemere, kandi na rwanje ni uko nyene. Ndababajwe n'amajambo yanje kandi ndemeye ko nakoze amakosa. Ndifatanije kandi n'abayahudi". Uyu munyatugenegene yigeze gutsindira agashimwe ka Oscar akaba aremesha ikiganiro The View kuva mu 2007, yatanguye kuvuga aya majambo yateje impari mu kiganiro co ku wa mbere igihe yariko avuga ku ngingo y'ishure ryo muri Teneessee yo kubuza igitabo c'ibicapo ku bijanye n'ihonyabwoko ry'Abayahudi ku mvo z'uko ngo cerekana abantu bambaye ubusa, kigacafuza kandi kikerekana abiyahura. Bimaze kuvyura icuka kibi, yaciye asaba imbabazi haciye amasaha make. Ariko  mu kiganiro ca CBS, The Late Show, cari kiremeshejwe na Stephen Colbert ku wa mbere mw'ijoro, mu gihe yariko agerageza gusigura amajambo yashikirije, yavuze ko aba Nazi babeshe kandi ko mu bisanzwe bari bafise ibibazo bishingiye ku bwoko atari ku rukoba, amajambo yateje ibindi bibazo. Si bwo bwa mbere Goldberg ateje ibibazo. Mu 2009, yavuze ko indongozi y'amareresi Roman Polanski  - yari yemeye icaha co gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'umwana muto" mu 1997 - ata caha co "gufata ku nguvu nya gufata ku nguvu" yakoze. Yarashigikiye kandi Bill Cosby yagirizwa ivyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu, imbere y'uko yigarura amaze kubona ko yateje icuka kibi.

column2: Uganda – Afghanistan: Impunzi za mbere zashitse i Kampala
column3: Itangazo ryo mu bushikiranganji bwa Uganda  bujejwe imigenderanire rivuga ko umugwi wa mbere washitse ku kibuga c'indege ca Entebbe mu ndege yari igenewe kubazana kuri uyu wa gatatu mu gitondo. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ni zo zasavye Uganda ko yokwakira bamwe mu banye Afghanistan bariko barahunga ico gihugu kuva aba-Taliban basubiye kwigarurira ubutegetsi. Ubushikiranganji bwa Uganda bujejwe imigenderanire buvuga ko abo bantu baciye muri Uganda ariko ameherezo bazotera baja muri Amerika n'ibindi bihugu. Ariko ntibiramenyekana igihe bazomara muri Uganda ingene kingana. Abashitse uyu munsi barimwo abagabo, abagore n'abana. Itangazo rivuga ko bashitse bapimwa Covid, hanyuma bongere bazomare igihe bari  ukwa bonyene. Ku ndwi iheze umutegetsi wo muri reta ya Uganda yari yabwiye BBC ko ico gihugu cemeye kwakira abanye Afghanistan ibihumbi 2 ku busabe bwa reta ya Amerika. Ariko mu nyuma abategetsi benshi bavuze ko ibiganiro bikibandanya. Amerika ivuga ko yasavye Uganda kwakira impunzi kubera ingene ico gihugu gisanzwe kizwi neza mu kwakira impunzi. Uganda isanzwe ihaye indaro umuriyoni w'impunzi zahunze intambara n'ibindi vyago bitandukanye mu bihugu vya Afrika y'Ubuseruko.

column2: Ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara CDC kirashima ingene Africa yarwanije coronavirus
column3: Umuyobozi w'ikigo ca Afrika gishinzwe kurwanya indwara (CDC) yashimiye ibihugu vy'Afrika ku kungene vyashoboye guhagarika ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, abantu umuliyoni 1.4 nibo banduye, abashika ibihumbi 34 bakaba ari bo bapfuye kuva mu kwa gatatu. Ibi biharuro biri hasi cane ugereranije n'ivya Bulaya, Aziya, Amerika, kandi bikaba bigenda bigabanuka. John Nkengasong arongoye ikigo CDC yabwiye BBC ko ingingo zafashwe hakiri kare muri Afrika zafashije cane mu kurwanya ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera. Ikigo CDC ni ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu kikaba cegukira umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika AU. Uyu mugabane utuwemwo n'abantu barenga gato umuliyaridi ufise ibice biri munsi ya 5% vy'abanduye umugera kw'isi yose, hamwe na 3.6% vy'abapfuye. Muganga Nkengasong avuga ko amakuru avuga ko abandura umugera hamwe n'abo uhitana atavugwa ko ari "ibinyoma". Ati: "Kumbure birashoboka ko hari abandura ntitubamenye, nk'uko biri no mu bindi bice vy'isi…ariko ntabo tubona bapfira ku mabarabara canke bahambwa mu binogo rusangi muri Afrika". Kuva habonetse umurwayi wa mbere mu kwa gatatu, ibihugu vyose vya Afrika vyaciye vyihutira gufata ingingo mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwu mugera. Vyinshi muri vyo, harimwo na Afrika y'Epfo, vyarafashe ingingo za guma mu rugo mu gihugu cose, ariko hari n'ibindi vyovyo nka za Etiyopiya vyafashe ingingo zibayabaye. Hagati aho, Muganga Nkengasong avuga ko kubona ibitigiri vy'abanduye vyagumye hasi vyavuye "ku gukorera hamwe kw'ibihugu vyose vy'umugabane", vyaciye vyitaho "gupima ku murindi munini kandi bigaca bihimiriza abantu kwambara udupfukamunwa". Ati: "Mu bihugu vyinshi, harimwo na Etiyopiya nsanzwe nkomokamwo, winjiye mu mabarabrara ya Addis-Abeba uzosanga hafi 100% bose bambaye udupfukamunwa". Muganga Nkengasong avuga kandi ko kubona abenshi mu batuye ku mugabane wa Afrika ari abakiri bato ko navyo vyafashije. Avuga kandi ko hampande y'ibi, utwigoro two gushigikira abanyagihugu be n'uburambe mu guhangana n'indwara z'ivyaduka nka Ebola, vyarafashije cane guhangana na coronavirus.

column2: Burundi: Rusansuma y’abashomeri, bamwe barizeye akazi abandi bati ‘nta gishasha’
column3: Igikorwa catanguye ku wa gatandatu uheze co kwandika urwaruka rwahejeje amashure rudafise akazi kizobandanya kubera ubwinshi bwabo, ni mu gihe vyari vyitezwe ko kirangira kw'isaha zitandatu ejo ku wa mbere. Mu minsi itatu, leta y'u Burundi ivuga ko yashoboye kwandika abashika 245.000, ariko kandi ko gushika ejo ku wa mbere hari hakiri benshi bakirindiriye kwandikwa. Abandikwa bavuga ko babazwa vyinshi harimwo ibijanye n'amashure bize hamwe impamyabushobozi bafise, igihe bayizonkeye, n'ibindi. Ntaco babwirwa uretse ko ari rusansuma rw'abashomeri bariko barakora. Bamwe bavuga ko ibi nyene vyabaye no mu myaka myinshi bandikwa buri mwaka, bakabona ko ata gishasha, ariko ubu bamwe barizigiye ko leta ishobora kubafasha. Igihe arahiza abashikiranganji ba leta yiwe, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yatangaje ko yiyemeje gushigikira urwaruka "cane cane bamwe bafise impapuro z'umutsindo ariko batararonka ico bakora".
