Umwe mu bavuganye na BBC, hampande y'amashure n'impamyabushozobi, avuga ko yabajijwe ubwoko bw'akazi yipfuza canke umutahe abona yoshobora gukoresha mu gihe yoba afise umugambi wo kurangura. Mu gihe abiyandikisha ari abahejeje amashure bakirondera akazi nk'uko binavugwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, uyu mushomeri avuga ko ataco babwirwa kuri iki. Ati: "Nta wuzi ko bagomba kuduha akazi, canke imitahe, gushika ubu turarindiriye". Uwundi mukenyezi atipfuje kuvugwa amazina yavuganye na BBC, avuga ko ico babwiwe conyene ari uko hariko hakorwa rusansuma y'abashomeri. Ati: "Jewe sinibaza ko ari akazi bashaka kuduha, kuko ivy'akazi baheruka gukoresha ikibazo, abaronse bararonse. Ariko baratubwira ko bibaye ngombwa tuzoja hamwe hanyuma bakaduha imitahe tugakorera hamwe". Uyu afise icizere gito kuko ngo sibwo bwa mbere yandikwa kuva ahejeje amashure. Ati: "Nama mbona batwanditse bigaherera iyo, turamenyereye kwiyandikisha. "Kuva umwaka wa mbere mpejeje amashure mu 2014 nta mwaka urengana batatwanditse. Maze imyaka itandatu nguma nandikwa, ariko nta cahindutse". Hagati aho, aremeza ko iri yandikwa ry'ubu ritandukanye n'iryari risanzwe rihari afatiye kuvyo yabajijwe. Yongerako ati: "Mfise icizere ko nzohava nkaronka umutahe kuko muvyo bambajije barambajije umutahe noba nkeneye kugira nshobore kurangura umugambi wo kwiteza imbere". BBC yashatse kuronka insiguro kuri kino gikorwa kimaze iminsi ine co kwandika abahejeje amashure ariko batigeze baronka akazi, uruhande rwa leta ntaco rwashimye gutangaza bikiriko birakorwa. Hagati aho, mw'ijambo ryiwe arahiza leta nshasha Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko mu migambi yiwe itandatu yihutirwa harimwo kuzamura urwaruka, cane cane abahejeje amashure batararonka akazi. Bwana Ndayishimiye yagize ati:"Abo nibo cane cane nshaka ko bazoba intwazangabo zirongora abandi mu rugamba rwo kugwanya ubukene ku rwego rw'intango". "Aho bukera tugira dushware mu makomine yose agize Uburundi, tuje kwegeranya urwo rwaruka mu kibiri, batwereke imigambi bafise, bashaka gukora. "Aho tuzosanga batoye kworora tuzobafasha kworora, aho tuzosanga batoye uwundi mugambi, tuzowubafasha". Ikiriho ni uko biboneka ko abashomeri biyandikisha ari benshi cane mu gihugu, nk'uko vyemezwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere ku rubuga rwabwo rwa Twitter. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ku munsi wa mbere gusa batanguye ico gikorwa handitswe abashika 45.000. Mu gihe gushika ku mugoroba w'ejo ku wa mbere, abashika 245.000 ari bo bari bamaze kwandikwa mu gihugu cose, abandi barenga 35,000 bari baraye bategerejwe kwandikwa.

column2: Trump aranegura uwuserukira Ubwongereza ku butumwa bw'ibanga bwagiye ahabona
column3: Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aranegura uwuserukira Ubwongereza muri ico gihugu yavuze mu butumwa bwa email ko ubutegetsi bwiwe "ataco bushoboye". Bwana Trump avuga ati: "Jewe nokubwira ko uwuserukira Ubwongereza atakoreye igihugu ciwe neza". Ubwo butumwa bwa Sir Kim Darroch yanditse kuri email  bwavuga ko abagize ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika (Maison Blanche) kuri Trump "ataco bashoboye" kandi ko "batumvikana". Umunyamabanga ajejwe ubudandaji, Liam Fox, yabwiye BBC ko kubona ubwo butumwa bumenyekana ari "ubumenyi buke, ingeso y'ukumena amabanga y'akazi kandi ari ukudakunda igihugu". Yavuze ko uwo ari we wese yashize ahabona izo emails yari afise "intumbero mbi" y'ugusambura imigenderanire mu vyo umutekano hagati ya Amerika n'Ubwongereza. Yavuze ati: " Ndizeye ko mu gihe twomenya uwabikoze, twokoresha inguvu zose tukamushira ku murongo, bibaye ngombwa n'amategeko akajamwo". Ubunyamabanga bujejwe imigenderanire buriko burakora amatohoza kugira bumenye ingene ubwo butumwa bwashikiriye ikinyamakuru Daily Mail co mu Bwongereza ejo ku wa Mungu. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Bwana Trump yabwiye abanyamakuru i New Jersey ati: "Twebwe si ukuvuga ngo turashima cane rwose urya muntu, kandi yarakoreye nabi Ubwongereza". "Rero ndashobora kumutahura kandi ndafise n'ivyo nomuvugako, ariko ntaco bimbwiye". Muri ubwo butumwa bwari ibanga ariko bugashirwa ahabona, Sir Kim yanditse ati: "Mu vy'ukuri nta cizere dufise ko ubu butegetsi buzoshika aho buja ku murongo; bugakora neza, bugafata intumbero  nziza; ntibucanemwo; bukagira imigenderanire myiza; bukerekana ko bushoboye". Umunnyamabanga ajejwe imigenderanire y'Ubwongereza, Jeremy Hunt, avuga ko ivyo Sir Kim yanditse biri "ku gatwe kiwe", atari kubw'ubutegetsi bw'Ubwongereza. Bwana Hunt asanzwe ariko ahiganirwa kuba umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza, avuga ko cari igikorwa ca ambasaderi gutanga "ivyiyumviro vyiwe", ariko ko bitavuga ko ari ho leta ihagaze. Avuga ko ubutegetsi bwa Bwana Trump "budakomeye gusa, ahubwo ko ari incuti ya mbere y'Ubwongereza kw'isi".

column2: Covid-19: Ubufaransa, Ubudage n'Ubutaliyano vyahagarise urukingo rwa AstraZeneca
column3: Ubugage, Ubufaransa n'Ubutaliyano vyahagaritse itangwa ry'urukingo rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca, nyuma y'ivyagiye birashika i Buraya vyerekeye kuvurirana kw'amaraso (coagulation du sang). Ivyo bihugu vyiyongeye ku bindi vyinshi bito vyo ku mugabane wa Buraya navyo vyahagaritse urwo rukingo mu buryo bwo kwiyubara mu gihe hakorwa isuzuma. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, ryavuze yuko ata cemeza y'uko ivyo vyashitse biterwa n'urwo rukingo. OMS yavuze yuko iriko irihweza amakuru yavuzwe ajanye n'urukingo, ngo ariko ni ivya nkenerwa cane yuko gutanga urukingo bibandanya. OMS yongenyeko yuko ari vyiza gutohoza ingorane izo ari zo zose zishobora gushika. Abahinga ku buziranenge ba OMS bazohura ejo kuwa kabiri baganire kuri urwo rukingo. Ishirahamwe rya Buraya ry'ubuvuzi bw'imiti, EMA, rizohura kuri uwo munsi nyene rikaba rizogira ico rishikirije kuwa Kane. Ryavuze kandi yuko urwo rukingo rukwiye kubandanya kuroreshwa. Ariko, abahinga bavuga yuko igitigiri c'ukuvurirana kw'amaraso cashikirijwe nyuma y'urukingo, ataho gitaniye n'igihora kiboneka mu bantu muri rusangi. Abantu bashika imiriyoni 17 mu karere k'ishirahamwe rya Buraya hamwe no mu Bwongereza baramaze guhabwa urwo rukingo, ariko abari munsi ya 40 gusa nibo vyavuzwe ko bagize ikibazo c'ukuvurirana kw'amaraso, nk'uko vyavuzwe na AstraZeneca. Hariko harafatwa izihe ngingo? Ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara mu Budage kuri uno wambere bwatangaje ko buhagaritse gutanga urukingo rwa Oxford-Astrazeneca ubu nyene, ku mpanuro z'ikigo Paul Ehrlich Institute (PEI), kijejwe ivy'inkingo mu gihugu. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara Jens Spahn yagize ati: "Icabanjirije iyi ngingo ni amakuru y'ingorane zashitse ku mutsi ujana mu bwonko zitewe n'urukingo rwa AstraZeneca. "Hafatiwe kuri ayo makuru mashasa, ikigo Paul Ehrlich Institute uno munsi casubiye kuvyihweza gica gitanga impanuro yo guhagarika uru rukingo, hagakorwa uwundi mwihwezo." Yavuze ko iyo ngingo ata "mvo za politike" ziyiri inyuma. Yongeyeko ati "twese turazi neza ingaruka z'ingingo nk'iyi, kandi ntitwayifashe ku buryo bworoshe". Haciye umwanya mutoyi, umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubufaransa Emmanuel Macron, yavuze ko Ubufaransa buhagaritse uru rukingo gushika EMA itanze ayandi makuru. Yagize ati: "Dufise intambwe dukurikiza zisanzwe, dukurikiza ivyo twerekwa n'ubumenyi hamwe n'abakozi bo mu gisata c'amagara bashoboye akazi cane, kandi tukabikorera hamwe nk'umugambi wa Buraya." Ikigo c'Ubutariyano kigenzura imiti naco congeye ikiringo co kubuza kwinjiza urwo rukingo mu gihugu, naho nyene harindiriwe ingingo ya EMA. Guhagarika ikoreshwa ry'uru rukingo bibaye nyuma y'ikiringo kiri munsi y'umunsi umwe Ubuholandi bugize uko nyene. Ingingo y'iki gihugu izoshika ku tariki 29 z'ukwa gatatu.

column2: Vladimir Putin yiyumvira iki agategura iki?
column3: N﻿a Steve Rosenberg Umwanditsi mukuru mu gisata c'Ikirusiya, i Moscow Iki ni ikibazo tumaze igihe kitari gito tubaza, n’imbere y’uko Uburusiya butera Ukraine. Vladimir Putin yoba yiyumvira iki agategura iki? Ariko reka mbe ndabibamenyesha. Nta sindagura. Kandi sinavuganye na Putin. Uwahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu ca Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika George W Bush igihe kimwe niho yigeze kuvuga ko yaravye Vladimir Putin mu maso aca abona akari ku mutima wiwe. Raba ingene vyarangiye neza mu migenderanire hagati y’Uburusiya n’Uburengero. Rero, kwinjira mu mutwe w’uyu mutegetsi wa Kremlin si igikorwa coroshe. Ariko ni vyiza kugerageza. Kumbure iki gihe nico gikomeye co kugerageza gusumba ibindi vyose, dufatiye kw’ikangisha riheruka kugirwa na Moscou ku bigwanisho nikleyeri. Nta gukekeranya cane ko umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya ubu atorohewe. Ico yita “igikorwa ca gisirikare kidasanzwe” muri Ukraine ntikiriko kimugendera neza. Cari citezwe kumara imisi mike. Ariko ubu turi mu mezi hafi umunani kandi nta kimenyetso ko kigiye kurangira. Kremlin iremera ko yatakaje “bikomeye”; mu ndwi nkeya za vuba, igisirikare c’Uburusiya cagiye gitakaza ubutaka cari carigaruriye muri Ukraine. Mu ntumbero yo kwongereza igitigiri c’ingabo, mu kwezi guheze Perezida Putin yateye akamo ko guhamagaza ingabo, ico yahora avuga ashimitse ko atari gukora. Ni mu gihe ibihano bibandanya bigira ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw’Uburusiya. Reka tugaruke ku coba kiri mu mutwe wa Putin. Ubwo yoba yibaza ko yihenze cane? Ko ingingo yo gutera Ukraine ryabaye ikosa rikomeye? Ntuhave uvyemeza gutyo. Konstantin Remchukov, umwanditsi mukuru akongera akaba nyene ikinyamakuru co mu Burusiya Nezavisimaya Gazeta, avuga ati: "Ivyo Putin yiyumvira ni vyo vyerekana ingene ibintu bimeze muri ino ntambara”. "Ni umutegetsi atwaza umukazo igihugu rutura ca nikleyeri. Ni umutegetsi atavuguruzwa muri kino gihugu. Arafise ivyiyumviro n’ibintu bikomeye yemera bimusarisha. Yatanguye kwemeza ko ari ku nyungu zo kubaho. Atari kuri we gusa. Ariko kuri kazoza k’Uburusiya”. Mu gihe ino ntambara yoba ari iyo kurwanira ukubaho kw’igihugu, Putin yoba yiteguye gute kuyitsinda? Mu mezi ya vuba, abategetsi b’Uburusiya (na Putin we nyene ubwiwe arimwo) bagiye bumvikana mu buryo budatomoye berekana ko uyu mukuru wa Kremlin ashobora kuba yiteguriye gukoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri muri ino ntambara. Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika abwira CNN ati: "Sinibaza ko azohava abikoresha. Ariko nibaza ko kubona avuga ibintu nk’ibi ko ata mutima agira”. Amabombe y’urutavanako yacucagiwe mu gihugu cose mu ndwi iheze yerekana ko nibura Kremlin yiteguye kwunyura ibintu hagati y'Ubususiya na Ukraine. N'uburengero nyene? Grigory Yavlinsky, inararibonye muri poritike nk’uwigenga, avuga ati: "Ariko aragerageza kwirinda ko hatoba ugutana mu mitwe amaso mu yandi n’Uburengero, ariko akaba anavyiteguriye”. "Mfise ubwoba ko hohava haduka intambara ya nikleyeri. Hanyuma ubwa kabiri, ntinya intambara itagira iherezo”. Ariko "intambara itagira iherezo" isaba uburyo butagira iherezo. Iki ni ikintu Uburusiya busa n’ubudafise. Igihuhusi c’ibisasu vya misire vyacucagiwe ku bisagara vya Ukrane ni ukwerekana inguvu zidasanzwe, ariko none Moscou yobibandanya mu gihe kingana iki? Remchukov ati: "None woshobora kubandanya utera izi misire mu kiringo c’imisi, c’amayinga, c’amezi? Abahinga benshi bafise amakenga ko tutoba dufise misire zikwiye. "Hanyuma kandi, turavye ku ruhande rwa gisirikare, nta n’umwe gushika ubu arerekana icoba ikimenyetso kirengeye vyose c’intsinzi [y’Uburusiya]? Ni ikihe kimenyetso c’intsinzi? Mu 1945 cabaye ibendera hejuru ya Berlin. None ubu icokwerekana intsinzi ni igiki? [Ibendera] hejuru ya Kyiv? Hejuru ya Kherson? Hejuru ya Kharkiv? Si nzi. Nta n’umwe abizi”. Nta n’uwuzi nimba na Vladimir Putin we nyene ubwiwe abizi. Mu kwa kabiri, intumbero ya Kremlin  yasa n’ugutsinda Ukraine vuba bwango, hanyuma uyu mubanyi w’Uburusiya agasubira mu muryango w’ibihugu bicuditse na Moscou ata ntambara ndende ihabaye. Aha yaharuye nabi. Uretse ko atiyumviriye ko igisirikare ca Ukrane n’abanyagihugu bayo bari biyemeje kurwanira igihugu cabo gushika ku ka nyuma, ntiyibaza ko igisirikare cayo cari gifise uburyo bwo guhangana n’Uburusiya. None ubu yoba yiyumvira iki? Ubwo ubu Vladimir Putin yoba  afise integuro yo gutsimbataza igenzura ry’ubutaka bwa Ukraine avuga ko aherutse kwihagira hanyuma agahagarika intambara? Canke ubwo yoba yariyemeje kubandanya asatira gushika Ukraine yose ayigarukanye mu ruhongore rw’ibihugu bigenzurwa na Kremlin? Mu ndwi iheze, Dmitry Medvedev  yahoze arongoye Uburusiya yanditse ati: "Igihugu ca Ukraine, uravye ukungene cubatse  ubu...kizokwama ari intambamyi ikomeye ku Burusiya. Mbona ko intego y’ibikorwa vyacu vya kazoza yoba ugusenyura burundu ubutegetsi bwa poritike bwa Ukraine”. Mu gihe amajambo ya Medvedev ari yo yoba ari mu mutwe wa Putin, aha rero mwitege intambara ndende cane kandi izosesekamwo amaraso menshi. Ariko, vyanka bikunda, ivyo Putin akora hanze biriko bigira ingaruka mu gihugu.  Kuva mu myaka itari mike, Kremlin yarubatse ishusho ya Putin nka "Mr Stability" (ni ukuvuga “Umugabo-buragamo"), ihimiriza Abarusiya kwizera ko igihe cose azoba arongoye igihugu ko bazoba bari mu mutekano utagira agahonzi. Ubu biragoye kwumvisha abantu ko ari vyo. Remchukov ati: "Amasezerano yari hagati ya Putin n’abanyagihugu yari ‘Ndagukingira’. "Mu kiringo c’imyaka itari mike, icivugo nyamukuru cari ‘ukubona kure’. None ukwo kubona kure muri kino gihe ni ukuhe? Ico carataye igihe. Nta kintu na kimwe co kwizera muri kazoza. Uno musi abanyamakuru banje ntibazi nimba badashika muhira basanga urwandiko rubahamagarira kwinjira mu gisirikare”. Ingingo ya Vladimir Putin yo gutera Ukraine yatangaje benshi. Ariko Yavlinsky ntarimwo. Yavlinsky  ati: "Nibaza ko [Putin] yamaze igihe yitegurira iyo nzira – umwaka ku mwaka yariko yubaka ivyo turimwo ubu”. "Akarorero, gusambura ibinyamakuru vyingenga. Ivyo yabitanguye mu 2001. Gusambura igisata c’abikorera utwabo. Yabitanguye mu 2003. Hanyuma mu 2014 ivyabaye muri Crimea na Donbas. Umuntu atabibona ni uko yari impumyi. "Ingorane z’Uburusiya ni intwaro yacu. Intwaro yashinzwe hano ikarema uyu muntu  [nka Putin]. Ikibazo c’uruhara rw’Uburengero mu gushinga iyi ntwaro ni ikibazo gikomeye cane. "Ikibazo ni uko iyi ntwaro itaremye abantu. Hari abantu benshi cane b’intungane mu Burusiya. Ariko mu bantu nta gatima ko guharanira uburenganzira  kahari. Nico gituma Uburusiya bunanirwa kwihagararako”.

column2: Afghanistan: Aba-Taliban bisubiyeko ntibugurura amashue ku bakobwa
column3: Aba-Taliban bisubiyeko ku ngingo yo kwemerera abakobwa bo muri  Afghanistan gusubira ku mashure yisumbuye, bavuga ko  hakiriko harafatwa ingingo y'umwambaro (uniformes) bategerezwa kwambara. Amashure vyari bitegekanijwe ko asubira kwugururwa  kuri uyu wa gatatu inyuma y'amezi yugawe kuva aba-Taliban bafashe ubutegetsi mu  kwezi kw'umunani. Ariko umushikiranganji ajejwe amashure yamenyesheje giturumbuka ko amashure yisumbuye ategerezwa kuguma yugaye ku bakobwa, bituma abantu bajuragirika. Abakobwa bamwe baciye baduka bararira, abavyeyi n'abanyeshure nabo barashavura kandi barababazwa n'iyo ngingo yo ku munota wa nyuma. Imbere  yaho benshi bari bavuze ingene banezerewe kandi bishimiye ko basubiye kuja mw'isomero. Iyo ngingo yaje  haheze indwi umushukiranganji ajejwe amashure amenyesheje ko amashure agiye kwugururwa ku banyeshure bose harimwo n'abakobwa ku wa gatatu. Ariko itangazo  kuri uyu wa gatatu ryaciye riza rivuga riti: "Turamenyesheje amashure yose y'abakobwa n'ayafise abanyeshure b'abakobwa hejuru y'umwaka wa gatandatu ko yugawe gushika haje iyindi ngingo." Iryo tangazo ribandanya rivuga ko amashure azokwugururwa ingingo kuri uniforme z'abanyeshure b'abakobwa  imaze gufatwa hisunzwe "Itegeko rya Sharia hamwe n'imigenzo ya Afghanistan." Iyi ngingo ya giturumbuka yababaje cane abavyeyi b'abana b'abakobwa. Umugabo umwe atashatse ko umwidondoro wiwe umenyekana yabwiye BBC ko umukobwa wiwe yaciye yaduka ararira kuva yankiwe n'aba-Taliban  kwinjira mw'ishure kuri uyu wa gatatu mu gitondo. Yavuze ati: "Hamwe hogira igishikira umukobwa wanje, sinzobabarira aba-Taliban." Ku ntwaro y'aba-Taliban mu myaka ya 1990, abakobwa ntibari benerewe kuja mu mashure. None kuva aba-Taliban bongeye gufata ubutegetsi mu kwezi kw'umunani, amashure  y'abakobwa y'intango n'ayo abahungu niyo yonyene yagumye yuguruye henshi mu gihugu. Amashure  yisumbuye y'abakobwa vyari bitegekanijwe ko yugurutrwa uyu munsi. Umwe umwe ku giti ciwe,  abakuru b'aba-Taliban baremera ko amashure y'abakobwa ari ikibazo kidahurizwako na bamwe mu ndongozi zabo z'umurongo ukaze. Uku kumenyesha ingingo giturumbuka ku munota wanyuma biragaragaza ukutumvikana muri uwo mugwi - kandi vyerekana ingene bamwe mu ndongozi batitayeho ivyifuzo vy'abanya-Afghanistan ba none. Umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira Mahouba Seraj, yashinze urunani rw'abagore muri Afghanistan (Afghan Women's Network), yumiwe n'uko kwisubirako. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Ico bitwaje ngo ni uko "mudafise hijab ibereye'. Nta ngingo ya sentare yahabaye, bifatiye iyo ngingo mu gitondo, ku mvo iyari yo yose." Yavuze ko uniforme z'ishure z'abakobwa muri Afghanistan zama zifuka hose, imimsi yose". Bimwe mu vyo amakungu yasavye n'uko aba-Taliban  bemerera abagore n'abakobwa kuja mu mashure imbere y'uko bahabwa imfashanyo zo hanze. Madame Seraja yavuze ati: "Ico nshaka kwumva canke kubona kuri bo n'uko bahagaruka bakavuga bati 'okay, iki nico mwahisemwo gukora? Emwe, natwe iki nico duhisemwo gukora: nta kubemera, nta mafaranga. Nta kindi!'"

column2: Imvo n'Imvano ku musi mukuru wa Noheli abakristu kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu
column3: Ndabaramukije nongera ndabaha n'ikaze mu kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano co kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 25 ukwezi kwa 12 mu 2021. Imvo n'Imvano y'uyu musi yerekeye umusi mukuru wa Noheli, aho abakristu hirya no hino kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu. Buri mwaka, abemera Kristu imiliyoni n'imiliyoni hirya no hino kw'isi barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli. Noheli y'uyu mwaka, ibaye mu gihe ikiza Covid kibandanya kuvugwa mu bihugu bitandukanye kw'isi no mu gihe haherutse kugaragara ubundi bwoko bita Omicron bwandukira ku buryo bwihuta. Muri kino kiganiro, twahisemo guha umwanya abakunzi b'Imvo n'Imvano bifuje kutubwira uko bariko barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli, ari na ko tugenda tubashikiriza uturirimbo dutandukanye two guhimbaza uyu musi. None Noheli yiteguriwe gute muri iyi misi ikiza coronavirus cakwiragiye kw'isi? Ababa mu karere k'ibiyaga binini n'abari mu bindi bihugu eka mbere n'abari mu makambi y'impunzi bariko bayihimbaza gute? Inyishu ni muri kino kiganiro. Mugiye kuba hamwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo, muri studios za BBC i Nairobi.

column2: Ukraine ivuga ko Russia yacucagiye za  misire mu buseruko no mu bumanuko
column3: Ibitero vya rokete n’ibisasu vya misire vyononye ibitari bike mu bisagara vyo mu buseruko no mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine, nk’uko abategetsi b’akarere babivuga. Abasivire bane barapfuye mu gitero cabaye mu gisagara ca Siversk mu ntara ya  Donetsk, nk’uko buramatari Pavlo Kyrylenko abivuga. Uturere dutuwemwo n’abasivire twa Druzhkivka muri iyi ntara nyene natwo nyene twaratewe. Inyubakwa y’akaguriro yarasambuwe no mu micungararo hasigara ikinogo kinini. BBC ntiyashoboye guhinyuza ibivugwa kuri ibi bitero biheruka. Ingabo z’Uburusiya zirwanira hasi zisa n’izitashoboye gutera intambwe ikomeye mu masaha 24 arangiye mu rugamba rwazo rwo kwigarurira igice gisigaye c’intara ya Donetsk. Abategetsi ba Ukraine kandi bavuga ko ibisasu vya misire vyatewe mu turere twa Kharkiv mu buraruko, Mykolaiv mu bumanuko, na Kryvyi Rih, igisagara kiri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Mykolaiv. Ingabo za Ukraine ziriko zirarwana n’inguvu zazo zose mu gukingira Mykolaiv, igisagara gikomeye kiri ku nkengera  y’uruzi kw’ibarabara rikomeye rija i Odesa, igisagara nyamukuru Ukraine icishako ibidandazwa ishora hanze. Amato y’intambara y’Uburusiya aracabuza Ukraine gushora hanze intete ziva i Odesa. Icegera c’umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ukraine Iryna Vereshchuk asaba abanyagihugu kuva mu duce twigaruriwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya mu bisagara vya Kherson na Zaporizhzhia mu bumanuko. Aka kamo gasa n’akerekana ko ingabo za Ukraine zoba ziriko zitegura ibindi bitero vyo kwivuna. Abarusiya barigaruriye igisagara ca Kherson, ariko ingabo za Ukraine zarashoboye kwisubiza uduce tumwe tumwe tw’ako karere. Igipolisi muri iyo ntara cagiriza Uburusiya guhonya n’ibigirankana ibiterwa. Mu butumwa cacishije ku rubuga rwa Facebook, cerekana imirima iriko irasha, kikavuga kiti: “Imiriro myinshi yama yaduka uko bukeye uko bwije, amajana n’amajana y’amahegitari y’ingano, hamwe n’izindi ntete aramaze guturirwa”. Cagiriza kandi ingabo z’Uburusiya gusambura ibigega n’ibikoresho vyo mu burimyi, kandi zikanabuza abanyagihugu kuzimya iyi miriro.  I Kryvyi Rih, vya muzinga vyarononye ishure n’inzu y’uburaro, vyica umugore w’imyaka 41, nk’uko bivugwa na buramatari Valentyn Reznichenko. Ubushikiranganji bw’Uburusiya bujejwe kwivuna abansi buvuga ko ingabo zabwo zabomoye ikigangara cari kibitswemwo ibirwanisho vyo mu bwoko bwa M777 vyatanzwe na Amerika i Chasiv Yar hafi ya Kramatorsk. Slovyansk na Kramatorsk vyitezwe kuba ibindi bisagara nyamukuru gukiririmbirwamwo n’Uburusiya muri Donetsk. Amerika ivuga ko igiye kurungikira Ukraine ibindi birwanisho bidahusha bitera ibisasu vya rokete. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko ibisasu vya muzinga vyo mu bwoko bwa HIMARS  biriko birakoreshwa mu gutera ububiko bw’ibirwanisho mu turere turi mu minwe y’Uburusiya, ibituma Moscou itoroherwa na gato mu kurungika ibindi. Mu Bwongereza, ibigo vya gisirikare biriko birakoreshwa mu kwigisha ingabo za Ukraine ubuhinga bwo kurwana, nk’uko reta y’Ubwogereza ibivuga. Ni mu ntumbero yo kwigisha abanya-Ukraine 10.000 mu mezi ari imbere. Mu yandi makuru y’igendereza, igisirikare c’Ubwongereza kivuga ko Uburusiya buriko buregeranya izindi ngabo mu gihugu cose buzegereza hafi ya Ukraine mu kwitegurira ibindi bitero.

column2: Gutwaririza: Mbe ni kubera iki abagore bibungenze bifuza cane ivyo kurya bimwe bimwe?
column3: Twese turamaze kwumva inkuru y'umugore iyo yibungenze usanga hari indya imwe gusa canke zibiri ashaka kuguma afungura, akavyura umugabo hagati mw'ijoro ngo azimuronderere. Canke na twebwe ubwacu turamaze gushikirwa no gushaka cane ikintu kinaka co kurya. Kenshi biravugwa ko gutwaririza indya iyi canke iriya ari uburyo bwo kwironsa ingaburo umugore n'umwana yibungenze bakeneye, kandi hari n'ikiganisha ku ciyumviro c'uko vyoba biterwa n'ingene umubiri uremye. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ni igice kigoye gutegera c'ikintu rimwe na rimwe kitoroha. Kwirema kw'umuntu mu nda y'uwundi bisanzwe bitwara igihe, bikarusha, bikagora umubiri, kandi iyo hari impamvu yo gushaka cane kurya tacos (indya zo muri Mexique zikundwa cane), ntibikunda kwiyima. Ariko, iyo wihweje ico ubushakashatsi mu bumenyi bubivugako, uhasanga inkuru itangaje kandi isa n'iyisiga ubwenge. Gutwaririza nk'ikintu kiri aho ntibishikira bose mu mico itandukanye, nk'uko abashakashatsi babibonye. Kandi mu bihugu vy'imico y'abatavuga icongereza aho bivugwa ko abagore batwaririza, usanga ivyo batwaririza bitandukanye cane n'ivy'abagore bo muri Amerika canke mu Bwongereza, nk'akarorero. Nko mu Bayapani, iyo bavuze ivyo gutwaririza, usanga umuceri ari co gifungurwa kivugwa cane. Twegeye imbere, ivyigwa vyo kumenya nimba ivyo kurya bitwaririzwa cane hari ingaburo zihariye bitanga zifasha imbanyi, vyasanze ivyo vyo kurya ata ngaburo nk'izo bifise. Mu bisanzwe, abagore batwaririza usanga bagira umuvyibuho kurusha uko biba vyitezwe ku mbanyi y'umugore afise amagara meza, ivyo navyo bigashobora guteza ibibazo. Ariko ntibisigura yuko abagore batwaririza ari ivyo bigira, gusa ni uko ukwo gutwaririza gushobora kuba guterwa n'ikindi kintu ataho gihuriye n'ibibera mu mubiri. Kurabira hamwe muri rusangi igituma abantu bashaka cane ibifungurwa bimwe bishobora gutanga icerekezo, nk'uko bivugwa na Julia Hormes, umwigisha w'inyifato kuri kaminuza ya State University of New York, Albany, yize ibijanye no gushaka cane ivyo kurya mu buryo butandukanye. Nk'akarorero, Hormes avuga ko hafi ya 50% vy'abagore muri Amerika bavuga ko bashaka cane shokola mu ndwi ibanziriza kuja mu butinyanka. Abahinga barihweje niba ukwo gushaka cane shokola gufitaniye isano n'ingaburo ngirakamaro ziyirimwo, canke niba bijanye n'uko haba hari uguhindagurika kw'imisemburo mu mubiri. Mu cigwa kimwe, umuhinga mu nyifato yasavye umugore kwugurura agasaho bahawe agafungura ibirimwo niyasubira kwumva ashaka cane ico arya. Tumwe mu dusaho twarimwo shokola ikoranye amata (ifise ingaburo zose usanga muri shokola hamwe n'uburyo ishongera mu kanwa). Utundi twarimwo shokola yera, itarimwo igiterwa ca cocoa kigumye gisanzwe giha shokola ikoranye amata ibara ryayo ry'umugina, ariko ikagira imfato nziza. Hanyuma, udusaho dusigaye twarimwo ibinini vya cocoa, birimwo ibigize cocoa bigumye ariko bidateye nka shokola isanzwe iribwa. Shokola yera niyo yashoboye cane guhaza abifuza kuyirya, bigasigura rero ko atari ingaburo ngirakamaro canke ibindi birungo vya cocoa igumye bitera ukwo kuyishaka cane. Ibindi vyigwa vyibanze ku kwifuza cane shokola vyasanze ata sano ririho n'urugero rw'imisemburo mu mubiri. Mu bisanzwe, abagore baciye imvyaro babandanya kuvuga ko bakigira ukwifuza kwa cane kwa shokola, nk'uko Hormes abisigura. Ico ibi vyose vyerekana ni uko ukwo kwifuza kwa cane igifungurwa guterwa n'imico hamwe n'ibiri mu mutwe. Kwifuza cane igisuguti c'amavuta menshi canke akamanyu ka shokola, amafiriti, bishobora kuza nk'iciyumviro gisanzwe, kigacikamwo buke buke ukwifuza kwa cane kugoye kwiyumanganya. Muri ico gihe nyene, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, hamwe n'ahandi hatandukanye, kwiyumvira ivyo kurya bikwega ijisho - amajambo akoreshwa n'abashakashatsi mu kuvuga ivyo kurya birimwo kuva kuri ice cream gushika ku makaroni atekanya foromaji - bizanana no kwicuza. Hormes agira ati "haraba kwijijanya imitima. "Biraryohera umubiri, ariko kandi nkaba mba ahari umuco umbwira ko ntategerezwa kurya iyi shokola." Yongerako ati "Ndayishaka cane, ariko sinarinkwiye kuyirya - twibaza ko urwo ari rwo ruhande rw'umuco rutuma haba ico gikorwa." Ku buryo bwihariye, iyo wari umaze igihe wiyima - waramaze gushira mu mutwe ko utazosubira kwiha igifungurwa kinaka - birakugora cane kwihangana iyo ufise ico gifungurwa. Rero nyuma yo kwihereza ikimanyu ca keke, aho kwumva unyuzwe ubuzima bukabandanya, uca urya ibindi bimanyu bitatu. Vyongeye, abagore barashobora kwiyima ibifungurwa bimwe iyo bibungenze, nkumbure barondera amagara meza kubera impanuro za muganga ku bijanye n'indya nka sushi, inyama za deli hamwe n'ibindi bifungurwa. Ibi vyose bituma, n'imiburiburi mu bice bimwe vyo kw'isi, gushaka ibifungurwa cane bishika kandi bikagorana kuvyirinda, bigashobora no gutuma haba kwongera ibiro kwa cane. Kwibungenga navyo birashobora gufatwa nk'igihe kwifuza cane ibifungurwa binaka bishobora kwihanganirwa. Hormes agira ati "Uyu muco kandi uratuma tumenya ibihe hamwe n'inyendamuvano aho usanga vyihanganirwa ko abagore barya ibintu mu bisanzwe babwirizwa kwigira kure". "Guca imvyaro no kwibungenga ni ibihe ikibano gisa n'icemerera abagore kwirekura." Hormes ahanura yuko mu gihe ushaka cane shokola, wari ukwiye gufata iyo ku rwego rwo hejuru, ukarya utumanyu nka tubiri ku munsi, ubuzima bukabandanya - ivyo birashobora gutuma ingaruka zavyo zivaho. Uburyo bumwe ni ubwo gukoresha kwisamaza - hari ivyigwa vyakozwe hakoreshejwe ibisamaza vyo kuraba canke kwimotereza. Ubundi buryo ni kwita ku bibera mu mutwe hamwe no kubaza umutima nama, ukemera ko ukwo kwifuza ugufise ukakureka kukakuvamwo. Iyo ari ibijanye no gutwaririza, harashobora kuba hari ikindi kijanye n'umuco: kwibungenga biragora, kandi birashobora kunanirana iyo ata bufasha buhari. Icigwa cibanze ku bagore bo mu caro muri Tanzaniya bavuze ko batwaririza inyama, ifi, intete, ivyamwa, imboga, casanze kubaronsa ivyo vyo kurya bashaka ari ikimenyetso co gushigikirwa n'umugabo hamwe n'umuryango. Kandi koko, gusaba inkoko yokeje saa saba z'ijoro bisaba ukwitanga gukomeye ku wutumwe kuyirondera, rero bitanga icizere ko uwo muntu koko ahari kugira afashe. Mu gihe amababa y'inkoho asanzwe aryoha ubwayo, kuba hari umuntu ukunda ayakuzaniye biyongera agaciro karengeye ingaburo afise.

column2: Akazi: Woshika gute ku bintu vyinshi ukoresheje umwanya muto?
column3: Ukivyumva, bishobora kuba ata nsiguro bifise. Wokora gute umwanya muto kugira uronke umwimbu mwinshi? Aha turabasigurira ingene ivyo bishoboka n'ingene bishobora kubafasha mu migambi imwe imwe. Cal Newport, ikigo c'ubuhinga mu kugwiza umwimbu, kiratanga impanuro ku kungene ushobora akazi ku rwenge. Izo mpanuro harimwo ikintu citwa "gukora udakebaguzwa". Mu gutahura ico ari co gukora udakebaguzwa, birakenewe kumenya ico ari co akazi kadashemeye. Kusoma ubutumwa bwa mail, kuraba imbuga hwaniro, gukoresha amanama ku bintu bitihuta cane, ivyo vyose bishobora gufatwa nk'akazi kadashemeye. Ushobora kutavyirengagiza gose, ariko ushobora kubikura ku rutonde rw'ibintu vyo gukora mu mwanya umwe, kugira wihatire ku kandi kazi udakebaguzwa. N'ukwihatira cane ku bikorwa bikenewe cane no kuvyitondera cane. Ushobora no kwiherera kugira ntusamare. Ni vyo umwanditsi Maya Angelou yakunda gukora, mu gihe umugwizatunga Bill Gates azwi nk'umuntu yakunda kwiyugarana ahantu hiherereye kugira akore. Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo gushika ku ntumbero mu buzima. Umugwizatunga Warren Buffet ahanura kugira urutonde rw'ibintu 20 nkenerwa vyo gukora mu buzima, hanyuma ugaca akarongo musi y'ikigira gatanu. Hanyuma, ibindi 15 biri kuri urwo rutonde ivyihoze, gushika ubonye uhejeje ivyo bitanu vya mbere. Umwarimu wa kaminuza Angela Duckworth n'umuhinga muvyo inyifato yateguye indinganizoy'intumbero umuntu yipfuza gushikako. N'ukubigaburamwo ibice vyinshi, ikija hejuru kikaba ari co gekenewe cane (nko kuba umuganga canke gutwara umudari wa olempike). Intera ikurikira irimwo intumbero zito zito zikenewe kugira ushike ku ntumbero nyamukuru. Nk'akarorero, ubushakashatsi bukenewe kugira ukore ibibazo vyotuma uba umunyeshure wa kaminuza muvyo amagara y'abantu, canke imyimenyerezo ikenewe kugira wirukw imetero 100 kugira uronke umudari w'inzahabu. Intera yo hasi irimwo ibikorwa bishigikira ibiri mu ntera yo hejuru, gutyo gutyo gutyo. Mu gihe akazi kamwe katagushikana ku ntumbero nyamukuru, intera iyo ari yo yose kariko, ntugakore. Gukora umusi wose akazi ku muvuduko wa 100km/h si ikintu ciza. Akaruhuko karakenewe, kandi nawe karashobora kugufasha. Francesco Cirillo, umuhinga mu gukoresha neza umwanya, yaratoye igipimo c'akaruhuko ku cuma giharura iminota gifise iforoma y'urutomati yasanze mu gikoni ciwe. Ubwo buhinga buzwi kw'izina rya pomodoro (kivuye mw'izina urutomati mu gitaliyano), bukora mu kugabura akazi kawe mi bice vy'iminota 25. Ugakurikizako iminota 5 y'akaruhuko ifasha mu mwimbu. Sohoka hanze gutembera gato hakuguma uraba imbuga hwaniro - ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko utwo turuhuko dushobora umererwa neza gusumba mu kwitegurira iyindi minota 25 y'akazi. Cal Newport arafise uko afata akazi umuntu adakebaguzwa, ariko arazi kandi kugahagarika no kugira umwanya wiwe. Kugira aheraheze umusi w'akazi, yari afise akamenyero ko guhagarika. N'ukuvuga kumenya ko umusi uheze, kwihweza akazi katashoboye kurangira, gutegura ibizokorwa bukeye, no kugara inyabwonko ngendanwa canke ikaye y'imyimenyerezo no kuvuga ijambo nka "ndaheje kugara burundu". Uko wobivuga kose bikuvako, ariko ayo majambo ategerezwa kwerekana ko uhejeje akazi k'uyo musi n'intango y'akaruhuko, ko widegemvya ushobora kwinezereza. Ako kanya utegerezwa kukaronka! Inkuru yo kuri  BBC Bitesize

column2: Barcelona: Gerard Pique avuga ko hakenewe impinduka zikomeye inyuma y'agasuzuguro ka nijoro
column3: Inyuma y'igihe kitari gito Barcelona yiganje mu mupira w'amaguru, haraciye igihe itsindwa mu buryo buteye isoni, ivyaraye bibaye nijoro vyo yo bikaba ari agahomerabunwa. Urukino rwa nijoro rwayihuje na Bayern Munich mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere I Bulaya (Uefa Champions League), aho Barça yaraye ikubiswe ibitsindo 8 kuri 2 vyatumye Gerard Pique avuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka zikomeye muri uyo murwi. Uyu mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 33, yashoboye gufasha Barcelona gutsindira ibikombe 20 mu myaka 12 avuga ko bibaye ngombwa "ari we azoba uwa mbere kuva muri uyo murwi" mu gihe wobona ko ari co gikenewe. Barcelona yaraye itsinzwe mu buryo butari bwigere buyishikira ku mugabane wa Bulaya kuva igihe kitari gito, inyuma y'ihiganwa ryo mu gihugu hagati La Liga ryagiye kurangira Barça itakaje igikombe catahiye Real Madrid. Pique ati: "N'ukuri twaraye twigonze ku rutare". "Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere, canke ubwa kabiri, canke ubwa gatatu. Ntabwo turi mu nzira nziza." Abandanya avuga ati: "Abamenyereza n'abakinyi baragenda hakaza abandi, ariko mvugishije ukuri haraciye igihe kirekire tudafise inguvu z'ugushobora guhangana n'iyindi mirwi ku rugero rw'umugabane w'Ubulayi". "Nibaza ko twese hamwe dutegerezwa kwicara tukiyumvira hagati yacu icokorwa ku neza y'umurwi. Ibitubayeko ntibishobora kwihanganirwa". "Biragoye cane kwemera ariko nibaza ko bizodufasha kwiyumvira icokorwa, kuneza yacu twese". "Umurwi wacu ukeneye impinduka. Sindiko mvuga umumenyereza canke abakinyi, ariko umurwi wose muri rusangi ingene utunganijwe bitegerezwa guhinduka". "Turakeneye amaraso mashasha kugira ngo ibintu bihinduke, kandi bibaye ngombwa, noba uwa mbere kuva mu murwi". Harategekanijwe amatora y'umukuru w'umurwi muri Barça mu 2021 kugira ngo barondere uwusubirira Josep Maria Bartomeu. Umumenyereza wa Barcelona Quique Setien yagiye mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma muri Champions League ibintu bitameze neza na gato kuri we, inyuma y'amezi indwi yose yari amaze kuva mu kwa mbere asubiriye Ernesto Valverde umurwi ukaba utavyifashemwo neza muri ico gihe cose. Abajijwe ivyerekeye kazoza  k'umurwi n'ivyari bihejeje gushikirizwa na Pique, Quique Setien yishuye ati: "Si nshobora kuvuga igikenewe mu murwi, urazi ko maze amezi make cane". "Nimba Gerard avuga ko hakenewe impinduka zikomeye, aya ni amajambo akomeye cane. Harageze ko twihweza ibintu tugafata ingingo zikomeye kugira ngo twubake kazoza". Abajijwe nimba ikibazo ciwe gikenewe kwigwa nk'umumenyereza wa Barca, avuga ati: "Nibaza ko ubu nyene hakiri kare cane kuvuga nimba nzoguma mu murwi canke nzogenda. Ikiriho ni uko ibiba atari jewe ndabituma". "Ni ngombwa ko twese hamwe turabira hamwe igikenewe gukorwa, tukanigira hamwe ibintu vyose vyatumye tumaramara uku". Amahirwe yo kubandanya amenyereza uyu murwi inyuma y'ibara waraye ubonye i Lisbone ni make cane, mu gihe hari amakuru abandanya azunguruka avuga ko Barça yoba yaramaze gufatna ingingo yo kumwirukana. Chris Sutton yahoze akinira umurwi Blackburn Rovers mbere uyu murwi ugatsindira ihiganwa ry'u Bwongererza mu 1995 isumbije Man U inote rimwe rudende, yabwiye radiyo BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Aragenda nta gisivya, ntashobora kubandanya". "Ntushobora kumaramazwa gutya nk'umumenyereza wa Barca. Ibibaye ni agasuzuguro karenze urugero". Mu bantu bavugwa ko bashobora kumusubirira, harimwo Mauricio Pochettino yahoze amenyereza Tottenham, hamwe na Ronald Koeman yahoze amenyereza Everton. Koeman, umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubuholande 2018, yamaze imyaka itandatu akinira Barça hagati ya 1989 na 1995, mu gihe Pochettino amaze igihe atakazi afise kuva yirukanywe muri Tottenham mu kwa cumi na rimwe 2019. Umwanditsi w'umunya Espanye mu bijanye n'umupira w'amaguru, Guillem Balague , avuga ati: "Pochettino nta kazi afise kandi ni umuntu azi neza uyo murwi". "Umukuru w'umurwi Josep Maria Bartomeu na Pochettino basanzwe ari abagenzi". Kuva Setien atanguye kumenyereza uyo murwi mu kwa mbere uno mwaka, ntiyiyumviswemwo n'abantu benshi muri uyo murwi, mu gihe abakinyi bakomeye muri uyo murwi harimwo na Lionel Messi batigeze biyumvamwo ubuhinga yashaka kuzana mu murwi. Nibwo bwa mbere Barça itsinzwe ibitsindo umunani mu rukino rumwe kuva mu 1946 igihe Sevilla iyitera ibitsindo 8-0.

column2: Greece: Umupatiri i Athens yafashwe inyuma y'uko ateye aside abasenyeri
column3: Umupatiri yahagaritswe ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubugiriki Athens/Athènes inyuma yo gutera aside abasenyeri indwi bo mw'idini ry'aba Orthodox, nk'uko bivugwa n'igiporisi. Ibi vyabaye igihe uyu mupatiri w'imyaka 36 yariko yumvirizwa n'urwego rujejwe indero inyuma y'umutaga w'ejo ku wa gatatu, nk'uko bibandanya bivugwa n'igiporisi. Abasenyeri batatu bariko baravurirwa mu bitaro kubera ubushe batewe n'iyi aside, bakaba bahiye mu maso. Umuporisi yirutse aja gutabara abo basenyeri, na we nyene ari mu bitaro. Uwagirizwa gukora aka kabi - umupatiri ashobora kwirukanwa muri iryo dini - yagirizwa ko afise uruhara mu rudandaza rw'ibiyayuramutwe, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ANA. Nk'uko ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu bibitangaza, abo basenyeri bari bakoranye kugira ngo baganire ingene bomwirukana - bakamwambura ubupatiri - inyuma y'aho bivugiwe ko mu kwa gatandatu mu 2018 yafatanywe amagarama 1,8 y'urumogi. Ikinyamakuru Ta Nea kivuga ko uyo mupatiri yinjiye mu kigo c'ababihebeye Imana ca Petraki kiri i Athènes agiye kwumvirizwa, akaba yinjiranye "icupa rinini ririmwo iyo aside". Umuzamu yashoboye gufata uyo mupatiri ageze kw'irembo ry'ico kigo, na we nyene yaraturiwe n'iyo aside, akaba yaciye asimbanwa kwa muganga. Umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubugiriki Katerina Sakellaropoulou ariyamiriza iki gitero, nayo umushikiranganji wa mbere Kyriakos Mitsotakis akaba yavuganye n'uwurongoye iryo dini mu Bugiriki, Musenyeri mukuru wa Athènes, Ieronymos II. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mitsotakis avuga ko ababajwe cane n'iki gitero, akaba yijeje uyu musenyeri ko "reta izokora uko ishoboye mu kuvura abakomeretse kugira bashobore gukira ningoga".

column2: Tanzania yakiriye incanco za mbere za Covid-19 zitanzwe na US
column3: Tanzania yahawe doze zirenga umuriyoni w'incanco za Johnson &Johnson mu mugambi Covx w'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, wo kurwanya ca kiza karanda ca Covid-19. Ni muri wa mugambi wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika wo gufashisha umugabane wa Afrika incanco zigera ku miriyoni 25. Nk'uko bimeze mu bindi bihugu, abazoronka ubwa mbere izi ncanco ni abakora mu bisata bijejwe ubuvuzi hamwe n'abo bandi bose baboneka ko bashobora kwanduzwa uwu mugera ningoga. Ku rubuga rwayo rwa Twitter, ubuserukizi bwa Amerika muri Tanzania buvuga ko bwahaye reta ya Tanzania izo ncanco bubicishije mu mugambi wa Covax, bukoranye kandi n'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika. Uwuserukira Amerika muri ico gihugu Donald J Wright, avuga ko  bariko barakwiragiza izi ncanco kugira no barokore ubuzima mu gufata iya mbere mu rugamba rwo gutuza iki kiza. Itangazo ryasohowe n'umunyamabanga ntayegayezwa mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu wa Tanzania ryaciye mu kinyamakuru The Citizen muri ico gihugu, rivuga ko reta yiteze kuronka ubwoko bune bw'incanco zirindiriwe mu kiringo c'amezi atatu gushika kuri ane ari imbere. Uru rucanco rutangwa kuri doze imwe gusa ruzotangwa ku buntu mu bitaro vyose vya reta. Abazoba bafise ingendo mu mahanga nabo nyene bazohabwa uru rucanco ariko babanje kuriha. Hari haciye indwi zibiri izinga rya Zanzibar ry'ico gihugu ryaratanguye isekeza ryo gucandaga rikoresheje rwa rucanco rw'ahingurwa n'Ubushinwa, Sinovac. Gushika ubu ariko nta biharuro vyerekana abamaze gucandagwa, canke igitigiri c'izo ncanco zatanzwe na reta y'Ubushinwa. Tanzania yari imaze igihe kitari gito idatangaza ibitigiri vy'ingene coronavirus yifashe mu gihugu kuva mu 2020 gushika mu kwa gatandatu uno mwaka, haciye amezi make Perezida Samia Suluhu yimitswe nk'umukuru mushasha w'ico gihugu. Uwo yasubiriye, umuhisi John Pombe Magufuli, yari umwe mu bategetsi b'isi batabona kumwe n'abandi ibijanye na Covid, akaba yari yariyamirije incanco. Iki gihugu ubu kimenyesha ko gihanganye n'igihuhusi kigira gatatu ca Covid. Eritrea n'Uburundi ni vyo bihugu vyonyene ku mugabane wa Afrika bitarasaba incanco muri wa mugambi Covax canke muri wa mugambi w'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika, uzwi nka Vaccine Acquisition Trust.

column2: Spice Diana ati 'Nsaba Imana ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza'
column3: Igisata c'umuziki muri Uganda kiriko kiratera imbere, kandi kirimwo abacuraranzi batari bake b'abagore bamaze gutera imbere. Spice Diana afise indirimbo zitari nke amaze gusohora ubu akaba ariko aritegurira urukurikirane rwiwe rwa mbere. Aherutse kandi no gushirwa ku rutonde rw'abahiganira agashimwe kitiriwe MTV Africa Music Awards  (MAMA). "Iri genwa ryantumye mbona ko nkwiye gukora ntagoheka kubera vyanyeretse ko umuziki wanje ushimwa ku mbuga mpuzamakungu hamwe no muri Afrika". "Numva umengo bambwiye bati: 'Hey, Spicey. Usanzwe ukora ibikomeye, rero utegerezwa kwihata gusumba'." Spice Diana avuga ko ibihe bigoye Uganda yari imazemwo iminsi vyagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki, akipfuza ko ibintu vyosubira mu buryo kugira ngo ibikorwa vyabo bibandanya ukuri kwamye. Spice Diana yabwiye ikiganiro This Is Africa (Iyi Ni Afrika)  ko umurwi w'abana batamba wiyise Triplets Ghetto Kids ari wo watumye ashobora gushika aho ageze. Yarabakunda cane, bimutuma abona ko akwiye kuza arabandikira indirimbo, ariko bobo bamubonyemwo ubushobozi: Ati: "Muri jewe nibwira nti: 'Oya, kuririmba ntavyo nshoboye', ariko bobo muri bo bavuga bati 'Urashobora kuririmba!' Si niyemera, ariko abo bana baranteye intege nyinshi, ku buryo nabona ntobahemukira". Umwaka uheze ntiworoheye abanyamuziki muri Uganda. Mu bitandukanye n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi byo muri Afrika, Uganda yarafashe amategeko yo kubabuza ibikorwa vyabo. Igihe abanyamuziki ba Nijeriya, Omar Ley na Tems bakora igiteramo cabo, birengagije amategeko ya Covid-19, abanyamuziki benshi ba Uganda barashavuye cane. Spice Diana ati: "Twarashavuye cane, ariko mu nyuma twamenye ko ari umunya Uganda yari yateguye ico giteramo, maze twifatanya n'aba banyanijeriya kubera twabonye ko igiporisi cakoze nabi kubahagarika mu gihe atari bo bari bagiteguye". Spice Diana  avuga kandi ko imigumuko yagiye yibonekeza mu gihugu igihe cariko citegurira amatora yagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki ba Uganda. Ati: "Abantu benshi baratakaje ubuzima bwabo, abandi baratakaza ubuzi bwabo, hanyuma igihe cose ivyo bibaye, abakunzi bacu baba biteze ko hagira ico tuvuze". Ati: "Rimwe na rimwe, usanga ata vyinshi uzi muri poritike - ugaca usanga iyo ubuze ico ushikiriza, abantu baraguhevye mbere n'umuziki wawe bakawuheba". "Rero nsaba ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza inyuma y'ibi vyose".

column2: Lady Gaga n'umufana bituye hasi bavuye hejuru ku butambiro i Las Vegas, batanguza imitwe
column3: Lady Gaga yaraguye atanguza umutwe amaguru aja hejuru agwa mu barorerezi mu giteramo giheruka mu muji wa Las Vegas. Uwo 'musani' yari yahamagaye umufana wiwe azwi nka Jack ngo aze ku butambiro, aca asimbira mu maboko yiwe - ariko uwo mufana abura intege bose baca batembera hasi. Umwe mu bariko bararorera igiteramo yanditse agira ati "n'ukuri twari tuzi yuko apfuye". Ahubwo Gaga yaciye agaruka ku butambiro aririmba indirimbo Million Reasons na Jack amuri impande. Yagize ati "Birahimbaye. Turakundana cane ku buryo twaguye twese tuva ku butambiro." "Twagwanye mu maboko. Turi nka Jack na Rose bo muri Titanic. "Ndibaza ko tuza gusangira icayi nyuma y'aha." Abafana bari bagize ubwoba bibaza ko Gaga yababaye kuko asanzwe afise uburwayi buzwi nka fibromyalgia, uburwayi amaranye igihe butuma ababara umubiri wose. Ubwo burwayi bushobora kandi gutuma ababa birengeje, akaruha, inyama z'umubiri zikagumirwa, kwibuka bikamugora kandi akabura itiro. Mu 2013, yahagaritse ibiteramo vy'urukurikirane Born This Way amaze kuvunika ikiyunguyungu. Ariko uwo muririmvyi kugwa kw'ejo kuwa kane ntaco kwamutwaye, ahumuriza abarorerezi hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano bamufashije guhaguruka. Kanda ngaha urabe ingene Lady Gaga n'umufana baguye Yagize ati: "Vyose ni sawa. Ikintu kimwe kitagenda ni uko dukeneye ingazi kuri ubu butambiro kugira nsubire hejuru." Uwo 'musani' yanahojeje Jack, yari yarenzwe n'umwosori kubera ivyari bihejeje kuba. Gaga yagize ati: "Ntugire ingorane, vyose ni sawa. Si ikosa ryawe. Urashobora kunyemerera ikintu? Urashobora kwibabarira ubu nyene kubera ibihejeje gushika?" Nyuma muri ico giteramo, Gaga yarerekanye yuko ukwo kugwa ata na kimwe kwamutwaye aca akora ikarasisi rikomeye ariko araririmba indirimbo yiwe ikunzwe, Bad Romance.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru: Mbappe, Costa, Guimaraes, Lukaku, Yerry Mina
column3: Real Madrid ntiriyumvira ivyo gusubira kurondera umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Kylian Mbappe  w’imyaka 23, hagati aho, uyu murwi wo muri Espagne uriko ukurikiranira hagufi ingene uwahoze ari umukinyo wo hagati Xabi Alonso  yitwara nk’umumenyereza wa Bayer Leverkusen . (ESPN) Mbappe ariko arihweza ingene yohagarika amasezerano yiwe mu kwa mbere. (L'Equipe iciye kuri Mail) Hagati aho, PSG iripfuza kugura umukinyi w’inyuma wa Real Madrid umunya-Espagne Rafa Marin  w’imyaka 20. (Marca mu ki espagnol) Inter irashaka gusinyisha Romelu Lukaku amasezerano kugira ngo yimukire burundu muri uyu murwi. Uyu mubirigi w’imyaka 29 yatijijwe uyo murwi wo mu Butaliyano avuye muri Chelsea. (Calciomercato mu gitaliyano) Inter kandi iripfuza umukinyi w’inyuma wa Everton umunya-Colombia Yerry Mina  w’imyaka 28. (Calciomercato mu gitaliyano) Manchester United niyo ifise amahirwe yo gutahukana umunyegori wa Porto umunya-Portugal Diogo Costa  w’imyaka 23. (Diario de Noticias, iciye kuri TeamTalk) United igiye gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo yongereze amasezerano ifitaniye na Diogo Dalot kugira ngo izibire Barcelona iriko irahiga ingene yoronka uyu munya-Portugal w’imyaka 23 akina inyuma. (ESPN, iciye kuri Mirror) Newcastle United irashaka gushika ku masezerano y’igihe kirekire n’umunyabrezili akina hagati Bruno Guimaraes w’imyaka 24 imbere y’uko uyu mwaka w’inkino urangira. (90min) Arsenal  bihobora kuyibera ngombwa ko iriha amafaranga menshi kugira ironke umunya-Ukraine akina ku ruhande  Mykhaylo Mudryk w’imyaka 21, mu kwa mbere, mu gihe umurwi wiwe Shakhtar Donestk wobandanya mw’ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League). (Football.London) Tottenham itegura gutangura ibiganiro ku vyerekeye amasezerano ifitaniye n’umumenyereza wayo Antonio Conte mu kwezi kuza. Amasezerano y’uyu mutaliyano w’imyaka 53 azorangira mu mpera z’uyu mwaka w’inkino. (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Atletico Madrid umunya-Portugal Joao Felix w’imyaka 22  aripfuza gusezerera uyu murwi mu kwa mbere kubera icuka kibi kiri hagati ya we n’umumenyereza Diego Simeone. (A Bola mugi portugal) Manchester United ishobora kuba umwe mu mirwi yiteguriye guciria inzira Felix yo kuva muri Atletico Madrid. (A Bola iciye kuri Express) Umuserukizi w’umusatirizi w’umunya-Autriche Marko Arnautovic akina muri Bologna avuga ko uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 33 ari we yanse kwimukira muri Manchester United, aho kuba uyu murwi wa Premier League wamwanse. (Gianluca di Marzio via Sport Witness) Real Madrid irashaka kurondera umunya-Canada Alphonso Davies w’imyaka 21 akina inyuma muri Bayern Munich. (Marca mu ki-Espagnol ) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa Leicester City umubirigi Wout Faes w’imyaka 24 avuga ko yanse amasezerano yamusaba kuja gukinira Chelsea mu ci, imbere y’uko afata ingingo yo kwimukira kuri King Power Stadium (ikibuga ca Leicester). (Telegraph ) Chelsea yagenye uwujejwe kugura abkinyi mushasha, Joe Shields, imuvanye mu murwi Mugenzi wawo wo muri Premier League,  Southampton. (Sun) Manchester City ni umwe mu mirwi iriko irarwanira umukinyi w’inyuma w’umunya- Ireland, Sam Curtis w’imyaka 16, asanzwe akina mu murwi St Patrick's Athletic. (Football Insider)

column2: Ukraine: Moscou ivuga ko Russia izohagarika intambara igihe OTAN/NATO itazoba ikiyibangamiye
column3: Ibikorwa vya gisirikare vya Moscou bizorangira mu gihe OTAN/NATO izohagarika gukoresha ubutaka bwa Ukraine mu kubangamira Uburusiya, niko Alexey Polishchuk, umutegetsi mukuru wo mu bushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya yabwiye ikinyamakuru cegamiye reta, Tass. Polishchuk ati: "Igikorwa kidasanzwe kizohagarara mu gihe intumbero zaco zizoba zishitsweko. Muri zo harimwo gukingira abanyagihugu bibereyeho mu mahoro ba Donbas, gusambura igisirikare hamwe no gukura ivyiyumviro vy'iki-NAZI muri Ukraine, co kimwe no gukuraho ikintu cose cobangamira Uburusiya kivuye ku butaka bwa Ukraine kubera bwifatiwe n'ibihugu vya OTAN". Hagati aho, nta nsiguro atanga z'ukungene OTAN ibangamiye Uburusiya ku butaka bwa Ukraine. Uyu mutegetsi wo mu bushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire yongerako y'uko iki gikorwa ca gisirikare "kibandanya uko categuwe" kandi ko "intumbero zaco zose zizoshikwako". Avuze aya majambo mu gihe ingabo z'Uburusiya zibandanya ibitero mu bice bitandukanye vy'igihugu, aho zivugwa ko ejo ku wa gatatu zateye intambwe ntoya muri iyo ntambara. Umutegetsi wo mu kigo gikora ubushakashatsi ku ntambara, Institute for the Study of War, ca Amerika yavuze ko ejo ku wa gatatu Uburusiya bwateye intambwe ntoya mu bitero vyo hasi no mu kirere ku ruganda ruhingura ivyuma rwa ca gisagara ca Mariupol kigoswe. Abarwanyi ba Ukraine muri ico gisagara co ku nkengera y'ibahari cugarijwe n'Abarusiya bugaraniwe muri urwo ruganda rwa Azovstal. Ico kigo kivuga kandi ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zigaruriye uduce duto dukomeye tw'ibisagara vya Rubizhne na Popasna mu buseruko. Congerako y'uko ata kintu kinini ingabo z'Uburusiya zirashikako, ariko ko zibandanya ibitero mu turere turwiriyemwo abantu twa Kharkiv na Kherson. Uwuserukira Ukraine mu biganiro, Mykhailo Podolyak, avuga ko afise umunezero wo kuja "mu biganiro bidasanzwe" n'Uburusiya mu gisagara ca Mariupol kigoswe ata kirinze gusabwa. Podolyak yanditse kuri Twitter ko yemeye ivyo mu ntumbero yo "kurokora abantu bacu, batayo ya Azov, abasirikare, abasivire, abana, abakiriho n'abakomeretse". Mariupol iracagoswe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Bamwe mu basivire bamaze amayinga bazibiriweyo barashoboye kuvayo ejo ku wa gatatu  - ariko abategetsi bavuga ko ari bake cane gusumba abari bitezwe. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza avuga ko ibiganiro n'Uburusiya bivugwa vyo kurangiza intambara biboneka ko ataco bizoshikako. Boris Johnson avuga ko kuganira na Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya ari nk'uguharira "n'ingona iyo yamaze kugucakira ukuguru". Avugana n'abanyamakuru mu gihe yagomba yurire indege imushikana mu Buhindi, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza yavuze ko Putin ashobora kuganira mu gihe gusa yamaze gushinga rukaguma muri Ukraine. Aragabisha ko uyu mukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya ashobora gusubira gutegura igitero ku mugwa mukuru Kyiv. Nayo ku ruhande rwa Ukraine, Boris Johnson yibaza ko Perezida Zelensky yipfuza kubona ingabo z'Uburusiya zirukanywe mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubushinwa Xi Jinping yasubiye kwiyamiriza ibihano nk'ivyo ibihugu vyo mu Burengero vyafatiye Uburusiya. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ikoraniro ry'akarere ryo kwiga ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, Xi yavuze ko Ubushinwa budashigikiye amategeko y'igikenye, kandi ko amayeri yo gutera igitsure kirenze urugero no kuzibira imihora ataco bizoshikako. Ariyamiriza ico yise "ivyiyumviro vyo mu gihe c'intambara yo kwikekana", kutaja inama no kwigira kibirengeye - amajambo Ubushinwa bukunze gukoresha mu kunegura ingingo za Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Hagati aho, Pekin/Beijing yanse kwiyamiriza igitero c'Uburusiya kuri Ukraine, mbere ica yiyemeza kubandanya ukuri kwamye imigenderanire y'ubudandaji n'iki gihugu ivuga ko ari umufatanyabikorwa ngirakamaro. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko atangazwa n'ingene igisirikare ca Ukraine cihagazeko mu guhangana n'umwansi. Mu nama y'ejo ku wa gatatu yamuhuje n'abategetsi bakuru bo mu gisata co kwivuna abansi, yavuze ati: "Barakomeye kandi bariyemera gusumba uko navyiyumvira". Perezida Biden yongerako y'uko "ubumwe, kuguma ku ntumbero imwe hamwe n'ishaka" vya OTAN vyataye mu gahundwe Perezida Vladimir Putin  w'Uburusiya. "Ibirwanisho bibandanya vyisukira buri musi ubu tukaba turiko turabona akamaro k'ubucuti n'ubufatanyabikorwa kw'isi yose". Amerika yiteze gutanga iyindi mfashanyo ya gisirikare mu misi iza, inyuma yo kwemerera Ukraine imiriyoni 800 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu ndwi iheze. Umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Maison Blanche/White House, Jen Psaki, ntavuga ibizoba biri muri iyi mfashanyo yindi. Ariko avuga ko ubutegetsi "buzokora uko bushoboye kwose mu guha inguvu reta ya Ukraine n'abategetsi ba Ukraine kugira ngo yivune mu ntambara yayo ya gisirikare". Mu yandi makuru Uburusiya bwasohoye ireresi buvuga ko yerekana igerageza rya misire irasa kure (missile balistique intercontinental/intercontinental ballistic missile). Perezida Putin avuga ko iri gerageza ry'iki gisasu ca misire, Sarmat, kirasa kure, rizotuma abo bose barondera kubangamira igihugu ciwe babanza kuzungurutsa umutwe. Raba ingene vyagenze:

column2: Intambara hagati ya Ethiopia na Tigray: Kubera iki isi yose ifise impungenge
column3: Umunyamabanga wa Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken ari mu rugendo muri Kenya, aho yiteze kuganira n'abategetsi bayo ibijanye n'intambara yo mu gihugu kibanyi ca Ethiopia. Amerika n'Ubwongereza vyaramaze gusaba abanyagihugu bavyo kuva muri Ethiopia kandi ko indege zo kubibafashamwo ziteguye, nk'uko bivugwa n'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza. Aka kamo, akamo kibutsa Kabul mu kw'umunani guheze, gatewe mu gihe inyeshamba zo mu ntara ya Tigray yo mu buraruko ziboneka ko zishobora kwinjira ku mugwa mukuru, Addis Ababa. Inyuma y'umwaka wose iyi ntambara imaze, ikaba inateye ikibazo c'ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi, impungenge z'amakungu zigenda ziyongera cane. Afrika na Amerika zibandanya zita ku rutare mu gihe ibiriko bibera muri Ethiopia bifise ingaruka zikomeye mu karere kose no mu bindi bice vy'isi. Ibiharuro vyonyene birateye ubwoba. Abantu n'imiburiburi 400.000 mu buraruko bw'igihugu bahanzwe na kigoyi, mu gihe ibice 80% vy'imiti nkenerwa atayiriho, abantu barenga imiriyoni zibiri nabo bakaba barataye izabo. Reta y'igihugu iragirizwa kubuza n'ibigirankana ko imfashanyo zishika mu ntara ya Tigray, ivyo yoyo ihakana. Hejuru y'ibi, hari ivyemezo vy'ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane, iyicarubozo n'ivyo gufata abagore ku nguvu vyagirizwa impande zompi. Ariko kandi hari n'izindi nyungu zikomeye. Ethiopia, igihugu giharurwamwo abantu imiriyoni 110 kikaba kiza ku mwanya ugira kabiri muri Afrika, gisanzwe ari incuti ikomeye y'ibihugu vyo mu burengero bw'isi muri ako karere karangwamwo umutekano ukunze guhungabana. Hari amakenga ko iyi ntambara ishobora guteza umudugararo muri iki gihugu kirangwamwo amoko menshi ugashobora mbere no gutuma gisambuka. Bibaye ngombwa ko imiriyoni z'abantu zihunga mu gihe intambara zoba ndanse, ibihugu bibanyi bishobora kuhagirira ingorane. Ethiopia ni igihugu kidafise umuhora ugishikana kw'ibahari, ikaba ihana urubibe n'ibihugu bitandatu, bibiri muri vyo birangwamwo umutekano muke - Sudani y'Epfo na Somalia - ikindi naco, Sudan, kikaba kivugwamwo coup d'Etat, aho igisirikare giherutse gutembagaza ubutegetsi. Ifise abasirikare mu ngabo za Afrika zagiye kurwanya intagondwa ziyitirira idini rya Islam muri Somalia, aha rero hakaba hari ubwoba ko ishobora kubatahukana mu gihe vyoba nkenerwa. Imbere y'uko ava muri uru rugendo, Blinken agabisha ko uyu mudugararo ushobora "guteza akaga gakomeye ku banyagihugu ba Ethiopia hamwe no mu karere kose". Ingabo za Eritrea zisanzwe ziriko zirarwana muri Ethiopia, mu gihe rero iyi ntambara yobandanya n'ibindi bihugu bibanyi bishobora kwinjiramwo. Ariko n'ibihugu vya kure navyo nyene biravugwa ko vyoba vyaramaze kwinjira muri yo. Mu kwezi guheze, itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ryavuze ko Turukiya yemeye guha Ethiopia za ndege za gisirikare zitagira abadereva, zizwi nka drones. Ibi biteje impungenge ku migenderanire hagati ya Turukiya na Misiri isanzwe iri mu mpari na Ethiopia ku bijanye na rwa rugomero rwa rutura ruriko rurubakwa ku ruzi Nil, nk'uko Reuters ibivuga. Ethiopia kandi imaze kugura ibirwanisho mu Bushinwa no muri Irani, aho indege ziva muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu (Emirats Arabes Unis/United Arab Emirates) ari zo ziriko zirakoreshwa mu kubishikana mu gihugu, nk'uko bivugwa n'urubuga ngurukanabumenyi Oryx rusanzwe rutangaza amakuru ajanye n'ivyo kwivuna abansi. Kuri Amerika, Ethiopia ni incuti ya kera yizigiwe cane, cane cane mu citwa Urugamba rwo kurwanya Iterabwoba. Ethiopia iri mu ntambara n'intagondwa ziyitirira idini rya Islam muri Somalia, ikaba yaranemereye Amerika gukoresha ikirere cayo muri ya ntambara ya Irak. Iri mu bihugu bike vya Afrika vyifatanije na Amerika mu runani mpuzamakungu rwari rurongowe na Amerika muri iyi ntambara ya Irak. Ubutegetsi butajegajega muri Ethiopia bwagize uruhara runini muri ubu bucuti. Amerika irabushigikiza imfashanyo y'amafaranga, aho hagati y'imyaka ya 2016 na 2020 yabuhaye imiriyaridi 4.2 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Ariko intumwa ya Amerika mu karere, Jeffrey Feltman, ntarya umunwa mu kunegura reta y'igihugu, akavuga ko poritike yayo yatumye igihugu giterwa n'inzara, akayigereranya n'ubutegetsi bwa Bashar al-Assad muri Syria. Inyuma y'aho abarwanyi b'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) bateye basugereza umugwa mukuru kw'ibarabara rikuru riva mu buraruko rija i Addis Abeba, icuka caraduze bikomeye. Amerika yarateye akamo abanyagihugu bayo kuva muri Ethiopia, umushikiranganji wa mbere nawe, Abiy Ahmed, atangaza ibihe bidasanzwe, aca atera akamo ko abanyagihugu binjira mu gisirikare. Abategetsi ba Addis Ababa basavye abanyagihugu kwandikisha ibirwanisho vyabo bakitegurira kurwanya inyeshamba. Hari kandi uwundi muhari w'inyeshamba wishize hamwe na TPLF uriko usugereza umugwa mukuru. Icuka kibi muri iki gisagara carunyuwe n'uko gituwemwo n'amoko menshi, mbere bamwe bakagiriza ubutegetsi ko butoteza abanya Tigray bahagarikwa agasakisaki. Ariko abarwanyi ba Tigray baracari kure, ku birometero birenga 300 uvuye mu gisagara - mu micungararo y'igisagara ca Kombolcha. Tibor Nagy yahoze ari icegera c'umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika muri Afrika, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ntabwo ari ba Batalibani bagenda bifatira ibisagara uko bashatse muri Afghanistani ata n'urusoro na rumwe rurashwe". "Aho TPLF ikorera hari intambara zikomeye...Addis Ababa ishobora gusesekamwo amaraso ateye ubwoba". Yemeza ko ivyo gufata umugwa mukuru biriko bikoreshwa mu gutera ubwoba co kimwe n'uko igihugu gifise ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vy'ubumara cogira mu gutera ubwoba ko kigomba kibirekure. TPLF ivuga ko ico yipfuza ari ukwugurura inzira kugira ngo imfashanyo zishobore kwinjira muri Tigray. Umuvugizi wayo, Getachew Reda, yabwiye ikiganiro Focus on Africa ca BBC ati: "Tuzobandanya urugamba [dusugereza Addis Ababa]… ariko ikituraje ishinga si Addis Abeba kuko dushaka kugondoza Abiy ngo yugurure inzira". Reta ya Ethiopia yaramaze gutangaza TPLF nk'umuhari w'iterabwoba, umushikiranganji wa mbere nawe akaba yariyemeje kuyirwanya. Mu ntango z'uku kwa mbere, Abiy yavuze ati: "Tuzohamba uyu mwansi n'amaraso n'amagufa yacu kugira ngo tugarukane icubahiro ca  Ethiopia". Amakenga ni uko iyi ntambara iriko irafata iyindi ntera kandi bikazogenda bigorana ko hagira uruhande rwemera gusubira inyuma. Hari kandi n'ubwoba ko iyi ntambara ishobora gukwira mu gihugu cose. TPLF yarishize hamwe n'iyindi mirwi itari mike irwanya reta mu runani rushasha rurondera kurandurana n'imizi ubutegetsi bwa Abiy. Intumwa y'Ubumwe bwa Afrika muri ako karere, Olusegun Obasanjo yahoze arongoye Nigeria, avuga ko hakiri "akadirisha gato k'amahirwe". Amaze kuganira n'impande zompi mu rugendo aherukamwo muri Ethiopia, yabwiye inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano ati: "Igihe ni gito ku mfashanyo iyo ari yo yose". Atera akamo ko hoba ibiganiro vy'amahoro kugira ngo batorere umuti iyi ntambara bagatora inyishu biciye mu nzira y'amahoro, n'aho ataravuga ingene vyogenda. Inyishu itangwa n'uwuserukira Ethiopia mw'ishirahamwe ONU irerekana ibibazo abahuza bashobora kugira. Avuga ko yubaha aka kamo ariko akabandanya avuga ko TPLF ari "umurwi w'inkozi z'ikibi". Aho nyene, umuvugizi wa TPLF, Getachew, wewe yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter ko "utwigoro hafi twose tw'amahoro" turondera kurokora  [Umushikiranganji wa mbere] Abiy, aho kurondera gutorera umuti ibibazo nyamukuru vya poritike bihanze igihugu". Ibi birumvikana ko ibiganiro vyo guhagarika intambara biri hagati y'impande zankana urunuka. Nagy avuga ko imwe mu nzira yotuma impande zompi zicara zikaganira ari uko Amerika n'Ubushinwa vyompi, biri kumwe n'ibindi nka za Turukiya, vyokorera hamwe. Ati: "Abiy ntashobobora guhangana na Amerika n'Ubushinwa mu gihe vyoba bivuga rumwe". Avuga ko ikintu ca mbere ari ugukora kugira ngo intambara zihagarare hanyuma imfashanyo zigashikira abo zigenewe, hanyuma buke buke hagatorwa inzira za poritike. Umuzi w'iyi ntambara ni ukutumvikana hagati y'umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy na TPLF, umugambwe wamaze hafi imyaka 27 ari wo urongoye igihugu cose, atari Tigray gusa. Umushikiranganji Abiy yashitse ku butegetsi mu 2018 inyuma y'imyiyerekano y'urutavanako yakozwe n'abo mu bwoko bw'aba Oromo. Aba Oromo - ubwoko bunini gusumba ubundi bwose muri Ethiopia - bwumva ko bwari bumaze igihe kirekire bwarakumiriwe. Abiy we nyene ubwiwe umu-Oromo kandi akaba ari mu runani rurongoye igihugu, yaboneka nk'umuntu ashobora gutorera umuti iki kibazo. Mu rukurikirane rw'impinduka, aho yatanze uburenganzira bwa poritike mbere akagiriranira amasezerano y'amahoro na Eritrea inyuma y'imyaka itari mike ibi bihugu vyari bimaze birabana urunuka, TPLF yashizwe ku ruhande. Icuka kibi cari hagati ya TPLF na Abiy cagiye kwadukamwo intambara mu mezi 12 aheze, igihe ingabo za Tigray zagirijwe ko zateye ibirindiro vy'igisirikare c'igihugu kugira ngo zinyage ibirwanisho, ariho reta y'igihugu nayo yaca yihora.

column2: DRC: umutegetsi mukuru wa Isilamu yaraye yishwe arashwe i Beni
column3: Umwe mu bategetsi bakuru b'idini rya Isilamu yaraye agandaguwe, arashwe n'abantu bataramenyekana mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo (DRC). Sheikh Ali Amini yarashwe amasasu menshi mu gihe yari arongoye amasengesho y'ejo ku mugoroba mu musigiti mukuru w'igisagara ca Beni mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Ubu bwicanyi bwabaye haciye amasaha make Perezida Félix Tshisekedi w'ico gihugu atangaje ko intara zibiri zigoswe kuva ku wa gatanu. Iki gitero cakozwe mu gihe c'Ukwezi Kweranda kwa Isilamu, Ramadan, cateye ubwoba bwinshi mu bantu. Nta murwi n'umwe uriyitirira ubu bwicanyi, ariko vyinshi mu bitero nk'ibi bimenyerewe bikorwa n'inyeshamba z'umurwi ADF zirwanya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda. Umurwi Etat Islamique (IS) nawo wariyitiriye bimwe mu bitero vyayo, ariko gushika ubu ntibiratomoreka neza imigenderanire ufitaniye na ADF. Imbere y'uko iki gitero kiba, ibigwati bibiri vyo muri ako karere vyari vyatewe n'abikekwa ko ari izo nyeshamba za ADF, umurwi umaze igihe ukiririmbira muri ako karere, kuva mu myaka ya 1990. Ibi bibaye mu gihe abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bafise impungenge ku ngingo ya Perezida Tshisekedi yo gutangaza ko intara zibiri - Kivu ya Ruguru na Ituri - zigoswe n'ingabo z'igihugu. Bafise ubwoba ko igisirikare kigiye kwongererezwa ububasha mu gihe kivugwa ko gifise amateka mabi cane y'ihohotera.

column2: Papa Bouba Diop yahoze akinira Senegal n'imirwi yo mu Bwongereza yapfuye ku myaka 42
column3: Papa Bouba Diop yahoze akina hagati mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Senegal, be no mu mirwi ya Fulham na Portsmouth yapfuye afise imyaka 42. Diop yakinye inkino 129 mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League, mbere akaba yaranakiniye n'imirwi ya West Ham United na Birmingham City mu Bwongereza. Diop yarakiniye umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Senegal mw'igihanwa ry'igikombe c'isi mu 2002, akaba ari we yinjije igitsindo catumye iki gihugu gitsinda Ubufaransa 1-0. Fifa yanditse ku mbuga hwaniro iti: "Warabaye intwari mu gikombe c'isi, uzokwama uri intwari". Ubutumwa bw'umurwi Fulham yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, buvuga ko uyu murwi "wababaye cane". Iki gihe Senegal ija muri rino higanwa ry'igikombe c'isi mu 2002, niho yashika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, Diop akaba yashoboye kwinjiza ibitsindo bibiri mu rukino rwo gukuranamwo rwayihuje na Uruguay, rukarangira ari 3-3. Yakiniye kandi Senegal mu mahiganwa ane y'igikombe ca Afrika, harimwo igihe Senegal irangiza ihiganwa ari iya kabiri mu 2002. Diop yasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru mu 2013. Diop yarafashije umurwi wa Portsmouth gutwara igikombe ca FA mu 2008, igihe wari usanzwe umenyerezwa na Harry Redknapp. Redknapp yabwiye iradiyo BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Yari umuntu ameze neza cane". "Yambereye umuntu mwiza cane, umuntu w'imico ikomeye, yama anezerewe kandi yarangwa n'akamwemwe mu maso. Yari umuntu w'igihangange". "Nta mutima mubi yari afise. N'aho yaboneka ko umengo ateye ubwoba mu kibuga kuko yari afise igihagararo kinini, nta kabi kari muri we". "Nifatanije n'umuryango wiwe". Umukuru w'igihugu ca Senegal, Macky Sall,  avuga ko urupfu rwa Diop "ari incamugongo kuri Senegal", nayo Sadio Mane akina hagati muri Liverpool yanditse ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "Papa Bouba, Turababaye cane twumvise urupfu rwawe. Tukwemereye ko uzoguma mu mitima yacu n'aho ugiye utadusezeye".

column2: Lionel Messi: Barça yipfuza kunagura umurwi ishingiye ku mukinyi wa mbere kw'isi
column3: Barcelona iracipfuza ko yosubira kwiyubaka ishingiye kuri kizigenza wayo Lionel Messi, ubu abarongoye uyu murwi bakaba bariko baragerageza kumwumvisha ko yowugumamwo, nk'uko bivugwa na Ramon Planes ajejwe kwinonora imitsi muri Barça. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 33 akomoka muri Argentine yaratangarije uyu murwi ko yipfuza kuwusezerera. Uyu mukinyi amaze gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu incuro indwi zose niwe mukinyi wa mbere amaze gutsindira Barcelona ibitsindo vyinshi, bingana na 634. Planes ati: "Ivyabaye vyarabaye kandi intumbero yacu ni ukunagurira umurwi wacu ku mushinge w'umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi". "Dushaka kwubaka uwundi murwi utsinda urongowe n'umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi, uwa mbere mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi". "Barça na Leo ni nk'umugabo n'umugore, aho uruhande rumwe rwitangiye cane urundi, kandi bompi banezereje abakunzi. Nibaza ko kazoza ari keza. Ndafise viyizigiro". Messi - umukinyi amaze imyaka yose akina muri Barça - yipfuza kuja ahandi inyuma y'uko umwaka wose w'inkino urangiye ata gikombe na kimwe baronse, akamaramaza kakaba kabaye mu rukino rw'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma ca Champions League rwagiye kurangira Bayern Munich yirahiye Barça ibitsindo 8-2. Amasezerano ya Messi na Barcelona azorangira mu 202, ariko umurwi umukeneye ukaba utegerezwa kumugura ku miliyoni 700. Planes ati: "Turakeneye abakinyi b'inararibonye nka Leo Messi, ariko kandi n'abakinyi b'integabizoza ku murwi. Turiko turita ku rutare kugira ngo imigenderanire hagati ya Messi na Barça ibandanye. Turiko turakora kugira ngo twumvishe Leo". "Barça yagiye yiyubaka incuro nyinshi muri kahise kandi yamye yivyukiranya ikaza ikomeye cane, rero muri kino gihe nivyo turimwo". Bamwe babona ko kugira ngo Messi ashobore kugondozwa ari uko umukuru wayo Josep Maria Bartomeu atanga imihoho, maze hakaba ayandi matora. Hagati aho, iki conyene gishobora kudatuma uyu murwi ugumana uyu mukinyi amaze gutsindira ihiganwa rya Espanye incuro cumi zose hamwe n'ihiganwa rya Bulaya (Champions League) incuro zine.

column2: Amatora mu Burundi 2020: Menya abakandida bitoza hamwe n'ivyo bashira imbere
column3: Ku tariki 20/05/2020 abarundi babifitiye uburenganzira bazokwihitiramwo umukuru w'igihugu azobarongora mu myaka indwi iri imbere. Uru ni urutonde rw'abakandida indwi bazokwitoza muri ayo matora y'umukuru w'igihugu, hamwe n'imigabo n'imigambi yabo. Ingene bakurikirana muri ino nkuru bijanye na nimero baronse mw'itombola yakozwe n'umugwi w'igihugu wigenga ujejwe amatora, CENI. Evariste Ndayishimiye ni umunyamabanga mukuru w'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD kuva mu kwezi kw'umunani 2016, aho uwo mugambwe usubiriyemwo itunganywa ryawo, asubirira Pascal Nyabenda yari umukuru wawo. Yavukiye muri komine Giheta y'intara ya Gitega mu mwaka wa 1968. Azwi nk'umwe mu bari intwazangabo zikomeye muri uwo mugambwe ucitwa umuhari, mu ntambara yadutse mu Burundi inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye yari amaze amezi atatu ku butegetsi. Ndayishimiye ari mu bacitse kw'icumu mu bwicanyi bwakorewe abanyeshure b'Abahutu kuri kaminuza y'u Burundi mu kwa gatandatu 1995, bituma ahamvya abandi barwanyi b'umuhari, ico gihe wari ucitwa CNDD ishami ryawo rya gisirikare rikitwa FDD, urongowe na Leonard Nyangoma yawutanguje mu 1994. Uyo muhari, mu nyuma wagiye kwitwa CNDD-FDD, umaze kwinjira mu masezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha yo mu 2000 ugashira ibirwanisho hasi mu 2003, Jenerali Ndayishimiye yarakoze mu biro bikuru vya gisirikare, mu nyuma aragenwa nk'umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu 2006-2007, imbere y'uko agenwa kuba umuhanuzi wa gisirikare mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu. Imigambi yiwe nyamukuru ishimikiye ku gukomeza inzego z'umutekano no kwivuna abansi,  gukomeza igisata c'ubutungane,  intwaro ibereye, imibereho y'abanyagihugu, ibijanye n'amagara y'abantu, gutegekaniriza kazoza abenegihugu, indero, kurwanya ubushomeri, uburaro bwiza, ibidukikije, imico kama n'inkino. Imigambi y'ubutunzi ishingiye ku burimyi n'ubworozi, ubutare n'agataka, ubudandaji, ingenzi n'amahinguriro, hamwe no kwunguruza abantu n'ibintu. Evariste Ndayishimiye ategura kandi gukomeza  imigenderanire no gufashanya n'amakungu, aho avuga ko  ishingiye ku kwuzuzanya n'ugutsimbataza umwumvikano hagati y'u Burundi n'amakungu be n'amashirahamwe atandukanye. Gaston Sindimwo ni icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu kuva agenywe, hari ku wa 20 z'ukwa munani 2015 ku butegetsi bwa Petero Nkurunziza, inyuma y'amatora yateye amahane mu Burundi. Yavukiye muri karitiye Bwiza mu gisagara ca Bujumbura mu mwaka w'1965, akaba kandi ari umunyamabanga mukuru w'umugambwe w'abadasigana UPRONA, imbere y'aho akaba yari umunyamabanga w'icegera c'uwo mugambwe. Mu vya politike, yemerera abarundi guteza imbere intwaro rusangi, kurwanya ibiturire, ashigikire ubwigenge bw'urwego rw'ubucamanza, yongere anagure ubucuti bw'u Burundi n'ayandi makungu. Yemerera Abarundi kandi gukomeza inzego z'umutekano. Mu vy'ubutunzi, imigambi yiwe ihagaze ku gusubiramwo intererano ihabwa amakomine, ku gutunganya gushasha ivy'amabanki cane cane ku bijanye n'ingurane, ashigikire uburimyi n'ubworozi, yubake amabarabara, gushigikira amahinguriro, kunagura igisata c'ingenzi, umuyagankuba, ubutare n'indero. Nayo ku bijanye n'imibano, akaranga n'imico, imigambi yiwe ihagaze ku kworohereza abarundi mu vyo ubuvuzi be no mu gushigikira imico n'akaranga k'u Burundi harimwo gusubiza iteka Ikirundi. Léonce Ngendakumana ni umunyapolitike wo mu mugambwe Sahwanya-Frodebu, umugambwe wa Perezida Melchior Ndadaye yagandaguwe mu 1993 haciye amezi atatu gusa ashikirijwe intwaro inyuma yo gutsinda amatora yo ku wa 01 z'ukwa gatandatu 1993. Léonce Ngendakumana  yavukiye mu ntara ya Bujumbura mu mwaka wa 1954. Yatanguye ibikorwa vya politike akiri muto, akaba yabitanguriye mu muhari witwa BAMPERE washinzwe na Ndadaye mu Rwanda mu mwaka wa 1976. Mu nyuma yahavuye yinjira mu muhari w'abakozi witwa UBU washinzwe mu 1979. Bwana Ngendakumana ari mu batanguje umugambwe Sahwanya Frodebu mu 1986 mu mpisho. Mu matora yo mu kwa gatandatu 1993, yaratowe ngo abe mu bashingamateka ba Frodebu baserukira intara ya Bujumbura. Mu 1995, yabaye umukuru w'Inama Nshingamateka, mu bihe bitari vyoroshe na gato, gushika mu 2002. Mu matora yo mu 2005, Bwana Ngendakumana yarongeye aratorwa nk'umushingamateka w'umugambwe Frodebu n'aho watsinzwe n'umugambwe CNDD-FDD. Mu mwaka wa 2014, igihe yari arongoye urunani rw'imigambwe itavuga rumwe na leta rwari rwiswe ADC-Ikibiri yaraciriwe igihano co gupfungwa umwaka,  yagirijwe gutyoza no gukwiza urwanko rufatiye ku moko inyuma y'ikete yandikiye mu kwezi kwa kabiri uwari umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU ico gihe, Ban Ki Moon. Iryo kete yanditse kw'izina rya ADC-Ikibiri, Leonce Ngendakumana yagabisha ONU ko mu Burundi hashobora kuba ihonyabwoko kubera urwaruka rw'umugambwe CNDD-FDD yavuga ko rwariko ruhabwa ibigwanisho nayo iradiyo television yegereye uwo mugambwe Rema FM akayagiriza kwitwara nka RTLM yo mu Rwanda imbere y'uko ibara rigwa mu 1994. Léonce Ngendakumana, avuga ko ashaka kugarukira demokarasi, intwaro ibereye n'agateka ka zina muntu, gukingira Abarundi bose,Uburundi n'ababubamwo, aho avuga ko azogarukira igisata c'umutekano yisunze intumbero ya Melchior Ndadaye. Avuga kandi ko azogarukira imigenderanire myiza hagati y'u Burundi  n'amakungu mu gukuraho icuka kibi kihari, ko azorwanya ubushomeri n'ubukene. Avuga ko azokomeza igisata c'amagara y'abantu, indero y'abana n'abanyeshure hamwe n'agateka k'abarezi. Léonce Ngendakumana avuga kandi ko afise umugambi wo kugarukana abarundi bose bavyipfuza bahunze igihugu cabo, be no kugarukira agateka n'iterambere ry'abakenyezi. Agira ati: "Utora nabi ugatwarwa nabi, upfa uko utoye ugapfa uko utwawe, hanyuma watora neza ugatwarwa neza". Nahimana Dieudonné yavukiye muri komine Gasorwe mu ntara ya Muyinga mu mwaka w'1974, akaba agiye guhiganirwa ikibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu ku giti ciwe. Mu vyo yaranguye, haciye imyaka 25 atanguje umuhari w'urwaruka rw'imboneza mw'ikanguro ryo mu mitima mu mico no mu mibereho, witwa NEW GENERATION. Yari awurongoye gushika mu mwaka w'2019. Ari mu batanguje kandi yahora arongoye Ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe y'urwaruka ruri mu bikorwa: Réseau des organisations des Jeunes en Action - REJA mu majambo ahinahinye. Yatanguje igikorwa cigisha ivy'uburongozi kigashigikira imigambi ifise intumbero yo kwigisha uburongozi nkorerabandi citwa Dieudonne Nahimana Foundation - DNF. Nahimana Dieudonné Yaronse ubushimwe butari buke, harimwo: Bimwe mu vyamutumye ashaka kwitoza nk'uwigenga, avuga ko ababazwa n'amacabubiri, ka mwana wa mama, igiturire no kwikunda avuga ko vyagiye vyibonekeza ku barongozi, bikaba vyarazingamitse igihugu. Avuga ko ashaka guha ikibanza ca mbere urwaruka. Ibindi ashira imbere ni: Francis rohero yavutse ku wa 16 z'ukwa mbere mu mwaka wa 1972, avukira muri Zone Rohero, karitiye Rohero iri mu gisagaraca Bujumbura, abavyeyi biwe bose bakaba bamuka muri komine Bugendana y'intaraya Gitega. Francis Rohero yavutse ari umwe mu muryango. Abavyeyi biwe Rohero Majoric, hamwe na  Rohero Hélène Ntawuyankira, bubakanye ku wa 19 z'ukwa 11 mu 1970, maze bibaruka umwana wa mbere, Francis, kuwa 16/01/1972. Haciye amezi ane gusa, se wiwe, ico gihe yari icegera c'umukuru w'igisata c'ingenzi, yaragandaguwe muri bwa bwicanyi bwo mu 1972, gutyo arerwa na nyina wiwe ari we mwana w'ikinege. Francis Rohero yagiye guhereza amashure yisumbuye kw'iseminari y'i Buta i Bururi, mu nyuma yinjira iseminari nkuru ya Burasira hanyuma iya Bujumbura, imbere y'uko yinjira kuri kaminuza y'u Burundi, nayo nyene yahavuye ahunga atarangije mu 1997 kubera indwano. Yahungiye muri Kameruni, akaba  ariho yagiye kurangiriza ivyigwa vya kaminuza. Avuga yuko nyina wiwe yamureze amwigisha kwirinda igikenye, inyigisho yamye agendera no kuva kw'ishure i Buta, mu gihe igihugu cose carangwamwo amacakubiri hagati y'Abahutu n'Abatutsi. Avuga ko yigiye cane ku bantu karuhariwe  muri kahise mu bijanye no kwirinda igikenye, nka Gandhi, Martin Luther King n'abandi, cane cane Yezu Kristu. Amaze guhunguka, Francis Rohero arazwi cane mu biganiro yakunda gushikiriza ku maradiyo yerekana ingene ibintu bikwiye kugenda ku neza y'u Burundi n'Abarundi, rimwe na rimwe ntibamutahure, ari naco catumye aruhira gutanga imihoho akava muri CNDD-FDD mu 2006 Inyuma y'aho niho yatanguje ico yise "Mouvement Orange" nk'inzira yoza aracishamwo ivyiyumviro vyiwe. Ivyiyumviro vyiwe vyatumye mu kwa cumi na rimwe 2018 apfungwa, aho yamaze indwi yose mu gasho, ariko agahava apfungurwa igipolisi kimaze kubona ko ata kabi kiwe. Mu kwezi kw'icumi 2019, niho yamenyesha ko ashaka kwitoza kuba umukuru w'igihugu, imigambi yiwe nyamukuru ikaba ihagaze ku gukomeza intwaro ibereye abicishije mu gutunganya gushasha ubutegetsi, gukomeza inzego z'umutekano no kuzironsa ivyo zikeneye, gutunganya igisata c'ubutungane, kworohereza ibinyamakuru kugira ngo bakore mu mwidegemvyo, aho avuga ko azokuraho amategeko yose abuza abamenyeshamakuru gukora bisanzuye. Avuga kandi ko ashaka gukomeza imigenderanire myiza y'u Burundi n'amakungu, gutunganya gushasha amategeko, aho avuga ko azonahindura ibwirizwashingiro kugira ngo hajeho iryubahiriza bose. Afise kandi  n'imigambi ijanye no kurwiza umwimbu no gukomeza ubutunzi bw'igihugu (ikigega, uburimyi n'ubworozi, ubudandaji n'ibindi), gukomeza imico kama, indero, amagara y'abantu… hamwe kandi n'ibijanye no gutumatumanako n'ukwiyunguruza, n'ibindi. Agathon Rwasa arongoye umugambwe Congrès National de Liberté, CNL, inyuma y'igihe kitari gito yatswe uburongozi bw'umugambwe FNL. Yavukiye muri komine Kiremba y'intara ya Ngozi mu mwaka wa1964. Mu 1988 biturutse ku bwicanyi bwa Ntega na Marangara, yararokotse ahungira mw'ikambi ya Kirwa iri mu ntara ya Tabora muri Tanzania, ari naho yinjiriye mu muhari PALIPEHUTU wari washinzwe na Rémy Gahutu mu 1980, uja guhinduka PALIPEHUTU-FNL  mu mahinduka yabaye muri uwo muhari mu 2001, amahinduka yatumye awurongora asubiriye uwari umukuru wawo, Cossan Kabura. Agathon Rwasa mu nyuma yinjiye mw'ishami rya gisirikare rya FNL ryegukira PALIPEHUTU, ari naho yahavuye aja ku rugamba rwashirwa imbere na PALIPEHUTU. Inyuma y'aho atahiye mu gihugu mu 2008 inyuma y'ibiganiro na PALIPEHUTU-FNL, Agathon Rwasa yarongoye umugambwe FNL kuva mu 2009 gushika mu 2010 inyuma y'aho umuhari PALIPEHUTU-FNL uhinduriye izina kugira ngo wisunge amategeko y'u Burundi abuza imigambwe ishingiye kw'ivangura. Muri ico gihe yahawe kurongora ishirahamwe INSS ryo kuziganiriza kazoza abakozi. Inyuma y'amatora yabaye mu 2010 Agathon Rwasa yarahunze yagiriza leta ko yashaka kumugandagura kubera yiyamirije ivyari bihejeje kuva muri ayo matora, ariko yakwa uburongozi bw'uwo mugambwe mu buryo burimwo igipfungu, uhabwa Jacques Bigirimana, uwo mugambwe muri kino gihe ukaba ari pfa mpfe na CNDD-FDD. Amaze kugaruka mu gihugu mu 2013, Agathon Rwasa yinjiye mu nama nshingamateka mu matora yo mu 2015 yaranzwe n'ukutumvikana gukomeye biturutse ku ngingo ya CNDD-FDD yo gushira imbere Petero Nkurunziza ngo yitoze mu kiringo kigira gatatu abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bavuga ko cari giteye kubiri n'amategeko. N'aho urunani  Amizero y'Abarundi rwari ruhurikiyemwo abigenga rutagiye muri ayo matora, Agathon Rwasa n'abiwe bafashe ingingo yo kwinjira mu nama nshingamateka. Inyuma y'ugukwegana amashati hagati y'ubushikiranganji bw'intaro yo hagati nawe ku kibazo c'ugushinga umugambwe, ku wa 14 z'ukwa kabiri 2019 umugambwe wiwe CNL wahavuye wemererwa gukorera ku mugaragaro, akaba ari nawe yagenywe ngo azowuserukire mu matora y'umukuru. Imigambi  ashira imbere ishingiye ku guteza imbere uburimyi n'ubworozi, kunagura indero mu mashure yaba matomato, ayisumbiye na kaminuza, aho nk'akarorero avuga ko azogarukana uburaro mu mashure yisumbuye. Agathon Rwasa kandi  ashira imbere ukunagura ibisata vy'ubuvuzi n'amagara y'abantu, gutunganya ibisagara n'uburaro, amasoko ntanganguvu, ubutare n'agataka, kwiyunguruza no kwunguruza abantu n'ibintu, intwaro ibereye, imigenderanire, ubutunzi, ibidukikije, be no kwitaho no gukomeza inzego z'umutekano. Domitien Ndayizeye niwe arongoye urunani KIRA BURUNDI akaba ari nawe azokwitoza mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu kw'izina ry'urwo runani. Yavukiye muri komine n'intara ya Kayanza mu mwaka wa 1953. Mu buzima bwa politike Domotien Ndayizeye yarabaye mu muhari MEPROBA washinzwe inyuma y'ubwicanyi bwa 1972, aho yari mu buhungiro mu gihugu c'u Rwanda, azezwa amabanga atandukanye. Mu nyuma yahavuye yinjira mu mugambwe Sahwanya Frodebu mu 1992. Amaze guhunguka, mu kw'icenda 1993, Bwana Ndayizeye yarajejwe amabanga atandukanye haba mu mugambwe Frodebu canke mu butegetsi bw'igihugu. Mu gihe u Burundi bwari mu ntambara yadutse inyuma y'aho umugwi w'abasirikare ico gihe ugandaguriye umukuru w'igihugu Melchior Ndadaye, Bwana Ndayizeye yarapfunzwe incuro zibiri. Ubwa mbere, yapfunzwe  kuva mu kwa kabiri 1995 aza kurekurwa mu kwa gatatu 1996, yagirijwe ko yari yifananije n'umuhari CNDD warwanya ubutegetsi. Yasubiye gupfungwa  mu kwa kabiri aho yamaze indwi imwe mu gasho k'igipolisi kijejwe umutekano mu gihugu (police de Sécurité Publique, PSP), yagirizwa guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu, bitumwe n'uko umugambwe Frodebu wiyamirije itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi bwa Sylvestre Ntibantunganya ryakozwe na Petero Buyoya ku wa 25 z'ukw'indwi 1996.
