Domitien Ndayizeye yaragize uruhara mu biganiro vy'amahoro vyatanguye mu 1998 birangira mu 2000. Ivyo biganiro ni vyo vyatumye aronswa amabanga y'ukurongora igihugu mu buryo bw'imfatakibanza, aho yabaye icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu kuva 01/11/2001 gushika ku wa 30/04/2003. Uwo munsi nyene niho yaca arahira kuba umukuru w'igihugu, amabanga yaranguye  gushika ku wa 26 z'ukwa munani 2005. Hagati aho, inyuma y'ukugira uruhara mw'ishirwa mu ngiro ry'amasezerano hagati ya leta n'umuhari CNDD-FDD, harimwo n'iyinjizwa ry'abarwanyi bawo mu nzego z'umutekano w'igihugu, ubutegetsi bwa CNDD-FDD bwaramupfunze kuva kuwa 21/08/2006 gushika ku wa 17/01/2007, aho we n'abo bari bapfunganywe bagirijwe ko bari bateguye gutembagaza ubutegetsi. Mu migambi yiwe, Domitien Ndayizeye mu vyerekeye ubutunzi n'iterambere ategura guteza imbere uburimyi n'ubworozi, guhimiriza urwaruka kwijukira gukora utwabo mu bisata bitandukanye, gusubiramwo itunganywa ry'amakori, guteza imbere ibisagara bitobito, kurwiza amasoko ntanganguvu n'ibindi. Nayo mu vyerekeye imibano, Domitien Ndayizeye ategura gusubiramwo inyigisho, ibijanye n'imishahara, kurwiza ubuzi, gusubiramwo ivyo ubuvuzi n'ibindi. Mu bijanye na politike, Domitien Ndayizeye ategura gusasagaza intwaro ibereye, guhagararira ubutungane bubereye, gukomeza ubuhinga bw'inzego z'umutekano, no kunagura imigenderanire.

column2: Aurlus Mabele: Rurangiranwa mu muziki wa Congo (Brazzaville) 'yahitanywe na coronavirus'
column3: Umunyamuzika rurangiranwa wo muri Kongo (Brazzaville) Aurlus Mabele yaguye mu bitaro ku murwa mukuru w'Ubufaransa, Paris, afise imyaka 67. Ubutumwa bwashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro n'abagenzi hamwe n'umuryango wiwe buvuga ko yahitanywe na coronavirus ariko ibi ntibiremezwa. Abafana biwe bamwita umwami wa soukous - umuziki w'umudiho unyaruka wo muri Kongo ukundwa hose muri Afrika. Umukobwa wiwe, umuririmvyi w'umufaransakazi Liza Monet, yanditse ubutumwa kuri twitter kuwa kane avuga ko se yahitanywe na coronavirus. Yanditse ati "nishwe n'amarira." Uwari mu mugwi umwe nawe wa Loketo, Mav Cacharel, nawe yanditse kuri Facebook ko yahitanywe na coronavirus. Umutunganya-bikorwa wiwe (manager), Kimmy Ouetenou, ariko yabariye BBC Afrique ko  bitaremezwa ko yahitanywe na coronavirus kandi ko yari afise ibibazo vy'amagara amaranye igihe. Yinjijwe ibitaro ejo kuwa kane aca acikana uwo munsi nyene. Mabele, azina ryiwe ry'ukuri ari Aurélien Miatshonama, yavukiye Brazaville aca yimukira mu Bufaransa mu myaka y'1980. Indirimbo ziwe zakunzwe zirimwo iyitwa Embargo. Bwana Ouetenou yavuze ko batanguye kuganira na leta ya Kongo kugira barabye ko yoshingurwa mu gihugu ciwe. Hagati aho, isandugu yiwe izoshirwa mu kibanza izobikwamwo gushika ingendo zahagaritswe kubera coronavirus zisubiriye, nk'uko bivugwa na Rose-Marie Bouboutou wa BBC Afrique. Mabele yashikanye injana ya soukous kw'isi yose Vyashikirijwe na Gaïus Kowene, BBC News, Kinshasa Akoresheje izina ryiwe Aurélien Miatshonama, Mabele yashinze umugwi Les Ndimbola Loketo ari kumwe n'abagenzi biwe i Brazaville basohora zimwe mu ndirimbo zakunzwe cane muri Afrika mu myaka 1970, nk'indirimbo Embargo, Zebola na Waka Waka. Mu nyuma, yaje kwimukira i Paris aho yashinze uwundi mugwi, Loketo, bisigura amafyinga mw'ilingala - ururima bakoresha kenshi mu ndirimbo za soukous, rukanavugwa cane mu burengero bwa Kongo-Kinsasa na Kongo-Brazzaville. Mu gihe yagurishije inkurikirane z'indirimbo (albums) zirenga imiriyoni 10 mu mwuga yari amazemwo imyaka irenga 30, Aurlus Mabele yashikanye soukous hanze y'imbibe za Afrika, ayishikana kure kw'isi.

column2: Boeing na Airbus zigabisha US ku ngorane zishobora guterwa na 5G
column3: Abakuru b'ikompanyi zibiri za mbere rutura mu gukora indege basavye reta ya Amerika gutevya gutangura gukoresha ubuhinga bushasha bw'ama terefone bwa 5G. Mw'ikete, abategetsi ba Boeing na Airbus bagabisha ko ubwo buhinga bushobora kugira "ingaruka mbi ku bikorwa vy'indege." Amakenga yari amaze gushikirizwa ko ubuhinga bwa 5G bushobora guhungabanya ivyuma vy'ubuhinga bwa electronic vyo mu ndege. Ibihangange vya telecoms (ubuhinga bwo gutumatumanako)  muri Amerika AT&T na Verizon  vyitezwe gutanguza ikoreshwa rya 5G itariki 5 za Nzero (ukwezi kwa  mbere). Abakuru ba Boeing na Airbus Dave Calhoun na Jeffrey Knittel, mw'ikete barungikiye hamwe uwujejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu muri reta ya Amerika Pete Buttigieg, bamubwiye bati: "Uguhungabanya kwa 5G gushobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bw'indege bwo gukora mu mutekano". Iryo kete ryishingiye ku bushakashatsi bwakozwe n'umugwi w'ubucuruzi Airlines for Amerika rwatoye ko iyo amategeko y'urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe indege (FAA)  aba yagiye mu ngiro mu 2019, hafi ingendo 345.000 z'indege z'ingenzi  na 5.400 zitwara imizigo ziba zaracerewe, zarahinduriwe inzira canke zitabaye zikiba. Igisata c'indege n'urwego rwa Amerika rw'indege (FAA) barashikirije amakenga ko 5G ishobora guhungabanya ivyuma  vyo mu ndege nk'amaradiyo y'ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere. Itangazo rya Airbus rivuga ko "Airbus na Boeing bakoranye n'abandi bafise uruhara mu gisata c'indege muri Amerika kugira batahure ihungabana rishobora guterwa na 5G ku vyuma bifata ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere (altmeters)". "Iinteguro y'ingene ingorane zishoboka zoba nke cane ku ndege yarashikirijwe igisata ca Amerika kijejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu kugira yigwe." Uku kwezi, urwego FAA rwaragabishije ko uguhungabanya ibindi vyuma guturutse kuri 5G gushobora gutuma indege zihushishwa inzira, ruvuga ko ruzotanga amakuru menshi imbere y'uko ubwo buhinga butangura gukoreshwa itariki 5 Nzero. Muri Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), kompanyi za AT&T na Verizon  zarasibije gutanguza urudandazwa rwa 5G ikiringo c'ukwexzi gushika itariki 5 Nzero zica zifata ingingo zo kwiyubara zo kugabanya ko haba ihungabanya. Amakompanyi yo mu gisata c'indege avuga ko izo ngingo zidahagije, Boeing na Airbus zikavuga ko zaciye zitanga integuro yazo yo kugabanya imishwarara iturutse ku bikoresho vyo gutumatumanako imbere no mu micungararo y'ibibuga vy'indege no mu bindi bibanza nkoramutima. Ku ndwi iheze, umukuru wa United Airlines Scott Kirby yavuze ko ingingo za FAA zerekeye 5G zizobuza ikoreshwa z'ibipimo z'aho indege igeze mu kirere ku bibuga bishika 40 mu vya mbere binini muri Amerika. Kompanyi ya Amerika y'ubuhinga budaciye mu ntsinga CTIA ivuga ko 5G ata ngorane n'imwe iteye akagiriza igisata c'indege gutera ubwoba no kwerekana ukutariko uko ibintu  bimeze. Umukuru wa CTIA  Meredith Attwell Baker yavuze mu kwezi guheze ati: "Kuducereza bizogira ingaruka mbi ikomeye. Kurindira uwundi mwaka bizotuma habura miriyaridi 500 z'amadorari mw'izamuka ry'ubutunzi, mu gihe igihugu cacu kiriko kirivyukiranya  congera ciyubaka inyuma y'ingaruka za Covid".

column2: Aba-Taliban n'abagore: Umunyeshure wa kaminuza ya Kabul mu bwoba bwa kazoza
column3: I Kabul, aya  mango abanyeshure ba kaminuza bategerezwa kuba bariko baritegurira gutangura igice/igihembwe gishasha. Ariko  ubu hari benshi bariko barata ikintu cose kigaragaza ingene babayeho muri  kahise mu guhe aba Taliban bariko barakizura hanze. Ku munyeshure umwe - umugore , akaba n'uwo mu bwoko bw'inkehwa buburabuzwa bw'aba-Hazara, abo muri bwo muri iyi myaka bahuye n'amabi yo kunyuruzwa no kwicwa n'aba Taliban - abo bagabo bari hanze bateye impungenge gusumba. Ngaha abwira BBC ingene ivyo yarota gushikako vyasubiriwe n'ubwoba bwo kuhakura agatwe mu minsi mike gusa. Ni ibintu ntabona amajambo nobivugamwo, ntabeshe. Ibintu vyose, vyose narota gushikako, ivyo nakoreye vyose. Agateka kanje, ukwiyumva kwanje, naho no kubaho kwanje nk'umukobwa, ubuzima bwanje - vyose birageramiwe. Ninde azi umwanya uzohaca kugira baze gusaka inzu ku nzu kugira batware abakobwa - kumbure banabasambanye ku nguvu. Nshobora no guhitamwo kwiyahura niyo baza mu nzu iwacu. Namye mvugana na bagenzanje, ivyo nivyo twese, twese, dutegekanya gukora. Urupfu ni rwiza gusumba gutwarwo nabo. Twese dufise ubwoba kandi dufise ubwoba gushika no mu musokoro w'amagufa. Nta n'amezi abiri aheze,  nta kindi niyumvira  atari urupapuro rwanje rw'umutsindo. Nariko ndategekanya ingene nzokwigira ibibazo vyimirije, ico gukora, ico kureka, nkora ikirangaminsi, ngerageza kuraba ko ibintu vyose vyokorwa neza. Abantu batandukanye batanguye kugira ubwoba igihe aba Taliban bariko barafata intara, ariko jewe n'abandi ntitwigeze twibaza ko vyoshitse bagafata Kabul. Ubuzima bwanje bwari busanzwe kugeza aho bafatiye Mazar-i-Sharif (igisagara kinini mu buraruko bushira uburengero bwa Kabul, cari gisanzwe kiterekwa aba Taliban). Hanyuma bashika Kabul. Harumvikanye amasasu hanyuma tuja twumva ngo aba Taliban bakwiye  mu bice vyose vy'igisagara. Kuva ico gihe, nta na kimwe casubiye kuba uko cahora. Abandi bose bo mu muryango wanje bagumye muhira. Imangazini zose zarugawe, ibiciro vyaguma biduga kw'isaha kw'isaha, n'urugero rwo kuvunja amafaranga rwaguma ruhindagurika vuba. Naciye nturira impapuro zanje zose zo kuri kaminuza. Naraturiye impapuro zanje zose zerekana amanota naronse. Nabikoreye kw'ibaraza. Nari mfise ibitabo vyinshi, ibitabo vyiza cane, nariko ndasoma. Vyose narabinyegeje. Narivanye ku mbuga hwaniro zose nariko. Nabwiwe ko vyari kumbera ikibazo kuba mfise ivyo nanditse canke nashize kuri izo mbuga canke kubandanya uri kuri zo. Aba Taliban bashobora kuba baraba ivyo twashizeko bakadutora. Facebook niyo yari ingorane ikomeye kuko nayijako cane. Nari mfise ivyo nari naranditse kera mvuga ko aba Taliban ataco bari kugira, ko nari kwihagararako imbere yabo, ko batashobora guhagarika uburenganzira bwanje bwo kwiga, ko batashobora kunyugaranira i muhira.Nabise abakora iterabwoba. Ivyo nari nanditse vyarabatyoza, nta nkeka. None vyose babikoze mu minsi mike gusa. Vyandengeye, biranteye ubwoba, birambabaje. Aba Taliban bamenyesheje ko abagore bokwambara mu buryo bw'ingene vyamye bikorwa kuva kera kandi bakambara hijab. Abantu bambara burka na hijab kubera ugutinya. Narumvise aho mu mashure amwe ya kaminuza usanga hari igitambara (rideau) hagati y'abanyeshure b'abahungu n'abakobwa. Imiryango imwe imwe ntireka abana bayo b'abakobwa ngo baje kw'ishure.  Kubera abantu bose bazi ko aba Taliban gushika ubu batarerekana isura yabo y'ukuri, ariko akaba ata nkeka ko bazoyerekana, abantu bashaka rero kwirinda ingorane niyo vyashika. Nararavye ikiganiro c'aba Taliban n'abamenyeshamakuru (ku wa kabiri -aho bemeye uburenganzira bw'abagore). Barabesha, ndazi neza ko babesha. Narasohotse  ku wa kabiri ndi kumwe na data tugiye kurondera umuti. Vyose vyari vyugaye. Nategerejwe kwambara hijab ifuka hose, hari n'abambara burka, n'abakobwa bafise hagati y'imyaka 13 na 14.Nta na hamwe bihuriye n'uko vyahora. Umenga igisagara carimutse. Aba Taliban bariko baratembera mu micungararo. Barakuraba  niyo woba wambaye hijab ikwiye hose - nk'uko umenga nturi  umuntu asanzwe, nk'uko umenga nibo baganza ubuzima bwawe, nk'uko umenga uru umucafu wo guta. Uko niko bakuraba mw'ibarabara. Igihe nari nciga, niyumvira gushika ku bintu vyinshi, imigambi n'intego z'ubuzima. Ubu none nibaza ko nzotegerezwa kuva muri iki gihugu , kuko ndi umu-Hezara. Muri kahise barateye amashure y'abakobwa b'aba-Hazara, bica amajana. Urumva nta nkeka bazotwica, kumbure badusambanye ku nguvu, batwice. Nk'umukobwa nkongera kandi mu  bwoko bw'inkehwa, nta kibanza mfise mu gihugu canje. Bose mu muryango wanje bafise ubwoba. Tuguma tugerageza kuva umunsi wa mbere aba Taliban binjira kugira turabe ingene twova muri iki gihugu, biciye mu mategeko canke bidaciye mu mategeko. Ikibuga c'indege cuzuyeko abantu benshi, nta bibanza bisigaye vyo guhungisha abantu, kandi ibihugu biriko biranka kutwakira, kandi abantu bose, bose baguma baraba nk'uko umengo nta kiriko kiraba. Ikintu gikuru  nosaba ama reta y'ibihugu vyo hanze n'uko bitokwemera aba Talaban nka reta ya Afghanistan. Kuko babikoze, tuzoba dupfuye, kumbure turi hasi kurusha abapfuye, ninde yobimenya. Ariko ikimbabaza cane kuruta kubona igisagara canje nkunda n'umutima wanje wose gifatwa - aha si ukuvuga ko ntwawe n'ikibabarwe - ariko ikimbaza gusumba n'uko amakungu ari mu gacerere. Abantu bose bibereye mu gacerere. Abo bantu bose ataco banezwe, bigira nk'uko umenga abanya-Afghanistan si abantu. Ivyo rero birambaza cane  ku mutima. Baravuga ngo , "Ubuntu ku bantu bose". Ariko nibaza ko ivyo bwikiye kuvugwa gutya, "Ubuntu kuri bose, kiretse abanya-Afghanistan".  Ariko sinigeze nibaza ko vyoshitse ngaha. Biravuna umutima kubona mu minsi mike gusa, ibintu vyose narota gushikako, ibintu vyose nibaza ko noronse, vyose vyayonze. BBC ntivuga izina ry'umugore nyene iyi  nkuru ku mvo z'umutekano wiwe

column2: Amatora ya 2020 muri America: Russia, China, Iran, vyipfuza ko ari nde atsinda ?
column3: Ubwo Uburusiya bwoba bwipfuza ko "Amerika igumana ijunja ifise"? Ubushinwa bwoba bushigikiye Biden? Ibi ni ibibazo abajejwe igendereza muri Amerika babandanya bibaza mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Umutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru aragabisha ko hhari bihugu vya rutura bizokoresha "amayeri mu buryo bweruye n'ubwihishije" kugira ngo bazimagize abatora muri Amerika. Aha bakaba bavuga Uburusiya, Ubushinwa hamwe na Irani. Ariko rero, vyose ntivyofatwa kumwe kuko, nk'uko abajejwe igendereza muri Amerika bavyerekana, kimwe kimwe cose gifise intumbero n'ubushobozi cisangije. Eka n'ivyegeranyo ubwavyo biracariko birihwezwa - umwe mu nderetsi aherutse kuvuga ko yasabwe gutsinda ubwoba buterwa n'Uburusiya kuko bwatumye "umukuru w'igihugu abonwa nabi". None mu gihe hasigaye indwi zitatu ngo amatora abe, abatora muri Amerika bakeneye kumenya iki? Igendereza rivuga iki? Nta n'umwe atazi uruhara Uburusiya bwagize mu matora yo mu 2016 n'inyuma yayo. Mu majambo make, abajejwe igendereza muri Amerika bemeza ko Uburusiya bwivanze mu matora mu ntumbero yo gufahsa Donald Trump, bagafatira ku manama hagati y'abo bakorana n'abategetsi b'Uburusiya, ubusuma bwo ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi bwakorewe Hillary Clinton n'abo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi, kwinjira mu bubiko nyabwonko bwerekana abatora, hamwe n'inguvu bwashize mu gukwiragiza ibinyoma canke amakuru yegamiye ku ruhande rumwe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Mu kwezi guheze, umurwi w'abakenguzamateka bo mu mugambwe w'Abarepubulika watanze ibindi vyemezo vyerekana ko Uburusiya bwashaka ko Trump ari we atsinda, bavuga ko imyiyamamazo yiwe yari yoroshe kwinjirwamwo n'abanyamahanga, ariko wirinda kuvuga ko hoba harabaye icaha. Uno mwaka wa 2020, uruhigi rwavuye kuri Hillary Clinton ruja kuri Joe Biden.  Mu cegeranyo ciwe kikirindiriye gushirwa ahabona, umukuru w'ikigo kijejwe umutekano no kurwanya abasumyi b'urusaku (National Counterintelligence and Security Center, NCSC) William Evanina, avuga ko Uburusiya buriko "bukoresha amayeri atandukanye kugira bubanze bucuvye Biden yahoze ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu". Nayo kuvyo umukuru w'ikigo kijejwe igendereza muri Amerika, FBI, Christopher Wray, abona, Uburusiya ntibwigeze buhengeshanya kwivanga mu vya Amerika, akavuga ko ingene bwakoze mu matora y'abakenguzamateka mu 2018 bwariko "bugerageza amayeri butegekanya gukoresha mu 2020". Uburusiya bwamye bwamirira kure ivyo kwivanga mu matora y'ikindi gihugu. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya (Kremlin)  yavuze ko ibi birego vy'ukwivanga mu matora "ari amajambo y'ubwoba" kandi ati "nta kuri kurimwo". Kuba rero Uburusiya bwoba bushaka canke budashaka ikindi kiringo ca Trump, hari abandi bihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko iki gihugu gifise intumbero nini cane yo gutesha umutwe ibihugu vy'abakeba mu gutera amadidane muri vyo. Akarorero muri uno mwaka, hari urwandiko rwashizwe ahabona n'umuryango w'ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Bulaya rwavuga ko hari umugambi w'Uburusiya wo gukwiragiza amakuru y'ibinyoma ku bijanye na coronavirus kugira ngo uyu muryango unanirwe no kumenyesha ingene wariko urahangana nayo. Uburusiya bwavuze ko aya makuru ata shingiro yari afise. Abahiganwa bavuga iki? Joe Biden aherutse kugabisha ko "ibintu bitazokwijana" mu gihe Uburusiya bwobandanya bwivanga mu bibazo vya Amerika, aho yise Uburusiya ko ari "umukeba" wa Amerika. Perezida Trump yamye afata minenenrwe ivyo Uburusiya bwagirizwa bijanye no kwivanga mu matora, ivyo atumvikanyeko n'abiwe bajejwe igendereza. Inyuma y'umubonano na Vladimir Putin mu 2018, abajijwe nimba yizera abajejwe igendereza ba Amerika canke umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya kuri ibi birego, Trump yishuye ati: "Perezida Putin avuga ko atari Uburusiya. Simbona igituma na kimwe bwoba bwo". Mu nyuma yahavuye yigarura avuga ko yavuze nabi. Abajejwe igendereza bavuga iki? Abategetsi bakuru mu butegetsi bwa Trump bavuga ko uno mwaka Ubushinwa ari bwo buteye ikibazo, ko atari Uburusiya. Umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Repubulika,  William Barr , yavuze ati: "Narabonye ivyavuye mw'igendereza. Uko niko nabibonye". Umukuru w'umurwi ujejwe igendereza mu nama nshingamateka, umu democrate  Adam Schiff, yaragije Barr ko ivyo yavuze ari "ikinyoma ceruye". Mu cegeranyo ciwe, Bwana Evanina yavuze ko abajejwe igendereza muri Amerika babona ko "Ubushinwa bushaka ko Perezida Trump - uyo iki gihugu kibona ko adatomoye - atosubira gutorwa". Ati: "Ubushinwa buriko buriko bwongereza inguvu mu  guhindura politike ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu gutera igitsure abanyapolitike bubona ko barwanya inyungu z'Ubushinwa, no mu kurwanya ivyiyumviro binegura Ubushinwa". N'aho Ubushinwa bwahinyanyuye amayeri yo  kwinjira mu banyapolitike, cane cane iciye ku buhinga bwa none bwo guhererekanya amakuru, ntibiboneka neza aho bwiteguye gushika. Ariko Bwana Evanina avuga ati: "Ubushinwa bubandanya bwihweza ingaruka n'inyungu bushobora kuvana mu vyo buriko burakora". Kumbure hari naho bwoba buriko burarondera kugira ikibanza gikomeye kw'isi. Facebook iherutse kwugara amakonte ngurukanabumenyi yari afitaniye isano n'Ubushinwa, amenshi muri yo akaba yari ashigikiye iki gihugu. Ubushinwa burahakana ko butivanga mu biraba 'ubuzima bw'ibindi bihugu', bukavuga ko "atavyo bushaka kandi ata n'inyungu bubibonamwo". Abahiganwa bavuga iki? Muri uku kwezi, Perezida Trump yarashize ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter inkuru yanditswe n'ikinyamakuru co ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi, Breitbart, cegamiye Trump, inkuru yavuga ko "Ubushinwa busa n'ubushigikiye Joe Biden mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu". Afatiye ku muhungu wa Joe Biden, Hunter, Trump yanditse ati: "Nivyo nyene, bashaka Biden. Nafashe amamiliyaridi y'amadorari yari mu Bushinwa ndayagarukana mu gihugu, ndayaha abarimyi bacu n'ikigega ca Amerika. Ubushinwa burashaka kwifatira Amerika mu gihe Biden na Hunter bohashika". Imigenderanire hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa iri hasi cane kubera impari muri vyose, kuva kuri coronavirus gushika kw'itegeko rijanye n'umutekano Ubushinwa bwahaye Hong Kong ku nguvu. Joe Biden abandanya agerageza kurwanya ivyo yagirizwa na Perezida Trump ko yorohereza Ubushinwa, akemerera abanyagihugu ko "azokara" ku bijanye n'agateka ka zina muntu n'ibindi bibazo. Hagati aho, abo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi babona ko Uburusiya ari bwo bubangamye  iyo hageze amatora. Umwihwezo ukorwa na Gordon Corera, Umunyamakuru w'umuhinga muvyo umutekano Mu 2016, leta ya Amerika, co kimwe n'amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro, ntiyihutiye kurwanya ukwivanga kw'Uburusiya mu matora. Muri kino gihe, nta n'umwe atavuga, ariko gusa ibintu vyarahindutse. Amakompanyi aravuga cane ivyo ariko arakora hanyuma n'igisata kijejwe igendereza naco kikama gishira ahabona ivyegeranyo vyaco. Ariko rero ikibazo cahawe intumbero ya politike. Aba Democrates barajwe ishinga n'ingene Uburusiya buriko bwivanga muri aya matora bushaka gufasha Perezida Trump ngo asubire gutorwa, mu gihe abamushigikiye nabo ahubwo barajwe ishinga n'ingene Ubushinwa buriko burakora kugira ngo ntasubire gutorwa. Abajejwe umutekano w'igihugu bagerageza kwiyubara - baremera ko ibi ariko bimeze, ariko bakirinda kwerekana itandukaniro rihari kubera bafise amakenga ko hoca haduka impari zishingiye ku vyiyumviro vya politike. Ukwivanga kw'Uburusiya kuraboneka ko kwateguwe neza kandi mu buryo bwihishije gushika ubu, ariko atari ku rugero rumwe  canke mu buryo bishobora kugira ingaruka nk'izo mu 2016 igihe binjira bakiba ama emails y'aba Democrates. Eka n'amayeri abashaka kwivanga muri ano matora bakoresha yarateye imbere, mu gukorera cane cane ku makuru nyayo ya Amerika, hagukoresha amakuru y'ibinyoma. Hanyuma kandi hari ubwoba ko hashobora no kwaduka n'ibindi bikomeye mu minsi ya nyuma y'imyiyamamazo harimwo mbere n'ukugerageza gutesha agaciro ibizova muri ayo matora yo nyene ubwayo. Abajejwe igendereza bavuga iki? Mw'itangazo ryiwe, Bwana Evanina avuga ko Tehran (umugwa mukuru wa Irani) idakeneye kubona Perezida Trump atwara ikindi kiringo, ikabona ko "ari igitsure ca Amerika kizobandanya kuri Irani mu kurondera guhindura ubutegetsi". Avuga ko Irani izoshira inguvu zayo zose "ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, nko mu gukwiragiza ibinyoma ku mbuga hwaniro be no gukwiragiza amakuru arwanya Amerika". Mu gushimangira ivyashikirijwe n'inzego zijejwe igendereza za Amerika, uruganda ruhingura inyabwonko Microsoft ruvuga ko abasuma bakoresha inyabwonko (pirates informatiques) bafitaniye imigenderanire n'Uburusiya, Ubushinwa na Irani, bariko baragerageza kuneka abantu bakomeye bafise uruhara mu matora ya Amerika. Kuri Irani, Microsoft ivuga ko hari ishirahamwe ryo muri Irani nyene ryitwa Phosphorus ryagerageje kwinjira mu ma konte y'abategetsi bo muri Maison Blanche/White House (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu muri Amerika) hamwe n'abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Trump hagati y'ukwa gatanu n'ukwa gatandatu uno mwaka, ariko bibata kuw'amazi. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire wa Irani yavuze ko ibivugwa na Microsoft ari "ibiterasoni". Saeed Khatibzadeh ati: "Ntabwo Irani irajwe ishinga n'uwo ari we wese azotsinda amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu". Hari icegeranyo kivuga ku bijanye n'uruhara rwa Irani mu ntango z'uno mwaka casohowe n'ishirahamwe ryo muri Amerika Atlantic Council kivuga ko Irani irajwe ishinga n'ugukomeza izina ryayo mu makungu, mu kurondera kuba ari yo iri hejuru mu karere iherereyemwo. Abahiganwa bavuga iki? Irani ntivugwa cane mu matora ya Amerika nk'Uburusiya n'Ubushinwa. Perezida Trump yabandanije atera igitsure gikomeye cane Irani, mu kwivumbura muri ya masezerano yerekeye umugambi wa Irani wo kwimbura ubutare bw'ubumara (Accord nucléaire) hamwe no mu gutanga uruhusha rwo kwica wa mu Jenerali yari akomeye cane Qasem Soleimani. Joe Biden avuga ko iyi politike yananiwe.  Mu kiganiro na CNN, yavuze ko "hariho inzira nziza yo gu`tera igitsure Irani", yemera ko azohagarika "ibikorwa bibi" vy'iki gihugu ariko kandi ashire imbere "inzira y'ibiganiro".

column2: Sharia: kubera iki iri tegeko rya Islam ribuza umuzik? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
column3: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia. Muri iri tegeko, hari vyinshi bibujijwe, kimwe muri vyo ni  umuziki. Mu ndwi iheze, umuvugizi w’aba Taliban Zabihulah Mujahid yabwiye ikinyamakuru New York Times ko umuziki ubujijwe mw’idini rya Islam. Mu gihe c’ubutegetsi  bw'aba Talibani mu myaka ya 1990, umuziki hafi ya wose, televiziyo n'amazu ya sinema vyari bibujijwe kandi kubirengako vyashoboraga kugira ingaruka zikomeye. Iri tegeko Sharia ririmwo ibifatwa nk’indenzarugero. BBC yashatse kumenya ico iri tegeko rivuga n’uko Islam ifata umuziki muri rusangi, ikaba yavuganye na Haruna Nkunduwiga yigeze kurongora umuryango w’aba-Islam mu Burundi. Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga ko iri tegeko ari itegeko ngenderwako rikunze gukurikizwa mu bihugu vya Islam, ariko ridakoreshwa mu bindi bihugu nk’Uburundi kubera Islam iri kumwe n’ayandi madini. Fyonda aho hejuru wumvirize ingene Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga.

column2: Premier League: Imirwi igiye kuvugana uko ihiganwa ryorangira ku wa 30/06
column3: Imirwi iri mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, Premier League, itegekanya kuganira ejo ku wa gatanu ingene iryo higanwa borirangiza ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu. Imirwi yose ntiyashoboye kugira ico ishikirije mu mibonano yagiye iraba gushika ubu, ariko beneyo bariko bihweza ingene hatoba ingorane mu masezerano bafitaniye n'abakinyi. Ivyo biri uko mu gihe icizere c'uko iryo higanwa rishobora gusubira gutangura mu kwa gatanu kiri kure nk'ukwezi. Hari abakinyi batari bake amasezerano bafitaniye n'imirwi yabo azorangira ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu. Abo ni nka Willian akina hagati muri Chelsea, hamwe na Jan Vertonghen akina ku ruhande rw'inyuma muri Tottenham. Hambavu y'ivyo, hariho nka Liverpool itegekanya guhagarika amasezerano ifitaniye na New Balance yo kubakorera impuzu, ikagiranira ayandi masezerano na Nike. Eka n'imirwi ya Watford na NewCastle nayo nyene itegekanya guhindura amakompanyi asanzwe abakorera impuzu. Ishirahamwe FIFA risanzwe rizi ico kibazo, rikaba ririko ririhweza ingingo zofatwa, nk'ukongereza ibiringo vy'amasezerano, kubera amahiganwa yahagaritswe mu kiringo kitazwi biturutse ku kiza ca coronavirus. Ariko rero mu mategeko, abakinyi ntibashobora gusinyishwa amasezerano ku nguvu, ivyo bigashobora gutuma hari imirwi itakaza abakinyi babo bakomeye imbere y'uko ihiganwa rirangira. Ni naco gituma habaye ivyiyumviro vyinshi aho abatari bake bashikirije ko, uko bizoba bimeze kwose muri Premier League, iyo tariki ya 30/06 itegerezwa kuba ntarengwa. Ivyo bizotuma haboneka umuco kw'ihiganwa riza rya 2020/2021 rifatwa ko ariryo rizoba rikomeye gusumba iry'uyu mwaka, nk'uko abatari bake babibwiye BBC Sport. Gushinga igenekerezo ntarengwa ry'iryo higanwa birimwo ibibazo vyinshi, cane cane bishingiye ku kungene imirwi iduzwa mu gice ca mbere, hamwe n'iyimanurwa mu gice ca kabiri. Hari n'abandi babona ko icoba ciza ari uko boduza imirwi ya Leeds na  West Brom iri imbere mu gice ca kabiri, gutyo Premier League ikazoba igizwe n'imirwi 22, ariko ngo ivyo navyo vyozana izindi ngorane. Ivyo nivyo bibazo bizokwigwa n'abarongoye ihiganwa rya Premier League muri iyo nama itegekanijwe kuri uyu wa gatanu. Hagati aho, nta nyishu ntabanduka yitezwe kuko ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya,UEFA, ryasabiye abajejwe amahiganwa mu mirwi y'ibihugu vya Bulaya ko bohabwa umwanya ukwiye kugira ngo bazoshikirize aho bahagaze kubijanye n'ingene borangiza amahiganwa yabo i Bulaya, ivyo navyo bikaba vyitezwe hagati mu kwa gatanu. Ku ruhande rwiwe, umukuru w'umuri Sheffield United, Chris Wilder, abona ko ata tariki ntarengwa y'ihiganwa izohava ishingwa. Mu kiganiro Today ca Radio 4 yegukira BBC, yavuze ati: "Ndazi neza ko tuzokwitunganya dufatiye ku bihe turimwo. Ndazi ko, ku neza y'iri higanwa nyamukuru ry'u Bwongereza be n'ayandi mahiganwa makuru makuru ya Bulaya, bose bazokwipfuza ko amahiganwa arangira neza". "Ndizera ko bizokunda ko twitunganya ukundi mu  mahiganwa y'umwaka uza, dufatiye ku bihe vy'amahiganwa mpuzamakungu, be n'uko inkino zimwe zimwe zishobora gushirwa hagati mu ndwi". "Turashobora gutegura tukarangiza ihiganwa neza, vyose bivana n'integuro be n'ingene twitunganije". "Ariko nk'uko n'abandi bose babivuga, kandi ndabihagararako, aho ni mu gihe ibihe vyoba vyorohereza bose. Kandi dutegerezwa kugendera ku vyo leta idusaba".

column2: Abahitanywe na Covid-19 bamaze kurenga imiriyoni zitatu kw'isi
column3: Abantu bamaze guhitanwa na ca kiza karanda ca Covid-19 kw'isi barenze imiriyoni zitatu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins rikurikiranira hagufi iki kiza. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, agabisha ko isi "iriko yegereza igitigiri kitari bwabeho c'abandura" gushika ubu. Ubuhindi - igihugu gihanzwe n'ubwoko bugira kabiri bwa coronavirus - catangaje ko abantu barenga 230.000 ari bo banduye ku musi w'ejo wa gatandatu wonyene. Hafi abantu imiriyoni 140 nibo bamaze kwandura uwu mugera kuva wadutse. Ku wa gatanu, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus arongoye OMS yagabishije ko "ibitigiri vy'abandura n'abapfa bibandanya biduga ku rugero ruteye ubwoba". Yongerako y'uko "mu mezi abiri aheze, ibitigiri vy'abandura ku ndwi vyiyongereye hafi incuro zibiri kw'isi". Ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins rivuga ko Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubuhindi na Brezil - ibihugu bifise abanduye benshi gusumba ibindi kw'isi - vyonyene biteranije ibitigiri vy'abamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera barenga umuriyoni. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP rivuga ko mu ndwi iheze, abantu bashika 12.000 kw'isi yose bahitanye n'iki kiza. Hagati aho, ibitigiri bitangwa n'ibihugu vyinshi kw'isi bishobora kuba atari vyo. Amadoze arenga imiriyoni 800 y'incanco za coronavirus aramaze guhabwa abantu mu bihugu 165 kw'isi yose. Hagati aho, Dr Tedros yabwiye abategetsi ba ONU ku wa gatanu ati: "Ubusumbasumbane mu bijanye no kuronswa incanco nico kibazo nyamukuru muri kino gihe - kandi turiko turananirwa". Ibihugu bimwe biramaze kuronka no gucandaga abanyagihugu bavyo batari bake. Ivyo bihugu bifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanyagihugu bavyo bamaze gucandagwa, aha harimwo nk'Ubwongereza na Israel, bifise agahengwe kuko ibitigiri vy'abandura vyagabanutse cane rwose. Abahinga bo kw'ishure kaminuza  Imperial College London bavuga ko isekeza ry'ugucandaga ririko riragabanya abandura, abapfa n'abinjizwa ibitaro. Muri iyi ndwi, umuganga akomeye w'umunya Israel yavuze  y'uko yemera ko Israel - aho abarenga igice c'abanyagihugu bose bamaze gucandagwa - iri mu gushika ku rugero rw'aho igihugu cose kizoba gikingiwe. Ibi rero biri uko mu gihe hari ibihugu vyinshi bikirindiriye kuronswa incanco za mbere. Ibi nivyo vyatumye OMS igabisha ko hari ubusumbasumbane mu kuronswa incanco, aho biboneka ko zitariko zitangwa ku rugero rumwe hagati y'ibihugu bitunze n'ibikenye. Dr Tedros avuga ko mu bihugu bitunze, ica kane (1/4) c'abanyagihugu bamaze gucandagwa, mu gihe mu bihugu bikenye ari umwe ku bantu amajana ane (1/400). OMS iriko ikorana n'umugambi mpuzamakungu covax, mu guhimiriza ko ibihugu bitunze vyosangiza incanco ibihugu bikenye. Gushika mu mpera z'unwo mwaka, covax itegekanya ko yoba imaze gutanga imiriyaridi zibiri z'amadoze kw'isi yose, gusa incanco zimwe zisaba ko umuntu aterwa doze zibiri. Abahinga kandi bafise impungenge ku kuntu izi ncanco ziriko ziratangwa ubu zidashobora kurwanya ubwoko bushasha bw'iyi ndwara bukwirakwira ku muvuduko udasanzwe. Hariko harakorwa ubushakashatsi kugira ngo incanco zisubirwemwo kugira zishobore kurwanya ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera. Prof. Adam Finn ari mu murwi w'Ubwongereza ujejwe incanco (JCVI), avuga ko yiteze ko incanco zigiye kugenda zita inguvu buke buke uko uwu mugera uzogenda uhinduka.

column2: Ethiopia: Umusigiti wa mbere muri Africa, al-Nejashi, wasambuye n'ibibombe muri Tigray
column3: Reta ya Ethiopia yemeye ko igiye gusanura umusigiti wa kera cane wasambuwe mu kwezi guheze mu ntambara ya Tigray mu buraruko bw'ico gihugu. Umusigiti wa al-Nejashi uvugwa ko watewe ibibombe, ivyari muri wo biranyagwa, eka mbere n'imva z'abategetsi b'idini rya Isilamu bo muri kahise zirononekara. Reta ivuga ko n'urusengero rwasambuwe muri ico gihe c'intambara na rwo nyene ruzosanurwa. Abanyagihugu baba muri ako karere bazi ko umugisiti wa al-Nejashi wubatswe n'Aba-Isilamu ba mbere bimukiye muri Afrika mu gihe c'Intumwa Muhammad. Bari bahunze amabi bariko barakorerwa i Makka baca bahabwa ubuhungiro mu cahoze ari ubwami bwa Aksum. Aba-Isilamu bo muri ako karere bazi ko abasangirangendo 15 b'Intumwa Muhammad bahambwe muri izova zasambuwe . Bazi kandi  ko uwo musigiti ari wo wa mbere watanguye kwubakwa muri Afrika, n'aho hari abandi bavuga ko uwa mbere wubatswe muri Afrika uri muri Misiri. Uwo musigiti uri mu gisagara ca Wukro kiri ku birometero hafi 800 uvuye ku mugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa. Urusengero Emanueli Mweranda (Saint Emmanuel) rw'Abakristu b'idini rya Orthodoxe na rwo nyene rwarasambuwe ariko nta nsiguro zatanzwe. Mu mwaka wa 2015 hari ishirahamwe ryo muri Turukiya ryatanguje ibikorwa vyo gusanura uwo musigiti, rivuga ko ryashaka "kubungabunga uwo mutungo wo muri kahise", rigahindura ako karere kugira ngo gashobore kwirukirwa n'ingenzi. Uwu musigiti hamwe n'urusengero rwari hafi yawo vyasambuye mu bitero vya gisirikare vyamaze ukwezi kumwe  bifise intumbero yo kwomora ubutegetsi bw'umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) wari urongoye akarere ka Tigray. Ishirahamwe ryigenga ry'Ububirigi rikorera muri Afrika rivuga ko ku wa 18 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri uwo musigiti wa al-Nejashi "wabanje guterwa ibombe mu nyuma unyagwa urukombamazi n'abasirikare ba Ethiopia na Eritrea". Iryo shirahamwe rivuga kandi ko ibinyamakuru vya Tigray vyatangaje ko abantu batari bake bishwe bariko bagerageza gukingira uwo musigiti. Reta ntaco irashikiriza kuri ivyo vyegeranyo vy'iryo shirahamwe. Ariko, reta za Ethiopia na Eritrea zompi zirahakana ko hari abasirikare ba  Eritrea bari muri Tigray gufasha mu ntambara yo kurwanya TPLF. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC igisata ca Amharic, icegera c'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe gukingira umurage wo muri kahise, Abebaw Ayalew, yavuze ko ko komite idasanzwe izoshikanwa muri ako karere kugira ngo yige ingene uwo musigiti n'urwo rusengero vyasambuwe imbere y'uko ibikorwa vyo gusanura bitangura. Ati: "Ubu burere ntibuzwi gusa ku bijanye n'ugusenga, ariko kandi ni umutungo wo muri kahise kuri Ethiopia yose". Mu ntango z'ukw'icumi na rimwe, intambara yaradutse mu karere ka Tigray igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, yagomora ingabo mu ntumbero yo gutuza abarwanyi ba TPLF. Hari haciye amezi atari make hari ukutumvikana hagati ya reta ya Abiy n'abategetsi ba TPLF, umugambwe wari urongoye Tigray.

column2: R﻿eta y'Uburundi iragabisha abatimbo bari muri Nyege Nyege
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw’Uburundi bujejwe Afrika y’Ubuseruko, Urwaruka, inkino n’imico kama "buriyamiriza ikoreshwa nabi ry’ingoma z’Uburundi" mw’isabukuru Nyege Nyege ririko ribera muri Uganda. Amasanamu y’abavuzi b’ingoma z’Uburundi bambaye umwambaro w’ibendera ry’Uburundi bariko baravuza ingomba muri iri sabukuru yarakwiragijwe cane ku mbuga hwaniro. Ubu bushikiranganji bushira ku rubuga rwa Twitter amasanamu yerekana abagore bariko batamba, bavuza n’ingoma z’Uburundi mu buryo butamenyerewe mu bijanye n’umurisho w’ingoma z’Uburundi. Isabukuru ry’indirimbo n'intambo, Nyege Nyege, ririko ribera mu gisagara ca Jinja mu buseruko bwa Kampala muri Uganda kuva ku wa 16 z’uku kw’icenda, inyuma y’aho reta y’iki gihugu itangiye uruhusha ko rishobora kuba habanje kuba impari. Isoko ryo muri ubwo bushikiranganji ryabwiye BBC ko umurwi w’aba batimbo bari muri iyi sabukuru batazwi na reta y’Uburundi kandi ko atari yo yabarungitse. Buciye ku rubuga rwabwo rwa Twitter, ubu bushikiranganji bumenyesha ko budashobora “kwihanganira umuntu uwo ari we wese acafuza imico n’akaranga vy’Uburundi”. Bwandika buti: “Uburundi burazi ko ingoma z’Uburundi ziriko zirakoreshwa nabi mw’isabukuru Nyege Nyene 2022 muri Uganda”. Ingoma z’Uburundi zanditswe mu murage ndangakaranga mw’ishirahamwe UNESCO kuva mu 2014, kandi ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko kuzikoresha binyuranyije n’amategeko bihanwa. Si bwo bwa mbere reta y’Uburundi yiyamiriza abavuza ingoma z’Uburundi reta itabitangiye uruhusha, cane cane abarundi b’impunzi ziba hanze. Mu 2019, reta y’Uburundi yamenyesheje ko hari abantu bashatse kwiba no kwiyitirira umurisho w’ingoma z’Uburundi mw’ihiganwa "East Africa's Got Talent" ryariko ribera i Nairobi. Ni inyuma y’aho umurwi witwa Himbaza Club wari ugizwe ahanini n’abarundi b’impunzi baba mu Rwanda witabiriye iri higanwa wambaye impuzu reta y’Uburundi ivuga ko zitemewe mu kuvuza ingoma.
