column2: Chris Brown yagirijwe ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca amusambanya ku nguvu mu bwato
column3: Chris Brown yagirizwa ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca aramusambanya ku nguvu, ubu akaba ariko mu rubanza rushobora kumutwara imiriyoni 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Iki caha co gufata ku nguvu kivugwa ko cabereye mu bwato (yacht) ku wa 30 kigarama (ukwa cumi na kabiri) 2020 i Miami mu ntara ya Florida. Ikiganiro Newsbeat ca Radio 1 cagerageje kuvugana n'abaserukira Chris Brown kugira ngo bagire ico bavuze ariko gushika ubu ntaco barishura. Chris Brown asa n'uwishuye aciye ku rubuga rwa Instagram, aho avuga ko ariko arakurikiranwa kubera ariko ategura gusohora umuziki. Yanditse ati: "NDIBAZA KO ARI IVYO MUBONA MWESE....ni igihe cose ngiye gusohora umuziki canke mfise imigambi kanaka". Uru rubanza rwugurujwe n'umunyamuziki atashatse kumenyekana, azwi gusa kw'izina rya 'Jane Doe' mu nzandiko z'amategeko. Izi nyandiko zerekana ibirego bitanu bitandukanye kuri uyu munyamuziki - gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina, guturubika n'ibigirankana, guturubika umuntu kubera urwangara hamwe no gupfunga umuntu atabifitiye uburenganzira kandi amuturubitse. Uyu mugore avuga ko afise "ubwoba ko ashobora kwicwa canke gutakaza akazi" . Avuga ko yahawe ubutumire muri ubwo bwato bwegukira umunyamuziki wo mu mudiho wa rap (rapper) akongera kaba n'umu 'producer',  Diddy, ari naho habereye iki caha kivugwa. Nk'uko uru rwandiko Newsbeat yashoboye kubona rubivuga, uyu mugore avuga ko amaze gushika, Brown  yamuhaye ikinyobwa mu nyuma aca yumva "umubiri urahindutse giturumbuka mu buryo atashobora gusigura". Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko "yataye umutwe, inguvu ziramuherana, aca afatwa n'itiro", imbere y'uko atwarwa mu gitanda ariho bivugwa ko Brown yaciye amwambura impuzu amusambanya ku nguvu. Brown avugwa ko ku musi wakurikiye yahamagaye uyo mugore, amubwira ko yofata imiti kugira ntasame imbanyi. Newsbeat kandi yagerageje no kuvugana n'abaserukizi ba Diddy, ariko nta nyishu baratanga.

column2: Francine Niyonsaba avuga iki inyuma yo kuba uwa mbere ku metero 3000 i Lausane?
column3: Umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yatahukanye ikibanza ca mbere mw'ihiganwa rya Diamond League ryariko rirabera i Lausane mu Buswisse ku metero 3000. Uwo murundikazi aherutse guhabwa icubahiro co kwitwa ambasaderi yasize isegunda imwe gusa umunye Amerika Alicia Monson. Francine Niyonsaba yagize iminoto 8:26:80 na we Monson agira iminota 8:26:81. Ihiganwa rya nyuma rya Diamnond League ritegekanijwe itariki 6 z'ukwezi kw'icenda mu 2022.

column2: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w’ Ubuyapani aragabisha Afrika ku madeni y’umurengera
column3: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani aragabisha abategetsi ba Afrika ku ngaruka z'ugufata amadeni menshi, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'itororokaniriza ry'amakuru AFP. Ayo majambo ya Shinzo Abe afatwa nk'igabisha ku ruhara rw'Ubushinwa muri Afrika mu gihe buvugwa ko bushira imbere amakompanyi yabwo mu migambi ikomeye kuri uwo mugabane. Yabwiye abategetsi bari mu nama i Yokohama muri ico gihugu yerekeye iterambere rya Afrika ko Ubuyapani bwipfuza guteza imbere imitahe "ngirakamaro" yoshigikirwa n'amashirahamwe y'Ubuyapani. AFP ivuga ko ico gihugu gitegekanya kwigisha abahinga 30 bava mu bihugu vya Afrika  mu myaka itatu iri imbere ku buryo bwo guhangana n'ibiza n'amadeni ku gihugu. Avuga ko abakora imigambi y'iterambere boterwa intege kugira ngo bashobore guteza imbere ubutunzi ku mugabane wa Afrika. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani yasubiwemwo amajambo avuga ati: " Mu gihe ibihugu bigenzi vyugarijwe n'amadeni y'umurengera, bica biba inzitizi kuri uyo wese yari afise imigambi y'ukuzana imitahe yabo". Bwana Abe ari mu barongoye inama mpuzamakungu ya Tokyo kw'iterambere rya Afrika (Ticad), ikaba yateguwe mu gihe Ubushinwa buriko bushinga imizi muri Afrika. Ubuyapani buvuga ko intumbero bufise kuri Afrika ari ukuyifata mu mugongo mu buryo bw'amafaranga n'ikoreshwa ryayo, intumbero itandukanye n'iyo Ubushinwa.

column2: Ronaldo na Messi babaye abagenzi inyuma y'aho Van Dijk abakubitiye hasi
column3: Rimwe na rimwe amatombora mu mupira w'amaguru canke iminsi mikuru y'ugutanga ubushimwe birashobora kutaryoha kubera amajambo menshi y'umwanya muremure, ugasanga abariko babikurikira bararambiwe. Ariko iyo ubonye babiri mu bihangange kw'isi - Lionel Messi na Cristiano Ronaldo - bemeye ubwa mbere gusangirira umukate hamwe, ni ibintu bidasanzwe. Kari akamwemwe gusa hagati y'umusatirizi wa Juventus Ronaldo na mugenziwe wa Barcelona Messi igihe bari bicaranye batebura eka banatwenga. Hari igihe batangaza ko Virgil van Dijk ari we atahukanye agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza i Bulaya mu 2018/2019. Vyari ibintu bigoye kwiyumvira ko abo bantu babiri bigeze kuba ari abakeba mu kiringo c'imyaka icenda Ronaldo yamaze mu murwi Real Madrid, banarwanira umupira w'inzahabu, ubu bariko batebura. Ronaldo ati: "Twari tumaze imyaka 15 yose duhurira hano. Sinzi ko ivyo vyari bwigere bibabo mu myaka iri inyuma - abantu babiri bakama bahurira ng'aha igihe cose". "Nivyo ko dufise ubucuti bwiza. Ntiturigera dusangirira hamwe, ariko ndibaza ko bizotinda bigashika muri kazoza". "Twarahanganye cane muri Espanye. Naramuhenuye, nawe arampenura. Nico gituma biryoshe kuba mu bagize amateka y'umupira w'amaguru". Uravye ingene bari bakundanye muri ako kanya, ni nde yokwiyumvira ko hari ukutumvikana hagati y'abo? Igihe c'abo bakeba babiri c'ukwiganzira umupira w'amaguru gitera kirangira, aho muri iri joro ryakeye ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Uefa, ryatangaje umwami mushasha w'umupira w'amaguru ku mugabane wa Bulaya Uyo nawe si uwundi ni Virgil van Dijk, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool. Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 28 akomoka mu Buholande yahawe agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza gusumba abandi i Bulaya mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2018/2019. Van Dijk yafashije Liverpool gutahukana igikombe c'igihanwa ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Liverpool yatsinze Tottenham ibitsindo 2-0 mu rukino rwa nyuma rwabereye i Madrid mu kwa gatandatu guheze. Van Dijk abaye umukinyi agize kabiri atsinze ivyo bihangange inyuma y'aho mu mwaka uheze, Luka Modric wa Real Madrid atahukaniye ako gashimwe ashize hasi Ronaldo na Messi. Van Dijk kandi niwe mukinyi w'inyuma wa mbere atsindiye ako gashimwe, katanguye guhiganirwa mu mwaka wa 2010/2011. Ati: "Si noreka gushimira bagenzanje dukinana, kuko iyo ataba bo sinari gushika ku ntambwe ngezeko. Rwabaye urugendo rurerure".

column2: 12 bahagaritswe bagirizwa kubomora imva ya DJ Arafat muri Côte d'Ivoire
column3: Igipolisi ca Côte d'Ivoire cahagaritse abantu 12 bagirizwa kubomora imva y'umuririmvyi azwi cane muri ico gihugu bapfundurura isandugu yari yahambwemwo. Abanya Côte d'Ivoire benshi bababajwe n'ireresi yazungurutse ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana abakunzi ba DJ Arafat,  yasandavye mu kwezi guheze mw'isanganya,  bakura isandugu yiwe mu ruhafu barayugurura kugira ngo barabe koko y'uko irimwo ikiziga ciwe. Ivyo bibaye inyuma y'urukurukuru n'ibihuha vyakwiragijwe bivuga y'uko yoba atapfuye. Ku munsi wa gatanu w'indwi iheze, abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baritavye igiteramo cabereye ku kibuga c'umupira mu ntumbero y'ukwibuka ubuzima bwiwe. DJ Arafat, izina ryiwe ry'ukuri akaba yari Ange Didier Houon, yari yavutse ku wa 26 z'ukwa mbere 1986 asandaba ku wa 12 z'ukwezi kw'umunani guheze azize isanganya ry'ipikipiki. Yari azwi cane nk'umuririmvyi w'umucuraranzi rurangiranwa muri Côte d'Ivoire no muri Afrika yo munsi y'ubugaragwa bwa Afrika. Yafatwa nk'icirore c'umuziki wo mu mudiho witwa Coupé-décalé wabiciye bigacika mu myaka ya 2000 na 2010, umudiho wahavuye wizizirwa n'urwaruka rwa Côte d'Ivoire muri kino gihe.

column2: U﻿kraine ibandanya gushora intete n'aho Uburusiya bwikuye mu masezerano
column3: Ikigo gihagarariwe na UN/ONU kigenzura ingene intete zishorwa ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura ki vuga ko u﻿bundi bwato butatu bwahagurutse muri Ukraine ku musi wa kabiri, n'aho uburusiya bwafashe ingingo yo kwivana muri ayo amasezerano. I﻿co kigo kivuga ko ubwo bwato 'bwemerewe kugenda na Ukraine, Turkia na Onu, mu gihe uburusiya na bwo "bwabimenyeshejwe". K﻿u musi wa mbere, amato 12 atwaye amatone 354.500 y'ibifungurwa yarahagurutse muri Ukraine. U﻿burusiya bwahagaritse gushigikira ayo masezerano ku musi wa gatandatu, bwagiriza Ukraine gukoresha inzira ubwato bucamwo mu gutera  amato yabwo y'intambara. O﻿nu ivuga ko ata bwato na bumwe bwariko buraca muri iyo nzira muri iryo joro. U﻿kraine ntiyigeze yemanga kugira uruhara muri ico gitero ca Crimme  - izinga rya Ukraine riri mu bumanuko ryigaruriwe n'Uburusiya mu 2014. P﻿rezida wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yagiriza Uburusiya "gukangisha inzara amakungu" - ivyo Uburusiya buhakana. I﻿co kigo gifise icicaro I Istanbul ntikiramenyesha ivyo ubwo bwato butatu bwavuye muri Ukraine ku wa kabiri bwikoreye. U﻿burusiya nta co buravuga kuri ivyo. U﻿muzigo wo kuri uyu wa mbere ni wo wambere munini utwaye ku musi umwe kuva ayo masezerano yo gutwara intete atanguye gushirwa mu bikorwa, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuvugizi w'ubutegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Odesa aho yasubiwemwo na Reuters. Ubwo butegetsi bwongeyeko ko bumwe mu bwato butwaye amatoni 40.000 y'intete bwari bugenewe igihugu ca Ethiopia, aho "hashobora gutera amapfa." I﻿nyuma y'aho Uburusiya butereye Ukraine mu kwezi kwa kabiri, amato yabwo yaciye yugariza ibivuko vya Ukraine vyo ku kiyaga cirabura, bwugaranirayo imiliyoni 20 z'intete zigenewe gutwarwa hagati mu gihugu, harimwo n'ibindi bifungurwa nk'ibigori n'amavuta y'ibihoke. A﻿riko mu kwezi kw'indwi harabonetse amasezerano hagati y'Uburusiya na Ukraine bafashijwe na Turkia na Onu, bituma hashobora gusubira gushorwa intete ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura. A﻿riko ku musi wa mbere, prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yavuze ko ayo masezerano yahagaritswe , avuga ko ari kubera ibitero "vyinshi" vy'indege zitagira umudereva ku mato yabwo ku bivuko vya Sevastopol aho yavuze ko Ukraine ibifisemwo uruhara. Y﻿avuze ko hategerezwa kubanza kubaho umutekano wo mu mazi, ko kwubahiriza amasezerano yo gushora intete bikimeze uko koba ari ukwigerezako. M﻿w'ijambo ryiwe ku mboneshakure, prezida Putin yagize ati:"Ukraine itegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ko ubwato butwara abantu butazogeramigwa." U﻿kraine ntiyemeje ko yagize uruhara muri ivyo bitero, ikavuga ko Uburusiya bwateguye kuva kera kwivana muri ayo masezerano mpuzamakungu, mu kugira icitwazo ivyo bitero. U﻿muvugizi w'ibiro vya prezida w'Uburusiya, Dmitry Peskov yagize ati:"Mu gihe Uburusiya buvuga ko bidashoka kwemanga umutekano wo muri ako karere, ayo masezerano aragoye gushirwa mu bikorwa, yafashe iyindi ntumbero - harimwo ukwigerezako kurengeje. U﻿kwikura muri ayo masezerano kw'Uburusiya kwatewe ivyatsi na Amerika, yavuze ko ico ico gihugu "kiriko kirakoresha imfungurwa nk'ikigwanisho". J﻿oseph Borrell ajejwe imigenderanire y'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya EU n'amakungu, yateye akamo Uburusiya kwisubirako, avuga ko kubuza urudandazwa rw'intete n'umwavu bishobora gutera ikibazo c'inzara kw'isi. U﻿wuserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika yamiriye kure ivyo vyagiriji ko igihugu ciwe kiriko kiratuma haba inzara kw'isi, yemeza ko ari akarenganyo kunebagura igihugu ciwe. U﻿burusiya bwafashe iyo ngingo mu gihe bwemeza ko bwaguye igikorwa co gukura abantu mu karere bwigaruriye ka Kherson, n'aho bwari bwavuze, mu mpera z'iyinga, bwari bwarangije ico gikorwa.

column2: Rwanda: Abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi basaba leta guhagarika ingingo y'ugukata umushahara w'abakozi
column3: Amashyaka (imigambwe) abiri atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda, ariyamiriza ingingo ya leta y'ico gihugu yo gukata umushahara w'abakozi, ibice bingana na 0.5% buri kwezi aja mu kigega c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi muri ico gihugu kizwi nka RSSB. Victoire Ingabire, umukuru w'umugambwe DALFA-Umurinzi,  hamwe na Bernard  Ntaganda w'umugambwe PS-Imberakuri, bakorera mu Rwanda, bagiriza umugambwe FPR uri ku butegetsi mu Rwanda ko ugomba kunyaga abakozi ku nyungu zawo. Leta yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe mu ntumbero yo gushigikira umusanzu w'ubwisungane mu kwivuza, ikanavuga ko yafashwe habanje kuba ibiganiro bitandukanye. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC Gahuzamiryango, Victoire Ingabire avuga ko iyo ngingo ya leta yafashwe hahonyanzwe ibwirizwashingiro ry'ico gihugu hamwe n'itegeko rigenga akazi "kuko umushahara w'umuntu ni umutungo wiwe bwite, ni ntavogerwa, ntabwo umuntu apfa kuwufataho uko yishakiye". Yagiriza ikigega  RSSB c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi ko cabaye igikoresho c'umugambwe FPR/RPF uri ku butegetsi. Ati: "Kiriya kigo gishirwamwo amafaranga y'ubwishingizi n'ayo gutegekaniriza abakozi RSSB, ni ikigo cabaye nk'inka y'imvyeyi ririya shyaka rivomamo". Umupfasoni Ingabire avuga ko atarwanya uwo mugambi wa leta wo kwunganira umusanzu w'ukwivuza, akabona ko ahubwo leta  ikwiye kuronderera mu bindi bisata maze amafaranga agashobora kuboneka. Avuga ko ingorane nyamukuru ari ingene ayo mafaranga yegeranywa akoreshwa, akabona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: "Ntabwo ari ikibazo c'ibura ry'amafaranga, ikibazo ni uburyo amafaranga yo mu bwisungane bwo kwivuza acungwa. Imbere y'uko baja kurondera amafaranga ni babanze bacunge neza n'ayahari". "Iyaba ayahari bayacunga neza, ntabwo uyu munsi baba bariko baja gusonga abakozi bababwira ngo barabakata amafaranga". Leta y'u Rwanda yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe ku nyungu z'umunyagihugu muri rusangi. Gaspard Musonera,  umunyamabanga uhoraho (ntayegayezwa mu Kirundi) mu bushikiranganji bw'abakozi n'akazi mu Rwanda, avuga ko amafaranga asanzwe atangwa n'umukozi hamwe n'ayo umukoresha amutangira ari ayo kwivuza be n'umuryango wiwe gusa. Avuga ko hakenewe ubundi buryo kugira ngo abanyagihugu bandi nabo bashobore kuvurwa, ari co ayo mafaranga bazokatwa azokora. Ati: "Ayo 0.5 % ku mushahara wabo bwite batahana ku kwezi ni inkunga yabo ku kigega c'ubwishingizi mu kwivuza kuko ayo abaturage basanzwe batanga ni make cane ugereranije n'ayakenewe kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza mu buryo bukwiriye". "Rero ni ngombwa ko hashakwa izindi nzira zo kwunganira ico kikega kugira ngo abaturage bashobore guhabwa serivisi z'ubuzima zikwiriye, inzego z'ubuzima nazo zishobore kugira ubushobozi bwo kubafasha neza". Avuga ko ibivugwa n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi y'uko ikigo RSSB gikora gihomba kandi ko iyo ntererano isanzwe ikoreshwa nabi, bidafise ishingiro "kuko nta bindi bari kuvuga". Ati: "Ikigo c'ubwisungane RSSB nta kibazo gifise, aho ikibazo kiri, ni uko abaturage basabwa amafaranga makeya ugereranyije n'ayo bategerezwa gutanga kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza". Bwana Musonera avuga ko imbere y'uko iyo ngingo ifatwa habaye ibiganiro bitandukanye vyari bifise intumbero yo kurondera inzira zo kwegeranya ubwo buryo harimwo n'abakozi, akabonako ata mpamvu y'uko yojamwo impari. Ati: "Ivyo ari vyo vyose jewe ico numva abantu bashira imbere ni ukumva akamaro bifitiye buri Munyarwanda wese ndetse n'uyo mukozi". Ku wa 26 z'ukwezi guheze, ni ho umushikiranganji w'abakozi ba leta n'umurimo mu Rwanda yasohora itangazo risaba abakoresha bo mu nzego za leta n'abikorera utwabo gukata 0.5% ku mushahara wa buri kwezi ku bakozi babo  maze bakawushikiriza ikigo c'Ubwisungane mu Rwanda (RSSB). Ni ingingo ishingiye kw'itegeko ry'umushikiranganji wa mbere c'ico gihugu ryo ku wa 13 z'ukwa mbere uno mwaka nyene, ryerekeye ubwisungane mu kwivuza, rikanerekana inzira zitandukanye uburyo bushobora kuvamwo.

column2: US: Imigumiko inyuma y'aho umuporisi yiciye umwirabure Daunte Wright hafi ya Minneapolis
column3: Igiporisi cakoresheje ivyuka bikoroza amosozi gihagarika uruja n'uruza mw'ijoro kugira gicureshe  imigumuko yadutse inyuma y'aho umuporisi arasiye umwirabure mu gisagara ca Brooklyn Center, hafi ya Minneapolis muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Umuryango w'uyu musore yagandaguwe uvuga ko azwi kw'izina rya Daunte Wright, akaba afise imyaka 20. Umukuru w'igisagara ca Brooklyn Center yaciye afata ingingo yo kubuza uruja n'uruza mu gisagara cose mu masaha y'ijoro gushika isaha cumi na zibiri z'agatondo mu masaha yo muri ako karere, asaba abanyagihugu "gutaha muhira ku mutekano wabo". Hari icuka kibi cane muri Minneapolis mu gihe urubanza rw'uwahoze ari umupolisi yagirizwa kwica George Floyd rubandanya. Buramatari wa Minnesota, Tim Walz avuga ko ariko arakurikiranira hafi ingene ibintu bimeze, yongera asengera umuryango wa Wright. Ejo ku wa Mungu, abantu baharurwa mu majana bagenda baririmba izina rya  Daunte Wright baciye biyegeranya hanze y'ibiro vy'igiporisi mu gisagara ca Brooklyn Center, ku birometero bike uvuye hagati mu gisagara ca Minneapolis uja mu buraruko. Icuka kibi cadutse igihe igiporisi cashirako umwambaro wo mu gihe co kurwanya imigumuko n'igihe  imodoka zibiri zashika zigaca ziterwa amabuye, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Abari muri iyo myiyerekano banditse ivyandiko hasi n'ingwa bongera batsa n'amabuji, ariko igiporisi mu nyuma kikaba cabategetse kuvaho, ireresi ikerekana abo baporisi bariko batera vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi  n'ama grenades yo gushwiragiza abari mu myiyerekano. Ibinyamakuru bikorera muri ako karere bivuga ko habaye n'ibikorwa vyo gusahura mu turere tutari duke, Mike Elliott arongoye igisagara ca Brooklyn Center agaca atangaza ingingo yo kubuza uruja n'uruza aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter. Yanditse ati: "Dushaka ko umutekano w'abantu bose wubahirizwa. Ndasavye ko mwese muba mu mutekano kandi ndasavye ko mutaha muhira". Bamwe mu basirikare b'igihugu ba (Minnesota National Guard) bari basanzwe bararungitswe gucungera urubanza rwa Derek Chauvin yagirizwa urupfu rwa George Floyd, barungitswe mu gisagara ca Brooklyn Center. Brooklyn Center yugaye inyubakwa z'amashure yose ihagarika n'ivyigwa hamwe n'ibindi bikorwa kuri ayo mashure kuri uno wa mbere, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru bikorera muri ako karere. None ni ibiki vyashikiye Daunte Wright neza na neza? Mw'itangazo casohoye, igiporisi ca Brooklyn Center kivuga ko cahagaritse umugabo yari yarenze amategeko y'ibarabara ku muhingamo w'ejo ku wa Mungu, kandi ko yari asanzwe afise umutahe wo kumuhagarika. Igiporisi kivuga ko abaporisi bagerageje kumuhagarika yaciye asibimra mu modoka. Niho umwe mu baporisi yaca amurasa, ariko abandanya anyonga imodokari yiwe agenda aca ku zindi, imbere y'uko ayita ku yindi modoka. Mu nyuma niho yatangazwa ko yapfuye. Umugore yari muri iyo modoka yakomeretse buke buke. Igiporisi kivuga ko abo baporisi bari bambaye bafise camera  zabo kandi ko na kamera y'imodoka nayo nyene yariko irakora. Nyina wiwe Katie avuga kpo umuhungu wiwe yamuhagamaye igihe imodoka yiwe yahagarikwa akamubwira ko yahagaritswe kubera "ibimotesho vyari kuri retroviseur". Avuga ko mu nyuma yumvise uruhagarara terefone ica iracika. "Haciye umunota, nahamagaye hanyuma umukunzi wiwe bari kumwe muri iyo modoka aca avuga ko yarashwe....umuhungu wanje yari aryamye hasi yapfuye". Avuga ko abo baporisi basize ikiziga c'umuhungu wiwe kiryamye hasi, yongerako ati: "Nta n'umwe azotubwira na kimwe. Nta n'umwe azotuvugisha...navuze nti ndabasavye mukure ikiziga c'umuhungu wanje hasi". Umukuru w'igisagara Elliott yavuze ko ivyabaye ari "agahomerabunwa", buramatari  Walz  nawe ati : "Reta yacu iragandariye uwundi  mwirabure yishwe n'abajejwe kwubahiriza umutekano". Igisagara ca Minneapolis gisanzwe kirangwamwo icuka kibi inyuma y'urupfu rwa wa mwirabure George Floyd rwatumye haduka imyiyerekano mu gihugu,, ahanini yakozwe mu mahoro n'aho hari ahandi yabayemwo imigumuko, inyubakwa zimwe zimwe zirononekara.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru 07/09/2019: Messi, Neymar, Smalling, Rojo, Eriksen, Mbappe, Coutinho
column3: Lionel Messi arashobora kuva muri Barcelona mu mwaka uza akaja gukinira ahandi atarinze kugurishwa , mu gihe uyo mukinyi wa Argentine w'imyaka 32 yovyiyumvamwo, nk'uko amasezerano abimwemerera. (El Pais, via L'Equipe) Messi azoba afise uburenganzira bw'ukugiriranira amasezerano n'umurwi uwo ari wo wose kuva ku wa 01 z'ukwezi kwa mbere umwaka uza wa 2020.  (Marca - in Spanish) Mu mwaka uza w'inkino, Real Madrid ishobora kurondera umukinyi wa Paris St-Germain, umufaransa akina imbere Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 20.  (Sport - in Spanish) Umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Brezili Neymar ashobora kuzoguma mu murwi wa  PSG kiretse ari nka hamwe yokwemera kugabanya umushahara asaba, nk'uko bivugwa na  Javier Tebas, umukuru w'ihiganwa ryo muri Espanye, La Liga. (Mail) Chris Smalling ariteguye kuva burundu muri  Manchester United inyuma y'aho uyo mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 29  atijirijwe  mu murwi Roma wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A. (Mirror) Eka n'umukinyi w'inyuma nyene wa Manchester United, umunya Argentina  Marcos Rojo w'imyaka 29, ariteguye gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo mu kwezi kwa mbere ave muri uyo murwi bibaye ngombwa,  inyuma y'aho utwigoro tw'ukwimukira muri Everton muri iri ci riheze ataco twashitseko.  (Ole - in Spanish) Umurwi Juventus wo mu Butaliyano uriko wihweza ingene wogura  abakinyi babiri ba Tottenham, umubirigi akina inyuma Toby Alderweireld w'imyaka 30, be n'umunya Danemark akina hagati Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27. Inter Milan nayo nyene ikaba yipfuza umukinyi Alderweireld. (Mail) Manchester City yashitse ku masezerano n'umurwi wo mu gihugu ca Serbia FK Cukaricki y'ugushobora kugura mu kwezi kwa mbere umukinyi w'imbere Slobodan Tedic w'imyaka 19 akomoka muri  Montenegro. (Manchester Evening News) D'Margio w'imyaka 17, umuhungu wa Shaun Wright-Phillips yigeze kuba umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester City be n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza, yateye igikumu ku masezerano ya mbere yo gushobora gukinira uyo murwi. (Manchester Evening News) Umumenyereza wa Manchester City, Pep Guardiola, yari yanse kurondera umunya Brezili Philippe Coutinho wa Barcelona  imbere y'uko uyo mukinyi wo hagati w'imyaka 27 aja gukinira Bayern Munich nk'intizo. (Marca - in Spanish) Chelsea iriteguye kugiriranira ayandi masezerano na Emerson Palmieri, umutaliyano yavukiye muri Brezili, bigashobora gutuma amasezerano y'uyo mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 25 afitaniye n'uyo murwi yongerezwa uwundi mwaka inyuma ya 2022.  (Gazzetta dello Sport, via Mail) Henrikh Mkhitaryan umukinyi wa Arsenal w'imyaka 30 akomoka muri Armenia, ntamenya neza nimba azoshobora gusubira muri uyo murwi wiwe inyuma y'aho agiriye gukina mu murwi Roma wo mu Butaliyano nk'intizo gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka w'inkino. (Sun) Sir Alex Ferguson yaragerageje guhendahenda uwahoze ari umusatirizi w'umurwi w'Ubwongereza Michael Owen ngo yinjire muri Manchester United igihe yari akiri umukangara imbere y'uko yinjira muri  Liverpool. (Mail) Umukuru w'umurwi wa Paris St-Germain,Thomas Tuchel, aracari mu biganiro n'umukinyi w'imbere wa  Barcelona, umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w'imyaka 22, n'aho bisa n'uko ataco biriko birashikako . (Express) Bobby Duncan, umwongereza w'imyaka 18 yahoze ari mu murwi w'imikangara ya Liverpool yaranse kuja mu murwi Manchester United  akaba yashimye kwimukira mu murwi wa Fiorentina wo mu Butaliyano. (Mail)

column2: Astro azwi mu ndirimbo nka Kingston Town, Red Red Wine ari muri UB40 yashengeye
column3: Umunyamuziki w'umwongereza akongera akaba n'umwe mu batanguje umurwi UB40 Terence Wilson, azwi cane kw'izina rya Astro, yapfuye ku myaka 64. Astro umuririmvyi yaririmbanye n'uyu murwi wo mu mudiho wa reggae mu kiringo c'imyaka irenga 30 yahitanywe n'indwara y'igihe gito, nk'uko vyemezwa n'umurwi yari asanzwe aririmbamwo. Itangazo ryacishijwe ku rubuga n'umurwi Ali Campbell and Astro rivuga riti:  "Turababaye cane. Isi yose irabuze intwari". Astro yasezeye mu murwi UB40 mu 2013 akaba yagiye kubandanya n'umurwi wiyonkoye UB40 featuring Ali Campbell and Astro, ukaba wari umaze kuremesha ibiteramo bitari bike muri uno mwaka. Wari witeze kuzunguruka ugenda uremesha ibiteramo mu mwaka uza wa 2022. Umurwi wiwe wa mbere watangujwe mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1980 n'umudiho wa reggae wisangije kamere, ukaba waramenyekanye cane mu miziki itari mike harimwo nka Red Red Wine na Can't Help Falling In Love. Uyu murwi wa Birmingham wagurishije ama casettes arenga imiriyoni 70 kandi imiziki yawo iraba iya mbere mu Bwongereza ku ncuro zitatu zose. Itangazo ry'abagize umurwi UB40 wa kino gihe wanditse kuri twitter uti: "Wiruhukire mu mahoro Astro. "Muri iri joro twumvise inkuru y'umubabaro ko uwahoze mu murwi UB40, Terence Wilson, azwi kw'izina rya  Astro, yasandavye inyuma y'indwaya y'igihe gito. Turahojeje umuryango wiwe". Muri rusangi, UB40 yasohoye indirimbo 39 muri 40 za mbere mu Bwongereza, yongera isohora album 28 muri 40 za mbere mu gihugu, na Astro akaba ari we yari umuririmvyi mukuru mu ndirimbo Rat In Mi Kitchen yabaye iya 12 mu 1987. Uyu murwi kandi waramenyekanye cane kw'isi yose, harimwo no muri Amerika, aho indirimbo Red Red Wine yabaye iya mbere, nk'uko vyagenze no ku yindi yitwa, Can't Help Falling in Love with You, yamaze amayinga indwi yose ari yo yiganje mu 1993. Aba mbere mu bagize uyu murwi baramaze imyaka 30 yose baririmbira hamwe imbere y'uko Ali Campbell  awusezera mu 2008. Mu kiganiro Astro yagiranye na The Guardian mu kwa gatanu, yavuze ko uyu murwi umaze gushingwa mu 1978 wahindutse ijwi ry'abanyagihugu batishimiye ibijanye na poritike hamwe n'ibibazo bihanze isi. Yabwiye iki kinyamakuru ko nawe yabonye "amabwa nk'ayo abandi birabure bose bahuye nayo mu mpera z'imyaka ya 1970", aha akaba yashaka kuvuga itegeko ryaha uburenganzira igipolisi guhagarika no gusaka abantu bafatwa ko bateye amakenga - ivyo Astro avuga ko vyama biba buri ndwi. Ati: "Twabonye vyari bigoye kwandika indirimbo z'urukundo gusumba indirimbo z'abarwanira agateka kabo, kubera vyari vyoroshe cane kwandika ku bintu wewe nyene wiboneye canke wasomye ahantu. Yari kamere yacu". Mu 2016, uyu munyamuziki yabwiye urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'Ubwongereza UK Music Reviews ko iri ritazirano yarironse akiri umwana kubera yambara ibirato vya Dr Martens vyari bizwi nka "Astronaut". Yongeyeko ati: "Ku gihamana ciza, nta muntu yigeze anyita astronaut kuko ari ijambo rirerire, ari naco gituma baciye barigabanya bafata Astro, kandi kuva ubwo ryaciye ringumako". Abajijwe ingene yiyumva iyo ariko arazunguruka aremesha ibiteramo, Astro yavuze ati: "Nta kazi kuri iyi si koguha umunezero nk'uwo ndonka. Jewe ndiho kugira ngo ndirime". Mu kw'umunani, uwundi mugenzi bakoranye muri UB40 batangranye uyu murwi Brian Travers yarapfuye ahitanywe na kanseri ku myaka 62.

column2: Trump asaba ko US yokwitaho umutekano w'amashure imbere ya Ukraine
column3: Uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Donald Trump atera akamo abashingamateka b'iki gihugu kwitaho gushira amafaranga mu mutekano w'amashure hakurungika imfashanyo ya gisirikare muri Ukraine. Mw'ijambo yashikirije mu nama ihuza abashigikiye itegeko riha uburenganzira abanyagihugu gutunga inkoho, Trump ntabona ukungene Amerika "ishobora kuba ifise imiriyaridi 40 z'amadorari yo kurungikira Ukraine" ariko ikaba idashobora gukingira umutekano w'amashure. Inama y'ishirahamwe ryishinze gukingira itegeko riha uburenganzira abanyagihugu gutunga inkoho, National Rifle Association (NRA), iriko ibera i Houston. Avuze aya majambo inyuma y'imisi mike abantu 21, harimwo abana 19, biciwe mu gitero c'umusore yitwaje inkoho kw'ishure rimwe ryo muri Texas. Mw'iri jambo yashikirije nijoro ku wa gatanu agakomerwa amashi menshi cane, Trump avuga ati: "Imbere y'uko tuza kwubaka ibindi bihugu kw'isi, twategerezwa kubanza kwubakira abana bacu amashure atekanye mu gihugu cacu". Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka za Amerika  (Congrès/Congress) zaremeje ku rugero runini imfashanyo ya gisirikare kuri Ukraine ingana hafi n'imiriyaridi 40 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Yose hamwe, abashingamateka n'abakenguzamateka bamaze kurungika imiriyaridi 54 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika muri Ukraine kuva Uburusiya buteye iki gihugu mu kwa kabiri. Trump abandanya ati: "Congrès yategerezwa kwemeza vuba bwango kugarukana ifaranga ryose turakoreshejwe muri ya mafaranga yo gufasha abakozweko na Covid. "Intara ni ziyasubize hanyuma akoreshwe ningoga mu gushiraho uburyo butavogerwa bwo gucungera umutekano ku mashure yose yo ku butaka bwacu". Trump ariyamiriza abasaba ko hoba ugucungera ibijanye no gutunga inkoho, akavuga ko abanyamerika bategerezwa kugira uburenganzira bwo kwivuna "akabi". Ahubwo asaba ko hosubirwamwo "kuva hasi gushika hejuru" integuro ijanye no gucungera umutekano w'amashure, nko gushinga irembo rimwe ricungerewe cane ku bigo vy'amashure, harimwo ubuhinga bwo gucungera ko ata muntu yinjiza icuma kandi ishure ryose rikaba rifise n'imiburiburi umupolisi yohabwa ikirwanisho. Yagiriza aba Democrats kuzibira ingingo zo gucungera umutekano nk'izi. Uyu mu Repubulika yahoze arongoye Amerika yatanguye ijambo ryiwe asoma amazina y'abaguye mu gitero c'umusore yitwaje inkoho i Uvalde, rimwe rimwe ryose rigakurikirwa n'inkengeri. Ahejeje gusoma amazina y'abantu 21 bose biciwe muri ico gitero kw'ishure i Uvalde, Trump yavuze ati: "Kubera hari ikibi, ni kimwe mu bituma vyiza cane bituma itegeko rirekurira banyagihugu gutunga ikirwanisho, ntiribaka ikirwanisho". Iyi nama ya NRA - rifise abanywanyi imiriyoni zitanu -  yama iba uko umwaka utashe, iriko ibera ku birometero 450 uvuye i Uvalde, ahabereye iki gitero c'agahomerabunwa. Imbere y'uko iyi nama itangura, abatari bake mu bashikirije ijambo bo ku ruhande rw'aba Conservateurs/Conservative hamwe n'abanyamuziki batangaje ko biyonjoroye - harimwo buramatari wa Texas  Greg Abbott, umukenguzamateka John Cornyn hamwe n'uwahinguye irya nkoho yakoreshejwe mu gitero ca Uvalde. Trump yifatiye mu gahanga abo biyonjoroye, mu kubwira abari aho ati: "Jewe sinabahemukiye ngo ndeke kwitaba nk'abo bandi". Mw'iryo jambo ryiwe, Trump kandi yateye akamo Amerika "guhindura cane integuro ijanye n'abafise ibibazo vyo mu mutwe". Yarateye akamo nk'ako igihe yari akiri umukuru w'igihugu, n'aho muri ico gihe abamunegura bamwagirije ko yariko agerageza guhagarika amafaranga yari agenewe imigambi y'ubuvuzi harimwo no kwitaho abafise ibibazo vyo mu mutwe. imbere y'uko Turmp ashikiriza ijambo, umukenguzamateka wo muri Texas Ted Cruz yavuze ko ibitero vy'abarasa abantu mu kivunga biva kuri ba serugo batitaho imiryango, abantu batakija mu masengero, imbuga hwaniro hamwe n'amavidewo y'udukino. Umukenguzamateka Cruz ashimangira ko ashigikiye cane iri tegeko riha uburenganzira abanyagihugu gutunga inkoho, aca asaba abari bitavye iyi nama "ko mu kwishura ikibi batoca bahonyanga ibwirizwashingiro canke uburenganzira bw'abanyagihugu bagendera ku mategeko". Hanze y'aho iyo nama ibera, habaye imyiyerekano yahuriyemwo amajana n'amajana y'abatera ivyatsi ishiramawe NRA. Bari bafise ivyapa vyanditseko ngo "NRA yica inzoya",  "kingira abana hagukingira inkoho", bafise n'imisaraba hamwe n'amasanamu y'abaguye muri ico gitero.

column2: Burundi: Isabukuru Buja Sans Tabou yahagaritswe kubera "abatimbo bambaye ikoti"
column3: Ubushikiranganji bufise urwaruka mu nshingano zabwo mu Burundi bwahagaritse isabukuru yariko irabera mu gisagara ca Bujumbura kubera umugwi w'abavuzi b'ingomba bambaye umwambaro uzwi nka "costume". Amasanamu yahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana abatimbo bari bitabiriye isabukuru Buja Sans Tabou, bavuza ingomba bambaye amakoti n'amapantalo na karuvati bashizeko. Bisanzwe bizwi ko mu muco w'ikirundi ingomba zivuzwa n'abantu bambaye umwambaro w'imbega. Ku mbuga hwaniro bamwe baguye mu gahundwe bakagira bati ivyo ni uguta umuco, abandi nabo bati nkumbure ni iterambere, ntawogaya ikitarageragezwa. Ariko mu gihe isabukuru yitwa "Buja Sans Tabou", canke "Buja itagira umuziro" ugenekereke mu kirundi, hari abibajije igituma bobuzwa kwambara uko bashatse naho boba bariko baravuza ingoma z'ikirundi. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'umushikiranganji ajejwe ivy'ishirahamwe ry'akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, urwaruka, inkino hamwe n'umuco ryasohotse uno munsi, uushikiranganji Ezechiel Nibigira amenyesha ko iyo ngingo yafashwe mu ntumbero yo gukingira "Umurage w'Umuco kama w'u Burundi". Yongeye ko yuko vyavuye "ku nyifato yerekanywe itubahirije intambo yubashwe cane y'Umurisho w'Ingoma z'Ikirundi, yigaragaje ku munsi wo kwugurura isabukuru Slam Buja Sans Tabou". Ngo muri iyo sabukuru "abavuzi b'ingomba barihaye uruhusha rwo kwiyereka bambaye 'tenue de ville (costume)' " ku bw'izo mpangu ngo Ubushikiranganji bujejwe ivy'ishirahamwe ry'akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, urwaruka, inkino hamwe n'umuco "buhagaritse ubu nyene ibikorwa vya Buja Sans Tabou". Haraciye imyaka irenga itandatu ingoma z'u Burundi zishizwe ku rutonde rw'umurage w'isi n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe umuco n'inyigisho, UNESCO. Abatunganije iyo sabukuru yagomba kumara iminsi itanu kuva ku tariki 7 gushika ku tariki 11 z'uku kwezi, ntaco barabivugako.

column2: Ibihugu vya Afrika vyumvikanye gukorera hamwe mu guhangana na coronavirus
column3: Mu gihe abahitanwa n'umugera wa coronavirus bagenda biyongera kw'isi, abashikiranganji bari bateranije i Addis-Abeba ku cicaro c'umuryango wa ibihugu vya Afrika bavuyeho bumvikanye  gukorera hamwe mu guhanahana amakuru be no gucungera uruja n'uruza. Gushika ubu, umuntu umwe gusa akomoka muri Misiri niwe amaze kumenyekana ko yanduye coronavirus ku mugabane wa Afrika, ariko na we nyene ubu yarakize. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, yaribukije abari bakoraniye i Addis-Abeba ati: "Ikituraje ishinga ni uko coronavirus itoshika mu bihugu atako vyifashe mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu". Ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe gukinga indwara kimenyesha ko ubu umugabane wa Afrika witeguye neza guhangana n'uwo mugera gusumba uko vyari bimeze haciye ukwezi. Muganga Tedros yanatangarije abari muri iyo nama ko John Nkengasong, arongoye ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara muri Afrika, hamwe na Samba Sow, arongoye ikigo kijejwe gukora imiti y'urukingo muri Mali, bagenywe nk'intumwa zidasanzwe mu kurwanya umugera coronavirus. Gushika ubu mu bihugu birenga 25 vya Afrika, hari abaganga barenga ibihumbi cumi bamaze kuronswa inyigisho, haratangwa n'ibikoresho vyo gupima, nayo ugucungera uruja n'uruza bikaba vyarakomejwe. Harashinzwe kandi n'umurwi w'abahinga karuhariwe muvyo ubuvuzi ujejwe gutabara mu buryo bwihuse cane mu gihe hogira umuntu amenyekana ko yanduye uwo mugera. Muganga Tedros yavue ko ishirahamwe OMS rifishe ishaka ryinshi ryo gukorana n'ibihugu vyose vya Afrika kugira ngo ibishoboka vyose bikorwe mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwo mugera ruhonyabantu.

column2: Umugore w'Umutalianokazi yikanguye amaze amezi 10 muri coma
column3: Umugore w'umutalianokazi yavuye muri  koma (coma)  inyuma y'amezi 10, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Cristina Rosi, w'imyaka 37, yari afise inda y'amezi indwi igihe yagira ikibazo c'umutima mu  kwezi nkw'indwi mu mwaka uheze. Umukobwa wiwe, Caterina, yavutse nyina abanje gukorwa (Caesarean). Ariko nyina yaciye aguma muri koma bikekwa ko  ubwonko bwari bwononekaye. Ubu yikanguye avuga ijambo ryiwe rya mbere, "Mamma", nk'uko umugabo wiwe yabivuze. Gabriele Succi yabwiye ikinyamakuru La Nazione ati: "Ntavyo twari twiteze, kari akanyamuneza vy'ukuri inyuma y'ayo marushwa." Madame  Rosi yimuriwe mu bitaro muri Autriche  mu kwezi kwa kane kugira  akurikiranwe mu buryo budasanzwe . Nyina n'umugabo wiwe bompi bari iruhande yiwe igihe yavuga. Amafaranga yo kuvurwa kwiwe yatanzwe n'urubuga rwo kwegeranya imitahe mito mito ariko itanzwe n'abantu benshi (crowdfunding) gushika ubu rumaze kuronka amadorari 208.000  yo kubandanya avurwa harimwo `n'ukugororwa ingingo z'umubiri (physiotherapie). Urubuga rwa internet rwa Arezzo Notizie ruvuga ko Succi yavuze ati "Cristina ubu biragoye kumumenya. "Arisanzuye gusumba, ubu baramukuyemwo umuringoti bari batobereye inzira mu muhogo kugira ashobore guhema (thracheostomy), ubu bacishije mw'ipompo bariko baramuha umuti uzotuma haba irindi terambere mu ngingo ziwe." Umukobwa wiwe nawe yaramaze amezi atari make mu  mu bitaro kubera ubukene bw'umwuka wa oxygene igihe yavuka.

column2: Ukraine: Kyiv irarahira ko itarota ihebera ubutaka Russia kugira habe amahoro
column3: Reta ya Ukraine ivuga ko itazokwemera amasezerano y'amahoro n'Uburusiya arimwo ivyo kubuhebera ubutaka. Iyi ngingo isa n'ukwihagararako kwa Ukraine ije inyuma y'umusi umwe Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky avuze ko inzira yonyene yo guhagarika iyi ntambara ari ibiganiro. Umuhanuzi w'umukuru w'iki gihugu Mykhaylo Podolyak avuga ko mu gihe Ukraine yogira ivyo iheba vyotuma Uburusiya bukora igitero gikomeye kandi cosesa amaraso menshi. Avuze aya majambo mu gihe Uburusiya bubandanya bugerageza kugota ingabo za Ukraine ziriko zirarwanira Severodonetsk mu buseruko. Mu yandi makuru, umukuru w'igihugu ca Pologne Andrzej Duda yabaye umutegetsi wa mbere mvamakungu ashikirije ijambo inama nshingamateka ya Ukraine amaso mu yandi. Yakomewe amashi menshi igihe yavuga ko abanya Ukraine bonyene ari bo bazokwihitiramwo kazoza kabo. Yongerako y'uko Pologne izokora ivyo ishoboye vyose mu gufasha Ukraine kwinjira mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji w'Ubufaransa ajejwe ibibazo vya Bulaya, Clément Beaune, yavuze ko bishobora gufata nk'imyaka "15 cane 20" kugira ngo Ukraine yemererwe nk'umunywanyi w'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya. Mu gihe intambara zibandanya, ibiro bikuru vy'igisirikare ca Ukraine bivuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko ziragerageza kumera uruhome rw'ingabo za Ukraine kugira ngo zishike ku mbibe z'intara ya Luhansk mu buseruko. Buramatari wa Luhansk, Serhiy Haidai, avuga ko Uburusiya bwagerageje kumenera muri Severodonetsk buciye mu mpande zine zitandukanye. Mu butumwa yacishije kuri Telegram, yavuze ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zagerageje bikazita ku w'amazi, ariko ko zibandanya zicucagira ibibombe mu turere turimwo imihana y'abantu. Yongerako y'uko ikiraro gifatanya iki gisagara n'ikindi cegeranye naco ca Lysychansk  cabomowe. BBC ntiyashoboye guhinyuza ivyo avuga. Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyo mu Burengero bisaba ko hoba amasezerano yo guhagarika intambara yotuma ingabo z'Uburusiya ziguma mu turere tumwe tumwe zimaze kwigarurira mu bumanuko no mu buseruko bwa Ukraine kuva Moscou iteye iki gihugu ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2). Ku wa kane w'indwi iheze, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubutaliyano, Mario Draghi yabwiye inama nkenguzamateka y'igihugu ko "hategerezwa kuba amasezerano yo guhagarika intambara vuba bishoboka". Ariko wa muvugizi wa Perezida Zelensky, Mykhaylo Podolyak, avuga ko iyo ngendo yogira ingaruka mbi. Ati: "Intambara ntizohagarara. Kazoba agahengwe k'umwanya muto. Bazoca batanguza ikindi gitero, mbere kizosesa amaraso menshi kandi gikomeye". Umunyamakuru wa BBC i Kyiv Joe Inwood avuga ko muri kino gihe Uburusiya na Ukraine bitarahuriza hagati ku vyo kimwe kimwe cose gishobora kwemera. Avuga ko mu gihe buri ruhande rukibona ko rugifise amahirwe yo kubandanya intambara, ibiganiro bisa n'ibidashoboka.

column2: South Korea: Kompanyi y'amata yasavye imbazi kubera yerekanye abagore nk'inka
column3: Kompanyi ya mbere nini y'amata muri Korea y'Epfo vyabaye ngombwa ko isaba imbabazi kubera video yo kwamamaza (publicité, advert) yerekana abagore nk'inka. Iyo video ya Seoul Milk yerekana umugabo ariko afata rwihishwa amashusho y'abagore bari mu murima, mu nyuma baca bahinduka inka. Imaze kunegurwa cane, iyo kompanyi yaciye ivana iyo publicité kuri YouTube, ariko kuva ico gihe imaze guhererekanywa cane inyuma yo gusubizwa  ku mbuga n'abakoresha internet. Bamwe bagereranije kandi inyifato y'uwo mugabo na "molka", ingeso itemewe yo gufata amashusho abantu rwihishwa. Ishami rya Seoul Milk, Seoul Dairy Cooperative ryavuze mu mbabazi ryashize kuri internet riti: "Turasavye imbabazi bivuye ku mutima ku muntu wese yababajwe n'iyo publicité y'amata yasohotse itariki 29 mu kwezi guheze". "Twemera ko iki kibazo gikomeye kandi tozokwisuzuma, hanyuma turushirizeho kwiyubara kugira ibintu nk'ibi ntibisubire gushika muri kazoza. Turicishije bugufi mu gusaba imbabazi". Iyo video itangura yerekana umugabo afise camera ariko yitembereza mu gahinga. Ijwi ry'umugabo ryumvikana rivuga ngo: "Amaherezo twashoboye kubafata amashusho na camera mu kibanza ciza cane". Aho haca hakurikira uwo mugabo yinyegeje mu bisaka, ariko afata amashusho rwihishwa umugwi w'abagore bariko baranywa amazi mu mugezi bongera bagira yoga. Hagera aho uwo mugabo ahonyora atabishaka kw'ishami ry'igiti, abo bagore bagaca bikanga buno nyene bagaca bahinduka inka. Iyo publicité irangizwa n'aya majambo: "Amazi meza, indya nziza, amata ya Seoul Milk ni  100%. Amata atagira akanenge, avuye mw'iraro ritagira akanenge mu murima uteye igomwe wa Cheongyang." Iyo publicité/advert yatumye haba impari zikomeye mu gihugu ku bijanye n'ivangura n'ibindi bibazo bishingiye ku bitsina ariko ibineguro ntivyagarukiye ku kwerekana abagore nk'inka gusa. Bamwe barerekanye amakenga yo kuba umugabo afata rwishishwa amashusho y'abagore, mu gihe ivyaha vyo gufata amashusho rwishishwa vyagwiriye cane muri Korea y'Epfo muri iyi myaka. Molka, bisigura "camera yinyegeje", ubu yabaye ikibazo kidasanzwe ku bagore muri Korea y'Epfo. Si ubwa mbere Seoul Milk ivugwa mu binyamakuru kubera imvo zitari nziza. Mu 2003, iyo kompanyi yatunganije agakino aho abanyamideri bari gusa basukanako ikivuguto   (yoghurt). Umukuru w'igisata co kwamamaza muri Seoul Milk hamwe n'abagize uruhara muri ako gakino baratangishijwe ihadabu kubera kwerekana ibiterasoni.

column2: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi ku w'Imana 28.08.2022
column3: Liverpool iramaze kwumvikana, ariko ku munwa gusa, n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Dortmund n'Ubwongereza Jude Bellingham kugira azoze gukinira uwo mugwi kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere. (Football Insider) Ajax isaba Manchester United kuriha imiliyoni 84.8 z'amapawundi kugira babahe umukinyi wo muri Brezil Antony w'imyaka 22.  (Mail) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham Sergio Reguilon w'imyaka 25 yimirije kuja muri Atletico Madrid kw'ideni, gusubirira umukinyi w'inyuma mu ruhande rw'ibubamfu, umunye Brezil Renan Lodi w'imyaka 24, yagiye gukinira Nottingham Forest. (Times - subscription required) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Slovakia, Martin Dubravka w'imyaka 33 yabwiye Newcastle ko ashaka gukura meza aje muri Manchester United. (Sky Sports) Liverpool iriko irakurikirana umukinyi wo hagati wa Wolves na Portugal, Ruben Neves w'imyaka 25, hamwe n'umukinyi wa RB Leipzig na Autriche, Konrad Laimer w'imyaka 25. (90min) Chelsea iriko iriyumvira kurangiza amasezerano y'umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubwongereza Ross Barkley ubu ahembwa amapawundi 200.000 ku ndwi. (Sun) West Ham iri mu biganiro n'uwahoze ari umukinyi wa Manchester United, Adnan Januzaj ngo imugarukane mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza. Uwo mubiligi w'imyaka 27 ashobora kuva mu mugwi wa Real Sociedad ata gisabwe. (Talksport) Brighton irashaka umukinyi wa Rosario Central na Argentine, Facundo Buonanotte w'imyaka 17, kandi iriteguye kuriha imiliyoni 3 z'amapawundi. Bournemouth barashaka gucako Leeds United mu muvuduko wo gutwara umukinyi w'imbere wa Zurich Italia, Willy Gnonto w'imyaka 18. (Football Insider)

column2: Abajejwe amagara mu Burundi bemeje ko abantu babiri banduye coronavirus
column3: Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara no kurwanya ikiza ca sida mu Burundi yatangaje ko mu gihugu ku nshuro ya mbere habonetse abantu banduye umugera corona. Umushikiranga Dr Thaddée Ndikumana yavuze ko abo banduye ari abantu babiri, u Burundi bukaba bwari mu bihugu bike bitari bwagaragaremwo uwanduye coronavirus. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu mugoroba wo ku wa kabiri, umushikiranganji Ndikumana amenyesha ko ari abagabo b'imyaka 56 na 42. Ngo binjiye mu Burundi bava mu Rwanda n'i Dubai, bose bakaba ari Abarundi. Amakuru y'uko hoba hari abanduye coronavirus mu Burundi yavugwa, hakaba mbere n'abagiriza leta kubinyegeza. Umuvugizi w'umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burundi yaheruka kubwira BBC ko u Burundi burinzwe n'Imana, ari yo mpamvu ico kiza kitari bwahashike. Ivyo vyatumye hari amashirahamwe yiyamiriza ingene u Burundi bufata ikibazo ca coronavirus, akavuga ko bugifata minenerwe. Gushika ubu mu Burundi nta mategeko abuza abantu gusohoka yari bwafatwe nk'uko biri mu bihugu bibanyi, kiretse gusa kubaha impanuro zo kugira isuku. Ingendo z'indege zarabujijwe ikiringo c'iminsi cumi n'ine, imbibe nazo zikaba zugaye ku ruja n'uruza rusanzwe. Gushika ubu Afrika niyo irangwamwo abanduye coronavirus bake ugereranije n'iyindi migabane, ariko abajejwe ivy'amagara ku rwego mpuzamakungu bavuga ko abandura n'abapfa kuri uwo mugabane bagenda bariyongera.

column2: Umunyamabanga w'ubudandaji wa Amerika Wilbur Ross avuga ko coronavirus izotuma ubuzi bwiyongera
column3: Umunyamabanga ajejwe ubudandaji wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Wilbur Ross, avuga ko ikiza ca coronavirus mu Bushinwa gishobora gutuma ubutunzi bwa Amerika bwiyongera. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na televiziyo imwe, Bwana Ross yavuze ati: "Ndibaza ko kizofasha mu kugarukana ubuzi bwinshi muri Amerika ya Ruguru". Ayo majambo yiyamirijwe bikomeye n'abanegura ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Donald Trump. Ikwirakwira ry'ico kiza ryatumye haba ubwoba ko ubutunzi bw'Ubushinwa bushobora kugira ibibazo. Yishura ku kibazo yari abajijwe na televiziyo Fox Business nimba ico kiza gishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwa Amerika, Bwana Ross yavuze ati: "Si nipfuza kuvuga ko ari intsinzi ntoya mfatiye ku ndwara nk'iyo ije guteza ibibazo, indwara mbi cane". "Ariko ikiriho ni uko ivyo bituma amakompanyi aronka ikindi kintu afatirako mu bikorwa vyayo n'aho akorera... Rero ndibaza ko ivyo bizotuma ubuzi bugaruka muri Amerika ya uguru". Mu nyuma niho ubunyamabanga bw'ubudandaji bwasubiramwo amajambo yiwe buti : "Nk'uko umunyamabanga Ross yabisiguye, igikorwa ca mbere ni ukurwanya uwo mugera no gufasha abawanduye". Umuvugizi wabwo ati: "Ariko kandi ni ngombwa kwihweza neza ibijanye no gukorana n'igihugu kimenyereye kunyegeza ibibazo bihanze abanyagihugu baco n'isi yose". Ayo majambo yiyamirijwe bikomeye n'umushingamateka w'umu Démocrate Don Beyer abona ko ari ugukina ku muvyimba abantu mu gushaka kwungukira ku kiza ruhonyanganda nk'ico. Eka n'abahinga muvyo ubutunzi baneguye ayo majambo ya Bwana Ross. Simon Baptist umuhinga muvyo ubutunzi wo mu gihugu ca Singapour yabwiye BBC ko yakubiswe n'inkuba yumvise amajambo ya Ross. Avuga ko uwo mugera ushobora kugira ingaruka mbi kuri Amerika aho kuzana akarusho. Ati: "Ikiriho ni uko Amerika izohahombera cane kuko n'aho bimeze uko bimaze, Amerika irashorera cane mu Bushinwa. Rero iyo ubutunzi bw'Ubushinwa bugize ibibazo bikomeye, bigira ingaruka mbi kuri Amerika". Ishami ry'ishirahamwe ONU ryitaho amagara kw'isi OMS ryatangaje ko isi iri mu bihe bidasanzwe kubera uwo mugera  ubandanya ukwiragira hanze y'Ubushinwa. Umaze guhitana abantu bashika 213 mu Bushinwa, mu gihe umaze gushika mu bindi bihugu 18. Abahinga muvyo ubutunzi bavuga ko Coronavirus ishobora kugira ingaruka mbi cane ku butunzi bw'isi gusumba ikiza ca SARS co mu mwaka 2002-2003. Ico kiza candukiye abantu barenga 8000, abarenga 700 nabo bahasiga ubuzima, bikaba vyasavye imiliyaridi zirenga 30 z'amadolari kugira kirwanywe. Muri kino gihe, uwu mugera coronavirus watumye amakompanyi mpuzamakungu akomeye harimwo ay'ubuhinga bwa none, ayakora n'ayagurisha imiduga ahagarika vy'agateganyo ibikorwa vyayo mu Bushinwa.

column2: Anglican ya UK yabujije umukobwa wa Desmond Tutu kuyobora ibirori vyo gushingura
column3: Ishengero rya Anglican ishami ry’Ubwongereza ryabujije umukobwa w’umuhisi Desmond Tutu kuyobora ibirori vyo guhamba kubera yubakanye n’umugore nka we. Mpho Tutu van Furth ni umupasitori mw’ishengero Anglican muri diyoseze ya Washington, akaba yari yasabwe kuyobora imisa yo guhamba uwari umuvyeyi wiwe w'ibatisimu, Martin Kenyon, ahitwa Shropshire mu Bwongereza ejo ku wa kane. Tutu van Furth yabwiye BBC ko kumwankira “bisa n’ubugome kandi bibabaje”. Diyoseze ya Hereford ivuga ko vyari "ibintu bitoroshe". Ishengero rya Anglican ishami ry’Ubwongereza (Church of England) ntiryemerera abavugabutumwa baryo ko barongorana n’abo basangiye ibitsina kuko inyigisho ritanga ari uko ukwubakana biba hagati y’umugabo n’umugore. Hagati aho, ishengero rya Anglican rigenzi ryaryo muri Amerika, rizwi nka Église épiscopalienne des États-Unis /The Episcopal Church, riremerera abavugabutumwa baryo kwubakana n’abo basangiye ibitsina. Itangazo rya Diyosezi ya Hanoford rivuga riti: "Hatanzwe impanuro hisunzwe aho inama y’Abepiskopi ihagaze ku bijanye n’abarongorana basangiye ibitsina”. Uwahoze ari musenyeri wa Liverpool, Paul Bayes asanzwe ari mu bahimiriza ko ishengero rihindura aho rihagaze ku bijanye n’igitsina, avuga ko “atari vyiza kuvuga ngo ibintu ntivyoroshe”. "Ni ngombwa ko vuba bwango kami ka muntu, umwitwarariko mu butumwa, hamwe n’urukundo, bihabwa ikibanza”. Umuryango wa Kenyon umaze kubwirwa iyi ngingo y’Urusengero, waciye wimura igisabisho co gusezera ikivana kw’isengero St Michael ikijana kuri All Angels ahitwa Wentnor, hafi y’ikigo ca Musenyeri, ahantu hazwi cane, hafi y’aho uyu muvugabutumwa aba kugira ngo umupfasoni Tutu van Furth ashobore guhagarikira iki gisabisho avuge n’ubutumwa. Tutu van Furth  yabwiye BBC ati: "Birababaje cane. Vyumvikana ko ari ingingo y’abategetsi ba ruburakigongwe." Kenyon yari incuti ya hafi cane n’uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru muri Afrika y’Epfo umuhisi Desmond Tutu. Tutu van Furth yategetswe guhagarika ivyo kuvuga ubutumwa nka pasitori muri Afrika y’Epfo inyuma y’aho yubakaniye n’umugore nkawe, Marceline van Furth, umwigisha wa kaminuza wo mu Buholande, mu 2015. Se wiwe Desmond Tutu - yitavye Imana muri Kigarama (12) 2021 - yaratsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel mu 1984 kubera  uruhara yagize mu kurwanya ya ntwaro y’ivangura ya apartheid muri Afrika y’Epfo. Nawe nyene yararwaniye uburenganzira bw’abahuza ibitsina babisangiye yongera ashigikira ukurongorana hagati y’abasangiye ibitsina. Mu 2013 yavuze ati: Nopfuma mpeba kuja mw’ijuru ryanka abatinganyi. Oya, novuga nti mbabarira, nshaka kuvuga ko nopfuma nja mu kindi kibanza. “Sinosenga Imana yanka abatinganyi kandi uku niko ndavyumva cane”. Yongeyeko ati: " Muri rino sekeza, mfise ishaka nk’iryo nari mfise mu kurwanya apartheid. Kuri jewe, bimeze co kimwe”.

column2: Ni ibiki Donald Trump yagiye avuga ku bijanye na Coronavirus?
column3: Perezida Donald Trump ni we mutegetsi akomeye kw'isi yanduye indwara ya Covid-19. Mw'ijoro ryo ku wa 01 z'uku kw'icumi, Perezida Trump yamenyesheje ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter ko we n'umugore wiwe Melania banduye. Iyi nkuru ije mu gihe gikomeye c'imyiyamamazo mu matora ategekanijwe ku itariki 3 z'ukwa 11, mu gihe kandi iki kiza karanda ca coronavirus kimaze guhitana Abanyamerika barenga 200,000, mu gihe abarenga miliyoni 7 banduye. Ibinyamakuru vya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bimenyesha ko uyu ari we mukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika agize ibibazo vy'amagara akiri ku butegetsi mu myaka mirongo iheze. Ivyagiye bitangazwa na Perezida Trump ku bijanye na coronavirus vyagiye bitera impari zikomeye, mbere akaba yaraneguwe cane ku kungene yavyifashemwo ku biraba iki kiza. Ng'ibi bimwe mu bikomeye yagiye aravuga kuri Covid-19: Ku wa 22 z'ukwa mbere, haciye iminsi ibiri gusa habonetse umuntu wa mbere yanduye coronavirus muri Amerika, Perezida Trump yahaye ikiganiro televiziyo CNBC yo muri Amerika, aho yafashe minenerwe Covid-19, avuga ko ata kibazo iteye ku gihugu. "Ibintu biri ku murongo. Ni umuntu umwe avuye mu Bushinwa, kandi ibintu turabifise mu minwe. Nta ngorane zizoba". Ku wa 27 z'ukwa kabiri, abantu bari banduye Covid-19 muri Amerika bari 25 gusa, ariko Trump yabwiye Abanyamerika ko ibintu vyategerezwa "kuba bibi imbere y'uko biba vyiza". Ico gihe, Trump yari agifise icizere ko uwu mugera ushobora kuranduranwa n'imizi. Mu nama mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu Maison Blanche/White House, Trump yavuze ati: "Izogenda amazimayongo. Ni umunsi umwe gusa, ni nk'igitangaro, izorangira". Ayo majambo yagumye ayasubiramwo mu ndwi nkeya zakurikiye, aho yavuga ko ibitigiri vy'abandura mu minsi mike vyariko "biregereza ubusa[zeru]". Mu kwa gatanu, Bwana Trump  yavuze ko kubona ibiharuro vy'abandura bigenda vyiyongera muri Amerika cari "ikimenyetso ciza". Mu nama nshikiranganji yerekanywe ku mboneshakure, yavuze ati: "Iyo tugize abantu benshi banduye, jewe si mbona ko iyo ari ingorane". "Jewe ingene ndabifata, ku ruhande rumwe, ndabifata ko ari ikintu ciza kuko vyerekana ko ubushobozi bwacu bwo gupima bukomeye cane". Yavuze ivyo yishimikije ibiharuro vyerekana ko ico gihe Amerika ari yo yari imaze gupima abantu benshi gusumba ibihugu vyose kw'isi, n'aho yaza inyuma mu bijanye n'urugero rw'abantu bari bamaze gupimwa ico gihe. Ku wa 22 z'ukw'indwi, Perezida Trump yavuze ko imyiyerekano yo muri rya sekeza Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara) mu bisagara bitari bike vya Amerika ari yo yabaye intandaro y'irwirirana rya Covid-19 mu gihugu. Ati: "Ibiharuro vy'abandura vyatanguye kwiyongera mu Banyamerika bakiri bato inyuma gato y'imyiyerekano, ari yo nk'uko mubizi neza, ariyo yatumye haba ukudebukirwa mu twigoro two kurwanya iki kiza mu gihugu". Mu gihe abahinga mu vy'amagara y'abantu bari bagize ubwoba ko iyi myiyerekano yari gutuma ibitigiri vy'abandura vyiyongera, ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko ata kivyemeza ko ibi ariko vyagenze. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'ibigo vya Kaminuza vya Harvard na Northwestern bwerekana ko iyi myiyerekano "yari ifise uruhara ruto cane rwose" mw'irwirirana ry'abanduye uwu mugera mu kwa gatandatu no mu kw'indwi. Uko iki kiza cagenda ciyongera muri Amerika, Perezida Trump yagenda yipimisha coronavirus iminsi yose. Abajijwe ibijanye n'uku kwipimisha kwa minsi yose, ku wa 21 z'ukwa gatanu yatanze inyishu nk'uko umengo ntaco bimubwiye. Imbere yuko yurira kajugujugu ari imbere ya Maison Blanche, yavuze ati: "Inyishu z'ibipimo ni vyiza cane". "Rero muri kino gitondo, ibipimo vyerekana ko nkomeye, si ko? Rero, ibipimo ni vyiza cane. Ni ukuvuga ko ata mugera nanduye". Mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abandura vyariko biraduga cane muri Amerika, Perezida Trump, ku wa 04 z'ukw'indwi, umunsi w'ukwikukira kwa Amerika, yavuze ko ibice 99% vy'abanduye Covid-19 muri Amerika "ata ngorane na ntoya bateye". Ati: "Ubu tumaze gupima abantu hafi imiliyoni 40. Twakoze gutyo, turerekana ibitigiri vy'abanduye, 99% muri vyo nta ngorane na ntoya biteye". Aya majambo yaciye yiyamirizwa ubwo nyene na Anthony Fauci, umukuru w'ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara zandukira mu gihugu (National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases), hamwe n'umuhinga wa leta yiwe mu bijanye na Covid-19. Muganga Fauci ati: "Ibi si ko bimeze na gato". Ikiganiro ca mbere hagati y'abahiganirwa ikibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu ku wa 29 z'ukw'icenda, caranzwe n'uguterana amajambo hagati ya Bwana Trump n'umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abademokarate, Joe Biden. Bimwe mu vyo yanegura, Perezida Trump yarifatiye mu gahanga Biden k'ukungene yitwararika cane ingingo zo kwirinda Covid-19. Ati: "Igihe cose uzomubona, azoba yambaye agapfukamunwa". "Ashobora kuba ariko avugira ku metero 60 uvuye ... ariko ukabona yambaye agapfukamunwa kanini bitari bwigere bibaho". Mu ntango, Perezida Trump yaranse kwambara agapfukamunwa n'aho yaba ari mu bibanza rusangi, akaba yatanguye kukambara ubwa mbere mu kw'indwi, mbere no ku wa 22 z'ukwa cenda akaba yaritavye ikoraniro ashikiriza n'ijambo ata gapfukamunwa yambaye. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Perezida Trump yarafashe minenerwe ivyo kwambara agapfukamunwa, n'aho abahinga bobo bavuga ibindi. Ubutumwa bwa Bwana Trump kuri Twitter amenyesha ko we n'umugore wiwe banduye Covid-19, bwaherekejwe n'ubundi butanga icizere mu gihe hari abari bafise amakenga ku magara yiwe. Ubwo butumwa buvuga buti: "Muri iri joro, ibipimo vyerekana ko @FLOTUS [Madamu wa Perezida, mu mfunyafunyo] na jewe twanduye COVID-19. Dutanguye igihe ca guma mu rugo ubu nyene. Ibi tuzobirengana TURI KUMWE TWESE!" Uyu mukuru w'igihugu w'imyaka 74, ari mu murwi w'abantu bafatwa n'abahinga ko babangamirwa cane, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara muri Amerika (Centre for Disease Control, CDC). Kugeza kw'itariki 30 z'ukw'icenda, Covid-19 yari imaze kwica Abanyamerika barenga 41,000 bafise hagati y'imyaka 65 na 74, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo CDC.

column2: Inama ya G7 yemeje integuro yo gusohora amafaranga kugira ihangane na China
column3: Abategetsi b'ibihugu bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bihurikiye mu citwa G7 bemeje integuro yo gufasha ibihugu bikenye n'ibiri mu nzira y'amajambere mu bikorwa vy'iterambere, ni mu ntumbero yo guhangana n'Ubushinwa. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko ashaka ko umugambi wo gufasha ibihugu bikenye ushigikiwe na Amerika, wiswe Build Back Better World (B3W), uba uwo ku rwego rwo hejuru ugasubirira umugambi nk'uwo w'Ubushinwa. Umugambi w'Ubushinwa uzwi nka Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), uramaze gufasha ibihugu bitari bike mu kubironsa amagari ya moshi, kwubaka amabarabara n'ibivuko. Ariko ni umugambi unegurwa cane, uvugwa ko winjije ibihugu mu madeni y'umurengera. Mw'itangazo basohoye inyuma y'inama yariko ibera mu karere ka Cornwall mu Bwongereza, abategetsi ba G7 bavuga ko bazoshira imbere ubucuti bushingiye ku "kwubahiriza indangagaciro, bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru hamwe no gukorera mu muco". Hagati aho, ntibatomora iyo amafaranga azova mu gushira mu ngiro uwu mugambi. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubudagi Angela Merkel avuga ko batari bwagere ku gihe co gusohora amafaranga. Amerika iranegura cane Ubushinwa ku nteguro yabwo y'ugukomeza igifatwa nk'imigenderanire "ishingiye ku madeni". Abategetsi ba G7, umurwi w'ibihugu indwi bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bivuga ko bishira imbere intwaro rusangi, bavuga kandi ko biyemeje gushiraho iyindi nteguro y'ingingo zo kurwanya ibindi biza bishobora kwiyadukiza muri kazoza. Muri izi ngingo harimwo kugabanya ikiringo co gukora no kwemeza incanco n'imiti yo kurwanya Covid-19 kikaja musi y'imisi ijana. Kuri uyu wa Mungu niho bategekanya gutangaza iyi nteguro, hampande y'itangazo rirangiza iyi nama barimwo. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson niwe arongoye iyi nama y'imisi itatu iriko ibera mu karere ka Carbis Bay. Ni ibiki ibihugu vy'uburengero bw'isi vyoba bimaze gukorera Ubushinwa gushika ubu ? Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Amerika, Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Ubwongereza hamwe na Canada vyafatiye ibihano Ubushinwa. Ibi bihano vyafatiwe abategetsi bo hejuru mu ntara ya Xinjiang bagirizwa ihonyanga ry'agateka ka zina muntu bakorera aba Islam  bo mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur, muri vyo hakaba harimwo ukubuza ingendo muri ivyo bihugu hamwe no gufata amatungo yabo. Abantu barenga umuriyoni bo  mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur z'izindi nkehwa nibo bazwi ko bapfungiwe mu makambi ari muyi iyo ntara yo mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'Ubushinwa. Reta y'Ubushinwa yagirizwa gutera ubugumba abagore b'aba Uyghur no gusambura imiryango, mu gutandukanya abana n'abavyeyi babo. Itohoza ryakozwe na BBC ryashizwe ahabona mu kwa kabiri ririmwo amakuru yemeza ivyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina hamwe n'iyicarubozo bikorerwa abapfungiwe muri ayo makambi. Ubushinwa bwaciye bwihora mu gufatira ibihano abategetsi b'aba nya Burayi.

column2: Ubutunzi bwa Afghanistani buteye ahatemba
column3: Ku musi wa kabiri, itariki 23 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), hari hakwiye imisi 100 kuva abatalibani bagarutse ku butegetsi muri Afghanistani. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC, Yalda Hakim yaragendeye akarere ka Kabul, kurondera inkuru yerekeye ubutunzi bwagabanutse kuva imfashanyo y’amakungu ihagaritswe, bituma haba akaga ku bantu.

column2: Burundi-Covid: Prezida yasavye abanyeshure bose kwipimisha imbere yo gusubira mu mashure
column3: Abanyeshure bose biga mu bigo vy'amashure y'uburaro mu Burundi kuva kuri uyu wa gatanu baripimisha coronavirus  mu mwiteguro wo gusubira ku mashure ku wa mbere, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'ubushikiranganji bujejjwe amagara y'abantu. Iryo sekeza ryerekeye abanyeshure bashika 30.000, abigisha babo n'abasanzwe babakurikirana mu buraro (encadreurs). Umwe wese muri abo ''azotegerezwa kuba afise  urupapuro rwerekana ko yipimishije'' imbere yo kwinjira mu kigo c'ishure ku wa mbere, nk'uko bivugwa n'umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu, Thadee Ndikumana. Iyo ngingo yatangajwe  inyuma y'aho bisabiwe n'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi  Evariste Ndayishimiye. Prezida Evaritse Ndayishimiye yabivugiye mw'ikoraniro ryahuje urwaruka 1500 ruva mu ntara zose z'u Burundi kugira ruvugane ikibazo c'ukurwanya ubukene. Kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka, abandura coronavírus bariyongeye mu Burundi inyuma y'umwaka umwe iyo ndwara ivuzwe muri ico gihugu. Abitavye iryo koraniro bamwe bagaragara mu mafoto bafise  udufukamunwa n'ubwo hari abatwambaye mw'izosi,  ariko hari n'abatatwambaye. Prezida w'Uburundi yabwiye abitavye ikoraniro ati: ''Ndasavye y'uko mu gusubira mu mashure yanyu mwese mwogenda mwipimishije kugira mumenye ko mufise amagara meza kugira ntimuzoshike mwanduza abandi". Umukuru w'u Burundi  yavuze ko ashaka kwirinda ivyashitse igihe c'inyuma y'uburuhuko bwa Noel. Yagize ati: "Mwarabonye mu kiruhuko ca Noweli ingene vyabagendeye. Benshi bagiye banduye bashika banduza abandi babana mu mashure." Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko yamaze kubwira umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu  gutegura isekeza ryo gupima abanyeshure bose b'amashure yisumbuye imbere y'uko basubira ku mashure. Amashure mu Burundi azokwugurura icese ku wa mbere 12/4/2021 inyuma y'uburuhuko bwa Pasika. Ingingo zo kwirinda zimwe zubahirizwa nabi nabi Mu ntango z'uwu mwaka, abandura umugera wa coronavírus bariyongeye cane mu Burundi ugereranije n'imbere yaho bituma igihugu gikaza ingingo zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera. Gushika ubu winjira mu Burundi ari uko ugiye n'indege gusa, ariko iminsi yo gushika ushirwa ukwa wenyene mw'ihoteri iherutse kugabanywa iva kuri ndwi ishirwa kuri ine gusa. Izindi ngingo nko kwambara agafukamunwa  canke kwirinda kwegerana zubahirizwa nabi nabi. Gushika ubu kandi reta y'u Burundi nta gahunda ifise yo guha incanco za coronavírus abanyagihugu. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu yatangaje ko reta y'u Burundi yahisemwo kuba  irarindiriye, ivuga ko incanco ziriko zirakoreshwa gushika ubu  zitaremezwa burundu ko ata ngaruka mbi zishobora gutera ku magara y'abazihawe. Ku biharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, mu  Burundi abamaze kwandura umugera wa corona ni ibihumbi 3.017 na 6 gusa umaze kwica. Abamaze kwandura no gupfa bashobora kuba barenga aho cane kuko  hatangazwa ibitgiri vy'abaciye  mu bigo vyo gupima canke kuvura bizwi icese.

column2: 'Igituririre ni cinshi muri Afrika y'Epfo' - Akanama ka Zondo
column3: Inyuma y'icegeranyo gishira ahagaragara ubusuma bw'ama miriyaridi y'amadolari mu kigega ca reta ya Afrika y'epfo ku ntwaro y'uwamubanjirije, prezida Cyril Ramaphosa yariyemeje ko "ivyo bitazosubira kuba ." Ariko abanye Afrika y'epfo ntibemera ko hari icigwa bakuyemwo. Barababajwe no kuba amahera yibwe yari gukoreshwa mu bisata vy'amagara y'abantu n'uburezi muri ico gihugu. Ayo matohoza akomeye ku giturire co ku ntwaro ya prezida Jacob Zuma yerekanye ingene nk'ibisata vyose vya reta vyanigiwe mu menshi, birononwa n'abategetsi ba ANC  (African National Congress), uri ku butegetsi kuva mu 1994 harangiye intwaro y'abazungu bari ku rushi. Iki cegeranyo cagiriza ahanini uwo mugambwe. Prezida Ramaphosa ubwiwe yabwiwe n'ako kanama karongowe n'umucamanza, ko atakoze ibikwiye mu gukumira ubwo busuma igihe yari icegera ca Zuma. Impapuro zirenga 5.000, akanama Zondo - kiswe izina ry'umucamanza wo mu rwego rwo hejuru akarongoye - karerekana ido n'ido ry'ingene ubutunzi bwa reta bwibwe. Kiranerekana ingene abagwizatunga bavukana bo mu muryango wa Gupta, bagerageje kugira uruhara mu ngingo za politike n'ubutunzi mu ntumbero yiswe  "kwigarurira reta". Zuma yirukanywe ku butegetsi mu 2018 yagirizwa igiturire caguma congerekana, hanyuma Ramaphosa aca afata ubutegetsi yiyemeje guhanagura ivyo vyose. Igice ca nyuma c'ico cegeranyo c'akanama ka Zondo cashikirijwe ku musi wa gatatu. Prezida akaba yavuze ko ivyo babonye ari "iceyi kuri demokrasi yacu kandi vyahonyanze uburenganzira bw'abanye Afrika y'Epfo bose." Ariko bimwe muvyo ico cegeranyo casozerereyeko ni gusigira ibibazo prezida ahari ubu ategerezwa kwishura vyerekeye impamvu vyabaye arorera. Ico cegeranyo kigira kiti: "Hari inkuru nyinshi zifise ifatiro zamenyekanye (...) zashobora kumutuma agira amatohoza akanafata n'ingingo kuri bimwe bivugwa bikomeye. "Nk'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, yari afise ububasha bwo kubikora." Mu ntango ayo matohoza yategerezwa kuba mu misi 180, ariko ukurengukisha abantu vyatwaye imisi 400 aho ivyabona 300 vyabajijwe. Ico gikorwa cose catwaye imyaka ine. Ivyemezo vyarerekanye ingene abategetsi ba ANC, harimwo abashikiranganji b'ubu n'abakera bagiye canke bafashije mu busuma  vyatumye igihugu gihomba amahera menshi. Muri ivyo harimwo kubuza gukora igisata kijejwe gutoza amakori mu gihugu, gupfukama mu nda ishirahamwe ry'indege South Africa Airways, kwiba amahera mu gisata kijejwe ingendo za gariyamoshi muri ico gihugu no mu kwivanga mu biraba ikinyamakuru ca reta, SABC. Igisata kijejwe iperereza na co nyene caragabanuwe inguvu mu kugena abakozi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru babujije ko haba amatohoza babisabwe na Zuma n'abandi bantu bifatwa ko bamwegereye.
