column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa gatatu: Ramsey, Pogba, Gerrard, Coutinho, Rodgers, Kounde, Bowen
column3: Everton na Newcastle United iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus, umunya Pays de Galles/Wales Aaron Ramsey, 30. (Goal) Manchester United iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umufaransa Paul Pogba, 28, mu kadirisha ko kugura no kugurisha abakinyi ko mu kwa mbere, imbere y'uko amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi arangira mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka w'inkino. (Star) Aston Villa izotegerezwa guha umurwi Rangers imiriyoni 2.7 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu gihe uyo murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League wofata ingingo yo kugena Steven Gerrard nk'umumenyereza. (Express) Umumenyereza mushasha wa Newcastle United Eddie Howe ariko ararondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Atletico Madrid, umwongereza Kieran Trippier, 31, ikaba umukeneye mu kwa mbere. (Express) Abakinyi bakomakomeye ba Barcelona babandanya kutishimira umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umunya Bresil Philippe Coutinho, 29, bakamwagiriza ko atagishaka gukina, ni mu gihe hari ibihuha ko ashobora kwigira muri Newcastle United. (Star) Umumenyereza wa Leicester City Brendan Rodgers niwe ahabwa amahirwe menshi yo gushobora gusubirira Ole Gunnar Solskjaer nk'umumenyereza wa Manchester United. (Eurosport) Manchester United irafise icizere ko izoshobora gukubita hasi Chelsea mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma, umufaransa Jules Kounde, 22, asanzwe akinira Sevilla. (AS via Express) Liverpool iripfuza umukinyi wo ku ruhande rw'i buryo wa  West Ham umwongereza Jarrod Bowen, 24, ariko nta mugambi ifise wo kumugura mu kwa mbere. (Mirror) Newcastle United ishobora kuronka umusatirizi w'umufaransa Ousmane Dembele, 24, ata rufaranga na rumwe itanze mu gihe yokwanka gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha na Barcelona. (Express) Ariko Barcelona iriteguye kugiriranira ayandi masezerano na Dembele ariko bikavana n'umwanya ashobora kumara mu kibuga. (Sport) Umumenyereza wa Genoa Andriy Shevchenko aripfuza kugura umusatirizi wa Chelsea umunyamerika Christian Pulisic, 23. (Secolo XIX - in Italian) Victor Font yahoze arongoye Barcelona avuga ko uyu murwi ukwiye kuzogarukana wa musatirizi wa Argentina Lionel Messi, 34, mu igihe amasezerano afitaniye na Paris St-Germain azoba arangiye. (Marca) West Ham ishobora kwankira imirwi iyo ari yo yose yoza irondera umukinyi wo hagati, umwongereza Declan Rice ashobora no kugurwa imiriyoni zirenga 130 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, kuko ishaka kwiyubaka ishingiye kuri uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 22.  (Sun) Utwigoro twa Arsenal two kurondera umusatirizi wa Fiorentina Dusan Vlahovic, 21, twigonze ku rukuta inyuma y'aho abaserukizi b'uyu munya Serbia bankiye ibiganiro.  (Mail) Newcastle yatanguye ibiganiro n'abaserukizi b'umudagi  Niklas Sule 26 akina inyuma mu murwi Bayern Munich. (Newcastle World) Umurwi wo mu Budagi Borussia Monchengladbach uriko urihweza ingene mu kwa mbere yoronka umusatirizi wa Arsenal Eddie Nketiah, 22. (Sun) Giovanni Simeone, umuhungu w'umumenyereza wa Atletico Madrid Diego Simeone, ni we aza ubwa mbere ku rutonde rw'abasatirizi baronderwa na West Ham. Uyu munya Argentina w'imyaka 26 akina mu murwi nserukiragihugu ubu asanzwe akina muri Verona, umurwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano, aho yatijijwe avuye muri Cagliari. (Express)

column2: US iriko izibira Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, umunyafrika wa mbere kurongora WTO
column3: Igenwa ry'uwahoze ari umushikiranganji w'ikigega wa Nijeriya kurongora  ishirahamwe rijejwe ubudandaji kw'isi, OMC/WTO, rishobora kuburizwamwo inyuma y'aho Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zankiye iki cemezo. Ejo ku wa gatatu, umurwi ujejwe kugena abashaka kurongora iri shirahamwe wasavye ibihugu 164 bihurikiye muri iri shirahamwe gushigikira umupfasoni Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala. Yoba abaye umugore wa mbere kandi umunyafrika wa mbere arongoye WTO. Ariko Amerika isanzwe inegura imikorere ya WTO mu budandaji mpuzamakungu, ishaka ko iri shirahamwe rirongorwa n'uwundi mugore, umunya Koreya y'Ubumanuko, Yoo Myung-hee, ivuga ko yozana impunduka muri iri shirahamwe. Umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala avuga ko "ari iteka rinini cane" kuri we kubona yizigirwa. Ariko iki gikorwa kimaze amezi ane yose co kugena uwushobora kurongora WTO cahuye n'inzitizi zikomeye igihe Amerika ivugiye ko izobandanya ishigikira uyu mushikiranganji w'ubudandaji wa Koreya y'Ubumanuko. Mw'itangazo rinegura WTO, ibiro vya Amerika bijejwe ubudandaji, ari navyo bihanura Perezida Donald Trump ku bijanye na politike y'ubudandaji, bivuga ko iri shirahamwe "ritegerezwa kurongorwa n'umuntu nyawe afise uburambwe muri kino gisata". Umupfasoni Yoo afise "ubuhinga yisangije" nk'inzobere mu bijanye n'ubudandaji kandi "afise ubumenyi bukwiye bwo kurongora neza iri hirahamwe" nk'uko tubisoma muri iryo tangazo. Ryongerako riti: "Iki ni igihe kigoye kuri WTO n'ubudandaji mpuzamakungu. Mu myaka 25 yose iheze nta biganiro vyigeze bihaba ku bijanye n'ibiciro, integuro yo gukemura ibibazo nta kigenda, hanyuma kandi ibihugu bike cane biri muri iri shirahamwe nivyo vyashoboye gukurikiza ingingo shingiro zijanye no gukorera mu muco. WTO irakeneye cane rwose impinduka". Hagati aho, muri iri tangazo, nta na hamwe harimwo izina ry'uyu mupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala. Mu gatondo k'ejo ku wa gatatu, inyuma y'umubonano w'intumwa za WTO  wo guhanahana ivyiyumviro ku bijanye n'iri genwa, umuvugizi waryo Keith Rockwell yavuze ko igihugu kimwe gusa ari co kitashigikiye umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala. Ati: "Uno munsi, intumwa zose zashigikiye cane rwose ingene igikorwa cagenze ...n'ivyakivuyemwo. Kiretse iz'igihugu kimwe". 'Igikorwa kidasanzwe' Bwana Trump avuga ko WTO ari "akaga" kandi ko yegamiye ku ruhande  rw'Ubushinwa, ni mu gihe hari bamwe bari bagenywe muri iri shirahamwe bamaze guhagarikwa. WTO yaciye itumako iyindi nama ku wa 09 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe - inyuma y'amatora ya Amerika - kugira ngo basubire bahanahane ivyiyumviro kuri iki kibazo. Kubona Amerika yanka igenwa ry'uyu munya Nijeriya si ukuvuga ko adashobora kugenwa, ariko Washington ishobora kugira uruhara rukomeye mu gufata icemezo ntabanduka. Bwana Rockwell yabwiye abanyamakuru ko hashobora gusabwa igikorwa kidasanzwe kugira ngo igenwa ry'uyu mupfasoni  Okonjo-Iweala rishigikirwe na bose. Gushika ubu, arashigikiwe n'umuryango w'ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Bulaya. Iri shirahamwe ryatakaje uburongozi bwaryo igihe uwari arirongoye Roberto Azevedo  atangiye imihoho mu kw'umunani kw'umwaka uheze. Kuva ico gihe, ivyegera bine nibo bafise ibintu mu minwe. Umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala w'imyaka 66 niwe mupfasoni wa mbere yabaye umushikiranganji w'ubutunzi hamwe n'uw'imigenderanire wa Nijeriya kandi akaba yaramaze imyaka 25 yose ajejwe ibibazo vy'iterambere mw'Ibanki y'isi yose. Muri kino gihe, ari mu barongoye urubuga rwa Twitter, akaba arongoye ihuriro rya GAVI rijejwe incanco, kandi akaba n'intumwa idasanzwe y'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO mu rugamba rwo kurwanya Covid-19. Mu gihe umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala yogenwa, azoba afise igikorwa kidasanzwe. WTO isanzwe ihanganye n'ikibazo c'ibiganiro vy'ubucuruzi vyahagaze hamwe n'icuka kibi hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, yavuze ko uburambe bunini afise mu mu guhindura imikorere bwamutumye aboneka ko ari we nyawe ashoboye gufasha WTO kusubira ku murongo.

column2: Africa-Covid: Amerika yemeye kwongera miriyoni 17 z'incanco
column3: Reta Zunzwe Ubumwe za Amerika ziyemeje guha Afrika izindi miriyoni 17 z'incanco za Covid-19 , mu gihe uwo mugabane gushika ubu uri inyuma y'iyindi kw'isi mu gucandaga abawubamwo. Izo ncanco zizotangwa biciye kw'ishirahamwe rya Afrika, Union Africaine/African Union. Ivyo vyamenyeshejwe n'umukuru wa Amerika ku wa kane ahejeje kubonana n'umukuru wa Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta. Uwo mubonano wabereye ku biro vy'umukuru wa Amerika, White House, wari wo wa mbere Joe Biden ahaye umukuru w'igihugu wo muri Afrika kuva aho abereye Prezida wa Amerika. Gushika ubu abantu badashika 4% ku mugabane wa Afrika nibo bamaze kuronka incanco zikwiye za Covid -19  bivanye no gukeherwa, kutihutira kuziteza canke kubera uburyo bugoye bwo kuzishikana  ku banyagihugu, na cane mu bihugu biherutse kuva mu ntambara. Prezida Biden yavuze ko izo ncanco za Jonhson & Johnson umuntu aterwa rimwe gusa zizoca zitangwa ubwo nyene cane cane mu bihugu vya Afrika  vyakehewe. Yaniyemeje kandi  gufasha kugira incanco zikorerwe muri Africka. Gushika ubu Amerika imaze kwemera gutanga incanco zingana na miriyoni 500 kw'isi yose. Hagati aho Prezida Biden na Kenyatta bavuze ko bazofashanya mu gutorera inyishu intambara yo muri Tigray mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia aho abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi babayeho nko mu  mapfa nayo abaharurwa muri za miriyoni bakaba bari mu kaga ko kuronswa imfasanyo. Kenya muri iki gihe niyo irongoye inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kw'isi. Reta ya Biden yagabishije gufatira ibihano bikomeye reta ya Ethiopia, mu gihe ahubwo ingabo za reta y'ico gihugu  ziherutse kugaba igitero gishasha muri iyo ntara ya Tigray iri mu buraruko.

column2: USA: Ibiciro vy’igitoro vyakorotse ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka yaho
column3: Igiciro c'ibitoro muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika cakorotse cane ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka y'ico gihugu. Ivyo bituma abahingura ico gitoro biba ngombwa ko babanza kuriha abakirangura kugira ngo bakibakureko, ku gutinya ko mu kwa gatanu bashobora kubura n'aho bagishira. Abagura igitoro baragabanutse rwose mu gihe ingingo zo kuguma  murugo ahatandukanye kw'isi yose zatumye abantu baguma biyugaranye. Vyatumye amahinguriro y'igitoro akodesha amatanki kugira ngo bashobore kubika ibitoro vy'umurengera, ibiciro mu gihugu cose bikoroka. Igiciro c'akagunguru muri West Texas Intermediate (WTI), ishingiro ry'igitoro ca Amerika, caramanutse kija musi y'amadorari 37.63 ku kagunguru. Stewart Glickman, umushakashatsi wo mu kigo ca Amerika Center for Financial Research and Analysis (CEFRA) kijejwe kwihweza ibijanye n'amafaranga avuga ati: "Ibiriko biraba birarengeye ubwenge. Igabanuka ry'abakiriya ryararengeye ivyo abantu bashobora kuba bari biteze". Avuga ko mu gihe izi ngingo za Guma murugo zobandanya uko ziri bishobora gutuma ibiciro vy'igitoro no mu kwa gatandatu bibandanya bikoroka. Ati: "Ni ukuri nta cizere mfise ko ibintu bishobora kworoha ku makompanyi adandaza igitoro canke ku biciro vyaco". Igisata c'igitoro kiri mu ngorane z'uko abagishaka bagabanutse kubera coronavirus hamwe n'ukutumvikana hagati y'ibihugu bisanzwe bicimbura. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, ishirahamwe OPEP/ OPEC rihuza ibihugu vyimbura igitoro hamwe n'ibihugu bicuditse vyarahavuye birashika ku masezerano yo kugabanya urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa gushika hafi 10%. Muri ayo masezerano bumvikanye ko urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa rugabanywa ku buryo butari bwigere bubaho. Hagati aho, abahinga babona ko iryo gabanywa ata kintu kinini rizohindura. Stephen Innes ajejwe ubudandaji mu kigo Axicorp avuga ati: "Ntivyafashe umwanya muremure kugira ngo abadandaza igitoro babone ko amasezerano yashitsweko na OPEP/ OPEC - uravye ingene ameze ubu - atazoshobora gutuma  isoko y'igitoro isubira ku murongo". Ku bashoferi ba Amerika, ikoroka ry'ibiciro vy'igitoro - vyamanutse hafi ku bice 2/3  kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka - ryaragize ingaruka ku giciro co kw'ipompo, n'aho ejo ku wa mbere  bitakorotse uko vyari vyitezwe. Glickman ati: "Ikiriho ni uko, n'aho woba ukeneye kuja mw'ibarabara kubera imvo iyi canke iriya, ukenera igitoro gike cane gusumba uko vyari bimeze mu mezi ane aheze". "Ingorane nyamukuru kuri benshi muri twebwe ni uko n'aho wocuzuza, uzoja he?". Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika avuga ko leta ishobora kugura igitoro gihingurwa muri ico gihugu. Ariko amakenga ahari ni uko ububiko bwaco bushobora kurengerwa, mu gihe ububiko bw'ikompanyi Cushing, ikompanyi nkuru itanga igitoro muri Amerika, bwarengewe gushika ku bice 50% kuva mu kwa gatatu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibanki ANZ.

column2: Korea ya Ruguru igabisha Amerika ko izofata ‘ingingo ruhasha’ ku myimenyerezo rusangi itanguye
column3: Na Yvette Tan BBC News Korea ya Ruguru iragabisha Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ko izofata “ingingo ruhasha” mu gihe zitohagarika imyimenyerezo rusangi ya gisirikare na Korea y’Epfo. Ejo ku wa mbere, Amerika na Korea y’Epfo vyatanguye imwe mu myimenyerezo rusangi ikomeye y’igisirikare kirwanira mu kirere itegekanijwe kurangira ku wa gatanu. Korea ya Ruguru iherutse kandi gutera ibisasu vya misire mu ndwi ziheze mu myimenyerezo nk’iyo itari mike. Ibi bije bikurikira amakuru ava mw’igendereza yerekana ko Pyongyang iriko itegura igerageza ry’ikirwanisho ca nikleyeri ca mbere kuva mu 2017. Itangazo ry’ubushikiranganji bwa Korea ya Ruguru bujejwe imigenderanire rivuga riti: "Mu gihe Amerika yobandanya n’aka gasotoro kabi ka gisirikare, [Korea ya Ruguru] izofata ingingo zindi zikomeye”. "Nimba [Amerika] idashaka ikintu gikomeye kibi ku mutekano wayo, ikwiye guhagarika imyimenyerezo y’intambara ataco imaze ata n’akamaro kayo vuba bwango. Atari uko, niyo izobazwa ibizoshika vyose”. Imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare ya kino gihe yiswe Vigilant Storm (twogereranya mu Kirundi na ‘Igihuhusi kiri maso’), irimwo amajana n’amajana y’indege zikora ibitero vyo gusamaza amasaha 24 kuri 24. Mu ntango z’ukwa cumi, Washington yarungitse ubwato bwa nikleyeri bwikorera indege  USS Ronald Reagan, hafi y’ikigwa ca Korea, ikintu abatari bake babona ko ari ukugabisha Korea ya Ruguru -  ubwo bwato bukaba bwaragize uruhara mu myimenyerezo itari mike yo mu mazi. Seoul (umugwa mukuru wa Korea y’Epfo) ivuga ko irungikwa ry’ibi birwanisho “ridakunze kuba” ryerekanye ko “urunani rwa Korea y’Epfo na Amerika rwiteguye kwivuna bikomeye ku gasotoro ako ari ko kose kova muri Korea ya Ruguru”. Ubu bwato muri kino gihe buri mu bikorwa vy’imyimenyerezo y’indege mu kiyaga Philippine. Mu kw’icumi, Pyongyang (umugwa mukuru wa Korea ya Ruguru) yatangaje ko ibisasu vyayo yarashe kwari “ukwigana” igitero ca nikleyeri kuri Korea y’Epfo. Ivuga ko yiganye neza ibitero bishobora gukorwa ku birindiro vya gisirikare, ibivuko n’ibibuga vy’indege vya Korea y’Epfo, kandi ko ibisasu vya misire vyatewe vyikorera ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri. Mu kw’icenda, indongozi ya Korea ya Ruguru Kim Jong-un yatangaje ko igihugu ciwe ari igihugu ca nikleyeri “mu buryo ntasubira inyuma”, aca ahindura amategeko, kugira agihe uburenganzira bwo gukoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri mu ntumbero yo kuzibira. Poritike ya kare yari iyo gukoresha ibi birwanisho mu kwivuna igitero. Korea yarongereje kandi akariro mw’igerageza ry’ibisasu vya misire muri uno mwaka, aho vyageragejwe incuro zirenga 40 gushika ubu, iki kikaba ari co gitigiri kinini gushika ubu. N’aho yafatiwe ibihano biyiboheye amaboko i mugongo, Pyongyang yaragerageje ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri incuro zitandatu hagati ya 2006 na 2017.

column2: Burundi: Abakozi b'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi bagabisha ko bagiye guhagarika akazi
column3: Sendika y'abakozi ba Brarudi, SYLITRAB, itangaza ko igiye guhagarika akazi inyuma y'iminsi itandatu kuva ejo ku wa kane, mu gihe ibibazo bashikirije umukuru w'iryo hinguriro ry'inzoga bitoba biratorerwa umuti, nk'uko biri mu rwandiko bamwandikiye. Dieudonné Nizigiyimana arongoye iyo sendika yabwiye BBC ko ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi ritwawe nabi cane, bakagiriza umukuru waryo ko aho gushira imbere ibiganiro ashima ahubwo gufatira ingingo abamukebura. Mu minsi iheze, Brarudi yaragirijwe ko ibinyobwa isigaye ikora vyataye akanovera, mu gihe hari ibinyobwa bikundwa mu Burundi vyigeze gukena. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Dieudonné Nizigiyimana yagiriza umukuru w'iryo hinguriro amakosa atari make, ivyo navyo ngo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku bakozi no kuvyo risanzwe rikora. Mu makosa ashirwa imbere, Bwana Nizigiyimana avuga ko harimwo ko iryo hinguriro risigaye rirangwamwo ubusuma cane cane bukorwa n'abakozi b'abacangero (Sous-traitants), kugabanya imishahara y'abakozi, kwirukana abakozi,  gutanga akazi ku kimenyane n'ibindi. Avuga ko umukuru w'iryo hinguriro aterekwa ibiganiro asabwa n'abakozi kugira ngo bigire hamwe ingene ingorane zihanze Brarudi zotorerwa umuti, ahubwo ko aca yihutira gufatira ingingo bamwe mu babaserukira mu ntumbero yo kubatera ubwoba. Bwana Nizigiyimana ati: "Abakozi babicishije ku basanzwe barongoye sendika yabo barazishikirije umukoresha kugira ngo hagire ikintu cohinduka, ariko wewe ntiyashatse kubumviriza , ahubwo yaciye yigizayo abaserukira abakozi kugira ngo yibandanirize imigambi yiwe igayitse atacamira". BBC yagerageje kuvugana na Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Brarudi kugira agire ico ashikirije kuri ivyo bivugwa na sendika y'abakozi bayo ariko akaba yamenyesheje ko ataco bafise babivugako. Hagati aho, uburongozi bw'iryo hinguriro bwasohoye itangazo inyuma y'urwo rwandiko rwa sendika y'abakozi baryo, aho buvuga ko bwubaba uburenganzira bw'abakozi bwo guhagarika akazi mu gihe cose amategeko azoba yakurikijwe. Abarongoye Brarudi bamenyesha ariko y'uko amasezerano bafitaniye n'abakozi bazoba bahagaritse akazi azoca ahagarikwa muri ico gihe batazoba bari ku kazi, kandi ko ata n'imishahara n'utundi turusho bahabwa n'akazi bazoronswa. Mu kwezi kw'icumi umwaka uheze, mushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, amahinguriro n'ingenzi yaragabishije Brarudi ko mu gihugu hari imyidogo yavuga ko ibinyobwa bihingurwa n'iryo hinguriro vyatakaje akanovera, anarikebura ko ryokwikubita agashi rigakora ibinyobwa bitonona amagara y'abavyihereza. Ku ruhande rwaryo, Brarudi yarahumurije abanyagihugu, aho yamenyesheje ko amashiramamwe HEINEKEN na Coca-Cola akorana naryo, yama akora ivyigwa kugira ngo arabe ko inzoga zihingurwa zikwije ibisabwa kandi ko n'ibikoresho vyayo bimeze neza.

column2: Gloria Estefan avuga ko yakorewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina afise imyaka icenda
column3: Umuririmvyi Gloria Estefan yanyeguruye ko yahohotewe bishingiye ku gitsina n'umuntu wo mu muryango igihe yari afise imyaka icenda. Uwo muririmvyi w'amamamuko ya Cuba na Amerika  w'imyaka 64 avuga ko yashurashujwe ari kw'ishure ry'umuziki n'umuntu nyina yizera. Yavuze ko "93% y'abana  bahohoterwa bazi kandi baba bizeye ababibakorera. Kandi ivyo ndabizi kuko nari umwe muri abo." Yavuze kuri iryo hohoterwa ubwa mbere mu kiganiro co kuri Facebook Watch  ari kumwe n'umukobwa wiwe akuze n'umukobwa w'uwo bavukana. Clare Crawley azwi mu biganiro vyo kuri television nawe nyene yagaragaye mu kiganiro Red Table Talk: The Estefans, nawe avuga ingene yashurashujwe n'umupatiri. Madame Crawley yavuze ko yashurashujwe "n'umujenama'' igihe yiga kw'ishure rya Katolika. Madame Estefan yamubwiye ati: "Nashaka kuvuga iki kibazo kuko birakenewe cane ko cokwirindwa. Kandi sinashaka kwicara ngaha ataco mvuze nawe uriko uratubwira ivyagushikiye kandi mu butwari". Madame Estafan yaririmvye indirimbo zizwi cane nka Conga na Rythm is Gonna Get You, yavugiye muri ico kiganiro ko incuti itari iya hafi yafatiye ku kwizerwa nyina yari ayifitiye kugira imushurashuze. Umukobwa w'uwo bavukana, Lili, w'imyaka 54 yaciye yishura uwo muririmvyi ati: "Waindiriye  uwu mwanya igihe kirekire". Yavuze ati: "Yari incuti, ariko atari iya hafi. Yari afise ububasha kuko mama yari yanshize mw'ishure ryiwe ry'umuziki aca atangura kumubwira buno nyene ingene nari mfise impano nyinshi n'uko nari nkeneye kwitabwaho bidasanzwe, nca ntangura kwumva ingene yari amahirwe kubona anyitaho gutyo." Madame Estafan , yavukiye muri Cuba hanyuma akimukira Miami n'umuryango wiwe akiri umwana w'igitambambuga, yavuze ko iryo hohoterwa ryatanguye  "buke buke hanyuma birihuta". 'Igihe kibangamye' Uwo muririmvyi amaze gutwara agashimwe ka Grammy Award gatatu yavuze ko yabona ko ari "mu gihe "kibangamye" ariko atashobora kwishitura uwo mugabo. "Naramubwiye, 'Ibi ntibibaho, ntushubora gukora ibintu nk'ibi.' Nawe agaca avuga: 'So ari muri Vietnam, nyoko ari wenyene kandi nzoca ndamwica hamwe womubwira." "Nari inzi ko uwo mugabo ari igipfu nico gituma nibaza ko vy'ukuri yashobora kugirira nabi mama." Yavuze ko ayo maganya yatumye atakaza ibice vy'umushatsi , ariko araruha arabwira nyina ivyariko biraba. N'ubwo nyima yabibwiye igiporisi, yagiriwe inama yo kudashingisha urubanza kuko yari "kurushirizaho guhahamurwa no kuja guhagarara  imbere ya sentare kuvuga ivyamushikiye".

column2: Tanzania: Sentare ivuga ko inyandiko zo kuraga itunga ryose Jackline Ntuyabaliwe zitakurikije amategeko
column3: Umupfakazi wa nyakwigendera Reginald Mengi, Jackline Ntuyabaliwe, yerekanye akababaro kiwe ku ngingo ya sentare nkuru ya Tanzania yerekeye uwohagarikira itunga ryasizwe n'umugabo wiwe. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "Kirakwiye... icegeranyo co kwa muganga ca Dr Reginald Mengi cerekanywe nk'icemezo. Ukuri ku bantu bakunda ukuri. Umugabo wanje yamaze ubuzima bwiwe yubashwe, akerebutse kandi yafashije ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abatanzania." Ntiyari umukehabwenge! Ushobora kuvuga ivyo ushatse vyose, ufate ivyo ushatse, ariko kuri ivyo, nzomuvugira gushika mpfe. Jackline yanditse kuri urwo rubuga hwaniro ashirako n'icegeranyo ca muganga wiwe, yanditse ivyerekeye amagara yiwe, ko ingwara yamufashe ya AVC itatumye atakaza ubwenge. Mu misi iheze, mu gusoma urubanza rw'impapuro 72, umucamanza Mlyambina yavuze ko inyandiko zo kuraga za nyuma za nyakwigendera Dr Mengi zanditswe itariki 17 z'ukwezi kw'umunani mu 2017 zitakurikije amategeko agenga kuraga. Muri urwo rubanza, abana ba Dr Mengi bariko bariyamiriza izo nyandiko zo kuraga bivugwa ko zasizwe na nyakwigendera se wabo, n'umukono wari kuri izo nyandiko nta ho bisa bisana n'izindi ziwe, kandi muri ico gihe se wiwe nta nguvu yari afise zo kwandika kubera ingwara yari afise kuva mu 2016. Abana bakuze ba nyakwigendera bavuga ko izo nyandiko zo kuraga zabirengagije, iragi ryose rihabwa Jackline Ntuyabaliwe n'abana biwe b'amahasa, rero ko izo nyandiko zitakurikije amategeko  kubera zashize ku ruhande abandi bana ata mpamvu. Jackline Ntuyabaliwe azwi kw'izina ry'ubuhizi rya K-Lynn muri BongoFleva yamenyekanye cane mu ndirimbo Nalia Kwa Furaha. Bahuriye n'umugwizatunga w'umutanzania Reginald Mengi mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza mu 2010. Mu 2014 ikinyamakuru candika ku butunzi ca Forbes canditse ko uwo mugabo yari afise imitahe mu bimenyeshamakuru no mu mashirahamwe yimba ubutare, yari afise ubutunzi bungana na miliyoni 560 z'amadolari. Bari bubakanye mu 2015 mu bugeni bwabereye mw'izinga rya Maurice, Dr Reginal Mengi akaba yarusha umupfasoni wiwe imyaka 36. Yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ari i Dubai afise imyaka 75  itariki 2 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 2019, mu gihe Jackline Ntuyabaliwe yari afise imyaka 39.

column2: Burundi: 'Turiyamirije abatwitiranya n'umugambwe' - Abepiskopi gatolika
column3: Inama y'Abepiskopi b'i Burundi imenyesha ko ibabajwe n'uko hari bamwe bashaka kuyitiranya n'umugambwe biturutse ku gikorwa bakoze mu matora aheruka nk'indorerezi, mbere bakanashikiriza amahinyu bayabonyewo. Biri mw'itangazo ryasomwe n'umukuru w'iyo nama musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye atanga umuco ku ruhara rwayo muri ayo matora. Iyo nama imenyesha ko itishimiye ingene sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro yavuze ivyo yashikirijwe "nk'uko yoba yaritwaye ku vyerekeye amatora". Ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu, iyo sentare niho yashikiriza ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa 20/05/2020, aho yanavuze ko utunenge twashikirijwe n'inama y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, co kimwe n'ibirego vyatanzwe n'umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ata shingiro bifise. Mw'iryo tangazo, musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye  arongoye inama y'abepiskopi amenyesha ko itigeze yitwara muri sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingio. Ati: "Ico yakoze kwabaye ukugira ico ishikirije icese ku vyerekeye igikorwa c'uburorerezi yari yaronkeye uruhusha". Abasenyeri b' i Burundi bavuga ko ata mvo n'imwe yari ihari y'uko bitwara ngo kuko uruhara rwabo muri ayo matora cari igikorwa c'umurorerezi kandi bakagendera ku ngingo ngenganyifato y'abarorerezi b'amatora. Avuga ko igikorwa c'abarorerezi kwari ukwandika n'ukugumya gusa amahinyu y'ivyabaye yiboneye n'amaso yiwe gusa. Musenyeri Ntahondereye ati: "Turababajwe n'uko Inama y'abepiskopi yafashwe mu buryo butumvikana nk'uko yoba yaritwaye , ivyo navyo bigatera agapfungu mu mitima y'abantu". "Turanse ko twitiranywa n'umugambwe canke n'umuntu uwo ari we wese yahiganywe mu matora". Inama nkuru y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, CECAB, yararungitse abarorerezi bayo barenga 2,700 mu makomine yose bashoboye kuja mu tuzu tw'amatora bahisemwo, nk'uko babivuga mw'itangazo ryabo ryo ku wa 26/05, iminsi ine inyuma y'ayo matora. Mw'iryo tangazo bari bamenyesheje ko ayo matora yabayemwo utunenge twari gushobora gutuma ivyari gutangazwa ko vyayavuyemwo bishobora kutizigirwa. Inyuma y'iryo tangazo, hari bamwe babonye ko Ekleziya Gatorika mu Burundi itari yishimiye ivyari vyaraye bitangajwe n'umurwi CENI ko ari vyo vyavuye mu matora. Hagati aho, inyuma y'aho Evariste Ndayishimiye w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi atangarijwe burundu na sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro ko ari we yatsinze ayo matora, iyo nama y'abepiskopi yaranamukeje mw'itangazo ryayo ryo ku wa 05/06, inamusaba kuba "umukuru w'igihugu wa bose".

column2: Coronavirus: Papa asaba ko urucanco n'imiti bishikira bose kw'isi
column3: Papa Francis yateye akamo abategetsi bo kw'isi ngo bafashe kugira abantu bose bashobore kuronka urucanco rwa coronavirus ata nzitizi. Mw'ijambo rya Noheli yashikirije ku rubuga rwa internet ubwa mbere, Papa yagabishije kudashiraho "uruhome" kubakeneye imiti. Ico kiza catumye ubutumwa bwa Urbi na Orbi budatangirwa ku rubaraza rwa Bazelike St Pierre ku bantu benshi, nk'uko vyari bimenyerewe. Ahubwo Papa yatanze ubwo butumwa ari mu cumba i Vatikano. Uko kugabisha kwa papa kuje inyuma y'amakenga y'ingene ibihugu bitunze  bigura incanco zitagira uko zingana gusumba ibihugu bikenye. Yavuze ati:"Ese umwana w'Imana yogarukana mu bategetsi ba politike n'amareta agatima ko gufashanya n'amakungu, bahereye ku magara y'abantu, kugira ngo bose boshobore gushikirwa n'urucanco hamwe n'imiti. "Imbere y'iki kibazo kitagira imbibe, ntidushobora kwiyubakirako uruhome. Twese hamwe turi mu bwato bumwe." Papa yavuze ko ingaruka y'iki kibazo c'amagara y'abantu zerekanye ko ubumwe bw'amakungu bukomeye cane. "Muri iki gihe c'akahise, tugeramiwe n'ibibazo vy'ibidukikije hamwe n'ubusumbasumbane mu butunzi no mu mibano vyagiye kunyurwa n'ikiza coronavirus, birakenewe cane ko twemerana nka benewacu na bashiki bacu." Papa yateye akamo ngo habe umutima wo gufasha no gushigikira abakozweko n'ico kiza, adoma urutoke cane cane ku bapfasoni bahohotewe muri iki gihe abantu bugaranywe. Avuga ku zindi ngorane ziri kw'isi, yahamagariye abantu gukomeza ubumwe no gusubiza hamwe muri Syria, Yemen, Libya, Nagorno-Karabakh, Sudan y'epfo , Nigeria, Cameroun na Irak. Vyitezwe ko azogira urugendo muri Irak mu kwezi kwa gatatu, urugendo rushobora kuba rubaye urwa mbere rwa Papa mu gihugu cazahajwe n'intambara.

column2: Dolly Parton: ‘Nivyo, ubuzima bw’abirabure ni kirumara”
column3: Umunyamuziki rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa country music, Dolly Parton, nawe yifatanije n'abandi mu gushigikira isekeza Black Lives Matter (ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), mu gihe yariko ashikiriza aho ahagaze ku bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu, ibidakunze kuba. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru c'utugenegene Billboard ati: "Mbega burya wibaza ko aba bazungu bacu ari bo bonyene bafise akamaro? Oya". Uyu muririmvyi aasanzwe afise  abakunzi mu mpande zose, asanzwe adakunda kugira ivyo avuga ku bijanye na politike. Aya majambo yiwe aje mu gihe igihugu cose kiri mu bihe bidasanzwe mu bijanye n'umubaho hagati y'abadasangiye ubwoko vyagize ingaruka mu bice vyose vy'ubuzima muri Amerika, harimwo na country music. N'aho umupfasoni Parton atashoboye kuja mu myiyerekano muri rya sekeza rya Blakc Lives Matter, avuga ko ashigikiye uburenganzira bw'abiyamiriza ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Yabwiye ico kinyamakuru ati: "Ndatahura neza ko ari uburenganzira bw'abantu guserura akari ku mutima no kwumvirizwa". Urupfu rwa wa mwirabure George Floyd hamwe n'imyiyerekano yaciye ikurikira vyaragize ingaruka mbi mu bisata bitandukanye, haba mu nkino canke no mu muziki, ivyatumye abanyamuziki bamwe baja muri iyo myiyerekano, abandi nabo biba ngombwa ko basubiramwo bakihweza ibijanye n'imigenderanire yabo n'abandi badasangiye urukoba. Perezida Donald Trump wewe abona ukundi iyo myiyerekano, aho afata abari muri yo nk'abagumutsi, mbere yiyamiriza bikomeye abari bafashe ingingo yo gupfukama igihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko ruraririmbwa mu kwerekana akababaro kabo. Umupfasoni Parton yashikirije ayo majambo mu gihe imyiyamamazo mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu yimirije yashushe, ingendo itandukanye n'iyo yari afise mu myaka ine iheze aho  yirinda cane kunegura Bwana Trump igihe yahiganwa na Hillary Clinton. Eka no mu 2017 yashimye kutagira ico avuze mu gihe we na bagenziwe Emmys, Lily Tomlin na Jane Fonda bari mu giteramo, aho aba bandi bobo bafashe akanya ko kwiyamiriza Perezida Trump. Ubu bwa vuba naho ati: "None nimba wanka urunuka umukuru w'igihugu, kubera iki tutomusengera?" Sibwo bwa mbere uyu muririmvyi w'imyaka 74 - aboneka nk'umwe mu bashigikiye abagore bagendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vy'ukwigenga (feministes) akaba kandi anashigikiye abahuza ibitsina babisangiye - ashigikira abipfuza ko ibintu bihinduka. Mu 2014, yarashigikiye abubakana badahuje ibitsina, umwaka umwe imbere y'uko itegeko ribirekura mu gihugu cose. Hagati aho, ariyubara cane muvyo ashikiriza mu ntumbero yo kwirinda uko bishoboka kugira uwo ababaje, akenshi akama ahanura abantu "kwirinda gucira abandi imanza kugira ngo nabo ntibahave bacirwa izindi".

column2: Kardinali Burke anegura Papa Francis ku vyo aherutse gushikiriza ku bubakana basangiye ibitsina
column3: Umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye ba Ekleziya Gatolika aranegura amajambo Papa Francis aherutse gushikiriza ku vyerekeye abakundanye basangiye igitsina, akavuga ko ari ivyiyumviro vyiwe bwite bidashobora gukurikizwa n'Abagatolika. Kardinali Raymond Burke abonwa na benshi ko atava kw'izima ku mico ya Ekleziya Gatolika yavuze ibi mw'ijambo yashikirije haciye umunsi umwe Papa yerekanywe ariko ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokwemerwa n'amategeko. Yari amajambo atari bwaje ku mugaragaro. Ku wa gatatu w'ino ndwi, niho Papa Francis yumvikanye ashikiriza ayo majambo. Bivanye n'aho umuntu ahagaze muri Ekleziya, Kardinali Burke ni ihwa kuri Papa, canke naho umwe muri bake bazovugisha ukuri ku butegetsi. Kurwanya Papa ku bijanye no gushigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bemerwa imbere y'amategeko ni ibintu bidatangaje, ariko amajambo yabivuzemwo niyo kumbure yotangaza. Mu gihe Raymond Burke avuga ko amajambo ya Papa Francis ari "iciyumviro ciwe bwite", yongera ko y'uko abagatolika badategetswe kwumvira uyu mukuru wa Ekleziya kuri iki kibazo, ariko ko abayobozi ba Ekleziya basanzwe bafise igikorwa co gukora ico yise 'gutanga umuco ukenewe'. Arongera agashimangira y'uko ibikorwa vy'abahuje ibitsina babisangiye 'biteye kubiri n'imico' ishingiye ku kwemera kwa Gatolika, akavuga ko amajambo yavuzwe na Papa adahuye n'inyigisho za Ekleziya kandi ko ziteye umubabaro. Mw'ireresi ivuga ku buzima n'ibikorwa vyiwe, Papa Francis yumvikanye ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bakwiye kwemerwa imbere y'amategeko. Ati: "Ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kugira umuryango. Nta n'umwe akwiye gutabwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico. "Ico tugomba gushiraho ni itegeko ribaha uburenganzira bwo kubana. Gutyo bakaba bakingiwe n'amategeko". Mu nyigisho za Gatolika, imibonano mpuzabitsina hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ifatwa 'nk'ukugoka'. Aya majambo yavuzwe na Papa yateye impari, aho hari bamwe bashigikiye ivyo yavuze, abandi nabo babirwanya cane. Gusa impungenge zibandanya zibonekeza ni ingaruka aya majambo ashobora kugira ufatiye aho Ekleziya Gatolika ihagaze kuri iki kibazo. Massimo Faggioli, umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye n'ivy'Imana akaba n'umwanditsi w'igitabo Pope Francis: Tradition, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nta gushidikanya ko ivyo Francis yavuze ari ikintu gishasha muri Ekleziya. Hagati aho, ni ikibazo yagiye agarukako cane kuva muri ino myaka mike iheze".

column2: Ndayishimiye: ‘Karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?’
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko ibibazo Uburundi bwagiye buracamwo vyatumye igihugu gisigara inyuma mu bisata bitandukanye. Akebura  abakozi gukura amaboko mu mpuzu kugira bagwize umwimbu. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije Abarundi buca bahimbaza umusi mpuzamakungu wahariwe abakozi, Perezida Ndayishimiye ahamagarira Abarundi kwemanga ko basamaye hanyuma bafate ingingo yo gukura amaboko mu mpuzu. Mu gihe abakozi ba reta bari biteze ko umusi nk'uwu ari akaryo keza ko kwongerwa imishahara, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko batokwitega ko bahava bongerwa agashirukabute mu gihe "n'umwenda Reta yafashe mu myaka iheze kugira ihembe abakozi utararihwa". Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko gushika ubu hari abakozi bironderera kwongerezwa impembo mu gihe ataco bariko bafasha reta kugira ironke uburyo bukwiye, bakagomba ko reta isaba imfashanyo kugira ngo ibahembe. Ati: "Uno musi urasanga umukozi wa Reta ashaka agashirukabute gakirurutse ariko we nyene abona abanyonora ikigega ca reta akihorera canke akabakingira ikibaba. Mbere hari naho usanga ari we nyene ariko aranyonora agaca asaba impembo irengeye. "Hari abandi bareka ibidandazwa vyari gutanga amakori bigaca ku ruhande ariko ukwezi kwahera agasaba impembo. None yibaza ko iyo mpembo ica iva hehe, ko hari aho nyene?" Perezida Ndayishimiye ntiyumva ivyo gusaba imfashanyo, kuko kubw'iwe, abakeneye imfashanyo ni abatishoboye. Ahamagarira  abarundi gutahura ko ivyo bagiye baracamwo  vyatumye basamara. Ati: "None ko umuntu wo gufashwa ari uwutishoboye, koko karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?  Jewe si uko ndavyumva; sindanavyemera; ni co gituma bintera isoni gusega". Perezida Ndayishimiye abona ko uwutakoze atari akwiye guhembwa ukwezi guheze kuko ku bw'iwe, "ni we ngumba y'ukuri kuko imana yamuhaye ubwenge n'inkomezi hanyuma abipfisha ubusa". Avuga ko muri kino gihe igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro, agasaba Abarundi guhaguruka bakiyishura ivyo bataye, bakarangura imigambi yo kwiteza imbere. Ati: "Twarabuze vyinshi, twarataye umwanya mwinshi kubera ububegito bwa benshi muri twebwe bwatumye tubura amahoro. "Muri uwo mwanya twataye, ibikorwa bitakozwe ni vyinshi kandi biraturindiriye. "Kurima, tukworora kijambere ntavyo twitaho; twarira ikija mu nda gusa, umusesekara ntiwotubajije, tukitwaza imyibutsa yataye igihe ngo ivy'ejo biraba ab'ejo. "Guhingura itunga kama uwo wari umugani kuko biteba kwimbuka ... gutunganya aho abamukerarugendo ... vyari umugani." "Ivyo vyose vyari akazi koduha itunga dukeneye kandi n'ubu karacaturindiriye".Atera akamo abarundi ko bova hasi bagakora kugira ngo bahamvye ibindi bihugu kuko vyovyo vyamaze kugera kure. Ati: "Abandi barakamaze. Barubatse amabarabara, barubaka amashure, barubaka ingomero z'umuyagankuba, barubaka ivyo ba mukerarugendo bakenera, barubaka ibikoresho vy'ubuhinga ngurukanabumenyi, barubatse amahinguriro, ubu ntaco basigaje. "Twebwe, ivyo vyose biracaturindiriye, dukure amaboko mu mpuzu dukore".

column2: Uyu muririmvyi wo muri Afrika y'epfo yahuye n'ikibazo co guhohoterwa
column3: Zahara, umuririmvyi azwi muri Afrika y'epfo, avuga ko yashikiwe ubwiwe n'ihohoterwa rikorerwa abagore muri ico gihugu. Muri iyi ndwi yahariwe kurwanya amabi akorerwa abapfasoni, aratuyagira ku vyamushikiye hamwe n'ingene afasha ngo ntibishikire abandi.

column2: South Africa: Kwivuza uri umunyamahanga ntivyoroshe
column3: Umushikiranganji wa Afrika y’Epfo ajejwe amagara y’abantu yagabishije abanyagihugu ko atari bo bajejwe kwubahiriza amategeko agenga abanyamahanga. Joe Phaahla yabivuze igihe yagendera ibitaro vyo ku murwa mukuru, Pretoria, aho abantu bo mu mugwi wiyita Operation Dudula bagize  imyiyerekano bagerageza kubuza abanyamahanga kwivuza. Uwo mugwi Operation Dudula wagirizwa kwanka abanyamahanga, ariko abanywanyi bawo bavuga ko abanyamahanga batuma  amavuriro n’ibitaro vy’igihugu cabo birengerwa. Phaahla yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko abantu bava mu bihugu bibanyi – eka mbere no mu vya kure nk’Ubuhindi – baza kwivuza muri Afrika y’Epfo. Yavuze ko ivyo bibandanije gutyo, Afrika y’Epfo izoshika aho irengerwa. Ariko yashimangiye ko ibwirizwa nshingiro ritomoye ku burenganzira bwo kwivuza ku muntu wese aba muri Afrika y’Epfo. Abagiye mu myiyerekano babandanije gusaba ko abantu babanza kwerekana ubwenegihugu bwabo imbere y’uko binjira ibitaro n’ubwo hari ingingo ya sentare ibihagarika. Bivugwa ko abantu b’urukoba (uruhu) rwirabura aribo batotwa hanyuma bagahatirwa kwerekana ko bazi kuvuga rumwe mu ndimi zisanzwe zivugwa aho muri Afrika y’Epfo. Ku wa kane hadutse intureka hagati y‘abanywanyi ba Operation Dudula n’abadashigikiye iyo myiyerekano hanze y’ivyo bitaro. Igiporisi carashe amasasu ya caoutchouc kugira gishwiragize  iyo migwi ibiri. Reta ya Afrika y’Epfo ntisanzwe iharura abanyamahanga baja kwivuza mu mavuriro y’igihugu. Ariko hari impungenge ku ngaruka abanyamahanga b’abimukira batagira ibibaranga bashobora kugira ku nzego z’ubuvuzi muri ico gihugu. Muri Afrika y'Epfo si ubwa mbere havuzwe ikibazo co kwanka abanyamahanga. Mu kwezi kwa gatatu uyu mwaka, abanywanyi ba Alexandra Dudula Movement bagize imyirekano bavuga ko abanyamahanga bigaruriye amazu ya reta. Muri iyo myiyerekano bari bafise ivyapa bimwe bivuga ngo   "tahe iwanyu" .

column2: Mu Burundi havugwa umunyu mubi mu masoko. Bisigura iki?
column3: Ubushikirangnji bujejwe urudandazwa mu Burundi buheruka kumenyesha ko hamaze kwibonekeza mu masoko umunyu udakwije ivyangomba ku magara y'abantu. Uwo munyu ngo nta cunyunyu ca iode gikwiye ufise, ngo ukaba ushobora kugira ingaruka ku magara y'abantu. Kugira dutahure izo ngaruka, twavuganye n'umushakashati ari mu batoye isabuni ikinga imibu itera malaria, Gerard Niyondiko.

column2: Saido Ntibazonkiza inyuma y'igitsindo yatsinze Tanzania, Young Africans yamutwaye
column3: Saido Ntibazonkiza, yahora abarizwa mu mugwi wa Vital'o, yagiriraniye amasezerano yo gukinira umugwi wa Young Africans wo muri Tanzania nk'uko iyo kipe ibimenyesha. Uwo mukinyi rurangiranwa w'imbere w'Uburundi, agiye muri uwo mugwi inyuma yo gutsinda igitego kimwe ku busa Uburundi bwatsinze Tanzania mu rukino rwa kivukanyi ku munsi w'Imana. Amasezerano hagati y'umugwi wa Young Africans na Vital'O kuri uyu mukinyi ntarashirwa ahagaragara. Saido Ntibazonkiza yaheruka gukinira Intamba mu rugamba haraciye imyaka itanu, mu rukino rwari rwabahuje n'izinga rya Morise (Maurice), aho ivyo bihugu bibiri vyari vyanganije igitego kimwe ku kindi. Muri urwo rukino rwabereye mw'izinga rya Morise, Ntibazonkiza ari kizigenza, yaragirijwe kwitwara nabi harimwo no kubuza bagenziwe gukina, bituma ahagarikwa n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Burundi, FFB, gusubira gukinira igihugu ciwe. Umurundi Ntibazonkiza, muri Young Africans asangayo Haruna Niyonzima wo mu gihugu kibanyi c'u Rwanda, na ho nyene Saido azwi cane n'aho atahakinye. Mu 2005, yaraguzwe n'umugwi wa Rayon Sports, we na Bernard Mwarara, ariko bankirwa gikina muri uwo mugwi. Bompi ntibahawe impapuro zibarekurira gukinira Rayon Sports, ikibazo cateje impari zikomeye ico gihe hagati y'abafana ba Rayon Sports bagiriza umugwi  bakebana wa APR FC kubigiramwo uruhara. Saido Ntibazonkiza amaze gukina mu migwi myinshi mu bihugu bitandukanye mu karere, na Buraya nko muri Holande, Polonye n'Ubufaransa. Azwi mu gihugu ciwe nk'umukinyi kizigenza yagiye afasha bagenziwe bo mu mugwi nserukiragihugu mu kubafashisha intererano y'uburyo mu gihe igihugu caba cakehaniwe.

column2: Kenya: Imisi 13 niyo yahawe abakozi ba reta bataricandagisha Covid-19
column3: Abakozi ba reta muri Kenya bahawe imisi 13 gusa ngo babe bahejeje kwiteza urucanco rwo kwikingira Covid-19 canke naho bafatirwe ingingo. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, umukuru w'igisata kijejwe abakozi ba reta yavuze ko iyi ngingo yafashwe kubera igitigiri gito c'abakozi ba reta baronkejwe uru rucanco, cane cane abigisha n'abo mu gisata kijejwe umutekano. Avuga ko hari abakozi ba  reta batari bake bataye akazi kugira bahunge uru rucanco. Ejo ku wa mbere, Kenya yatangaje ko abantu 745 bashasha banduye uwu mugera wa corona, bituma abamaze kwandura kuva iki kiza gishika mu gihugu bashika 212.573. Mu ndwi iheze, reta yavuze ko imaze gutanga incanco imiriyoni 1,7 za AstraZeneca, nyinshi muri izi zikaba ari doze ya mbere. Kenya itegekanya ko gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka izoba imaze gucandaga abantu imiriyoni cumi.

column2: Abakuru ba US na China bavuganye kuri terefone ubwa mbere mu mezi indwi
column3: Prezida w'Ubushinwa  Xi Jinping yavuganye na mugenziwe wa Amerika Joe Biden ku wa kane, bukaba ari bwo bwa mbere bavuganye kuri terefone mu mezi indwi. Itangazo ry'ibiro vy'umukuru wa Amerika, Maison Blanche/White House ryavuze ko bavuganye "vyinshi bijanye n'aho inyungu zabo zihurira". Bubabye ubwa kabiri gusa bavugana kuri terefone kuva prezida Biden ashitse ku butegetsi. Imigenderanire hagati y'Ubushinwa na Amerika imaze igihe irangwa  n'icuka kibi,   bitumwe n'imvo zirimwo kunyinyana ku bijanye n'urudandazwa, ukwabura n'ikiza ca  Covid. Itangazo rya Maison Blanche ryongeye riti: "Uko kuvugana, nk'uko prezida Biden yabisobanuye neza, kwari mu murongo w'utwigoro Amerika ibandanya tw'uko  Amerika n'Ubushinwa vyokwitwara neza mw'ihiganwa hagati yavyo". "Abo bategetsi babiri bavuganye inshingano za buri gihugu zo kwirinda ko ihiganwa hagati yavyo  ridahinduka rikavamwo intambara." Mu ntango  z'uyu mwaka, ibiganiro vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru hagati y'ubutegetsi bwa Biden n'Ubushinwa vyaranze no guterana amajambo hagati y'intumwa z'ivyo bihugu. Abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bari bagirije Amerika gukokeza ibihugu "gutera Ubushinwa", nayo Amerika ivuga ko Ubushinwa "bwaje kwiyerekana neza gusa". Ni ibiki Ubushinwa na Amerika batumvikanako? Ni vyinshi cane ugiye kubiraba. Hari ibibazo bitari bike bikomeye cane ivyo bihangange bibiri mu butunzi binyinyanirako - kimwe muri ivyo kikaba ari uburengenzira bwa zina muntu na demokrasi. Amerika yagiriza Ubushinwa gukora ihonyabwoko ku bwoko bw'aba Uighur mu ntara ya Xinjiang. Ivuga kandi ko reta y'Ubushinwa ihonyanga uburenganzira bwa demokrasi muri Hong Kong biturutse kw'itegeko rishasha ry'umutekano abarinegura bavuga ko rikoreshwa mu gucinyiza abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi. Ubushinwa nabwo bumaze kubwira Amerika kenshi guhagarika kwivanga mu vyo buvuga ko ari ibiraba ico gihugu ubwaco, bukagiriza Amerika "gukengera" umugambwe w'aba Communiste. Hari n'ikibazo c'urudandazwa. Ivyo bihugu vyompi biri mu ntanbara y'urudandazwa yatanguye mu 2018 ku ntwaro ya prezida Donald Trump. Amerika yashinze  amafaranga arihwa ku bidandazwa  biva mu Bushinwa biciye miriyari 360 z'ama dorari , Ubushinwa nabwo buca bubikora ku bidandazwa biva muri Amerika biciye miriyariri 110 z'ama dorari. Joe Biden ntaco arahindura ku hari hahagaze uwo yasubiriye ku vyerekeye imigenderanire n'Ubushinwa mu bijanye n'urudandazwa, ivyo rero bikaba bibushavuza cane. Ariko na Afghanistan ishobora kuba iyindi mvo yo kutumvikana. Muri iyi ndwi, umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'Ubushinwa bujejwe imigenderanire Wang Wenbin yaneguye cane ukuvana  ingabo za Amerika muri Afghanistan avuga ko ari "ugusiga akajagari". Yagirije kandi Amerika kuba yetumye Abanya-Afghanistan "batakaza vyinhi cane".

column2: Uganda: Uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican yahagaritswe yagirijwe kurenga ibigo
column3: Ishengero rya Anglican muri Uganda ryahagaritse uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru Stanley Ntagali, mu mabanga yo gusoma misa no guserukira iryo shengero gushika ingingo ihindutse, yagirizwa kurenga ibigo. Ntagali yatanze imihoho mu mabanga mu kwa gatatu kw'umwaka uheze inyuma y'imyaka 43 yari amaze ari umupasitori. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa 13 z'uku kwa mbere ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'ishengero rya Anglican, uwamusubiriye, Dr. Stephen Samuel Kaziimba, yavuze ko Ntagali yarenze ibigo aryamana n'umugore afise umugabo, kandi na we nyene akaba yaravyiyemereye. Dr Kaziimba ati: "Yarahemukiye ibiro vy'abepiskopi, arenga indahiro yiwe yo kwimikwa, hamwe n'ivyo yari yiyemeje mu nyifato yiwe." Dr Kaziimba avuga ko ishengero rya Uganda ryiyemeje gukorera mu muco no kwitwararika abo bose bagizweko ingaruka n'ivyabaye, asaba ko abagore bompi bosengerwa, abihana bakihana, abakizwa bagakizwa. Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri Amerika ya Ruguru, Foley Beach, na we nyene yasohoye itangazo aho avuga ko ababajwe n'ivyabaye. Ati: "Stanley ni mwenewacu muri Kristo, kandi ndashima ingene twakoranye mu myaka iheze. Birambabaje cane kwumva ko yatirimutse kw'ibanga". "Ndasaba Imana ko Stanley yobandanya n'inzira yo kwihana, yongere ihe ukwihangana abo bose bakozweko n'icaha ciwe". Uyu yahoze ari umwepiskopi mukuru ntiyabonetse kugira ngo ashobore kugira ico abivugako. Ariko abanya Uganda bazokwama bamwibukira ku majambo yavuze ku vyo yafata nk'ubutabanga mu gihugu. Mu 2019, yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu ariko ahanura abantu ko "bokwigumya mu vyipfuzo vyabo mu bijanye n'uguhuza ibitsina". Ishengero Anglican muri Uganda rifise abanywanyi bashika imiriyoni 13.

column2: Ebola yongeye kwaduka muri DR Congo
column3: Indwara ya Ebola yasubiye kwaduka mu ntara ya Kivu muri Repuburilka ya Demokrasi ya Congo (RDC/DRC) nk’uko vyaraye bitangajwe na reta y’ico gihugu. Vyemejwe kandi n’ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw’isi OMS/WHO. Mw’itangazo, OMS ivuga ko  ugutangaza ko iyo ndwara yasubiye kwaduka vyabaye inyuma yo kwemeza ko hari umuntu yishwe n’iyo ndwara muri Nord Kivu, intara yo mu buseruko bwa Congo ihana urubibe n’Urwanda na Uganda. OMS ivuga ko umugore w’imyaka 46 yapfuye itariki 15 ukwezi kw’umunani i Beni, igisagara co muri Nord Kivu. Yabanje kuvurirwa ku bitaro vya Beni, mu ntango ku zindi ndwara, ariko mu nyuma aza kugaragaza ibimenyetso biranga umugera w’indwara ya Ebola. Amashami y’ikigo c’igihugu c’ubushakashatsi ku buvuzi (INRB) i Beni na Goma, yompi yaremeje ko hatowe ibimenyetso vya Ebola mu bipimo vyafashwe kuri uwo murwayi. OMS ivuga ko ivyigwa vyerekanye ko uwo murwayi yafashwe na Ebola ifitaniye isano n’iyari yaradutse mu 2018-2020 mu ntara za  Nord Kivu na Ituri - gushika ubu ariyo yamaze  umwanya munini ikanafata ahantu hanini kurusha izindi. Ariko OMS yizeye ko vuba iyo ndwara izohagarikwa itararandagata cane. Umukuru wa OMS ku mugabane wa Afrika, Dr Matshidiso Moeti, avuga ati: “Ebola yaduka isigaye yaduka yisubiriza kenshi muri Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo, ivyo bikaba biteye impungenge. "Ariko, abajejwe amagara y’abantu muri Nord Kivu baramaze guhagarika akatari gake kandi vuba ivyaduka vya Ebola, bafatiye aho rero nta nkeka ko n’iki c'ubu bazogihagarika”. OMS ivuga ko abakozi bayo bakoranye n’abategetsi ba Congo bariko barakurikirana amagara y’abantu 160 bafise aho bahuriye n’uwo yapfuye mu ntumbero yo kubuza ko iyo ndwara irandagata. Iryo shami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y’abantu rimenyesha ko mu gihugu hasanzwe hari incanco za Ebola 1.000, amajana abiri muri izo zikaba zigiye kurungikwa muri Beni muri iyi ndwi kugira zihabwe abahuye n’uwo yapfuye canke abahuye na bo. Indwara ya Ebola yaheruka kwaduka aho i Beni muri Nord Kivu  mu 2021 aho yamaze emezi abiri ikarangira itariki 16 z’ukwezi kwa cumi na kabiri. Ico gihe hafashwe abantu 11 (harimwo munani bemejwe na 3 biketswe), batandatu muri bo bakaba barapfuye.

column2: Uganda: Amadini n’abayoboke abangamye kandi abangamiwe
column3: “Hari n’abica ku bwa Christ (Kristu)”, ni bimwe biri muri iri tohoza rya BBC Africa Eye. Peter MacJob agaragaza uturorero muri Uganda, aho n’abakiri bato bakoreshwa n’aba ‘pastors’ (abapasitori) bo mu madini atandukanye, n’abantu bakahasiga ubuzima.

column2: Coronavirus -Burundi: Bavuze ivyavuye mu gupima abantu benshi
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi bumenyesha ko mu bantu bashika 670 bafashwe ibipimo ku wa mbere w'iyi ndwi 28 banduye wa mugera ruhonyabantu wa coronavirus. Nibwo bwa mbere mu Burundi hari hafashwe ibipimo vyinshi ku munsi umwe mw'isekeza ryatangujwe ryo kuraba uko iciza Covid-19 gihagaze mu gihugu. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi, Dr Jean-Bosco Girukwishaka, abicishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, amenyesha ko ivyo bipimo vyafashwe mu bigo bitatu vyo gupimiramwo uyo mugera no mu bitaro bitandukanye, mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Iryo sekeza ryatanguriye i Bujumbura bikaba bitegekanijwe ko kuva mu ndwi iza kizobandaniriza mu zindi ntara zo hagati. Dr Girukwishaka avuga ko ku munsi ugira kabiri w'iryo sekeza, abashika "593  aribo bafashwe ibipimo" , bakaba barindiriye inyishu. Avugana na BBC Gahuzamiryango ejo ku wa kabiri, Bwana Girukwishaka yavuze ko iri sekeza rizomara amezi atatu rizofasha leta kumenya ingene ikiza ca coronavirus cifashe mu gihugu cose. U Burundi buzwi ko buri mu bihugu bitafashe ingingo ruhasha mu ntumbero yo kurwanya ikwirakwira ry'umugera wa coronavirus, harimwo ingingo zo kuguma mu rugo, nk'uko vyagenze mu bindi bihugu vyo mu muryango wa Afrika y'Ubuseruko. Hari amashirahamwe amwe amwe yagiriza leta ko igiharuro vyatangwa na leta ku bijanye n'uwo mugera bitari vyo, ibirego vyiyamirijwe. Umukuru w'igihugu mushasha Evariste Ndayishimiye wewe aherutse gutangaza ko agiye kurwanya bikomeye iki kiza gushika gitujijwe. Mw'ijambo yashikirije igihe abagize leta yiwe barahira, ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu guheze, Perezida Ndayishimiye yatangaje icese ko agiye guhagurukira uwo mugera gushika utujijwe. Mu gihe ico gikorwa kibandanya, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu busaba abanyagihugu kubandanya bakurikiza ingingo zafashwe mu ntumbero yo kwikingira, izo nazo hakaba harimwo gukaraba igihe cose, kwirinda gukorana mu minwe canke kugwana mu nda, hamwe no kwisiga ya miti yica imicafu. Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu kandi busaba ishirahamwe Atrabu ryo kwunguruza abantu kwama bapompa imiduga yabo, abakiriya nabo bagasabwa kwambara udupfukamunwa.

column2: Acat-Burundi: Germain Rukuki yasohotse ibohero inyuma y'imyaka irenga ine
column3: Germain Rukuki kuva ku mugoroba wo ku wa gatatu araye yidegemvya inyuma yo gusohoka ibohero rya Ngozi aho yari apfungiwe kuva agifatwa mu 2017, nk'ukwo vyemezwa n'umwe mu bashingwamanza biwe Maitre Ildephonse Congera. Germain Rukuki yari umukozi w'ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu ACAT Burundi, yari yakatiwe gupfungwa imyaka 32 mu 2018 ku vyaha vyo guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu no kugarariza. Germain Rukuki yagumye ahakana ivyo yagirizwa kuva agifatwa. Yarekuwe hashizwe mu ngiro ingingo ya sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Ntahangwa yavanye igihano yari yaraciriwe c'imyaka 32 mu 2018 na sentare nkuru ya Ntahangwa ikagishira ku mwaka umwe gusa. Hari haheze iminsi icenda sentare iciye urwo rubanza, amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu akaba yari amaze gutangura gushikriza amakenga yo kuba atarekurwa ngo asohoke ibohero kandi sentare yamurekuye. Inyuma y'impari n'intureka vyakurikiye ingingo y'umuhisi prezida Pierre Nkurunziza yo kwitoza ubugira gatatu kurongora Uburundi mu 2015, amashirahamwe menshi adaharanira inyungu za poritike harimwo ayo agateka ka zina muntu yarahagaritswe canke arafutwa. Muri izo harimwo Acat-Burundi, Aprodh, Ligue Iteka, Focode, Forsc, Olucome, na Parcem. Iryo rya nyuma ariko ubu riherutse kwemererwa gusubira gukora. N'ibiro vya ONU bikurikirana agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi vyarugawe burundu. Kuva ku myaka 32 gushika ku mwaka umwe Mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu mwaka uheze urubanza rwiwe sentare gasamburamaza yararusambuye ica irusubiza mw'iburanishwa. Yari yasanze hari amategeko ajanye n'iburanishwa ry'imanza atari yubahirijwe igihe rwacibwa. Sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Bujumbura yaciye isubira kuruburanisha, irushira mu mwiherero mu kwezi  kwa gatatu. Yaciye urubanza rwo kugabanya igihano ciwe kuva ku myaka 32 gushika ku mwaka umwe gusa muri uku kwezi kwa gatantatu.
