column2: Ghana: Abashingamateka barwanye bapfa ikori ku mahera aca ku materefone ngendanwa
column3: Hadutse imishamirano mu nama nshingamateka ya Ghana mw'ijoro ryo kuwa mbere buca ari ku wa kabiri igihe abashingamateka bariko biga ikori ryotangwa ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa. Abashingamateka barateranye inkokora, barasunagurana, bahana amangumi, mu gihe abandi nabo bagerageza kubanguranya. Iyi mishamirano yadutse igihe abashingamateka bo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi bahaguruka bakaja kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka Joseph Osei Owusu ko ahaguruka ngo aje gutora, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Niwe yari arongoye ino nama yahavuye yunguruzwa kubera uru ruhagarara. Umugambwe National Democratic Congress (NDC) utavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi uriyamiriza iri kori ringana na 1.75% ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa, harimwo no kuriha ibicuruzwa ukoresheje terefone ngendanwa. Uyu mugambwe uvuga ko iri kori rizohohotera abadafise amikoro manini hamwe n'abo bose bari hanze y'igisata c'amabanki. Ariko umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca reta Ken Ofori-Artta avuga ko ari ukwagura igisata c'abatangakori, agasigura ko mu mwaka uza igihugu gishobora kuhungukira imiriyaridi 6.9 z'amafaranga y'ama cedi akoreshwa muri Ghana (yababa hafi imiriyaridi 1.15 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika). Iri koraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ryatanguye ku wa mbere mu gatondo, rikaba ryagiye guhagarikwa inyuma y'isaha zitandatu z'ijoro (canke saa sita z'ijoro), nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Graphic co muri ico gihugu. Iki kinyamakuru cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter iyi reresi y'uru ruhagarara. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Abanya-Ghana batari bake bagaye iyi nyifato y'abashingamateka babo, bakavuga ko bategerezwa kubera akarorero keza abandi - hakwifata nk'abana. Ijwi ry'icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ryaboneka ko ari kirumara mu gihe inama nshingamateka yacanyemwo bikomeye kubera integuro y'iri kori. Ava mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi New Patriotic Party (NPP). Umugambwe NDC uvuga ko atategerezwa gutora kubera yari arongoye inama. Ikinyamakuru Graphic kivuga ko integuro y'tegeko rigenga iri kori yemejwe n'umurwi w'inama nshingamateka ujejwe ikigega, ku majwi 13 kuri 12, ariko ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'uyu murwi atangiye ijwi ryiwe ryabanguranije. Inama nshingamateka yasubiye gukorana kandi ejo ku wa kabiri, ariko abashingamateka ntibatoye iri tegeko inyuma y'aho bumvikaniye ko inama yungururizwa mu kwa mbere. Poritike ya Ghana irangwamwo ukutumvikana kuva mu mwaka uheze, inyuma y'amatora aho imigambwe NDC na NPP yaronse intebe 137 umwe umwe. Intebe imwe ni iy'uwigenga, yagiye ku ruhande rwa NPP, agatuma uwu mugambwe uronka akarusho. Mu kwa mbere, abasirikare barinjiye mu nama nshingamateka kugira bahagarike imishamirano hagati y'abashingamateka yadutse bagomba gutora umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Ico gihe, Alban Bagbin wa NDC niwe yatowe inyuma y'aho bamwe mu bashingamateka ba NPP bamuhereye amajwi bakayima uwo mu mugambwe wabo, Mike Oquaye. Bagbin ntiyari muri iyi nama yo kuwa mbere yadutsemwo uru ruhagarara, ari co gituma yaciye irongorwa na Owusu wo muri NPP.

column2: Ethiopia: Onu irasaba gushikira abakeneye imfashanyo muri Tigray
column3: Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU rivuga ko rikeneye vyihuta gushikira abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu kangaratete muri Tigray mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe abana kw'isi, Unicef, rivuga ko amabarabara akwiye kwugururwa, indege zizana imfashanyo nazo zikarekurirwa kuzana imfashanyo za nkenerwa, muri iki gihe abana barenga 30.000 bageramiwe n'urupfu. Uwuserukira Unicef, Adele Khodr yabwiye BBC ati: "Turakeneye kandi ko hasubira kuba itumatumanako, umuyagankuba ukagarukanwa kandi tugashobora gushikira abantu bakeneye imfashanyo." Umutegetsi wo muri reta ku mugwa mukuru Addis Ababa yavuze ko abasirikare bashobora gusubira kwigarurira umugwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle, mu ndwi zitatu mu gihe vyoba ngombwa. Ico gisagara cafashwe n'abagwanyi ku musi wa mbere. Igisirikare kivuga ko cavuye muri ico gisagara kubera gikeneye kwitegurira ibindi bikigeramiye, kandi ko abagwanyi bo muri Tigray batakiri ikibazo.

column2: S Africa: Ramaphosa arashikiriza ivyo azi ku biturire mu gihe ca Zuma
column3: Umukuru wa Afrika y'Epfo Cyril Ramaphosa yahakanye ibineguro vy'uko ataco yakoze ku vyavugwa ku biturire mu gihe c'intwaro c'uwo yasubiriye ku butegets bw'igihugu, Jacob Zuma. Yariko aravuga ivyo azi imbere y'umugwi w'igihugu wiswe Zondo Commission, ukora amatohoza ku biturire mu nzego z'igihugu. Uwo mugwi washinzwe kugirango  ukore amatohoza mu bivugwa ko Zuma yaretse umuryango utunze cane w'aba Gupta ukanyonyeza itunga ry'igihugu igihe yari ku butegetsi, ivyatumye Afrika y'Epfo ihomba miriyaridi 81 z'ama dorari mu kigega ca reta ikongera igatakaza amahirwe atari make. Cyril Ramaphosa yari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu n'umugambwe ANC uri  ku butegetsi ku gice kimwe c'ico kiringo c'ubutegetsi bwa Jacob Zuma. Uwo mukuru w'igihugu w'imyaka 68 yabwiye uwo mugwi ko amaze kumenya ko hari abagirizwa ibiturire yaciye afata ingingo yo kuguma mu nzego z'umugambwe kugira agwanye ibiturire ahereye imbere. Mu nyuma yahavuye yitoza kuba umukuru w'igihugu yemera kuzorwanya ibiturire muri reta no muri ANC. N'amajambo akomeye yashikirijwe na Ramaphosa - amajambo azotuma habazwa ibibazo vyinshi muri uwo mugwi w'amatohoza. Pumza Fihlani, umunyamamkuru wa BBC ari Johannesburg, avuga ko benshi muri ico gihugu biteze ko hari vyinshi bizoja ahabona muri iyo minsi ibiri umukuru w'igihugu azoba ariko arashikiriza ivyo azi. ANC, uvuga ko ari umugambwe  w'uburongozi rusangi, ubu nawo  ushinzwe ijisho. Pumza Fihlani avuga ko abanya-Afrika y'Epfo bifuza kumenya  abazobazwa ibiturire vyaranze imyaka 10 iheze, vyatumye reta idashitsa ivya nkenrwa ku bakene, bituma kandi ubuzi butakara mu mahinguriro amwe amwe. Yaba Zuma, waba n'umuryango w'aba Gupta , bose  barahakana ko ata caha bakoze.

column2: Africa-Ukraine: Ingaruka z'intambara ziguma zigaragaza uko bukeye uko bwije
column3: Gaz (umwuka)  yo gutekesha (Liquified Petroleum  Gas, LPG)  yaduze igiciro muri Kenya  gushika kuri 11 kw'ijana mu ndwi imwe gusa, mu gihe intambara Uburusiya bwateye muri Ukraine iriko iragira ingaruka ku biciro v'ibitoro kw'isi. Ubu igiciro ca gaz yo gutekesha muri Kenya kimaze kuduga gushika kuri 50 kw'ijana mu kiringo c'umwaka, ubu kikaba congeye umuzigo ku banyagihugu bari bahanzwe  n'uburyo bwagabanutse kubera ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ubu igiciro co kwuzuza icupa rya gaz ry'ibiro 13 ciyongeyeko 11 kw'ijana muri iyi ndwi n'ukuvuga ko bica bisaba amafaranga angana n'ama dorari ($) 29.30 (hafi 60.000 mu marundi canke 30.000 mu manyarwanda) rivuye ku ma dorari 26.26 ku ndwi iheze. Ubu icupa ry'ibiro 6 ryuzuzwa kuri $13.68 kare ryari kuri $12.43. Ni  ikimenyetso ko ibihe biri imbere bitagiye kworoha ku bantu b'uburyo bubayabaye basanzwe bari bahanzwe n'ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya vyaduze cane. Bitandukanye n'ibindi bikomoka ku bitoro  nka essence, amazutu na kerosene, muri Kenya ibiciro vya gaz yo gutekesha ntibishingwa na reta, bisigura ko abaguzi baca bahura n'ingaruka uko ibiciro bihindutse kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Kuri uyu wa mbere igiciro c'ibitoro bitayunguruye caduze gushika ku $140 ku kagunguru (barril)  kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika biramaze kuduza ibiciro vy'ibitoro. Mu Rwanda havugwa kuduga kw'igiciro c'ibitoro... No mu Rwanda kuva kuri uyu wa mungu hari ibiciro bishasha vy'ibitoro. Mazutu yavuye kuri 1.140Frw ija kuri 1.201Frw, essence iva kuri 1.225Frw ija kuri 1.256Frw. Itangazo ry'ubuyobozi bubijejwe rivuga ko n'aho ryirinze kuduza igiciro uko vyategerezwa kugenda kugirango ibiciro  muri rusangi ntibice biduga cane ngo vyonone umurindi wo kwivyukiranya ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ariko abaraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko  ibintu bishobora kwunyuka hamwe ihererekanywa ry'ivyo bitoro ryohungabana. Rolake  Akingube-Filani wo muri  Africa Energy Chamber avuga ati: "Amaherezo ingaruka zizova i Buraya zishike muri Afrika  aho ibiciro bishobora kuduga kurusha aho bigeze ubu." Yongerako ati: "Dukeneye kurondera uburyo bwo kwikwiza ku bitoro muri Afrika. Aho niho dushobora kwihagararako habaye ihungrana nk'iryo muri kazoza."

column2: Uko abahinga babaze umwana akiri mu mbanyi, nyina wiwe yamwise 'Igitangaro'
column3: "Ikintu ico ari co cose kibi gishobora gushika, ariko rero kubona nashoboye gukora (kubaga) uyu mwana, nibaza ko ari co kintu ciza nashoboye kumukorera. Mu mutwe wanje, nta kundi vyari kugenda - nategerezwa kumubaga". Inyuma y'incuro indwi zose bagerageza kumutera urubuto rwamaze guhura n'intanga (fécondation in vitro, IVF), Helena yari yamaze kwihebura ko ata wundi mwana wa kabiri azigera aronka. Ariko rero ku ncuro igira indwi, yashoboye gusama imbanyi mbere ibintu bibandanya neza gushika ku ndwi igira 20 aho bamupima bakabona ko hari ikibazo. Ico gihe, Helena yabwiwe ko umwana wiwe w'umukobwa yari yibungenze yari afise ikibazo c'uruti rw'umugongo (spina bifida). Avuga ingene bamubwiye, Helena avuga ati: "Yari afise intoboro nini ku mugongo kandi igice c'uruti rw'umugongo cari hanze. Bambwiye ko yari afise igihamana kibi co kumugara, ntashobore kwifata mu gusohora umwanda mukuru na muto, akaba kandi inyuma y'aho yategerezwa guterwa akaringoti ko kuvoma amazi yaboneka mu bwonko". "Narataye umutwe bambwiye ingaruka zose zishobora kumubako kubera izi ngorane, igihe cose nama mu marira". "Bamwiye ko amahirwe yo gutambuka yari make , make cane rwose - numva n'inguvu zose zimperanye". Mu misi yakurikiye, Helena yarungitswe ku bipimo bamwemerera ko bashobora kumubaga. Amaze indwi 23 yibungenze, yarungitswe ku bitaro vy'abahinga mu Bubirigi, bikorana n'ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu c'Ubwongereza, NHS. Umurwi w'abahinga ugizwe n'abantu hafi 25 nibo bakoze ico gikorwa kidasanzwe kandi kigoye, bashobora kubaga uyo mwana yari mu nda barakora urwo ruti rw'umugongo banazibira intoboro yari mu mugongo wiwe. Helena ati: "Nari nzi ko ni batambaga ubuzima bwiwe buzoba ukundi". Umwigisha wa kaminuza Anna David, akaba n'umuhanuzi ku bijanye n'amagara y'impinja kw'ishure kaminuza y'ubuvuzi ya Londres (University College Hospital), avuga ati: "Mu myaka iheze, uru ruhinja rwari gutegerezwa kubagwa kugira rusanasanwe rumaze kuvuka - ariko rero kubera ubu dushobora kubaga umwana ari mu nda ya nyina, iyo ntoboro twashoboye kuyizibira hakiri kare cane, bisigura ko ata ngorane nyinshi uruti rw'umugongo ruzogira". "Ibi biha amahirwe menshi uyu mwana gushobora gutambuka akanagenzura gusumba uruhago n'urura vyiwe". Haciye amezi atatu akozwe, Helena yahavuye yibaruka umukobwa wiwe Mila - impfunyapfunyo ya milagro, bisigura igitangaro mu rurimi rw'iki espangol - ku bitaro vyegukira iri shure kaminuza rya Londres. Mila aracafise uruziruzi mu bwonko, ariko gushika ubu ibimenyetso vyerekana ko abandanya akura neza. Helena ati: "Arashobora kuzungagiza amaguru we nyene, kandi umukoze ku mano aravyuma neza, n'ukuri ni ibintu bitangaje cane". "Nshimira cane aba baganga bakoze iki gikorwa co kumubaga kuko iyo bitagenda uko, ubuzima bwiwe bwari kuba ukundi". Iyi ndwara Spina bifida y'uruti rw'umugongo ikaba ifata abana bari mu mbanyi bashika hafi 1,500 ku mwaka mu Bwongereza, ituma uruti rw'umugongo rudakura neza. Ishobora gutera ubumuga, canke ibibazo vy'uruhago, urura n'amafyigo. Ariko iyo abaganga bashoboye kumubaga imbanyi imaze indwi hagati ya 22 na 26 hakurindira avutse, umwana ashobora kubaho neza. Iki gikorwa gisanzwe gikorwa n'abahinga bo mu bitaro vy'ishure kaminuza ya Londres (University College London), ibitaro vy'abana Great Ormond Street Hospital, hamwe n'ibitaro vyegukira Ishure kaminuza ya Louvain mu Bubirigi. Impinja 32 ziramaze gukorwa muri ubu buryo kuva mu kwa mbere 2020. Prof Stephen Powis, arongoye igisata c'ubuvuzi mu kigo NHS c'Ubwongereza, avuga ko aka ari akarorero kamwe mu buhinga bugezweho mu vyo ubuvuzi bikorwa n'ikigo NHS. "Hampande yo kurwanya ikiza karanda gihanze isi, NHS irabandanya ibi bikorwa bidasanzwe no kwitaho abarwaye". Kate Steele, arongoye ikigo Shine gifata mu mugongo imiryango yashikiwe n'iyi ndwara spina bifida ifata uruti rw'umugongo, hamwe n'indwara yo kuvyimba umutwe (hydrocéphalie), avuga ati: "Turizeye ko umuryango uwo ari wo wose ushobora gukenera ubu buhinga bwo gukora uruhinja ruri mu mbanyi uronswa akaryo ko gutahuzwa ko iyo nzira ari yo nyayo kandi bakabona ko bafashwe mu mugongo, nk'uko vyabaye kuri Helena".

column2: Sadio Mane: iki gihangange ca Liverpool yitiriwe ikibuga muri Senegal
column3: Sadio Mané yaronse ikibuga kimwitiriye mu gisagara ca Sedhiou  muri Sénégal inyuma yo gufasha igihugu ciwe gutahukana igikombe c'ihiganwa rya Afrika mu mupira w'amaguru. Uyu musatirizi wa Liverpool yinjije penalty yavuyemwo itsinzi igihe umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Sénégal Lions de la Teranga ( Intambwe za Teranga) zatsinda Misiri ku ma penalty 4-2, maze utahukana ku ncuro ya mbere ihiganwa rya Afrika mu mupira w'amaguru, ni inyuma y'urukino rwa nyuma rwarangiye ari 0-0. Ibitsindo bitatu yinjije akongera agatanga imipira ibiri yavuyemwo ibitsindo kuri uyu murwi w'iki gihugu co muri Afrika y'uburengero muri iryo higanwa vyatumye aronka agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza (Most Valuable Player, MVP), ubu naho umukuru w'igisagara ca Sedhiou, Adboulaye Diop, akaba yavuze ko ikibuga c'umupira kigiye kwitirirwa uyu mwana wabo akundwa cane. Diop yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu avuga ati: "Mu kwitirira Sadio Mané iki kibuga Stade de Sédhiou, nashaka gushimira abahungu n'abakobwa bose bo muri ino ntara, ndabicishije ku mugabo amenyekanishije kw'isi yose, Bambali n'umugwa mukuru wayo Sédhiou". "Ni ukuri Sadio Mané arakwiye guhabwa iri teka". Mané yarakunzwe n'amamiriyoni y'abantu kubera ibikorwa vyiwe vyo gufasha mu karere avukamwo inyuma yo kubemerera amafaranga yo kwubaka ibitaro n'ishure, anatanga n'intererano zo kwubaka imisigiti, yongera atanga amafaranga yo gufasha kurwanya Covid-19. Imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya mu kwa gatanu 2018, Sadio Mané yahaye imipira ya Liverpool abafana ba Bambali kugira ngo bazobe bayambaye igihe urwo rukino rwariko ruraba. Ico gihe, Mané yavuze ati: "Hari abantu bashika 2000 mu kigwati. Naguze imipira 300 ya Liverpool ndayirungikira abantu mu kigwati kugira ngo abafana bayambaye igihe bazoba bariko bararorera urukino rwa nyuma". Bambali niho Mané yarabiye urukino rwa nyuma rwabaye rurangiranwa hagati ya Liverpool na AC Milan mu 2005, aho Liverpool yivyukiranya yari yatsinzwe 3-0 mu gice ca mbere, ariko vyose irabikurayo mu gice ca kabiri, mbere iruhira gutahukana iri higanwa, ico gihe Mané yari afise imyaka 13. Ntiyigera yibagira i muhira. Urugendo rwa Mané rwabaye rurerure gushika aho aba umukinyi rurangiranwa kw'isi yose, atanguriye muri Metz mu Bufaransa gushika muri Liverpool abanje guca muri RB Salzburg yo muri Autriche/Austria no muri Southampton. Uyu mukinyi w'umwaka ku mugabane wa Afrika yaripfuza cane gutahukana iki gikombe muri Sénégal inyuma yo gutsindira ihiganwa ry'Ubwongerza Premier League hamwe n'ihiganwa rya Bulaya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Uefa Champions League) na Liverpool. Inyuma y'intsinzi y'umurwi wiwe muri Cameroun/Cameroon, Mané avuga ko gutsindira Sénégal mu gikombe ca mbere ca Afrika mu mupira w'amaguru ari co kintu ca mbere gikomeye ashitseko mu mwuga wiwe wo gukina umupira.

column2: Filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi Muhammad yahagaritswe mu Bwongereza
column3: Ikigo cerekana za filime co mu Bwongereza, Cineworld, cahagaritse kwerekana mu mazu ya filime (cinema) yaco yose muri ico gihugu filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi w'idini rya Islamu, Muhammad, nyuma y'imyiyerekano yadutse hanze y'ama-cinema amwe amwe. Ico kigo ca cinema cavuze yuko cafashe iyo ngingo "ku bw'umutekano w'abakozi n'abakiriya bacu". Abantu barenga 120.000 bashize umukono ku nyandiko isaba ko filime yitwa The Lady of Heaven (Umudamu w'Ijuru) itokwerekanwa muri za cinema zo mu Bwongereza. Ihuriro ry'imisigiti, The Bolton Council of Mosques, ryavuze ko iyo filime ari sakirirego kandi irimwo amacakubiri afatiye kw'idini. Ariko umukenguzamateka Baroness Claire Fox yavuze ko iyo ngingo "ari icago ku bugenegene kandi ikaba ari mbi cane ku bwigenge bwo gushikiriza iciyumviro". Nayo umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe amagara y'abantu, Sajid Javid, yavuze yuko "atewe umwitwarariko cane n'umuco wo kwiyamiriza uriko uragwirirana" mu Bwongereza. Iyo filime yakuwe mu bigo vya cinema vy'ikigo Cineworld nyuma y'amakuru y'imyiyerekano mu miji wa Bolton, Birmingham na Sheffield. I Bolton, abantu barenga ijana bagize imyiyerekano hanze ya cinema, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'ikinyamakuru caho, Bolton News. Mu butumwa bwa email bugenewe Cineworld bwashizwe ahabona na Bolton News, umukuru w'urwego Bolton Council of Mosques, Asif Patel, yavuze ko iyo filime "irimwo ingengabitekerezo y'amacakubiri afatiye ku dini" kandi yuko "ivuga ukutari ko kahise k'idini ikanasuzuguza icubahiro Islamu ihabwa n'amateka yayo". Igitangazamakuru cegamiye idini rya Islamu co kuri internet, 5Pillars, catangaje kuri Twitter amafoto y'abo cavuze ko ari aba-Islamu 200, bari mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyo filime imbere y'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Birmingham ku munsi wa Mungu. Video yahanahanywe kuri internet isa n'iyerekana umuyobozi w'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Sheffield ariko arabwira abari mu myiyerekano ko iyo filime yahagaritswe kwerekanwa, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Guardian. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Umuhinguzi mukuru (executive producer) ari mu bateguye iyi filime, Malik Shlibak, yabariye BBC ko abari mu myiyerekano bigenza "nk'amabandi arenganya abandi, bakisuka muri za cinema banatera ubwoba abahakora". "Ibi ni ibintu bitari bikwiye kwihanganirwa mu Bwongereza", nk'uko yabandanije avuga, aca agabisha yuko guhagarika kwerekana iyi filime bizoha ingoga abakoresha ukwiyamiriza nk'uko muri kazoza. Yabandanije agira ati "ibi birarengeye filime. Uno munsi hifatiwe mu gahanga filime Lady of Heaven, ejo harashobora kwiyamirizwa ikindi kigushika ku mutima kurusha". Yavuze kandi yuko abakora imyiyerekano batazoshobora kubuza kubaho kw'iyi filime.

column2: BAL2022: Umugwi New Star usaba urundi rukino inyuma yo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaboko Basketball mu Burundi FEBABU ryandikiye ishirahamwe ry'isi yose ry'urwo rukino FIBA risaba ko umugwi wa New Star urenganurwa ku ngingo wafatiwe zo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa kubera Covid. Umugwi wa New Star wahagaritswe mw'ihiganwa inyuma yo gusanga abakinyi bane b'uwo mugwi n'ababaherekeje babiri bafise umugera wa Covid-19. Mu rwandiko rwa FIBA ruvuga ko uwabanduje ari umukinyi yitwa Brian Kavakure. FIBA ikavuga ko, hishimikijwe amategeko y'iryo shirahamwe, abakinyi bose bategerezwa guca bashirwa mu kibanza ca bonyene. Banditse kandi ko "kubera abanduye bashobora kwanduza abandi ku kibuga, hafashwe ingingo ko umugwi wa New Star wirukanywe mw'ihiganwa." Urukino rwategerezwa guhuza New Star na Cape Town Tigers rwaciye rufutwa, New Star ica itsindwa impaga. Baba abarongozi b'umugwi wa New Star canke ba FEBABU ishavu riraniga, bavuga ko barenganijwe. Bagiriza umugwi wa Afrika y'Epfo, Cape Town Tigers, wari watsinzwe na New Star mu rukino rwa mbere ko ari wo woba uri inyuma y'uko kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa. New Star ntihakana ko ari abakinyi bayo basanganywe Covid ariko bagatangazwa n'uko umugwi wa Cape Town Tigers na wo wasanganywe umukinyi afise uwo mugera ata ngingo n'imwe wafatiwe. Aho ni mu gihe ari wo bategerezwa gutana mu mitwe. FEBABU iranibaza iti: "Bigenda gute ngo FIBA ivuge ko umukinyi wacu Brian Kavakure ari we yanduje abandi ariko akaba ata Covid bamusanganye, mbere akanahabwa n'uburenganzira bwo gutahana n'abandi mu Burundi?" Ikindi ishirahamwe rya Basketball mu Burundi rivuga n'ingene umugwi bari baraye bakinye na New Star wa Cobra Sport bawuretse urabandanya ihiganwa. New Star kandi, n'aho yari ibuze abakinyi bakomakomeye, yaratonze ku kibuga kugira bakine na Cape Town Tigers, ariko abo na bo ntibitaba. Ivyo ngo bikagaragara ko ari ivyari vyateguwe ko babakubita impaga babagiriza ko bamwe muri bo batowe Covid. Kubera izo mvo zose, FEBABU isaba ko New star yobandanya ihiganwa hisunzwe amanota iyo migwi ibiri yari imaze kuronka, canke hatunganywe urundi rukino rwobahuriza ku kindi kibuga.

column2: Kurondera amamuko nyafrika y''intambo y'intambara ya Brazil, capoeira
column3: Brésil  izwi nk'amamuko y'ubuhinga bwo kurwana busa n'intambo buzwi kw'izina rya capoeira, ariko amamuko nyezina mu bisanzwe yinjiye aciye mw'ibahari Atlantic. Marcia Veiga yandika ko muri Angola hari umugabo umwe ariko aragerageza kuvyura iyi ntambo yo muri kahise kugira ngo afashe abantu gusubira kw'iragi ryabo. Gatatu mu ndwi, ubushuhe bwo ku mugoroba burakubita, Lucio Ngungi ari mu kibuga ahantu hamwe i Luanda ku mugwa mukuru wa Angola. Akurikira akayira kagana ku kibuga c'umupira w'amaboko, mu gihe izuba ririco riracokera, hatangura kwumvikana amashi, indirimbo n'ingoma vy'abanyamuziki. Ku muzingi, abanyeshure bambaye T-shirts z'umuhondo ziriho 'masks' za kera, barindiranye igishika cinshi co kwinjira mu muzingi  babiri babiri. Bose ica rimwe, batangura bazunguruka bunamye i buryo n'i bubamfu, mu ntambo izwi nka Ginga. Umwe muri bo, asa n'uwataye umutwe, Ngungi, umukuru wabo yatwawe n'akaririmbo ngo: "Nta kindi gisigaye, hari ubumenyi butandukanye". Iyi rero ni Capoeira Angola, ubuhinga bundi bwo kurwana ariko bukoreshwa gake cane muri Bresil no muri Angola yo nyene ubwayo. Ariko izina ryayo ubwaryo rirerekana amamuko yayo yo mu binjana bitari bike - imbere y'uko abantu bagirwa abaja bakavanwa muri ako karere ko mu bumanuko bwa Afrika bakajanwa muri Amerika y'Ubumanuko kuba abacakara. Yavuyemwo ico icitwa Brésil ubu ibona ko ari umudiho ukomoka mu karanga nyafrika. Ibicurarangisho bifise uruhara ntangere mu gusamaza abarorerezi. Capoeira Angola irimwo akantu ko guterekera, kandi usanga ahanini batambira hasi cane. Nico gituma n'umuziki ugenda buke buke ugereranije n'umudiho uzwi cane, unzwi nka Capoeira Regional. Itandukaniro riri hagati ya  Capoeira Angola na Capoeira Regional ntiryoroshe kubona, ariko muri Capoeira Angola harimwo ibicurarangisho vyinshi kandi abayikora bumva ko ari nk'umugenzo wo gusenga. Intumbero ya Ngungi ni uko ubu bwoko bw'iyi ntambo bumenyekana cane mu bantu. Hafi imyaka 20 iheze, yatanguye kwimenyereza muri Capoeira Regional, ariko haciye imyaka indwi, yahavuye yumva ivya Capoeira Angola aca atahura ko Regional itari rwiwe. Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 36 ati: "Nagumye nibaza nti kubera iki mbandanya nkina Regional kandi nshobora kwishikira ku muzi w'igihugu canje". N'aho ata makuru akwiye yari afise, yarondeye kumenya umunya Brésil Pedro Trindade - yari azwi kandi nka Mestre Moraes - akaba yari yarigishijwe ko ari we muhinga yafashe iya mbere mu kunagura Capoeira Angola mu myaka ya 1980. Ngungi ati: "Rimwe rimwe ndashavura iyo niyumviriye ingene uruhara rwa Angola muri capoeira rwibagiwe". Mestre Moraes avuga ko uruhara rwa Afrika rwasuzuguwe, kimwe mu vyabitumye kikaba ari ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba. Asigura ati: "Yaramenyekanye nka kimwe mu karanga ka Afrika hanyuma ifatwa ko yari iyo kurwana kubera ishirahamwe ry'abacakara". Hagati mu kinjana ca 16, mu gihe bariko barakora mu mirima, abacakara batanguje icagiye kuba ishusho ya mbere ya capoeira ya Brésil, yahinduwe ubuhinga bwo kurwana buba nk'intambo kama. Inyuma y'aho ubucakara buvaniweho muri Brésil mu 1888, reta yarabujije capoeira, kubera ubwoba ko abacakara baronse ubwigenge bashobora kuyikoresha mu migumuko yari kugorana guhagarika. Yarabandanije mu kinyegero kandi abirabure benshi babandanije bakora icitwa ubu Capoeira Angola bakorera mu bibanza bitazwi, kandi bakoresha amazina atari yo mu kwiyoberanya. Mu myaka ya 1930, Reis Machado, azwi cane kw'izina rya Mestre Bimba, yatanguje uburyo bwo kwigisha capoeira bwatumye yoroha kwiga. Amaze kwumvisha ubutegetsi agaciro k'ubu buhinga bwo kurwana mu mico, bwahavuye bukuraho itegeko ryabuza capoeira, ivyamuhaye akaryo ko gutanguza ishure rya mbere ryigisha capoeira muri Brésil. Hagati aho, capoeira yabandanije gusuzugurwa, cane cane n'abanya Brésil bisununuye. Abonye bimeze uko, Mestre yaciye ashiraho ayandi mategeko ngenderwako - ategeka ko kuja muri yo utegerezwa kuba wambaye impuzu yera kandi nziza, ategeka abanyeshure kuza basa neza, mbere aca ashiraho n'uburyo bwo gutanga amanota ku barusha abandi. Ibi vyatumye capoeira ikwega abantu bashasha baciye batangura gukorera  capoeira mu nzu. Aha rero niho hatanguriye Capoeira Regional. Bitumwe n'uko hari bamwe babandanije bagendera kw'ishusho ya kera, bahavuye bemeranya ko boyita Capoeira Angola  kugira ngo bayitandukaye na capoeira Regional. Ariko uko imyaka yagiye iragenda, niko yagiye ishirwa ku ruhande ivamwo iribagirwa cane. Regional ifise umudiho unyaruka ugereranije na Capoeira Angola. Mestre Bimba yarongeye aravyorosha mu bicurarangisho bikoreshwa, aca akoresha cane umuduri n'ingoma. 'Yarangabanirije ishavu' N'aho yitwa gutyo, ibivugwa ko capoeira ifise amamuko muri Angola biracateye amadidane, kuko abacakara bavuye ku bivuko vya Luanda bari abavanywe mu turere dutandukanye twa Afrika yo hagati n'ubumanuko twose. Ariko ifitaniye isano n'intambo za Angola, nk'akarorero iyizwi nka N'golo - aho imisore ibiri irwana yigana ingene imparage zibiri zirwana barwanira umukobwa. Ariko, n'aho amamuko nyezina ataboneka neza, Ngungi yariyemeje gusubira muri kahise karanze igihugu imbere y'ubucakara yongere ahimirize abanya angola kwishimira akahise kabo. Yahunze afise imyaka 15 mu gihe ca ya ntambara yo muri Angola, ariko atahutse mu gihugu mu 2014, yashatse gufasha kuzana impinduka mu gihugu. Ngungi yabaye umuntu afasha abanyagihugu, hanyuma atanguza ishure ya mbere ya Capoeira muri Angola, Escola de Capoeira Angola Okupandula, bisigura ngo "ndagushimira wewe ngashimira na ba sokuruza". Yahawe ipete rya Contramestre (bisigura umuyobozi), kandi afise akarwi gato, ariko gafise ishaka, k'abanyeshure. Utujwi tw'ibi bicurarangisho -  agogô (amafirimbi), atabaque (ingoma) n'imiduri vyumvikana mu micungararo y'iri shure turyoheye ugutwi. Umunyeshuri w'imyaka 17 yitwa Kelly agira ati: "Nari mpagaze ku rubaraza neraguza irya n'ino kugira menye iyo ayo majwi yariko arava, ariho nagiye mbona Contramestre". Eka na Marcos w'imyaka 18 ni uko nyene, aho yagiye kumenya Capoeira Angola yumvise uwo muziki igihe yari ku rubaraza, haraciye imyaka itanu. Ati: "Nkina  Capoeira Angola imisi itanu mu ndwi kandi ndakunda ingene ingabaniriza ishavu, ikamfasha kwiyumva neza, ikamara irungu, kandi ikamfasha kwibagira ivyo hanze". Ukwigisha abanyeshure insiguro ya kahise ka Angola hampande y'umuco w'abanyaburaya ni ngombwa kuri iyi shure. 'Mu kintu kinini cane' Aguinelo umunyeshure akiri muto w'imyaka 15 ati: "Nize vyinshi ku muco wanje ndetse n'igihugu canje biciye muri Capoeira Angola gusumba kw'ishure". Mestre Moraes agereranya Capoeira Angola na ca kimenyetso cerekana isi idahera (symbole de l'infini/infinity symbol), ashaka kuvuga ko hagati mu muzingi umucapoeirista (ni ukuvuga uwukora capoeira) yumva ata mipaka ihari kandi ata n'umwe asumba uwundi. Ati: "Ikwigisha ko uri mu kintu kinini cane" . Abanyeshure ba Ngungi ni bo kimenyetso cavyo. Marcos ati: "Numva nishimiye kuba mfise ikibanza mu kintu kimbohoza cavuye mu bucakara, nk'umuntu nigenga". Indoto ya Ngungi ni uko umusi umwe yozogura ubutaka bukwiye yokwubakamwo ishure kugira ngo abandanye ahimiriza urwaruka gukoresha Capoeira Angola. "Nditaho cane abantu banje kandi nama ndiko ndiyibutsa ko kwishura ivyiza bankoreye atari agahato ahubwo ko ari igikorwa ntegerezwa gukora".

column2: Russia yahaye amasaha indwi ingabo za Ukraine ziri i Mariupol ngo zikishikane, zanse
column3: Nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko ingabo za Ukraine zirwanira mu gisagara ca Mariupol cugarijwe zihava zishikana ku ngabo z'Uburusiya, nk'uko zari zatewe akamo n'iki gihugu kimaze igihe cugaye iki gisagara kiri ku nkengera y'inyanja mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine. Umuhanuzi w'umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol, Petro Andriushchenko, yavuze abicishije ku rubuga rwa Telegram ko "n'aho Uburusiya bwatanze 'akanya ko kwishikana' ku ngabo zacu zisigaye" muri ico gisagara "abarwanyi bacu barabandanya urugamba". Umushingamateka wa Ukraine aserukira akarere ka Odesa, Oleksiy Goncharenko, yabwiye BBC ko ingabo za Ukraine ziri i Mariupol zitazokwishikana ku ngabo z'Uburusiya. Ati: "Naravuganye nabo ejo, kandi ndazi ko bazorwana gushika ku wa nyuma". Uburusiya bwari bwemereye ingabo za Ukraine zirwanira mu gisagara ca Mariupol ko zishobora kuticwa - ariko gusa mu gihe zari gushira ibirwanisho hasi kuri uyu wa Mungu zikishikana. Reta y'Uburusiya yavuga ko ingabo za Ukraine "n'abacangero mvamakungu " bakirwana i Mariupol -  igisagara Uburusiya buvuga ko bwigaruriye hafi cose - bari bafise amahirwe yo gushira ibirwanisho hasi hagati y'isaha cumi na zibiri z'agatondo (06h00) gushika isaha indwi z'umurango (13h00) mu masaha ya Moscou hanyuma bagashobora gukira. Yavuga ko abakora ivyo bashobora gufatwa neza hisunzwe amasezerano ya Geneva agenga impfungwa z'intambara. Iri tangazo ntirivuga icoba mu gihe hogira umusirikare n'umwe wa Ukraine yokwanka gushira ikirwanisho ciwe hasi - ariko rikavuga ko reta yemeye ibi "mu kwubahiriza iteka rya kiremwamuntu". Uburusiya buvuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zigisigaye muri ico gisagara zazibiriwe mu gace gatoya ka Azovstal gahingurirwamwo ivyuma. Iri tangazo ryavuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya "zari kubandanya zisohora" ibiri mu vyo izi ngabo za Ukraine zikiri i Azovstal zemerewe uko iminota 30 iheze ijoro ryose. Uburusiya buvuga ko ingabo za Ukraine ni zemera kwishikana, ingabo z'Uburusiya zari kumanika amabendera atukura isaha cumi na zibiri hanyuma iza Ukraine nazo zigashobora kumanika amabendera yera. Rihimiriza kandi izo ngabo ko zitorinda kurindira uruhusha ruva i Kyiv kugira ngo zishikane, ariko ko zokwifatira ingingo zo nyene. Imbere y'aha, Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky yari yatangaje ko "guhonya" abarwanyi bakirwanira i Mariupol gushobora gutuma ibiganiro n'Uburusiya bihagarara burundu. Ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'intara ya Donesk iherutse gutangazwa n'Uburusiya ko ari igihugu cigenga (Donetsk People's Republic, DPR) atangarije ko abarwanyi ba Ukraine basigaye i Mariupol bazokwanka kwishikana bazohonywa. Afatiye ku kungene igisagara kiri hafi ya Kyiv casambuwe n'ibibombe, Perezida Zelensky yabwiye urubuga ngurukanabumenyi Pravda  ati: "Mariupol ishobora kuba nka Borodyanka incuro cumi". Muri ino ndwi, Moscou yatangaje ko abasirikare ba Ukraine barwanira mu mazi barenga 1000 bishikanye i Mariupol, ivyo Ukraine yoyo yahakanye. Inyuma y'aho ejo ku wa gatandatu Uburusiya buhereye amasaha make yo kwishikana ingabo za Ukraine zirwanira i Mariupol, Perezida Zelensky yaremeye ko ingabo za Ukraine zigisigaranye agace gatoya gusa ka Mariupol, anavuga ko reta iguma ivugana n'abo bacirwanako. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters risubiramwo Zelensky avuga ko ibintu bimeze nabi cane. Ariko ntiyavuze ku bivugwa n'Uburusiya ko igisirikare cabwo cakubuye udusigarira tw'ingabo za Ukraine mu gisagara cose kimaze igihe gisatirwa, kiretse izari zikiri ku ruganda rwa Azovstal - uruganda rukomeye ruhingura ubutare bw'icuma. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya yavuze ko ingabo za Ukraine zababa 2500 ari zo zikiri muri urwo ruganda, kandi ko ata saganirizo zisigaranye kuko zugaraniweyo n'abasirikare b'Uburusiya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta TASS. BBC ntiyashoboye guhinyuza aya makuru. Icegera c'umukuru w'ikambi y'umunani mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya, Vladimir Petrovich Frolov, yasize ubuzima mu ntambara muri Ukraine, nk'uko bitangazwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ry'Uburusiya TASS. Aya makuru yemejwe na buramatari wa St Petersburg,  Alexander Beglov. Beglov avuga ati: "Vladimir Petrovich Frolov yapfuye nk'intwari mu ntambara n'intagondwa za Ukraine". Uyu muburamatari avuga ko Frolov "yitanze kugira ngo abana, abagore n'abatama mu ntara ya Donbas ntibasubire guterwa amabombe". Ariko amabombe menshi aterwa muri Ukraine aterwa n'Uburusiya. Muri ino ntambara, abajenerali b'abarusiya batari bake n'izindi ntwazangabo mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya bavugwa ko bahasize ubuzima. Ni ibintu bidasanzwe kwumva intwazangabo zo ku rwego nk'urwo bishira mu kaga mu kwegera cane urubuga rw'intambara, amakuru ava mu bihugu vyo mu burengero akavuga ko bakora gutyo mu ntumbero yo kuraba ko bofata urugamba mu minwe mu gihe, hamwe hamwe rwagenze nabi.

column2: Abantu bakomakomeye Africa yabuze mu mwaka urangiye: abaperezida, abahoze ari abaperezira n'abandi
column3: Mu gihe umwaka waraye urangiye uwundi nawo ukaba utanguye, turabire hamwe bamwe mu bantu bakomeye bapfuye kuri uno mugabane wa Afrika. Turabe cumi muri aba bantu tutakiri kumwe. Mamma Sarah, nk'uko bamutazira, yagiye kumenyekana cane kw'isi igihe umwuzukuru wiwe Barack Obama abaye umukuru w'igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2009, ariko imbere y'aho, yari azwi cane mu karere yamukamwo mu burengero bwa Kenya aho yari yarongowe n'umugabo yari akuze cane nawe akiri umuyabaga - nk'uko imico n'imigenzo yabitegeka. Mu myaka mirongo, yari arongoye ikigo co gufasha kwigisha impfuvyi n'abakobwa, ikintu yiyumvamwo cane kubera we nyene ubwiwe atari azi gusoma. Mu 2014, ONU yaramuhaye agashimwe ku gikorwa ciwe. Barack Obama  yavuze ko kwitangira indero vyatanguriye ku bana biwe, ati: "N'ubwo atari nyina wiwe w'amaraso, Nyokuru yarareze dawe nk'umwana wiwe, kandi urukundo rwiwe ruri mu vyatumye dawe ashobora guhangana n'ingorane aritwara neza mw'ishure gushika aho aronka uburenganzira bwo kuja kwiga kw'ishure kaminuza ryo muri Amerika". Barack Obama yavuze ko mu buzima bwiwe, Sarah Obama yagiye abona impinduka zitari nke uko ibihe vyagenda "ariko ubutwari bwiwe  - kugira umutima rugabo, yiyemera, akunda ibikorwa, adatwarwa n'ibihuhusi hamwe n'ubugwaneza vyiwe - ntibwigeze buhungabana". Sarah Obama yapfuye ku wa  29 z'ukwa gatatu 2021 Urupfu rw'uyu yari umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania rwatangajwe mu kwa gatatu inyuma y'indwi zirenga zibiri zari ziheze ataboneka. Reta yatangaje ko yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima, ariko rero abakeba biwe bamwe bamwe ba poritike bavuze ko yari yanduye Covid-19. John Magufuli, uwakuriye mu muryango w'abarimyi, yagiye kuba umukuru w'igihugu mu 2015 akaba yari mu bategetsi bari bubashwe muri Afrika. Kw'izina ry'iritazirano nka Tingatinga (The Bulldozer), abamurwanya bamwagiriza ko yari umutegetsi yatwaza umukazo yarwanije ibinyamakuru, agatera ubwoba abatavuga rumwe nawe, yongera atuma abantu benshi bahitanwa na ca kiza ca coronavirus kubera yafashe minenerwe imigambi yo kukirwanya. Muri iki gisata, twatakaje kandi : Umukuru w'igihugu wa Tchad Idriss Déby, yiciwe ku rugamba, hamwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Côte d'Ivoire Hamed Bakayoko, yahitanywe na kanseri. Abahoze ari abakuru b'ibihugu vya Algeria - Abdelaziz Bouteflika, Madagascar - Didier Ratsiraka, Somalia - Ali Mahdi Mohamed na Chad - Hissène Habré, nabo nyene barapfuye. Icegera c'umukuru w'izinga rya Zanzibar Seif Sharif Hamad, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Zimbabwe Sibusiso Moyo hamwe n'umushikiranganji yari ajejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu Joel Biggie Matiza nabo bose barapfuye bahitanywe na  Covid-19. UMUNYAMUZIKI Alemayehu Eshete, 80 Uyu azwi nka Elvsi wa Ethiopia, Alemayehu yabaye rurangiranwa muri Ethiopia mu muziki wo mu mudiho wa jazz kuva mu myaka ya 1960 akaba yabandanije aryohera abantu gushika umwaka wanyuma w'ubuzima bwiwe. Kuva akiri muto, yari azwi cane mu gusubiramwo indirimbo za Elvis Presley, ariko mu 2008 yabwiye ikinyamakuru Guardian ko James Brown ari we yahavuye aba icitegererezo kuri we. Ati: "Nambara nk'umunyamerika, ndatereka imishatsi yanje, nkama ndirimba Jailhouse Rock na Teddy Bear - rimwe na rimwe twararirimba Strangers in the Night. Ariko kuva igihe ntanguriye kuririmba indirimbo z'iki amharic, abantu barankunze bimwe bidasanzwe". Alemayehu Eshete yapfuye ku wa 02 z'ukw'icenda, abanya Ethiopia bakimukunda cane. Muri iki gisata c'abanyatugenegene, twaratakaje kandi : umunyamuziki wa Afrika y'Epfo Sibongile Khumalo, yaririmvye kuva ku midiho ya jazz gushika ku midiho kama; umucuraranzi w'itarumbeta wa Afrika y'Epfo Jonas Gwangwa;  umuririmvyi w'indirimbo zihayagiza Imana n'umudiho wa jazz  Wambali Mkandawire; umwe mu banyamuziki ba Senegal bakomeye cane Thione Seck; umunyamuziki wa Cameroun  Wes Madiko; umunyamuziki w'umunyarwanda wo mu mudiho wa rap Jay Polly, yari yapfunzwe yagirizwa gutunga ibiyayuramutwe; umunya Namibia yaririmba mu mudiho wa hip-hop Kanibal hamwe n'umwe mu baririmvyi ba Algeria  bakunzwe cane Rabah Deriassa UMUHINGA mu kuremura ibihimba vy'umubiri Matolase Mtonga, 34 Nk'umwe mu bahinga ba Zambia mu vyo kubaga mu kuremura ibihimba vy'umubiri vyonionekaye  (chirurgie plastique/plastix surgery),  Mtonga yagiye kubona umuhamagaro wiwe igihe yariko aravura abarwayi bahiye, ico gihe akaba yari umunyeshure yiga ivy'ubuganga. Ishirahamwe ReSurge ryanditse riti: "Ni ukuri yari icitegererezo c'umugore w'akarorero, kandi yari mu nzira yo kuba umugore wa mbere muri Zambia yose w'umuhinga mu bijanye no kuremura ibihimb vy'umubiri vyononekaye. Uru ni uruhombo rukomeye cane, atari gusa kuri twebwe twari tumuzi, ariko kandi no kuri kazoza muri iki gisata, haba mu gihugu ciwe eka mbere no kw'isi yose". Mtonga yapfuye mu kwa cumi na kabiri haciye igihe gito avuye mu nama ya chirurgie plastique yari yabereye muri Amerika. Rwabaye urupfu rubabaje cane. Ubutumwa bwacishijwe kuri Facebook ni ubwo umugabo umwe yavuriye umugore wiwe mu myaka mike iheze, aho yanditse ati: "Dr Mtonga yageze kure akoresha amafaranga yiwe kugira agure ivyari bikenewe kugira ngo ashobore kuvuga umugore wanje, aho hose yashaka ko umugore wanje akira ukuboko kwiwe kw'iburyo n'intoke". Twatakaje kandi: Umwigisha wa kaminmuza wa Nigeria akongera akaba n'umuhinga mu bijanye n'imigera David Olufemi Olaleye hamwe na John Baptist Mukasa, umwe mu bahinga bake ba Uganda mu bijanye n'ukubaga imitsi, yari yiyemeje kwigisha abandi baganga ku nyungu za kazoza. Uyu munya Afrika y'Epfo yahanganye n'ubutegetsi bw'ivanguramoko bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yinjiye mw'ishengero rya Anglican  aratera imbere gushika aho aba umwirabure wa mbere abaye Musenyeri mukuru  wa Cape Town mu 1986  - haciye imyaka ibiri ahawe ka gashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel ku ruhara rwiwe mu kurwanya intwaro y'inkehwa z'abazungu. Kw'izina ry'iritazinaro rya The Arch, yahavuye agenwa kurongora umurwi wo kumenya ukuri n'ukurekuriranira inyuma y'aho Nelson Mandela atsindiye amatora ya mbere y'inyuma ya apartheid mu 1994. Nk'umuntu yafatwa nk'umuhanuzi muri Afrika y'Epfo, Tutu ntiyatinya kunegura bikomeye ubutegetsi bw'inyuma ya apartheid muri ico gihugu yataziriye The Rainbow Nation.  Tutu yapfuye mu kwezi guheze kwa cumi na kabiri, iyi ndwi yose ikaba iheze bariko baramwunamira, bikaba bitegekanijwe ko ashingurwa kuri uyu wa gatandatu. Twatagkaje kandi : FW de Klerk, umukuru w'igihugu wa nyuma w'ubutegetsi bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yasangiye agashimwe ka Nobel na Mandela mu 1993 kubera yafashije mu biganiro vyarangije ubutegetsi bwa apartheid. TB Joshua yapfuye ku wa 05 z'ukwa gatandatu. Ubutumwa bwacishijwe ku rubuga  rwa Facebook rw'uyu muvugabutumwa wa Nigeria  bwavuga buti: "Imana yisubije Umukozi wayo". Bwatumye imiriyoni n'imiriyoni y'abanywanyi b'ihsengero ryiwe kw'isi yose Synagogue Church of All Nation baja mu kigandaro. Uyu muvugabutumwa yari asanzwe afise abanyaporitike bo hejuru mu banywanyi biwe, yagiye kuba rurangiranwa kubera "ibitangaro" vyiwe, mbere akaba yatangaje ko yari afise ububasha bwo gukiza indwara z'ubwoko bwose, harimwo n'umugera wa SIDA. Muri iki gisatan yene twaratakaj: Umukardinali wa Cameroun Cardinal Christian Tumi, aho urupfu rwiwe rwashize hamwe mu mubabaro iki gihugu kirangwamwo indyane,  Alexandre José Maria dos Santos, umupatiri wa mbere w'umwirabure wa Mozambike yagiye kuba mu nyuma umu kardinali wa mbere w'ico gihugu, umutegetsi wo mw'idini rya Islam muri Tunisia  Hichem Djait hamwe n'umusenyeri mukuru wa Katorika muri Sudani y'Epfo Paulino Lukudu Loro. Abanonotsi ba Kenya baracitse intege bamaze kwumva ko mugenzi wabo yaciye umuhigo kw'isi yacumiswe imbugita gushika yitabe Imana mu kw'icumi. Umugabo wiwe, Ibrahim Rotich, avuga y'uko ata ruhara afise muri ubu bwicanyi. Tirop yaboneka ko yari agiye kuba umwirutsi rurangiranwa inyuma yo guca umuhigo ku birometero 10 ku ruhande rw'abagore mu kw'icenda, mbere akaba yaraserutse mu nkino za Olempike i Tokyo. Twatakaje kandi: Umunyonzi w'ikinga wa Eritrea Desiet Kidane, yapfuye agonzwe n'imodoka igihe yari mu myimenyerezo, umunya Senegal yahoze arongoye ishirahamwe ry'abanonotsi kw'isi (IAAF) Lamine Diack, umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wa Afrika y'Epfo Ryder Mofokeng yabaye kizigenza w'umurwi Kaizer Chiefs mu kiringo c'imyaka 11, hamwe n'umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Nigeria Yisa Sofoluwe, yari azwi mu murwi nserukiragihugu nka "Defence Minister" (umushikiranganji w'ukwivuna abansi). Uyu mwami w'Abazulu muri Afrika y'Epfo, yari umuntu akomeye cane yaharanira akaranga n'imico kama mu myaka 50 yose yari amaze ku butegetsi. Yari uwo mu muryango w'Umwami Cetshwayo, yayoboye Abazulu muri ya ntambara yabahuza n'igisirikare c'Ubwongereza mu 1879. N'aho uyu mugabo, se w'abana 28 yavyaye ku bagore batandatu, ata butegetsi bwa poritike bwite yari afise, yaserukira abafise ivyiyumviro vy'uko Afrika y'Epfo itiyigeze yibagira akahise kayo, n'aho yahindutse ikaba igihugu ca none. Umwe mu bagore biwe, umwamikazi Queen Mantfombi Dlamini-Zulu, yaramusubiriye mu kwa gatatu, ariko yaciye apfa haciye ukwezi kumwe gusa. Twatakaje kandi: Sulutani Sultan El-Hadj Ibrahim Mbombo Njoya w'umunya Cameroun, umwami w'abanyagihugu bo mu bwoko bw'aba Pedi muri Afrika y'Epfo, Victor Thulare III na Kefa Sagbadjou Glele, umwami w'aba Abomey muri Benin. Uyu mukinyi w'amareresi wo mu Misiri yamaze imyaka 50 akina amareresi. Yarakinye amareresi ateye ubwoba ariko kumbure yari azwi cane kandi akundirwa ubuhinga bwiwe bwo gutwenza. Kuri bamwe, izina rya El-Bably ryibutsa imyaka ya 1950 na 1960 igihe sinema yabica bigacika. Mu nyuma yahavuye amenyekana cane kuri televiziyo akina udukino mu mareresi yakunzwe cane mu buzima bwa buri muryango igihe cose ca Ramadani. Soheir El-Bably yapfuye k uwa 21 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe. Twatakaje kandi : Umunyarwenya w'umusomalia Ibrahim Ismail, azwi cane ku ritazirano rya  Soran, hamwe na Abdi Muridi Dhere uwundi munyarwenya w'umunyasomalia nyene. Uwundi umwe mu banyarwenya ba Nigeria rurangiranwa Baba Suwe na we nyene yarapfuye. Uyu yarwaniye ukwikukira kwa Zambia yapfuye mu kwa gatandatu, yari umwe mu bategetsi ba nyuma ba Afrika barwanije intwaro za gikoloni. Yavuga ko icipfuzo ciwe ari ukubona buri munya Zambia afise igi ku meza mu mfungurwa ziwe zo mu gitondo, agacupa k'amata - kandi buri munya Zambia akambara ibirato. Kw'izina ry'iritazirano rya KK, yarakunda kuvuza igitari, akaba yari umwigisha imbere y'uko yinjira mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ukwikukira, mbere akaba yari mu bantu bari bafashe mu mugongo utwigoro two kurandurana n'imizi ubutegetsi bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yongera afata mu mugongo imihari yo kwibohora muri Mozambike no muri Zimbabwe.

column2: Africa mu mafoto muri iyi ndwi: 20-26 Ukwezi kw'umunani 2021
column3: Amwe amwe mu mafoto meza cane muri Afrika n'ahandi. Amafoto yose afitiwe uruhusha rwo kuyakoresha.

column2: Covid: Biden avuga igitigiri ca 500.000 bamaze gupfa ari ''intambwe ivuna umutima''
column3: Prezida Joe Biden yashikirije ijambo igihugu ubwo Amerika yarenganye igitigiri c'abantu ibihumbi amajana 500 bamaze guhitanwa n'impfu zifatiye kuri Covid, igitigiri ca mbere kinini mu bihugu vyose vyo kw'isi. Biden yavuze ati: ''Nk'igihugu, ntidutegezwa kwemera akaga kariko karadushikira.Dutegerezwa kwanka gutimbishwa n'intuntu.'' Umukuru w'igihugu n'icegera ciwe, n'abo bubakanye,baciye bamara akanya mu gacerere hanze ya Maison Blanche(White House) mu birori vyo kwatsa buji. Ubu abantu banduye umugera wa corona muri Amerika  ni miriyoni 28,1. Naco nyene nico gitgiri ca mbere kinini kw'isi. . Biden yavuze ati: "Uyu munsi nsavye Abanyamerika bose kwibuka. Kwibuka abo twabuze no kwibuka abo twasize inyuma", anasaba abanyamerika kugwaniriza Covid hamwe. Biden yavyifashemwo gute kuri uwo munsi? Prezida yategetse amabendera yose yo mu bibanza mpuzantara kuduzwa gushika hagati muri iyi minsi itanu iri imbere. Ku ngoro y'umukuru w'igihugu, yuguruye ijambo ryiwe yerekana ko igitigiri c'Abanyamerika bamaze kwicwa na Covid kiruta abishwe mu ntambara ya mbere y'isi , intabara ya kabiri y'isi n'intambara yo muri Vietnam ubafatiye hamwe. Yavuze ati : ''Uyu munsi vy'ukuri n'umunsi mubi, umunsi w'intambwe ivuna umutima-abantu 500.071 bamaze gupfa.'' Yabandanije ati: ''Hari aho twumva abantu bavugwa ngo Abanyamerika basanzwe. Ikintu nk'ico ntikibaho. Nta kintu cari gisanzwe kuri bo. Abantu  twabuze ntibari basanzwe. Bari mu myaka myinshi y'urunganwe. Bavukiye muri Amerika, bimukiye muri Amerika. None benshi muri bo bahemye irya nyuma bonyene muri Amerika'' Yafatiye ku vyamushikiye mu buzima bwiwe mu kwerekana akababaro-umugore wiwe n'umukobwa wiwe baguye mw'isanganya ry'imodoka mu 1972 hanyuma umwe mu bahungu biwe yicwa na cancer yo mu bwonko mu 2015. At: "Ndazi ico arico kuba utari hafi iyo bishitse. Ndazi icari co iyo uhari ukabafata ibiganza; urabona ingene bakuravye hanyuma bakigira.'' "Kuri jewe, inzira yo kurwanya intuntu n'ugutora ico tugamije". Intumbero ya Biden itandukanye n'iyo uwo yasubiriye, Donald Trump yari afise kwijijanya ingaruka z'uwo mugera kandi yabonwa nk'uwagize ikibazo ca poritike ukwambara agafukamunwa n'izindi ngingo zo kwirinda gukwirakwiza uwo mugera. Ku wa 19 ukwezi kwa mbere, buca Biden atangura amabanga, yarakoze umugirwa wo kwibuka abanyamerika 400.000 bari bamaze guhitanwa n'iyo ndwara. Umunsi wo kuri uyu wa mbere washitse haheze hafi ukwezi. Ahandi mu gisagara ca Washington, amakengeri kuri National Cathedral yavuze incuro amajana atanu, rimwe rimwe ryose ku bantu 1.000 bamaze gupfa muri iki kiza. Dr Ashish Jha, umukuru w'igisata c'magara y'abanyagihugu kuri kaminuza ya Brown yabwiye BBC News  ati  : "Haraheze umwaka ntibaza ko  inusu y'umuriyoni w'abantu bashobora gutakaza ubuzima kubera iyo ndwara. Dufise ubushobozi bwinshi, dufise uburyo bwinshi…ibi vyose twari kuvyirinda,ntivyari gushika. Ariko none raba aho tugeze.'' Igihe co  kubaho muri Amerika ubu cagabanutseko umwaka wuzuye kubera Covid-19,nk'uko vyavuzwe ku ndwi iheze n'ikigo ca Amerika kijejwe kurwanya no gukinga indwara. Ico gihe cagabanutse cane mu bo mu bwoko bwa banyamuke ari nabo uwo mugera wasinzikaje cane ugereranije n'abandi. Ibirabure bataje imyaka itatu ku gihe cabo co kubaho hagati y'ukwezi kwa mbere n'ukwa gatantatu mu 2020. Abagabo bakomoka muri Amerika y'Epfo (Hispanic) nabo batakaje imyaka 2,4 muri ico kiringo.

column2: Zambia yahagaritse urukino rwa kivandimwe na Afrika y’Epfo kubera ibitero ku banyamahanga
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Zambia (FAZ) ryahagaritse urukino rwa kivandimwe rwoyihuje na Afrika y'Epfo kuri uyu wa gatandatu ku mugwa mukuru Lusaka. Iyo ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'ibitero vyakozwe ku banyamahanga mu gihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo. Abanyagihugu ba Zambia baciye ku mbuga hwaniro barasavye ko iryo shirahamwe FAZ rihagarika urukino hagati ya Chipolopolo na Bafana Bafana nk'ukwerekana akababaro. Umukuru wa FAZ Adrian Kashala yemeje iyo ngingo, yongera ko y'uko urwo rukino rwungururijwe ku rindi genekerezo ritamenyekanye, inyuma y'aho babonaniye n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika y'Epfo, SAFA. Muri uwo mwanya nyene, leta ya Zambia yahanuye abadereva b'amakamyo ko bohagarika ingendo zabo muri Afrika y'Epfo gushika umutekano ugarutse muri ico gihugu. Umushikiranganji w'ukwunguruza abantu n'ibintu, Mutotwe Kafwaya, yasavye abadereva basanzwe bari muri Afrika y'Epfo ko bobika amamodoka yabo ahantu hatekanye gushika umutekano ugarutse. Ivyo bitero ku banyamahanga vyasubiye kwiyongera vyatumye amaduka y'abanyamahanga asahurwa urukombamazi, amamodoka araturirwa, eka n'amakamyo yagendeshwa n'abanyamahanga araterwa. Eka n'ishirahamwe rijejwe iterambere rihuza ibihugu vyo mu karere ka Afrika y'Ubumanuko, SADC, ririyamiriza ivyo bitero. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'iryo shirahamwe,  Stergomena Tax, avuga ko SADC iteye ivyatsi ubwo bukozi bw'ikibi butagira izina bukorerwa abanyamahanga muri Afrika y'Epfo, agasaba ko ico kibazo cotorerwa inyishu irama.

column2: Kenya: Abasoromyi b'icayi bajanye urubanza muri sentare ya Scotland
column3: Abakozi indwi bo mu mirima muri Kenya  bitwariye muri sentare yo muri Ecosse (Scotland ) imwe muri kompanyi zikomeye cane kw'isi zimbura icayi  basaba indishi ku mvune batewe n'akazi. Abo basoromyi b'icayi bavuga ko bagize imvune nyinshi  kubera uburyo bakoramwo mu mirima ya James Finlay  Kenya Ltd. Iryo ni ishami rimwe ry'iyo kompanyi ikorera henshi kw'isi ifise amamuko muri Glasgow mu kinjana ca 18. Iyo kompanyi ntiyemera urwo rubanza mu gushigikira ingingo zayo zijanye n'amagara n'umutekano mu kazi. Finlays batanguye bacuruza ipampa muri Ecosse mu 1750 ubu bakaba bafise  ibikorwa mu migabane itanu y'isi, Starbucks ikaba ari umwe mu bakiriya babo. Iyo kompanyi ni nini  cane ku buryo yimbura icayi gikwiye igikenerwa ku mwaka mu Bwongereza bwose. Iyo kompanyi yimuye icicaro cayo gikuru ikivana Glasgow ikijana Londres haraheze imyaka 15 ariko n'ubu yanditswe ko ikorera Aberdeen, ivyo bigatuma imanza irimwo zijanwa muri sentare za Ecosse. Abo bagabo n'abagore indwi bitwaye basaba indishi ingana n'ibihumbi 15 mu mafaranga y'abongereza £15.000, umwe umwe muri sentare ya Sheriff Personal Injury muri Edinburgh. Uwubunganira muri Kenya, Isaac Okero, avuga ko bagize imvune zitandukanye harimwo no mu ruti rw'umugongo. Yabwiye BBC Scotland ati: "Abo bakozi bo mu cayi bavuga ko baravye imyaka bamaze bakorera James Finlay Kenya Ltd, n'uburyo bakoreramwo, bagiye baragira imvune buhoro buhoro gushika aho zigira ingaruka ku buzima bwabo." "Izo mvune zifatiye ku mubiri no mu mutwe." Okero avuga ko bamwe bari bagikora igihe urwo rubanza rwatanguzwa muri ico gisagara kiri ku birometero birenga ibihumbi bitandatu uvuye muri Kenya, ariko ubu umwe wenyene ni we agikora. Abandi barungitswe mu kiruhuko canke naho ntibaba bagishobora gukora. Yibaza ko urwo rubanza ruzogira ingaruko irenze aho. Yavuze ati: "Twizeye ko ruzotuma iyo kompanyi ihindura cane uburyo abakozi bakoreramwo, uru rubanza rero rukazotuma haba akarusho gafadika mu masezerano n'uburyo vy'akazi k'abasoroma icayi, hanyuma harangire ivy'uko hari abakozi b'abanyaKenya bagira invune zibakurikirana ubuzima bwose nk'uko aba bakozi indwi vyabashikiye." Umuhinga mu bijanye n'imvune z'akazi David Short wo mu kigo ca Balfour and Manson co muri Edinburgh ni we  ahagarariye abo basoromyi b'icayi. Yavuze ati: "Mu rubanza rwo muri sentare kimwe mu bintu vya mbere  ubanza kuraba n'aho witura, ni iyihe sentare izotwemerera kwakira urubanza. "Ngaha dufise kompanyi yanditswe muri Ecosse, gutyo rero ikibanza ciza c'urwo rubanza ni muri sentare yo muri Ecosse. "Twitwaye mu rubanza ku bisanzwe  rwobereye muri Kenya. Rwerekana uburyo abakozi babo bakoreramwo n'ubutunzi bwabo." Imyaka ibiri urubanza rumaze gutangura mu 2017, umucamanza yategetse ko Finlays ireka abunganira mu mategeko abo basoromyi bagashika mu mirima yayo muri Kenya, ikabareka bakaraba uburyo abantu bakoreramwo. Finlays yaciye ishingisha urubanza rwo kuvyanka mu masentare yo muri Kenya iranarutsinda ivuga ko ingingo yo muri Ecosse idashobora gushirwa mu ngiro kiretse ibanje kwemerwa na sentare yo muri Kenya. Abasoromyi b'icayi barunguruje kuri iyo ngingo, uruzocibwa rukaba rwitezwe gusohoka mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Short avuga ati: "Bitwaza ngo ntivyemewe mw'ibwirizwanshingiro. "Naho vyoba biri uko, ni kuki batatureka ngo tuje kuraba? Ndakeka ko ari uko badashaka ko tubona uburyo buteye ubwoba abo bantu bakoreramwo." Mu kwezi kwa kabiri, abo basoromyi b'icayi barerekanye uburyo abakozi bo mu yindi kompanyi yo muri Kenya bakoreramwo, abunganizi babo bo mu Bwongereza barabiraba. Gwen Morgan-Evans, wo mw'ishirahamwe ry'abashingwamanza Hugh James, avuga ati: "Twaragiye muri Kenya turi kumwe na babiri mu bahinga bo mu Bwongereza kugira barabe ingene icayi gisoromwa kugira bagire inama sentare yo muri Ecosse y'ingene ubwo buryo bwo gukora buhungabanya amagara. "Ico kibazo gishika kure. Hamwe urwo rubanza borutsinda, abarushingishije bizigiye ko vyozana akarusho ku bakora mu cayi muri Kenya." Ikinyamateka ca vuba ca Finlays 1750 cashimikiye ku bikorwa vyayo muri Kenya. Umukuru w'iyo kompanyi Guy Chambers yakibwiye ati: ''Turemera ko vyose bitera ngo de kandi ko hama hari ivyo gukora neza gusumba. "Ariko abatunegura rimwe na rimwe barirengagiza urugero rw'utwigoro twagize mu gufasha ab'aho dukorera." Mw'itangazo umuvugizi yagize ati: ''James Finlays [Kenya] Ltd  yiyemeje kwiregura ku birego vyose vyashikirijwe haba muri sentare nkuru ya Nairobi canke iya All Sheriff Personal Injury." Iyo kompanyi ivuga ko ibikorwa vyayo vyo kurima no guhingura icayi muri Kericho na Bomet birimwo abakozi ibihumbi 8 n'ubundi buzi bushamikiye ku cayi vyose ''bitanga inyungu ifadika muri ako karere". Iryo tangazo rirabandanya riti: "Twama turondera gushika ku rugero rwo hejuru rwo kwitaho amagara, umutekano n'ineza y'abantu bose dukorana. "Dufise ingingo twashizeho kuva kera zijanye n'amagara n'umutekano aho hose dufise ibikorwa kw'isi, harimwo no muri Kenya." Mu myaka ya 1980, imyiyerekano yarabaye hanze y'ahariko harabera inama rusangi ya buri mwaka ya Finlays i Glasgow ku buryo bwo gukoramwo mu mirima yayo y'icayi mu Buhindi. Umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano mu 1984 yari Roger Jeffery, ubu akaba ari umwigisha muri Kaminuza ya Edinburgh mu gisata c'ivyigwa vya poritike. Yavuze ati: "Uwurongoye iyo kompanyi ico gihe yavuze ko turi abantu bahiga isoko hose, tuja ahantu hose turondera kuronka inyungu ku banyamitahe bacu kandi avuga ata kivyerekana na kimwe ashize ahabona ko ari abakoresha beza kandi ko abantu baronkera akarusho mu bikorwa vyabo." Agira ico avuze ko urwo rubanza rw'ubu, Prof Jeffrey yavuze ati: "Uvyihweje neza muri rusangi, wokwemera ko kurima icayi ari igikorwa kibangamye,  kandi ntibashobora gutangura guha abakozi babo imishahara nk'iyitangwa i Buraya, ariko nemera ko bashobora gusumvya  uko biri ubu."

column2: Sylvana Ntiyibagira, azwi ku ndirimbo yiwe izwi cane WIBUKE USHIME yitavye Imana
column3: Sylvana Ntiyibagira, azwi ku ndirimbo yiwe izwi cane WIBUKE USHIME yaritavye Imana mw’ijoro ryo ku wa kane rishira ejo ku wa gatanu. Indirimbo yiwe yaramenyekanye cane mu myaka ya 1980, akaba yararirimbanye n’abaririmvyi batandukanye bo mu murwi rurangiranwa witwa AMABANO. Hagati aho, nk’uko bivugwa n’umwe mu baririmvyi amuzi, Sylvana Ntiyibagira ntiyigeze aja muri iyo mirwi y’abaririmvyi yari ikomeye nka za AMABANO, NAKARANGA, n’iyindi. Yari mu baririmvyi bakunda kuririmba ari bo nyene (solo). Sylvana yavukiye mu Kabezi mu ntara ya Bujumbura mu mwaka wa 1965, akaba yatanguye kuririmba mu murwi w’abaririmvyi ba paroisse kubera yavuka mu muryango w’abakirisu, mu gasengero ka Irtyazo Sylvana ahanura abaririmvyi ba kino gihe kwitonda bagategura neza indirimbo zabo kugira ngo koko bashobore gutanga inyigisho kubera, nk’uko yabivugiye mu kiganiro yari yahaye Radio Isanganiro ikorera mu Burundi, indirimbo za kino gihe usanga ata kanovera zigifise. Sylvana asize aban batatu. Umviriza indirimbo yiwe  WIBUKE USHIME

column2: Covid -Omicron: Abagwayi biyongereye incuro zibiri muri South Africa mu masaha 24
column3: Abajejwe amagara y'abantu bavuze ko ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus, Omicron ubu  aribwo bwiganje cane  muri Afrika y'epfo kandi ko bwongereje igitigiri c'abariko barandura bashasha. Abagwayi bashasha ba Covid bashika 8500  ni bo bamaze kumenyekana  mu biharuro vya buri munsi vyo muri iyi misi ya vuba. Ivyo biharuro ni nk'incuro zibiri igitigiri  ca 4300 bari bemejwe ko bandukiwe n'iyo ngwara ejo hahise. Ubu Omicron imaze gutorwa mu bihugu 24 hirya no hino kw'isi nk'uko bishikirizwa n'ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS. Afrika y'epfo ni co gihugu ca mbere catanguye gutora ubwo bwoko bushasha buhindagurika cane. Ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe ingwara zandukira (NICD) kivuga ko urugero rurenga  70% vy'ibipimo vyose vyakozwe mu kwezi guheze vyatowemwo ubwo bwoko bushasha. Ubuhinde, Ghana, Saudi Arabia na Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu ni bimwe mu bihugu biherutse kwemeza vyabonetsemwo Omicron. Ibindi harimo Ubwongereza, Reta Zunze Ubumbwe za Amerika n'Ubudagi vyarabonetsemwo  abantu banduye ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa corona. Haracari ibibazo vyinshi kuri Omicron bitararonka inyishu, harimwo kumenya icerekeye ubushobozi incanco z'ubu zifise bwo gukinga uwo mugera. WHO yabwise "ubwoko bwa corona buteye umutima uhagaze" inavuga ko ibiherutse kugaragara vyerekana ko ugusubira kwandura iyo ngwara bishoboka ku rugero rwo hejuru. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, ibihugu vyo hirya no hino kw'isi vyarahagaritse ingendo z'indege ziva muri Afrika y'Epfo  igihe hamenyekana ko buriko burakwiragira. Ibi  vyatumye umushikiranganji wa Afrika y'Epfo ajejwe imigenderanire yidoga ko bahanywe - hagukomerwa amashi - kuba batoye ubwo bwoko bwa Omicron. Umukuru w'igihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo Cyril Ramaphosa nawe yavuze ko "ababajwe cane"  n'ihagarikwa ry'ingendo, yavuze  ko ata shingiro rifise. Umukuru wa WHO Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus yaragabishije ko izo ngingo ku kiza Covid zihana Afrika y'ubumanuko. Urugero rw'abandura  ubwo bwoko bushasha rwitezwe kuduga mu gifatwa ubu nk'intango y'umupfunda ugira kane muri Afrika y'Epfo, igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu kikavuga n'igitigiri c'abinjira ibitaro kimaze kwiyongera gato. Umunyamakuru wa BBC mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu Nick Triggle avuga ko ico ivyo bisigura ku zindi mpande z'isi zisigaye kitagaragara, narirya Afrika  y'Epfo yigeze kugira ikindi gitigiri kinini c'abagwayi b'ubundi bwoko bwa corona - Beta - butigeze butera ingorane zikomeye mu bindi bice vy'isi. Kubera ubwo bwoko bwa Beta na Delta, ishusho nyayo y'ingene ibintu vyifashe muri Afrika y'Epfo ntiizogaragara gushika "abantu bagware cane bakenere kuja mu bitaro" , ivyo navyo bikaba bishobora gufata "indwi zitatu, zine.." nk'uko bivugwa na Prof Salim Abdool Karim wo mu mugwi ujejwe kurwanya Coronavirus. Yabwiye ikiganiro ca BBC Newsday ati: "Inyishu turonka iva ku rubuga n'uko bidakabije cane - nta kintu giteye ubwoba gitandukanye n'ivyo tubona canke n'ivyo tumenyereye kubona." Benshi mu bagiye mu bitaro muri Afrika y'Epfo ntibari baricandagishije coronovirus nk'uko bivugwa n'igisata ca NICD. Nta bukene bw'incanco buri mu gihugu, kandi prezida Ramaphosa yahamagariye abantu bose kwicandagisha, avuga ko ari bwo buryo bwonyene busigaye bwo kugwanya uwo mugera. Abanya-Afrika y'Epfo bashika ku bice 24% ni bo bamaze guterwa incanco zose - baruta kure abarenga i 6% bamaze kubikora ku mugabane wa Afrika wose mu kwezi kwa cumi, ariko bakaba bari hasi cane y'ibiharuro vya vuba vyo ku mugabane wa Buraya aho abamaze gukingirwa bishika ku 54%.

column2: Perezida Nkurunziza w'u Burundi hari ivyo asaba amadini kwirinda, rimwe rivuga ko 'rizovuga ukuri'
column3: Perezida Petero Nkurunziza w'Uburundi asaba abarongoye amadini ko bokwirinda kugwa mu mutego muri kino gihe u Burundi buriko bwitegurira amatora yo mu mwaka uza wa 2020. Amwe mu madini nka Ekleziya Katolika yoyo ivuga ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije yibuka imyaka ine amaze atowe n'abanyagihugu ubwabo ku ncuro ya kabiri, Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ko bokwirinda "kugwa mu mutego w'abahanuzi b'ibinyoma n'inyigisho zikomoka hanze" avuga ko zitajanye n'ivy'Imana. Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ati: "Si ivy'imbeshere, bamwe mu bakozi b'Imana baraguye, abandi barakomereka bongera bakomeretsa abayoboke babo; babera umuzimagiza abo bajejwe aho kubabera urumuri n'icitegererezo". Ntadoma urutoke kw'idini iri canke ririya, gusa Ekleziya Katolika ni yo ikunze kwagirizwa ko yivanga mu vya politike. Bavuga ko ibi ibikora cane cane mu gihe ishikiriza aho ihagaze ku biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu mu butumwa bukunda gusomwa mu masengero yose ya Katolika mu gihugu. Abasenyeri ba Katolika bobo bamenyesha ko ata nyigisho za politike batanga, ahubwo ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo "kuko iyobokamana rirangukira mu buzima bw'abantu". Mu ndwi iheze, mu birori vy'uguhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Assomption, Pascal Nyabenda arongoye inama nshingamateka, yasavye abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika kuguma hagati na hagati, ntiberekane aho bahagaze mu vya politike kuko ngo bitsitaza abakirisu. Mu kumwishura, Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, Yohakimu Ntahondereye, yamenyesheje ko bazovuga ijambo ry'Imana uko riri ata gucisha iruhande, "n'aho hari aho rigera rikababaza".

column2: Covid: Ico kiza cagabanije umunezero w'umwaka mushasha hirya no hino kw'isi
column3: Amategeko yo kwikingira mu misi mikuru y'umwaka mushasha ariko arashirwaho hirya no hino kw'isi mu gihe ibihugu vyinshi bihanganye n'iyongerekana ry'abagwayi ba coronavirus. Ukurasa ibintu biturika kandi vyakaka mu kirere hamwe n'ayandi makoraniro ntibirekuwe kuva i Sydney gushika i New York. Ibirori ntibizoba na cane cane i Buraya, mu gihe hari ubwoba ko hari ubundi bwoko bwa coronavirus bwadutse. Ubufaransa bwategekanije abapolisi 1000.000 bo kugenzura imisi mikuru y'umwaka mushasha no kwubahiriza amasaha y'umukwabu. Abantu barenga umuliyoni 1.8 baramaze gupfa bahitanywe na coronavirus hirya no hino kw'isi kuva ico kiza giteye haraciye umwaka. Abantu barenga imiliyoni 81 baramaze gufatwa n'iyo ngwara. Ingene ibihugu vya Aziya na Pacifique vyabangamiwe? Kimwe mu bihugu vya mbere vyashikiriye umwaka mushasha ni Australia. Ibintu biturika kandi vyakaka birabandanya kuraswa mu kirere, ariko nta bantu baza kwemererwa gukoranira ku kivuko co muri ico gisagara mu kuwigina. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa New South Wales, Gladys Berejiklian avuga ati:"Ntidushaka gutuma haba imisi mikuru ikwiragira hose ku mugoroba w'umwaka mushasha." Benshi mubaba i Sydney baza kuguma imbere y'imboneshakure, aho abantu bazoba barekuriwe kuja hamwe batarenga batanu, nk'uko umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC ari muri ico gisagara, Phil Mercer abivuga. Mu Bushinwa, ibirori vy'umuco w'amatara vy'umwaka mushasha mu gisagara ca Pekin vyahagaritswe. Imisi mikuru yagabanuwe cane mu bisagara vyo muri ico gihugu. Ubuyapani bwahagaritse umusi mukuru usanzwe uhimbazwa buri mwaka mushasha aho igikomangoma Naruhito n'abandi bo mu muryango wiwe baramutsa isinzi ry'abantu. Mu Buhinde, i Delhi no mu bindi bisagara vyinshi hashizweho umukwabu hamwe n'izindi ngingo zibuza amakoraniro y'abantu benshi ku mwaka mushasha. I Buraya ho gute? Mu Bufaransa, reta yategetse ko haba abajejwe umutekano bagaragara mu bisagara hose kuva isaha zibiri z'ijoro ku musi wa kane, isaha umukwabu utangurirako. I Paris, igice c'itereni zica mu kuzimu kizoba cugaye ku mugoroba. Ubufaransa bumaze kwiyugarana incuro zibiri, ububare, inzu z'uburiro hamwe n'ibibanza vy'akahise bizoguma vyugawe ku musi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha. Mu Bwongereza - aho coronavirus nshasha iriko irakwiragira vyihuta kandi abantu imiliyoni 20 bamerewe nabi cane  mu turere dusinzikaye cane,  bategetswe kuguma mu mihana yabo - Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yahamagariye abantu gukurikiza amategeko yo kwikingira Covid. Ku musi wa gatatu yavuze ati:"Ibi ntibisigura ko mubonana n'imiryango hamwe n'incuti mu mazu yanyu, kiretse igihe musanzwe mubana, kandi mukwiye kwirinda amakoraniro y'abantu benshi ayo ari yo yose." Igipolisi co mu bisagara cateye akamo abakunda kugira imisi mikuru i Londres "ko bohimbariza umwaka mushasha mu mazu yabo." Irlande irongereza ingingo zo kwikingira kuri uyu wa kane, ibuze imigenderanire hagati y'amazu, yugare ubuguriro budakenewe cane ihagarike no kuja ku birometero bigera kuri bitanu mu kiringo c'amezi atatu. Ubudagi buri mu mategeko yo kugaranwa gushika itariki 10. Reta yahagaritse ibintu biturika birwaswa mu kirere, ishiraho n'ingingo zindi zikomeye ku gitigiri c'abantu bashobora guhurira hamwe. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu Jens Spahn yavuze ko igihugu gishobora "kugira umusi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha w'agacerere" utazopfa wibagiwe. Holande na yo nyene iri mu ngingo zo kutava ku muhana, zitegekanijwe kurangira itariki 19 z'ukwezi kwa mbere. Uguharura umwanya usigaye ngo umwaka mushasha ushike, kuza kubera ku kibuga ca Amsterdam, ata mu ntu n'umwe ahari. Turkia kiratangura imisi ine yo kwiyugarana kuva ku mugoroba w'umwaka mushasha. Muri Amerika, abategetsi bashizeho ingingo zo guhagarika imisi mikuru mu ntara no mu bisagara vyinshi. I new York, umupira wakaka uri mu kibanza ca Times Squares uraza kururutswa mu mihango y'umugenzo wo guharura umwanya usigaye ngo isaha zitandatu z'ijoro zishike, ariko nta bantu bazoba barekuriwe kuza muri ico kibanza. Ibintu biturika kandi bica ibibatsi biraswa mu kirere vyahagaritswe mu bisagara harimwo San Francisco na Las Vegas.

column2: Pierre Buyoya yahoze arongoye u Burundi yashengeye ku myaka 71
column3: Pierre Buyoya yabaye Prezida w'Uburundi mu biringo bitandukanye gushika ku myaka 13, yashengeye afise imyaka 71. Umuntu umwe wo muryango wiwe yabwiye BBC ko yahitanywe na Covid-19 kandi ko yaguye i Paris mu Bufaransa. Umudipolomate umwe w'igihugu ca Buraya na we yemeje inkuru y'urupfu rwa Pierre Buyoya. Mu kwezi kw'icumi k'uyu mwaka, ubucamanza bw'Uburundi bwamuciriye igihano co gupfungwa ubuzima bwiwe bwose ahamwe n'ivyaha bine bifatiye kw'igandagurwa ry'umuhisi Prezida Melchior Ndadaye. We co kimwe n'abandi 18 bagirizwa kugira uruhara mw'igandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu wa mbere yatowe n'abanyagihugu mu nzira ya demokarasi, Prezida Melchior Ndadaye. Mu kwezi kwa 11, Buyoya  yatangaje ku mugaragaro ko atanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe aho yahora aserukira ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika muri Mali no mu karere ka Sahel. Mu kiganiro ico gihe yagiranye n'abanyamakuru i Bamako muri Mali, Buyoya yavuze ko ari ingingo yafashe we nyene ubwiwe kugira ngo ahangane n'uru rubanza.
