column2: Nigeria: Uyu mupatiri yiyemeje gukingira ibigirwamana vy'aba Igbo biriko biraturirwa
column3: Mu gihe abavugabutumwa bo mw'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu buseruko bwa Nigeria bagenda baturira ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyo muri kahise babona ko ari ibigirwamana, umupatiri umwe w'umukatorika wewe abandanya avyegeranya. Ibi bibumbano bifise ikibanza gikomeye mu madini kama yo muri ako karere kabamwo abo mu bwoko bw'aba Igbo, basanzwe babifata nk'imana zabo kandi bemera ko bifise ubushobozi ndengakamere. Gusa abanywanyi b'aya madini kama bagenda bagabanuka kubera idini rya Gikristu - ahanini rigizwe n'amashengero ya Pentecote - rigenda ryigarurira abatari bake. Abanyamakuru ba BBC Igbo Chiagozie Nwonwu na Karina Igonikon barerekana utwigoro tw'uyu mupatiri two gukingira kahise kariko karatokombera kubera ibikorwa vy'abavugabutumwa bamwe bamwe. N'aho bamwita "umuriro waka", nta kintu giteye ubwoba kuri Patiri Paul Obayi arongoye inzu ndangamurage ishinguwemwo ibigirwamana mu gisagara ca Nnsuka kiri mu buseruko bwa Nigeria. Iyi nzu ndangamurage y'ivyumba bitatu iherereye mu kigo c'Isengero nkuru ya Katorika yitiriwe umweranda Tereza (Saint Theresa), irimwo amajana n'amajana y'ibigirwamana bitandukanye, ikibumbano c'intambwe hamwe n'ibishusho vy'imana z'aba Igbo. Iyo hagize abava inyuma y'izi mana kama, cane cane kubera inyigisho z'amashengero ya Pentecôte bamwe mu bavugabutumwa baca baturira ibi bibumbano, bavuga ko biteye kubiri n'ukwemera gushingiye ku Mana imwe, kandi ko ari "impwemu mbi zitera imikoshi". Rimwe na rimwe, hari n'abemera izo mana kama bo nyene ubwabo bavyituririra bishimikije umugani wo mu migenzo y'aba Igbo uvuga ngo: "Iyo imana ibangamye cane, icika urukwi rwo guturira". Ariko Patiri Obayi wewe yafashe iyindi nzira mu gukingira izo mana n'imanakazi, akavuga ko akoresha ububasha ahabwa n'Imana kugira ngo azake izo nguvu ndengakamere. Ibi vyamutumye bamutazira Okunerere - "umuriro uturira ibigirwamana muri mutima". Ari kuri iyo nzu ndangamurage, yavuze ati: "Naramaze gusambura izi mpwemu". "Iki ubona hano ni ikibarara. Nta kintu na kimwe kirimwo". Patiri Obayi avuga ko ahanini yigiye ku mazu ndangamurage yo mu bihugu vyo mu burengero bw'isi biriko biraterwa igitsure kugira ngo bigarukane ibibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni, aho atanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Benin Bronzes/Bronzes du Bénin (ibibumbano vy'ivyuma birenga igihumbi vyari bishashije ingoro y'umwami w'icitwa Ubwami bwa Benin, ari yo Nigeria ya kino gihe). "Naragendeye amazu ndangamurage yo mu burengero nca nsangayo ibi bibumbano, harimwo mbere n'ivyavuye muri Benin, ariho naca nigira inama yo kubibungabunga". Uwurongoye iyi sengero nkuru, Patiri Eugene Odo, arashigikiye aka kigoro kiwe, aho agereranya iyi nzu ndangamurage n'iyindi yegukira Katorika mu Butaliyano. Ati: "I Roma nk'akarorero, hari inzu ndangamurage ibitsemwo ibintu vyahinguwe mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwa gipagani bw'Abaromani, kandi ingenzi zama zigendera iyo nzu mu ntumbero yo kwiga ingene umuntu yagiye atera imbere". N'aho iyi nzu ndangamurage ibitse ibi bigirwamana yakira ingenzi ziva kure mbere n'i Lagos, irakeneye kugarukirwa. Ibibumbano, bimwe mbere bimaze ibinjana, bisanzaye irya n'ino hasi muri iyo nzu, vyuzuye inkungugu. Hari mbere n'ivyamaze kuribwa n'umuswa. Ibi vyose ni ivyo yegeranije mu "butumwa amaze akora mu kiringo kirenga imyaka 20 aho agenda yigisha mu bisagara no mu mitumba itandukanye mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. Ati: "Abantu barandikira isengero ryanje bansaba ko ngenda kubakuriraho ibi bigirwamana bibabujije amahoro". Ni itunga rikomeye ryerekana imana z'aba Igbo z'ubwoko bwinshi. Ariko iyikomeye muri izi zose ni Adaada leja, ikigirwamana cambitswe inkofero y'injishano yasengwa n'abarondera kuvyara. Patiri Obayi avuga ko iyi imaze imyaka hafi 200. Odinani, idini kama ry'aba Igbo, ryariho imbere y'umuzo y'idini rya Gikristu n'ubukoloni.  Ni uburyo bwo guterekera aho abantu basenga umuzimu userukiwe n'igishusho kizwi kw'izina rya chi, kugira ngo ubasabire kuri Rugira Vyose, bita Chukwu. Izindi mana basenga harimwo: Si benshi bagisenga izi mana kama, kandi abenshi barahamwa cane n'abakirisu basanzwe ari na bo benshi. Imisi mikuru yabo irasuzuguritse, kandi n'imigirwa imwe imwe isa no kubandwa ibonwa nabi mbere birashika n'utuzu tw'indaro tugaterwa mu bikorwa bijanye n'ubukristu. Muri kino gihe, abenshi mu bakigendera muri aya madini kama ni abatama, n'aho ubu hari bamwe mu rwaruka bagenda bagarariza ubukristu bagashira imbere imigirwa barazwe n'abakurambere. Chinasa Nwosu, umusenyeri w'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu rusengero rwa Royal Church ruri mu gisagara Port Harcourt kiri mu buseruko, ararwanya bikomeye uku kwemera kama. Musenyeri Nwosu yatanguye kumenyekana mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1990 igihe yasambura utuzu tw'indaro, aturira ivyitwa ibigirwamana, anarandura ibiti avuga ko vyari "ibiti vya shetani/satani". Ibi biti, bimwe muri vyo bikaba ari ivya kera cane, bizungurutswe hasi n'ibitambaro vy'amabara atukura canke yera, bigafatwa nk'ivyeranda ku bayoboke bavyo babisenga bakanabitambira. Hari bimwe usanga biri ku mihana y'abantu ariko vyinshi biri mu mashamba. Ati: "Imana ntishaka ko dusenga ibigirwamana. Idini kama rya Afrika akenshi rishingiye ku gusenga ibigirwamana". Asubiramwo amajambo yo muri Bibiriya, yongerako ati: "Imihezagiro uyironka mu gihe utaye ivyo bintu vyavumwe". Avuga ko ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni mu burengero bwa Nigeria ubu bikaba bibarizwa mu mazu ngandamurage yo mu bihugu vy'uburengero, bitirirwa Imana iyo ari yo yose, akaba ashigikiye ko bigarukanwa mu gihugu. Hagati aho, aragabisha reta ya Nigera ko mu gihe yogarukana ibibumbano bishobora kuba vyaragizwe ibigirwamana, agatanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Ikenga biri mu nzu ndangamurage y'Ubwongereza, ko bikwiye guturirwa. Ibi vyiyumviro birarwanywa bikomeye na Patiri Obayi yiyemeje gukingira ibi bibumbano mu nzu yiwe ndangamurabe. Ati: "Ibi ni ibibumbano abana bacu bazokwigirako kugira ngo batahure neza ingene abakurambere babo bari babayeho".

column2: Umunsi wahariwe isi: Umurundi Yves Kami mu bakoze indirimbo iwuhimbaza
column3: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Yves Kami ari mu bandi 200 bo hirya no hino kw'isi bahinyanyuye indirimbo Resolution Song, igamije guhimiriza abatuye isi kuyikingira. Itariki ya 22/04/2022 ni umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe kwita ku si dutuye mu gukingira ibidukikije, ukaba wahuriranye n'ishirwa ahabona icese ry'umugambi Resolution Project. Uwo mugambi ni uw'indirimbo yiswe Resolution Song yerekeye gukingira ibidukikije, yagomba kuririmbwa mu ndimi 200 zo hirya no hino kw'isi. Umugambi Resolution Project watangujwe n'ikigo Tackroom Theatre, gifadiganije n'ibigo bihinyanyura umuziki hamwe n'ivy'imbuga hwaniro birimwo Deccca Records, WWF International, Tik Tok, Acccenture n'abandi baririmvyi batandukanye bo kw'isi yose. Muri abo baririmvyi, harimwo Umurundi Yves Kami, akaba ari we yatowe mu Burundi ngo akore iyo ndirimbo ashizemwo ikirundi akanayiha umudiho w'ikirundi. Ku bw'ukwo gutoranywa, Kami yabwiye BBC ati: "Jewe ndi umu 'artiste' akora umudiho wisunze imidiho yo ngaha iwacu. Nkora afro ndayicanze n'ingoma nzo ngaha mu Burundi. "Burya ivyo umuntu aba ariko arakora barabikurikirana. Nagiye mbona umuntu andondeye, arambarira umugambi nanje numva neza ko ari umugambi mwiza. "... umuziki wacu tuwukoresha kugira [duhimirize] abantu [...] tuwukoresha kugira ngo ushobore gufasha [ikibano] tubayemwo." Umugambi Resolution Project watangujwe mu 2019 ku cicaro ca ONU, ukaba ushigikiwe na ba rurangiranwa ba Hollywood nka Emma Thomson, Naomi Harris, Keira Knightly, Marc Rylance na Bill Bailey. Intumbero yari uko itariki ya 22/04/2022 ishika izo ndirimbo zose 200 hamwe na video zazo vyamaze gushirwa ahabona bishobora kwumvirizwa. Izo ndirimbo zose zifise amajambo amwe hamwe n'injana (melodie) imwe, ariko buri muririmvyi akaza arashiramwo akiwe kajanye n'umuco wiwe. Kami avuga ko bitari vyoroshe guhindura mu kirundi indirimbo isanzwe iriho ngo ariko baroroherejwe. Yagize ati: "Cabaye igikorwa kitoroshe ariko baraduhaye umwidegemvyo wo gukora irya ndirimbo twisunze ama 'realites' yacu yo mu Burundi. "Nico gituma muri irya ndirimbo murumvamwo inanga y'ikirundi, murumvamwo ingoma, murumvamwo akazehe, murumvamwo umudiho w'amayaya." Urashobora kwumva ukanaraba amashusho y'indirimbo Resolution Song ya Yves Kami ngaha.

column2: Uganda: Bituye sentare kubera bahawe udukingirizo tudakomeye tugatabuka mu mibonano
column3: Abaganda batatu bitwariye ikigo kijejwe kugenzura imiti mu gihugu hamwe n'ishirahamwe Marie Stoppes, bakavuga ko babahaye udukingirizo tubadokeme twabateye kwandura umugera wa SIDA  no gusama inda batipfuza. Umwe muri abo bagabo avuga ko yakoresheje udukingirizo twitwa Life Guard, ariko tukaba twarapasutse mu gihe yariko agira imibonano mpuzabitsina, vyatumye yandura umugera wa SIDA, mu gihe uwundi nawe yanduye agashangaza (blennorragie). Uwundi mugore nawe avuga ko yasamye inda kandi yakoresheje ako gakingirizo. Mu kwa cumi na rimwe 2019, abategetsi ba Uganda barategetse ko udukingirizo twari tumaze gutangwa incuro zibiri n'iryo shirahamwe Marie Stopes Uganda rijejwe irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza dukurwa kw'isoko. Urwandiko rwabo ruvuga ko utwo dukingirizo tutapimwe kugira twemezwe ko dukwije ibisabwa n'amategeko imbere y'uko duhabwa abanyagihugu. Ishirahamwe Marie Stoppes yatanze udukingirizo tungana n'imiliyoni zibiri ku kwezi mu gihugu. Muri urwo rubanza, abitwaye basaba ko uruhusha rwo kwinjiza no gutanga utwo dukingirizo ruhagarikwa. Basaba ko ikigo kijejwe imiti mu gihugu, ari naco gitegerezwa gupima imiti yose n'ibindi vyose bikoreshwa mu buvuzi imbere y'uko bishirwa kw'isoko, ko cemera ko cananiwe mu mabanga yaco. Utwo dukingirizo tungana n'umuliyoni twavanywe kw'isoko na leta mu kwa cumi na rimwe 2019, kubera imyidogo y'abanyagihugu. Ico gihe ikigo kijejwe imiti muri Uganda (NDA) cari giherutse gusohora urwandiko kivuga ko ibipimo vyerekana "udutoboro n'ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko utwo dukingirizo dushobora guturika". Ariko kuva ico gihe, hari bwinshi bwari bumaze kugurishwa, ubugera ku bice 70% bwonyene bukaba ari bwo bwonyene bwavanywe kw'isoko. Abagabo babiri bitwariye ishirahamwe Marie Stoppes mu rubanza rundi bari bunguruje mu kwa kabiri uno mwaka, basaba indishi y'akababaro.

column2: Germany: Igarariza rya Katolika mu guhezagira ababana basangiye igitsina, n'abagore basoma misa
column3: Ng'izo inkengeri ziravuze, inanga ziratangura gusamirana, maze Patiri Jan Korditschke na we araduga kuri Arutari kugira ahereze inkuka y'imisa. Vyose bisa nk'uko vyahora bimeze iyo hageze imisa ku wa Mungu muri Katolika. Ariko muri ako kanya nyene, hari ikintu kidasanzwe kiri mu mitima ya bamwe kandi kibateye impungenge. Ikintu kigomba kibe ni ikidasanzwe na gato. Patiri Korditschke arafashe ijambo, ati "uwo wese yipfuza umuhezagiro w'Imana ni ahaguruke". Hafi abari mw'isengero bose barahaguruka, harimwo n'abatari bake basanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina. Ng'ako akaririmbo karatanguye, patiri na we aregera, maze abaza umwe umwe ico yipfuza gusaba Imana mu bisabisho vyabo. Hanyuma niko kuganzura ibiganza yubika ku mitwe yabo asengera umwe umwe. Hari benshi bakoroye amosozi. Aba rero si abandi, ni ba bandi bubakanye basangiye ibitsina, inyuma y'imyaka itari mike nibwo bwa mbere bakiriwe ukuri kwamye muri Ekleziya. Umwe muri bo Sangha, umukatolika kuva avuka ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye, Frieda kuva imyaka 25 yose, ati: "Ni ibintu bibabaje cane kandi ubu niho mbonye ingene nakomerekejwe ku mutima". "Mu myaka 49 yose, sinigeze nakirwa. Ariko rero impera n'imperuka, abantu baratanguye kuvuga bati: 'kuba uri ng'aha nta ngorane'". Ku bwa Matthias, na we nyene yavutse ari umukatolika akaba yaronse uwo muhezagiro ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye Thomas, kuja mu misa ntiyigeze iba ingorane. Ariko avuga ko amajambo ashikirizwa n'abategetsi ba Katolika yamutumye yiyumvira guhindura idini. Ati: "Igihe cose namye nibaza nimba ari ngombwa ko nguma mw'idini ritanyemera. Ariko rero, Ekleziya 'nyayo' hano ku rubuga, irongeye kugarura ukwemera kwanje". Mu buryo bw'agahemo, ijambo nk'iri rishikirizwa n'abategetsi ni ryo ryatumye iyi misa igenda uko yagenze. Mu kwa gatatu, Vaticano yasohoye itangazo rikomeye rivuga ko ukwubakana hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ari "icaha", rinashimangira ko abapatiri bose bazohirahira bagahezagira abubakana basangiye igitsina bashirwa ku ruhande. Iki ni ikintu abapatiri bo nyene ku giti cabo bakora - ariko ni gake biba ku mugaragaro. Iri jambo rikarishe rya Vaticano ryashavuje abakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Mu kwishura, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abapatiri, ababikira n'abakirisu baciye batanguza isekeza bise Liebe gewinnt (Urukundo Ruratsinda/l'Amour Triomphe/Love Wins), kugira bemeze ku mugaragaro ko ababana basangiye ibitsina bemewe mu masengero yabo. Patiri Korditschke ati: "Narashavuye numva n'isoni kubera nibaza ko ari ijambo ribabaje cane". Ni umwe mu bapatiri hafi  120 bo mu Budagi bafashe ingingo yo kugarariza ku mugaragaro iri tegeko rya Vaticano. Mu kiringo c'indwi imwe gusa abapatiri baremesheje ibisabisho mu masengero ya Katolika mu gihugu cose c'Ubudagi bahezagira abantu abo ari bo bose babisavye, harimwo n'abubakanye mu buryo Vaticano ibona ko ari icaha, nk'abubakanye n'abahukanye, hamwe n'abubakanye basangiye igitsina. Umunyamakuru wa BBC abajije Patiri Korditschke ingene asigura igituma aja kubiri n'itegeko rya Vaticano, yishuye akorora amosozi. Guhezagira abubakanye basangiye ibitsina biri mu bintu bigenda vyiyongera mu bakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Amashirahamwe aharanira agateka k'abagore, nka Maria 2.0, nayo nyene asaba uburenganzira bungana muri Ekleziya. Haciye umusi umwe inyuma y'iki gisabisho ca Patiri Korditschke i Berlin, abagore baragiye ku ruhimbi basigura ijambo ry'Imana mu masengero ya Katolika 12 atandukanye y'Ubudagi - na vyo nyene Vaticano ikaba itavyemera. Ulrike Göken-Huismann umugore yashikirije ijambo mw'isengero asengeramwo mu karere ka Düsseldorf, avuga ati: "Ekleziya yahora itwigisha ko Isi iringaniye kandi yatwigisha ko twategerezwa kuvyemera uko. Ariko rero vyabaye ngombwa ko Ekleziya ihindura. Canke kandi wibuke ko wategerezwa kwemwera ko Adamu na Eva ari abantu babayeho. Ntibivuga y'uko Ekleziya idategerezwa guhindura ivyo yigisha". Abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika mu Budagi ntibahuza: hari uruhande rumwe rw'abasenyeri  rushigikiye ko ibintu bihinduka, mu gihe urundi ruhande rw'abarongoye Ekleziya ruryumako, rukaba rushigikiye intumbero ya Vaticano itarota iva kw'izima . Hagati aho, ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko hari abakatolika ku giti cabo mu Budagi bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka. Icigwa kimwe cakozwe n'amashure kaminuza yo mu bisagara vya Berlin na Münster cerekana ko ibice 70% vy'abakatolika mu Budagi bashigikiye ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bahezagirwa, 80% nabo bakaba ata ngorane babona ku bantu babanye batarahezagirwa, hanyuma 85% nabo bakaba babona ko abapatiri nabo bokwemererwa kurongora. Inyuma y'igisabisho co guhezagira abubakanye basangiye igitsina i Berlin, abantu baharurwa mw'ijana baciye bakoranira hamwe hanze y'isengero biha agacupa mu buryo bwo kwigina kuri iyo ntambwe. Ariko kw'irembo ry'isengero, abantu bashika cumi bakoze imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyi ngendo, bafise icapa canditseko ngo "Imana ntihezagira icaha". Nta mishamirano iri hagati y'izi mpande ariko zompi zigizwe n'abantu bakomeye muri Ekleziya Katolika badahuriza hamwe. Amwenyura, Patiri Korditschke  wewe yivugira ati "ivyo na vyo ni sawa." Papa avuga iki ku bijanye n'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye? Mu kw'icumi 2020: Papa Francis yabwiye umuhinga akora amareresi ko abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina "bokwemererwa imbere y'amategeko".  "Abahuza ibitsina babisangiye ... ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu muryango. Nta n'umwe yokwirukanwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico". Mu kw'icumi  2014: Ikoraniro ry'abasenyeri b'Ekleziya (synod) bahakanye ivyipfuzo vyari bishigikiwe na Papa ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye bokwemerwa. Mu kw'indwi  2013: Ari mu ndege ari ku rugendo, Papa yabwiye abanyamakuru ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye batokumirwa ahubwo ko boshirwa mu muryango. Yavuze ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye basanzwe bari mu barongoye Ekleziya bogirirwa imbabazi, ivyaha vyabo bigaharirwa. 2013:Mu gitabo On Heaven and Earth (Ku vyerekeye Ijuru n'Isi), Papa avuga ko gufata ku rugero rumwe abahuza  ibitsina babisangiye n'abubakana badasangiye ibitsina kwoba "ari ugusubira inyuma nk'ibirenge". 2010: Igihe yari musenyeri mukuru wa Buenos Aires yariyamiriza ko amategeko yemerera abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina ariko agashigikira ko abasanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokingirwa n'amategeko ku rugero kanaka.

column2: Ethiopia -Tigray: ONU igabisha ko igihugu gihakwa kuja mu ntambara cose
column3: Ishirahamwe mpuzakungu ONU rigasbisha ko Ethiopia ishobora kuja mu ntambara y'igihugu cose hamwe indwano yo mu ntara y'uburaruko ya Tigray itohogarara vuba. Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe ibibazo vya poritike n'ugukomeza amahoro muri ONU  Rosemary DiCarlo avuga ko ata mfashanyo irashika ku murwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle, kuva hagati mu kwezi kw'icumi mu gihe hari abantu bashika miriyoni indwi bayikeneye vyihuta. ONU ivuga ko abantu bashika 400.000 babayeho nko mu bihe vy'amapfa. Kuri uyu wa kabiri, intumwa y'ishirahamwe rya Afrika AU mu bihugu vy'ihembe rya Afrika, Olusegun Obasanjo, yavuze ko yabonanye n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa  Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, n'indongozi y'intara ya Tigray, Debretsion Gebremichael. Avuga ko bompi bemera ko iyo ntambara ari iya poritike ariko ko hatigeze havugwa ibiganiro vy'imbona nkubone hagati yabo. ONU ishaka ko ingabo za reta n'abayigwanya  bahagarika intambara bakava muri ako karere kugira  bishoboke ko hashikayo imfashanyo n'imiti bikenewe cane. Hagati aho Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (US) n'Ishirahamwe rya Afrika bavuga ko babona ko hari amahirwe make yo gutorera inyishu ikibazo ca Ethiopia . Intumwa idasanzwe ya US Jeffrey Feltman aherutse i Addis Abeba aho yabonanye n'abo muri AU hamwe n'abategetsi ba reta. Intumwa ya AU Olusegun Obasanjo yabwiye inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano ko umwanya uriko urahera kandi ko hazoba akaga gakomeye cane ku bantu hamwe intambara itotorerwa inyishu vuba. Iyo ntambnara yo muri Ethiopia imaze umwaka yadutse hagati y'ingabo za reta mpuza-ntara n'abagwanyi b'umugambwe wahora utwara intara  ya Tigray, TPLF. Abo bagwanyi bavuga ko bagiye gusugereza  umugwa mukuru Addis Ababa mu gihe reta nayo yahamagariye abahora mu ngabo bakukurutse gusubira gufata umuheto bakitaba urugamba. Umuvugizi w'abagwanyi ba Tigray avuga ko bazokomeza gushika reta ivanyeho ingingo zo kwugarana iyo ntara. Getachew Reda yabwiye ikiganiro BBC Focus on Africa ko intambanyi yonyene iri mu nzira y'amahoro muri Ethiopia ari ministre wa mbere Abih Ahmed mu "kwibohera ku nyishu iciye mu nzira ya gisirikare  ku kibazo ahanini ca poritike". Getachew  avuga ati: "Ico dukeneye cane si Addis Ababa, ico dushaka n'uko tugondoza [Abiy] akavanaho ukwugarana intara yacu". "Abiy niwe ategerezwa kwemera ivyo dusaba… hanyuma akarangiza intambara." Uwo muvugizi avuga ko uwahoze ari umukuru wa Nigeria, Olusegun Obasanjo, ari muri Ethiopia kugerageza kuvugana n'impande zose ingene intabara yorangira, yagiranye ibiganiro vyiza n'umukuru wa TPLF, Debretsion Gebremichael.

column2: Igitero kuri Ukraine: EU yugaye ikirere cayo ku ndege z'Uburusiya
column3: Ishirahamwe rya Buraya ryugaye ikirere caryo ku ndege z'Uburusiya nk'uko vyamenyeshejwe n'umukuru w'urwego rutwara iryo shirahamwe, Ursula von der Leyen. Yavuze ati: "Twugaye ikirere c'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya ku ndege z'Uburusiya, indege  zifise ibiziranga vy'Uburusiya canke indege zigenzurwa n'Uburusiya". Izo ndege zose, harimwo n'iz'abantu ku giti cabo z'abatunzi ruhebwa, ubu ntizizoshobora kugwa, canke kuguruka ziva  mu gihugu icarico cose c'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya canke ngo zice hejuru yaco. Indege z'Uburusiya zarankiwe kandi guca mu kirere c'Ubwongereza. Kompanyi ya mbere nini y'indege y'Uburusiya, Aeroflot, yavuze ko ica ifuta ingendo zose zo kuja i Buraya gushika ibintu bihindutse mu nzira yo kugera ingere ku yindi. Imbere y'iyo ngingo, ibihugu vya Buraya vyari vyatanguye, kwugara ibirere vyavyo  kimwe kimwe. Ubudagi bwavuze ko ingingo yabwo izomara amezi atatu. Ivyapa vyerekana urutonde rw'ingendo mu bibuga vy'indege vya  Domodedovo na Sheremetyevo vyerekanye ingendo ziharugwa mu mirongo zafuswe ku wamungu, harimwo izaja i Paris, Vienne na Kaliningrad. Kompanyi y'Uburusiya S7 Airlines yavuze kuri Facebook ko izofuta ingendo mu bihugu vya Buraya vyinshi gushika nibura itariki 13 za Ntwarante (ukwezi kwa gatatu). Uburusiya buguma bugera ingere ku yindi ku bihugu biba vyafashe ingingo. Umukuru w'urwego rutwara Ishirahamwe rya Buraya yamenyesheje ko iryo shirahamwe rigiye kandi guhagarika imirongo y'ibinyamakuru bigenzurwa na reta y'Uburusiya Sputnik na Russia Today bibonwa nk'urubuga rw'ukuvugira Kremlin. Yavuze ati: "Turiko turarondera uburyo bw'ingene duhagarika amakuru yabo yo kuyovya no guhumanya i Buraya." Izo ngingo ku ndege zizotuma  indege z'Uburusiya zifata ingendo zo kuzigura/guca kure, bituma amasaha y'urugendo aba  menshi gusumba. Indege zisanzwe zitwara abantu n'ibintu ziririnda kandi guca mu kirere ca Ukraine, Moldova na Belarus kubera igitero c'Uburusiya. Muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Delta Air Lines yavuze ko izohagarika amasezerano bari bafitaniye na Aeroflot y'Uburusiya yo gufatisha ibibanza vy'urugendo. Indege zose zifise ibiziranga vy'Uburusiya zizokorwako n'izo ngingo. Ingingo y'Ubwongereza yatumye Moscou nayo igera ingere ku yindi ku ndege z'Ubwongereza. Virgin Atlantic yavuze ko kudaca hejuru y'Uburusiya bizokwongereza hagati y'iminota 15 n'isaha ku mwanya w'ingendo zayo hagati y'Ubwongereza n'Ubuhindi na Pakistan. Kompanyi ya Australia Qantas yavuze ko izokoresha inzira ndende gusumba ku ngendo zayo ata handi ziciye  hagati ya Darwin na Londres  n'ubundi zitari zisanzwe zikoresha inzira yo guca hejuru y'Uburusiya.

column2: Africa yahomvye miriyoni z'ama dorari kubera ihagarara rya Facebook, Instagram na Whatsapp
column3: Abifashisha  imbuga hwaniro muri Afrika kugira bagurishe ibicuruzwa bitandukanye bariko baraharura igihombo baraye bagize mu masaha atandatatu Facebook, Instagram na Whatsapp vyamaze bidakora. Ikigo kigenzura ingene internet ikora Netblocks kigereranya ko iryo hagarara rishobora kuba ryateye ubutunzi bwa Africa yo munsi y'ubugararwa (ubutayu)  bwa Sahara igihombo ca miriyoni 19,8 z'ama dorari (miriyaridi hafi 40 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). Abahinga bavuga ko ibigo vyari vyarateye imbere cane  muri urwo rudandazwa rwo kuri internet na cane cane muri ibi bihe vya Covid arivyo vyakozweko cane n'ico gihombo. Kuri bamwe bamwe iryo hagarara ryashitse mu masaha arijo haba hageze ko bagurisha cane. Kafui Adza  atwara kompanyi ya Akosombobar, inzu y'uburiro igurisha ivyo kurya kuri internet no ku bahishikiye hagati mu gisagara ca Accra AirportCity, irabana n'ikibuga mpuzamakungu c'indege ca Kotoka. Avuga ko izo mbuga hwaniro zabaye mu masaha yo kurya ivyo ku murango. Kafui avuga ati: "Nico cari igihe cacu ciza kuko 80% y'ivyo tugurisha ni ku  bakiriya baciye kuri internet. Abakiriya bake bashoboye kuza n'imiduga muri ico gihe c'urutavanako mu mabarabara nibo bonyene bashitse ku buriro. Igihe izo mbuga zahagarara , abakozi banje baciye babona ko tutariko turaronka abadusaba kubarungikira ivyo kurya uko twahora. Benshi baca barungika ubutumwa busanzwe bwa telefone, ariko ingorane ni uko udaheza ngo urungike igoto y'ivyo kurya ushaka". Kafui yabwiye BBC ko akoresha amadorari hafi 3.200  (miriyoni zirenga 6 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) ku mwaka kugira amenyekanishe ivyo akora kuri Facebook na Instagram. Ahandi nko muri Afrika y'ubuseruko, , Richard Gikonyo  afise Rickys Home Interiors. N'urudandazwa rushingiye i Nairobi, umurwa mukuru wa Kenya, rukoresha internet  mu gushira abakiriya ibikoresho bitandukanye vyo mu mazu mu gihugu cose. Ihagarara ry'imbuga hwaniro ryabaye mu gihe ku munsi usanzwe ariho akazi kaba gashushe. Gikonyo avuga ati: "Buno nyene naciye mbona ko habaye ikibazo kuko nama ndi ku murongo. Hagati y'isaha cumi z'umuhingamo n'isaha imwe y'ijoro, niho turonka abantu benshi ku mirongo yacu, kuko abantu baba bari mu rutavanako rwo mu mabarabara baca baja ku mbuga hwaniro bagatangura kugura ibintu". Yagiye kumenya ko vyahagaze atanguye kuronka ama terefone menshi y'abakiriya bidoga bamuhamagara  bavuga ko abakozi biwe batariko barishura ubutumwa bwabo. Avuga ati: "Tugereranya ko hari abakiriya 50 tutatunganirije, none uyu munsi (ku wakabiri), imirimo iri hasi cane". Karen Wambugu, umuhinga mu kugurisha kuri internet avuga ati: "Abakozweko cane n'abahembwa kuri buri kintu bagurishije hamwe n'imangazini ntonto, kuko nini nini zo zifise imbuga zazo (websites). Iyo imbuga hwaniro nka Facebook na Instagram zihagaze, imangazini ntonto ntizishobora kugurisha kuko nta yindi  nzira zifise" Aho iryo hagarara ribereye, abantu baciye baja ku zindi mbuga hwaniro nka Twitter kugira baronke umurongo. Ariko nko muri Nigeria, Twitter ntaco yafashije. Reta y'ico gihugu yarayihagaritse mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa gatandatu inyuma y'aho ikuriye ku rubuga rwayo ubutumwa bwa prezida Muhammadu Buhari imwagiriza kurenga ku mategeko yayo agenga "inyifato itari nziza". Ariko abanya-Nigeria bamwe babandanije kwandika kuri Twitter baciye ku buhinga buziguye bwa Virtual Private Networks (VPN).

column2: Igikombe c’isi Qatar 2022: Twigire kuri kahise ibishobora gushika
column3: Na  Rob Haywood U﻿munyamakuru w'inkino wa BBC Ni iki ibikombe vy'isi vy'imbere y'aha bishobora kutwigisha ku vyo twokwitega muri  Qatar? Igikombe c'uno mwaka coba kigoye? Ibihugu vyaronse itike yo kuja muri iri higanwa bibanje gukina urukino rwa play-off vyohebuzwa ubu nyene? Ubwo gukinira muri Asia vyoba bizokworohera ibihugu bimwe bimwe? Turaraba ibi vyose - hamwe n'ibindi vyinshi - kugira turabe ibihugu bishobora guhabwa amahirwe muri kino gikombe c'isi yose c'uno mwaka. Hamaze kuba amahiganwa atandatu ahuriyemwo igitigiri nk'iki c'ibihugu 32 bigabuwe mu mirwi umunani umwe umwe ufise ibihugu bine bine , akaba ari ayo mahiganwa atandatu aduha inkino 384 tugiye kwihweza kugira turabe niba hari ibija biragaruka. Mu mwihwezo ukurikira, tugiye kurabiha hamwe aya mahiganwa atandatu - kuva mu 1998 gushika 2018 - - kiretse bibaye ngombwa ko tuja hanze y’aho. Mu mahiganwa atatu aheruka kubera i Bulaya, mu bibanza 16 vyo muri ca gice co gukuranamwo (canke igice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma), imigwi y'i Buraya yafashemwo 10. Iyo ihiganwa ribereye hanze y'Ubulaya, iki gitigiri caramanuka nko gushika ku ndwi. Imirwi yo muri Amerika y'Ubumanuko niyo ica ihatomborera, mu gihe igitigiri c'imigwi ya Asia ishike muri ico gice yigwiza na kabiri  iyo ihiganwa ribereye hanze y'Ubulaya. Ibikombe bitanu  ku mahiganwa atandaatu aheruka vyatwahanywe n'ibihugu vy'i Buraya -  kandi uretse Ubufaransa bwatsinze iri higanwa mu 1998 buronse itike kubera ari bwo bwari bwaryakiriye, ibindi vyose vyari vyitwaye neza mu mahiganwa yo kurondera itike. Ibindi bihugu bine vyatahukanye iki gikombe - Ubutaliyano mu 2006, Espagne mu 2010, Ubudagi mu 2014 be n'Ubufaransa mu 2018 - wasanga birangije bidatsinzwe na rimwe canke ugasanga bitsinzwe nka rimwe gusa mu nkino cumi zo kurondera itike. Urugero rw'izi nstinzi (mu gihe iyo banganije biharurwa nk'inusu y'intsinzi) rwari ku 80% no kurenga. Mu nkino zo kurondera itike mw'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka, ibihugu vyinshi vya Bulaya vyarashitse kuri uru rugero: Danemark (95%), Ubwongereza n'Ubudagi (90%), Serbia n'Ububirigi (87.5%), Espagne, Ubuswisi n'Ubufaransa ( 81.3%) hanyuma Croatia n'Ubuholande ( 80%). Twisunze urutonde rwa FIFA rw'ingene ibihugu bikurikirana kw'isi, turashobora kubona ingene iri higanwa rishobora kuzoba rikomeye.  Raba ubutandukane bw'ingene ibi bihugu 32 bihagaze kuri buri higanwa: Kubera amategeko ya FIFA agena igitigiri c'imirwi iva kuri buri mugabane, hari ibihugu bitari muri iri higanwa kandi ku rutonde rwa FIFA biri imbere ya bimwe mu vyaronse itike. Ibihugu bikomeye bitazokwitabira iri higanwa ry'uno mwaka ni Ubutaliyano - buza mu kibanza ca gatandatu - ariko  Colombia (17), Peru (23), Suède (25), Ukraine (27), Chili (29) na Nigeria (32) vyari kuba vyararonse itike iyaba urutonde rw'isi ari rwo rwakurikizwa mu kugena abaryitabira hatarabwe aho igihugu giherereye. Mu gihe ibihugu indwi vyo ku rugero rwo hasi biri muri rino higanwa bishobora kuboneka ko ari vyinshi, uravye ahubwo ni igitigiri gito kuva iri higanwa ritanguye guhuriramwo ibihugu 32. Hari amahiganwa yagiye yitabirwa n'ibihugu bishika 11 biri inyuma ya 32 vya mbere. Rero iki gihe ni ihiganwa rizoba rikomeye cane. Hanyuma turavye ingene ibihugu bihagaze, biboneka ko Ubwongereza na Pays de Galles (Wales) biri mu murwi utoroshe na gato muri  Qatar - ni wo murwi wonyene uhuriyemwo imirwi iri muri 20 ya mbere dufatiye kuri uru rutonde rwo ku wa 30 z'ukwa cumi. Imirwi yo mu gikombe c'isi yose ca 2022  n'ingene ibihugu bihagaze kw'isi (Gushika   ku wa 30 z'ukwa cumi. ) Pays de Galles mu mahiganwa ya mbere yitabiriye mu myaka 64, yamye ironka itike ibanje gukina play-offs  kumwe na Pologne hamwe na Portugal. Ukibibona ubwa mbere, womenga vyaciye mu canzo - ariko akahise ka vuba kerekana ko ibihugu bironka itike muri iyo nzira bikora ibintu bikomeye. Tugereranije imirwi ya Bulaya, 67% y'ibihugu bironka itike biciye muri play-offs  birashika mu gice co gukuranamwo, ugereranije na 57% gusa biba vyaronse itike mu buryo bworoshe. Inkino zibiri za nyuma (finales)  z'amahiganwa atandatu aheruka zahuje ibihugu vya Bulaya vyaronse itike mu ma play-offs - ibi bikaba ari Ubudagi mu 2002 hamwe na Croatia mu 2018. Vyongeye, Croatia (1998) na Turukiya (2002) vyashitse mu  gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma (demi-finales) , mu gihe ibindi bihugu bitatu navyo vyashitse mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma (quart de finales). Kuva mu myaka ya 1990, mu bihugu biba bifise igikombe, ikimaze gutsinda muri  gice c'inkino zo gukuranamwo (knockout) ni kimwe gusa, iki naco ni Ubudagi igihe butsinda Ghana mu 2006. Mu vy'ukuri, kuva mu 1962, nta gihugu kirashobora kugumana igikombe, mu gihe mu mahiganwa 14  kuva ico gihe, ibihugu bibiri ari vyo  vyonyene bimaze kugera mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Ibihugu biba bifise igikombe kenshi bitangura kugira ingorane ku rukino rwa mbere. Mu mahiganwa 12 kuva Ubwongereza butsinze urukino rwa mbere aho bwahura na Roumanie mu 1970, ibihugu bitatu vyonyene biba bifise igikombe ni vyo bimaze gutsinda urukino rwa mbere. Mbere bine muri bitanu biba bifise igikombe nta n'uko vyavuye mu nkino zo mu mirwi (phase des groupes). Kubera iki? Imyaka ine ni igihe kirekire mu mupira w'amaguru. Uravye, usanga 50% vy'abakinyi batsindiye ico gikombe ari bo batangura urukino rwa mbere rwo mu mirwi mw'ihiganrwa rikurikira. Igihe Ubutaliyano bukina urukino rwa mbere bukanganya na Paraguay mu 2010, bwakinishije batatu gusa mu bari batsindiye igikombe ca 2006. Nimba witeze ko imirwi ibiri ya mbere ari iyizoba ihagaze neza ku rutonde mpuzamakungu muri buri murwi, uzotangara. Ni ibisanzwe ko bitandatu muri 16 bikina inkino zo gukuranamwo usanga bigira gatatu na kane mu mirwi yavyo. Ni urugero rutangaje rwa 32%. Muri ano mahiganwa atandatu nyene, imirwi yo hasi yatsinze inkino zo gukuranamwo ku rugero rwa 34%. Inkino zitatu muri zine zababaje ni izatsinzwe n’ibihugu vyakiriye amahiganwa - ku ncuro zibiri biciye ku ma penalties, incuro imwe nayo biciye ku gitsindo c'inzahabu. Uko bizogenda kwose mu ndwi zitanu ziri imbere, hashobora kuba ibintu bizobabaza abantu, bitangaza, eka ibintu bizoteza impari.

column2: Ibintu bitanu bisigura Messi avavanura na Barcelona
column3: Ivya Messi muri FC Barcelona birarangiye. Inyuma y'imyaka 21 muri uno murwi wo mu ntara ya Catalan, uyu musatirizi nta yandi masezerano agiye kuronka, n'aho impande zompi zari zamaze gushika ku masezerano y'intangamarara, hasigaye akanyuma gusa. Ariko hari akantu kabaye mu minota ya nyuma. Ico Barcelona yakoze conyene, kwabaye ukumenyesha ko ata masezerano mashasha "ashobora kuba kubera inzitizi zishingiye ku mafaranga n'inzego". Ivuga iti: "Impande zompi zirababajwe n'uko ivyipfuzo vy'uyu mukinyi be n'umurwi bidashobora kuja mu ngiro". "Barça irakengurukiye n'umutima wayo wose uruhara rw'uyu mukinyi mu gukomeza uwu murwi, ikaba imwipfurije kuroranirwa mu buzima bwiwe bwite, ndetse no mu mwuga wiwe". Messi ntaco yashimye gushoka atangaza. Nk'uko amakuru aca mu kinyamakuru ca Catalan,  Mundo Deportivo, abivuga, "uyu musatirizi wa Argentina arababaye cane", ku buryo ata mugambi afise wo kugira ico abivuzeko. Ariko none, ni ibiki vyoba vyatumye iyi migenderanire, imwe mu yikomeye cane mu gisata c'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi muri kino gihe, itabandanya? Nta kintu Messi atatsindiye mu gihe cose amaze muri Barca: ibikombe cumi vyose vya La Liga, ibikombe bine vyose vya Champions League/Ligue des Champions (Ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya), ibikombe indwi vy'ihiganwa ryitiriwe umwami (Copa del Rey), ibikombe bitatu vya European Super Cup/ Supercoupe d'Europe (urukino ruhuza imirwi yatsindiye Champions League na Europa League), hamwe na bitatu vya Club World Cup (ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku migabane). Ku gatwe kiwe, avuye muri uwu murwi awutsindiye ibitsindo 672 vyose, bikiyongera ku mupira w'inzahabu (Ballon d'Or ) yatahukanye incuro zitandatu zose. Messi, ubu afise imyaka 34, yaboneka ko yorangirije umwuga wiwe muri uwu murwi yinjiyemwo afise imyaka 13. Ariko rero, Messi nta munezero yari agifise muri Barcelona. Mu mwaka uheze, yariyamirije uburongozi bw'uwu murwi, anamenyesha ko yipfuza kuwusezerera, mu kuvuga ati: "Haciye igihe ata nteguro ihari kandi nta kintu, babandanya bafyinata bapfukapfuka gusa". Ico gihe, mu kiganiro n'ikinyamakuru ngurukanabumenyi, Goal, yavuze ati: "Umukuru w'umurwi [Josep María Bartomeu] yahora avuga ko ihiganwa rirangiye nshobora guhitamwo niba nshaka kugenda canke niba nshaka kubandanya, amaherezo yiwe ni uko ivyo yiyemeje ata na kimwe yakurikije". Kugira ngo yirinde impari mu butungane, uyu munya Argentina yahisemwo kwihangana mu bubabare hamwe no kwinumira kugira ngo ntahangane n'umurwi wamukujije. Igenda rya Josep María Bartomeu n'umuzo wa Joan Laporta ku burongozi bw'uwu murwi wa Catalan, vyahinduye imigambi ya Messi. Uyu mukinyi yari yishimiye imigambi ya Laporta yo kunagura uyu murwi. Mw'ihiganwa rirangiye, uwu murwi ntiwashoboye gushika ku ntego zawo zose: waratsindiye Copa del Rey, ariko warangije ihiganwa rya La Liga ari uwa gatatu, unatsindwa mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Spanish Super Cup (ruhuza umurwi watahukanye ihiganwa La Liga rya Espagne n'umurwi watsindiye igikombe ca Espagne), unatsindirwa mu gice ca kabiri ca Champions League. Ariko n'aho vyagenze uko, Messi na Laporta barumvikanye ko bogiriranira amasezerano agira 11 n'uyu mukinyi. Ariko ibibazo vy'amafaranga uwu murwi ufise vyaje kwica vyose. Nk'uko bimeze no mu yindi mirwi, FC Barcelona iri mu bibazo vy'amafaranga vyatewe n'ikiza karanda ca coronavirus, bituma ubutunzi bugabanuka. Messi yari yemeye kugabanirizwa umushahara yari asanzwe ahembwa gushika ku bice 50% - akaba yari asanzwe ahembwa hafi imiriyoni 165 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika nk'uko ibinyamakuru vyandika amakuru y'inkino bibivuga - akabandanya akinira FC Barcelona gushika mu 2026. Haciye imisi yicandagishije, Messi yasubiye i Barcelona, aho ku wa kane yari yiteze gutera igikumu kuri aya masezerano mashasha. Ariko si ko vyagenze. Guha amasezerano mashasha Messi vyasigura ko Barça yategerezwa kwongereza amafaranga yo kuriha imishahara y'abakinyi, ivyari gutuma yisanga yarengeje urugero rw'amafaranga imirwi yemerewe gukoresha mw'igihangwa rya Espagne. Ibi navyo biva ku mafaranga yinjizwa, aya nayo akaba ari make kubera iki kiza karanda ca corona. Mu gihe mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2020-2021 yari yemerewe gukoresha amafaranga agera ku miriyoni 600 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, mu mwaka uza yemerewe kutarenza imiriyoni zababa 410. Hanyuma kandi, kugira ngo Messi ashobore gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha, vyari ngombwa ko haba abakinyi bagurishwa kugira ngo uwu murwi ushobore kuriha imishahara y'uyu kizigenza wa Argentina. Aha rero, mw'itangazo ryo ku wa kane, uwu murwi watangaje ko hari "inzitizi zishingiye ku butunzi n'inzego", wisunze "amategeko ngenderwako ya La Liga", aya nayo akaba ajanye n'urugero ntarengwa rw'imishahara. Aha, La Liga ntaco yashotse itangaza. Mu gihe bari bakiri mu biganiro, ku wa gatatu hatangajwe amasezerano hagati ya La Liga n'ikompanyi iguriha imitahe, CVC Capital Partners. Aya masezerano, ataremezwa n'inama nkuru y'uwu murwi gushika mu misi iri imbere, ashobora gushiramwo imiriyoni 3000 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu mupira w'amaguru muri Espagne, muri yo ibice 90% bikagabanganwa hagati y'imirwi. N'aho igice gito cane (15%) ari co gishobora gukoreshwa mu kuriha imishahara, uwu mutahe ushobora gufasha kwongereza urugero rw'umushahara. N'aho uwu mutahe utarangije ibibazo vy'imishahara uwu murwi ufise, abihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko bwari uburwo bwo gutorera inyishu ikibazo c'amasezerano ya Messi. Kuri FC Barcelona, iyo ntiyariyo nyishu, kuko ku wa kane yamenyesheje - haciye amasaha ivya Messi bishikirijwe - ko itemera aya masezerano. Barça yavuze ko idakwiye gutera igikumu kuri aya masezerano kubera impungenge zibonekeza mu gisata c'umupira w'amaguru muri kino gihe. N'aho Messi yari yemeye umushahara yari guhabwa kugira ngo abandanye akinira FC Barcelona, hari ibindi bintu uwu murwi udashobora kumuha. Ibinyamakuru vyo muri Espagne vyemeza ko uyu munya Argentina yasavye ko bagura mugenziwe Cristian Romero, ariko uwu murwi ntiwashoboye gushika ku masezerano n'uyu mukinyi w'inyuma. Mu ndwi ziheze, warashoboye kugura  Sergio Kun Agüero na Memphis Depay, ariko Messi yabandanije avuga ko batari bahagije kugira ngo uwu murwi ushobore guhangana n'iyindi mirwi ikomeye. Laporta yari yatangaje ko ejo ku wa gatanu yari kubonana n'abanyamakuru kugira ngo asigure vyinshi ku bijanye n'itangazo yasohoye ryateje nyamugigima mu gisata c'umupira w'amaguru. N'aho vyagenze uko vyagenze, umuhinga Andy West  abona ko ibi bishobora kuba bidasigura ko imigenderanire hagati ya Messi na FC Barcelona irangiriye aha. Uyu muhinga mu bijanye n'umupira w'amaguru muri Espagne yabwiye igisata ca BBC kijejwe inkino, BBC Sport, ati: "Mu vy'ukuri, n'aho ari ingingo ya nyuma, ishobora gutuma umurwi utakaza igihagararo mw'ihiganwa rya La Liga". "Impera n'imperuka turashobora gusubira kubona Lionel Messi mu mwambaro wa Barcelona". Kuva mu mwaka uheze igihe atangaza ko yipfuza gusezera uwu murwi, Manchester City na Paris Saint Germain, yompi ni yo mirwi yaboneka ko uyu musatirizi wa Argentina ashobora kwimukiramwo. N'aho imiryango yasubiye kwugururwa kuva iri tangazo rishizwe ahabona ku wa kane, Manchester City, ihejeje kwerekana uwundi musatirizi, Jack Grealish,  azoba yambaye inomero 10 mw'ihiganwa buca ritangura. Messi  avuga kandi ko yamye afise icipfuzo co kuba muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kugira ngo akine mw'ihiganwa ryo muri ico gihugu MLS Uko vyogenda kwose kuri kazoza kiwe, ikizwi ni uko ubu Messi ari umukinyi yedegemvya, inyuma y'aho amasezerano yari afitaniye na FC Barcelona arangiriye, hari ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu, 2021.

column2: Theodore McCarrick yahoze ari kardinali muri US arahakana ivyo gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa
column3: Uwahoze ari kardinali wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arahakana ivyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu umwana w'umuhungu w'imyaka 16 mu myaka ya 1970. Theodore McCarrick, 91, yarengutse imbere ya sentare i Massachusetts kugira yisigure ku vyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu no gukubagura (coups et blessures) yagirizwa ko yakoze mu 1974. Uyu mu kardinali yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Washington DC azwi ko ari we mutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Amerika yagirijwe ivyaha vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Imbere y'aho yahora avuga ko atibuka ko hoba hari ivyo guhohotera yoba yarakoze. Mu rubanza rwashinzwe mu kw'indwi, McCarrick yaragirijwe ivyo gukwegakwegera uyo mwana w'umuhungu - ariko atavuzwe izina -  mu buhumbu, mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike. Uyu mugabo avuga ko yakorewe aya mabi yavuze ko igihe kimwe vyabaye mu gihe yari mu bugeni bwa mwenewabo kuri kaminuza ya Wellesley muri Massachusetts mu 1974. Nyene gukorerwa aya mabi avuga ko McCarrick yamukwegeye mu cumba kimwe co muri iyo kaminuza aca atangura kumukuyakuya. Inyuma yaho, uyo mupatiri avugwa ko yaciye abwira uyu mugabo kuvuga ibisabisho kugira ngo akire "ibicumuro". Muri sentare ku wa gatanu, McCarrick yategetswe kutavugana n'uyu nyene guhohoterwa canke n'umwana n'umwe. Yasabwe gutanga ingwati y'ibihumbi 5000 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika, mu gihe bitegekanijwe ko asubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 28 z'ukw'icumi. Buri caha gishobora guhanishwa umunyororo wo gushika ku myaka itanu, kandi agategerezwa kwandikwa ku nguvu nk'umusambanyi (délinquant sexuel/sex offender) McCarrick ni umwe mu bategetsi ba Ekleziya Katorika bagirizwa gushurashuza abana mu kiringo c'imyaka mirongo. Mu 2019, yarakuwe mu mabanga inyuma y'amatohoza yakozwe na Vaticano ku vyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu mu myaka itari mike. Yaragirijwe kandi ko yafashe ku nguvu umuyabaga i New York hagati mu myaka ya 1970, yongera ahatira abagabo kuryamana nawe mu rugo i New Jersey mu gihe bariko bigira ubupatiri. Icegeranyo c'impapuro 450 ca Vaticano casanze Papa Yohani Paulo wa kabiri yarabwiwe ivyerekeye ibi vyagirizwa McCarrick, ariko agahitamwo kwizera abepiskopi ba Amerika bamukingiye ikibaba. Casanze kandi Papa Benoit/Benedict XVI - yatanze imihoho mu 2013 - ashobora kuba yaranse iciyumviro co gukora amatohoza kubera ata "vyemezo vyari bihari" ku vyo yagirizwa.

column2: Lionel Messi: Ibi bintu bitanu wari ubizi kuri we?
column3: Na Ciaran Varley BBC Sport Lionel Messi nta nkeka, ni we mukinyi rurangiranwa mu mupira w’amaguru. Ku myaka 35, uyu musatirizi wa Argentina amaze gutsindira hafi ubushimwe bwose muri uru rukino. Yatsindiye Umupira w’Inzahabu (Ballon d'Or) – agashimwe gahabwa umukinyi wa mbere mwiza kw’isi – aho yaciye umuhigo mu kugatsindira incuro indwi, yongera atsindira agashimwe ka FIFA  k’umukinyi mwiza ku ruhande rw’abagabo rimwe. Mu bundi bushimwe harimwo ibikombe bine vy’ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Ligue des Champions/ Champions League), atsindira ibikombe 11 vy’ihiganwa ryo mu gihugu, yongera atsindira igikombe c’ihiganwa rya Amerika (Copa America) mu 2021.  Ico abuze conyene. Ni igikombe c’isi yose. Hagati aho ariko, tuzi bike cane ku bijanye n’uyu muntu w’imbaga ntoya ariko atera akukuruka. Mw’ireresi nshasha y’isaha yakorewe BBC, benshi mu bahoranye nawe mu murwi be n’abakinyi bigeze guhangana nawe, hamwe kandi n’abanyamakuru bakoze amakuru kuri we, barinjira muri kino gitangaza, ari we Messi. Ng’ibi bike mu vyo twokuramwo. Messi yinjiye mw’ishure ry’umupira w’amaguru rya Barcelona, La Masia, afise imyaka 13. Iri ni ishure ry’umupira w’amaguru ryasohoye ibihangange nka Xavi, Andres Iniesta, Gerard Pique na Cesc Fabregas. Fabregas yahoze akina hagati muri Barcelona, Arsenal na Chelsea avuga ko ikintu ca mbere yabonye ku muyabaga Messi  ni uko “yari umwana muto, atavuga, yari afise isoni nyinshi”. Isoni ni ikintu kiguma kigaruka cane, aho umunyamakuru w’ikinyamakuru Guardian, Jonathan Wilson, avuga ko Messi yahora yihindurira mu gasimbaryango (corridor) hakwinjira mu vyumba vyo kwihinduriramwo. Fabregas abandanya asigura ingene uyu muyabaga yitonda cane yatangaje abantu bose mu myimenyerezo. Avuga ati: "Mu myimenyerezo ya mbere twagiranye na Leo, nakina cane ku ruhande rwo hagati amaja inyuma (milieu défensif /defensive midfielder), kandi tukaba twahura turi umwe kuri umwe. "Mu mutwe iwanje, nibaza ko ndamwaka umupira ata ngorane kuko nakunda gukinira hasi kandi nkunda 'tackle', ariko rero mbona afise umuvuduko udasanzwe. Naratangaye, kuko ndibuka nikubise hasi ngo ndawumwake ariko aransiga aca arinjiza”. Fabregas avuga ko, kuva ico gihe, yaciye abona ko “dukwiye kwitwararika cane uyu muhungu”. Imbere y’uko ava mu murwi mu 2021, Messi yafashije Barcelona gutsindira ihiganwa rya La Liga incuro cumi, ibikombe bine vya Ligue des Champions, ibikombe indwi vya Copa del Rey hamwe n’ibikombe umunani vya super coupes muri Espagne. Messi mu kwimukira muri Barcelona vyasigura impinduka zikomeye ku muryango wiwe. Umunyamakuru Guillem Balague yanditse igitabo ndangakahise kuri Messi, arasigura ingene vyamugoye gufata ingingo. Nk’uko abisigura, inyuma y’amezi atandatu ashitse muri Barcelona, abavyeyi ba Messi batumyeko inama y’umuryango. Mushikiwe Maria, ntihari hamuguye neza, mu gihe mwenewabo nawe Matias yari afise umukunzi yasize i Rosario. Balague ati: "Cari igihe co gufata ingingo, ‘tugume i Barcelona canke dusubire i Rosario'? “Bicaye ku meza bamubaza bati, 'Leo, wipfuza gukora iki?' Leo avuga ati, 'Nshaka gutera imbere. Nshaka kuba muri Barcelona, nshaka kuba umukinyi rurangiranwa'." Balague asigura ko ico Messi atari yabwiwe zari inkurikizi z’ibi – nyina wiwe yategerezwa gusubiza mushikiwe na benewabo babiri i Rosario hanyuma se wiwe akagumana nawe. Balague ati: " Akenshi, yarinjira mu cumba ciwe agashira umutwe munsi y’umusego akarira. "Yakora ivyo kugira ngo se wiwe ntamwumve. Afise myaka 14 gushika kuri 15, niho yabona ko, kubera ingingo yiwe, yategerezwa kubitahura”. Rio Ferdinand yagize igihamana kibi co guhura na Lionel Messi n’abandi bakinyi ba Pep Guardiola bari bateye ubwoba muri Barcelona mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Ligue des Champions, atari incuro imwe gusa, ariko zibiri. Manchester United yahuye n’aba ba Catalans mu 2009 hanyuma mu 2011 – aho hompi itsindwa. Mu 2009, Barcelona yatsinze 2-0 aho Messi yinjije igitsindo kigira kabiri ciza cane n’umutwe. Ferdinand yahushije umupira wari utewe na Xavi imbere y’igori. Ferdinand  ati: "Messi yinjije n’umutwe, bose wamengo bambaza ngo ‘raba ingene ungana, n’ingene angana. Nta vyinshi yinjije nk’ivyo kuva atanguye gukina, ariko yabikoze mu gihe kidasanzwe”. Messi yarinjije kandi yongera aba umukinyi w’urukino (man of the match) mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa 2011 Barcelona yatsinze 3-1. "Messi wamengo, nta guhuza amaso, nta kintu na kimwe, ari ukwiwe, nta n’uko akwegereye, hanyuma ubwo nyene ukaza wumva ng’uyo, ‘aragusetse’. Iryo joro baratwishe pe”. Mu kiringo cose amaze akina umupira, haba neza canke nabi, yagiye agereranywa n’ikindi gihangange ca Argentina: Diego Maradona. Iyi reresi yerekana ingene Messi atorohewe mu kwikorera umuzigo w’iri gereranya. Maradona yabaye ntibagiranwa igihe atsindira igikombe c’isi yose mu 1986. Messi yamenyekanye mu rukino rwa nyuma rw’igikombe c’isi yose mu 2014 akaba yari amaze gukina inkino za nyuma za Copa Amerika ariko aho hose nta gikombe yari bwatsindire igihugu ciwe gushika mu 2021 aho batahukaniye igikombe ca Copa Amerika. N’aho hari ibintu bisa mu buhinga bwabo bwo gukina, umunyamakuru wa Guardian Marcela Mora y Araujo arerekana ubudasa mu nyifato hagati ya Messi na Maradona. Avuga ati: "Maradona yamenyekanye cane kubera impari. Nibaza ko Messi ateye imbere gusumba, aho kudugira ku mpari, yadugiye ku kwifatanya n'abandi. Messi akeneye kuba mu murwi umeze neza, kandi ukorera hamwe”. Uwundi mukinyi Messi akunze kugereranywako igihe cose ni Cristiano Ronaldo. Be na we, bamaze imyaka irenga cumi bahurira ku bushimwe nyamukuru hafi bwose mu mupira w’amaguru. Messi afise Ballon d'Or indwi, mu gihe Ronaldo afise zitanu, akaba kandi afise ibikombe vya Ligue des Champions bine Ronaldo nawe afise bitanu. Ariko none ubu bushamirane si bumwe bukokezwa n'abakora imyihwezo, abanyamakuru n'abafana? Xavi, yahoze akinana na Messi abona ko ivyo ari ukuri. Ati: "Cristiano yamuteye intege zo kuba umukinyi rurangiranwa. "Kumbure Cristiano na Leo bashobora kutavyemera uko. Ariko ndazi neza ko bagumye barabana ku kajisho. Iyo uriko urahiganwa, uba ushaka kuba uwa mbere”.

column2: Qatar 2022: Ronaldo avugako ugucanamwo na Man U kudashobora guhungabanya Portugal
column3: Cristiano Ronaldo avuga ko “avugira igihe ashakiye" kandi ko icuka kibi kiri hagati ya we na Manchester United kidashobora “guhungabanya” umurwi wiwe wa Portugal mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose. Man United iriko iraraba ico amategeko avuga mu gihe iriko irondera kurangiza igihe ca Ronaldo muri uyo murwi inyuma y’ikiganiro yagiriraniye n’imboneshakure TalkTV anegura uyu murwi. Ronaldo w’imyaka 37 yavuze ko yumva “yarahemukiwe n’uyu murwi” kandi ko “ata cubahiro” agifitiye umumenyereza Erik ten Hag. Ku wa mbere Ronaldo yavuze ati: "Mu buzima bwanje, igihe ciza ni igihe canje”. Mu kiganiro kitari citezwe yagiranye n’abanyamakuru, uyu kizigenza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal yavuze ati: "Si ntegerezwa kwiyumvira ku co abandi biyumvira. Mvuga igihe nshakiye. Abakinyi baranzi neza cane kuva kera kandi barazi uwo ndi we. "[Portugal] Ni umurwi ukomeye unyotewe kandi ufise ihangiro. Rero ndazi ko kirya [kiganiro] kidashobora guhungabanya abakinyi n’intumbero yabo”. Uyu mukinyi Ronaldo yatsindiye Ballon d’Or (Umupira w’Inzahabu) incuro zitanu azoba arongoye umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal mu rukino rwayo rwa mbere mw’itsinda H ruzoyihuza na Ghana ku wa kane. Asigaranye amezi indwi yonyene mu masezerano yiwe y’umushahara w’ibihumbi 500 (500.000) vy’amapawundi ku ndwi i Old Trafford ariko Man U ishobora guhagarika amasezerano ifitaniye nawe. Ivyo vyotuma yidegemvya agashobora kwimukira mu wundi murwi muri ka kanya k’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi ko mu kwa mbere. Ntarasubira gukina kubera ingwara itazwi kuva aho Man U itsindiwe na Aston Villa 3-1 ku wa 06 Munyonyo (11) akaba ari we yari kizigenza, ariko avuga ko yumva ameze neza muri iri higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi rigize gatanu kuri we. Ronaldo ati: "Numva nkomeye, narakize, ndakora imyimenyerezo neza, kandi nditeguye gutangura ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose neza cane bishoboka. "Numva ko uyu murwi wa Portugal ufise ubushobozi budasanzwe. Ndibaza ko vyanse bikunze dushobora gutsinda, ariko dukeneye kwibanda cane ku rukino twimirije. Rero ni ngombwa ko twibanda kuri Ghana, dutsinde hanyuma tudugire aho. "Tuzoraba duhejeje umurwi ukomeye, ariko ndizeye ko Portugal ari wo murwi ukomeye muri rino higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi. Ariko dutegerezwa kuvyerekana mu kibuga”.

column2: Bob Marley: Kwibuka imyaka 40 iheze iyo mboneza ipfuye
column3: Imyaka 40 iraheze kuva umuririmvyi wa reggae yasize izina Bob Marley yishwe na cancer i Miami, ku myaka 36, hari ku wa 11 ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 1981. Uwo munyamuziki n'umwe mu bakundwa kandi bemewe cane muri kahise k'umuziki, ku ndirimbo nyinshi zabiciye bigacika nka No Woman No Cry, One Love, na Redemption Song. Indirimbo yiwe Buffalo Soldier niyo yabaye rurangiranwa kurusha izindi mu Bwongereza, aho yagiye mu kibanza ca kane mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 1983. Album [urukurikirane rw'indirimbo] yo mu 1977 Exodus yiswe Album y'Ikinjana n'ikinyamakuru Time Magazine. Marley yavutse mu 1945, kuri se w'umuzungu na nyina w'umwirabure, muri Jamaica. Nk'umwana yakuriye mu bukene kandi nta migenderanire myinshi bari bafitaniye na se, uwo akaba yari asanzwe ari umusirikare wo mu mazi yakorera reta y'Ubwongereza. Yavuye iwabo ku myaka 14 aja gutangura umwuga w'umuziki i Kingston. Mu  1972, Marley yashitse mu Bwongereza n'umugwi wiwe The Wailers kuremesha ibiteramo na Johnny Nash mu ntumbero yo kugerageza kumenyekana ku rubuga mpuzamakungu. Mu mwaka ukurikira, The Wailers basohoye album yabo Catch a Fire baca bakora igiteramo cabo ca mbere kuri television kuri BBC. Ico giteramo cagize ingaruka nini cane gica kibazanira abakunzi benshi ku bo bari basanganywe. Inyuma y'urundi rugendo rw'ibiteramo mu 1975, yafashe amajwi ikibiriraho indirimbo No Woman No Cry kuri The Lyceum, i Londres, ica isohoka yonyene (single) ibera Bob Marley indirimbo yiwe mbere yagiye ku rutonde rw'izikundwa cane mu Bwongereza. Uwo muririmvyi yaciye aja mu murongo w'abaririmvyi bakomeye kw'isi aca aba izina rizwi mu aho uciye hose. Marley yari azwi ku kwemera kwiwe gushingiye kuri  Rastafarism, hamwe n'umugore wiwe, Rita, idini rikaba ryaragaragara mu ndirimbo ziwe. Uwo muririmvyi yarakunda kandi cane umupira w'amaguru, vyari bizwi ko acishamwo akaja gukina iyo afashe akaruhuko mu gihe co gutegura indirimbo (muri studio) canke imbere yo kuremesha igiteramo. Mu kiganiro mu 1980 yavuze ati: "Nkunda umuziki imbere yo gukunda umupira." "Gukina umupira w'amaguru no kuririmba n'ibintu bibangamye kuko umupira urimwo kubabazanya. Ndirimba amahoro, urukundo n'ibindi nk'ivyo, urabona uriko urakina ntawuzi igishobora gushika, "Umuntu aguteze akakubabaza umenga ibaye intambara." Igiteramo c'ikibiriraho ca nyuma ca Bob Marley mu Bwongereza cabaye itariki 13 ukwezi kw'indwi mu 1980 muri New Bingley Hall, Stafford. Marley yaciye apfa mu mwaka ukurikira ahitanywe n'indwara ya melanone acral-lentigineux yari yatowe mu 1977. Yashinguwe aho yavukiye muri Jamaica mu kigwati ca Nine Mile. Amafoto yose n'aya nyeneyo.

column2: DR Congo: Umunyamuziki General Defao yapfuye
column3: Umunyamuziki rurangiranwa wo muri Repubulika ya Demokrasi ya Congo Lulendo Matumona azwi kw'izina rya General Defao yapfuye. Defao, yari afise imyaka 62, yapfiriye aho yari asanzwe arwariye mu bitaro vya Laquintinie i Douala, muri Cameroun ejo ku wa mbere. Uyu munyamuziki yavutse mu 1958 azwi mu ndirimbo n'intambo zaryoheye abakunzi b'umuziki batari bake. Abaririmvyi Ferre Gola na Fally Ipupa bari mu banyamuziki ba mbere batanze ubutumwa bw'akababaro, bavuga  ko uru rupfu ari uruhombo runini kuri Afrika. General Defao yavukiye i Kinshasa ku wa 31 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri 1958, akaba yatanguye kuririmba mu 1978 mu murwi wa Suka Movema. Yararirimvye mu gihe gito mu mirwi Fogo Stars na Somo West imbere y'uko yinjira muri  Grand Zaiko Wawa, mu nyuma akaba yagiye kwimukira mu murwi Choc Stars wari watangujwe mu 1983 n'abaririmvyi Ben Nyamabo hamwe na Bozi Boziana, ari naho yerekaniye ubuhinga bukomeye aranamenyekana cane. Defao yahavuye ava mu murwi Choc Stars mu mpera za 1990 aca atanguza umurwi Big Stars ari kumwe na Djo Poster. Hagati aho, ibintu ntivyagenze uko yavyipfuza, biba ngombwa ko arondera abandi baririmvyi Djo amaze kugenda. Defao yari yashitse muri Cameroun mu ndwi iheze akaba mbere yaragiye mu myimenyerezo y'igiteramo ciwe c'Umwaka Mushasha, ari naho yatanguye kwumva atameze neza, nk'uko amakuru ava i Douala abivuga. Defao yahavuye asimbanwa ku bitaro Laquintinie ari naho yahavuye asandabira.

column2: India: Umukoresha yanebaguwe ku ciyumviro co gukora amasaha 18 ku musi
column3: Umukuru w'ikompanyi imwe mu Buhindi yanebaguwe inyuma yo kuvuga ko abakozi bashasha mu kazi akari ko kose bategerezwa gukora amasaha 18 mu myaka yabo ya mbere ine canke itanu bakironka akazi. Shantanu Deshpande, yatanguje kompanyi yo kumwa ya Bombay Shaving Company, asaba abakozi bakiri bato "gukunda akazi" no kutaguma bidoga nk'uko yavyanditse ku mbuga hwaniro. Abantu bashavuye banditse ku mbuga hwaniro bamwagiriza gukokeza "umuco w'akazi k'uburozi". Ubuhindi bufise amategeko genga akazi akaze cane, ariko abaharanira agateka k'abakozi bavuga ko abategetsi bakeneye gushiramwo inguvu nyinshi kugira ashirwe mu ngiro. Mu 2020, umwe mu batanguje ikompanyi ya Infosys yaranebaguwe cane aho yavuga ko abahindi bategerezwa bakora amasaha 64 buri ndwi mu myaka ibiri canke itatu mu ntumbero yo kuzibira igihengeri c'ubutunzi catewe n'iyugaranwa rivuye kuri coronavirus. Urugero rw'icizere c'abakozi rwa LinkedIn mu 2020 ruvuga ko abakozi babigize umwuga babiri  kuri batanu mu Buhindi baramaze kugira ikibazo co kugira umutima uhagaze n'umwitwarariko. Ku rubuga rwa LinkedIn ku musi wa kabiri, Deshpande   yavuze ko "hakiri kare" ku bakiri bato kumenya ingene bokwifata hagati y'akazi n'ubuzima igihe ari ho bagitangura akazi. Umwe mubakoresha urubuga rwa Twitter yavuze ko Deshpande yariko arashigikira "umuco w'akazi k'uburozi" igihe  "vyari vyabaye ibisanzwe ko amakompany menhsi agitangura yirukana abantu benshi." Uwundi wo kuri Twitter nyene yavuze ko Deshpande atigeze avuga ko "yoriha amahera y'agasunuzo" abantu bakoze amasaha menshi. Yagize ati:"Amakompanyi afise intumbero yo kurya imitsi abantu bakora amasaha menshi. Kenshi na kenshi bigatuma baruha kare bakiri bato, bigatuma bashira mu kaga akazi kabo." Kubera inebagurwa ryakwiye hose kubera ivyo yanditse, Deshpande yongeyeko ati:" Urwo rwanko rwose ruvuye ku masaha 18 y'akazi?" Yongeyeko ko abo biyumvira ku muco wo gukora muri kompanyi yiwe bahawe ikaze kubiyaga n'abakozi biwe. Ivyo Deshpande yavuze vyakurikiye igihe ijambo "Hagarika mu mutekano" ryakwiragira ku mbuga hwaniro. Iryo jambo risigura gukora ivyo ujejwe gusa ata kindi urengejeko. Ryatangujwe muri video y'umunyamerika ari ku rubuga rwa TikTok ahanura "akazi si ubuzima bwawe". Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Perisha Kudhail yanditse ko iryo sekeza rishobora kuba ryatanguriye mu Bushinwa , aho ijambo ubu ryabujijwe gukoreshwa #tangping risigura "ryama urampije" ryakoreshejwe mu kwiyamiriza umuco wo gukoreshwa amasaha menshi.

column2: Prince Philip: Ivyaranze ubuzima bwiwe n'icubahiro yagize hose
column3: Umuganwa  Philip, Duc wa Edinburgh, yabashije kugira icubahiro hose kubera gushigikira cane Umwamikazi kandi igihe cose. Rwari uruhara rutoroshe ku w'ariwe wese, ubaye urareka umugabo yari amenyereye ivya gisirkare kandi yari afise aho ashingiye bikomeye ku bibazo bitari bike. Ariko n'izo nguvu nyene z'inyifato yiwe zamufashije kurangura neza ivyo yari  ajejwe maze akabona gushigikira atiziganije umugore wiwe mu mabanga yiwe y'Umwamikazi. Yari umugabo w'Umwamikazi ari ku ngoma ariko Philip nta ruhare  rw'ibwirizwa nshingiro yari afise. Ariko nta n'umwe yari hafi y'Umwamikazi kurusha we canke ngo abe akomeye kuri we kurusha uko we. Umuganwa Philip w'Ubugiriki yari yavutse itariki 10 ukwezi kwa 6 mu  1921 kw'izinga rya Corfu. Urupapuro  rwiwe rw'amavuko rwerekana ko yavutse itariki 28/5/1921 kuko Ubugiriki butari bwatangure gukoresha ikirangamisi ca Gregoire (calendrier Gregorien). Inyuma y'itembagazwa  ry'ubutegetsi mu 1922, se yaciye acibwa na sentare y'impinduka. Ubwato bw'intambara bw'Ubwongereza  bwarungitswe na  muvyarawe wa kabiri, Umwami George V, bwaciye bujana umuryango mu Bufaransa. Umwana  Philip ahanini yamaze urwo rugendo rwo mu mazi mu gatebe gakozwe mu dusandugu twari twavuyemwo imicungwe. Philip yatanguriye ishure mu Bufaransa ariko ku myaka 11, yaciye aja kubandanya n'incuti ziwe mu Bwongereza aho yize ishure  nteguza i Surrey. Philip yari yavutse nk'umuganwa w'umugiriki ariko yamuka ku banye Danemark n'Abarusiya. Ico gihe nyina yari yatowe indwara ya schizophrenie aca ajanwa aho bene abo bantu barwarira. Umwana Philip yabonana gake cane nawe gushika akure. Mu 1933 yarungitswe kwiga kuri Schule Schloss Salem mu Budagi bw'ubumanuko , ishure ryari rirongowe n'umuntu yari imbere mu barondera guteze imbere amashure Kurt Hahn. Ariko mu mezi make, Hahn, yari Umuyahudi,yaciye yomoka ahunga ihigwa n'aba Nazi. Hahn yaciye aja muri Ecosse aho yaciye ashinga ishure rya Gordonstoun, ari naryo Philip yaciye yimukiramwo amaze ibice bibiri mu Budagi. Ingendo nk'iya Sparte yaranga ishure rya Gordonstoun, yari ishingiye ku kwibako, niyo yari ijanye n'umwana w'umuyabaga yari yatandukanye n'abavyeyi biwe akaba nka nyamwigendako. Mu ntambara Intanbara ya kabiri y'isi iriko iregereza, Philip yaciye ahitamwo kuja mu gisirikare. Yashaka kuja mu ngabo zikoresha indege ariko umuryango wa nyina wari usanzwe ufise kahise mu vy'imirimo yo mu mazi uca umuhanura kwinjira mw'ishure ry'ingabo zo mu mazi  rya Royal Naval College i Dartmouth. Aho niho yashingwa guherekeza Abaganwakazi bari bakiri bato Elizabeth na Margaret, mu gihe Umwami George VI n'Umwamikazi Elizabeth  bariko barazunguruka iryo shure. Ku bw'ababibonye, Philip yariyerekanye cane. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth yari afise imyaka 13 yahavuye agenda aramutangarira. Philip ntiyatevye kuba inkerebutsi kuri iryo shure rya Gordonstoun. Yavyerekanye mu kuba uwa mbere mw'ishure ryiwe, mu 1940 aca atangura kuja ubwa mbere mu bikorwa vya gisirikare ahereye  mw'ibahari Indiano. Yaciye arungikwa ku bwato bw'intambara HMS Valiant muri Mediterranee aho yavuzwe ku ruhara mu ntambara ya Cape  Matapan mu 1941. Nk'intwazangabo yari ajejwe amatara yo kurondeza y'ubwo bwato, yagize uruhara runini  muri ico gikorwa gikomeye co mw'ijoro. Hashitse mu kwezi kw'icumi mu 1942 ariwe mu lieutenant yari akiri muto kurusha abandi mu ngabo zo mu mazi yakora ku bwato  bw'intambara HMS Wallace. Gutangaza ivy'umubano Muri ico gihe we n'Umuganwakazi Elizabeth baraja bararungikirana amakete, akaba yaratumiwe kuza kumara iminsi mu muryango w'i bwami akatari gake. Rimwe yaje kubaramutsa, mu gihe ca Noel yo mu 1943, niho Elizabeth yashira ifoto ya Philip mu mwambaro wa uniforme z'ingabo zo mu mazi ku meza yategurirako impuzu ziwe. Imigenderanire yabo yarabandanije mu gihe c'amahoro, n'ubwo hari abatabishaka mu batoni b'i bwami-muri bo hari umwe yavuze ngo Philip "arahuruduka kandi ntafise  inyifato nziza''. Ariko Umuganwakazi yari yamukunze cane hanyuma muci ryo mu 1946, Philip aca asaba Umwami kumuha umukobwa wiwe ngo bubakane. Ariko imbere y'uko hatangazwa ko vyemewe, Umuganwa Philip yategerezwa kuronka ubwenegihugu bushasha hamwe n'izina ry'umuryango. Aca aheba izina ryiwe ry'Ubugiriki, aba umwenegihugu w'Umwongereza, aca afata izina rya nyina rivuzwe mu congereza, Mountbatten. Umunsi umwe imbere y'uko ubukwe buba, Umwami George VI yaciye aha Philip  icubahiro  c'abo mu nda y'ubwami, bukeye mu gitondo c'ubukwe, aba yagizwe Duc wa Edimburgh, Earl wa Merioneth hamwe na Baron wa Greenwich. Ubukwe bwabereye Westminster Abbey ku wa 20/11/1947. Vyari ibirori, nk'uko Winston Churchill yabivuze, vy'umwakaka w'amabara' mu Bwongereza bwari bucijiriwe inyuma y'intambara. Umuganwa Philip yarasubiye mu kazi kiwe ko mu ngabo zo mu mazi aca arungikwa gukora muri Malte, aho ubwa mbere nibura, we n'umugore, bashoboye kubaho nk'uwundi muryango wose wari mu butumwa  bw'akazi. Umuhungu wabo, Umuganwa Charles, yavukiye ku kirimba Buckingham mu 1948 mu gihe Umuganwakazi Anne yabonetse  mu 1950. Mu 1952, bafashe urugendo rwo kuzunguruka Commonwealth, basezewe n'umwami Geaorge VI we, atazwi n'umwuzukuru wiwe w'umukobwa, yari afise indwara ya cancer. Umuganwa Philip yabaye uwa mbere yakeje Umwamikazi igihe yimikwa. Abari bahari ico gihe bavuga ko yari gushobora guca ashikira, iyo abishaka, icubahiro ca First Sea Lord. Ahubwo yaciye yironderera ico yokora na cane cane, aho Elizabeth abareye umwamikazi. Yari afise ivyiyumviro vyinshi vyo kugira ivyo ahinduye mu ntwaro ya cami ariko abanyamabanga b'ikirimba ntibabimwemereye. Umuganwa Philip ntiyari  umugabo aha ikibanza ivyo kwicuza, ariko mu nyuma yaravuze ko yababajwe n'uko atashoboye kubandanya igisirikare. Kuvugurura intwaro y'ubwami. Igihe bari bacumbitse mu nzu  iri mu kibira c'ibikoko  muri Kenya mu kwezi kwa kabiri niho hatangura kuvugwa ko umwami yapfuye. Yari yafashwe n'indwara yo kuvura amaraso yo mu mutima idatevya kwica. Vyaguye kuri Philip kuba ariwe amenyesha ubwa mbere umugore wiwe ko yabaye Umwamikazi. Umwe mu bagenzi babo yavuze ko ico gihe Philip yaciye asa n'uko "igice c'isi" kimuguyeko. Aho yagumanye ububasha bwiwe bwose  mu guha indero abana biwe. Niwe yarungitse umuhungu wiwe w'imfura Charles mw'ishure nawe yari yarizemwo rya Gordonstoun, ariko ntiryamuguye neza namba, mbere yahavuye ariheba. Inkino Umuganwa Philip yarakunda inkino. Yasoza ubwato, agakina cricket na polo, yari azi cane kugendesha ibitwazi bikwegwa n'amafarasi akaba yaranabaye imyaka myinshi umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'isiganwa ku mafarasi. Kuba yari umuntu yavuga atarya umunwa rimwe na rimwe vyaramutera ibibazo. Yahavuye afatwa nk'umuntu atari azi kuraba aho avugira na cane cane iyo yaba ari mu mahanga. Ari mu Bushinwa mu 1986 mu rugendo hamwe n'Umwamikazi, yabwiye abanyeshure b'Abongereza ati ''nimwamara igihe kinini ngaha amaso yanyu azomera nk'ayabashinwa''. Muri Australia naho mu 2002 abaza umugwizatunga w'umu Aborigene niba ''mugiterana amacumu.'' Ukutumvikana n'umuhungu w'imfura wiwe vyagiye gusubira kuja ahabona hasohotse igitabo ku buzima bwiwe canditswe n'umunyamakuru Jonathan Dimbleby. Vyavuzwe ko Philip ariwe yatumye Prince Charles arongora atabishaka Diana Spencer. Ibihe bikomeye N'ubwo Philip yababajwe cane n'ukubona ingo z'abana biwe batatu kuri bane zisambuka, yagumye yanka kugira ico avuze ku bibazo bimuraba ubwiwe aho yabwiye ikinyamakmuru mu 1994 ati ntiyari bwabikore gushika ico gihe kandi ntagiye kubitangura. Gushigikira ubwami Yigeze kubwira BBC ati : ''Nakoze gushika aho nibaza ko ariho nashobora kugeza. Sinshobora guhindura ingene nkora. Niko meze''. Ministre wa mbere David Cameron yarabimushimiye buca ahimbaza isabukukuru yiwe y'imyaka 90. Yavuze ati ''yamye ari umuntu akora ibintu mu buryo bwiwe ata wundi yomwigana, afatiye ku buzima busanzwe mu buryo nibaza ko Abongereza bakunze''. Umuganwa Philip yarashoboye gukoresha ikibanza ciwe kugira hagire ico afashije mu buzima bw'Ubwongereza, hanyuma aragira uruhara mu gufasha intwaro y'ubwami kwisunga ivyagenda birahinduka mu buryo abantu babona ibintu uko imyaka yagenda irahera. Ariko kimwe mu bintu bikomeye yashitseko, kwabaye ugushigikira adahesha Umwamikazi mu myaka myinshi y'ingoma yiwe. Igihe bahimbaza imyaka 50 bari bamaze bubakanye, umwamikazi yarakeje umugabo wiwe, yabaye umugabo w'umwamikazi wa mbere yaramvye ku ngoma muri kahise k'Ubwongereza. ''N'umuntu adakunda cane gushimagizwa, ariko  yabaye inkomezi zanje, kandi akiriko muri iyi myaka yose. Hanyuma jewe n'umuryango wiwe wose tumufitiye  umwenda uruta uwo ashobora kutwishuza canke tutazokwigera tumenya uko ungana.'' Kurwanira ibidukikije Umugamwa Philip yaritanze cane mu  gukingira ibidukikije na cane cane amashamba hamwe n'ibikoko. Niwe yatanguje ikigega World Wildlife Fund cahavuye gihinduka World Wide Fund, gifasha mu gukingira ibidukikije. ''Nibaza ko twebwe abantu niba dufise ububasha bwo kwica no gukiza, dutegerezwa kubukoresha tubanje kwibaza ico dukora. Kuki twohonya ikintu bidakenewe?''. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, yavuze ati: "Nibaza ko biteye igomwe kubona abantu, kuri iyi si, tuba mu buzima butandukanye kandi budasa, mugabo hakaba ugufashanya". "Nibwira kandi ko, twebwe abantu, nimba dufise ingabirano zo kuvyara, tugashobora gukiza canke kwica - kubaho canke guhona-, tubwirizwa kubigendera dukoresheje amabanga y'ubuntu twahezagijwe. Kubera iki twokwica kandi tutabwirizwa kwigenza uko?" Abagendera imico n'imigenzo y'abongereza ba kera ntibashimye ingene yashigikiye ko inyoni z'inkware ziraswa. "Iyo uzi ko hari inkino zifasha abantu kuramba, dufate nk'uguhiga, ntaho bitandukaniye n'abarima, bakorora. Ni nka kurya twamura ingemwe ku biterwa. Ntituba turiko turabihonya". Imvugakuri Umuganwa Philip yarashimiwe cane ku ngendo n'ibikorwa vyiwe vyo gukingira amashamba mw'isi, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyiwe vyo kurwanya ukuroba kurenze urugero, mu mabahari. Umuganwa Philip yaranzwe no gushigikira iterambere ry'amahinguriro. Yaratemberera cane inganda zitandukanye. Ni uko yiswe umuvunyi w'amahinguriro, ubu tuzi nk'ikigo kidaharanira inyungu zitandukanye, gifasha mu migambi canke ibikorwa vy'ubushakashatsi vy'abakozi, mu Bwongereza -"Work Foundation"-. Mu 1961, yabwiye umurwi w'abarongoye amahinguriro ati: "Bagenzi, harageze ko duhagarika guta umwanya. Twerekane ivyo dushoboye". Iyi ngendo yo kutarya umunwa, yatumye bamwe bamufata nk'umuntu atubaha abandi, ivyanamuteye ingorane, rimwe na rimwe. Hari abamufashe nk'umuntu w'akagaye, cane cane ibihe yaba ari mu ngendo mu mahanga. Mu gihugu c'Ubushinwa, niho yavugiye ijambo rimwe mu yatazokwibagirwa. Hari mu mwaka w'1986, igihe yari mu rugendo, yaherekeje Umwamikazi. We yavuze ko yakoresheje imvugo ngereranyo, afatiye ku maso mato mato y'ubwoko bw'abanye Asia, cane cane Abashinwa. Naho bagerageje gusukamwo mabisi, imvugo yiwe yarababaje abantu mu Bushinwa. Mu mwaka wa 2002, ari mu rundi rugendo mu gihugu ca Australiya, yabajije umwe mu bagwizatunga w'umusangwabutaka  ati "Muracabandanya guterana amacumu"? Naho abatari bake, mu mice itandukanye bamunebagura, hari abandi ahubwo bamubona nk'umunyakuri, yanse guhindura ico ari ngo afate ingeso n'imvugo vy'abakinyi ba politike. Nkako, hari abasigura ko ivyo bita "amakosa" ata kabi karimwo, uretse inyifato yiwe yo gushaka kugabanya imitwaro y'abantu, mu kubatwenza. Mu buzima bwiwe, umuganwa Philip  yamanye urukundo rw'inkino. Yarakina inkino zo kugendesha ubwato buto buto, agakina inkino za cricket na polo. Yari umuhinga mugutwara imodoka zikwegwa n'indogobwe. Ndetse yaranarongoye, imyaka myinshi, ihuriro mpuzamakungu ry'amashirahamwe y'abakina inkino zikoreshwamwo indogobwe. Ukutumvikana n'umuhungu wiwe mukuru, kwagiye kwigaragaza kuva aho umumenyeshamakuru Jonathan Dimbleby ashiriye ahabona inyandiko ku vyaranze ubuzima bw'umuganwa Charles. Umuganwa Philip , ari na Duc wa  Edinburgh, vyavugwa ko yoba yagize uruhara mu bukwe  bw'umuhungu wiwe mukuru Charles , mu kwubakana na  Lady Diana Spencer. Urengeye uko abamunebagura bavuga, umuganwa Philip  yarazwi nk'umuntu yahagaritswe umutima n'ibiringo bigoye abana biwe baciyemwo, mu ngo zabo. Yarashize imbere y'ibindi vyose ugutahura izo ngorane, kumbure afatiye ku vyamushikiye n'ivyo yibuka bigoye, mu muryango w'i bwami. Umuganwa Philip yaratewe agahinda n'ingene abana biwe batatu bose ivy'ingo  vyabananiye, kuva ku muganwakazi Anne  gushika ku baganwa Andrew na Charles. Ico atigeze akora, ni ukuvuga ibijanye n'ubuzima bwiwe bwite. Mu 1994, yabwiye ikinyamakuru ko atariko yarezwe, kandi ko atibona agiye guhindura imibereho yiwe. No mu gihe yariko arasaza, imibereho yiwe ntiyahindutse. Yabandanije agendera amakungu. Yaba agiye mu bikorwa vyiwe bijanye no gushigikira ikigega mpuzamakungu co gukingira ibinyabuzima, canke aherekeje umwamikazi mu ngendo zijanye n'imirimo yiwe. Mu 1994, yaragize urugendo rurerure, aca no mu bibanza vyeranda, aranashika n'ahari imva y'umuvyeyi yamwibarutse. Mama wiwe yari yaripfuje guhambwa I Yerusalemu, nk'uko vyagenze. Uwundi munsi wari uhambaye mu buzima bwiwe, ni igihe amakungu yibuka itsindwa ry'Ubuyapani mu ntambara  ya kabiri y'isi yose -"VJ Day"-. Uyo mwaka wa 1945, umuganwa Philip  yakorera igisirikare co mu mazi. Yari no mu bwato bw'Ubwongereza, bumwe mu bwatera kandi bwari hafi ya Tokyo, umurwa mukuru w'igihugu c'Ubuyapani. Mu kwibuka uwo munsi, ibirori biba uko umwaka utashe. Mu 1995, yari akwije imyaka 50 y'amavuka. Yifadikanije n'abandi bakukuruke mu gisirikare bagiye kurwanira mu bihugu vya Asia  y'ubuseruko. Umwamikazi yarateye iteka ivyo birori vyabereye mu kibanza cagutse gikunze gukoraniramwo abantu, kiri hafi y'ikirimba - Buckingham Palace-. Imvugo ihumuriza Umuganwa Philip yararemesheje, aranakeza abari baragizwe imbohe. Abenshi muri bo barahahamuwe n'ivyo baciyemwo, ndetse hari n'abatashoboye guharira Abayapani babagize imbohe. . Ubukari bw'amajambo yiwe bwagiye buragabanuka mu myaka yakurikiye, bitumwe n'uko igihugu kitakiriye neza iyo nyifato yo ku kirimba, na cane cane inyuma y'isanganya ryahitanye umuganwakazi Diana. Mu mwaka w'i 2007, hari amakete umuganwa Philip  yandikiraniye n'umuganwakazi Diana yashizwe ahabona. Intumbero ikaba yari ukubeshuza amakuru yavugwa ko umuganwa Philip  atumvikana n'uwo mukazana wiwe. Amajambo Diana yakoresha mukwandikira sebukwe, umuganwa Philip, yemeje ko yamubereye nk'umuvyeyi mu kumushigikira mu bihe bitandukanye. Mu matohoza ku rupfu rw'umuganwakazi Diana, Mohamed Al Fayed, se wa Dodi, umugabo yagendanye n'umuganwakazi Diana mu minsi ya nyuma, wewe yari yavuze ko umuganwa Philip ariwe ari inyuma y'urwo rupfu, ivyemezo vyatewe ivyatsi n'uwari ajejwe kwemeza ko Diana yacikanye. Umuganwa Philip  akaba na Duc wa Edinburgh, yari umuntu w'ishaka. Kandi mu nyifato y'ubwigenge bwiwe, vyamugize umuntu w'icubahiro gikomeye mu Bongereza. Inyifato ifise ifatiro n'ihangiro Umuganwa Philip yari umuyobozi kamere, kandi ibikorwa vyiwe vyamuhaye ikibanza ca kabiri mu buyobozi bw'Ubwongereza. Yari umurwanashaka atarazi kuruhuka, kandi atitaho cane ivy'ikibanza ciwe. Umunsi umwe yabwiye BBC ati: "Narakoze ivyo numva nabwirizwa gukora kandi uko nashoboye". Yongeye ati:  "Sinshobora guhindura rimwe na rimwe uko mbona canke nkora ibintu, canke ngo mpindure uko ndemye, canke ibindaje ishinga". Ibi yavuze vyanemejwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere David Cameron mu mwaka wa 2011, mu birori vyo gukeza umuganwa Philip , aho yahimbaza imyaka 90 y'amavuka. Yavuze ati: "Yamye arangura imigambi n'ivyiyumviro vyiwe mu buryo yisangije kandi busanzwe, nk'umuntu wo kuri iyi si. Ndemera ko ari kimwe muvyo abongereza bamukundira". Akaruhuko ko mu za bukuru Mu bikorwa vy'igihugu, umuganwa Philip yagiye mu karuhuko k'izabukuru mu kwezi kw'umunani mu  2017. Yari amaze imyaka ashigikira umwamikazi, yongera akorera canke aserukira amashirahamwe atandukanye yari arongoye, canke yashinze. Ikirimba ca  Buckingham giharura ko umuganwa Philip yaranguye, canke yaterereye mu migambi 22.219  ku gatwe kiwe, kuva mu mwaka wa 1952. Umushikiranganji  wa mbere Theresa May yaramushimiye cane, ati: "Ni ibikorwa biboneka mu buzima bw'igihugu". Philip  yarashoboye gukoresha ububasha n'ikibanza igihugu kimuha, mu guterera agacumu k'ubumwe mw'iterambere ry'Ubwongereza. Yaranafasha uburongozi bwo ku kirimba guhindura ibitari bike mu mibereho yari imaze imyaka. Ariko igikorwa nyamukuru kwabaye ugukoresha inguvu ziwe mu gushigikira Umwamikazi mu kiringo ciwe kirekire, yari amaze arongoye ubwami bw'Ubwongereza. Nk'uko yabiganiriye umwanditsi w'ivyaranze ubuzima bwiwe, Umuganwa Philip yaremeza ko umurimo wiwe mukuru kwari "Ugufasha Umwamikazi kurongora ubwami". Mu birori vyo guhimbaza imyaka 50 bamaze bubakanye, Umwamikazi yarashimye , anakeza umuganwa Philip, nk'uwabaye uwa mbere yamaze imyaka myinshi ari umufasha w'Umwamikazi, muri kahise k'ubwami bw'Ubwongereza. Umwamikazi yavuze ijambo ryabaye rurangiranwa ati, "N'umuntu adakunda cane gushimirwa no gukezwa, ariko yarambereye inguvu, ambera intahemuka iyi myaka yose. Kandi ahanje, umuryango wiwe wose, Ubwongereza hamwe n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi, tumufitiye ideni rinini, rikomeye ku buryo adashobora kuryishuza canke ngo tunamenye n'ibirigize". Amafoto yose yatangiwe uburenganzira.

column2: Burundi na Covid-19:Abarenga 70 batowe umugera mu ntara ya Makamba
column3: Abajejwe amagara y'abantu mu ntara ya Makamba yo mu bumanuko bw'Uburundi ku rubibe bihana na Tanzania bamenyesha ko gushika uyu munsi abantu 79 bamaze gutorwa umugera wa Covid-19. Komine zitatu z'iyo ntara-Mabanda, Nyanzalac na Vugizo nizo zivugwamwo abo bantu. Mu batowe uwo mugera harimwo abanyeshure n'abigisha. Abo bantu bose ubu bariko barakurinwa kwa mu ganga mu bitaro vya komine za Mabanda, Nyanzalac na Makamba nyene. Haraheze indwi irenga iyo ndwara itanguye kuvugwa muri iyo ntara. Kuva ico gihe haciye hatangura isekeza ryo gupima abokoranyeko n'aba mbere batoweko  uwo mugera. Gushika ubu iyo ndwara iterwa n'umugera corona yahora ivugwa cane na mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Abantu  nibura 140 baratowe uwo mugera um bipimo vyakozwe hagati y'itariki 4 na 10 ukwezi kwa mbere. Ariko muri iyi minsi iravugwa no mu gihugu hagati. Gushika kuri uyu wa kane, mu ntara ya Ngozi iri mu buraruko bw'Uburundi havugwa abantu 22 batowe iyo ndwara, hakurikijwe ibiharo bitangwa n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu n'intwaro. ''Abo ni abari mu ma centres de sante no mu  bitaro, hari abafatira imiti muhira'' nk'uko bivugwa n'umwe mu  baba mu gisagara ca Ngozi. N'umukuru w'intara ya Mwaro amajahagati y'Uburundi ku wa kane yavuze ko hari umuntu yatowe umugera wa Covid-19 muri muri iyo ntara Mu ntara ya Kayanza naho barenga 30 ku bipimo vyakozwe kuva itari 8 z'uku kwezi. Uwo murindi ugira kabiri w'ikwirakwira ry'iyo ndwara ryatumye hafatwa ingingo zindi zirakazwa mu ntumbero yo kwirinda ko ico kiza kibandanya kirandagata. Kuva kuri uyu kuri uyu wa kane mu miduga yo kwiyunguruza rusangi abantu bategerezwa kwambara udufukamunwa. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Uburundi Alain Guillaume Bonyoni yanavuze ko ahantu hose hahurira abanbtu benshi bategerezwa kujayo bambaye udufukamunwa. Yabivuze kuri uyu wa kane ariko aragendera ibigo bipima uwo mugera. Coronavirus yatanguye kuvugwa mu Burundi mu kwezi kwa kane mu mwaka uheze.  Abantu barenga igihumbi baramaze kwandura uwo mugera, babiri nabo uramaze kubahitana, hakurikijwe ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu.

column2: Coronavirus: Dr Tedros wa OMS ati: "reka kugira Covid-19 ikibazo ca politike"
column3: Umukuru w'umuryango ujejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO asaba ko abantu bagira ubumwe mu kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus, ni mu gihe uwo muryango waneguwe n'umukuru wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije, umukuru wa OMS Tedros Ghebreyesus, yarashimagije igikorwa kiriko gikorwa n'uwo muryango, anasaba ko abantu boreka kugira covid-19 ikibazo ca politike. Bwana Trump avuga ko agiye kwihweza ingene yohagarika imfashanyo itangwa na Amerika muri uwo muryango. Trump yagiriza OMS ko "yegamiye cane ku ruhande rw'u Bushinwa". Dr. Tedros ariyamiriza ayo majambo, agashimangira ati "Turi kumwe n'ibihugu vyose, kandi nta vangura rituranga". Inyuma y'aho yifatiye mu gahanga OMS ku wakabiri, Bwana Trump yarasubiye aranegura kandi ejo ku wa gatatu uwo muryango mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru, avuga ko uwo muryango "utegerezwa kwerekana neza ibikorwa ushira imbere". Avuga ko Amerika igiye gukora umwihwezo kugira ngo ifate ingingo nimba ishobora kubandanya itanga intererano yayo muri OMS. Ati: "Babanje kuvuga ko ari ibinyoma. Tugiye guhagarika amahera dutanga muri OMS". Eka n'umunyamabanga ajejwe imigenderanire w'ico gihugu Mike Pompeo na we ejo ku wa gatatu yabwiye abanyamakuru ko ubutegetsi bwariko "bwihweza intererano yacu duha OMS". Pompeo ati: "Amashirahamwe ategereza gukora. Ategerezwa kwerekana ko ariko akora ivyo yiyemeje". Coronavirus yatanguye kwibonekeza mu kwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze mu gihasagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa, ababa muri ico gisagara ubu basubiye kwemererwa gusohoka inyuma y'ivyumweru 11 bugaranywe. Umwe mu bahanuzi b'umukuru wa OMS yari yavuze ko kubona  barakoranye cane n'u Bushinwa "vyabaye ngirakamaro cane" mu gushobora gutahura ivy'iyo ndwara kuva icaduka. Ayo majambo anegura OMS yashikirijwe na Perezida Trump aje mu gihe ubutegetsi bwiwe bunegurwa cane ko bwavyifashemwo nabi mu guhangana n'ico kiza. Tedros ntafise ubwoba ko Amerika yohagarika intererano yayo Ejo ku wagatatu, Dr Tedros yavuze ati: "Ndabasavye, mugire ubumwe mu gihugu cose, reka kugira Covid-19 ikibazo ca politike". "Ubwa kabiri, isi yose ifatane mu nda. Hanyuma n'ubutegetsi bwa Amerika n'u Bushinwa bube ubutegetsi bwizigiwe". Yishura ku majambo yavuzwe na Trump, Dr. Tedros yateye akamo ati: "Ibihugu bikomeye vyategerezwa gufata iya mbere, kandi ndabasavye mureke gukorera politike kuri Covid-19". Amerika ni kimwe mu bihugu bitanga intererano nini muri uwo muryango, ibiharuro vya OMS bikerekana ko itanga ibice 15% vy'amahera yose akoreshwa. Dr. Tedros ejo ku wagatatu yavuze ko ata bwoba afise kuri ayo majambo yo guhagarika intererano, akavuga ko yizeye ko Amerika izobandanya iyitanga. Imbere y'aho, umunyamabanga w'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU, António Guterres, yari yashikirije ijambo ashigikira uwo muryango. Yavuze ko coronavirus ari ikiza "kitari bwaboneke", amenyesha ko ivyo kwihweza ingene isi yahanganye naco vyoba ivyo muri kazoza. Ati : "Ubu ni umwanya wo kuja hamwe, aho isi yose itegerezwa gukorera hamwe, dufatane mu nda kugira ngo duhagarike uwu mugera n'inkurikizi zawo". Abategetsi b'ibihugu vya Afrika nka Paul Kagame w'u Rwanda, Cyril Ramaphosa wa Afurika y'Epfo na Hage Geingob wa Namibia batangaje ko bashigikiye OMS mu rugamba irongoye rwo kurwanya Covid-19.

column2: Burundi: Leta ikemura gute ikibazo c'ikena ry'amahera y'agaciro?
column3: Leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata ingingo mu gisata c'ubutunzi n'urudandazwa benshi bavuga ko zigamije kugerageza kubungabunga amahera y'agaciro ari muri ico gihugu. Muri urwo rwego, Banki ya Republika y'u Burundi iherutse gufata itegeko riraba abinjirana amafaranga muri ico gihugu, harimwo n'abanyamahanga. Iryo tegeko ribabwiriza gukoresha amafranga y'amarundi mu kugura ibintu vyose imbere mu gihugu.
