Baterezwa kandi  kuvunjisha mu bigo vyemewe n'amategeko amafranga y'agaciro baba bafise, bashaka kuyakoresha. Iyo ngingo yakurikiranye n'iyindi igenga ukudandaza ubutare n'ayandi mabuye y'agaciro muri banki y'igihugu. Ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafatanga y'agaciro mu Burundi bivugwa ko coba kiva ahanini ku bihano u Burundi bwafatiwe n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya, ryahagaritse amahera ryaha ico gihugu kuva mu 2015 igihe hatangura ingorane za politike. Mu gushaka kumenya vyinshi kuri izo ngingo leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata, Florentine Kwizera yavuganye na Faustin Ndikumana, umuhinga mu vy'ubutunzi. Ushobora kwumva ico kiganiro ngaha

column2: Kenya: Evariste Ndayishimiye asaba abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe mu Burundi
column3: Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye atera akamo abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe yabo mu Burundi  kuko ngo mu myaka ibiri canke itatu iri imbere bashobora kuzoba bacerewe. Agishika muri Kenya, yaciye aca mu burengero bw'ico gihugu mu gisagara ca Kisumu, aho prezida n'abagize reta ya Kenya bari, bitegurira guhimbaza umusi mukuru wa Madaraka Day kuri uyu wa kabiri. Mu kiganiro bahaye abamenyeshamakuru, abakuru b'ibihugu Uhuru Kenyatta na Evariste Ndayishimiye bashimagije umubano mwiza, gufashanya muri politike, ubutunzi, gutsimbataza amahoro n'ishaka bafise ryo kubitsimbataza. Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko amaze kuza muri Kenya kenshi, ariko ko ari ubwa mbere ashitse mu gisagara ca Kisumu. Yagize ati:"...Ntangajwe n'ubwiza hamwe n'iterambere nsanze muri kino gisagara." Yavuze ko Uburundi bumaze gutera intambwe mu mahoro n'umutekano, ko butakiri ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bitarangwamwo amahoro muri Onu, ashimira prezida Kenyatta ko "we ubwiwe yabigizemwo uruhara." Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ubu, Uburundi buriko burashira inguvu cane mu guteza imbere ubutunzi, aranashima ko uguhanahana ibidandazwa hagati ya Kenya n'Uburundi bigenda vyiyongera. Yvuze ati:"Ndateye akamo abagwizatunga bo muri Kenya kuza mu Burundi kukoni co gihe ciza, kurindira imyaka ibiri canke itatu, mushobora gusanga mwacerewe." Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi kandi yatumiye mugenzi we wa Kneya Uhuru Kenyatta kugendera Uburundi.

column2: Passports za Covid: Zikora gute kw'isi?
column3: Uko iminsi ihera, niko ibihugu biba vyinshi mu kwiyumvira gukoresha urupapuro rw'inzira, murekarengane, canke passeport ya Covid, nk'uburyo bwo kwugururira no kurekura abantu ngo batembere. Bene izo passeports zikunze kuboneka umuntu aciye kuri app (application) yo kuri telefone ngendanwa yiwe  canke hamwe hamwe hakanatangwa iz'impapuro zisanzwe. Ibihugu bimwe bimwe biramaze gushiraho passeports zavyo za Covid zemerera abantu kuja mu manza canke ibirori bihuriramwo abantu benshi. Ariko mu gihe hari ibihugu bikiri inyuma cane mu bijanye no gutanga incanco, hari ubwoba ko bimwe bizosigara inyuma.  Aha turaraba ingene ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyatunganije ikibazo c'ama passeports y'urucanco n'ibijanye nazo. Gushika ubu, "ibibanza vy'urugero runini rwo gushobora kwandura" nk'inzu z'ubutambiro ntibisaba icemeza ko watewe urucanco. Ariko, umushikiranganji wa mbere Boris Johnson yatangaje imigambi y'uko "kuba warakwije incanco bizoba ngombwa kugira winjire mu mazu y'ubutambiro n'ibindi bibanza bihuriramwo abantu benshi cane" kuva mu mpera z'ukwezi kw'icenda. Hisunzwe izo ngingo nshasha, abantu bazokwerekana ko bakwije incanco bakoresheje ikimenyetso bahabwa na app y'ikigo NHS. Ico kimenyetso ca NHS - canke ikimeze nk'ico mu bindi bice vy'Ubwongereza (UK) - kizotuma abantu bakuze bakwije  incanco badasabwa kwikumira iyo bagarutse bava mu bihugu biri ku rutonde rw'ibisaba abantu kuguma ukwa wenyene iminsi cumi no kwipimisha corona kabiri muri ico kiringo (amber-list countries). Ariko n'ubwo boba bafise ico kimenyetso, bazotegerezwa guca baguma ukwabonyene i muhira iwabo bashitse mu Bwongereza mu gihe  bavuye mu Bufaransa. Ku bwa reta, ibihugu birenga 30 birimwo Ubugiriki na Espagne ubu biremera ico kimenyetso ariko abagifise bategerezwa kubanza kuraba neza amategeko yo kwinjira iyo bagomba kuja imbere yo gufatisha itike kandi bakaguma basuzuma imbere yo gufata urugendo. Passeport y'urucanco y'ibihugu vya Buraya igiye gushirwaho mu bihugu 27 bigize iryo shirahamwe - hongeweko Ubuswise , Islande, Norvège na Liechtenstein. Abanyagihugu bo muri ivyo bihugu bashobora gukura iyo passport kuri app canke bakaronka iy'urupapuro - ata mafaranga batanze. Ishobora kuronkwa kandi n'abanyamahanga bafise uburenganzira bwemewe n'amategeko bwo kuba muri ivyo bihugu. Kubera Ubwongereza butakiri muri iryo shirahamwe, iyo passeport nta Bongereza benshi bashobora kuyironka. Urwo rupapuro rushobora gutangwa iyo umuntu yaronse urucanco, aheruka gupimwa bagasanga nta Covid afise canke aheruka gukira uwo mugera. Uwariwe wese afise urwo rupapuro  ubundi ntaheza ngo asubire gupimwa canke ngo ashirwe ukwa wenyene iyo ajabutse urubibe mu bihugu bigize EU. Ibindi bihugu bigize ishirahamwe navyo birafise impapuro zavyo bwite zihabwa abaronse urucanco. Abategetsi bashizeho urupapuro ruzoha uburenganzira abantu bwo kwinjira mu mazu y'uburiro, ubunywero, indege hamwe n'amatereni (gariyamoshi). Gushika ubu, ibibanza bihuriramwo abantu barenga 50 vyaratanguye gusaba icemeza ko waronse urucanco canke urupapuro rw'uko ata Covid bagusanganye mu bipimo. Iyo murekarengane (pass) izosabwa abantu bose bakuze kuva mu kwezi kw'icumi ariko harimwo n'abana barenza imyaka 12 kuva itariki 30 z'ukwezi kw'icenda. Kugira uronke urwo rupapuro, abantu bategerezwa kwerekana ko bakwije incanco, ko bapimwe mu minsi mike iheze bagasanga nta mugera bafise canke ko baherutse gukira umugera. Kw'itariki 24 ukwezi kw'indwi, hafi abantu ibihumbi 160 baragize imyiyerekano mu gihugu biyamiririza iyo murekarengane ya Covid n'ingingo y'uko abakozi bo kwa muganga bategerezwa guterwa incanco. Israel yashizeho murekarengane y'urucanco mu ntango z'uyu mwaka. Yasaba abantu kwerekana icemeza ko baronse incanco canke ko barwaye umugera mu minsi ya vuba. Iyo murekarengane yatumye ibitigiri vy'abiteza incanco vyiyongera, cane cane mu bakiri bato. Ibiharuro vy'abandura bimaze kugabanuka, abategetsi baciye bafata ingingo yo kuvanaho iyo ndinganizo. Ariko ubu reta yatangaje imigambi yo kuyisubizaho mu gihe ibiharuro vy'abandura vyasubiye kuduga. Indinganizo nshasha izotuma abantu barenza imyaka 12 baronse incanco, baherutse gukira Covid canke bapimwe ntibatorwe uwo mugera, bashobora kuja mu manza canke ibirori vy'abantu benshi no kwinjira ibibanza bimwe bimwe bigenewe bose, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Times of Israel. Iyo murekarengane nshasha yari gutangura gukoreshwa kuva itariki 29 z'ukwezi kw'indwi. Iyo murekarengane izokora ku biteramo vy'akaranga n'inkino, inzu zo kunonoreramwo imitsi (gym), inzu z'uburiro, ahabera amanama (conference), ahagenderwa na ba mukerarugendo hamwe n'ibibanza vy'amasengesho. Ubushinwa bwashizeho indinganizo ya QR code mu mwaka uheze ishira abantu mu migwi hakoreshejwe amabara atandukanye. Ibara ry'urwatsi rubisi rirekurira abantu gutembera ata na hamwe bimiriwe, mu gihe umuntu afise ibara ry'umuhondo ashobora gusabwa kuguma i muhira mu kiringo c'iminsi indwi. Izo QR codes ziba zirimwo amakuru ku rugero rwagutse hamwe n'ayatangwa n'abazikoresha ubwabo. Vyinshi mu bibanza bigenewe uwariwe wese mu Bushinwa birasaba abantu kwerekana QR yabo kugira bemererwe kwinjira. Mu kwezi kwa gatatu Ubushinwa bwashizeho urupapuro rw'amagara rwo mu buhinga bwa none (digital) rwerekana niba uwurufise yaricandagishije canke atarabikora hamwe n'icavuye mu bipimo. Urwo rupapuro n'abanyamahanga bashobora kururonka mu Bushinwa co kimwe n'Abashinwa. Hizigiwe ko Abashinwa bazoshobora kurukoresha nka murekarengane y'urucanco mu bindi bihugu muri kazoza. Ntiharamenyekana ibihugu Ubushinwa buriko buravugana navyo kugirango urwo rupapuro rwabwo rwemerwe. Ibihugu vyinshi vyahisemwo kudashiraho murekarengane y'urucanco. Mu kwezi kwa kane, ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu (White House/Maisom Blanche) vyamenyesheje ko hatazoshirwaho passeport y'urucanco ku rwego rw'igihugu, bivuga ko uburenganzira bw'abanyagihugu ku mabanga y'ubuzima bwabo butegerezwa gukingirwa. Ariko hari ama reta ane afise apps z'urucanco zikora, nk'uko vyerekanwa na MIT Technology Review. Ariko hari n'ayandi ma reta yahisemwo gushiraho ingingo zayo zo kugerageza kuduza urugero rw'abateza urucanco. California izosaba abakozi ba reta bose hamwe n'abakozi bitaho amagara y'abantu  kwerekana ikigaragaza ko batewe urucanco canke bace bapimwa buri ndwi guhera mu kwezi kuza. Igisagara ca New York kizokurikiza ingingo isa n'iyo kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda hagati mu gusaba abakozi b'igisagara - harimwo abaporisi n'abigisha - kwiteza urucanco canke gupimwa buri ndwi. Gushika ubu, abantu batewe urucanco muri Australia barafise urupauro rwo mu buhinga bwa none (digital) mu materefone yabo ariko nta burenganzira bujanye narwo. Umushikiranganji w'ico gihugu ajejwe ubukerarugendo Dan Tehan yavuze ko passeport y'urucanco ishobora guha abantu ''uburenganzira bwo gushobora gusohoka imbibe iyo hari ingingo zo kwiyugarana canke iyo hari ibice vy'intara biri mu ngingo zo kwiyugarana, kubera icaduka c'indwara". Yanavuze ko kwongera ukwishira no kwizana abatewe urucanco bishobora gutuma abandi barwiteza.

column2: Lionel Messi: kubera iki uyu kizigenza avuga ko yarambiwe na Barcelona?
column3: Nk'uko bivugwa n'iradiyo yo muri Espanye, Cadena Ser, kizigenza w'umurwi wa Barcelona yahagaritse ibiganiro vyo kwongereza amasezerano kubera yananiwe n'ukwihanganira ibihuha n'amajambo avuga ko ari umwe mu batera imigumuko muri uyo murwi. Messi ababajwe n'ibintu bitari bike bivugwa mu murwi wiwe wa Barcelona muri kino gihe. Yumva y'uko yaruhijwe n'uko yagirizwa ko ari we atwara uyo murwi, ko ari we atanga akazi kandi akabogoza abamenyereza, ko ari we atanga amategeko mu bijanye no kugura abakinyi kandi ko ari we ahitamwo abakina, aruhishijwe n'uburongozi bw'uyo murwi muri rusangi hamwe n'amakosa bakora mu bijanye no kugura abakinyi. Ngo iyo vyakabereye ni kera! Ikiganiro c'iyo radio El Larguero  kimenyesha ko uyu mukinyi yamaze kumenyesha uyu murwi ko ihiganwa ryo mu mwaka uza rirangiye azoca agenda. None ni ibiki biri muri uyo murwi? Nivyo tugiye guca irya n'ino. Messi aragirizwa ko yari yashatse ko umurwi wiwe ugura umukinyi w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann yakinira Atletico Madrid, ariko y'uko muri kino gihe adashaka kumubona. Ibi ngo si vyo. Twirengagije ivyo umupira, Griezmann yama ari kumwe na Messi hamwe na Luis Suarez, bari kumwe n'abagore babo kugira basangirire hamwe, kandi imigenderanire yabo ni myiza cane, n'aho Griezmann atarashobora kuronka amahirwe menshi yo gutsinda ibitsindo vyinshi. Ahubwo ikiriho Messi na Suarez babandanya bamufasha kugira ngo amenyere umukino wa Barcelona. Ku bijanye n'uburongozi, yagirizwa ko ari we yatumye uwahoze amenyereza uyo murwi Tata Martino yirukanwa maze uwusanzwe awumenyereza muri kino gihe, Quique Setien, aronswa akazi ngo kuko yiyumvamwo umukino wiwe. N'ibi ngo sivyo. Nk'umukinyi wa mbere ahembwa neza muri uyo murwi, ibihuha nk'ibi vyama bivyuka kandi nivyo y'uko iyo hageze ko hafatwa ingingo zikomeye zerekeye imishahara, abakinyi rurangiranwa barababaza. Ivyo rero niko bimeze, kandi si ikintu kidasanzwe muri Barcelona, mbere bitagenze uko hoba habayemwo ugufata ibintu minenerwe.' Ariko ukuri ni uko hari ingorane zigoye gutorerwa umuti. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru ni uko umukuru w'uyo murwi Josep Maria Bartomeu hari ivyo yemeye gukora ariko yananiwe n'ugushitsa. Ubwa mbere, yari yemeye ko yari kugarukana mu murwi umukinyi Neymar, mu gihe ahubwo yari azi neza ko yari agiye kugura umukinyi Griezmann. Ikindi, yemeye ko yari kwirukana Ernesto Valverde kugira ngo azanye Xavi, ariko ikiriho ni uko impande zompi, ni ukuvuba Barca na Xavi bari bamaze kwemeranya ko badashobora gusubira gukorana. Amasezerano Messi afitaniye n'uyo murwi muri kino gihe asanzwe afise ikigabane kimwemerera gushobora kuva muri uyo murwi mu gihe azorangirira. N'aho muri rusangi amerewe neza mu mibereho yiwe muri kino gihe - kumbure mbere no gusumba no mu myaka iheze - umutima nturi mu nda ku burongozi bw'uyo murwi. Wewe ashaka ko umurwi wiwe utsinda cane cane ku rwego rw'umugabane wa Bulaya. Rero mu gihe yokwerekana amadidane kuri kazoza kiwe, ni ngombwa ko uburongozi bwicara bugatora inyishu - iyo nayo si iyindi, ni ugukerebuka bakagura abakinyi beza. Ibiganiro vyo kwongereza amasezerano vyariko biragenda neza. Ariko uyo mukinyi akomoka muri Argentine ntiyishimiye umwimbu mubi mu kibuga, mbere n'icizere kuri Setien kigenda kigabanuka mu gice kinini c'abakinyi. Ibintu vyagiye kwunyuka inyuma y'urukino rwo ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iheze na Celta Vigo rwagiye kurangira iyo mirwi yompi inganije 2-2, ivyatumye intumbero yo gutsindira ihiganwa ija muri kabaza. Harabaye uguterana amajambo hagati ya Setien na bamwe mu bakinyi bakomakomeye ba Barcelona. Asa n'uwihebuye kubera atashoboye gukora vyinshi muvyo yari yiteze gukora igihe ashika muri uyo murwi, uyo mumenyereza, yarashwanye cane. Yabwiye abakinyi ko ibintu bidashobora kubandanya uko bimeze, kandi ko nimba babishatse bomubwira akigira mu gihe ibintu bitohinduka. Si ukuvuga ko yashatse gutanga imihoho, ariko ni inzira yo gusaba ko hotorwa inyishu. Inyishu yahavuye iboneka. Haciye hatangura ibiganiro hagati ya Setien na ba kizigenza, hamwe kandi na Bartomeu, kandi ibintu vyaciye bitangura gufata umurongo. Gerard Pique, umwe muri ba  kizigenza akaba mbere n'umuntu w'umwizigirwa, yacishije ubutumwa kuri Twitter asaba ubumwe mu bagize umurwi hamwe no mu bakunzi bawo. Hagati aho, mu gihe hakiri icuka atari ciza mu burongozi mbere n'umumenyereza agashobora wirukanwa, mu gihe co kugiriranira amasezerano n'abakinyi, mu gihe ibindi biganiro vyari vyitezwe, Messi wewe ntiyavyoroheje mu kwerekana amakenga yiwe, n'aho vyavuzwe n'iradiyo. Ico kwibuka ni uko uyo murwi atari bwo bwa mbere uja mu mayira abiri kuva muri kahise iyo bishitse Messi agashaka kuwuvamwo. Mu ntango z'umwuga wiwe, umurwi Inter Milan w'Ubutaliyano habuze gato ngo umunyakure igihe umenyesha ko igiciro ciwe c'imiliyoni 150 y'amadorari kitari ikibazo, kandi ko yari yiteguye kugwiza incuro zitatu umushahara wiwe. Ico gihe mbere yari agikwegana amatwi n'abategetsi ba Espanye arondera ibimuranga kugira ngo ashobore gukinira muri ico gihugu, kandi ntiyari bwanabe umukinyi yizigiwe muri Barcelona. Amajambo ya gishingantahe w'uwari arongoye umurwi ico gihe, Joan Laporta, yahinduye ibintu. Messi, we nyene ubwiwe akaba atashaka kugenda, yagumye muri uwi murwi. Ku ncuro igira gatatu, Barcelona yinjiye mu kibazo gikomeye mu gihe abayirongoye babuze ico bafata n'ico bareka, Messi nawe akaba yarabamenyesheje neza icipfuzo ciwe. Nk'uko yari yavyiketse mu ntango, Barcelona iboneka ko ata nguvu yari ifise yo gutsindira ihiganwa rya Bulaya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Eufa Champions League). Hampande y'ico, vyaranse ko igura umusatirizi wa Argentine Lautaro Martinez, n'aho aboneka ko asa n'umukinyi Barcelona ikeneye kugira ngo igume ku rugero rwo hejuru. Mu murwi hoho gushika ubu baracafise icizere ko bashobora kumuronka. Mu gihe hari iciyumviro kibandanya ko Xavi ashobora kugaruka muri Barcelona kugira ngo awubere umumenyereza, Victor Font ashaka kwitoza kurongora uyo murwi mu 2021, yaratangaje izuba riva ko ikintu ca mbere yokora ari ukuzana Xavi kugira amenyereze Barcelona. N'aho Xavi aboneka ko ashobora kwakirizwa yompi kugira ngo anagure umukino wa Barcelona, igikorwa nyamukuru coba kirindiriye uyo yahoze ari kizingenza wayo kwoba ukuraba nimba ashobora gutorera umuti ibibazo biyihanze, nk'umurwi wabaye rurangiranwa kw'isi ariko uriko utera wegereza iminsi yawo yanyuma. Mu kurindira, Messi wewe abandanya abihweza, akaba arindiriye amaherezo yavyo.

column2: Uyghurs: ONU ivuga ko Ubushiwa bushobora kuba bwarakoze ivyaha vyo guhohotera ikiremwa muntu i Xinjiang
column3: Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU riheruka kwagiriza Ubushinwa uguhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu gukomeye mu cegeranyo kirekire cari kirindiriwe igihe kinini kirimwo ibirego vy’ubugizi bwa nabi mu ntara ya Xinjiang. Ubushinwa bwihutiye gusaba ONU ko itosohora ico cegeranyo bwise ''ikinamico" ryateguwe n’ibihugu vya Bulaya bikomeye. Ico cegeranyo cihweza ivyagiriji vy'ihohotera rikorerwa abantu bo mu bwoko bw’aba Uyghur bo mw’idini rya Islamu n’abandi bantu bo mu bwoko bwa banyamuke ariko Ubushinwa burabihakana. Ariko abakoze amatohoza bavuga ko babonye "ivyemezo bidakekeranywa" vy'ikubagurwa bishobora gufatirwa ku rwego rw'ivyaha bihohotera ikiremwa muntu. Abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bari bamaze imyaka baguma batabariza ku bibera mu ntara yo mu buraruko bushira uburengero, bavuga ko abantu barenga umuliyoni bo mu bwoko bw’aba Uyghur  bafunzwe ku nguvu mu rukurikirane rw’ico leta yise "ikambi irera igasubiza abantu mu ntumbero nziza’’. Mu makuru ya BBC ubwayo yo muri iyi myaka ya vuba, harabonetse impapuro - zirimwo n'iz'igipolisi zerekeye abo bapfunzwe - zisa n'izemanga ivyo bivugwa, hamwe n'ivyagiriji vyo gufata ku nguvu, kuboreza igufa hamwe no gucira umuntu imvyaro ku nguvu. Ariko icegerano ca ONU casanze "urugero rw'ifatwa ridakurikije amategeko hamwe no gupfunga hafatiwe ku bwoko abo mu moko y'aba Uyghur n'iyindi migwi igizwe ahanini n'aba-Islamu... rushobora gushirwa mu rwego rw'ivyaha mpuzamakungu, ku buryo bwihariye, ivyaha bihohotera ikiremwa muntu".  Babonye kandi ko: Ico cegeranyo gisaba Ubushinwa "gutanguza ubu bwa vuba intambwe zo gurekura abo bantu bafashwe bidakurikije amategeko bakakwa ukwishira ukizana kwabo". Beijing iza yamaze kwiyamiriza ibiri muri ico cegeranyo, umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bujejwe imigenderanire Wang Wenbin akaba yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko "ivyo vyitwa ko ari ivyashikirijwe ari irempenkanya rishingiye ku makuru atariyo ku mvo za politike". Inama mpuzamakungu y’aba-Uyghur yashimye ico cegeranyo yongera isaba ko amakungu yofata ingingo zihuta. "Naho leta y'Ubushinwa ihakana yivuye inyuma, ONU ubu yemeje icese y'uko ivyaha vy'agahomerabunwa biriko birakorwa", nk'uko vyavuzwe n'umuyobozi w'ikigo giharanira agateka k'aba-Uyghur (Uyghur Human Rights Project), Omer Kanat. Umunyamabanga w’ishirahamwe rijejwe agateka k’aba-Uyghur yavuze ko naho leta y’Ubushinwa yanka bikomeye kwemera ibiri mu cegeranyo, ONU yaremeje ku mugaragaro ko ivyaha bibabaje biriko biraba . Hariho abantu imiliyoni 12 bo mu bwoko bw’aba-Uygyur, bagizwe ahanini n’abari mw’idini rya Islamu baba muri Xinjang. ONU ivuga ko n’abatari mw’idini rya Islamu bashobora kuba barashikiwe n’ibibazo bivugwa muri ico cegeranyo. Amerika n’abashingamateka bo mu bihugu vyinshi bitandukanye baheruka kwiyamiriza ibikorwa vy’Ubushinwa bibera muri Xinjiang bavyita ihonyabwoko, ariko ONU ntiyashikanye aho. U﻿bushinwa - bwabonye iki cegeranyo kitarasohoka - buhakana ivyagiriji vyo guhohotera bukavuga ko ayo makambi ari uburyo bwo kurwanya iterabwoba. Ubushinwa bwamye buvuga ko impirimbanyi z’aba-Uyhgur ziri mw'isekeza ry’ubugizi bwa nabi mu kurondera kuba igihugu cigenga, ariko bwagirizwa gukavya mu kuvuga amabi bakora kugira bubone akaryo ko kubakandamiza. Abaserukiye Ubushinwa mu kanama kajewe agateka kazina muntu i Geneve ku musi wa kane barahakanye ibiri muri ico cegeranyo, bavuga ko kigayisha kikongera kigateza urubwa Ubushinwa, kikivanga no mu bikorwa vyo hagati mu gihugu.  The Xinjiang Police Files (Amadosiye y’igipolisi co muri Xinjiang) - izina ryahawe izo mpapuro n'ihwaniro ry’abanyamakuru mpuzamakungu barimwo n'aba BBC- nizo zashingiweko mu gukora igice kinini c'inkuru yakozwe na BBC ku ba Uyghur muri iyi myaka ya vuba. Aha, uwahoze ari umunyamakuru wa BBC mu Bushinwa John Sudworth aravuga bimwe mu vyo izi mpapuro zatumye bija ahabona. Ku ﻿rupapuro ruhambaye kurusha izindi muri izi zose, harimwo ko abapolisi bategetswe gukoresha ibirwanisho mu gihe hari uwutorotse. I﻿nkengeri igabisha iramutse ivuze, nk'uko izo mapuro zibivuga, amabarabara akikuje inkambi ategerezwa guca yugarwa, inyubako zose zikugarwa hanyuma abapolisi bafise ibirwanisho b'iyo nkambi "b'umugwi utera" bakarungikwa. I﻿sasu rigabisha rimaze kuraswa, hanyuma "umunyeshure" akabandanya agerageza gutoroka, itegeko riratomoye: rasira kwica. U﻿bushinwa burashimangira yuko buha aba-Uyghur babishaka kandi babishima hamwe n'izindi nkehwa z'aba-Turkic, inyigisho zibakura mu nzira y'iterabwoba hamwe n'ubutagondwa. U﻿biravye, ibi barimwo bihabwa isura y'ishure, aho usanga bafata ku mutwe inyigisho z'igishinwa hamwe no gusubiramwo amajambo ya propaganda (yerekana isura nziza y'igihugu). A﻿riko izi mpapuro zishitsa kure mu kwerekana ububi n'agahato bikoreshwa muri izi nkambi, bigamije gufata ico ari co cose cerekeye umuco w'aba-Uyghur, bakagisubiriza mu buryo bw'inguvu, no kwitangira umugambwe w'aba-Communistes. Ico cegeranyo camaze igihe kire kire gihanzwe amaso n'amakungu, ku buryo umukuru w'urwego rujejwe agateka ka zina muntu muri ONU, Michelle Bachelet, mu ndwi iheze yemeye ko "ingingo yo kugisora canke kutagisohora wari umutwaro uremereye cane". I﻿migwi imwe y'i Buraya na Amerika iharanira agate ka zina muntu yaravuze yuko Beijing yamuhimirije gukura muri ico cegeranya ibigaragara nabi, cane cane nyuma yaho gisibijwe gusohoka inshuro nyinshi. Bachelet yarashigikiye ukwo kugitevya avuga ko kurondera kuganira n'Ubushinwa ku bijanye n’ico cegeranyo bidasigura ko yari yirengagije ibiri muri co. Ariko Amnestie Internationale yavyise ikitababarirwa. Impera n'imperuka, ico cegeranyo carasohowe hasigaye iminota 13 ngo hahere ikiringo c'iwe c'imyaka ine mu mabanga. Kandi mugihe cakiriwe neza na benshi, hari abandi caciye intege - barimwo ikoraniro mpuzamakungu ry’aba-Uyghur. Zumretay Arkin umuvugizi waryo yavuze ko bari biteze ko Michelle ahagarara rugabo imbere y’Ubushinwa muri rusange. Olaf Wientzek, umuyobozi w’ishami ry'i Geneve ry'ikigo German Konrad Adenauer Foundation yagirije Bachelet ko "yirinze ingaruka" z’ishirwa ku mugaragaro ry’ico cegeranyo. Bachelet, hagati aho, yaragirije ibihugu bimwe kuba vyarahinduye iki kibazo kikaba politike, akavuga ko vyatumye "gukorana kugorana cane kandi... kuzana ukwizerana hamwe no kugira icoshikwako ku rubuga bigorana gusumba". U﻿bu amaso  ahanzwe ku bizokurikira mu nyuma. Impirimbanyi z’aba-Uyghur zasavye ko hajaho comisiyo itohoza, basaba kandi abakora urudandaza bose kw'isi guhagarika imigenderanire n'uwo wese afasha leta y'Ubushinwa mu bikorwa ikorera ba Uyghur. Tom Tugendhat, umushingamateka akaba n’umukuru w’umugwi w’inama nshingamatela y’Ubwongereza ujejwe ivy’imigenderanire n’amakungu, yavuze yuko ivyo iki cegeranyo cabonye birimwo "ibirego bikomeye cane" aniyamiriza ibivugwa na Beijing vy’uko ivyo vyagiriji birondera urwanko ku Bushinwa. Ubudage bwasavye irekurwa ry’aba-Uyghur bapfunzwe ata caha bagirijwe. Ariko, nta cizere c’uko hashobora kuba igitsure giturutse hagati mu Bushinwa: ikibazo c’ihonyangwa ry’uburenganiza bw’aba-Uyghur camye ari ikintu kitavugirwa ahabona kandi kigakumirwa cane mw’itangazamakuru – gushika ku wa kane w’indwi iheze, icegeranyo ca ONU nticari bwavugwe mu bitangazamakuru bikomeye mu Bushinwa canke ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.

column2: Biden: 'Trump afatiye imbugita kw'izosi rya demokrasi ya Amerika'
column3: Prezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Joe Biden, yagirije uwo yasubiriye Donald Trump kuba afatiye imbugita kw'izosi rya demokrasi ya Amerika. Ibi vyavuzwe na Prezida Biden ni ko kwifatira mu gahanga kwa mbere guhambaye amaze kugirira uyu haciye hafi umwaka asubiriye. Ibi yabivugiye mw'ijambo ryo kwibuka umwaha uhaciye habaye ukwahuka ingoro ikoreramwo inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka za Amerika, vyagizwe n'abashigikiye Bwana Trump. Muri iryo jambo, Prezida Biden yagirije Trump kuba akwirakwiza uruvangatirane rw'ibinyoma akanagerageza guhindura amateka. Yavuze ko kwanka kwa Trump kwemera ko yatsinzwe amatora vyateje umugumuko w'abantu bitwaje ibirwanisho. Yahimirije abanye-Amerika kurwanira amategeko n'ubutungane bakiyamiriza gukoresha igikenya hamwe  no gushira imbere inyungu bwite. Bamwe mu mugambwe w'aba Republicain utavuga rumwe na leta bagirije umukuru w'igihugu kuba yitwaje iyi sabukuru y'umwaka uhaciye habaye iyo migumuko, mu gushira imbere inyungu z'aba-Democrate bari ku butegetsi.

column2: US: B﻿iden arashima ivyavuye mu matora yo hagati muri manda
column3: P﻿rezida wa Amerika yiruhukije inyuma y'aho aba demokrate baburije aba republika  kuronka amajwi menshi mu matora yo hagati muri manda. A﻿ba republika babura gato ngo biganze mu nama nshingamateka ariko Biden avuga ko "bataronse intebe nyinshi cane" nk'uko vyari vyitezwe, ku musi wa kabiri ku mugoroba. U﻿mwe muri iyo migambwe ushobora gutsindira kurongora inama nkenguzamateka, intsinzi ikaba ihagaze kubizova mu ntara zitatu aho amajwi gushika ubu yegeranye cane. Mu bisanzwe umugambwe uri ku butegetsi, ubu ukaba ari uw'aba demokrate, ukunze gutsindwa mu matora yo hagati mu kiringo ca mbere ca prezida. A﻿bajejwe imikenyuro mu mugambwe w'aba republika bari bizeye intsinzi itagabanije, bafatiye kw'iduga ry'ibiciro birengeje mu myaka 40 n'ingene abemera politike yiwe bari ku rugero rwo hasi. A﻿riko ibiharuro ngereranywa bivuga ko abitavye amatora boba bahoye aba republika utwigoro twabo two kubuza abantu gukorora imbanyi. A﻿vugira ku kirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu White House, ku musi wa gatatu ku mugoroba, Biden yavuze ko ivyavuye mu matora "vyatumye yiruhutsa". Y﻿avuze ati: "Nibaza ko wari umusi mwiza kuri demokrasi." Y﻿avuze ko icizere ciwe  cagaragaye, aca anebagura abamenyeshamakuru bari bagabishije ko abademokrates bazotsindwa bikomeye. K﻿ubera inguvu ahawe n'amajwi aronse muri iryo joro atari yiteze, Biden yavuze ko ategekanya gusubira kwitoza mu 2024. Biden agiye gukwiza imyaka 80 muri uku kwezi yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ati: "Intumbero yacu n'ugusubira kwitoza, ni yo ntego yacu." H﻿agati aho, aba republika bari begereje kuronka intebe 218 bari bakeneye kugira bakure mu minwe y'aba demokrate inama nshingamateka. M﻿u gihe aba republika botsinda mu nama (shingamateka na nkenguzamateka) iyo ari yo yose muri izo, bazoshobora kuburizamwo imigambi ya prezida. I﻿biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu kandi biriko biritegurira amatohoza y'inama nshingamateka ku butegetsi bwa Biden. B﻿iden yavuze ko yiteguye gukorana n'aba republika kandi ko ashobora gutunganya ibiganiro vy'impande zibiri mu ndwi iza. A﻿riko prezida kandi yavuze ko abanye Amerika bashobora gufata amatohoza yose yoba arongowe n'aba republika "nk'urukino rutwengeje". U﻿mugambwe wose uza gutahukana intsinzi mu ntara zibiri kuri zitatu zikomeye za Arizona, Georgie na Nevada, aca aramutswa inama nkenguzamateka.

column2: Coronavirus-Kenya: igipolisi cafashe umudereva agiye guhamba isandugu y’abapfuye igaragara
column3: Igipolisi muri Kenya caraye gihagaritse umudereva yanduye coronavirus n'abandi batatu babesha ko batwaye ikiziga. Abo bantu bahagaritswe bamaze kugenda ibirometero 370 batorotse bavuye ku mugwa mukuru Nairobi, batwaye isandugu y'ikiziga ariko iri gusa, imbere y'uko bahagarikwa bageze mu karere ka Homa Bay. Ivyo vyatangajwe n'umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Kenya Mutahi Kagwe, aho yamenyesheje kandi ko ako karwi kigize abapolisi bafise iyo sandugu iri gusa, bikaba vyabatumye bashobora kurengana ibirindiro vy'abapolisi bitari bike. Bageze muri ako karere ka Homa Bay, abajejwe umutekano baragize amakenga biba ngombwa ko bugurura iyo sandugu basanga nta kirimwo. Umushikiranganji Kagwe avuga ko uyo mudereva yaciye ashirwa ukwiwe, maze abo bandi nabo bari kumwe nawe bashirwa mu kibanza categuriwe abikekwa ko banduye kugira ngo bakurikiranwe. Haraciye ukwezi kumwe Kenya itangaje umuntu wa mbere yanduye coronavirus, igitigiri c'abandura kikabandanya congerekana ku minsi ku munsi. Kubera ikiza ca coronavirus kwinjira Nairobi canke gusohoka birabujijwe. Haraciye hafi indwi zibiri leta y'ico gihugu itangaje ingingo zibuza ukwinjira n'ugusohoka umugwa mukuru Nairobi be n'ibindi bisagara bitatu bifatwa ko vyinjiranywe na Covid-19. Umushikiranganji Kagwe avuga ko leta iriko irakora amatohoza ku makuru avuga ko abapolisi bajejwe uruja n'uruza ku mabarabara boba barya ibiturire kugira abantu barengane. Kenya imenyesha ko gushika ubu abashika 262 ari bo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera inyuma y'aho ejo umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu atangarije abandi 16 banduye. Uwo mugera watumye hafatwa ingingo yo guhagarika ibikorwa vyose vy'ubudandaji mw'isoko rizwi cane riri muri karitiye ya Eastleigh mu gisagara ca Nairobi. Abarongoye ishirahamwe ry'abadandaza bakorera muri iyo soko bavuga ko abadandaza bananiwe n'ugukurikiza ingingo zafashwe n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, nko kutegerana, kwambara twa dutambara dupfuka amazuru n'umunwa be no gukaraba. Iryo soko rizwi ko rifise amaduka abayabaye ashika 18.000 hamwe n'ayandi manini cane ashika 60, agurisha ibidandazwa bitandukanye harimwo impuzu ziva mu Bushinwa, mu karere k'ubuseruko bwo hagati hamwe n'i Bulaya. Iryo soko kandi ni ihuriro ry'ingenzi ziva mu bihugu bitandukanye vya Afrika y'Ubuseruko no hagati bakora ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji. Umugera wa coronavirus ubandanya ukwiragira mu bundi burere bwa Kenya, umushikiranganji w'umutekano mu gihugu hagati, Dk Fred Matiang'i , akagabisha ko mu minsi iri imbere hashobora gufatwa n'izindi ngingo ruhasha mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera.

column2: Ibihugu bitunze biriko vyikwegerako incanco za Covid
column3: Ibihugu bitunze biriko birigungirako incanco za covid mu gihe abanyagihugu bo mu bihugu bikenye bobo bazoburiramwo, nk'uko ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe ajejwe guhimiriza rigabisha. Ihuriro People's Vaccine Alliance, rivuga ko ibihugu hafi 70 bifise amikoro make ari vyo bizoshobora gucandaga 1/10 c'abantu bavyo. Ibi biri uko mu gihe uruganda Oxford - AstraZeneca rwemeye ko ruzotanga ibice 64% vy'urucanco rwayo mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere. Hari ngingo ziriko zirafatwa kugira ngo ibihugu vyose kw'isi bishobore kuronswa izi ncanco. Ariko n'aho biri uko, ihuriro People's Vaccine Alliance - ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe atari make harimwo Amnesty International, Oxfam na Global Justice Now - rivuga ko ata ncanco ziriho zokwira bose, rigasaba ko amakompanyi ahingura imiti yokwereka ayandi ubuhinga bwayo kugira ngo hashobore guhingurwa incanco zikwiye. Ubushakashatsi bw'aya mashirahamwe bwerekanye ko ibihugu bitunze bimaze kugura incanco zihagije zo gukingiza abanyagihugu bavyo incuro zitatu zose mu gihe incanco zose zoba zemewe gukoreshwa. Akarorero, ubu bushakashatsi buvuga ko Canada yatumyeko inkingo zikenewe zo gukingira Umunyacanada wese incuro zitanu. N'aho ibihugu bitunze bifise ibice 14% vy'abantu bose kw'isi, amakuru ava mu bihugu biriko birageragerezwamwo izi ncanco ku rugero rwa gatatu ari rwo rwa nyuma avuga ko bimaze kugura ibice 53% vy'incanco ziboneka ko umwanya n'umwanya zishobora kwemezwa. Anna Marriott, umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu mw'ishirahamwe Oxfam, agira ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe akwiye kwimwa urucanco rurokora ubuzima bwiwe kubera igihugu abayemwo canke ata mafaranga akwiye afise. "Ariko, kiretse hagize igihindutse koko, amamiriyaridi y'abantu kw'isi nta rucanco rwiza kandi nyarwo bazoronka rwa Covid-19 mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike iri imbere". Ihuriro People's Vaccine Alliance ritera akamo ibigo bihingura imiti, bikaba biriko birahingura incanco za Covid-19, ko vyoshira ahabona ubuhinga bwavyo kugira ngo incanco zikwiye zishobore guhingurwa maze buri muntu arukeneye aruronswe. Rivuga ko ibi bishobora gukorwa biciye mw'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi mu gisata caryo kijejwe Covid-19. Urucanco Pfizer-BioNTech rumaze kwemezwa mu Bwongerezwa kandi ababangamiwe gusumba abandi bakaba baratanguye gucandagwa muri ino ndwi. Umwanya n'umwanya, rushobora kwemezwa n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Amerika n'i Buraya. Izindi ncanco zibiri zahinguwe n'amakompanyi Moderna hamwe na Oxford-AstraZeneca zirarindiriye kwemezwa mu bihugu bitari bike. Iri huriro rivuga ko gushika ubu, incaco zose za Moderna n'ibice 90% vy'incanco za Pfizer/BioNTech zaguzwe n'ibihugu bitunze. AstraZeneca, ikompanyi iriko irahingura urucanco rwatowe n'ishure kaminuza ya Oxford, yariyemeje ko izorutanga ku buntu mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere. Ni urucanco ruzimbutse gusumba izindi kandi rugashobora kubikwa mu vyuma bikanyisha bisanzwe (frigo), ibi bikaba bituma rushobora gukwiragizwa mu mpande zose z'isi. Urucanco rw'Uburusiya, Sputnik, narwo nyene rumaze kuboneka ko rumeze neza, mu gihe hari izindi zine ziri mu gice ca nyuma c'igeragezwa.

column2: Covid: Vladimir Putin avuga ko 'incanco za Sputnik zizewe nka Kalashnikov
column3: Perezida Vladimir Putin avuga ko urucanco rushasha rwahinguwe n'Uburusiya "rwizewe nka ya nkoho ya Kalashnikov". Aya majambo yayavuze nijoro ku wa kane mu nama yariko agirana n'icegera c'umushikiranganji wa mbere Tatyana Golikova ku buhinga bwa videwo. Ayavuze mu gihe abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu bemeje ejo ku wa kane ubundi bwoko bw'urucanco rwa Sputnik V rutangwa nka doze imwe gusa, rukaba rwahawe izina rya Sputnik Light. Perezida Putin yagereranije urwo rucanco n'iyi nkoho yahinguwe ku butegetsi bw'aba Soviyeti (Union Sovietique/ Soviet Union) yabaye rurangiranwa mbere ibandanya ikoreshwa cane gushika ubu. Yasubiyemwo amajambo yavuzwe n'umuganga wo muri Autriche/Austria mu ntango z'uno mwaka igihe yavuga ku nguvu z'uru rucanco. Urucanco rwa Sputnik V rukora co kimwe n'izindi ncanco zakozwe n'amakompanyi Oxford/AstraZeneca na Janssen/Johnson & Johnson. Abanegura ubutegetsi bwa Putin bari bafise amakenga ko abajejwe kugenzura imiti i Moscou bihuse kwemeza uru rucanco mu mwaka uheze, ariko igerageza ryakozwe mu nyuma ryerekanye ko rukingira Covid-19 ku rugero runini cane. Ubwoko bwa mbere bw'uru rucanco rutangwa incuro zibiri bumaze kwemezwa mu bihugu bitari bike kw'isi. Uru rucanco rushasha rwa Sputnik Light, ubwoko bwa Sputnik V umuntu aterwa rimwe gusa, rwemejwe mu Burusiya ejo ku wa kane. Mw'itangazo basohoye, abarukoze bavuga ko doze imwe gusa ikingira uwurutewe ku rugero rwa 79.4%, aho hari mw'isekeza ryo ucandaga riheruka mu gihugu. Iri tangazo rivuga riti: "Uru rucanco rutangwa kuri doze imwe gusa rwatumye abantu benshi bakingirwa mu mwanya muto, ivyatumye urugamba rwo kurwanya iki kiza igihe cariko kirarandagata rutera imbere". Iyi ngingo yo kwemeza uru rucanco ije mu gihe impari ari nyinshi kw'isi nimba amahinguriro y'incanco yokuraho inzitizi kugira ngo ibindi bihugu kw'isi bishobore guhingura izi ncanco kugira ngo zibe nyinshi.

column2: Umwamikazi Elizabeth II na Africa: Ibihe bikomeye vy'ingoma yiwe
column3: Umwamikazi Elizabeth II yagendeye ibihugu birenga 20 vyo muri Afrika ku ngoma yiwe, igihe ingoma y'Ubwongereza yariko irarangira, ukwikukira nakwo kuriko kurashwara Afrika. Ubucuti budasanzwe bwarabandanije biciye mw'ishirahamwe rya Commonwealth, umwamikazi yari arongoye. Yari imigenderanire ikomeye - rimwe na rimwe igoye - imigenderanire iri hagati y'ingoma y'Ubwongereza  hamwe n'igihe c'ubukoloni. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth yavugiye ijambo imbere y'inzu ya reta i Cape Town, muri Afrika y'Epfo igihe yashikana imyaka 21, yiyemeza ko ubuzima bwiwe bwose azokorera ishirahamwe rya Commonwealth. "Ahantu hose nagiye muri iki gihugu ciza ca Afrika y'Epfo.... abavyeyi banje, mwenewacu nanje nyene twarakunzwe cane n'abanyagihugu baco, gushika aho twiyumva nk'abantu bari muhira ngaha, nk'uko umenga twabanye na bo ubuzima bwabo bwose. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth agaragara ngaha mw'ihoteli Treetops muri Kenya ari kumwe n'umugabo wiwe, Duke wa Edinburgh. Mu nyuma akiri muri urwo rugendo, yumvise amakuru ko se wiwe, Umwami George VI yatanze kandi ko ategerezwa kuba umwamikazi. Uru ni rumwe mu ngendo zibiri umwamikazi Elizabeth yagize muri Nigeria. Yafashwe ifoto ngaha ari kumwe n'umutegetsi Oba Adenji-Adele II i Lagos. Yaragendeye kandi Calabar, Enugu, Jos, Kaduna, Kano na Port Harcourt. Umwamikazi Elizabeth ariko aratambana na Kwame Nkrumah, prezida wa mbere wa Ghana inyuma yo kwikukira, yaza n'imbere mu muhari w'abashaka kwikukira. Yatamvye umuziki wateguriwe urwo rugendo wiswe Welcome Your Majesty. Umwamikazi Elizabeth n'umuganwa Philip bafashwe ifoto bari kumwe n'igikomangoma Haile Selassie wa Ethiopia i Addis Abeba, mu rugendo rw'akazi. Ico gikomangoma carahungiye mu Bwongereza hagati ya 1936 na 1941 inyuma y'aho Ubutaliyano bwigaruriye igihugu ciwe aza kugaruka ku ngoma mu 1941 igihe Ubwongereza na Commonwealth batsinda Ubutaliyano. Umwamikazi Elizabeth na prezida El Tigani El-Mahi bariko barava ku kibuga c'indege ca Khartoum mu modoka. Urugendo rwiwe muri Sudani harimwo n'umuhingamo w'isiganwa ku ngamiya hamwe n'urugendo rwo kuraba ibikorwa vyo kwubaka urugomero rw'umuyagankuba rwa Roseires kuri Nil Bleu, rwarangiye mu mwaka ukurikira. Umwamikazi ari kumwe na prezida Julius Nyerere atanguye urugendo rw'akazi rw'imisi itatu. Imyaka 18 imbere y'aho, Dr Nyerere yari yashikanye Tanganyika yahoze ikoronijwe n'Ubwongereza ku ntahe yo kwikukira, aca aba uwa mbere akibereye umushikiranganji wa mbere hanyuma aba prezida w'ico gihugu wa mbere. Uko imyaka yagenda, yagiye yanka cane Ubwongereza n'Uburaya. Ariko, reta y'Ubwongereza yamubona nk'umuntu afise inguvu zo guhoyahoya mu karere karimwo ibihuhusi vyinshi. Prezida wa Zimbabwe yarahawe ikidari n'umwamikazi mu 1994. Ariko igihe imishamirano yongerekana hagati ya Zimbabwe na reta y'Ubwongereza ku mugambi w'isubirwamwo ry'itangwa ry'amatongo, Zimbabwe yarikuye muri Commonwealth mu 2003 - hanyuma Mugabe aca yakwa ico kidari mu 2008. Umwamikazi Elizabeth yafashwe ifoto ashitse ku kibuga c'indege ca Durban. Yari mu rugendo rw'akazi rw'imisi itandatu muri Afrika y'Epfo, hakaba habaye igihe c'imvura ciza mu myaka 10, aho yaciye atazirwa Motlalepula canke "umwamikazi w'imvura". Umwamikazi ari kumwe n'umukuru w'igihugu wa mbere wa Afrika y'Epfo w'umwirabure, Nelson Mandela, bivugwa ko bakundana cane. Umwamikazi yarandikiye amakete prezida Mandela aho yakoresha "Umugenzi wawe  nyawe, Elizabeth R" kandi bisa n'uko yamuhamagara "Nelson", mu gihe bivugwa ko na we yamuhamagara bisanzwe "Elizabeth" aciye ku ruhande amategeko agenga ubwami. Umwamikazi yaragendeye Nigeria ubugira kabiri mu 2003. Ico gihugu cari carahagaritswe muri Commonwealth kubera kutubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu ku butegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Sani Abacha mu 1995, gisubira kwemererwa kugaruka mu 1999, hagarutse ubutegetsi bwa gisivile. Umwamikazi na prezida Obasanjo bagaragara ngaha mu birori vyo kwugurura inama y'abakuru b'ibihugu bihurikiye mw'ishirahamwe Commonwealth i Abuja. Mu rugendo rwa nyuma ku mugabane wa Afrika, uwo mwamikazi amaze umwanya muremure ku butegetsi yarahuye n'umwe mu baprezida bamaze imyaka myinshi ku butegetsi, Yoweri Museveni, na we ari ku butegetsi kuva mu 1986. Yari yarigeze kugendera Uganda imbere y'aho - mu rugendo rwa mbere rw'akazi muri Afrika nk'umwamikazi mu 1954.

column2: Kenya: abatemera Imana basaba ko amasengesho mu mashure avanwaho
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'abahakanyi muri Kenya ryandikiye umushikiranganji w'indero w'iki gihugu rimusaba kubuza ivyo gusenga mu mashure ya reta imbere y'uko ibibazo vya reta bitangura. Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko guhatira abanyeshure gusenga ari uguhonyanga agateka kabo. Amashure ya reta muri Kenya afise umugenzo wo gutegura amasengesho imbere y'uko abanyeshure batangura ibibazo vya reta. Muri ino ndwi, amashure yateye akamo abavyeyi ko bokwifatanya nayo muri ano masengesho  yamaze kuba nk'umugenzo kugira ngo abana babo bitegurire neza ibibazo. Muri uru rwandiko, havuga ngo: "Abanyagihugu ba Kenya benshi bari muri ano mashure ya reta aho ivy'amasengesho ari itegeko". Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko abana bakwiye guhabwa uburenganzira bo nyene bwo kwifatira ingingo ku bijanye n'idini.

column2: Izinga rya Man ryahaye u Burundi imiriyoni £1.3 nk'imfashayo yo kurwanya ihindagukira ry'ibihe
column3: Reta y'izinga rya Man yahaye ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza imfashanyo  ingana n' imiriyoni 1.3 z'amapawundi ( yababa imiriyaridi 3 .5 mu mafaranga y'amarundi) mu ntumbero yo gufasha kurwanya "ingaruka z'ihindagurika ry'ibihe". Iri shirahamwe International Development Partnership (IDP) ryacishije iyi mfashanyo mu rindi shirahamwe Send a Cow risanzwe rirangurira imigambi mu Burundi. Richard Granville ajejwe ibijanye n'imfashanyo muri iryo shirahamwe, avuga ko aya mafaranga yatanzwe agiye gufasha "umugambi w'imyaka ibiri" mu "ntara ya Mwaro". Reta y'iryo zinga ryo ku mugabane w'Uburayi isanzwe yarategekanijwe amafaranga y'ama pawundi agera ku miriyoni 2.5 y'imfashanyo mpuzamakungu. Igisata c'ihindagurika ry'ibirere ni kimwe mu bisata bibiri iri shirahamwe  IDP ryahisemwo gufasha mu kiringo ca 2021-2023. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Howard Quayle avuga ati: "Ikiza karanda ca coronavirus carerekanye ingene twese dukeneraniye kw'isi yose kandi ndanezerewe kubona iri zinga rya Man rishobora gufasha muri iki gikorwa kidasanzwe". Granville avuga ko Uburundi bwama "buhura n'ingaruka zikomeye z'ihindagurika ry'ikirere" mu gihe ibice 94% vy'abanyagihugu "babeshejweho n'uburimyi bwo ku rugero ruto kandi bushingiye ku mvura". Domothile Niyonzima w'imyaka 43 asanzwe aba i Mwaro, avuga ati: "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni uko ata mfungurwa zikwiye turonka, kubera tudafise intabire yo gutabira isi yacu". Unicef ivuga ko abantu barenga 114.000 mu Burundi bataye izabo kubera ibiza bishingiye kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe Send a Cow mu Burundi Gloria Nimpundu avuga ko iri shirahamwe rifasha abarimyi mu  "kubaha amazi n'isi ndimwa nziza" kandi ko "akarusho kariko karibonekeza". Avuga ko "ikibazo c'imvura igwa nabi nabi kandi itizewe kigenda ciyongera" gituma bigorana "kwitegurira irima n'iyimbura". "Muri iyi myaka iheze, izuba ryaratikije ibiterwa mu nyuma naho imyuzure iratikiza imirima". Yongerako y'uko uwu mugambi uriko urarangurirwa i Mwaro uzofasha imiryango ishika 5250 "kwikenura mu buryo bw'amafaranga mu guhangana n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere, biciye mu kurima n'ukworora kijambere".

column2: Papa Francis yagenye abakardinali bashasha: Harimwo Umunyarwanda Antoine Kambanda
column3: Papa Francis ahejeje gutangaza amazina y'abakardinali bashasha 13 muri bo hakaba harimwo Musenyeri mukuru wa Kigali, Antoine Kambanda. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda ni we Munyarwanda wa mbere agenywe kuba umukardinali. Muri abo 13, icenda bari munsi y'imyaka 80, bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu murwi w'abakardinali bashobora gutora umusubirizi wa Papa mu gihe yokwitaba Imana canke agatanga imihoho. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda afise imyaka 61, yavukiye mu Bugesera, mu 2018 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize Musenyeri mukuru (Arkepiskopi) wa Kigali canke umukuru wa Ekleziya Gatolika mu Rwanda. Kambanda yize amashuri mato n'ayisumbuye mu Burundi, muri Uganda no muri Kenya imbere yo kurangiza  ivyigwa vya Tewolojiya muri Seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda mu Rwanda. Inyandiko za Ekleziya mu Rwanda zivuga ko mu kwezi kwa cenda mu 1990 aribwo Papa Paul II yamugize umupatiri. Kuva mu 1993 yagiye kwiga i Roma aho yavanye impamyabushobozi y'ikirenga muri Tewolojiya. Inyuma y'amashuri yiwe, igihe kinini yari umwigisha muri seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda, aza no kuyiyobora kugeza mu 2013. Muri uwo mwaka wa 2013 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Kibungo kugeza mu 2018 ahabwa amabanga yo kuyobora kiliziya mu Rwanda. Kardinali ni rwo rwego rukuru rwo mu butegetsi bwa ekleziya umuntu ashobora kugerako imbere yo kuba Papa, umuyobozi wa Ekleziya Gatolika kw'isi. Ekleziya Gatolika yari isanzwe ifise abakardinali 219, muri abo 29 gusa ni bo bo muri Africa, mu gihe igihugu nk'Ubutaliyano conyene gifise abakaldinali 41. Ibihugu vya Africa bisanzwe bifise abakardinali ni: Aba bakardinali bashasha 13 batowe na Papa Francis bazemezwa kuri iyo mirimo kw' igenekerezo 28 z'ukwezi kwa 11 nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru ya Vatican. Muri bo harimwo uwitwa Mauro Gambetti yari asanzwe ari umupatiri. Urwego rw'abakardinali rumeze nka reta ya Papa. Bamwe bakorera i Vatican abandi baguma bakorera mu bihugu vyabo bakajayo igihe batumijwe. Amategeko abagenga avuga ko Abakardinali igikorwa cabo ca mbere ari ugutora umu Papa mushasha iyo uwusanzwe ahari apfuye canke avuye mu mirimo. Gusa muri bose, 120 ni bo baba bagize inama itora Papa mushasha. Bashingwa kandi iyindi mirimo itandukanye harimwo gukurikirana ibikorwa vy'abasenyeri, guhagararira amashuri ya Ekleziya, ivugabutumwa, eka bakagira n'inteko ijejwe sentare zitatu za ekleziya. Abakardinali ariko kandi baba bajejwe guhagararira diyoseze n'imiburiburi zibiri canke zirenga mu bihugu bakomokamwo. Abakardinali bambara ibara ry'umutuku kuvyo amategeko ya katolika asobanura ko baba "biteguye kumena amaraso yabo mu gukorera uwo basubiriye intumwa Petero."

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Ings, Kane, Sancho, Ramsey, Griezmann, Flick
column3: Manchester United ishobora guhindukirira umusatirizi wa Southampton umwongereza Danny Ings w'imyaka 28 mu ci riza mu ntumbero yo gukomeza uruhande rw'abasatirizi b'uyu murwi wa Ole Gunnar Solskjaer. (Telegraph - subscription required) Wa musatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane abona ko umurwi umubereye ari Manchester City mu gihe abandanya akora ibishoboka vyose kugira asezere umurwi wiwe Tottenham mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uwu mwaka. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27 yemeza ko umukuru wa Tottenham yamaze kumwemerera  mu majambo gusa kuva muri uyu murwi uwu mwaka w'inkino urangiye igihe bavugana mu mwaka uheze akamugondoza ko yobandanya akinira Spurs mu kiringo c'uwundi mwaka, uwu nawo ukaba ugiye kurangira.  (Times - subscription required) Hagati aho, Manchester United irashaka gutanga umufaransa akina imbere Anthony Martial w'imyaka 25, hamwe n'umusatirizi w'umwongereza Jesse Lingard  w'imyaka 28 - asanzwe yaratijijwe muri West Ham - kugira ngo ishobore kuzana Kane muri Old Trafford. (Football Insider) Chelsea yateguye imiriyoni zababa 113 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo izane umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Borussia Dortmund umwongereza Jadon Sancho w'imyaka 21, ariko rero ikaba iriko imurwanira na Manchester United. (Sun) Imirwi itari mike ku mugabane w'Uburayi, harimwo Tottenham, Chelsea, Borussia Dortmund na AC Milan, iriko irikazanura kugira ngo ishobore kugura umunyegori w'umwongereza Dean Henderson w'imyaka 24 asanzwe ari muri Manchester United. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus hamwe n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Pays de Galles (Wales) Aaron Ramsey w'imyaka 30 arashimwa cane na Liverpool, nk'uko amakuru ava mu Butariyano abivuga. Liverpool ivugwa ko yoba iriko itegura amahera kugira ngo ishobore kugura uyu mukinyi yahoze akina muri Arsenal mu gihe ca gihe c'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi kizoba gitanguye. (Tutto Juve - in Italian) Umurwi Chelsea urindiriye gukira urukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya (Champions league) uriko urakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi wo hagati wa Monaco umufaransa Aurelien Tchouameni w'imyaka 21. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Bayern Munich Hansi Flick w'imyaka 56 ariko abonwa ko ashobora kuja kumenyereza umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubudagi amaze gusezera umurwi wiwe, araronderwa cane na  Barcelona nk'uwushobora gusubirira umunya Hollande Ronald Koeman w'imyaka 58. (RAC1 - in Spanish) Barcelona iriteguye kwumviriza abo bose boba bipfuza umukinyi w'imbere w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann kugira ngo ishobore gukemura ibibazo vy'amafaranga biyihanze.  (Marca) Griezmann w'imyaka 30 ashobora gusubira muri  Atletico Madrid agujijwe n'umunya Portugal Joao Felix n'aho Barca itaremera neza.  (Sport - in Spanish) Umurwi Roma usanzwe umenyerezwa na Jose Mourinho ufise "amahirwe menshi" yo kuronka umusatirizi w'umutariyano Andrea Belotti w'imyaka 27 asanzwe akina muri Torino. AC Milan nayo nyene ibandanya irondera uyu mukinyi, ariko kandi ikaba iriko ikurikirana umukinyi w'imbere wa Chelsea umufaransa Olivier Giroud, mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza. (Calcio Mercato - in Italian) Imigwi yaEverton na Arsenal ibandanya ishinze ijisho ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Betis  Emerson Royal. Uyu munya Brésil w'imyaka 22 yatijijwe na Barcelona ariko ashobora kwigira muri Premier League mu gihe gushirwa ku ruhande muri Barcelona.  (Sport - in Spanish) Leeds United na West Ham ivugwa ko ishobora guhangana na Inter Milan, Roma na Napoli mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Cagliari Nahitan Nandez afise agaciro k'imiriyoni 42 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu ci riza. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 25 akomoka muri Uruguay afise amasezerano n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa Serie A ry'Ubutariyano azorangira mu 2024.  (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Newcastle United umufaransa Allan Saint-Maximin avuga ko uyu murwi ukwiye kugura umukinyi wa Arsenal umwongereza Joe Willock w'imyaka 21, asanzwe yatijijwe muri uyo murwi kugira ngo awegukire burundu.  (Sky Sports) Mu gihe Southampton ivugwa ko yoba iriko irondera uwundi munyegori, uyu murwi uvugwa ko woba uriko urakurikiranira hagufi umunyegori wa Lazio umunya Albania Thomas Strakosha w'imyaka 26 nk'umwe mu bo ushobora kugura. (La Repubblica, via Sport Witness)

column2: Coronavirus: OMS iti ‘Afrika ntizoba urubuga rwo kugerageza urucanco urwo ari rwo rwose".
column3: Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi,OMS/WHO ariyamiriza amajambo "y'ivanguramoko" yashikirijwe n'abaganga babiri b'Abafaransa aho bavuze ko urucanco rwa covid-19 rwogeragerezwa muri Afrika. Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus arongoye OMS ati: "Afrika ntishobora kuba kandi ntizigera iba urubuga rwo kugeragerezako urucanco urwo ari rwo rwose". Ayo majambo yashikirijwe mu kiganiro caciye kuri televiziyo yarateye icuka kibi, abo baganga bakaba baragirijwe ko bafata Abanyafrika "nk'imbeba z'inzungu". Vyabaye ngomwa ko umwe muri bo asaba imbabazi. Abajijwe ku bijanye n'ivyashikirijwe n'abo baganga mu kiganiro OMS yariko igirana n'abanyamakuru, Dr. Terdros yabonetse ko arakaye, aho yavuze ko ivyo vyerekana  "ivyiyumviro vy'ubukoloni". Ati: "Ni ibintu biteye isoni kandi bibabaje kwumva mu kinjana ca 21 hakiri abahinga bashobora gushikiriza amajambo nk'ayo. Turavyiyamirije twivuye inyuma, kandi turabijeje ko ivyo bitazigera bisubira". Mu kiganiro caciye kuri televiziyo y'abafaransa LCI, ku wa 01 z'uku kwa kane, Dr Camille Locht  ajejwe ubushakashatsi mu kigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu n'ubushakashatsi (Inserm), yariko avuga ibijanye n'igerageza ry'urucanco i Bulaya na Australia. Niho rero Dr Jean-Paul Mira, ajejwe kuvura indembe ku bitaro vya Coshin i Paris yinamura akavuga ati: "Ngerageje kuvuga mu majambo yo nyayo, kubera iki tutogeragereza urwo rucanco muri Afrika, ahantu ata dutambara two kwikingira bafise, ata miti bafise, ata n'uburyo bafise bwo gutabara indembe?" "Erega ni nk'uko bisanzwe bigenda ahandi mu bushakashatsi bumwe bumwe kuri SIDA. Nko mu ba maraya, turahakorera igerageza kuko tuzi ko ari bo babangamiwe kandi kubera tuzi ko batikingira". Niho muganga Locht, yaca ashigikira mugenziwe, muganga Mira, avuga ati: "Uvuze ukuri, turategekanya ubushakashatsi nk'ubwo bwokorwa no muri Afrika". Imbere y'aho, muganga Mira yari yerekanye amakenga kuri iryo gerageza ririko riraba, avuga ko atizeye ko bashobora gushika ku vyo bipfuza muri Australia n'i Bulaya kubera bobo bafise ibikoresho vyo kwikingira iyo bari ku kazi. Ayo majambo yatumye Abanyafrika mu bice vyose vy'uwo mugabane bashangashirwa, harimwo n'uwahoze ari umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru, Didier Drogba, yavuze ko ayo majambo ari ayo ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Yavuze kandi ati: "Kirazira ko abanya Afrika bafatwa nk'imbeba! Ako ni akagaye". Mugenziwe Samuel Eto'o nawe nyene yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa umupira w'amaguru, wewe yavuze ko abo baganga ari "abicanyi". Amajambo y'abo baganga kandi yongereje ubwoba bwari busanzwe buhari muri Afrika ko Abanyafrika bashobora gufatwa nk'imbeba z'inzungu bakageragerezwako urucanco rushasha rwa coronavirus.

column2: East Africa: Miriyoni 28 bashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikabije - Oxfam
column3: Abantu bashika miriyoni 28 muri Afrika y'ubuseruko barashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikomeye cane kubera iduga ry'ibiciro bitumwe n'intambara yo muri Ukraine hamwe n'ikena ry'imvura muri uku kwezi kwa gatatu, nk'uko ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza Oxfam rigabisha. Kenya, Somalia na Ethiopia vyugarijwe n'ikena ry'imvura rya mbere rikaze mu myaka 40, aho ni mu gihe Sudan y'Epfo yo ihanzwe n'imyuzure, nk'uko Oxfam ibandanya ivuga. Iryo shirahamwe ryerekana kandi ico ryita ugusamazwa kw'amakungu n'ingwano yo muri Ukraine, ituma hatitabwaho ikibazo c'ikena  ry'ivyo kurya mu karere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko. Itangazo rigenewe ibinyamakuru rivuga ko utwigoro mpuzamakungu two guhangana n'ico kibazo dufise uburyo budahagije na gato kuko ku miriyaridi 6 z'ama dorari ONU ikeneye mu 2022 kugira igarukire ku bari mu kaga muri Ethiopia,  Somalia na Sudan y'Epfo, 3% yonyene niyo amaze kuboneka. Madame Gabriela Bucher, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa mpuzamakungu wa Oxfam yagabishije avuga ati: "Ibice vya Ethiopia, Kenya, Somalia, Sudan y'Epfo n'ahandi vyimirije guhura n'akaga. N'aho imvura yogwa muri uku kwezi, kwivyukiranya bizoba nk'ibidashoboka kiretse hari igikozwe  ubu nyene." Abandanya ati: "Ingaruka z'ingwano yo muri Ukraine kw'ihererekanywa ry'indya kw'isi zizoshika mu bice vyose vy'isi, ariko abasanzwe bari bakenye n'abafise intege  nke nibo zizosesereza cane kuruta abandi kandi  vyihuse kuruta." Ibihugu vya Afrika y'ubuseruko bivana  90% y'ingano bikenera muri Ukraine n'Uburusiya, nk'uko itangazo ribandanya rivuga. "Kubera uruzuba,  indogobwa zacu zarapfuye, izo dusigaranye nazo ziragoyagoya ku buryo zidashobora gukwega intunduguru  z'imizigo", ivyo bivugwa na Ahmed Mohamud Omar, umurimyi  wo muri county ya Wajiir muri Kenya. "Nguma nibaza ico umuryango wanje uzorya, aho ico bazorya ejo kizova,  niba ejo nzoronka indobo canke ibido y'amazi."

column2: Qatar 2022: Ni nde Goncalo Ramos - umukinyi yasubiriye Cristiano Ronaldo?
column3: Na  Harry Poole Umunyamakuru w'inkino wa BBC Imbere y’uko urukino rutangura, havugwa gusa ivyo kudakinisha Cristiano Ronaldo. Ariko ifirimbi ya nyuma iheze, ivyavugwa vyose vyari kuri Goncalo Ramos. Igihe afata ikibanza ku ntebe y’abasubirizi mu rukino rwa nijoro n’Ubuswisi mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose muri Qatar, amakamera yose (cameras) yari yarabishijwe kuri uno mukinyi amaze kwinjiriza Portugal ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi bakinyi bose muri kahise k’umupira muri ico gihugu. Inyifato yagize igihe asubirizwa mu rukino rwaheruka yararakaje umumenyereza Fernando Santos. Intebe yari ikikujwe n’abafotozi barwana barondera gufata isanamu ya Ronaldo yari ababaye kubera atari ku rutonde rw’abakinyi 11 bategerezwa gutangura mu rukino rukomeye nk’uru. Bwari bwo bwa mbere bimugendeye uko kuva mu 2008. Ariko rero haciye akanya gato, amaso yose yaciye ahindukirira ku vyariko bibera mu kibuga, aho umukinyi w’imyaka 21 yamusubiriye yandikishije izina mu gutsinda ibitsindo bitatu vyose muri uru rukino rwarangiye Portugal inyagiye Ubuswisi 6-1. Igihe umumenyereza wa Portugal Santos afata ingingo yo kudatanguza Ronaldo muri uru rukino, ntiyari yiteze ibintu vyiza nk’ivyo yaraye abonye. Uretse ko umurwi wiwe watsinze ibitsindo bitandatu mu gice co gukuranamwo mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, umusore yakinishije mu kibanza ca Ronaldo yateye ibitsindo bitatu wenyene muri iri joro rya mbere rikomeye kuva atanguye umwuga wiwe. Ku myaka 21 n’imisi 169, Ramos ni we mukinyi wa mbere akiri muto yinjije ibitsindo bitatu mu rukino rumwe mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose kuva ku munya-Hongrie Florian Albert mu 1962. Uyu musatirizi wa Benfica vyamusavye iminota 17 gusa kugira atangaze izina ryiwe muri Qatar, igihe atera umupira ugaca iruhande y’umunyegori w’Ubuswisi Yann Sommer hejuru mu mfuruka z’igori, aba ashize Portugal imbere. Inyuma y’iminota mikeya igice ca kabiri gitanguye, yateye igitsindo ciwe ca kabiri ku mupira wo hasi yari ahawe na Diogo Dalot, maze biba bibaye 3-0. Igitsindo ca Raphael Guerreiro cinjiye imbere y’uko Ramos atera iciwe ca gatatu muri urwo rukino – ubwa mbere muri rino higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose – igitsindo yinjije arovye umunyegori Sommer. Yagiye gusubirizwa ku munota wa 74 amaze gutera ibitsindo vyiwe bitatu, tutavuze imipira yahereje n’iyo yateye mw’igori ishika itanu. Igihe Ramos yari asubirijwe, Rob Green yahoze ari umunyegori w’Ubwongereza yavugiye kuri BBC Radio 5 Live ati: " Goncalo Ramos yakoze ibintu bitangaje. Ivya mbere muri kino gikombe c’isi yose gushika ubu, n’ibindi vyose vyoba bimaze kuba”. Mu gihe Ronaldo atarashobora kwinjiza igitsindo na kimwe mu nkino zitandatu zose zo gukuranamwo Portugal imaze gukina muri rino higanwa, n’aho amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo umunani mu mahiganwa y’igikobe c’isi yose, Ramos wewe amaze kwinjiza bitatu. Ramos, umukinyi yakuriye mu murwi w’urwaruka rwa Benfica, yari amaze gukinira Portugal iminota 33 yonyene mu nkino zitatu yari amaze gukina, imbere y’uko igihugu ciwe gihura n’Ubuswisi nijoro ku wa kabiri. Aha harimwo iminota 23 yakinye mu rukino rwa kivandimwe Portugal yahuye na Nigeria mu kwa cumi na rimwe rwarangiye Portugal itsinze Nigeria igitsindo kimwe ku busa, iminota ibiri mu rukino rwa Ghana hamwe n’iyindi umunani yakinye mu rwa Uruguay mu nkino zo mu matsinda. Kuva ico gihe yashizwe ku rutonde rw’abasubirizi akaba atakinishijwe igihe Portugal itsindwa na Korea ya Ruguru, ariko ikaba yari yamaze kuronka itike yo kubandanya. Hagati aho, inyuma yo gushirwa ku rutonde rw’abatangura mu kibuga ku ncuro ya mbere ku rwego mpuzamakungu  mu nkino zo gukuranamwo muri rino higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, yakoze ibintu bikomeye aboneka nk’uko umengo ni ibintu yari amaze imyaka myinshi akora. Ku bitsindo 14 n’imipira itandatu yatanze ikavamwo ibitsindo mu nkino 21 za Benfica muri uno mwaka w’inkino – hiyongereyeko ibitsindo indwi yinjije mu nkino zitandatu mw’ihiganwa riheruka – Ramos nta nkeka ubu ni umukinyi yiyemera. Ariko indoto yonyene yari afise ni ukungene yari kuvyifatamwo ku rukino rwiwe rwa mbere ashizwe ku rutonde rw’abatangura mu kibuga mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose. Ni we mukinyi wa mbere yinjije ibitsindo bitatu, ikizwi nka hat-trick, ku rukino rwiwe rwa mbere atangujwe mu kibuga mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi kuva ku mudagi Miroslav Klose mu 2002- umukinyi wa mbere amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo vyinshi mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi ku ruhande rw’abagabo – akaba kandi n’umukinyi akiri muto agira kabiri amaze kwinjiriza Portugal ibitsindo muri kahise k’ik igihugu mu gikombe c’isi yose, inyuma ya Ronaldo mu 2006. Inyuma y’urukino rudasanzwe rwa nijoro, arumva neza ko yakoze ivyo yashobora gukora vyose kugira ngo igihugu ciwe kibandanye mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma aho kizohura na Maroc. Abajijwe ivya Ronaldo ifirimbi ya nyuma ivuze, Ramos yavuze ati: "Cristiano Ronaldo aramvugisha kandi avugisha uwo ari we wese mu murwi. Ni we kizigenza wacu kandi yama agerageza kudufasha”. Irangira ry’urukurikirane rw’inkino 31 atanguzwa mu kibuga  kuri uyu yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Real Madrid, Juventus na Manchester United ryategerezwa kuba inkuru ikomeye cane. Ariko na we nyene ashobora kuba yaratangajwe n’ingene yavuzwe cane imbere y’uko urukino rwa nijoro rutangura, mu gihe ikintu kinini yashoboye gukorera abakunzi baguma basaba ko yinjizwa mu gice ca kabiri ari igitsindo canswe kubera yari yaraririye. Uravye ivyo Ramos yaraye akoze, nta cizere kinini asigaranye c’uko ku myaka 37 Ronaldo azohava asaba gutanguzwa mu kibuga mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu aho Portugal izoba ihura na Maroc. Umumenyereza wa Portugal Santos avuga  ati "koko sinashimishijwe" n’inyifato ya Ronaldo igihe asubirizwa ku munota wa 65 igihe itsindwa na Korea y’Epfo mu rukino rwa nyuma rwo mw’itsinda ryabo, bikaba bisa n’ingene yaje kurangiza giturumbuka muri Manchester United mu kwezi guheze. Uyu mukinyi yatsindiye Ballon d’Or (Umupira w’Inzahabu) incuro zitanu arahakana ko atarakariye umumenyereza wiwe, ariko ibi nticabujije ko yisanga ku rutonde rw’abasubirizi mu rukino n’Ubuswisi. Inyuma yo kuba umukinyi wa mbere yinjije ibitsindo mu mahiganwa atanu y’igikombe c’isi yose imbere y’aha, ibitangaza umurwi wiwe waraye ukoze bishobora gutuma Ronaldo ata kundi vyogenda atari kwemera ikibanza giciriritse mu gihugu ciwe. Mu kiganiro n’imboneshakure ITV, uwahoze ari umusatirizi w’Ubwongereza, Ian Wright avuga ati: "Uyu ni umurwi ushobora neza na neza kubandanya gushika kw’iherezo kandi Ronaldo aracashoboye gufasha. "Mu gihe yokwipanga neza, birashobora kurangira abinjirije igitsindo c’intsinzi mu rukino rwa nyuma”.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amakuru ku wa mbere: Fellaini, Kane, Lingard, Salah, Pedri, Thauvin, Cavani
column3: Umumenyereza wa Tottenham Jose Mourinho ariko arondera ingene yogura uwahoze akina hagati mu murwi nserukiragihugu Marouane Fellaini. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 33 yahoze akina muri Manchester United igihe yamenyerezwa na Mourinho, asanzwe akina mu murwi  Shandong Luneng wo mu Bushinwa kuva avuye Old Trafford mu 2019. (Voetball 24 via Sun) Arsenal itegura kuzunguruka  West Ham mu nteguro yayo yo kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza Jesse Lingard w'imyaka 28 mu ci riza, ubu akaba asanzwe akina muri  West Ham aho yatijijwe . (Star) Leicester City iri imbere y'imirwi ya Manchester United na Tottenham mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa  Boubakary Soumare w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akina muri  Lille. (Star) Bayern Munich iriko irarondera ko kuzana umumenyereza wa  Liverpool Jurgen Klopp muri uyo murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'ubudagi, Bundesliga, mu ci riza mu gihe uwusanzwe awumenyereza ubu Hansi Flick yova muri uyu murwi akaja kumenyereza umurwi nserukiragihugu. (90mins) Umukuru wa Bayern  Herbert Hainer avuga ko yizeye neza ko Flick azobandanya amenyereza Bayern Munich. (Sky Sport Germany via Goal) Liverpool itegerezwa kwihuta ikagura umukinyi wa Barcelona umunya Espagne Pedri w'imyaka 18 kubera ko mu gihe yotera igikumu ku yandi masezerano igiciro ciwe kizoca kiduga cane. (Star) Paris St-Germain iramaze kuvugana n'abaserukizi ba Mohamed Salah kugira bavugane ingene mu ci riza uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 28 w'umunya Misiri yova muri Liverpool akaja gukinira uyo murwi wo mu Bufaransa. (Telefoot on Twitter - in French) Umumenyereza wa PSG akaba kandi yahoze amenyereza Tottenham, Mauricio Pochettino, aramaze kuvugana n'umusatirizi wa Tottenham n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza, Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 kugira ngo arabe ko yosubira kumwiyegereza mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa. (Telefoot on Twitter - in French) Manchester United "irarajwe ishinga cane" no kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Villarreal n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Espagne Pau Torres w'imyaka 24, akaba kandi ariko aronderwa n'imirwi  Bayern Munich na Real Madrid. (AS via Team Talk) Crystal Palace yahindukiriye umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Marseille umufaransa Florian Thauvin w'imyaka 28, mu gihe biboneka ko ifise amahirwe make yo kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Watford umunya Senegal Ismaila Sarr w'imyaka 23 mu ci riza. Hagati aho Thauvin ubu yaramaze gutangura ibiganiro na  AC Milan. (Sun) Edinson Cavani  kuva muri  Manchester United ntibizokworoha kubera mu masezerano y'ubuguzi harimwo umurongo uvuga ko umurwi umushaka uzotegerezwa gushirako imiriyoni 2.7 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Uyu musatirizi wa Uruguay w'imyaka  34 ariko araronderwa cane n'umurwi Boca Juniors wo muri Argentina. (Mirror) Inter Milan nta mugambi ifise wo kugiriranira ayandi masezerano n'umukinyi wo hagati w'umutariyano Nicolo Barella w'imyaka 24, n'aho asanzwe ariko aronderwa cane na  Chelsea, Bayern Munich na Atletico Madrid. (ESPN) West Ham iripfuza kugura umunyegori Seny Dieng, umunya Senegal w'imyaka 26 asanzwe asamira umurwi QPR ukina mu cicaro ca  kabiri  QPR. (Sun) Ibiganiro hagati ya Juventus n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Argentina Paulo Dybala w'imyaka 27 biracagoranye kubera ibibazo vy'amafaranga uyu murwi ufise, ni mu gihe  Manchester United iriko iramurondera, nk'uko bivugwa n'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe imyimenyerezo muri Juventus,  Fabio Paratici. (Sky Italia via Goal) AC Milan ntirota igurisha umukinyi wayo w'imbere Rafael Leao w'imyaka 21 munsi y'imiriyoni 50 y'ama euro. Uyu munya Portugal yarigeze kuronderwa n'imirwi ya Everton na Juventus. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Leicester City iri hafi yo kugura umunyegori Brad Young, umwongereza w'imyaka 18 asanzwe akina mu murwi Hartlepool. (Sun)

column2: Ntahokatarondererwa: Josiane Kwizera yahisemwo gufotora, abavyeyi bashaka ko yiga kuvura
column3: Uwo mwigeme w'imyaka 27 yahejeje amashure yisumbuye mu gisata c'ubumenyi (scientifique), abavyeyi biwe bipfuza ko abandanya mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu ariko we ahitamwo kwiyigisha gufotora. Avuga ko yakunze umwuga wo gufotora kuva akiri umwana. Ati: "Kuva nkiri umwana narakunda gufotora. Narakina ibintu vyo gufotora nkoresheje telefone canke ibindi bikoresho". Josiane avuga ko ahejeje amashure yisumbuye yinginze abantu benshi ngo bamwigishe uwo mwuga ariko benshi baramwankira. Umwe gusa ni we yamwemereye mu 2018. Josiane Kwizera avuga ko yatanguye kubikora nk'umwuga mu 2019, n'aho abavyeyi biwe bo bipfuza ko yokora umwuga wo kuvura abantu. Agira ati: "Abavyeyi bashaka ko mbandanya kwiga ivyo kuvura, ariko jewe nahisemwo gufotora kuko ari vyo nkunda. "Ubu ndaronka amasoko yo gufotora abana, mu manza z'isabukuru n'iz'ubugeni. "Ndaniyigisha nkoresheje inyabwonko kandi maze kumenya vyinshi." Kwizera avuga ko ubu, afashijwe n'uwo mwuga wo gufotora, hari vyinshi atakizera ku bavyeyi. Agira ati: "Ubu ndirihira inzu nkoreramwo, nariguriye camera-foto yo mu bwoko bwa Canon izimvye cane, ndagura akamoto n'inyabwonko. "Ndafasha n'abavukanyi banje nanje nkifasha ntarinze kugora abavyeyi." Josiane Kwizera ahanura urwaruka gukura amaboko mu mpuzu ngo bironderere akazi. Ati: "Ubu si nka kera aho abavyeyi bacu baheza ishure basanga akazi kabarindiriye, akazi n'ukukarondera. "Ugaye akazi, ntuba uzi ico ushaka gukora."

column2: Ingwano ya Ukraine: Roman Abramovich yafatiwe ibihano n'Ubwongereza
column3: Nyene umurwi  wa Chelsea Roman Abramovich yafatiwe ibihano na reta y'Ubwongereza (UK)  mu murongo w'ingingo zifatwa kubera igitero Uburusiya bwagize muri Ukraine. Ari mu batunzi ruhebwa indwi bakozweko n'ibihano  vya vuba, harimwo gufatira amatungo yabo no kubima impampuro zo kwinjira muri ico gihugu. Urwo rutonde ruriko kandi abafise amafaranga aharurwa muri za miriyaridi z'ama dorari  Igor Sechin na Oleg Deripaska, bose babonwa nk'abakorana na  prezida Vladmir Putin. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yavuze  ko "hadashobora kuba aho kwibera ata nkomanzi" kuri abo bashigikiye igitero. Johnson yavuze ati: "Ibihano vy'uno munsi n'intambwe ya vuba yerekana ukudahesha kw'Ubwongereza mu gushigikira abanya-Ukraine. Nta mpuhwe tuzogira mu gukurikirana abafasha iyicwa ry'abanyagihugu basanzwe, ugusambura ibitaro n'ukwigarurira  mu buryo bunyuranye n'amategeko ibihugu ducuditse vyigenga." Reta yari imaze iminsi yotswa igitutu kugira ifatire ibihano Abramovich, yavuze ko yafashe "ingingo itoroshe" yo kugurisha Chelsea FC mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Chelsea yatswe Abramovich mu gufatira amatungo yiwe, kugirisha uwo murwi rero bikaba bibaye birahagarara. Reta ivuga ko uwo murwi uzohabwa uruhusha rudasanzwe rwo kubandanya inkino zitegekanijwe, abakozi bahembwe hanyuma abari bamaze kugura ama tike nabo bashobore kuraba inkino. Abasanzwe bafise ama tike y'ikiringo c'inkino barashobora kubandanya kuraba izo bafitiye ama tike ariko ubu uwo murwi nta tike n'imwe wemerewe gusubira kugurisha. Inzu yo kugurishirizamwo ibicuruzwa na Chelsea nayo igiye kwugarwa. Abramovich, w'imyaka 55,  bivugwa ko afitaniye imigenderanire ikomeye na prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin, ariko ivyo arabihakana. Reta ivuga ko Abramovich, aharurwako itunga ribona rya miliardi  zirenga 12 mu ma dorari, ari umwe mu batunzi ruhebwa bake bo kuva mu myaka ya 90 bagihagaze neza ku ntwaro ya Putin". Abramovich afise imitahe mu ruganda rukomeye Evraz ruhingura acier (ivyuma)  no muri Norilsk Nickel akaba yagurishije imitahe yari afise muri kompanyi yo mu Burusiya y'ibitoro  Sibneft kuri kompanyi ya reta ya gaz Gazprom kuri miriyaridi zirenga 13 z'ama dorari mu 2005. Mu gihe gufatirwa ibihano bituma kazoza ka Chelsea kaja mu mayira abiri, abashikiranganganji bagerageje kwzeza uwo murwi ko "utazogirwako ingaruka mu bidakenewe". Muri tweet, umushikiranganji ajejwe umuco Nadine Dorries yavuze ko  igishirwa imbere ari uko abafashije intwaro ya Putin" babibazwa. Yanditse ati:  "Ndazi ko ivyo bizana kuja mu madidane, ariko reta izokorana n'ishirahamswe ry'umupira w'amaguru n'imigwi kugira umupira ugume ukinwa ariko kandi ibihano navyo bikore kuri abo vyerekeye".

column2: US na China bateranye amajambo akarishe mu biganiro barimwo muri Alaska
column3: Intumwa za Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'izo Ubushinwa zateranye amajambo akarishe mu biganiro vya mbere vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru hagati y'ubutegetsi bwa prezida Joe Biden n'Ubushinwa , biriko birabera Alaska. Intumwa z'Ubushinwa zagirije Amerika gukaburira ibihugu "gutera Ubushinwa", Amerika na yo ivuga ko Ubushinwa bushitse aho "kwiyerekana cane". Haheze imyaka imigenderanire hagati y'ivyo bihangange bibiri  imeze nabi cane. Amerika yiyemeje kuvuga ku bibazo biteye umutima uhagaze nk'ingene ubutegetsi bw'Ubushinwa bufata aba Islam b'aba Uighur  muri Xinjiang. Ivyo biganiro  vyatanguriye kw'isemo mbi  mu gisagara ca Anchorage birimwo umunyamabanga wa reta wa Amerika Antony Blinken n'umujenama ajejwe ibibazo vy'umutekano w'igihugu Jake Sullivan ku ruhande rwa Amerika, ku ruhande rw'Ubushinwa na ho hari uwuza imbere mu bategetsi bajejwe poritike yo hanze, Yang Jiechi n'umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire Wang Yi. Ariko, umwe mu ntumwa za Amerika yavuze ko ibiganiro vyabandanije mu mw'ihererero vyari ''bifashe, bikomeye kandi bidaca irya n'ino" kandi bimara amasaha abiri yari ategekanijwe. Mw'ijambo ryeruye ryo kwugurura imbere y'uko ibiganiro bibandaniriza mu mw'iherero, Blinken yavuze ko Amerika ija "kuvuga amakenga dufise ku bikorwa vy'Ubushinwa , harimwo muri Xinjiang, Hong Kong, Taiwan, ubukozi bw'ikibi buciye kuri internet bukorerwa Amerika,  agacinyizo k'ubutunzi ku bihugu dukorana". Yavuze ati:"Kimwe kimwe cose muri ivyo bikorwa kibangamira ingendo ishingiye ku mategeko ituma isi igira amaragamo." Amwishura, Yang yagirije Amerika gukoresha ububasha bwayo bwa gisirikare n'amafaranga mu gucinyiza ibindi bihugu. Yongeyeko ati:"Irikika mu kiza ku citwazo c'umutekano w'igihugu kugira ibangamire urudandazwa rusanzwe, no gukaburira ibihugu bimwe bimwe guhanga Ubushinwa." Wang yavuze ko agateka ka zina muntu kari hasi cane muri Amerika, aho abirabure "bicwa". Sullivan yasubije, avuga ko ubutegetsi bwa Amerika butarondera intambara n'Ubushinwa, ariko yongerako ati: "Tuzokwama duhagararira ingingo tugenderako ku neza y'igihugu cacu, no ku neza y'abagenzi bacu." Uko guterana amajambo kwabaye imbere y'ibinyamakuru vy'isi yose, kwabandanije mu kiringo kirenga isaha. Ni kwo kwuguruye ibikorwa biba mu ncuro  zitatu, bikarangira kuri uyu wa gatanu (mu gitondo mu masaha ya Amerika). Ni vyo bikorwa vya mbere vy'intumwa zo mu rwego rwo hejuru bibaye hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa kuva mu kwezi kwa gatandatu guheze - ku ntwaro y'uwahora ari umukuru w'igihugu , Donald Trump. Mu nyuma , intumwa za Amerika zagirije Ubushinwa guca kubiri n'ivyo bari bumvikanye ko amajambo yo kwugurura ibiganiro atorenza iminota ibiri kuri buri ruhande. Umwe mu bategetsi bo mu ntwaro yavuze ati:"Intumwa z'Ubushinwa… umenga zaje zifise intumbero yo kwiyerekana, zishira imbere ikinamico  aho kuja ku bintu bifadika". Uwo mutegetsi yavuze ko Amerika ija kubandanya ibiganiro nk'uko bitegekanijwe, yongerako ati  "gukavya mu gushikiriza amajambo  mu vy'imigenderanire akenshi biba bigenewe abo mu gihugu[c'uwuba ariko aravuga]". Mu nyuma mu kinyamakuru ca reta, intumwa z'ubushinwa zavuze ko ari Amerika, atari Ubushinwa, itubahirije ivyo bumvikanye mu kurenza iminota ibiri yo gushikiriza ijambo ryo kwugurura. Bwagirije abanyamerika "kubuvogera ata shingiro, muri poritike yabwo yo mu gihugu hagati no mumahanga". Mu ruhande rwiza, ico kinyamakuru casubiyemwo amajambo ya Yang avuga ko "ingorane zikomeye hagati y'Ubushinwa na Amerika zo muri kahise zidategerezwa kubandanya". Umunyamakuru wa BBC Barbara Plett Usher avuga ko ivyo biganiro ari akaryo ka mbere kuri prezida Biden ko kwerekana ingene agiye gukemura ikibazo Blinken yise "ikibazo ca mbere gikomeye c'inyungu n'imigenderanire mu kinjana ca 21". Uwo munyamakuru abandanya avuga ko Ubushinwa burondera ko ibintu vyosubira itoto inyuma y'aho imigenderanire ishikiye ku rugero rwa mbere rwo hasi ku ntwaro ya Trump. Wang yavuze ko ubutegetsi bw'Ubushinwa bwiteguriye kwugurura ''ibiganiro vyubaka." Ni vyinshi. Urudandaza nk'akarorero. Amerika yagiriza Ubushinwa ingendo itariyo, nko mu gufasha amahinguriro, kwiba ubuhinga bwakozwe n'abandi, kugumiza hasi agaciro k'ifaranga ryabwo no gushira inzitizi mu rudandaza. Ubushinwa na bwo bushaka ko ama taxes yashizweho n'intwaro ya Trump ku bidandazwa vy'Ubushinwa avanwaho. Bwagiriza kandi Amerika gucinyiza  ama kompanyi y'Ubushinwa ateye imbere mu buhinga bwa none, nka Huawei. Agateka ka zina muntu na demokrasi. Amerika yagiriza Ubushinwa ihonyabwoko ku ba Uighur mu ntara ya Xinjiang, guhonyanga demokrasi muri Hong Kong biciye ku mategeko mashasha y'umutekano. Ariko Ubushinwa busaba Amerika kureka kwivanga mu co bwita ibibazo vy'imbere mu gihugu, bukagiriza Amerika  ''kugaya" umugambwe w'aba Communiste uri ku butegetsi muri ico gihugu. Ubushinwa bushaka kandi ko ingabo za Amerika zo mu mazi zitabandanya kwinjira mu mazi y'ikiyaga ca  South China Sea , ubutegetsi bw'Ubushinwa bufata nk'igice c'igihugu cabwo.

column2: India: Ingene umwambaro wa hijab wambarwa n'abagore bo muri Islam uteje ibibazo
column3: Intara yo mu Buhindi yugaye amashure yisumbuye na kaminuza biturutse ku kibazo c'umwambaro wa hijab kiriko gikurikiranirwa hagufi n'amakungu inyuma y'aho uwuharanira agateka ka muntu Malala Yousafzai yatsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel avyinjiriyemwo. Reta y'intara ya Karnataka iri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi yafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho abanyeshure bihereye amabarabara mu myiyerekano ishingiye ku bakobwa bambara uwu mwambaro wo mw'idini rya Islam, imyiyerekano yandurutsemwo imigumuko. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, sentare nkuru y'iyo ntara itegekanya kwiga ku rwandiko ruvugira abagore b'aba Islam. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho abanyeshure batandatu b'urwaruka bagiriye imyiyerekano imbere y'ishure ryegukira reta ku kibazo co kwambara hijab, imyiyerekano yaciye ikwiragira ku yandi mashure. Abanyeshure batari bake b'aba Hindu nabo baciye biha amabarabara bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ibara ry'ikimenyetso c'idini rya Hindu - mu kwiyamiriza abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab. Ejo ku wa kabiri, umupfasoni Malala - umugore yarokotse igitero c'aba Taliban muri Pakistan afise imyaka 15 ahorwa ko yariko avugira abakobwa ko boronswa uburenganzira bwo kwiga  - yateye akamo abategetsi b'Ubuhindi ko bogira ico bakoze kugira "bahagarike inenwa abagore b'aba Islam bakorerwa". Uyu mupfasoni w'imyaka 24 yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Kubuza abakobwa kuja kw'ishure bambaye hijab zabo ni ibintu bibabaje. Ivyo gufata nabi abagore birabandanya - kubera uko bambaye". Mu Buhindi, uru ruhagarara rwongereje ubwoba n'ishavu mu nkehwa z'aba Islam bavuga ko ibwirizwashingiro ribaha uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ivyo bambara. Ejo ku wa kabiri, amareresi yakwiragiye cane yerekana umukobwa w'umu Islam ariko azomerwa n'ikirwi c'abagabo bakiri bato  bamuvugiriza induru, n'impari zikomeye hagati y'abanyeshure bambaye hijab n'abandi bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu bintu bidakunze kuba, umucamanza ariko arakurikirana uru rubanza yateye akamo abanyeshure hamwe n'abandi "kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano". Ikibazo catanguye kuja hejuru igihe abanyeshure batandatu biga kw'ishure ryisumbuye ryo mu karere ka Udupi mu ntara ya Karnataka batangura imyiyerekano kubera bari babujijwe kuja mw'ishure bambaye hijab. Udupi ni kamwe mu turere dutatu tugize intara ya Karnataka iri ku nkengera - ari naho higanje umugambwe Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) w'umushikiranganji wa mbere Narendra Modi. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bafata ko iyo ntara ari icicaro gitegurirwamwo poritike y'aba Hindu ari na bo benshi mu gihugu. Umugambwe BJP kandi ni wo urongoye iyi ntara ya Karnataka. Iri shure rivuga ko ryemereye abanyeshure kwambara hijab mu gihe bari mu kigo, ariko bagasabwa gusa kuzikura iyo bari mu masomero. Ariko abari mu myiyerekano  - bose bakaba bari mu mwambaro w'ishure - bavuga ko ari ngombwa ko bemererwa gupfuka imishatsi yabo mu masomero. Umwe muri aba banyeshure Almas AH, yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Turafise abigisha bakeya b'abagabo. Rero ni ngombwa ko dupfuka imishatsi yacu imbere y'abagao. Ni co gituma twambara hijab". Aba banyeshure barahakana ivyo bagirizwa ko bazambara babitegetswe n'umurwi Campus Front of India - ishami ry'umurwi w'abanyeshure ugendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vya Islam, Popular Front of India - ari na wo ubavugira. Si kenshi abagore bakunze kuboneka bambaye hijab na burka (umwitwikiro w'umubiri wose mw'idini rya Islam) mu Buhindi, aho kwerekana ibimenyetso vy'idini ku mugaragaro ari ibintu bisanzwe. Ariko umukuru w'iri shure avuga ko ari ngombwa ku mwigisha kubona abanyeshure mu maso, kandi ko umwambaro w'ishure utuma ata vangura riba mu banyeshure. Inama z'urutavanako hagati y'abanyeshure, abarongoye ishure hamwe n'abaserukira reta ntaco zashitseko. Ikibazo c'abanyeshure b'abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab carakwiye mu yandi mashure makuru makeya y'i Karnataka, ariko cagiye kurenga inkombe igihe amasanamu y'aba bakobwa bari mu myiyerekano i Udupi akwirakwirijwe. Ubwo nyene, abanyeshure b'aba Hindu mu yandi mashure amwe amwe baciye batangura kuza mu masomero bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ivyatumye abarongoye ishure bategeka ko iyi myambaro yompi itemewe mu bigo. Mu ndwi iheze, ireresi yafatiwe kw'ishure rikuru rya Kundapur mu karere ka Udupi yerekana abanyeshure bambaye hijab bankiwe kurengana bariyeri, yatumye ibintu biyangara. Imirwi y'abanyeshure b'aba Hindu  - abahungu n'abakobwa - nabo baciye batangura imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza bagenzi babo bigana bambaye hijab. Gusa nta mishamirano yari bwabe gushika ejo ku wa kabiri - hasigaye amasaha makeya ngo sentare itangure kwiga urwo rwandiko - aho baciye batangura guterana amabuye mbere baranaturira mu bisagara bimwe bimwe. Abategetsi b'abakere baciye bashira mu ngiro ingingo ya 144 (Section 144) - itegeko ryo mu gihe c'ubukoloni ryabuza abantu barenga bane gukoranira hamwe - mu ntumbero yo guhagarika iyi migumuko. Mu karere ka Shivamogga, umurwi w'abanyeshure b'abahungu bafashwe amashusho baduza ibendera ry'umutugutu kw'ishure ryabo, reta ica itangaza ko hagiye gukorwa amatohoza. Mu karere ka Mandya, ireresi yazungurutse cane yerekana umukobwa yambaye burka asugerezwa n'umurwi w'abagabo bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu gihe babandanya bamuzomera bavuga ngo Jai Shri Ram (twogereranya na 'Mana nziza'), nawe yarihagarayeko, ashira ijwi hejuru ati "Allah Akbar" (Imana ni yo nkuru) mu gihe abarongoye ishure bamuherekeza bamuvanaho. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Mu nyuma, uyo mugore azwi kw'izina rya Muskan yavuze ko umukuru w'iryo shure yamwemereye ko azomushigikira. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru The Indian Express ati: "Hari abandi bakobwa b'aba Islam na bo nyene bazomerewe nk'uku. Abarongoye ishure be n'umukuru waryo ubwiwe ntibigeze batubuza kwambara burka, none ni kubera iki nokwumviriza abo hanze?" Umutegetsi mukuru mu gipolisi yabwiye BBC Hindi ko ibi ari "ikibazo gito" kandi ko bafise ibintu mu minwe. Reta y'intara ivuga iki? Umushikiranganji w'indero w'intara ya Karnataka Nagesh ashigikiye abategetsi b'ishure bavuga ko, vyaba ibitambara n'ibisikafu vy'umutugutu, vyaba ibitambara vy'imyitwikiro, vyose ntivyemewe mu bigo vy'amashure. Avuga kandi ko aba banyeshure bagumuwe "n'inkozi z'ikibi". Afatiye ku kungene ishami rya poritike ry'umurwi Popular Front of India ririko rigerageza gushinga imizi mu karere ko ku nkengera, Nagesh yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Vyose bishingiye kuri poritike. Ibi vyose biriko biba kubera amatora yimirije mu mwaka uza". Sentare ivuga iki gushika ubu? Sentare yahawe inzandiko zibiri zivugira abari muri iyi myiyerekano.
