Rumwe ruvuga ko ibwirizwashingoro ry'Ubuhindi ritanga uburenganzira kuri buri muntu guhitamwo ivyo yambara. Urundi narwo rukarwanya itegeko riherutse gushingwa na reta y'intara ritegeka inyambaro yemewe mu mashure, ribuza ibitambara vyo mu mutwe n'ama hijab. Imbere y'uko urubanza rutangura kwigwa, igihe umushingwamanza yari asavye ko rwunguruzwa, umucamanza Krishna Dixit yaranse. Ati: "Ibishobisho vyose bigume hanze. Ibwirizwashingiro ni Bhagavad Gita (igitabo ceranda c'aba Hindu). Jewe nzokorera ku ndahiro nagize igihe ntangura akazi. Si vyiza ko abanyeshure baguma hanze". Uyu mushingwamanza aburanira abari mu myiyerekano avuga ko itegeko rya reta ribuza hijab riteye kubiri n'amategeko kandi ko rihonyanga ibwirizwashingiro - agasaba kandi ko sentare ifata ingingo mfatakibanza yokwemerera abanyeshure kubandanya biga imbere y'uko ibibazo bitangura.

column2: Kenya hatowe ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera utera Covid-19
column3: Ubundi bwoko bwa coronavirus bwatowe muri Kenya, nk'uko bigaragazwa n'ivyambere vyavuye mu bushakashatsi buriko burakorwa n'ikigo c'ubushakashatsi mu buvuzi gikorana na reta, Kenya Medical Research Institute,Kemri. Ubwo bwoko Kenya yisangije, bwari bwatowe mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bw'igihugu ku cigwa cakozwe hagati y'ukwezi kwa gatandatu n'ukwezi kw'icumi, nk'uko vyavuzwe na Kemri. Hari hagikenewe gukorwa ubundi bushakashatsi  kugira hamenyekane ingaruka z'ubwo bwoko bushasha, nk'uko kibandanya kibivuga. Kenya gushika ubu haharurwa hafi abantu 100.000 bamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19 n'abarenga 1.700 iyo ndwara imaze kwica. Hagati aho bwa bwoko bunyaruka kwandukira cane bwatowe muri Africa y'epfo bumaze gutorwa mu bindi bihugu bitatu vyo muri Africa-Botswana bihana urubibe,Zambia na Gambia muri Africa y'Uburengero, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi, OMS. Ubu Africa imaze kurengana igitigiri c'umuliyoni w'abantu bamaze kwandura uwo mugera, abandura ku munsi akaba ari benshi gusumba umurindi wa mbere, nk'uko OMS ibandanya ivuga. Muri rusangi abantu bashika 25.223 nibo bavugwa ko bandura ku munsi hagati y'itariki 28 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na kabiri mu 2020 n'itariki 10 z'ukwa mbere uyu mwaka  muri Africa, igitigiri kiri kuri 39% hejuru y'icashitse kw'isonga mu ndwi zibiri zo mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2020, aho abandura bashika 18.104 ku munsi, nk'uko bivugwa na OMS.

column2: Rwanda - Coronavirus: Katolika yafashe ingingo zijanye no gukinga ico kiza
column3: Ekleziya Katolika mu Rwanda ihamagarira abakirisu gukurikiza amategeko atangwa n'inzego zijejwe amagara y'abantu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda wa mugera ruhonyabantu coronavirus, yiswe Covid-19. Ivyo biri mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe na Antoine Kambanda, Umwepiskopi mukuru wa Diyoseze nkuru ya Kigali akaba n'icegera c'Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, aho amenyesha ingingo zafashwe mu makoraniro zizofasha abakirisu babo kudakoranako ngo bahave bandukizanya. Ibihugu bishika umunani ku mugabane wa Afrika bimaze gutangaza ko uwo mugera wamaze kubishikamwo, leta z'u Burundi n'u Rwanda zikaba ziherutse gutangaza ingingo zafashe mu ntumbero yo kwirinda no gukinga uwo mugera. Mw'iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda isaba abakirisu "guhana amahoro ya Kristu ku mutima gusa ata guhana ibiganza canke guhoberana". Isaba kandi ko "mu gihe co gusangira (guhazwa mu Kinyarwanda) ari ugutega ibiganza, atagutega ururimi". Iyo nama yafashe kandi ingingo yo gukura "amazi y'umugisha" (amazi ahezagiye mu kirundi) mu twombo yashirwamwo mw'isengero, maze abakirisu bakaja barayakoramwo mu kugira urumenyetso rw'umusaraba. Basaba abakirisu kudasubira gukora aho yahora ashirwa kuko atakirimwo "kugeza igihe ikibazo kizoba gikemutse". Muri iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepisikopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, yemereye abakirisitu ko izobandanya ikurikirana uko bimeze, ikazofata n'izindi ngingo zo kwikingira ni vyaba ngombwa. Gushika ubu, ibihugu birenga 80 biramaze guterwa n'uwo mugera watanguriye mu gisagara ca Wuhan c'intara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, ibihugu vya Togo, Nigeria, Senegal, Misiri, Algeria, Tuniziya, Afrika y'Epfo na Cameroon nivyo bimaze guterwa n'uwo mugera. Mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwo mugera, ibihugu vy'u Rwanda n'u Burundi biherutse gutangaza ingingo vyafashe mu ntumbero yo gukinga ko ishika muri vyo. U Burundi  bwatangaje ko ingenzi zivuye mu bihugu vy'u Bushinwa, Koreya y'epfo, Iran, Ubutaliyani, Ubudage, Ubufaransa, Ubuyapani na Espanye zizobanza gushirwa mu kibanza categuwe ukwazo nyene mu kiringo c'iminsi 14. Nayo mu Rwanda, leta isaba abanyagihugu "kugabanya ingendo zitari ngombwa" mu bihugu birangwamwo coronavirus, yongera kandi itangaza n'ingingo zitandukanye harimwo n'izo isuku, kugira ngo birinde kwandura.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Ronaldo, Mbappe, Kane, Kounde, Traore, Aubameyang
column3: Manchester City yashitse ku masezerano na Juventus yo kugura umukinyi  Cristiano Ronaldo, 36. (AS - in Spanish) Juventus ishaka imiriyoni hagati ya 25-30 z'ama euros kuri Ronaldo,  City ikaba yiteze kumuha amasezerano y'imyaka ibiri. (Guardian) Uwu murwi wo mu Butaliyano wagumye wipfuza kugumana Ronaldo ariko ubu ukaba wipfuza kugura umusatirizi wa City umunya Brésil Gabriel Jesus, 24, kugira ngo amusubirire.(Sky Sports) Ronaldo asaba umushahara wa 510.000 vy'amapawundi (yababa 698.000) ku ndwi kugira yinjire muri City, ivyomutuma aba umukinyi wa mbere ahembwa umushahara munini muri uwo murwi, ibi na vyo bigashobora gutera agashavu abandi bakinyi.  (Sun) Juventus iripfuza gusubirana nk'intizo umusatirizi w'umutaliyano Moise Kean w'imyaka 21 ubu akina muri Everton, ariko ikaronka n'akaryo ko gushobora kumugura burundu mu ci riza.  (Calciomercato in Italian) Liverpool iriko irihweza ingene yogura umukinyi wo hagati wa Brighton umunya Mali Yves Bissouma, 24, ku miriyoni zababa 55. (Express) Wolverhampton Wanderers irarahira ikarengwa ko idashobora gutiza Tottenham Hotspur umukinyi wo ku ruhande w'umunya Espagne Adama Traore, 25, kubera ikeneye kumugumana.  (Telegraph) West Ham United iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa  CSKA Moscow umunya Croatia Nikola Vlasic, 23, mu gihe ikeneye uwosubirira umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umwongereza Jesse Lingard. (Sky Sports) Watford watanguye ibiganiro na Tottenham kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa Moussa Sissoko, 32. (Fabrizio Romano) Paris St-Germain iriko irarondera abakinyi batari bake, harimwo umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umufaransa Paul Pogba, 28, hamwe n'umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umunya Norvège Erling Braut Haaland, 21, mu gihe iriko yitegurira ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka idafise Kylian Mbappe. (L'Equipe, via Mail) Real Madrid yongereje igiciro ishaka gutanga ku musatirizi wa PSG Mbappe, 22 gushika ku miriyoni zababa 199 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, inyuma y'aho aya mbere yababa n'imiriyoni zababa 188 bayankiye.  (Sky Sports) PSG ishobora guca irondera umusatirizi wa Everton umunya Brésil Richarlison mu gihe Mbappe yogenda, ni mu gihe abaserukizi b'uyu mukinyi bamaze gushika i Paris mu biganiro.  (ESPN Brazil - in Portuguese) Manchester United vyaranse ko ironka umukinyi wo ku ruhande w'umwongereza Noni Madueke w'imyaka 19, inyuma y'aho atereye igikumu ku yandi masezerano na PSV Eindhoven. (Mirror) Kizigenza wa Tottenham umwongereza Harry Keane  ari mu biganiro vyo kurondera amasezerano yoronkamwo akarusho. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 28 yiteze kuronka aya masezerano ashobora kumutuma ahembwa amapawundi 400.000 (mu madorari akaba yababa 548.346) ku ndwi, inyuma y'aho yemereye kuguma muri uyo murwi muri uno mwaka.  (Times - subscription required) Chelsea iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Sevilla umufaransa Jules Kounde, 22, ku giciro kingana n'imiriyoni  57.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sky Italia, via Star) Hagati aho, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea umufaransa Kurt Zouma, 26, yitezwe gufatwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga kugira aje gukinira West Ham mu masezerano y'imyaka itanu, ku giciro c'imiriyoni 35.6 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Tottenham yatanguye ibiganiro vyo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus  umunyamerika Weston McKennie, 22 ku giciro c'imiriyoni 54.8 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Independent) Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta yamiriye kure ivy'uko kizigenza wayo, umusatirizi w'umunya Gabon  Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang ashobora gusezera uyu murwi.  (ESPN) Everton iripfuza umusatirizi wa Brighton  umufaransa Neal Maupay w'imyaka 25. (Sky Sports) Manchester United ishobora kurondera umukinyi wo hagati imbere y'uko ikiringo c'igura n'igurishwa kirangira, ariko bigashobora kuba ngombwa ko irindira kugira irabe ko yoronka umwongereza Declan Rice, 22 akinira West Ham. (Independent)

column2: Coronavirus - Burundi: Leta imenyesha ko hari abandi 20 banduye
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu n'ukurwanya SIDA mu Burundi bumenyesha ko hari abantu 20 babonywe ko banduye umugera coronavirus. Mw'itangazo bwaraye busohoye, ubwo bushikiranganji bumenyesha ko abo 20 bari mu bantu 98 bapimwe uwo mugera kuva ku wa 01 gushika ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu. Ibi biharuro bishasha bitangajwe inyuma y'aho ishirahamwe OLUCOME rimenyeshereje amakenga yaryo ku bijanye n'amakuru ashikirizwa na leta y'u Burundi kuri mugera uriko urakora ibara kw'isi yose. Nk'uko vyama, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu ntibutanga umwidondoro w'abo bantu bashasha banduye iyi ndwara ya Covid-19. Iryo tangazo rimenyesha ko mu bari basanzwe bakirwaye iyo ndwara bashika 29, 12 muri bo bapimwe bagasanga barakize, kandi ko baronkejwe uruhusha rwo gusubira mu miryango yabo. Gushika ubu, ibiharuro vyerekana ko abantu 83 aribo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera; muri abo 45 bakaba bamaze gukira, nayo 37 bakaba ari bo bakirwaye, umwe akaba yaritavye Imana. Gushika ubu, nta ngingo zirafatwa na leta y'u Burundi mu ntumbero yo kuzibira ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera nk'uko vyagenze mu bindi bihugu vyo mu karere. Hari bamwe babona ko amakuru atangwa na leta ku vyerekeye iyo ndwara yoba atajanye n'ukuri ku kungene yifashe mu gihugu. Ishirahamwe ryigenga OLUCOME ryiyemeje kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'ubutunzi bwa leta, riherutse gusohora itangazo aho rinegura leta ko ititayeho uko bikwiye ikiza ca Covid-19. Olucome yibaza ko amakuru atangazwa ashobora kuba ari kure y'ukuri kw'ivyo Abarundi bibaza, ikanasaba leta y'u Burundi kureka kwizimagiza imbere y'iki kiza kiriko kiriha inkumbi kw'isi. Mu minsi iheze hari amakuru yakwiriye ku mbuga ntangamakuru ko hari bamwe mu bategetsi muri leta y'u Burundi boba baranduye iyi ndwara, ibihakanwa n'umuvugizi wa leta. Ayo makuru akaba yakwiragiye inyuma y'aho umutambukanyi w'umukuru w'igihugu, Denise Nkurunziza agiriye muri Kenya kuvurwa indwara itaramenyekana gushika ubu. Vyaravuzwe cane ko yagiye i Nairobi kwivuza uwu mugera, ariko ayo makuru akaba yarahakanywe n'umwe mu bakozi bo mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu BBC yabajije ariko atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana . Umugera wa coronavirus watanguye kumenyekana mu mpera z'umwaka uheze mu gisagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa, ubu ukaba ubarizwa kw'isi yose. Ku wa 31 z'ukwezi kwa gatatu niho leta y'u Burundi yatangaza umuntu wa mbere yanduye uwo mugera.

column2: Woba utewe impungenge n'urukingo rwa Covid-19? Izi ni inyishu ku bibazo woba ufise
column3: Ibibazo vyibazwa kenshi n'abatinya urukingo rwa Covid-19 hamwe n'inyishu zogutuma ugabanya impugenge.

column2: China: Umukuru w’igihugu aragabisha ko wa mugera corona ukwiragira cane
column3: Inyuma y'inama y'abashikiranganji ku munsi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha mu Bushinwa, umukuru w'ico gihugu Xi Jinping  aragabisha ko wa mugera ruhonyabantu corona uriko urakwiragira bidasanzwe. Perezida Xi yabwiye abategetsi bakuru ko igihugu ciwe "kiri mu gihe kidasanzwe". Umugera corona gushika ubu, umaze guhitana abantu 56  abandi nabo bashika 2000 baramaze kuwandura kuva wadutse. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe abashakashatsi b'abongereza bagabisha ko Ubushinwa bushobora kunanirwa no kurwanya uwo mugera. Mui bisagara bimaze kwandukirwa n'uwo mugera, hari amategeko yafashwe yo kugabanya uruja n'uruza. Kuva uno munsi ku wa Mungu, amamodokari y'abigenga ntiyemererwe kuja mu gisagara ca Wuhan aho uwo mugera watanguriye. Ibirori vy'umunsi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha vyatanguye ejo ku wa gatandatu vyarahagaritswe mu bisagara bitari bike. Hagati mu gihugu, ingenzi zitegerezwa kubanza gupimwa ubushuhe, mu gihe ingendo z'amatereni mu bisagara bitari bike zahagaritswe. Mu ntara ya  Hong Kong imaze igihe iri mu migumuko ikomeye hatangajwe ibihe bidasanzwe, ikiringo c'uburuhuko bw'abanyesure naco kirongerezwa. Hari n'ibihugu bimaze kwandukirwa n'uwo mugera, aho abanduye bashizwe mu bibanza vya bonyene kugira ngo bavurwe. Uwo mugerawa corona uri mu muryango w'imigera itera ibicurane bisanzwe, ariko ukabangamira cane ibihimba vy'ihemero. Mu kumenya ko umuntu yafashwe, atangura kwumva amenetse umutwe, mu nyuma agakorora cane, inyuma y'indwi agatangura kugira ingorane zo guhema. Gushika ubu nta muti canke urucanco rurashobora kuboneka. Abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bikeka ko uyo mugera woba wanduwe uvuye ku bifungurwa vyo mu kiyaga vyinjijwe mu kinyegero. Uwo mugera urateye umutima uhagaze abahinga bavuga ko bishobora kugorana ko igihugu c'Ubushinwa  kuwuhagarika. Abahinga bo mu kigo MRC bo mu Bwongereza kijejwe kwihweza indwara zandukira kw'isi kivuga ko umuntu yawanduye ashobora kuwandukiza abantu hafi batatu. Ico kigo kirashima utwigoro abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bariko barakora mu guhangana n'uwo mugera, ariko bakavuga ko hakenewe ko uwo mugera ubu urwanywa gushika ku bice 60% kugira ngo bashobore kuwuhagarika. Ibihugu vya Thailand, Singapore, Ubuyapani, Taiwan, Malaysia, Vietnam, Koreya y'Epfo, na Nepal biramaze gutangaza ko bifise abanduye uwo mugera. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, Australia yatangaje ko abantu bane bamaze kwandura, mu bisagara vya Melbourne na Sydney. Eka no ku mugabane wa Bulaya uramaze gushikayo, aho u Bufaransa bumenyesha ko umaze gufata abantu batatu. Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nazo nyene ntiziri kure kuko zivuga ko abantu babiri bamaze kuwandura, harimwo umukenyezi ari mu myaka 60 wo muri Chicago yawanduye avuye mu karere ka Wuhan.

column2: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Kidum ngo yabwiwe ko atemerewe kuririmbira mu Rwanda
column3: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi rurangiranwa mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika, Jean Pierre Nimbona azwi cane nka Kidum, yabwiye BBC ko yabujijwe kuremesha ibiteramo mu Rwanda. Kidum yategerezwa kuririmba mu giteramo Kigali Jazz Junction itariki 27/09/2019 ari kumwe n'abandi baririmvyi nka Johnny Drille wo muri Nigeria. Ariko ku buryo atari yiteze ngo yabwiwe ko atacemerewe kuririmba muri ico giteramo. BBC yegereye Kidum tumubaza icatumye abuzwa kuja muri ico giteramo kandi amatangazo yaco hamwe n'amatike vyari bimaze gusohoka. Kidum yagize ati: "Nta mpamvu n'imwe nabwiwe. Abateguye igiteramo bambwiye ko ubuyobozi bwa Kigali bwababwiye ko ntemerewe kuja muri ico giteramo. "Nta ngorane nari bwagire mu Rwanda, itariki zitandatu nariyo, kiretse mu kwezi kwa 12 aho nari mvuye mu Burundi, umuntu aravuga ati sinshobora kuririmba. Ariko nta kindi gihe vyari bwashike." Kidum ari mu baririmvyi rurangiranwa mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika, akaba amaze imyaka irenga 20 aremesha ibiteramo mu bihugu vy'ako karere agendera buri mwaka. Yabandanije agira ati: "Mu Rwanda ndahinjira nk'uwugiye muhira, nta visa, nta ruhusha ikintu kimwe bambaza gusa ni aho nshikira." BBC yashatse kumenya ico abatumiye Kidum bavuga, atubwira ko bobo bakiriko baringinga ubuyobozi bwa Kigali ngo barabe ko bwotanga uruhusha. Abajijwe niba hari iyindi mpamvu yoba ibiri inyuma Kidum yavuze ko ata mpamvu yindi n'imwe we ku bwiye yumva yoba yabiteye ngo ariko hatanguye kuvugwa vyinshi. Yagize ati: "Hari abari kuvuga ko vyoba bitewe n'umubano mubi hagati y'ibihugu vyombi (u Burundi n'u Rwanda), ngo vyoba bifise imvo za politike. "Jewe simba mu Rwanda canke mu Burundi, mba muri Kenya. Nta politike ndimwo. Ku vy'umutekano navyo, nta mutekano w'umuntu n'umwe mbangamiye, nta n'ubushobozi mfise bwo kubangamira umutekano." Kidum yari amaze kuremesha ibiteramo vyinshi mu Rwanda mu myaka 16 iheze, akaba yararirimvye ahantu henshi harimwo n'umuhango wo Kwita Izina. BBC iracakurikirana aya makuru.

column2: Tokyo Paralympics: Abanonotsi bagendana ubumuga ba Afghanistan bahungishijwe
column3: Komite mpuzamakungu y'inkino z'abagendana ubumuga iremeza ko abanonotsi babiri b'abanye Afghanistan bahungishijwe igihugu cabo. Vyari bitegekanijwe ko abo banonotsi bakina taekwondo, Zakia Khudadad na Hossain Rasouli, bahiganwa mu nkino z'abagendana ubumuga i Tokyo zatanguye kuri uyu wa gatatu. Ariko abo babiri bari mu bantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi batari bwashobore kuva muri ico gihugu inyuma y'aho aba Talibani bafatiye ubutegetsi. Ibendera rya Afghanistan ryatwawe n'umukorerabushake mu birori vyo kwugurura izo nkino ku musi wa kabiri. Umuvugizi wa komite mpuzamakungu y'inkino z'abagendana ubumuga (IPC) Craig Spence yagize ati: "Harakozwe utwigoro kugira tubakure muri Afghanistan, ubu bari mu kibanza gitekanye". "Sinshobora kubabwira aho bari kuko ibi ntibiraba ukwinonora imitsi, ibi vyerekeye ubuzima bw'abantu no gukingira abantu. "Ni vyo baciye mu bihe bikomeye, barabandanya gukurikiranwa no gufashwa mu bibazo boba baragize mu mutwe. "Tuguma tumenyeshwa umwanya ku mwanya aho bari n'ingene ubuzima bwabo bwifashe". Khudadadi w'imyaka 23, yari kuba umupfasoni wa mbere aserukiye Afghanistan mw'ihiganwa ry'abagendana ubumuga, kandi yari yasavye ubufasha bwo guhunga inyuma y'aho abatalibani bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan.

column2: Andy Mwag: Ivyo ndirimba muri 'Nisaidie Papa' vyambayeho
column3: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Andy Mwag, aheruka gusohora indirimbo ziryoheye ugutwi, avuga ko mu vyo aririmba harimwo ubuzima bubi yaciyemwo. Ni indirimbo zivanzemwo ikirundi, ikinyarwanda igifaransa, icongereza hamwe n'igiswahiri, vyumvikana ko zitondewe muri studio wumvirije ingene zivuga. Andy Mwaga, asanzwe yitwa Ndabaneze Andre, yatanguye kuririmba mu mwaka w'2007. Kuri ubu aba mu gihugu c'u Rwanda kuva mu 2015 akaba yubatse afise n'abana babiri. Igihe yatangura kuririmba, yatanguriye mw'isengero, hanyuma nk'uko avyivugira aca aja muri "bands zisanzwe", n'ukuvuga imigwi y'umuziki itaririmba indirimbo z'Imana. Wumvirije neza indirimwo za Andy Mwaga, nk'indirimbo Get There canke Amarira, wumva umudiho ukwibutsa abaririmvyi ba rurangiranwa nka Lokua Kanza wo muri Kongo canke Ismael Lo wo muri Senegal. Kanatsinda Andy Mwag we nyene arivugira ko Lokua Kanza ari mu baririmvyi bamuhaye ingoga zo kuririmba, anafatirako mu kwandika ibihangano vyiwe. Wumvirije indirimbo nyinshi zisohoka muri iki gihe yaba mu Burundi canke mu Rwanda, usanga ahanini zibanda ku mudiho utambika, indirimbo za Andy Mwaga ziruhura amaguru kuko uca wumva ushaka kwicara ukumviriza, zigashika ku mutima. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Andy Mwaga avuga ko indirimbo yiwe ikunzwe Nisaidie Papa, yayanditse afatiye ku buzima bwiwe bwite. Nta vyinshi yabivuzeko ariko ababaye mu Burundi mu mpere y'imyaka y'1990, baribuka ko hibonekeje abana benshi bo mw'ibarabara ahanini kubera intambara. Ico gihe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura haradutse abana benshi baza barasaba mw'ibarabara uwo bahuye nawe wese, bavuga mu giswahili bati "Nisaidie papa" bisigura mu kirundi ngo "mfasha papa". Si kenshi mu karere haza abaririmvyi baririmba bigashika ku mutima, bazi umuziki (kuvuza ivyuma bitandukanye) kandi bafise igihagararo n'igikundiro. Niyabandanya ku murindi ariko, abakunzi b'umuziki nabo bakemera kumutiza ugutwi, nta nkeka ko Andy Mwaga ari mu bahagarariye kazoza keza k'umuziki wo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi.

column2: Ishirahamwe rya Africa rimaze kuronka miliyoni 300 z'inkingo za Covid-19
column3: Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Associated Press rivvuga ko ryabwiwe n'umujenama mu kigo ca Africa co  kurwanya indwara( Africa Centers for Disease Control-CDC) ko ishirahamwe rya Africa rimaze kuronka hafi miliyoni 300 z'inkingo za Covid-19. Africa iharurwamwo miliyaridi 1.2 z'abantu. Nicaise Ndembi  yavuze muri ico kiganiro ko uwurongoye Ishirahamwe rya Africa muri iki gihe , umukuru wa Africa y'Epfo Cyril Rapahosa, vyitezwe ko abitangaza kuri uyu wa gatatu. Avuga kandi ko izo nkingo zabonetse mu buryo bwigenga bidaciye kuri Covax, umugambi w'isi wo kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19. Gishika ubu muri Africa haharugwa abantu 3.085.009 bamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19 na 73.504 bamaze gupfa, nk'uko bishikirizwa na Africa CDC. Ku kigiti cavyo, ibihugu bime bimwe vya Africa bimaze kuvugana n'ibigo bihingura inkingo kugirango vyumvikane ku buguzi. Africa y'Epfo yamenyesheje ku ndwi iheze ko izoronka muri uku kwezi kwa mbere umuliyoni wa mbere w'inkingo iguze muri Serum Institute of India, ikiigo co mu Buhindi, mu kwa kabiri naho ikaronka izindi 500.000.

column2: Ghana: Igiporisi cabujije ihishurwa ry'Umwaka Mushasha ritera ibibazo
column3: Dickens Olewe BBC News Igiporisi muri Ghana cagabishije abarongoye ukwemera n’amashengero ko batokora ihishurwa basanzwe bakora ku Mwaka Mushasha kuko hari abo ritera ubwoba, abandi umwitwarariko, mbere abandi bagapfa. Uburenganzira bwo gusenga ntibutegerezwa kurengera uburenganzira bw’abandi, nk’uko igiporisi cavuze mw’itangazo. Abanegura iyo ngingo bavuga ko iteye kubiri n’uburenganzira butangwa n’ibwirizwa shingiro mu kwishira no kwizana ku bijanye no kwemera  ko rero iteye kubiri n’amategeko. Aba-Kristu baharurwa muri za miriyoni akenshi barakoranira mu masengero kugira bumve ivyo  abapasitori  babahishurira ku vyo beretswe ku bizobashikira mu mwaka mushasha. Hari abahishurirwa ivyiza bibarindiriye ariko hari n’abagabishwa ko barindiriwe n’ivyago. Iyo ngingo y’igiporisi yatanguye gusohoka mu mwaka uheze igihe abantu bari barengewe n’ukugabishwa kw’impfu n’akaga, nk’uko ikinyamakuru co kuri internet My Joy Online kivyandika. Mw’itangazo, igiporisi casavye amadini atandukanye”gafashanya” na co no “gukoresha uburyo bwemewe n’amategeko um gushurira ivyo beretswe”. Ariko umunyamategeko Sammy Sarko yavuze ko  iyo ngingo y’igiporisi “iteye kubiri n’amategeko.” Yanditse ati: “Ntikeneye no kubanza kwihwezwa na sentare ya mbere nkuru muri Ghana. Nta tegeko muri Ghana riha igiporisi ububasha bwo kugenzura ingene ivyahishuwe bimenyeshwa mu gihugu”. Yongeyeko ati : “Ubwisanzure bw’idini burenze ubwisanzure bwo gusenga muri sinagoga, isengero canke umusigiti. Bisigura ko abantu badategerezwa guca kubiri n’ivyo bemera kugira bisunge umuco canke reta kiretse buteye kubiri n’itegeko  iri canke irindi.” Igiporisi cavuze co cashinze itariki ya 27 Kigarama (12) nk’umunsi wo gutangura kwubahiriza ingingo zijanye no kumenyesha ivyahishuwe. Iryo tangazo ryavuze riti: “Uyu munsi ni uwo kutwibutsa twese, gukora ibikorwa bijanye n’ukwemera hatarenzwe akarimbi k’amategeko kugira hubahirizwe  ituze ridahungabanywa n’umwitwarariko uvuye ku mburi y’ibibi canke urupfu bigiye gushika”.

column2: Harry Kane: Jose Morinho ati Tottenham 'ntishobora gukina neza ata musatirizi'
column3: Umumenyereza wa Tottenham, Jose Mourinho, avuga ko ata mukinyi ashobora gusubirira Harry Kane, kandi ko Tottenham idashobora gukina nk'uko isanzwe ikina atarimwo. Ashikirije ivyo mu gihe umurwi wiwe witeze kwakira Liverpool mu rukino rukomeye cane rwo kuri uyu wa gatandatu ruza gutangura isaha imwe n'igice z'ijoro mu masaha y'u Burundi n'u Rwanda. Uyo musatirizi wa Tottenham, Harry Kane, ntazosubira mu kibuga imbere y'ukwa kane uno mwaka, inyuma y'aho abagiwe kubera imvune yo kw'itako. Uyo musatirizi wa Tot ariwe kandi kizigenza w'u Bwongereza amaze gutsinda ibitsindo 27 mu nkino amaze gukinira Tottenham n'umurwi nserukiragihugu muri uno mwaka w'inkino. Morihno ati: "Ngize ngo mvuge menshi kuri Harry, bintera umubabaro mwinshi". "Vyombera vyiza tuganiriye ku vyotuma ntwenga". Kane yagize iyo mvune mu rukino rwayihuje na Southampton, urukino mbere yatsinzwe, hari ku munsi wa Bonane. Morinho ati: "Ico womenya coco, ni uko tudashobora gukina nk'uko dusanzwe dukina iyo Harry Kane ari kumwe natwe". "Nta mukinyi n'umwe ariho yofata ikibanza ciwe". Danny Rose yaragarutse mu myimenyerezo, eka na  Hugo Lloris na we nyene akaba ariko agaruka buke buke inyuma y'aho avunikiye inkokora mu kw'icumi kw'umwaka urangiye. Hagati aho, ibintu ntibitomoretse neza kuri kazoza k'umukinyi wo hagati, Christian Eriksen, mu gihe amasezerano yiwe n'uyo murwi azorangira mu mpera za rino higanwa ry'uno mwaka. Morinho avuga ati: "Ari nka hamwe umukuru w'umurwi [Daniel Levy] yotorera umuti ibi bibazo kugira ngo dushobore kuvyitwaramwo neza mu mezi ari imbere, ni ukuri vyoba vyiza". "Atari uko, twotegerezwa kurindira gushika mu ci kugira dutegure neza ikipe".

column2: Abagore babiri barwaye kanseri y’ibere batanguje ishirahamwe ry’ugufasha abandi barwayi nkabo
column3: Abagore babiri barwaye kanseri y'ibere idakira bashinze ishirahamwe bise Secondary Sisters kugira ngo bafashe abandi, ni inyuma y'aho baronkeye ibipimo vyabaciye umutima. Abongerezakazi Nicky Newman na Laura Middleton-Hughes, bompi b'imyaka 31, bafise kanseri igeze ku rugero rugira kane. Bisigura ko igeze ku rugero rwo gukwiragira mu bindi bice vy'umubiri nk'amagufa, amahaha, igitigu (canke umwijima mu Kinyarwanda) canke ubwonko. Igihe Nicky wo mu karere ka Guildford yabwirwa ko kanseri yiwe idashobora gukira kubera yari igeze ku rugero rwo hejuru, avuga ko vyatumye agira "ubwoba budasanzwe". Abo bagore bompi bizeye ko iryo shirahamwe ryabo rikorera ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rizofasha abandi bazoronka inkuru mbi nk'iyi guhangana nayo. Laura ava i Norwich avuga ko gushinga iryo shirahamwe vyabahaye "akaryo keza k'ukuganira ku vyerekeye kanseri yacu". Ati: "Twempi tubona ko dufise kazoza kadatomoye, ariko turafise kazoza kandi tuzobaho uko nyene". "Rero mu gihe twoshobora gufasha n'umuntu n'umwe gusa kwumva amahoro, akumva ko ari umuntu nk'abandi, ico kirahagije". Abo bagore bompi, bakorana n'umugambi wiswe Stand Up To Cancer. Ni umugambi w'isekeza ry'ukwegeranya amahera watunganijwe n'ikigo co mu Bwongereza ca Cancer Research UK kijejwe kurwanya kanseri, hamwe na televiziyo Channel 4. Nicky yagiye kumenya ko afise ikivyimba mw'ibere igihe yari yagiye kwivuza ari kumwe n'umugabo wiwe. Avuga ko yari yavyiketse n'imbere y'uko abimubwira, aravye ingene muganga yahindutse mu maso. Mu gihe yariko arapimwa, yavuze ko yumva ababara mu mugongo, ariho yaca arungikwa ku muhinga afotora mu mubiri. Ati: "Umuganga yambwiye ati: 'Sha nta kundi, ntaco nshobora kugufasha'. Vyaciye bintera ubwoba bwinshi". Ariko, yaciye amuha umuti witwa Palbociclib wari uherutse kwemerwa n'ikigo NHS kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza. Imiti bariko barafata ishobora kuba yaratumye iyo ndwara itabandanya ikwiragira mu mubiri, ariko ikaba yatumye batazigera bavyara. Nicky avuga ko igihe yava kwa muganga, yari ababajwe cane n'uko atazoronka akaryo ko kwitwa umuvyeyi gusumba kurwara kanseri. Mugenziwe Laura yagiye kumenya ko arwaye kanseri yo mw'ibere mu mwaka wa 2014 mu gihe yari mu karuhuko bakamutora ikivyimba. Baciye bamukura ibere rimwe baranamuvura, kandi arakira neza. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane 2016, niho yumva ububabare ku rutugu i buryo bwaguma bwongerekana, baca bamurungika gucishwa mu cuma agapimwa. Niho basanga afise ikivyimba ku mutwe w'igufa bita 'humerus' rifatanya urutugu n'inkokora. Ati: "Nagize ubwoba budasanzwe, 2016 wambereye umwaka mubi, umwaka mubi n'ukuri!" Laura afise ibimenyetso vya kanseri y'amabere vyakwiragiye mu ruti rw'umugongo, mu magufa afatanye narwo no mu gice c'urukenyerero n'amayunguyungu. Avuga ati: "Hagati aho, ndashima ko imiti ndiko ndafata iriko iramfasha kubandanya mbaho".

column2: OMS - COVAX: Birakenewe ko incanco zishika mu minwe y'abari muri Afrika
column3: Ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, WHO/OMS, rivuga ko ivyo amakungu yemeye vyo gutanga incanco za Covid muri Afrika bikeneye gushirwa mu bikorwa mu 'gutanga' izo ncanco kuri uwo mugabane. Uwurongoye OMS mu karere ka Afrika Dr Richard Mihigo yabwiye BBC Newsday ati: "Twagiye tubona imihango myinshi batanga muri kahise… yose yari myiza ariko ico dukeneye cane n'uko incanco zishika mu minwe y'abantu bari ku rubuga." Ivyo bivuzwe mu gihe Onu isigura ko uko ibintu vyifashe ari nko 'kwitako umwikomo', mu gihe abarenga ibice 90% vy'abanye Afrika bataracandagwa. Ashikiriza ijambo inama ya bose kuri uyu wa mbere, umunyamabanga mukuru wa Onu, António Guterres yagize ati: "N'ibiterasoni. Twaratoye ubuhinga bwo gupima. Ariko turi ku rudome F uravye inyifato." Dr Mihigo avuga ko Afrika yavyifashemwo neza mu gusaranganya incanco nke yaronse, n'aho zimwe zashitse hasigaye akanya gato ngo zirenze ikiringo. Abategetsi ba OMS bavuga ko umugambi mpuzamakungu wa Covax wo gutanga incanco, ufise intumbero yo gufasha ibihugu bikenye, wagenze neza n'aho utashoboye kuronka incanco zikwiye. Umugambi wa Covax watanze ibice 37% vy'incanco imiliyoni 177 zatanzwe muri Afrika, izindi zikaba zabonetse biciye mu migenderanire n'imfashanyo zivuye ahantu hatandukanye. Dr Mihigo yateye akamo ibihugu gushigikira uwo mugambi mu gucisha imfashanyo yavyo muri Covax.

column2: Russia yoba iriko irategura gutera Ukraine? Ni kimwe mu bibazo
column3: Ingabo z'Uburusiya zoba ziriko zitegurira intambara muri Ukraine? Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yiteze ibikorwa kanana vya gisirikare. Uburusiya bushaka ko ibihugu vyo mu Burengero bibwemerera ko Ukraine itazokwinjira mw'ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe OTAN/NATO, ariko rero n'aho impande zompi ziri mu biganiro, ibi ntibizoshoboka. Ivyoba mu nyuma birashobora gushira mu kaga umutekano w'umugabane w'Uburayi wose. Uburusiya burahakana ko ata gitero buriko butegura, ariko imbere y'aha bwarigaruriye ubutaka kwa Ukraine kandi bwaregeranirije ku rubibe rwayo ingabo zababa 100.000. Uburusiya bumaze imyaka itari mike burwanya ko Ukraine yinjira mu nzego za Bulaya, cane cane muri OTAN. Ukraine isangiye imbibe n'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya (EU) hamwe n'Uburusiya, ariko, nk'icahoze ari Repubulika y'aba Soviet, ifise ubucuti budasanzwe n'Uburusiya mu bijanye n'imico n'imigenzo, kandi ururimi rw'ikirusiya ruravugwa cane muri ico gihugu. Igihe Abanya-Ukraine babogoza umukuru w'igihugu yari yegamiye ku ruhande rw'Uburusiya mu 2014, Uburusiya bwaciye bwigarurira akarere ka Crimea kari mu bumanuko, buca bufata mu mugongo inyeshamba zirondera kwiyonkora zigaruriye uturere tutari duto mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Kuva ico gihe, izi nyeshamba zihanganye n'igisirikare ca Ukraine mu ntambara imaze guhitana ubuzima bw'abantu barenga 14.000. Uburusiya buvuga ko ata mugambi bufise wo gutera Ukraine: mbere n'umukuru w'ingabo Valery Gerasimov  yaraniyamirije ko ibivugwa ko hari igitero cimirije ari ikinyoma. Ariko icuka kibi ni cinshi mbere Perezida Vladimir Putin aragabisha ko "azotegerezwa gufata ingingo za gisirikare zikenewe zo kwihora" mu gihe ivyo yita ingedo y'agasotoro y'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero yobandanya. Umunyamabanga mukuru wa OTAN aragabisha ko intambara imota, mbere na Perezida Biden abona ko Uburusiya buzoruhira gutera.. Amerika ivuga ko izi neza ko Uburusiya butegura kwongereza ingabo hafi ya Ukraine mu mwanya muto. Amerika ivuga ko Uburusiya budasigura igituma bwarungitse inabo hafi ya Ukraine - mu gihe ingabo n'ibimodoka vy'intambara vy'Uburusiya vyagiye muri Belarus mu myimenyerezo. Icegera c'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya agereranya ingene ibintu bimeze muri iki  gihe n'ikibazo ca misire za Cuba  (missiles de Cuba/Cuban missiles) mu 1962 igihe Amerika n'Ubumwe bw'aba Soviet bihatswe kwinjira mu ntambara ya nikleyeri. Igendereza ryo mu bihugu vyo mu Burengero ryerekana ko Uburusiya bushobora gutera umwanya kanaka muri ino ntango ya 2022. Uburusiya buvuga ko iki ari "igihe c'ukubwirana ukuri" mu migenderanire yabwo na OTAN: "Kuri twebwe ni ugukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo Ukraine, ntihirahire ngo ibe umunywanyi wa OTAN", ibi bikavugwa n'icegera c'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire Sergei Ryabkov. Moscou/Moscow (umugwa mukuru w'Uburusiya) yagiriza ibihugu vya OTAN "kurundarunda" ibirwanisho muri Ukraine Amerika nayo ko ikokeza indyane. Perezida Putin avuga ko Uburusiya "ata handi bufise buja - bibaza ko tuzokwicara tukarera amaboko?" Mu vyo ukuri, Uburusiya bushaka ko OTAN  isubira ku mbibe zayo imbere ya 1997. Busaba ko ivyo kubandanya isatira uburengero bihagarara kandi igahagarika ibikorwa vya gisirikare mu buseruko bw'Ubulaya. Ibi bisigura ko imirwi y'abasirikare biteguriye intambara barungitswe muri Pologne no mu bihugu vya Estonie, Lettonie na Lituanie mu karere ka Baltique bavanwayo, kandi ko ata misire zosubira kurungikwa mu bihugu nka Pologne na Roumanie. Uburusiya kandi busaba ko hoba amasezerano na Amerika abuza ko hosubira kuba ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri birungikwa hanze y'imbibe zavyo. Uburusiya bwarigaruriye Crimea mu 2014, buvuga ko aka karere kari akabwo kuva muri kahise.  Ukraine yari imwe mu bihugu vyari bigize Ubumwe bw'aba Soviet bwagiye gusambuka mu kwa cumi na kabiri 1991, ivyo Putin avuga ko ryabaye "isambuka ry'Uburusiya bwo kuva muri kahise". Ikimenyetso c'ico Perezida Putin yiyumvira kuri Ukraine cagiye kwibonekeza mu nkuru ndende yasohotse mu mwaka uheze, aho yavuze ko Abarusiya n'abanya -Ukraine bagize "igihugu kimwe". Yavuze ko abategetsi ba Ukraine ba kino gihe bafise "umugambi wo kurwanya Uburusiya". Uburusiya kandi burababajwe n'uko ishirwa mu ngiro ry'amasezerano y'amahoro ya Minsk yo mu 2015 ku bijanye n'ubuseruko bw'Ubulayi riri kure nk'ukwezi. Nta n'integuro zihari zo gutegura amatora mu turere dushaka kwiyonkora. Uburusiya burahakana ivyo bwagirizwa ko ari bwo buri inyuma y'indyane zibandanya. Perezida Vladimir Putin aramaze kuvugana incuro zitari nke na mugenziwe wa Amerika Joe Biden kandi ibiganiro vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru birabandanya, ariko abategetsi b'Uburusiya  baragabisha ko kubona Uburengero bwaranse ibintu nyamukuru iki gihugu gisaba biriko "vyica ibiganiro". Ikibazo ni ukumenya aho Uburusiya buzogarukira. Perezida Biden agabisha ko mu gihe hoba igitero ceruye muri Ukraine Uburusiya bwobona ibara. Ariko kandi, yongeye avuga ko mu gihe hoba igitero gito, ibihugu vyo mu burengero "vyokwisanga mu mpari ku co vyokora", amajambo yateye impari. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika Maison Blancher/White House bishimangira ko mu gihe hoba ivogerwa ry'imbibe rya Ukraine vyofatwa nk'igitero - ariko bikavuga ko Uburusiya bufise ibindi birwanisho, harimwo ibitero nyabwonko hamwe n'amayeri yandi ya gisirikare. Pentagon (ibiro vyo kwivuna abansi vya Amerika) yagiriza Uburusiya ko buriko butegura igitero c'ikinyoma, ko abantu babwo bajejwe igendereza biteguye gukora ibikorwa vyo gutoba ku nyeshamba zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya zigomba kwiyonkora, kugira ngo kibe inyendamuvano y'ingene bwokwinjira. Uburusiya burahakana ibi. Uburusiya kandi bwaratanze ibitabo ndangamuntu 500.000 mu turere turi mu minwe y'inyeshamba, rero mu gihe bwobura ivyo burondera, bushobora kwitwaza iki mu gukora igitero ico ari co cose bugasigura ko bushaka gukingira abanyagihugu babwo. Hagati aho, nimba intumero yonyene y'Uburusiya ari ukwigiza inyuma OTAN ngo ntiyegere ku mbibe zabwo, nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko buzobishobora. Ibihugu 30 bihurikiye muri OTAN birarahira bikarengwa ko bidashobora kwemerera muntu n'umwe yogerageza kubibohera amaboko imugongo ku bijanye na kazoza kavyo. Icegera c'umunyamabanga wa reta wa Amerika Wendy Sherman, ati: "Ntituzigera twemerera umuntu n'umwe kwugara imiryango ya OTAN yugururiwe uwo ari we wese". Ukraine iriko irarondera igihe ntarengwa co kwinjira, mu gihe OTAN ivuga ko Uburusiya budashobora guhagarika, kandi ko ata burenganzira bufise bwo kuzibira uwu mugambi. Mbere n'ibihugu vya  Suède na Finland bitari no muri OTAN biriyamiriza Uburusiya mu mugambi wabwo wo kugerageza kubizibira mu nteguro zavyo yo gutsimbataza ubucuti n'iri shirahamwe. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Finland ati: "Ntiturota duhagarika umugambi wacu". Uburengero buzogera he ku kibazo ca Ukraine? Amerika iratomora neza ko ata mugambi ifise wo kurungika ingabo zija kurwana muri Ukraine, ariko ikaba yiyemeza gufasha ico gihugu gukingira "ubusugire bw'ubutaka" bwaco. Pentagon yateguye ingabo zigera ku 8600 zimeze magabo, zishobora kurungikwa mu bihugu vya OTAN mu buseruko bwa Bulaya mu kanya isase. Ikirwanisho nyamukuru mu bihugu vy'Uburengero gisa n'uko ari ibihano hamwe n'imfashanyo ya gisirikare igizwe n'abahanuzi hamwe n'ibirwanisho. Perezida Biden aragabisha umupuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya ko ashobora kufata ingingo "atari bwigere abona" mu gihe Ukraine yoterwa. None izi ngingo zoba zirimwo ibiki? Igihano nyamukuru kijanye n'ubutunzi coba ico gukura amabanki y'Uburusiya mu buhinga mpuzamakungu bwo guhanahana amafaranga (Swift). Iyi yamye ibonwa ko yoba ingingo yofatwa ubwa nyumamu gihe izindi zose zanse, kandi hari amakenga ko ishobora kugira ingaruka mbi cane ku butunzi bwa Amerika na Bulaya. Perezida Biden aragabisha kandi ko ashobora gufatira ibihano Vladimir Putin ku giti ciwe, mu gihe Uburusiya bwotera Ukraine. Ubundi bwoba buhari ni ihagarikwa ry'iyugururwa ry'umuringoti w'Uburusiya Nord Stream 2 wa gaze mu Budagi, igisata c'amasoko ntanganguzu c'Ubudagi kikaba kiriko kiriga iyi ngingo. None ibihugu vy'Uburengero vyoba bivuga rumwe ku cokorwa? Umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika avuga ko ko we n'abategetsi ba Bulaya "bavyumva kumwe bose" ku kibazo ca Ukraine, ariko hari ukutumvikana hagati ya Amerika n'Ubulaya. Abategetsi ba Bulaya bashimangira ko Uburusiya na Amerika bidashobora gufata ingingo vyonyene kuri kuri kazoza. Ubufaransa bwobwo bwanasavye ko abanyabulaya bokorera hamwe muri OTAN hanyuma bakagiranira ibiganiro ukwabo n'Uburusiya. Umukuru w'igihugu wa ukraine asaba ko hoba inama mpuzamakungu kugira ngo hatorwe umuti w'iki kibazo, yoba irimwo Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi biri kumwe n'Uburusiya.

column2: Africa-Urudandazwa ku buryo bwa none: Abagore bahevye iduka bakaja kuri terefone zigezweho
column3: BBC yibanze ku bagore batatu b'abanya-Afrika - uwahora afise iduka, umwigisha n'umushoferi wa taxi - bongereje amafaranga binjiza kuva batanguye gukora urundadazwa ku buryo bwa terefone zigezweho (smartphones na digital platforms). Ikiza ca coronavirus catumye benshi basubira kwiyumvira ingene boronka ikibabeshaho. Ikigo cigenga gikora ubushakashatsi  Caribou Digital catoye ko abagore muri Kenya, Nigeria na Ghana bariko baravyaza umusaruro uburyo bwo gukora urudandazwa uciye ku buhinga bwa none bwo gutumatumanako (smartphones na digital platforms) kuko bwo bworoshe gushikira  no gukora ibitandukanye -gutyo bagashobora kwinjiza amafaranga kandi bakabandanya n'amabanga yo kwitaho abana babo. Madame Tarit  (mubona kw'ifoto aho hejuru) ntiyibaza ko yoshoboye  kugwiza na kabiri amafaranga yinjiza mu kiringo c'amezi icenda. Ikiza ca Covid cari catumye yugara iduka ryiwe ry'impuzu z'abana muri Eldoret mu burengero bwa Kenya, none gukotesha ibibanza aciye ku bigo bikorera kuri internet nka Airbnb bisa n'ibiriko birazibira igihengeri cari catewe no kwugara urudandazwa rwiwe. Ariko, Madame Tarit w'imyaka 29, ari mu bandi bagore benshi bariko baratera imbere mu gukoresha imbuga nka Facebook, Whatsapp, Instagram na apps z'ama taxi nka Uber na Bolt. Yatanguye urundadazwa rwiwe n'ikibanza kimwe haraheze amezi icenda none ubu afise indwi -ubu akaba akotesha ku gihe kirekire hanyuma nawe agapangisha aciye kuri Airbnb. "Ubu ninjiza amafaranga menshi kurusha ayo nakura mu rudandazwa imbere y'ikiza [ca Covid]," niko yabwiye BBC Daily. Abakoresha urwo rudandazwa ahanini n'abakerarugendo babikisha aho bazorara hamwe n'abagwizatunga bashima kurara muri  Airbnb aho kurara mw'ihoteri. "Mu gihe ca Covid benshi mu  bagenzi banje baratakaje ubuzi baca batangura gukorera ku materefone kugira binjize amafaranga. Ubu bagurisha ivyo kurya baciye kuri internet hanyuma bagakora nk'abashoferi bo kubishira abakiriya", nk'uko Madame  Tarit avuga. Umunsi usanzwe kuri Madame  Adzogble w'imyaka 32, utangurwa no gushira ubutumwa bwo kwamamaza ivyo acuruza kuri Whatsapp no kuri Facebook yibereye i muhira i Acra, umurwa mukuru wa Ghana. Ari mu bariko baravyaza umusaruro zimwe mu mpinduka zikomeye cane mu butunzi muri Afrika -ukwiyongera kw'ibibanza vyo gukoreramwo ubucuruzi kw'isoko ryo kuri internet. Agurisha amaterefone ngendanwa, ivyuma vyo kuzana akayaga mu nzu hamwe n'ama-television, ivyo vyose akavyamamaza aciye ku migwi yashinze kuri Whatsapp na Facebook, hamwe no mu yo asanzwemwo, nk'uwo ahuriramwo n'abo basenga hamwe. Madame Adzogble  yahevye akazi ko kwigisha igifaransa kugira aronke umwanya ukwiye wo gukora urudandazwa rwiwe kuri internet. "Bivamwo amafaranga menshi kurusha kwigisha. Ndashobora kugurisha ikintu kimwe nkinjiza ayaruta ayo mara ukwezi nkorera mu kwigisha. Mfise abana. Nkeneye guha abana banje indero nziza ishoboka,  akaba aribo bampa umwete wo kurondera kwigenga mu bijanye n'amafaranga", niko avuga. Ku bwa Madame Adzogble, kwubaka imigenderanire myiza n'abakiriya n'ikintu nyamukuru ushaka guca amafaranga uciye kuri internet. "Aho baraheza bakakugurira hanyuma bakakuvuga neza." Madame Lawal, w'imyaka 34, akorera  ibigo vy'amataxi uhamagara uciye ku buhinga bwa none Uber na Bolt mu gisagara ca mbere kinini muri Nigeria, Lagos. Ariko, ntibimworohera - uyo mugore areze abana bane wenyene avuga ko hari abagabo banka gutwarwa n'umugore. Lawa avuga ati: "Igihe natangura gutwara taxi muri Lagos, abagabo bose baca bafuta urugendo maze gushika kubajana." "Lagos haragoye , bisaba kuba ukomeye cane kugira ushobore  gutwara imodoka mu gisagara. Abagabo bibaza ko izo nguvu atazo mfise, mbanza kubajijura kugira bemere kwinjira mu modoka." Icigwa ca  Caribou Digital cerekana kandi ko abagore benshi barondera ikibabeshaho baciye ku buhinga bwa digital bafise impungene ku mutekano wabo. Umukuru w'abakoze ubwo bushakashatsi Grace Natabaalo yabwiye BBC ati: "Abagore benshi twavuganye bavuze ko baburagijwe bishingiye ku gitsina iyo bitavye ababa  bafatishije ingendo." Ati: "Mu gihe reta ihimiriza abagore bakiri bato gufata bene aka kazi bakeneye no kumenya urundi ruhande rwako - ko hari ingeramizi kandi zitegerezwa gufatwa nk'ikibazo gikomeye n'inzego z'igiporisi na reta." Ariko Lawal avuga ko ivyiza birimwo biruta cane ibibi. Ati: "Ni vyiza cane kuba ushobora kwironkera ikikubeshaho ariko kandi nshaka no kugira ico ntereye mu butunzi muri rusangi mu gutanga amakori (imisoro). Nsaka ko ubwanje ntera imbere, na Nigeria igatera imbere."

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Pulisic, Bereton Diaz, Phillips, Dembele, Origi, Danjuma, Cook
column3: Barcelona iriko irategura urugamba rwo kurondera umunyamerika Christian Pulisic, 23 akina ku ruhande, umudagi Antonio Rudiger, 28,  akina inyuma hamwe n'umunya Espagne akina inyuma nyene Cesar Azpilicueta, 32, bose basanzwe bakina muri Chelsea. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Leeds United iracarondera umusatirizi wa Chili Ben Brereton Diaz, 22, n'aho Blackburn Rovers imushakako imiriyoni 33 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sun) West Ham iriko irarondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza Nathaniel Phillips, 24, kugira ngo asubirire umutaliyano Angelo Ogbonna, 33, ariko rero Liverpool iriko imuronderako imiriyoni zababa 13 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira imurekure. (Sun) Umufaransa akina ku ruhande muri Bayern Munich  Kingsley Coman, 25, aracanana gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n'uyu murwi, bikaboneka ko, mu gihe yokwanka, mugenziwe Ousmane Dembele, 24, basanzwe bakinana mu murwi nserukiragihugu akaba ariko ararangiza amasezerano afitaniye na Barcelona, ari we ashobora kumusubirira. (Christian Falk) Real Madrid nta mugambi ifise wo kugurisha umusatirizi wa Bresil Rodrygo, 20, n'aho hari amakuru avuga ko ariko araronderwa na Liverpool.(Fabrizio Romano) Tottenham yatanguye ibiganiro n'umunyegori wayo, umufaransa Hugo Lloris, 34, akaba ari na we kizigenza, imbere y'uko amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi arangira mu ci riza. (Football Insider) Umusatirizi wa Liverpool umubirigi Divock Origi, 26, ariko araronderwa n'imirwi yo mu Butaliyano AC Milan - isanzwe iriko irarondera abakinyi bashobora gusubirira  Zlatan Ibrahimovic - hamwe na Atalanta. (Tutto Mercatao - in Italian) Imirwi ya Paris St-Germain na Lyon iriko irarondera ingene yoronka umusatirizi w'umufaransa Anthony Martial, 26, ni mu gihe umuserukizi wiwe avuga ko uyu mukinyi yipfuza kuva muri Manchester United. (90 Min) Lyon iripfuza kuronka umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Villarreal umunya Hollande Arnaut Danjuma, 24. Manchester United na Barcelona nayo nyene izwi ko iriko iramukurikiranira hagufi.  (TodoFichajes - in Spanish) Chelsea iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n'abakinyi Andreas Christensen, 25, umunya Danemark akina inyuma, hamwe na Thiago Silva, 37, umunya Bresil na we nyene akina inyuma.  (Metro) Arsenal iriko irakora uko ishoboye kugira ngo irabe ko yogumana umusatirizi wayo, umwongereza Khayon Edwards, 18, amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo 14 vyose mu murwi w'abakiri bato muri uno mwaka w'inkino, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye nayo asigaje amezi atandatu gusa. Chelsea, Leeds, Southampton, Brighton naNewcastle yose iriko irakurikiranira hagufi ingene ivyiwe biriko biragenda, hampande y'imirwi itari mike yo mu Budagi. (Mail) Newcastle United igiye kuronderera muri Bournemouth umukinyi w'inyuma, Umwongereza Steve Cook, 30, inyuma y'aho isabiwe amahera y'umurengera ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Burnley, James Tarkowski, 29. (Sun) Everton, Leicester City na Newcastle iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Suwede Pontus Jansson, 30, ni m ugihe amasezerano afitaniye na Brentford azorangira mu ci riza. (Guardian) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United umunya Portugal  Diogo Dalot, 22, yariko araronderwa na Roma ariko bivanye n'ingene agize imisi avyifatamwo neza igihe Man U itanguriye kumenyerezwa na Ralf Rangnick amahirwe ni make cane, ibi bikavugwa ko uyo murwi wa Serie A uriko uronderera ahandi, harimwo n'umwongereza Max Aarons, 21 wa Norwich hamwe n'umudagi Benjamin Henrichs, 24 wa RB Leipzig.(Corriere Dello Sport - in Italian) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Arsenal umufaransa William Saliba, 20, avuga ko atipfuza "kuvuga ibijanye" na kazoza kiwe, ni mu gihe hari ibihuha bivuga ko ashobora gutera igikumu ku masezerano yo kwinjira burundu mu murwi Marseille asanzwe akinamwo nk'intizo kuva igihe kitari gito. (RTL, via Mirror)

column2: Uwahoze ari Pope Benedict ntaco yakoze kw'ihohoterwa, biri mu cegeranyo gishasha
column3: Uwahoze ari Papa Benedicto XVI yarananiwe  no kugira ico akoze ku mabi yo guhohotera abana igihe yari akiri musenyeri mukuru i Munich , nk'uko bivugwa n'amatohoza yo mu Budagi ku bijanye na Ekereziya Katorika. Papa Benedicto, ico gihe yari azwi nka  Josef Ratzinger, yari muri ico kibanza hagati ya 1977 na 1982. Yarahakanye ko ivyo vyabaye. Ariko icegeranyo gishasha ku mabi avugwa ko yakozwe muri kahise cakozwe n'ikigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi kiragiriza uwo yahoze ari umwungere mukuru. Ihohoterwa ryarabandanije igihe yari musenyeri mukuru, nk'uko bivugwa, kandi abapatiri bagirizwa bagumye mu mabanga bari bafise mu masengero bakoramwo. Uwo yahoze ari papa, ubu afise imyaka 94, yabaye indongozi ya mbere ya Ekereziya yatanze imihoho (yeguye)  mu myaka irenga 600 mu 2013, avuga ko arushe. Kuva ico gihe, abayeho mu buzima buhwekereye i Vaticano aho azwi nka papa 'emerite'. Ico cegerenyo gishasha c'ico kigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi citwa Westpfahl Spilker Wastl  casabwe na Ekereziya Katorika. Umunyamategeko Martin Pusch  ashikiriza ico cegeranyo yavuze ati: "Habiri  muri aho vyabaye  vyakozwe  ku gihe ciwe hanyuma birenzwako amaso na reta." "Kuri vyompi, ababikoze bagumye bakora amabanga y'ubupatiri yo kwitaho abantu." Hari hamwe bivugwa ko yari azi umupatiri yagirizwa guhohotera abana b'abahungu yimuriwe muri diyoseze yiwe, ariko abandanya gukora amabanga yo kwitaho abakristu  - aho hakaba harimwo rimwe na rimwe kugendera no gushigikira  abantu mu kibano iwabo. Uwo yahoze ari Papa bivugwa ko yarungitse impapuro nyinshi z'inyishu ku bibazo vy'ico kigo, aho yerekanye ko ashigikiye iryo tohoza ariko agahakana kuba yarigeze amenya canke yanka kugira ico akoze kuri iryo hohoterwa rivugwa. Ico cegeranyo, yamara, kirimwo  inyandiko zisa n'izerekana bikomeye ko yari ari mu nama aho ico kibazo cavuzwe. Vaticano yavuze mw'itangazo ko izokwihweza ido n'ido ry'ico cegeranyo niyo camara gusohoka. Vaticano yongeyeko iti: "Nk'uko twongeye guterwa  isoni n'ukwicuza twatewe n'amabi yakorewe abana bakiri bato n'abapatiri, Icicaro Ceranda kirashikirije ko gishigikiye abahuye n'ayo mabi bose kandi kiremeza inzira yo gukingira abatarakura n'uko haba ibibanza vy'aho ata kibi bashobora gukorerwa". Icegeranyo caheruka ku mabi yakozwe muri kahise mu Budagi cerekanye ko abantu bashika 3.600 mu gihugu cose bari barakorewe amabi n'abantu bo mu mu nzego za ekereziya  hagati ya 1946 na 2014. Benshi mu bayakorewe bari abana bakiri bato kandi bakora nk'abahungu b'abakorezi kuri arutari. Ico cegeranyo gishasha cibanze ku turere twa Munich na Freising  catoye vyihariye ko nibura abantu 497 bakorewe ihohoterwa kuva mu 1945 gushika mu 2019. Uretse uwo yahoze ari papa, ico cegeranyo kiranegura abandi bantu bo muri  ekereziya, harimwo umusenyeri mukuru w'iyo ntara muri iki gihe, Cardinal Reinhard Marx. Abakoze amatohoza basanze nawe hari aho ataco yakoze ku hantu  habiri havugwa ihohoterwa. Uwo mu karidinari aramaze gusaba  Papa François gutanga imihoho mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2011 avuga ko akwiye kwumva nawe hari ico yobazwa ku "kaga" k'ihohoterwa riguma rishirwa ahabona. Papa François ariko yaranse ubusabe bwiwe bwo gutanga imihoho. Imbere yaho, papa yari yahinduye amategeko ya Vaticano ajanye n'ivyaha, aho yakajije cane aho ekereziya ihagaze ku vyerekeye ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.

column2: Burundi: Basaba ko ingingo yo gukata umushahara w'abigisha ibangira
column3: Umurwi w'igihugu wigenga ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi CNIDH usaba ko ingingo yo gukata intererano ku mishahara y'abigisha ihagarara kuko yafashwe abo vyega batagishijwe inama. Urunani rw'amasendika y'abigisha COSSESONA yarafashe ingingo y'uko kuva muri uku kwa mbere 2020 buri mwigisha, yaba uwuri muri sendika canke atarimwo, azokatwa amafaranga 500 mu ntumbero yo gushigikirana hagati y'abigisha. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu wa kabiri, Sixte Vigny Nimuraba arongoye CNIDH asaba urwo runani guhagarika igikorwa cose co gukata ayo mafaranga y'intererano. Avuga ko barindira urutonde rushasha rw'abanywanyi bazoba binjiye mu wo mugambi. Abarongoye ama sendika SYGEPEBU na SEPEDUC barapfunzwe kuva ku wa 08 z'uku kwezi inyuma y'aho biyamirije iyo ngingo ya COSSESONA bavuga ko abayirongoye bashaka kwiba abigisha izuba riva. Muri ico kiganiro, Bwana Nimuraba avuga ko umurwi CNIDH ushigikiye umugambi wo gufatana mu nda wiyumviriwe n'urunani COSSESSONA, kuko ujanye n'itegeko ry'umukuru w'igihugu rishirasho umunsi wahariwe ugufatana mu nda. Hagati aho, avuga ko CNIDH inegura amasezerano yashizweko igikumu mu Kayanza ategekanya gutaka amafaranga ku mishara y'abigisha bose, abari mu ma sendika n'abatari muri yo. Ati: "Ntiyakurikije amategeko y'igihugu hamwe n'amategeko mpuzamakungu", akavuga ko ari uguhonyanga uburenganzira bwabo. "Ingingo yafashwe yo gukata umushahara abakozi batagishijwe inama ari uguhohotera uburenganzira bwo ku mutungo wabo". Emmanuel Mashandari, icegera c'urunani COSSESONA yabwiye BBC ko ingingo yo gukata abigisha bose yafashwe kubera ko nabo nyene iyo hari ivyo basavye bakavyemererwa, nabo nyene babironkako. Ati: "Twabigize kubera y'uko na twebwe iyo tugiye gusaba ivyo dusaba, bigashika mbere n'umushahara bakawudukata kubera tuba twahagaritse akazi, ivyo tuzanye barabironkako". "Duca tugira tuti rero ko amasendika arinda arwanira ivyo arwanira hanyuma akazana kandi bakaronkako bose, no kuri iki ciyumviro co gufashanya bategerezwa kuyatanga bose". CNIDH yo ivuga ko COSSESSONA yategerezwa "kubanza kuja inama n'ingingo n'abigisha ikabasigurira inyungu zo kwinjira muri uwo mugambi imbere y'uko babakata intererano ku mishahara yabo". Bwana Nimubara ati: "N'aho CNIDH ishigikiye umugambi w'igihugu wo gushigikirana, ugukata imishahara y'abakozi biba inyuma y'uko abantu bagishijwe inama kandi bikagaragarira mu rwandiko ruriko umukono nk'uko bigenda mu ntererano zindi zitangwa mu ma sendika". "Kireste uburenganzira leta ihabwa n'amategeko agenga igihugu n'ibindi bimwe bimwe bishobora kurekurwa n'ayo mategeko, umushahara nta n'umwe ashobora kuwihagira". Bwana Mashandari aragiriza Antoine Manuma arongoye SYGEPEBU hamwe na Gérard Niyongabo arongoye SEPEDUC ko bifatiye mu gahanga abarongoye COSSESONA mu kubatuka baciye ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. CNIDH  iranegura iyo ngendo, igahamagarira ahubwo abegwa n'ayo matati gushira imbere ibiganiro aho kwama batyozanya. Isaba ko iyo ngingo yo gukata amahera ku mishahara iba irahagaze kugira abigisha bavyiyumvamwo babanza kuvyiyemeza bo nyene ubwabo, batarinze guterwa ubwoba. Isaba kandi igipolisi kurekura "abari mu mashirahamwe aharanira inyungu z'abigisha bapfunzwe bariko baharanira amateka yabo kugira ngo hashirwe imbere umwumvikano hagati y'abari mu matati". Iyo ngingo yo gukata amafaranga yafashwe inyuma y'ayandi mafaranga yakaswe ku mishahara y'abigisha mu 2017 na 2019. Bwana Nimuraba asaba urunani COSSESONA kwerekana ku mugaragaro ingene ayo mafaranga yakoreshejwe kugira ngo buri mwigisha wese abikeneye abimenye. Ati: "Ivyo vyotuma haba umuco no mu kwumvisha abigisha ikoreshwa ryiza ry'amafaranga bakaswe". COSSESONA (Coalition Spéciale des Syndicats des Enseignants pour la Solidarité Nationale) ni urunani rw'amasendika atandukanye y'abigisha rwatangujwe mu 2017.

column2: FAO: Ata mafaranga abonetse indege zo kurwanya inzige zirahagarara
column3: Ishami rya ONU rikurikirana uburimyi n'ivyo kurya kw'isi FAO riragabisha ko indege zaryo zose zafasha mu kurwanya inzige zongeye gutera muri Afrika y'ubuseruko zishobora kudasubira gukora hamwe ritoronka amafaranga angana na miriyoni 38 z'ama dolari ($38 million). Izo nzige zitema zigatongora imirima zongeye gutera muri Ethiopia, Kenya na Somalia aho zigeramiye imibereho y'abarimyi n'abarozi basanzwe bahanzwe n'ingaruka z'izikiza ca Covid-19 n'imyuzure muri ako karere. Ku mwihwezo wa vuba, FAO isanga izo nzige zimaze gutera mu ntara 11  muri Kenya kandi ko ziriko zitera zija mu ntara zo kw'ibahari z'ico gihugu hamwe no muri Tanzania. Zimaze kwonona kandi imirima muri Ethiopia na Somalia uyu mwaka. Ribaye irya  gatatu  muri aka karere hatera inzige mu kiringo c'umwaka umwe. Inzige zateye: Aho ziva, ibyo zangiza, uko zirwanywa...ibyo ukeneye kumenya Icyorezo cy'inzige cyageze muri Uganda na Tanzania FAO iragabisha ko hagiye kuba ikindi gitero c'inzige Izo nzige nshasha zafashijwe gushwara akarere n'igihuhusi Gati  catumye mu minsi mike hagwa imvura ingana n'iyoguye mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri. Vyatumye inzige zoroherwa mu kugwirirana. Umuhuzabikorwa w'ibikorwa vyihuta muri FAO muri Somalia, Ezana Kassa, avuga ati: "Ingaruka n'uko uburimyi n'ubworozi bihungabana cane mu gihugu kidasanganywe amaragamo mu vyerekeye ivyo kurya'' Iryo shami rya ONU rivuga ko gupompa imiti mu kirere no hasi , vyakozwe kuva izo nzige ziteye ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2020, vyari vyatumye hakizwa ibitegwa n'ibitungwa biciye amafaranga aharugwa muri miriyaridi 1.2 z'ama dolari. "Aho inzige zaheruka gutera ku rugero rusa n'uru rw'ubu, mu karere ka Sahel, vyasavye imyaka ibiri n'amafaranga arenga miriyoni 500 z'ama dolari kugira zishobore gutuzwa. Iki gitero kirakomeye gusumba, ariko ibihugu vy'a Afrika y'ubuseruko bisa n'ibizogitsinda-gusa ni bitange amafaranga y'igitoro kugira indege zigume zikora'',  bivugwa n'icegera c'umuyobozi mukuru wa FAO Laurent Thomas.

column2: Umuganga atagira imiti yo kuvura abarwayi biwe
column3: D﻿amian Zane B﻿BC News Ikena ry’imiti y’ibanze ririca abarwayi mu ntara ya  Tigray  mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia, ubu imaze amezi 23 mu ntambara kandi ikaba yugaranywe ata kintu gishobora kwinjirayo. Impande zompi zarumvikanye kwitaba ibiganiro vy’amahoro muri Afrika y’Epfo, kandi umuganga atakamba asaba ko akaga kugarije abantu koja mu bibazo vya mbere vyo kwiga no gutorera inyishu. Muganga Fasika Amdeslasie avuga nk’uko umenga ntaco bimubwiye, ariko ivyo avuga biteye akoba. “Dukenye imiti yo gutimbisha (gutera ikinya), dukenye serumu, ntihagira antibiotique, niho rero ububona indwara zikomera, mu nyuma abarwayi bagapfa ata gitabara - uzinze amaboko”. Uwo muganga ivyo yabivuze ahamagawe kuri Whatsapp kuri internet ya satellite, imbonekarimwe ku murwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle. Abarwayi ntibagira uko bagira, ariko n’abaganga nico kimwe. Yamara, ariko arakuyagira ingaruka z’intambara ku gisata c’amagara y’abantu aho muri Tigray, Muganga Fasika, akora ku bitaro bikuru vya Ayder ku murwa mukuru Mekelle, mu maso ntiwomenya ko ariko aravuga ibintu bibabaje. Mu kiringo c’imyaka ibiri iheze, Tigray ntizi ibibera ahandi kw’isi. Intambara yatanguye muri Munyonyo (11) mu  2020 igihe ingabo za reta ya Ethiopia zarondera kwaka ubutegetsi bw’iyo ntara umugambwe TPLF (Tigray People’s Liberation Front). Intara ya Tigray yaciye yugaranwa rwose igihe TPLF yatunganya igitero ikisubiza igice kinini c'iyo ntara muri Ruheshi mu 2021. Nta bintu bishobora kwinjira, banki zarahagaze, terefone nazo ziracibwa ku buryo bidashoboka guhamagara umuntu muri iyo ntara. ONU igereranya ko abantu bangana na miriyoni 5.4 – hafi batatu kuri bane mu bantu bose baba muri Tigray – bakeneye imfashanyo y’ivyo kurya kuko intambara yahungabanije uruhererakane rw’ivyo kurya. N’abarwayi ntagahengwe bagirirwa, n’ubwo bo ata ruhara bafise mu rugamba. Hari imiti n’ibikoresho nkoramutima vyazanwe n’ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara kw’isi hamwe na CICR – ariko iza ryayo ryagiye riba ahandi ntiribe, noneho ibintu birahagarra rwose igihe intanbara zasubira kwaduka muri Myandagaro (8), inyuma y’agahengwe k’amezi atanu. Dr Fasika  yabwiye ikiganiro ca BBC Newsday ati: “Nta miti y’abarwayi bacu dufise, ntitugira ibikoresho vyo kubaga, nta ncanco (inkingo) dufise zo gukingira abana,  nta insuline dufise yo guha abarwaye diabete.” “Abarwayi bose nta gahengwe. Tubabwira gusubira imuhira iwabo tutabavuye.” Imiti yo kuvura abarwaye cancer ntiboneka namba, kandi ntibashobora kugirirwa ‘radiotherapie’ kuko imashini yo kubikora iri ku murwa mpuzantaray, Addis Ababa. Kugendayo ntibishoboka. “Muri make, abarwayi bacu bategerezwa gupfa,” nk’uko bivugwa n’uwo muganga w’imyaka 41 yigeze kuba umukuru w’ishure ry’ubuganga. Abavuzi baguma baraba aho abarwaye amafyigo amagara yabo aguma yunyuka kuko imiti yo gukora dialyse ija iraboneka yongera ibura. Ku bwa Muganga Fasika, “Imiti ya nyuma yaje muri Ruheshi (6),  kuva muri Myandagaro (8) nta kintu na kimwe casubiye kwinjira none ubu ibikoresho vyaduheranye ku barwayi  25 dufise”. Avuga ko abarwayi b’amafyigo 90 bapfuye “bari imbere y’abaganga” akibaza ibigiye gushikira abo 25 basigaye. Ku bijanye no gupima, icumba co gupima (laboratoire) ntikigira imiti ikenewe mu gupima, akenshi abaganga bakaba batamenya neza ingorane umurwayi aba afise. Kuri ivyo vyose hiyongerako ingorane z’umuyagankuba ukunda gucikagurika mu gihe ata bitoro bihari vyo gushira mu moteri zitanga umuyagankuba. Bisigura ko ibitaro bishobora kumara iminsi biri mu kizime. Muri urwo rusobekerane rw’ingorane we n’abo bakorana barimwo, ijwi rya Muganga Fasika ntiriserura uburemere bw’ivyo ariko aravuga. ”Naraheze ibishobisho, bisigaye ari ubuzima bwa minsi yose, ndiko mvuga ivyo mbamwo ku munsi ku munsi. ”Turirinda gutwarwa n’ibishobisho. Tuzomenya umutwaro twiremetse umunsi twavuye  muri ibi. Ubundi ni kamere k’umuntu ko kwirwanako kutavyibaza, ivyo urabireka ugakora ivyo ushoboye gukora.” Ariko abaganga n’abaforoma, co kimwe n’abakozi ba reta, bahanganye no kuba badahembwa kuva mu kwezi kwa Rusama (5). Muganga Fasika arungikirwa amafaranga n’abagenzi n’incuti bari mu mahanga ariko, ivyo bitwara amafaranga menshi kuko abayavunja bakurako menshi kuko bategerezwa kuyinjiza mu mpisho muri Tigray. Muganga Fasika avuga ko “ibi bitaro ari ubuzima bwanje”, agasigura ikimutera kubandanya akora n’aho ahanzwe n’ibibazo vyinshi. “Umwuga uraguhamagara. Iyo ushoboye kugenda ukayagisha abarwayi ukabaha impanuro hanyuma ugakora ivyo ushoboye, ico nico kintu gihambaye. Si jewe gusa, n’abandi bose dukorana ngaha.” Ku kibazo c’ibiganiro bishobora kuba hagati ya reta mpuzantara na TPLF, Muganga Fasika ntashaka kuvuga poritike. Ariko arajwe ishinga n’uko mu gihe ibiganiro ari igikorwa ca poritike, bazoguma mu ngorane mu gihe vyo bishobora kumara igihe imbere y’uko hari ico bishikako. “Ibiganiro bishobora gufata umwanya. Ariko ubuzima bwacu, ubuzima bw’abana, ubuzima bw’abarwayi uwo mwanya ntawo bufise. Nifuza rero ko vyobanza ku kaga kugarije abantu.

column2: Umushikiranganji w’ikigega wa Afrika y’Epfo asaba ko urucuruza rw’urumogi rwemerwa n’amategeko
column3: Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca leta ya Afrika y'Epfo,  Tito Mboweni, asaba leta y'ico gihugu ko urucuruza rw'urumogi rwemerwa n'amategeko kugira ngo amakori yiyongere. Yatangaje ivyo aciye ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, aho yamenyesheje ko ico kibazo azogishikiriza mu nama y'abashikiranganji. Kuri urwo rubuga rwiwe, yashizeko n'isanamu yerekana ingene ico giterwa gitera gikura. Amategeko ya Afrika y'Epfo yari asanzwe avuga ko ukugurisha urumogi, uko rwoba rungana kwose biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Hagati aho, mu mwaka wa 2017, ico gihugu caremereye abantu gukoresha urumogi mu mihana iwabo, ariko nticarekuye kururima canke kurugurisha. Mu bihugu vyinshi vya Afrika, harimwo n'u Burundi n'u Rwanda, kurima, gukoresha canke kudandaza urumogi ntivyemewe n'amategeko kubera rufatwa nk'ikiyayuramutwe. Hagati aho, hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe birukoresha ku rugero runini. Muri ivyo harimwo igihugu ca Lesotho gisanzwe gikikujwe na Afrika y'Epfo, aho urumogi rurimwa ku rugero runini cane, rukaba rwemewe mu vyo ubuvuzi gusa. Mu myaka ya 2000, amakuru yavuga ko ibice 70% vy'urumogi rwagurishwa muri Afrika y'Epfo rwava muri ico gihugu ca Lesotho. Abarimyi bo mu gihugu ca Lesotho basanzwe barima urumogi mu ntumbero yo kurukoresha mu mihana iwabo, hamwe no kurugurisha hanze kubera ubukene basanzwe babamwo. Usanga abanyagihugu bato bato barima urumogi bakarurimana n'ibindi biterwa nk'ibigori kugira ngo barushore muri Afrika y'Epfo. Igihugu ca Zimbabwe naco nyene giherutse kwemera ko urumogi rushobora kurimwa rukimburwa muri ico gihugu, ni inyuma y'aho cemereye ikoreshwa ryarwo muvyo ubuvuzi n'ubushakashatsi mu 2018. Zambia yoyo iherutse gutangaza ko ubu vyemewe n'amategeko gutunganya urumogi no kururungika mu mahanga ku mpamvu z'urudandaza n'ubuvuzi. Leya y'ico gihugu yafashe ico cemezo mu nama yayo yabaye ku wa 04 z'ukwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze nk'uko vyatangajwe na Dora Siliya avugira leta. Ikindi gihugu gikoresha urumogi ku rugero runini cane ni Korea y'Uburaruko, aho mbere n'amashirahamwe ya reta aja kurugurisha mu bindi bihugu kugira baronke amahera y'agaciro. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko bitazwi neza ko hoba hariho amategeko abuza ikoreshwa ry'urumogi, kandi ico gihugu ntikibona ko ikoreshwa ry'urumogi ari ukurenga ku mategeko.

column2: Umusunikano muri Israel: Ababibonye baravuga ingene abantu 'batererwa mu kirere'
column3: Abantu bari ahabereye umusunikano waguyemwo abantu benshi mu rugendo rw'idini baravuga ingene ''batwawe n'umukuba w'abantu, abandi nabo batererwa mu kirere". Nibura abantu 44 bapfuye abandi benshi barakomereka mu rugendo rwo guhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Lag B'Omer ku mucamo w'umusozi Meron. Igiporisi cabwiye ikinyamakuru Haaretz ko uwo musunikano wabaye kubera  bamwe mu bari muri urwo rugendo  banyereye ku ngazi, bituma abandi batemba. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari bitavye urwo rugendo rweranda. Umugabo yatanze izina ryiwe nka David yavuze ko yari yinjiye kuraba ingene batsa igicaniro/icoto bunonyene haza ''umupfunda uvuye hanze". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Ynet ati: ''Batumijuye. Abantu banuzwe mu kirere - abandi  barahonyorwa'' ''Hari umwana yagumye yumiye ku kuguru kwanje, agwanira ubuzima. Twarindiriye gutabarwa iminota 15-20 muri uwo musunikano uteye ubwoba". Umwe mu barokotse yajanywe mu bitaro yabwiye television ya reta  Kan ati "Nta n'umwe yari azi ico ari bukore". "Intango n'ukubera abantu benshi cane. Hejuru yanje hari abantu benshi. Nanje nari ndamye hejuru y'uwundi atari agishobora guhema. Hari amaborogo, urudubi. Nabonye abana bari munsi yanje. Icanciye mu mutwe gusa kwari uko umwana wanje atoba impfuvyi". Uwundi yari ahari yavuze ko abantu bazungazunga iburyo n'ibubamfu. ''Inyuma y'iminota 20 nibaza ko abantu bari batanguye kutabasha guhumeka neza gutyo barondera gusohoka, ariko nta n'umwe yashoboye gusohoka. Munsi yanje hari abanrtu batari bagihema. Hari amaborogo menshi y'abavuga ngo "birasanse ko mpema". Uwundi yari ahari, Shlomo Katz,  yavuze ko yari arindiriye abagenzi biwe aca abona abaforoma biruka kandi bongera bagerageza  guhembura abana. Ati: "Ambulance zaguma zinjira zongera zisohoka". Dov Maisel, akora mu rwego rw'abatabara vyihuta rwa United Hatzalah Emergency Services yavuze ko abantu bari ''barundanyeko nk'ipaki y'ikarata''. Avuga ko abakora mu nzego zo gutabara nabo vyabaye ngombwa ko bahabwa inama zo kudahahamuka. Dov Maisel yagize ati: "Abantu benshi bakomeretse., abandi bapfuye ngaha. Abakorerabushake mubona ngaho bakoranijwe bakorerwa inama yo kubafasha kudahahamuka, - kuko babonye ibintu bigoye" Umwe mu bari bahari  yafashije abakomeretse yabwiye Haaretz ati: "Nari nicicaye ngira mfungure nca numva amaborogo. Twaciye twiruka gufasha hanyuma tubona imivyimba. Ubwa mbere bari nka 10, none ubu ni benshi".

column2: ‘Vyanka vyakunda’ Mohamed Salah azoguma muri Liverpool
column3: Umusatirizi wa  Liverpool Mohamed Salah avuga ko "ivyo ari vyo vyose" mu mwaka w'inkino uza azoba ari muri Liverpool, ariko ko adashaka kujanwa mu mpari z'amasezerano mashasha. Amasezerano ya Salah azorangira muri Ruheshi (6) 2023, ibituma haduka amajambo menshi ko ashobora kugurishwa mu gihe atotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha kuko inyuma y'umwaka yoca yigira ahandi ata rufaranga na rumwe aguzwe. Abajijwe kuri kazoza kiwe imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma rwa Ligue des Champions/Champions League ku wa gatandatu, avuga ati: "Si nshaka kuvuga kuri ibi bintu. "Ico nipfuza ni ukubona Hendo [Jordan Henderson] ateruye igikombe". Uyu musatirizi w'umunyamisiri w'imyaka 29 avuga kandi ati: "Sinitaho ivy'amasezerano ubu. Si nshaka kwigungirako. "Ivyo ari vyo vyose ndacari ng'aha mu mwaka uza w'inkino". Mugenziwe Sadio Mane, wewe avuga ko azoshikiriza ingingo ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe inyuma y'urukino rwa nyuma na  Real Madrid i Paris. Uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Sénégal  amaze kwinjiriza ibitsindo 120 mu nkino 268 amaze gukinira Liverpool, na we nyene mu kwa gatandatu yinjira mu mezi 12 ya nyuma y'amasezerano yiwe. Yabwiye imboneshakure Sky Sports News ati: "Iki kibazo [kuri kazoza kanje] nzocishura inyuma ya Champions League. Nimba nzoguma aha canke ntazoguma aha, nzovyishura inyuma ya Champions League". Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp ntabona ko ibizova mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu ari rwo fatiro ku bakinyi bamwe bamwe mu gufata ingingo yo kwongereza amasezerano canke kuyahagarika. Ati: "Oya, oya na gato. None, mu gihe twotsinda, boca bashaka kugenda ? Turiko turaganira n'abakinyi bose, ubu si igihe co kuvuga ibijanye n'ivyavuye muri ibi biganiro. Nta n'umwe azi ivyo turiko turategura. "Gusa nta mwanya uhari, buri misi itatu turakina. Abakinyi barabizi, turabizi, rimwe na rimwe turahuza, ikindi gihe ntiduhuze, hanyuma rero tugakorera hamwe. "Turazinanye kuva kera". Salah yinjiye muri Liverpool avuye muri Roma mu 2017 akaba amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo 156 mu nkino 253 amaze gukinira Liverpool. Yarafashije uyu murwi gutsindira ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza (Premier League) mu 2019-2020, igikombe c'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League) mu 2019, igikombe FA Cup hamwe n'igikombe c'ihiganwa (League Cup) uno mwaka w'inkino, igikombe c'isi yose gihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere  (FIFA Club World Cup)  be n'igikombe ca Uefa Super Cup mu kiringo amaze muri Liverpool. Mu kwa gatatu, Klopp yavuze ko Salah ari we wenyene azofata ingingo ku vyerekeye  gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha. Uyu musatirizi yahoze akinira Chelsea aherutse kuvuga ko ashaka kuguma muri Liverpool, ariko ko kazoza kiwe kari mu minwe y'uyu murwi kandi ko atariko arasaba "ibitagenda". Ku wa Mungu, Liverpool yarangije ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza isumbijwe inota rimwe ritarenga ntirirenguke na Manhester City, ivyarangije ibizigizigi bari bafise vyo gutsindira ibikombe bine mu mwaka w'inkino umwe, ibitarigera bibaho mu Bwongereza. Urukino rwo ku wa gatandatu ruzoyihuza na Real Madrid i Paris mu Bufaransa ruzokwibutsa urundi rwa Champions League rwo mu 2018 aho uyo murwi wo muri Espagne watsinze 3-1, Salah akaba atarurangije kubera yavunitse mu gice ca mbere agonganye na Sergio Ramos mu buryo bwateje impari nyinshi. Salah yongerako ati: "Numva mfise ishaka, ishaka ryinshi cane, inyuma y'ivyabaye igihe giheze [mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa 2018], kandi ku wa Mungu - bose bafise ishaka kuri iki". "Iki turakirwanira kandi bose barabishashaye".

column2: Russia Vs US: aba 'hackers' bakoze ikindi gitero c'imigera ku nyabwonko z'abagiraneza - Microsoft
column3: Ikompanyi ihingura inyabwonko Microsoft, ivuga ko habaye ikindi gico c'ibitero vy'abasuma bo ku nyabwonko (hackers) b'abarusiya bakoresha imigera ku nyabwonko z'amashirahamwe yegamiye reta n'amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu mu bihugu 24, cane cane muri Reta zunze Ubumwe za amerika. Microsoft ivuga ko amakonte muravyo (email accounts) ashika 3000 mu mashirahamwe atandukanye arenga 150 ari yo yatewe muri ino ndwi turimwo. Microsoft yagiriza abakoze vya bitero vyo mu mwaka uheze kuri kompanyi SolarWinds, aho urwego rw'Uburusiya (SVR) rujejwe igendereza rwagirijwe, ko ari rwo rwabikoze. Uburusiya burahakana ibi bitero vyompi. Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu w'Uburusiya) ivuga ko itazi ivy'ibi bitero bishasha, igasaba iyi kompanyi ya Amerika gutanga izindi nsiguro, harimwo ingene yagiriza Uburusiya. Mu nkuru yacishije ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi ku wa kane, Microsoft yavuze ko ibi bitero bishasha vyakozwe ku nzego za reta zijejwe imigenderanire n'amakungu mu gikorwa co "kwegeranya c'igendereza". Ivuga ko n'imiburiburi ica kane c'amashirahamwe yatewe afise uruhara mu bijanye n'ibikorwa mpuzamakungu vy'iterambere, ubutabazi hamwe n'agateka ka zina muntu. Mu gihe hafi yose ari muri Amerika, aya mashirahamwe yatewe ni ayo mu bihugu n'imiburiburi 24. Nk'uko Microsoft ibivuga, Nobelium, umurwi ukomoka mu Burusiya, niwo wakoze ibitero vyo muri ino ndwi mu kwinjira muri konte ya email ikoreshwa n'ishirahamwe rya reta ya Amerika rijejwe ugufashanya, USAID. Abo ba hackers baciye barungika ubutumwa muravyo (emails) busa nk'uko umengo ni ubw'ukuri, ariko bukaba bufise link/lien, uyifyonzeko ica yinjiza umugera mubi wiba amakuru yose ari mu nyabwonko yawe, ukongera ugaca utera imigera mu zindi nyabwonko zose ziri ku murongo umwe na rwawe (network/réseau). Umuvugizi w'urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe gukingira umutekano w'inyabwonko (Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency, Cisa) yabwiye ikinyamakuru CBS News  ko abategetsi bari bamenye iki gitero kandi ko bariko baragerageza "gutahura neza ingaruka zaco no gufasha abo bose bashobora kuba baratewe". Microsoft ivuga ko imigera y'ivyo bitero vyose ku bakiriya bayo yazibiwe mu buryo bwikora (Automatiquement). Ntibiramenyekana neza igitigiri c'izoba zarashoboye kwinjirwa n'iyo migera. Mu mwaka uheze, aba hackers barakoresheje ikompanyi ya Amerika, SolarWinds' Orion, bavogera ibisata vya reta ya Amerika, amakompanyi ategamiye reta hafi 100 hamwe n'amashirahamwe makeya y'Ubwongereza. Vyagiye kurangira abakiriya hafi 18.000 binjije iyi logiciel y'umugera. Amerika n'Ubwongereza bwagirije ikigo SVR ko ari co cari cakoze iki gitero. Kirahakana ivyo cagirizwa.

column2: Brexit: Boris Johnson arashima amasezerano y'ubudandaji hagati ya UK na EU
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya, EU, n'Ubwongereza bashitse ku masezerano azogenga ubudandaji inyuma ya Brexit, aje kurangiza amezi yo kutumvikana ku burenganzira bwo kuroba n'amategeko agenga ubudandaji. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku biro iwe, Boris Johnson yagize ati:"Twasubiranye ubwigenge ku mategeko yaco hamwe na kazoza kacu." Umushikiranganji wa mbere yongeyeko ko, n'aho ibiganiro "vyari bigoye" ari "amasezerano meza ku Buraya bwose" azotanga akazi n'iterambere. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe rya Buraya Ursula Von der Leyen yavuze ko ari amasezerano "ata ho yegamiye". Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru I Bruxelles, umukuru w'akanama k'ubumwe bwa Buraya yavuze ati:"Rwari urugendo rurerure rurimwo ibihuhusi ariko twaronse amasezerano meza twerekana. "Ni nyayo, nta ho yegamiye, kandi n'ikintu ciza cari gikwiriye gukorwa ku mpande zose." Yongeyeko ko ubu ari "igihe co kwibagira kahise tukaraba muri kazoza" kandi ko Ubwongereza "buguma ari ncuti nyakuri". Yavuze ko hazoba ikiringo mfatakibanza c'imyaka itanu n'igice mu bakora mu gisata c'uburovyi. Hanyuma imigenderanire izobandanya ku bibazo bijanye n'ihindukagurika ry'ibihe, amasoko ntanganguvu, umutekano hamwe no mu gutwara abantu n'ibintu. Mw'itangazo, ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere mu Bwongereza bigira biti:"Turagarukanye amahera yacu, imbibe, amategeko, ubudandaji hamwe n'amazi turobamwo," Risubiramwo icivugo ca Johnson co kwiyamamaza mu matora, ryongeyeko  "Brexit iragiye mu bikorwa". Johnson yashize kuri Twitter ifoto yiwe ariko aramwenyura, yashize intoke z'ibikumu hejuru. Mu kiganiro yatanze, yavuze:"Turarangije amasezerano akomeye aciye imiriyaridi 668 y'amapawundi ku mwaka. "Amasezerano yumvikana ameze nk'aya Canada hagati y'Ubwongereza na EU. Amasezerano azokingira ubuzi muri iki  gihugu cose, azotuma ibidandazwa vyo mu Bwongereza bigurishwa ata makori, ata n'ibice bitanzwe kw'isoko rya Buraya. "Amasezerano azoha uburenganzira amakompanyi gukorana n'ibihugu vy'incuti vy'i Buraya."

column2: DR Congo: Umuririmvyikazi rurangiranwa Tshiala Muana  yasandavye ku myaka 64
column3: Umuririmvyi akongera akaba n'umutamvyi rurangiranwa wa Congo Tshala Muana yasandavye ku myaka 64, nk'uko bivugwa n’uwumufasha akongera akaba n’umugenzi wiwe, Claude Mashala. Inkuru y’urupfu rwiwe yasohorewe ku rubuga rwa Facebook rwa Claude Mashala, aho yanditse avuga ati: «Mu gatondo ka kare, Imana rugira vyose yafashe ingingo yo guhamagara Tshala Muana. "Imana ihabwe icubahiro ku bihe vyiza Tshala Muana yaduhaye kuri ino si. Igire n’amahoro Mamu». Mu kwa gatandatu 2020, haradutse igihuha cavuga ngo yapfuye, ariko ntivyari vyo, yari arajwe mu bitaro kubera indwara y’imitsi ifatira mu bwonko. Élisabeth Tshala Muana Muidikay (yavutse ku wa 13 Rusama [5] 1958), asanzwe azwi kw’izina rya Tshala Muana yari umunyamuziki azwi cane muri Repubulika y’intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, yandika indirimbo akongera agatamba. Afatwa nk’ “Umwamikazi wa Mutuashi", umudiho w’umuziki n’intambo vyo mu ntara ya Kasai asanzwe avukamwo, iri hagati mu gihugu. Akunzwe kwitwa "Mamu National”, ni ukuvuga nyina w’igihugu. Azwi cane ku ndirimbo zitari nke nka "Karibu Yangu", « Malu », «  Tshianza », « Tshibola »  n’izindi nyinshi. Yarazungurutse mu bihugu bitari bike, atsindira ubushimwe butari buke haba mu gihugu, ku rwego rw’umugabane canke ku rwego mpuzamakungu, akaba yashoboye gusohora inkurikirane (albums) zirenga 20. Umuziki wiwe urumvikana mw’ireresi y’umuziki izwi cane yo mu 1987 muri Congo  La Vie est Belle na Aya of Yop City. Yari azwi ko ashigikiye uwahoze ari umukuru w’ico gihugu Joseph Kabila n’umugambwe wiwe - Parti du peuple pour la reconstruction et la démocratie (PPRD). Mu 2020 yarahagaritswe na reta ya Perezida Félix Tshisekedi bikavugwa ko hari kubera indirimbo yiwe "Ingratitude" yavugwa ko yanegura umutegetsi atavuzwemwo izina.

column2: Papa Francis yemeye ko yananiwe kwihangana akubita urushi umukenyezi yariko amukwega
column3: Papa Francis yasavye imbabazi  inyuma y'aho akubitiye urushi ku kuboko umwe mu bakirisu bari mu rugendo rweranda bakoraniye ku kibanza citiriwe umweranda Petero i Roma. Papa yariko aramutsa abana n'abandi bari bakoraniye muri ico kibanza hanyuma agize ngo aragiye, umukenyezi umwe muri bo amukwega ukuboko n'inguvu nyinshi gushika n'aho ahakwa kumugwisha hasi. Ivyo vyatumye Papa ahindukira agerageza kumwikura vyanka, aca amukubita urushi ku kuboko ashavuye abona kumurekura. Niho mu nyuma Papa yemera ko vyanse ko yihangana aremera ko nawe nyene acumura nk'ikiremwamuntu nk'abandi. Ati: "Kenshi biranka ko twihangana. Naje birashobora kunshikira. Nico gituma nsavye imbabazi ku vyashitse nijoro". Ivyo vyatangaje benshi kuko imbere y'aho, mu gihe yashikiriza ijambo ry'ukwipfuriza umwaka mushasha abakirisu, yariyamirije ihohotera rikorerwa abakenyezi.

column2: South Africa: Intango yo kurondera kurekurwa vy'agateganyo kwa Oscar Pistorius
column3: Umunonotse w'umunye Afrika y'Epfo Oscar Pistorius, ari mw'ibohero azira kwica umukunzi wiwe Reeva Steenkamp, ashobora guhura n'abavyeyi biwe vuba nk'imwe mu nzira yo kumurekura vy'agateganyo nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi. Arashobora kurekurwa inyuma yo kumara igice c'umunyororo yahanishijwe. Ariko ategerezwa ubwa mbere kugira icitwa "ubutungane bunywanisha" (Ugusubira kuvugana hagati ya Pistorius n'umuryango wa Reeva Steenkamp). Pistorius yishe Steenkamp mu 2013 avuga ko yamwihenzeko yibaza ko ari igisuma muhira iwe ku mugwa mukuru Pretoria. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 34 yarashe incuro zine mu muryango wugaye w'akazu ka surwumwe. Mu 2014, igihe hasozerwa urwo rubanza rwakurikiwe n'isi yose, yari yaciriwe igihano co gupfungwa imyaka itanu ahamwe n'icaha co kwica umuntu atabigambiriye. Ariko mu 2015, muri sentare y'iyungururizo, yahamijwe icaha co kwica, igihano gica gishika ku myaka 13 n'amezi atanu. Mw'itangazo, igisata ca Afrika y'Epfo kijejwe amabohero cavuze ko kiriko kiravugana n'umuryango wa Steenkamp kuvyerekeye uwo mubonano. Basigura kubikenewe gukorwa imbere yo kurekurwa vy'agateganyo, iryo tangazo rivuga ko abakoze icaha bategerezwa "kwemera no kwemanga ivyo bakoze". Nk'intambwe y'ubutungane bunywanisha, hategerezwa kuba "akaryo kuri izo mpande zibiri ko gusubiza hamwe canke ko gusaba ikigongwe". Umushingwamanza w'umuryango wa Steenkamp, Tania Koen, yabwiye radio y'igihugu SABC, ko "ashobora kuja muri ico kiganiro kizohuza uwakoze icaha n'uwagikorewe". Yongeyeko ati:"June [Steenkamp, nyina wa Reeva], yagumye avuga ko yamaze kubabarira Oscar, ariko ko bidasigura ko adategerezwa guhanirwa ivyo yakoze... Barry [Steenkamp, se wa Reeva] aracafise imitima ibiri, ariko n'ibintu ategerezwa kuzogira ico abivuzeko ku mwanya ukwiriye." "Igikomere, n'aho haheze igihe kinini, kiracasamwe". Kuba ushobora kuronswa ikigongwe c'agateganyo ntibisigura ko ubifitiye uburenganzira, kandi ntibinasigura ko wamaze kukironka, nk'uko bivugwa n'uwo mushingwamanza. Abategetsi bategerezwa kandi kwihweza ibindi vyegeranyo vyanditswe n'abarongoye ibohero co kimwe n'izindi nzobere. Ntiharanamenyekana ryari igikorwa co gushaka kumurekura vy'agateganyo kizotangura. Biribazwa ko bitazoshika mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu 2023, ariko umuryango wa Steenkamp "warababajwe unagwa no mu gahundwe" kuba ashobora kuronka ikigongwe c'agateganyo, nk'uko bivugwa na Koen. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Pumza Fihlani ari i Johannesburg avuga ko, mu gihe yohabwa ico kigongwe, Pistorius ashobora kumara igipfungo gisigaye ari muhira iwe ariko akazoza aritaba abategetsi b'ibohero buri gihe. Imbere y'ubwo bwicanyi, Pistorius yari yabaye umuntu rurangiranwa nk'umunonotsi agendana ubumuga yatwaye umudari w'inzahabu. Mu 2012, yabaye umuntu wa mbere yaciwe amaguru yahiganywe mu kwiruka mu nkino za olempike akoresheje amaguru y'amakorano. Amaguru yiwe yaciriwe musi y'amavi afise amezi 11 kubera yari yavutse hatarimwo amagufa. Iduga n'ikoroka rya Oscar Pistorius

column2: Ethiopia: Inyeshamba za Tigray ziti 'emera ubutegetsi bwacu canke tubandanya intambara'
column3: Inyeshamba z'intara ya Tigray muri Ethiopia zivuga ko ubutegetsi bwazo butegerezwa kubanza kwemerwa imbere y'uko zemera guhagarika intambara. Mu bindi vyinshi zisaba, zivuga kandi ko ingabo za Eritrea zitegerezwa kubanza kuva mu gihugu. Ubutegetsi bwa Addis Abeba buherutse gutangaza ko buhagaritse intambara ku ruhande rwabwo, inyuma y'aho izi nyeshamba zifatiye igice kinini c'iyi ntara, ingabo z'igihugu nazo zikayanyaga.
