Iyi ntambara imaze amezi umunani hagati y'izi nyeshamba n'ingabo za reta imaze guhitana ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyagihugu. Ishirahamwe ONU rimenyesha ko abarenga imiriyoni zibiri bataye izabo, nayo abantu 400.000 bakaba bahanzwe na kigoyi gishobora gutera abarenga imiriyoni 1.8. Inyeshamba z'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) zabanje kuvuga ko ivyo guhagarika intambara vyatangajwe na reta ya Ethiopia ari "ukujajura" zica ziyemeza kwirukana "abansi" bazo muri iyo ntara. Muri bo harimwo ingabo za Eritrea hamwe n'ingabo za Ethiopia ziva mu ntara ya Amhara iri mu bumanuko bwa Tigray. Ariko basohoye urutonde rw'ibindi vyinshi bisabwa kugira ngo bemere guhagarika intambara, harimwo gukora amatohoza ku vyaha vyo mu ntambara bivugwa, gutanga imfashanyo z'ubutabazi hamwe no gusanura ibintu shingiro vyo mu buzima bwa misi yose, harimwo umuyagankuba. Ejo ku wa Mungu, "reta ya Tigray" yasohoye itangazo rivuga riti: "Mu gihe tuzoba twijejwe neza ko umutekano w'abanyagihugu utazohungabanywa n'igitero ca kabiri, twemeye guhagarika intambara". Umunyamakuru wa BBC World Service Africa Will Ross avuga ko mu gihe reta ya Addis Ababa yoramuka yemeye ibi bisabwa n'inyeshamba ko ubutegetsi bwazo bubanza kwemerwa, yoba yerekanye neza ko yatsinzwe intambara kandi ko yananiwe no kwikurako umwansi wayo. Avuga ko amakungu abandanya atera akamo ko intambara zihagarara kugira ngo imiriyoni z'abantu basinzikajwe n'intambara bashobore kuronswa imfashanyo, ariko ko bisabwa ko impande zompi zibanza kwumvikana neza kugira ngo amahoro agaruke. Iyi ntambara yatanguye ku wa 04 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe umwaka uheze, igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed agomorera ingabo za reta ku ngabo z'intara ya Tigray. Ico gihe yatangaje ko yafashe iyo ngingo inyuma y'igitero cakozwe ku kirindiro c'igisirikare ca reta muri iyo ntara. Ibintu vyagiye kuyangara haciye amezi atari make hari icuka kibi hagati ya reta ya Abiy n'abategetsi ba TPLF. Inyuma y'intsinzi zitari nke cagiye kigira harimwo ugufata umugwa mukuru wa Tigray Mekelle, ibintu vyagiye biba nabi ku gisirikare ca Ethiopia gifashwe mu mugongo n'ingabo za Eritrea n'iz'intara ya Amhara mu ntambara n'inyeshamba za TPLF . Mu ndwi iheze, ingabo za Tigray zasubiye kwigarurira umugwa mukuru Mekelle. Impande zompi muri iyo ntambara ziragirizwa ko zagandaguye abantu zinahonyanga uburenganzira bwa kiremwa muntu. Ku wa gatanu, ingabo ziharurwa mu bihumbi za Ethiopia zafashwe mpiri zarazungurukanywe mu mabarabara ya Mekelle. Gushika ubu, reta ya Abiy i Addis Abeba yaranse kuganira n'abategetsi ba TPLF, mbere akaba yavuze ko uwu ari umuhari w'iterabwoba.

column2: Kanye West yahinduye icese izina ryiwe yiyita Ye
column3: Umuririmvyi yari azwi nka Kanye West  kuva ubu agiye kwitwa icese izina rigufi rya Ye. Umucamanza wo muri Los Angeles yemereye uwo muhinga wa rap guhindura izina, nk'uko vyemejwe n'uwujejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Sentare nkuru ya Los Angeles. Uwo rurangiranwa w'imyaka 44 yari yabisavye mu kwezi kw'umunani avuga ko ari "ku mvo ziwe bwite". Uwo mu rapper, azwi ku ndirimbo nka Gold Digger na Stronger, yari asanzwe amaze gukoresha Ye nk'iritazirano hanyuma mu 2018 arikoresha nk'umutwe w'urukurikirane rw'indirimbo.  Iyo album imaze igihe isohotse, yanditse kuri twitter ati: "N'ubwo nzwi mu buryo bwemewe nka Kanye West. Ndi YE." Ubu rero yabitangaje icese izina yari asanganywe - Kanye Omari West - ntirikiriho. Mu gihe kuri twitter yari asanzwe yitwa Ye, kuri Instagram no ku rubuga rwiwe (website) hari hagikoreshwa izina ryiwe gushika ku wa kabiri. N'ubwo ari impfunyapfunyo ya Kanye, iryo zina yihaye rifise n'ico risigura mu bijanye n'idini kuri ico camamare. Mu 2018 yavugiye mu kiganiro yahaye umuremesha-biganiro vya radio, Big Boy, ati: "Nibaza ko Ye ariryo jambo rikoreshwa cane muri Bibiriya, kandi muri Bibiriya risigura wewe. N'ukuvuga ndi wewe, ndi twebwe, ni twebwe." "Rivuye kuri Kanye, risigura we wenyene, rija kuri Ye ryerekana uko tuba tumeze, neza, nabi, tuzazaniwe, ivyo uko turi vyose." Ye yasohoye album yiwe ya vuba Donda mu kwezi kwa munani irimwo indirimbo 27 zimara amasaha abiri. Mu nyuma yaciye avuga ko abasanzwe basohora indirimbo ziwe, Universal Music Group, basohoye atabahaye uruhusha album yiwe igira 10 yari irindiriwe umwanya munini cane. Abandi baririmvyi nka Prince, Snoop Dogg na Sean Love Comb nabo baragiye barahindura  amazina yabo, bamwe mbere kenshi. Ye yaravuzwe cane mu binyamakuru muri uyu mwaka igihe yavana n'umugore wiwe bari bamaranye imyaka indwi,  Kim Kardashian. Uwo mugabo n'uwo mugore bafitaniye abana bane, bari mu bantu babaye ivyamamare cane kw'isi. Ubukwe bwabo bwabaye bumwe mu bw'abantu b'ivyamamare kw'isi bwakurikiranywe cane muri iyi myaka irenga mirongo iheze. Iyo nkuru yakurikiye umugambi  wa Ye utagenze neza wo kwitoza mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika mu 2020.

column2: Burundi : 17 bapfunzwe bikekwa gushaka kunyaga abanyagihugu mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga
column3: Abantu 17 bo mw'ishirahamwe Crowd1 ricuruza amafaranga ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi bari mu minwe y'igipolisi bagirizwa gukora inama y'ishirahamwe ritazwi n'amategeko. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'umutekano yabwiye Radio Isanganiro ko abo barobowe mu bandi barenga 300 bari bafashwe bari muri iyo nama ejo ku wa kabiri ku mugoroba n'igipolisi c'u Burundi. Pierre Nkurikiye avugira ubwo bushikiranganji avuga y'uko abo bantu bafashwe n'igipolisi bari mu nama muri zone Rohero mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Avuga ko abari mu minwe y'igipolisi ari abariko bakorwako amatohoza kubijanye n'uko  ishirahamwe Crowd1 ryoba rifise intumbero yo kwiba abanyagihugu. Haciye amezi make ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, igabishije Abarundi kwirinda urudandazwa rw'amafaranga rukorwa biciye mu mihora ngurukanabumenyi bita 'monnaies virtuelles' canke crypto-monnaies. Mw'itangazo yasohoye mu kw'umunani umwaka uheze, BRB yavuze ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga yo kuri iyo mihora nka Bitcoin, Ether, Litecoin, Onecoin,  Fahari Cash Coin, Ello Cash Coin rutemewe. Jean Ciza, umukuru w'iyo banki, yavuze ko ayo mafaranga akoreshwa mu buryo butagira amategeko bwisunga ahantu na hamwe kw'isi, kuko ngo nta banki n'imwe y'igihugu kw'isi yose irayemera. Ati: "Ivyo bituma ibikorwa muri ayo mafaranga bisa n'ivyo ubusuma…" Abatari bacye muri iki gihe barinjira mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga mu buryo butandukanye leta z'ibihugu zimwe zivuga ko rutemewe.

column2: Ubuserukizi bwa US muri Tanzania bugabisha ko abandura Covid-19 bariko biyongera
column3: Ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika muri Tanzania biragabisha ko ibitigiri vy'abandura ca kiza karanda ca coronavirus biriko biriyongera. Mw'itangazo ivyo biro vyacishije ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwavyo, ivyo biro bivuga ko bifise amakuru yerekana ko ibitigiri vy'abandura iki kiza bigenda vyiyongera kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere uno mwaka. Bisaba ikigo kijejwe gucungera no gukinga indwara ca Amerika (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention) kubuza ingendo zose z'abashaka kuja muri Tanzania. Reta ya Tanzania yoyo ibandanya ivuga ko ata kiza ca coronavirus gihari, n'aho Prezida John Pombe Magufuli yavuze ko hari abanyagihugu bagiye mu mahanga kwiteza incanco bagaruka mu gihugu banduye ubundi bwoko bw'umugera. Reta y'iki gihugu yamirira kure incanco za Covid-19. Iri tangazo rigabisha ko "mu gihe reta ya Tanzania iheruka gutangaza ingene ibintu vyifashe ku bijanye na Covid-19 mu kwa kane 2020, nta ngingo ziboneka zo guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera". Amerika igabisha ko umwanya n'umwanya ibitaro n'amavuriro muri ico gihugu bishobora kurengerwa. Mu gihe hasanzwe hariho ibigo bipima coronavirus muri Tanzania, Amerika igabisha ko hari igihe inyishu zitaboneka ku mwanya utegekanijwe, canke ntizinaboneke bikaba ngobwa ko abapimwe basabwa gusubira kwipimisha haciye imisi. Ubu buserukizi bugabisha ko hari ingenzi ziva muri Tanzania zipimwa, ibipimo bikerekana ko batanduye ariko bashitse iyo bagiye basubiye gupimwa bagasanga baranduye. Muri Tanzania, hari ibigo bitandukanye bigenda bifata ingingo zo gukinga ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera binagabisha abantu bavyo kuri iki kiza. Ku wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, kaminuza ya Sokoine yigisha ibijanye n'uburimyi (SUA) yasohoye itangazo aho igabisha abanyeshuri n'abakozi ko borikanura kugira birinde coronavirus. Eka na kaminuza Open University yarasohoye itangazo isaba abantu gufata ingingo zo kwirinda kwandura n'ukwanduzanya. Hagati aho, iri tangazo ryarafuswe n'ubushikiranganji bw'indero buvuga ko riteye kubiri n'ingingo ngenderwako zatanzwe n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu. Mu kwezi guheze, Ekleziya Katorika muri Tanzania yaragabishije abanyagihugu ibasaba gufata ingingo zo kwirinda ubundi bwoko bwa corona buvugwa mu bihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika. Hagati aho, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu ntibumenyesha nimba hari abanduye ubu bundi bwoko bwa coronavirus canke nimba hari imaze guhitana. Haraciye imisi ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu butangaje ko ata Covid-19 iri muri Tanzania, kandi ko ata ncanco ikeneye, ahubwo buhimiriza abanyagihugu gukoresha imiti kama.

column2: Sudan y'Epfo:''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju''
column3: Umu Karidinari ari mu kiruhuko c'izabukuru muri Ekleziya Katorika yaneguye ubushobozi bwa bamwe mu ndongozi za Ekleziya muri Sudan y'Epfo. Kardinari   Gabriel Zubeir Wako yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Khartoum yavuze ati: ''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju mw'isengero'', aho hari mu rugendo yagize mu gisagara ca Wau kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero. Yavuze kuri uyu wa mungu ati: ''Mu minsi maze ngaha i Wau, hariho abapatiri twabonanye ndumva ko benshi batazi indinganizo n'inyigisho zo mw'isengero,  bigisha ibintu bidafashe. Bakeneye gusumvya aho bageza ubu ". Uwo mu karidinari azokwiza imyaka 80 y'amavuko mu kwezi kuza, , arubashwe kandi arazwi cane mu kuba yarashigikiye amashure. Yaratewe iteka na reta ya Sudan y'Epfo mu 2016 kubera uruhara rwiwe mu gushigikira indero y'abana bangana na miriyoni zibiri bari barateshejwe izabo n'intanbara muri Sudan y'Epfo. Yaranarungitse abapitiri kubandanya ivyigwa i Roma no muri Kenya , kugira bace impamyabushobozi za masters na doctorat. Mu bo yarungitse kubandanya ivyigwa harimwo uwamusubuiriye Musenyeri Mukuru Dr Michael Didi, ubu arongoye diyosezi ya Khartoum , n'uwurongoye diyosezi nkuru ya Juba, Dr Stephen Ameyu.

column2: Ukraine: Abahinga ba Irani mu vya drone ‘ku rubuga’ muri Crimea – niko US ivuga
column3: N﻿a George Wright George Wright Iran yarungitse abahinga ba gisirikare mu karere ka Crimée/Crimea kari mu minwe y’Uburusiya mu ntumbero yo gufasha kurungika za ndege zitagira abadereva, drones, mu bitero kuri Ukraine, nk’uko bivugwa na Maison Blanche/White House. Umuvugizi wa Amerika avuga ko aba ari abigisha n’abafasha mu vyo ubuhinga. Ku wa mbere, umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine, Kyiv, waratewe na drones “z’ubwiyahuzi” zarungitswe n’Uburusiya ariko zizwi ko zikorwa na Irani. Ubwongereza bwatangaje ibihano ku makompanyi n’abantu bafise uruhara mu gutanga izi drones. Umuvugizi w’igisata kijejwe umutekano w’igihugu muri Maison Blanche, John Kirby, yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Turabona ko abasirikare ba Irani bari ku rubuga muri Crimée kandi ko bafasha Uburusiya muri ivyo bikorwa". Avuga ko “igitigiri gito”c’abanya-Irani bafasha mu vyo ubuhinga, Abarusiya nabo bagatwara izi ndege zitagira abadereva muri Ukraine. Kirby ati: "Tehran ubu ifisemwo uruhara mu kuba iri ku rubuga be no mu gutanga ibirwanisho bigira ingaruka mbi ku basivire no ku bigo vya gisivire muri Ukraine”. Avuga kandi ko Amerika “izokoresha uburyo bwose” mu “gushira ahabona, kuzibira no guhangana n’ibikorwa vya Irani vyo gutanga ibi birwanisho birwanya abanyagihugu ba Ukraine”. Ukraine yabonye ko izi drones – canke indege zitagira abadereva (UAVs) – zakoreshejwe ku wa mbere, ko ari ibirwanisho vya Irani vyo mu bwoko bwa Shahed-136. Zizwi ko ari iz’ “ubwiyahuzi” kuko zisambuka iyo zikoze igitero – zikaba zitiriwe ba badereva b’indege b’Abayapani bakoze ibikorwa vy’ubwiyahuzi mu ntambara ya kabiri y’isi yose. Uburusiya bwakoresheje izi drones n’ibisasu vya misire mu gutera ibibanza bikomakomeye muri Ukraine mu misi iheze, busambura hafi ica gatatu c’amasoko ntanganguvu kuva ku wa mbere w’indwi iheze. Ibi vyatumye muri Ukraine, ku ncuro ya mbere, haba amabwirizwa asaba abanyagihugu gukoresha umuyagankuba muke ejo ku wa kane. Ubwongereza bwatangaje ibihano ku bajenerali batatu ba Irani hamwe n’uruganda ruhingura ibirwanisho kubera izi drones za Irani zakoreshejwe n’Uburusiya mu gutera Ukraine. Umunyamabanga w’Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire James Cleverly  yagirije abo bafatiwe ibihano “gukokeza intambara” no kwikika inyuma y’ibitero “vy’agahomerabunwa” vya Moscou. Muri abo bafatiwe ibihano harimwo umukuru w’igisirikare ca Irani Jenerali-Majoro Mohammad Hossein Bagheri, hamwe kandi n’uruganda ruhingura drone ruzwi nka Shahed Aviation Industries. Hagati aho, Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine yagirije Moscou gutega ibibombe ku rugomero rukomeye mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine. Mu gihe urugomero rw’umuyagankuba rwa Kakhovka rwokwononekara cane, ibisagara 80 bishobora guterwa n’imyizurira, mbere n’ikigo ca nikleyeri ca Zaporizhzhia kikabura amazi yo guhoza, nk’uko Zelensky abivuga. Bishobora kandi gutuma ubumanuko bwose bwa Ukraine, harimwo na Crimea, bubura amazi. Ku wa gatatu, umurwi w’abahinga wo ku kigo cigisha ibijanye n’intambara, Institute for the Study of War, bavuze ko Moscou ishobora kuba iriko irategura igitero kuri uru rugomero igaca icegeka kuri Ukraine, yizeye ko umwuzurira wokwaduka woha akaryo keza ingabo z’Uburusiya ko kuva mu turere tw’intara ya Kherson ata nkomanzi. Uru rugomero rupima ibirometero 70 rukaba ruri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Kherson. Uburusiya buriko burahungisha abasivire bubakura mu turere twa Kherson bugenzura, mu gihe bwiteze igitero gikomeye ca Ukraine mu ntumbero yo kwisubiza iki gisagara.

column2: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi ku mugabane wa buraya 29.07.2022
column3: Everton iriko iravugana na Paris St-Germain kugira igure umukinyi wo hagati wo muri Senegal Idrissa Gueye w'imyaka 32, bikaba vyitezwe ko ivyo biganiro bibandanya mu misi mike iri imbere.  (Fabrizio Romano) Nuno Tavares w'imyaka 22 arakorerwa ibipimo kuri uyu wa gatanu n'umugwi wa Marseille inyuma y'aho uwo mugwi wo mu Bufaransa ushitse ku masezerano yo kumutizwa na Arsenal. column2: Ni nde yanditse Bibiliya ?
column3: Na Edison Veiga BBC News Brazil Kuba Katolika, Bibiliya igizwe n’ibitabo 73. Ku baporoti hari 66, nayo aba-orthodoxe bavuga ko hari 78. Ni mu gihe Abayahudi bemera ibitabo 39 gusa, ibi bikaba ari ivyo abakirisu bavuga ko ari ivyo mw’isezerano rya kera. Aha turiko tuvuga igitabo kigurishwa cane gusumba ibindi vyose muri kahise k’isi, Bibiliya Nyeranda, ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo vyahinduwe mu ndimi zababa 3.000 – aho ibirenga imiriyaridi 3.9 bimaze kugurishwa kw’isi yose, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuryango wa Bibliya wa Brezili (Société biblique du Brésil). Ariko none, ni bande banditse ibi bitabo? Dufashe ko ari ibitabo vya kera cane, imbere y’uko abanditsi ba none batangura kwandika uko bandika, biragoye kuronkera iki kibazo inyishu nyayo. Intango y’iki kiyago ni ukubanza kumenya nimba ari ukugifatira ku bijanye n’idini gusa, canke nimba gikwiye gufatira ku buhinga n’ubumenyi. Umuhinga mu vya kahise no mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana Gerson Leite de Moraes asanzwe yigisha kuri kaminuza Mackenzie Presbyterian University avuga ati: "Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kubera hari imbono zibiri. Imbono ya mbere ishingiye ku kwemera Imana gushingiye ku masengero, aha tukaba dufise abiga ibijanye no kwemera Imana kubera bashaka kuba abapasitori/abapatiri mu muryango kanaka, imbono kama ». Kubw’iwe, inyigisho z’amasabamana ziganisha ku busaseredoti/ubupasitori, zitegerezwa « kugendera ku nyigisho z’uko ivyanditswe vyavugishijwe, ni ukuvuga ko ari ivyavuzwe n’Imana yo nyene ubwayo, iciye kuri Mutima Mweranda/Mpwemu Yera ». Avuga ati : "Ku rundi ruhande, inyigisho ku bijanye no kwemera Imana zishingiye ku buhinga ntizirajwe ishinga n’iyo mbono, ahubwo zozo zirondera kwihweza uko izi nyandiko zaje ufatiye ku bihe vya kahise ». Muri iyi nzira, turashobora gutahura ibitabo vya mbere vya Bibiliya, ibigize vya bitabo bitanu vya mbere bizwi nka Pentateuque (canke nka Torah y’Abayahudi), ko ari icegeranyo c’inyandiko zanditswe ubwa mbere imyaka hafi 1.000 imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Ibi ni Amamuko/Itanguriro, Ihunga, Abalewi, Guharura/Kubara  hamwe na Gutegeka kwa Kabiri  (Deuteronome)  - ibitabo bivuga ivyerekeye kuva kw’irema ry’isi gushika ku rupfu rwa Musa. Kubera ari ivya kera, abahinga bavuga ko bigoye kumenya neza na neza abavyanditse. Kubw’amayagwa y’idini, ibi bitabo bitanu vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe, Musa. José Luiz Goldfarb, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Katorika y’i São Paulo akaba arongoye n’igisata c’imico y’ikiyahudi mu murwi A Hebraica, avuga ati : "Nsomye nkongera nkavugana n’umusiguzi akongera akaba n’umukinyi w’ivyese, Haroldo de Campos (1929-2003), nahakuye icigwa ko hari inzira zibiri zishoboka. Iyo yo mw’isinagoga ivuga ko Musa ari we yanditse Torah. Tubifata nk’uko twama ‘twumviriza’ Musa buri ndwi [ibisomwa], kandi ibi bifise agaciro mu mico y’abantu ». Ihengama ry’abahinga ntiryemera ibivugwa ko ibi bitabo vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe. Ati : "Ku bijanye n’inyigisho za Bibiliya, tuvuga ibitabo vyanditswe mu myaka irenga 600 ». "Uku niko umwihwezo wa Harold urangira hampande y’ubushakashatsi yagize kuri Bibiliya, kubisigarira vy’ivya kera (archeoloie), ku bisigarira no ku nzandiko zo guhayagiza ». Avuga ko umwihwezo wimbitse w’izi nzandiko ufasha kubitadukanya ufatiye ku nyubako, amajambo azigize, n’ibirimwo ufatiye ku banditsi mu bihe bitandukanye vyo muri kahise. Ni iciyumviro cemerwa neza. Uri Lam wo mu muryango Templo Beth-El w’abanya-Israel muri São Paulo asigura ati: "Biragoye cane kuvuga ivy’ibihe canke abanditsi kuko umuntu atakara. Amatohoza y’abahinga yemeza ko izi nyandiko zifise imyaka iri hagati ya 2.700 na 3.000 canke gusumba aho kubera vyahererekanwa ku munwa ». Kubw’iwe, izo nyandiko zaratagatifujwe – ni ukuvuga ko zegeranijwe hanyuma zifatwa ko ari izigize Bibiliya y’Abahebreyi– amaja mu kinjana ca IV imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Lam yemera ati : "Ariko n’aho nyene, hari impari nyinshi, kandi ntidushobora kurangiza iki kibazo ». Goldfarb abona akarusho muri ibi vyo gufatira hamwe izi nyandiko hamwe no kuzifatira mu mice itandukanye. Yibaza ati : "Nimba ari inyandiko zamaze imyaka 600, ibi ni vyiza ku bantu bakunda ibikorwa. Ni bangahe bashoboye gusohora inyandiko mu karere kamwe canke akandi ? ». Muri ico gihe nyene ivy’abanditsi bitandukanye n’ivy’ubu, ingorane nk’izi nyene zo kumenya koko uwanditse zirabandanya mu bindi bitabo biri muri Bibiliya y’Abayahudi – ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo bigize isezerano rya kera muri bibliya ya gikirisu. Goldfarb ati: "Nk’akarorero, zaburi za Dawudi. Ni agatabo gato abantu bakoresha cane mu bisabisho n’indirimbo vya misi yose kegeranya indirimbo Dawudi yakunda kuririmba mw’isinagoga. "Tuvuga ko yari umuririmvyi kandi ko ibi bisabisho vyaririmbwa. Ni nde abizi ? Ni ikibazo ciza:  ku vyo nize ngasoma, jewe ntavyo nokwemeza… ». Moraes nawe ati: "Ikiri ukuri ni uko habaye benshi banditse ibiri muri Bibiliya ». "Igishoboka cane ni uko inkuru ziri mu vyanditswe muri bibiliya muri kino gihe imbere y’aha vyahanahanwa ku munwa igisekuru ku kindi. Kandi iri ryagumye ari itunga karanga ry’idini ry’aba bantu ». Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza ati: "Ni ukumenya kandi ko ivyo abitirirwa inyandiko mu gihe ca kera bitandukanye n’ivyo dufise ubu. Ico gihe, vyari bikunze kuba ko inyandiko kanaka yitirirwa umutware mukuru, umutegetsi akundwa, umuntu akomeye ». Aha niho rero, abanywanyi b’inyigisho zimwe zimwe, iyo bahinduye ivyo bazi bakabishira mu nyandiko, bakunda kuzitunganya nk’uko umengo ni ikintu canditswe na ba shebuja. Moraes  yongerako ati : "Kubiraba Torah, ushaka kuvuga ko izi nzandiko zanditswe na Musa? Bishobora kuba atari vyo. Kumbure afise kuba yarabigizemwo uruhara. Hari bamwe bavuga ko ata ruhara na rutoya yagize. "Ariko ni inyandiko zitirirwa Musa." Kubw’iwe, igikenewe ni uko izi nyandiko nyeranda birangira zitiriwe amadini. Moraes yibaza ko ari ibintu vyumvikana ko ibitabo vyeranda vyanditswe, nk’akarero, inyuma y’ishingwa ry’igihugu ca Israel gusumba ibihe bivugwamwo, nk’ibijanye n’ihunga ry’Abayahudi bava mu Misiri, barongowe na Musa. Ati: "Iyumvire igico c’abantu bayerera mu bugaragwa. Ivyo kwicara ngo bandike si vyo bibaraza ishinga. Ikiraje ishinga uwuriko arayerera mu bugaragwa ni ukurondera ingene abaho. Mu myaka itari mike, vyabaye ngombwa ko bategura intambara kugira ngo baronke ubutaka…nta n’umwe yari anezwe ivyo kwandika ibitabo." Uyu mushakashatsi ati: "Ikintu kinini gishoboka, ni uko ibi vyagiye kuba hashinzwe umuryango wiyubatse neza." Ariko zari inkuru zidakomeye cane, z’ubwoko butandukanye, vyarangiye zegeranijwe zigashirwa  hamwe n’umwanditsi umwe canke benshi. Umuhinga mu nyandiko nyeranda, Thiago Maerki akaba n’umushakashatsi kw’ishure kaminuza rya São Paulo (Unifesp), akaba kandi ari mw’ishirahamwe Hagiography Society, muri Amerika, arashima cane iciyumviro co gukoresha ubumenyi bwa none mu vy’indimi mu kugerageza gushira hamwe canke gutandukanya inyandiko zigize Bibiliya. Kubw’iwe, abanditsi nk’umwigisha wa kaminuza Robert Alter, umunyamerika yigisha kw’ishure kaminuza ya California, "babivuga neza ", nk’igihe avuga ko ari vyiza "gukoresha uburyo bumwe bumwe bukoreshwa mu kwiga ibijanye n’ivya kahise k’indimi n’inyandiko mu kwiga inyandiko za Bibiliya". Maerki ati: "Arihweza ubuhinga bw’inyandiko, impinyanyuro z’amajambo yakoreshejwe, ubudasa mu gushikiriza ivyiyumviro, imyumvikano ikurikizwa mu bwoko bumwe bumwe bw’inyandiko ya Bibiliya, na buri mwanditsi. "Igihe cose kugira ngo ntihabe kuzana ivyataye igihe." Indinganizo y’amayagwa nayo nyene ishobora kwisungwa mu mwihwezo w’ibitabo bine vy’injili, ibitabo bivuga ubuzima bwa Yezu, bikaba vyitirirwa Matayo, Mariko, Luka na Yohani. Umushakashatsi kuri kahise k’idini rya Gikristu kw’ishure kaminuza Université pontificale grégorienne i Rome akongera akaba n’umuhinga ku bijanye na Vaticano Mirticeli Medeiros, arabishingira intahe ko, ata gukekeranya, abanditse ibi bitabo bine ari abo bagabo bane. Asigura ati : "Ku vy’Injili, nta mpari zihari [kuba zitirirwa], n’imiburiburi ufatiye ku bushakashatsi bwa vuba. Aha ni ukwibuka ko babiri mu banditsi bazo, Matayo na Yohani, bari abatumwa ba Yezu/Yesu. Aba bandi babiri, Mariko na Luka, ku ruhande rwabo, bateguye inyandiko zabo bisunze ivyo abatumwa bashingiye intahe." Maerki arasangamwo ubudasa mu mpinyanyuro z’amajambo muri ibi bitabo bine. Asigura ati : "Matayo afatwa nk’umwanditsi adakoresha impinyanyuro itaziguye, akoresha impinyanyuro isanzwe. Yohani akoresha ururimi rugoye, rwuzuye imizunguruko, imvugo ngereranyo. Luka akoresha imvugo inonosoye, ihanitse." Nimba mw’isezerano rya kera hari ibibazo vyinshi gusumba ibizwi ku bijanye n’abitirirwa ibitabo, inyandiko zo mw’isezerano rishasha, n’aho ari iza vuba kandi n’abazitirirwa bavugwa hafi muri zose, naho nyene harimwo ibibazo. Birazwi ko bimwe muri vyo vyatanguye kwandikwa imyaka 30 canke 40 inyuma y’urupfu rwa Yezu. Moraes avuga ko "bishoboka cane ko aya mazina yose [y’aba banditsi b’Injili bane] yaje biciye mu mico n’imigenzo." Ashimangira ati : "Nta zina ry’umuntu yitirirwa ibi bitabo vya kera cane." Igisa n’uko ata mpari gitera ni uko iya mbere muri izi njili ari iya Mariko. Ati: "Mu gihe hari igisekuru, igisekuru cakurikiranye ubuzima bwa Yezu gushika apfe, ni ngombwa ko kigumana inyandiko ku vyabaye. Rero nico gitangura ubwoko bushasha bw’impinyanyuro y’amajambo, ari yo Njili." Mu gushira hamwe imico n’imigenzo hamwe n’ivyahanahanwa ku munwa, uyu mwanditsi w’injili arandika neza ivy’ubuzima bwa Yezu. Ariko ahagarara cane ku gice yashaka guhagararako ico gihe: aha ni ukuvuga ko ata kigoro agira ko kuvuga ku vyerekeye ivuka canke ubwana bwa Yezu, ahagarara cane cane ku gikorwa ciwe, ku rupfu rwiwe, ku butumwa bwiwe bwa Pasika. None uyu Mariko yari umuntu ki ? Umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana (théologien) arerekana ko yari umwigishwa w’intumwa Petero. Ati: "Ariko abandi bazokubwira ko yari umwigishwa wa Paulo. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ico tuzi ni uko atari umwigishwa wa Yezu." Injili ya Yohani nayo nyene irimwo amakenga. Ahari amakenga ni aho avuga  «umwigishwa yakundwa cane», aha amayagwa akerekana ko yari Yohani. Moraes ati : "Ariko hariho abahinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana babona ahubwo ko yashobora kuba ari Lazaro, kuko mu njili harimwo umurongo [mu gice kivuga urupfu rwa Lazaro] uvuga ko Yezu yarize,  ‘hanyuma raba ingene yamukunda." Mu kinjana ca 20 ni ho abakristu batanguye kmwemeza ko Yohani ari we yanditse iyi Njili. "Amayagwa yabigize uko nyene, tubandanya tumwita Yohani. Ariko ntivyoroshe kumenya uwayanditse, ishobora mbere kuba yanditswe n’umurwi wa benshi." Kubw’uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana, ni vyiza ko tugumana iciyumviro c’uko ari « Injili zanditswe na» ugaca ushirako izina rimwe rimwe muri ayo, hakubafata nk’abanditsi b’ibitabo nk’uko bafatwa mu gihe ca none. Ariko nimba ikibazo ari Isezerano rishasha, ni ukwerekana uruhaha rwa Paulo, intumwa yandikiye amabaruwa menshi imiryango ya mbere ya gikristu. Medeiros avuga ati : "Amabaruwa ya Paulo, nk’uko iri zina ribivuga, [yanditswe] na Paulo hamwe n’abigishwa biwe. Nk’akarorero, ibaruwa ryandikiwe Timoteyo, rishobora kuba ryanditswe na Paulo, rero abahinga bamwe baryita Deutéro-Paulin". "Hagati aho, hari impari ku vyerekeye amabaruwa yitirirwa Petero, kandi ashobora kuba atanditswe na we nyene ubwiwe. Co kimwe kandi n’irya Paulo yandikiye abahebreyi, rishobora cane kuba ryagiye kurangizwa n’umwe mu bigishwa biwe ». Paulo yumvikana ko ari we yatanguye kwandika kuri Yezu, kuva mu mwaka wa 57 canke 58. Moraes  avuga ati : "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba yari azi ko yariko yandika inyandiko nyeranda. Ashobora kuba atari abizi." "Hari uburyo yakoresha mu kuvugana n’amasengero hanyuma agasiga amakete. Amwe muri yo yaratakaye, amwe muyo twita ko ari amabaruwa yiwe yanditswe kumbure n’abigishwa biwe, ariko ashirwa mu murwi w’ayanditswe na Paulo." Uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana avuga ati: "Iyo tuvuga amabaruwa ya Petero, kumbure yanditswe n’abamwegereye, kuko Petero ntiyari azi kwandika, kandi arabitomora mw’ibaruwa ryiwe [rya mbere].  Yakoresha umwanditsi mu kwandika. Kumbure afise kuba yabwira icegera ciwe, yitwa Silvano, ivyo yandika."

column2: Funke Abimbola: ‘Izina ryanje ry’ikinyafrika ryambujije kuronka akazi’
column3: Umunyamategeko akongera akaba n'umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira bw'inkehwa, Funke Abimbola,  avuga ko "yamye arenganywa" igihe cose yagerageje kurondera akazi. Hafi icagatatu c'ama kompanyi 100 adandaza imitahe (FTSE) nta nkehwa afise mu nzego zifata ingingo, nk'uko icegeranyo kibivuga. Ikigo kijejwe kwihweza ingene ubwoko buserukiwe mu ma kompanyi atandukanye, Parker Review Committee, mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza, kimenyesha ko inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo mu makompanyi atari make. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Nahuye n'inzitizi nyinshi  igihe nariko ndondera akazi kubera nari mfise izina ry'ikinyafirika, kandi kubera ndi umwirabure, nta gukekeranya". Yabwiye BBC ko yaterefonye incuro zirenga ijana kugira ngo ashobore guhonyoza ikirenge  mu kazi. Ati: "Baranyinuvye, barankarira cane gusumba abandi  kubera kwitwa umugore w'umwirabure". "Biroroshe kukubona uwo uri we kandi biroroshe cane rwose kukurenganya iyo uri mu nkehwa". Icegeranyo c'ikigo Parker Review Committee  cerekana ko mu makompanyi adandaza imitahe ashika 250 casanze inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, aho 119 kuri 179 amoko adaserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Ico cegeranyo ntikintangaza. Hari inzitizi nyinshi  cane kugira ngo inkehwa zishobore kuronka ikibanza mu nzego zo hejuru". Ico kigo Parker Review Committee cashinzwe kugira ngo gikore ubushakashatsi ku kungene amoko atandukanye aserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo  mu makompanyi atandukanye, casohoye icegeranyo caco kuri ico kibazo mu 2017. Ico gihe, mu makompanyi 51 kw'ijana adandaza imitahe inkehwa ntizari ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, ugereranije n'ubu ari 33%. Ico cegeranyo gisaba ko gushika mu 2021 buri kompanyi mu makompanyi 100 ya FTSE yoba ifise n'imiburiburi indongozi imwe iva mu nkehwa, hanyuma gushika mu 2024 naho mu makompanyi 250 ya FTSE yoba yamaze gukora gutyo. Mu ntumbero yo gufasha kugira ngo inkehwa ziserukirwe, ico cegeranyo gisaba ko buri kompanyi yokwama itanga icegeranyo c'ingene inkehwa ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, n'ingene ubwoko butandukanye buserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola arizeye ko mu gihe hoba integuro yoha ibibanza kanaka inkehwa vyofasha mu gutorera inyishu ico kibazo. Ati: "Hariho amashirahamwe makeya mu Bwongereza aha akazi amoko atandukanye. "Ayo mashirahamwe yama ategura intonde z'abantu bafise ubuhinga butandukanye muy bwoko butandukanye buri mwaka, rero iyo wipfuza kurondera abirabure, abanyaziya hamwe n'inkehwa, biba ngombwa ko uja kuronderera muri izo ntonde". Umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, Andrea Leadsom, avuga ko ico cegeranyo cerekana ko "amakompanyi agifise igikorwa kitari gito" kugira ngo ashobore guhimiriza abakozi b'abirabure, Abanya Aziya hamwe n'inkehwa.

column2: Ubukritsu - Isilamu: hoba hari isano hagati ya Isilamu hamwe na Yezu/Yesu na Maria
column3: Mu bihugu birwiriyemwo Abakristu, muri kino gihe ikintu kivugwa ni Noweri/Noheli, mu ndimi mvamahanga naho ni Noel canke Christmas. Biragoye kwibaza ko hoba hari ibihugu uyu munsi mukuru utazwi na gato, bobo usanga ari umunsi usanzwe nk'iyindi. Igituma nyamukuru ni uko uyu munsi ari umunsi wo kwibuka ivuka rya Yezu, umunsi wubahwa cane rwose mu mashengero y'abakristu. Mu bihugu uyu munsi mukuru wa Noweri utazwi, canke udahimbazwa harimwo ibihugu bigendera kw'idini rya Isilamu, Nk'akarorero muri Turukiya, iri genekerezo rya 25 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri ni umunsi usanzwe ku kirangamisi cayo. Uyu munsi mukuru ntawuriho ku birangamisi ry'abayahudi, Abahindi canke vy''Abasilamu. Mu bihugu vy'Abasilamu, uyu munsi mukuru usa n'iminsi mikuru ya Eid, ariho Abasilamu baja hamwe, bagatumirara, bagateka, bakagenderanira, bagatanga ishikanwa, bakambara bakaberwa bakaja gusenga mu misigiti. Nimba ushaka gutahura itandukanirizo riri hagati y'aya madini, ntuze wigere wipfuriza Umusilamu Noweri nziza. Ariko rero, si ukuvuga ko Yezu/Yesu atazwi mw'idini rya Isilamu. Yezu/Yesu canke Jesus, uba uvuze Issa? Ibi rero biratangaza abantu benshi batabizi. Abasilamu ntibahimbaza ivuka rya Yezu, ariko barakurikiza inyigisho ziwe. Abasilamu barubaha cane uyu bita intumwa y'Imana kandi afise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu kwemera kwabo. Igitabo c'Ikorowani gifata Yezu nk'umwe mu ntumwa z'Imana zubahwa cane zaboneye izuba Intumwa Muhammad (S.A.W.- Sallā Allāhu ʿalayhi Wa-sallam). Yezu mu rurimi rw'icarabu ni ukuvuga Issa, kandi aravugwa incuro nyinshi cane mw'Ikorowani, mbere aravugwa cane gusumba na Muhammad muri iki gitabo ceranda. Si ivyo gusa, harimwo n'umugore umwe rudende izina ryiwe rivugwa mw'ico gitabu ceranda c'idini rya Isilamu. Maria canke Mariam, Ikorowani imusigura gute? Uyo mugore ni Bikira Maria, mu rurimi rw'icarabu akaba azwi kw'izina rya Mariam/Maryam. Mw'Ikorowani, hari igice cose kimuvuga, kigasigura ingene yavyaye umwana kandi yari asanzwe ari isugi. Gusa iyo iriko irasigura ivy'ivuka rya Yezu, Isilamu ntiyigera ivuga ivya Yozefu, canke ba ba majusi baza bavuye mu buseruko, canke ngo bavuge ingene yaryamitswe mu bwato bw'inka. Maria yibarutse ari wenyene mu bugaragwa, ari musi y'igiti c'umunazi cumye. Aho nyene haciye haba igitangaro, inazi zihiye neza zaciye zitangura gukoroka ziva kuri ico giti cumye maze ziba imfungurwa yiwe. Hanyuma kandi, mu maguru yiwe haciye havuka umugezi w'amazi meza cane maze aba inyobwa yiwe. Umukobwa atararongorwa iyo avyaye bitera ibibazo vyinshi cane ku bijanye n'indero yiwe. Ariko uyo mwana  - Yezu/Issa - amaze kuvuka, yaciye atangura kuvuga nk'intumwa y'imana. Iki gitangaro nico gikura iceyi nyina wiwe. Iyo Abasilamu bavuga Yezu, bategerezwa gushirako Alayhi Salaam- Imigisha y'Imana ibane na we, nk'uko babivuga ku Ntumwa Muhammad n'abandi bahanuzi. Hanyuma kandi, ni nde arindiriwe ku munsi w'iherezo ku munsi w'urubanza no kugarura amahoro kw'isi, kubw'idini rya Isilamu? Ni Yezu, aho azogarukira ubugira kabiri, kandi uku kuninahazwa kwiwe kuri no mu bindi bitabo vya Isilamu, si mw'Ikorowani gusa. Umuhinga w'Umusufi, Al-Ghazali, amusobanura "nk'Intumwa ityorora imitima y'abantu". Ibn Arabi aramwandikako aho avuga ko ari "ikimenyetso c'ubweranda". Mu gihugu vyose birimwo Abasilamu, hari abahungu bahabwa izina rya Issa (Yezu), abakobwa nabo bagahabwa amazina ya Maryam (Maria). Aha urashobora kwibaza nk'umuntu ava mu muryango w'abakristu yokwita umwana wiwe Muhammad ingene vyomugendera? Idini rya Isilamu rirazi neza Yezu, kubera igihe rivuka, mu kinjana c'indwi, idini ry'Ubukristu ryari rishinze imizi mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo Hagati. Muhammad nta hantu na hamwe avugwa muri Bibiriya. N'aho idini rya Isilamu riha icubahiro Yezu, si ukuvuga ko mu binjana vyakurikiye iri dini rya Gikristu naryo ryabasubirije mu ndumane. Ahubwo, mu gicapo kinini co mu kinjana ca 15 kiri mw'isengero nkuru ya San Petronio mu gisagara ca Bologne mu Butariyano, uyu muhanuzi mukuru wa Isilamu yerekanwa ari mu muriro udahera, ariko arababazwa n'amashetani. Harabaye ibishushanyo vyinhi vyerekana nabi cane Intumwa Muhammad. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umutariyano Giovani da Modena yarashingiye cane ku munyavyese azwi cane Dante Alighieri, yashize Muhammad ku muzingi w'icenda w'ikuzimu mu gitabo ciwe c'ivyese citwa Divine Comedy. Iki gitabo carakoreshejwe cane n'abanyatugenegene n'abahinyanyuzi benshi ba Bulaya gushika mu kinjana ca 18 mu gushushanya Intumwa Muhammad bamwerekana ariko arahanwa mu muriro udahera. Kimwe muri ivyo bishushanyo, ni ica William Blake, umunyatugenegene akomeye cane w'umwongereza mu masanamu n'inzandiko ziwe. Mw'isengero imwe yo mu Bubirigi, hari ibishushanyo vyo mu kinjana ca 17 vyerekana iyi ntumwa ya Isilamu aryamitswe hasi ariko ahonyangwa n'abamarayika. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka mu nyuma ku bijanye n'ingene idini rya Gikristu rifata Intumwa muhammad. Ariko gusa gushika muri kino gihe, haracari icuka kibi. Mu mwaka wa 2002, imirwi y'intagondwa ya Isilamu yaragirijwe ko yashatse kubomora ico gishushanyo co mw'isengero ya Bologne. Kuva ico gihe, harabaye ibitero vyinshi vyahitanye abantu, ibitero vyakozwe kw'izina ry'idini rya Isilamu mu bihugu bitari bike vya Buraya n'ibirwiriyemwo Abasilamu. Ibi bitero vyatumye icuka kibi hagati y'ama madini abiri kibandanya ciyongera. Hari ababona ko kumenya isano riri hagati ya Yezu n'idini rya Isilamu, hamwe n'ikibanza afise muri iri dini, bishobora gufasha Abakristu n'Abasilamu kunywana. Babona ko kwibanda ku vyo basangiye hakwibanda ku bibatandukanya bishobora gufasha gukuraho iki cuka kibi kihari.

column2: Barcelona 0-3 Bayern Munich: Thomas Muller yaraye asubiye guhumira Barca yari yakiriye Bayern
column3: Ibitsindo vya Thomas Muller na Robert Lewandowski ni vyo vyabanguranije iyi mirwi ibiri y'ibihangange mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya mu murwi E, mu rukino rwa mbere rwatsinzwe na Bayern Munich yari yakiriwe na Barcelona. Uyu murwi watahukanye ihiganwa ry'Ubudagi ry'umwaka uheze wafashe mu minwe uru rukino, Muller akaba yanashoboye kwinjiza  igitsindo kigize indwi atsinze Barcelona. Lewandowski niwe yatsindagiye, mu gutsinda ibitsindo bibiri vyose, aho yatanguye kwinjiza igitsindo ciwe ca 74 muri Champions League ku mupira watewe ugakubita kw'igori ukamugarukako agaca yinjiza igitsindo igori riri gusa, inyuma y'uko umunyegori Jamal Musiala yirashe ku ruhande akurikirana umupira igori rigasigara rigaragara. Muri uru rukino rwa mbere rwa Champions League ikinye kuva inyenyeri yayo  Lionel Messi ayisezeye, Barca vyaranse, irarushwa cane, gushika n'aho atigeze ishobora gutera mw'igori. Barcelona itakaje urukino rwa gatatu iri ku kibuga cayo incuro zitatu yikurikiranya mu mahiganwa ya Bulaya, ubwa mbere muri kahise kayo. Yararushijwe cane na Bayern, n'aho na yo nyene itakinye urukino rukomeye cane nk'uko abantu bari bayizi. Uyu murwi w'Ubudagi ni wo ufata ikibanza ca mbere mu murwi E, mu gihe urundi rukino hagati ya Benfica na Dinamo Kiev rwarangiye ari 0-0. Hari haciye amezi 13 kuva Bayern ibagiye ibisiga uyu murwi, icashize aheru ibibazo vyatera vyiyongera muri Barcelona, mu rukino rwarangiye Bayern inyagiye Barcelona ibitsindo umunani vyose kuri bibiri. Barcelona ntiyamenya ko ibintu vyari kugenda vyunyuka mu mezi yakurikiye, aho mbere ibibazo vy'amafaranga vyatumye Lionnel Messi ata akagenda, akimukira muri Paris St-Germain muri rino ci. Ubu isa n'ikibarara c'ikintu cigeze kuba gikomeye kera - igenda itabona iyo iriko iraja, yiteze kubona amarushwa mu gihe yohura n'umurwi wipanze neza, umurwi wo ku rwego mpuzamakungu nk'uko vyaraye biyigendeye kuri Bayern Munich nijoro. Igihe ikubitwa 8-2 Messi yakinanye na Luis Suarez nk'abasatirizi, hari mu 2020. Mu rukino rwa nijoro, Barca yakinishije abasatirizi bahoze bakina muri Premier League y'Ubwongereza, Memphis Depay na Luuk de Jong, kubera Martin Braithwaite yavunitse. Bayern yasa n'uko ataco yinona n'aho rimwe na rimwe yabura umupira, ariko iramutse igiye imbere, vyaba ngombwa ko Barcelona yisanga uruhande rw'inyuma iriko ikinisha batanu hakuba batatu isanzwe ikinisha. Gerard Pique, umwe muri aba bakinyi batatu b'inyuma, ati: "Ni uko nyene bimeze. Turi uko tumeze, ni uko nyene". Ariko uwo bakinana inyuma wewe Garcia abibona ukundi, aho avuga ati: "Burya ibitsindo birarenganya. Ica mbere cinjiye kubera umupira wanciyeko, ica kabiri umupira wakubise kw'igori uca ugaruka mu kibuga ukorokera kuri Lewandowski. "Si nibaza ko tuba twaratsinzwe ibitsindo nk'ibi vyose. "Nimba tutashoboye kugumana mupira hagati, ivyo ari vyo vyose ni uko twariko dukina na Bayern - kumbure umurwi wa mbere i Bulaya. Twari tuzi neza ko rwari urukino rutoroshe na gato". Bayern ubu ifise umumenyereza mushasha akiri muto Julian Nagelsmann w'imyaka 34 gusa, yasubiriye Hansi Flick, akaba aboneka ko afise ubushobozi bwo gushikana kure Bayern muri rino higanwa. Ubu Bayern ntirigera itsindwa mu nkino 19 zose zo ku rwego rwa Bulaya ikiniye hanze.

column2: Ethiopia: Reta isaba abakukuruke gusubira mu gisirikare kugira bafashe kurwanya inyeshamba za Tigray
column3: Igisirikare ca Ethiopia gitera akamo abakukuruke gusubira kwinjira mu gisirikare, mu gihe kiri mu rugamba rwo guhagarika inyeshamba. Aka kamo gatewe mu gihe inyeshamba z'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) zitera zisugereza umugwa mukuru Addis Ababa. Ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Amerika butera akamo abanyagihugu ba Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kuva muri Ethiopia vuba bwango mu gihe ibijanye n'umutekano mu gihugu bitera biyangara. Amasaha make imbere y'aha, imirwi icenda yose irwanya reta yari yatangaje ko yishize hamwe kugira ngo isambure ubutegetsi bw'umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed. Reta yoyo itangaza ko izobandanya kwigwanira. Iyi ntambara yinjiye mu mwaka ugira kabiri, aho imaze gutesha izabo abaharurwa mu mamiriyoni, nayo abarenga 400.000 bakaba basugerejwe na kigoyi. Muri ino ndwi, abategetsi ba reta batangaje ibihe bidasanzwe, banasaba abanyagihugu kwandikisha ibirwanisho vyabo, bababwira ko bitegurira kurwana kugira bakingire uturere babamwo. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, ibidakunze kuba, Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano isaba impande zompi guhagarika intambara, inashimangira ko ishigikiye utwigoro tw'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Afrika two kwumvikanisha abashamiranye. Eka n'incuti za Ethiopia zitera akamo ko guhagarika intambara. Umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire, Liz Truss, asaba impande zompi kwumvikana bagahagarika intambara, hari igihe yavugana kuri terefone n'icegera c'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia ejo ku wa gatanu. Uyu mupfasoni ati: "Narerekanye neza ko ata nyishu ivuye mu ntambara kandi ko ibiganiro ari ngombwa kugira ngo amaraso areke guseseka bongere bashike ku mahoro arama". Ku wa kane, umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken yasavye ko haba agahengwe kandi intambara igahagarara. Intumwa idasanzwe ya Amerika, Jeffrey Feltman, ari mu rugendo i Addis Ababa gufahsa kugira ngo habe umwumvikano. Imihari TPLF na Oromo Liberation Army (OLA) iri muri uru runani rushasha ruhuza inyeshamba. Avugira i  Washington, uwuserukira intara ya Tigray akaba yahoze anaserukira Ethiopia muri Amerika, Berhane Gebre-Christos, avuga ko intumbero ari ukubogoza reta ya Abiy ku nguvu canke biciye mu biganiro, hanyuma hagashingwa reta mfatakibanza. Ati: "Turiko turagerageza kugarukana ibintu mu buryo kuko bimeze nabi muri Ethiopia, biturutse ku butegetsi bw'ukwigungirako kwa Abiy". "Igihe kiriko kiramujana". Imihari OLA na TPLF yari yatanguye kurwanira hamwe, aho muri ino ndwi yatangaje ko yigaruriye igisagara ca Kemise kiri ku birometero  325 mu buraruko bw'umugwa mukuru Addis Ababa, kw'ibarabara rikuru riva i Tigray rija ku mugwa mukuru. Umwihwezo wa Anne Soy, umunyamakuru wa BBC Kubona abakukuruke batumwako ngo basubire mu gisirikare vyerekana ko reta ya Ethiopia yamaze kubona ko inyeshamba ziyigeramiye koko. Bibaye haciye umusi umwe gusa umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy asohoye ubutumwa bwo kwihagararako, avuga ko ingabo ziwe "zizokwemera gusesa amaraso yacu gushika zihamvye umwansi". Ariko iyi ngingo  irerekana ko reta itaciyemera. Yaramaze no gusaba abasivire kwirwanira. Hari utwigoro tw'amakungu two kurondera ingene umugwa mukuru utokwinjira mu ntambara. Ariko ibi bigenda biboneka ko biri kure, mu gihe impande zompi zibandanya zihaya intambara. Ariko abategetsi ba reta bobo barahakana ivyerekeye uru runani rushasha, bavuga ko ata bantu bazokwigera barushigikira. Kebede Desissa avugira reta yabwiye ikiganiro Newshour ca BBC ati: "Nta nguvu na nkeya bafise, niwo murwi wa mbere wa poritike muri Ethiopia ufise intege nke". Avuga ko ku rubuga ata kintu na kimwe cerekana ko inyeshamba ziriko zirasugereza umugwa mukuru. Haraciye umwaka iyi ntambara yadutse hagati y'ingabo za reta n'umugambwe TPLF wamaze imyaka mirongo wiganziye Ethiopia, ubu ukaba ari wo urongoye intara yaTigray.

column2: Umugwizatunga Rujugiro ashima icemezo ca sentare kuri UTC ngo ariko ntibikwiye
column3: Umugwizatunga w'Umunyarwanda Tribert Rujugiro avuga ko ashima icemezo ca sentare y'akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko ku vyerekeye inyubako yagurishijwe na leta y'u Rwanda. Ariko uwo mugwizatunga atakiba mu Rwanda kubera kutumvikana na leta y'ico gihugu, avuga ko kumuha amafaranga atari vyo yashaka kuko adashaka kugurisha. Iyo nyubako ivugwa ni inyubako izwi nka Union Trade Centre (UTC) iri mu muji wa Kigali iberamwo ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji, izi zizwi mu Congereza nka Shopping Mall. Sentare y'Ubutungane ya Afrika y'Ubuseruko yafashe icemezo c'uko Bwana Rujugiro ahabwa amafaranga iyo nyubako yagurishijwe akanahabwa ayo yari imaze kwinjiza igihe yari imaze ikora kuva yagurishwa. Ariko we avuga ko naho ashima ingingo ya sentare, ivyo adashobora kuvyemera kuko agaciro k'iyo nyubako ari kanini cane ugereranije n'ayo yoba ahawe. Yagize ati: "Umwanzuro narawushimye kuko weretse amakungu ko rirya tegeko bakoresheje na birya vyo kugurisha bitajanye n'amategeko. "... ngirango umuntu wese azi guharura, inzu yinjiza $1,500,000 ku mwaka, yobona agaciro kayo. Kandi amafaranga bayigurishije ni $6,800,000". Mu 2017 ikigo kijejwe amakoli mu Rwanda cafashe ingingo yo kugurisha inyubako UTC ya Bwana Rujugiro kimwagiraza ko agiheraniye amakoli. Ikigo Kigali Investment Company ni co cegukanye iyo nyubakwa cemeye gutanga amahera arusha ay'abandi (6,877,150,000). Ku vyerekeye kumwagiriza kutariha iryo koli, Bwana Rujugiro avuga ko sentare yabisiguye neza. Yagize ati: "Bwa mbere iyo nzu bari bayifise (urwego rushinzwe amakoli) kuva mu 2013. Iryo deni ry'ikoli bavuga ko mfise barizanye mu 2017, bamaranye inzu imyaka ine. "Noneho waraba amafaranga bafashe yagera ku miriyoni $5 zirenga. Kandi itegeko bagendeyeko ryavuga ko amafaranga yose avuye mu nzu bafashe, 50% bizoja bija muri Banki Nkuru akazohabwa nyene umutungo igihe yoboneka. "Urumva yuko nibaba bari bafise $2.800.000, ideni rikaba ryari $1.100.000, kuki batafashe muri ayo ngo barihe?" Abajijwe niba azokwunguruza ku ngingo ya sentare mu gihe we avuga ko adashaka kugurisha inzu yiwe, yavuze ko yabihaye abashingwamanza biwe nihafatwa ingingo akazoyitangaza. BBC yagerageje kuvugana n'uruhande rwa leta y'u Rwanda ariko batubwira ko ata co bashobora kuvuga kuri ico kibazo.

column2: Kardinari w'i Vatican Becciu mu rubanza rwo kunyonyeza miriyoni 412 z'ama dorari
column3: Umukardinari  w'ishengero Katorika yigeze kuba akorana hafi cane na Papa François agiye gucirirwa urubanza i Vaticano, yagirizwa gukoresha nabi amafaranga y'ishengero mu kamaramaza kahombesheje amafaranga menshi mu mugambi wo kugura inyubakwa i Londres/London. Kardinari Angelo Becciu, w'imyaka 73, niwe mwubahwa  akomeye cane mu barongoye Ekereziya Katorika  mu bihe vya none agiye imbere y'ubucamanza  kubera gukekwako ivyaha bijanye n'amafaranga. Yagirizwa gusohora amafaranga y'amanyaburaya, Euro, angana na miriyoni 350 (arenga miriyaridi 800 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) y'ishengero mu mugambi utagenze neza  wo kugura inyubakwa  muri Chelsea watumye hatakara amafaranga menshi cane. Arahakana kuba hari icaha yakoze. Abandi bantu icenda bakurukiranwa muri urwo rubanza nabo bagirizwa ivvyaha birimwo kuronka amafaranga ku nguvu canke kw'iterabwoba, kunyuruza no gukoresha nabi ububasha bw'akazi. Kardinari Becciu yirukanywe mu kazi na Papa François mu kwezi kw'icenda igihe amakuru y'ugukoresha nabi amafaranga yaja ahabona. Amatohoza yamaze imyaka ibiri yerekanye ingene Vaticano yatakaje miriyoni z'ama euro, arimwo amashikanwa, inyuma yo kugura inyubakwa  yahora ari ububiko bwa Harrods kuri Sloane Square  Avenue muri Chelsea, mu 2014. Uwo mukardinari yahora  araba amashikanwa mu biro bijejwe amafaranga ya  Vaticano. Ivyaha akurikiranwako birimwo kurungika amafaranga mu rudandazwa rwari rurongowe n'abavukanyi biwe mu ntara y'amavukiro yabo muri Sardaigne. Urwo rubanza rwitezwe kumara amezi menshi. Intahe zibiri zizosasa muri iyi ndwi - ku bibazo  vy'ubuhinga - zishobora kwungururizwa mu kwezi kw'icumi. Abandi icenda bagirizwa barimwo: Abagirizwa bose barahakana kuba barakoze icaha. Hamwe bokwagirwa n'ivyaha, bashobora guhanishwa umunyororo canke ihadabu, canke vyompi. Abashikirizamanza bavuga ko umuranzi  akorera Londres, Gianluigi Torzi,  yanyonyeje Vaticano mu gukoresha amafaranga yayo mu kugura imitahe yo muri iyo nyubakwa yo muri Chelsea yari guca isubirwawo ngo ivemwo amazu y'agaciro yo kubamwo. Torzi avuga ko ibivugwa bishingiye ku kwumva ibintu ukutariko. Ubutariyano buriko buragerageza ngo burabe ko  Ubwongereza bumubarungikira. Mu kwezi kwa kane Papa yafashe ingingo ko aba kardinari n'abepiskopi bagirijwe ivyaha bashobora gukurikiranwa n'abacamanza basanzwe - aho gucirirwa imanza n'aba kardinari nk'uko vyahora. Umukuru mushasha ajejwe amafaranga muri Vaticano, Juan Antonio Guerrero, avuga ko Vaticano iriko irashiramwo inguvu zitari bwigere ziboneka kugira ikorere ku mugaragaro mu bijanye n'amafaranga. Ku wa 24 ukwezi kw'indwi, ku ncuro ya mbere Vaticano yashize ahabona ido n'ido ry'imitahe yayo: amazu 4.051 mu Butariyano n'izishika 1.120 i Londres, Paris, Geneve  na Lausane. Furera Guerreo yagize ati: ''Twamenyereye gukorera mw'ibanga, ariko twamenye ko mu vyerekeye ubutunzi, gukorera ku mugaragaro bidukingira kurusha gukorera nw'ibanga."

column2: Russia - Ukraine: Hatanguye ibiganiro ku ntambara iri hagati y'ivyo bihugu
column3: Amafoto yatanguye guhererekanywa mu gihe abategetsi b'Uburusiya na Ukraine bari mu biganiro ku ntambara iriko irabahuza, ivyo biganiro bikaba biriko birabera  ku rubibe igihugu ca Ukraine gihana na Belarus. Imbere y'uko iyo nama itangura, prezida wa Ukraine yavuze ko igihugu ciwe cipfuza ko intambara zica zihagarara ubwo nyene n'ingabo z'Uburusiya zikava muri ico gihugu. Hagati aho, Uburusiya bwo buvuga ko hoshikwako amasezerano impande zose zifisemwo inyungu. Ku musi ugira gatanu inyuma y'aho ingabo z'Uburusiya zinjiriye muri Ukraine, intumwa z'ivyo bihugu bibiri zatanguye ibiganiro bigamije kurangiza iyo ntambara. Ibiro vya prezida wa Ukraine bivuga ko bishaka ihagarikwa ry'intambara ubwo nyene hamwe n'ivanwa ry'ingabo z'Uburusiya muri ico gihugu. Hagati aho, Vladimir Medinsky arongoye intumwa z'Uburusiya mu biganiro avuga ko bashaka amasezerano afitiye inyungu impande zose. Imbere y'uko iyo nama itangura, prezida Volodymyr Zelensky yahamagariye ingabo z'Uburusiya gushira hasi ibigwanisho, aca atera akamo ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya kwemerera Ukraine kwinjira muri iryo shirahamwe ubwo nyene.

column2: Afghanistan: Umukuru w'ingabo za US ntabona neza nimba 'ba ruburakigongwe' b'aba Taliban bazohinduka
column3: Umukuru w'ingabo za Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko aba Taliban ari "umuhari ruburakigongwe" akavuga ko bitaboneka neza nimba bazohinduka. Jenerali Mark Milley avuga ariko ko "bishoboka" ko muri kazoza Amerika ishobora kuzokorana n'aba barwanyi bagendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vy'idini rya Islam mu bikorwa vyo kurwanya imirwi y'iterabwoba. Ingabo za Amerika zavuye muri  Afghanistan ku wa 31 z'ukwa munani, ikimenyetso c'uko intambara ya Amerika yari imaze imyaka 20 kuva mu  2001 igihe zikora igitero co kwomora aba Taliban irangiye. Uyu muhari ubu niwo ugenzura igihugu cose ukaba urindiriye gutangaza reta nshasha. Gen Milley yari kumwe n'umunyamabanga ajejwe kwivuna abansi wa Amerika Lloyd Austin, mu kiganiro ca mbere bagize kuva ingabo za nyuma zivuye muri Afghanistan. Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika aranegurwa cane ingene yavyifashemwo, aho yagirizwa guhuruduka mu gutahukana ingabo, ivyatumye ubutegetsi bwa Afghanistan butembagazwa. Umuvuduko udasanzwe w'aba Taliban mu kwigarurira igihugu watumye haba igikorwa kidasanzwe co guhungisha ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyamahanga hamwe n'abanya Afghanistan bakorana n'ingabo mvamakungu. Mu kiganiro cabo nijoro ku wa gatatu, aba bategetsi bompi  barashimagije ingabo zakoreye muri Afghanistan hamwe n'igikorwa kidasanzwe co guhungisha abantu benshi mu mwanya muto. Abajijwe ibijanye n'uko bakoranye n'aba Taliban mu guherekeza ku kibuga c'indege abashaka guhunga , Austin yishuye ati: "Hari ibintu bike twakoranye n'aba Taliban, kandi ni ivyo - kugira ngo dushobore guhungisha abantu benshi bashoboka". Yongerako ati: "Mu ntambara ukora ivyo utegerezwa gukora kugira ngo ugabanye ingaruka mbi ku gikorwa ujejwe no ku ngabo, ntutegerezwa gukora ivyo ushaka". Avuga ko bishoboka ko muri kazoza Amerika ikorana n'aba Taliban mu kurwanya umurwi IS-K wegamiye Etat Islamique/Islamic State, uherutse kwiyemerera ko ari wo wakoze igitero giheruka mu micungararo y'ikibuga c'indege mu ndwi iheze kigahitana abarenga 170, harimwo abasirikare 13 ba Amerika. IS-K  ni wo muhari w'intagondwa mubi cane kandi uteye umudugararo gusumba iyindi mihari yose yiyitirira idini rya Islam muri Afghanistan. IS-K irafise ibintu bikomeye utandukaniyeko n'aba Taliban, kuko ibagiriza ko bahemutse bagata urugamba. Hagati aho, Austin avuga ko ataco ashobora kuvuga ku vyo yibaza ku bijanye n'ingene bashobora kuzokorana muri kazoza. Ariko yongerako y'uko abategetsi "bazokora uko bashoboye kwose kugira ngo tubandanye dukurikiranira hagufi IS-K, tumenye neza uyo muhari, hanyuma mu gihe tuzoshakira muri kazoza, bakabazwa ivyo bakoze". Abantu  barenga 123.000 nibo bashoboye guhungishwa muri Afghanistan. Amerika ivuga ko hari Abanyamerika bari hagati ya 100 na 200 bakiri muri Afghanistan. Icegera c'umunyamabanga wa reta ajejwe ibibazo vya poritike Victoria Nuland avuga ko bariko bihweza "uburyo bwose bushoboka" bw'ukungene bovana muri ico gihugu Abanyamerika basigayeyo hamwe n'abo bose bakoranye na Amerika. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Ubwongereza Dominic Raab avuga ko atazi neza Abongereza boba basigaye muri Afghanistan, ariko ko bashobora kuba ari bake. Aba Taliban barishimiye itahukanwa ry'ingabo mvamakungu, ubu ikibaraje ishinga kikaba ari ugushinga reta. Icegera c'umukuru w'ibiro vya poritike vy'aba Taliban muri Qatar, Sher Abbas Stanekza, yabwiye igisata ca BBC candika mu rurimi rw'igi Pashto ko reta nshasha ishobora gutangazwa mu misi ibiri iri imbere. Avuga ko abagore bashobora guhabwa ibibanza ku nzego zo hasi, ariko atari ku nzego nkuru. Avuga ko abakoreye reta mu myaka 20 iheze badashobora gushirwa muri reta nshasha.

column2: Papa asaba ko haboneka inyishu "ruhasha" ku bihe mu butumwa kuri BBC yonyene
column3: Mu butumwa bw'ijwi yahaye BBC yonyene, Papa François asaba abategetsi b'isi bazohurira  ku ndwi iza mu nama ya ONU  ku bihe i Glasgow (muri Ecosse), gutanga "inyishu ziri n'ico zishikako" ku vyihutirwa ku bidukikije no guha "icizere gifadika" abariko bararuka. Muri ubwo butumwa bwafatiwe amajwi i Vaticano  bugahabwa ikiganiro Thought for the Day ca Radio 4 ya BBC, Papa yagarutse ku bihanze isi birimwo ikiza ca Covid -19, ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, aca asaba abarongoye isi kubitorera inyishu mu buryo bw'icerekezo n'ingingo ruhasha , kugira "amahirwe" atangwa n'ivyo bihanze isi "ntatakare". Umwungere wa Ekereziya Katorika yavuze ati: "Duhangana n'ivyo vyugarije isi mu nzira za  nyamwigendako, kwigumizako ivyacu no gukoresha ivy'abandi, canke tukabibonamwo amahirwe nyayo y'impinduka". Yagarutse ku kuba hakenewe "ugusubira kwumva uruhara dusangiye rwo kwitaho isi yacu", yongerako ati "umwe wese muri twebwe - uwo ari we wese n'aho ari hose - ashobora kugira  ico aterereye mu guhindura inyishu ya twese ku ngeramizi zitari bwigere ziboneka  kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe n'itituka ry'inzu dusangiye." Papa mu mwanya uza aja kubonana na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden. Imigambi ya Biden ku bijanye n'ibihe mu gihugu iwe iracari mu mayira abiri inyuma y'aho umugambwe wiwe wigirije inyuma gutora itegeko rigenda  integuro z'amafaranga yo gukoresha. Ubwo butumwa n'ubwibutsa ingene Papa François yashize imbere ibijanye no gukingira ibidukikije mu burongozi bwiwe bwa Ekereziya. Mu majambo ashikiriza, aramaze kugaruka kenshi ku kaga k'ibihe, mu 2015 akaba yasohoye ikete rya  Papa (enciclyque), ryitwa  Laudato Si' rishimikiye kuri ico kibazo. Muri iyo nyandiko inyito yayo yahinduwe mu zindi ndimi nka "Ku kwitaho inzu dusangiye" , yiyamirije ugusambura ibidukikije, yerekana ko hakenewe ingingo zofasha  kugabanya iryo hindagurika, aca yemeza ata guca hirya no hino ko ihindagurika ry'ibihe ahanini riterwa n'ibikorwa vy'umuntu. Iryo kete ryasohotse imbere y'uko haba inama ya ONU y'i Paris mu 2015, COP21, rikaba ryabonywe nk'iryagize ico rifashije mu gutuma abategetsi bashika ku masezerano. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, abategetsi b'isi bariko baritegurira gukoranira i Glasgow mu nama y'uyu mwaka, COP26. Mu gihe biguma bigaragara ko ivyiyemejwe i Paris bitariko birashikwako kugira  ukwiyongera kw'ubushuhe bw'isi ntikurenge 1.5C, ugereranije n'urugero rw'imbere y'uko hatagura amahinguriro,  Papa François yasubiye gushimika kuri ico kibazo  yizigiye ko ijambo ryiwe rizosubira kugira ico rifashije nka mbere.

column2: Itegeko rya Islam Sharia rirabuza umuziki, kubera iki? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
column3: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia.

column2: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje iduzwa ry’amakori mu kwihora Ubushinwa
column3: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje ko agiye kwihora igihugu c'Ubushinwa mu kuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biva muri ico gihugu, ivyatumye ibintu biyangara mu ntambara y'ubutunzi hagati y'ivyo bihugu vyompi. Hari haciye amasaha make Ubushinwa butangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biciye  imiliyoni 75 z'amadolari vyinjiye muri ico gihugu bivuye muri vya Amerika, ivyo Perezida Trump yiyamiriza. Bwana Trump avuga ko iyo ngingo y'Ubushinwa ari iya "politike", akabwagiriza ko bushaka "kugendera" kuri Amerika. Ubushinwa bwatangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori kuva ku bice 5% gushika kuri 10% ku bidandazwa birenga 5000 biva muri Amerika, harimwo ivyimburwa vyo mu burimyi, indege n'ibitoro bitarahingura. Butegura kandi gutoza ikori ryari ryarabangiriweko ry'ibice 25% ku mamodokari ava muri Amerika. Abicishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter ejo ku wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yatangaje iduzwa ry'ayo makori ku bice 5% ku bidandazwa vyinjira bivuye mu Bushinwa. Avuga ko kuva kw'igenekerezo rya 01 ukwezi kw'icumi, Amerika izoduza amakori kuri ivyo bidandazwa biciye imiliyoni 250 y'abanyamerika, kuva kuri 25% gushika kuri 30%. Avuga kandi ko ibidandazwa biciye amadolari 300 vyari vyitezwe gutozwako ikori ingana n'ibice 10% rizoduga gushika kuri 15%. Ati: "Ikibabaje, ni uko ubutegetsi bw'inyuma bwaretse Ubushinwa bukarengera inyungu za Amerika muvyo ubudandaji, ku buryo bwabaye umuzigo ku mutangakori wa Amerika. Jewe nk'umukuru w'igihugu, sinshobora kwemera ko ivyo bisubira". Bwana Trump amenyesha ko "kuri iyo mvo, yategetse" amakompanyi ya Amerika kuvavanura n'Ubushinwa bakarondera abandi bakorana, agapfuma arondera ingene yokorera muri Amerika. Izo ngingo zerekana ukutumvikana hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri ku vyerekeye ubudandaji zatumye ibintu biba nabi ku masoko y'ivunja n'ivunjwa ry'amafarangam haba muri Amerika, canke i Bulaya. Ku munsi wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yarifatiye mu gahanga umukuru w'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu ca Amerika, Jerome Powell, inyuma y'aho avugiye ko iyo ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora gutuma ubutunzi bwa Amerika bugira ibibazo. Aciye kuri Twitter, Perezida Trump yashitse kure, aho yibajije nimba uyo mukuru w'ibanku nkuru y'igihugu atoba ari "umwansi" mukuru gusumba umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubushinwa, Xi Jinping.

column2: Coronavirus: Oxford igiye gusubira gutangura rwa rucanco rwari rwabangiriwe
column3: Igerageza rw'urucanco rwa Covid-19 ruriko rutunganywa n'uruganda rw'imiti AstraZeneca n'ishure kaminuza ya Oxford rigiye kubandanya inyuma yo kubangirwa inyuma y'aho bivugiweko hari uwo rwagizeko ingaruka mbi. Ku wa  kabiri w'iyi ndwi, AstraZeneca yavuze ko iri gerageza ryari ribaye rirahagarikwa mu gihe hariko hakorwa amatohoza kugira barabe nimba ivyabaye kuri umwe  mu bantu bariko barugeragerezwako bifitaniye isano. Ariko nijoro ku wa gatandatu, kaminuza ya Oxford yatangaje ko uru rukingo ata ngorane rufise, ko rero rushobora kubandanya. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza, Matt Hancock, yakiriye n'igishika cinshi iyi nkuru imenyesha ko igeragezwa ry'uru rucanco rigiye kubandanya. "Iyi ngingo yo kubangira yerekana ko twitwararitse ubuzima bwa muntu imbere ya vyose. Tuzoshigikira abahinga bacu kugira no bashobore kuduha urucanco nyarwo vuba bishoboka". Itangazo ryasohowe n'iyi kaminuza rivuga ko vyari "vyitezwe" ko bamwe "mu bariko bageragerezwako uru rucanco bashobora kubona ingaruka mbi" mu magerageza manini cane nk'iri. Ryongerako y'uko ubu bushakashatsi bushobora kubandanya bisunze impanuro bahawe n'umurwi wigenga ujejwe kwihweza ibijanye n'imiti, hamwe n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe kugenzura imiti n'ibijanye n'ubuvuzi. Ntiyategerezwa gutanga amakuru yerekeye umurwayi ku mpamvu z'ibanga, ariko ikinyamakuru New York Times carashoboye kumenya ko umwe mu bitanze kugeragerezwako mu Bwongereza yagize ibibazo vy'ubushe ku ruti rw'umugongo. Ishami rya ONU rijewe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO rivuga ko hafi incanco 180 ari zo ziriko zirageragezwa  mu mpande zitandukanye z'isi, ariko ko gushika ubu ata na rumwe rurashobora kurangira. Hari icizere kinini ko uru rucanco rushobora kuba mu za mbere zishobora gutangura gukoreshwa, inyuma y'aho rugeragerejwe ku ncuro ya mbere n'iya kabiri bikagenda neza. Iri gerageza ryo ku ncuro ya gatatu ririko rikorerwa ku bantu bashika 30.000 muri Amerika co mu Bwongereza, Brezili na Afrika y'Epfo. Incuro ya gatatu kenshi ijamwo abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi kandi igashobora no kumara imyaka itari mike. Ku wa gatatu, umuhanuzi wa leta mu bijanye n'ubuhinga mu Bwongereza, Sir Patrick Vallance, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko ivyashitse muri rino gerageza ririko rikorwa na Oxford ari ibintu bitari bimenyerewe.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Bulaya 18.07.2019: Pogba, Koscielny, Zaha, Maguire, Sane
column3: Real Madrid itegura gutanguza urugamba yise ''Operation 200'' aho bashaka kugurisha abakinyi Gareth Bale w'imyaka 30 na James Rodriguez w'imyaka 28, kugira ngo bashobore kuronka amahera akenewe y'ukugurua umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United, Paul Pogba. (Marca, via Sun) Neymar yugururiye imiryango Manchester United  mu gihe uyo mukinyi wa Brezili yipfuza cane kuva mu murwi Paris Saint-Germain. (Mundo Deportivo, via Sun) Barcelona iriko yihweza uburyo bushoboka bwo gusubira kugarukana Neymar, bumwe muri bwo bukaba ari kumuzana nk'intizo muri rino ci, ariko bagashobora kumugura mu kiringo c'umwaka. (Sport, via Express) Umumenyereza wa Chelsea, Frank Lampard, ategerezwa gufata ingingo nimba yokwongera gusinya amasezerano n'umukinyi Willian. column2: DR Congo: Ekleziya Gatorika isaba abapatiri bavyaye kuva mu mabanga
column3: Urwandiko rw'Inama y'Abepiskopi ba Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, CENCO, rwanyereye rugashika mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru rusaba abapatiri bo muri Congo bavyaye abana gutanga imihoho mu mabanga yabo y'ubusaserdoti, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru RFI. Inama y'abepiskopi CENCO, itegeka ko kizira y'uko abapatiri barangura amabanga y'abubatse. Urwo rwandiko rusohotse mu gihe Papa Francis yimirije kugendera Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo muri Mukakaro (7) uyu mwaka. Muri uru rwandiko rw'impapuro 19 rwiswe "A l'école de Jésus-Christ. Pour une vie sacerdotale authentique" (ni ukuvuga: Kw'ishure rya Yezu/Yesu Kristu/Kristo. Ubuzima nyabwo bw'ukwihebera Imana), abasenyeri bavuga ko ubuzima bw'igipatiri budashobora kubangikanwa n'ubuzima bw'ukuba serugo. CENCO isaba uwihebeye Imana uwo ari we wese afise umwana "gusaba uruhusha Papa rwo kuva muri ayo mabanga", nk'uko bisubirwamwo na RFI. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko mu gihe hogira abihebeye Imana bovyanka, musenyeri ashobora kwitura Vaticano kugira ngo ifate ibihano vyo ku rwego rwa nyuma, ibi bigasigura kwirukanwa burundi muri Ekleziya. Hari igice kimwe muri uru rwandiko rwa CENCO kivuga ibijanye n'abana b'aba bapatiri hamwe na ba nyina babo. Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi ivuga ko ishaka "gushira ibintu ahabona" ku bijanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze kuri bo, ikibutsa ko muri rusangi usanga "banenwa mu kibano". Ico gice kigira kiti: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima".i: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima". Ikibazo c'abihebeye Imana bavyara abana muri Ekleziya Gatorika ni ikibazo giteje impari no mu bindi bihugu vy'akarere no kw'isi. Mu mpera z'umwaka uheze uwari Musenyeri mukuru wa Paris, Musenyeri Michel Aupetit, yasavye imbabazi aca atanga n'imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera "umubano udasanzwe n'umugore". Ico gihe kandi, Patiri Wenceslas Munyeshyaka w'umunyarwanda, yahagaritswe ku kuba padiri wa paruwasi ya Brionne mu Bufaransa inyuma y'uko bimenyekanye ko yemeye mu nzego z'ubutegetsi ko ari se w'umuhungu yavutse mu kw'indwi 2010.

column2: Umuntu agira kabiri vyemejwe ko yahitanywe na Ebola muri DRC
column3: Umurwayi agira kabiri yahitanywe na Ebola muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo nyuma yaho ikiza gishasha cadukiye mu muji wa Mbandaka, mu ntara ya Equateur. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, ryavuze yuko uwo muntu wa kabiri ari umugore wo mu muryango w'uwapfuye ubwa mbere. Mu kiganiro kuri telefone, Dr Gervais Folefack yabwiye BBC ko "vyari bigoye kugira umugwi w'abajejwe kurwanya ico kiza ushobore kumenya iyo yagiye kuko yawutorotse akaja mu masengesho". Yongeyeko ati "igihe uwo mugwi washikira uwo mugore, amazi yari yamaze kurenga inkombe. Yacikanye atararonswa ubuvuzi na bumwe. Abo bose uko ari babiri bapfubwe hisunzwe amategeko yo kwirinda". Kuwa mbere abajejwe ivy'amagara bavuze yuko abantu barenga 100 bamaze kumenyekana ko bashobora kuba barahuye n'abo bahitanywe na Ebola, hakaba hitezwe ko urucanco rutangwa muri ino ndwi. Kongo iramaze kubonekamwo ibiza vya Ebola 13, harimwo kimwe caheze mu myaka ibiri iheruka, kikaba carahitanye abantu barenga 2000. Ibipimo vyasuzumwe mu kigo gikuri gipima indwara i Kinshasa vyerekana yuko iki kiza gishasha ataho gihuriye n'ivyakibanjirije. Amatohoza arabandanya yo kumenya aho iki kiza coba carazananye. Inkingo 1.300 zirategekanywa kurungikwa i Mbandaka zivuye i Goma mu buseruko bw'igihugu, gukingira bice bitangura kuwa gatatu.

column2: Ibivugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya ku wa gatatu itariki 27.02.2021: Di Maria, Upamecano, Garcia, Zirkzee, Tarkowski, Benteke

column2: Umukinyi wa tennis Novak Djokovic yamaze kuva mu gihugu inyuma yo gutsindwa mu rubanza rwa visa
column3: Novak Djokovic yavuye muri Australia inyuma y'aho atsindiwe mu rubanza yarimwo arondera kuguma muri ico gihugu. Abacamanza banse urubanza rw'uyu mukinyi rurangiranwa wa tennis yari yuguruje inyuma y'aho reta y'ico gihugu ihagarikiye visa yiwe ku mvo zo gukingira ubuzima no gukingira umutekano kubera atari bwicandagishe. Iyo ngingo yakuye icizere c'uyu mukinyi co kurwanira igikombe ciwe yatsindiye mw'ihiganwa Australian Open. Djokovic avuga ko ababaye cane ariko yubashe ingingo ya sentare yafashwe hari hasigaye umusi umwe gusa ngo akine urukino rwiwe rwa mbere. Abakunzi biwe baguye mu gahunwe aho bari bakoraniye hanze ya sentare igihe iyi ngingo yatangazwa, mu gihe bwaca akina urukino rwa mbere rwiwe. Umugore umwe mu bafana yabwiye BBC y'uko akaruhuko kiwe ko muci kazoba impfagusa kuko uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 34 atazoba ari mw'ihuganwa rya Open. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa AustraliaScott Morrison yakirije yompi iyi "ngingo ikingira imbibe zacu igakingira n'abanya Australia". Djokovic yari yuguruje uru rubanza igihe umushikiranganji abinjira n'abasohoka Alex Hawke  akoreshereje ububasha bwiwe nk'umushikiranganji mu gufuta visa y'uyu mukinyi w'umunya Serbia, avuga ko ari nka hamwe yoramuka yemerewe kwinjira mu gihugu vyoha impigi abarwanya incanco za Covid. Bwari ubwa kabiri visa yiwe ihagaritswe, inyuma y'aho ihagarikiwe ubwa mbere kubera ukutubahiriza amabwirizwa yo kurwanya covid, ingingo yahavuye ifutwa n'uwundi mucamanza. Itegeko rimwirukana mu gihugu ririmwo ingingo imubuza gusubira kugaruka muri Australia mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu, n'aho iyi ishobora kuvanwaho mu bihwe bimwe bimwe. Mu rubanza rwa sentare yashashe uno musi ku wa Mungu, ikaba yari igizwe n'abacamanza batatu, ababuranira Djokovic basiguye bavuga ko ingingo ya reta  "itemewe kandi idafise ishingiro", ariko biba ivy'ubusa. Iyi ngingo yo kuri uyu wa Mungu irangije impari zari zimaze imisi cumi ku bijanye na Visa ya Djokovic yo kwinjira muri Australian. Vyari vyateje uburakari mu gihugu kubona uyu mukinyi yariko agerageza kwinjira adacandazwe. Reta ibandanya ivuga ko ata muntu n'umwe ari hejuru y'amabwirizwa yashinzwe mu ntumbero yo kurwanya iki kiza. Mu gihe Djokovic ataricandagisha, yaranduye Covid-19 incuro zibiri zose, ubwa nyuma hakaba hari ku wa 16 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri guheze. Imirwi ibiri y'abaganga - umwe washizweho n'igisata kijejwe tennis muri Australia, Tennis Australia, uwundi nawo washinzwe na reta y'intara ya Victoria - yari yamucishirijemwo iramuha uburenganzira bwo kwinjira muri Australia. Ariko abajejwe gucungera imbibe z'iki gihhugu, Australian Border Force, baramuhagaritse ku wa 05 z'uku kwa mbere kubera atari akwije ibisabwa mu bijanye no kurwanya coronavirus. Mu nyuma, umucamanza  yarafuse iyi ngingo, abonye ko abajejwe gucungera imbibe batari bisunze amategeko igihe yashika, ariko reta ikaba yaciye ifata mu minwe ikibazo ku wa gatanu maze ica isubira guhagarika iyi visa. Djokovic azosubirizwa ejo ku wa mbere n'umutaliyano Salvatore Caruso aza mu kibanza ca 150 kw'isi, mu rukino rwiwe n'umunya Serbia Miomir Kecmanovic.
