azoba yirebanga mu ci riza. (Football Insider) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United  Erik ten Hag yari yashatse guha uruhusha umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo akigira mu kwa munani guheze ariko imirwi itari mike yaranse ayo mahirwe yo kugura uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 37 ubu yasezeye muri uyo murwi wa Old Trafford, ku mushahara wa 80.000 vy'amapawundi ku ndwi. (Athletic) Manchester United yasubiye kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Naples/Napoli Kim Min-jae ariko rero iriko imurwanira na Real Madrid, amasezerano y'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 26 akomoka muri Korea y'Epfo akaba arimwo ingingo ivuga ko umurwi umushaka utegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni 38 z'amapawundi. (Sunday Mirror) Tottenham, Juventus, Inter Milan na  Atletico Madrid yose iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati akina muri  Brighton, umunya-Argentina Alexis Mac Allister w'imyaka 23. (Fichajes) Arsenal na Chelsea yompi yari yipfuje kugura mu mwaka uheze umusatirizi wa Côte d'Ivoire  Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 30 asanzwe akinira  Crystal Palace. (Teamtalk) Newcastle ni wo murwi ufise amahirwe menshi yo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma akina muri Inter Milan, umunya Slovakia  Milan Skriniar w'imyaka 27. (Calciomercato) Chelsea na Liverpool yompi iripfuza umukinyi w'umunya-Norvège  akina hagati, Sander Berge, 24, akina muri  Sheffield United wo mu cicaro ca kabiri. (Jeunesfooteux). Juventus yahambije Inter Milan mu gukurikiranira hagufi  umwongereza akina inyuma  Chris Smalling w'imyaka 33, akaba ashobora kwirebanga mu ci riza mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na Roma azoba arangiye, mu gihe yokwanka amasezerano mashasha canke akanka kwongereza ayo afitaniye n'uyu murwi w'Ubutaliyano.  (Sky Sports Italia ) Umunya-Portugal akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu Raphael Guerreiro w'imyaka 28, asa n'uwushobora kuva muri  Borussia Dortmund mu ci riza. (Ruhr Nachrichten) Sevilla iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Angers  Azzedine Ounahi w'imyaka 22 ariko yitwara neza mu murwi nserukira gihugu wa Maroc muri rino higanwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose 2022. (Fichajes ) Borussia Dortmund ntishaka kugurisha umubirigi akina ku ruhande rw'i buryo inyuma, Thomas Meunier, mu kwa mbere, ni mu gihe Barcelona yipfuza uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31. (Sport ) Umukuru wa Bayer Leverkusen  Simon Rolfes avuga ko uyu murwi "ata bwoba na buke ufise" ku bijanye na kazoza k'umukinyi wayo w'inyuma, umunya-Hollande  Jeremie Frimpong w'imyaka 22,  asanzwe yipfuzwa na  Manchester United, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu 2025. (Sky Deutschland iciye kuri Manchester Evening News)

column2: Charles agiye kuba Umwami bwoko ki?
column3: Charles, umuntu wa mbere amaze igihe kirekire ari samuragwa muri kahise k'Ubwongereza, ubu ni umwami. Imyaka 70 amaze yiga nka samuragwa, yamutumye aba umwami wa mbere yimitswe yiteguye kandi akaba ari we mwami wa mbere  yimitswe afise imyaka myinshi. Uyu mwami w'imyaka 73 yamanye na nyina wiwe mu kiringo cose yari amaze ari ku ngoma, abategetsi b'isi baza bakagenda, harimwo abashikiranganji ba mbere b'Ubwongereza 15 hamwe n'apaperezida 14 ba Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Inyuma y'ingoma y'akaroruhore, rurangiranwa, ya Elizabeth II, dushobora kuba twiteze umwami w'ubwoko ki? Ni gute kandi umuganwa azwi ko atarya umunwa ku bibazo bimubakiye azomenyera kuvuga ataho yegamiye nk'Umwami? Nk'umwami, Charles ntazoba agifise igitabo c'inzira canke uruhusha rwo kugendesha imodoka vyiwe bwite -  canke ngo ashikirize ku mugaragaro ivyiyumviro vyiwe bikomeye. Kuba umwami birasumba umuntu ku giti ciwe. Ni amabanga atandukanye, intwaro zitandukanye, nk'uko umuhinga mu bijanye n'amategeko ajanye n'ibwirizwashingiro akaba umwigisha wa kaminuza Vernon Bogdanor abisigura. Prof Bogdanor ati: "Azwi kuva kera cane ko ingendo yiwe itegerezwa guhinduka. Abanyagihugu ntibakeneye umwami aza kwiyamamaza". Umwami Charles arazi neza ko ari ngombwa kwinengesera. Mu kiganiro na BBC mu 2018, yavuze ati: "Si ndi ikijuju. Ndazi ko kuba umwami ari igikorwa gitandukanye. Kwibaza ko nzokora nk'uko nkora ni uguhuba cane". Igihugu Umwami Charles  agiye kurongora kiratandukanye cane n'ico nyina wiwe yarazwe, mbere Prof  Bogdanor abona ko umwami mushasha azoyobora Ubwongereza burangwamwo imico n'imigenzo bitandukanye, abanyagihugu bari mu madini atandukanye. Amubonamwo nk'umuntu azogerageza kuba umuhuza, azokora uko ashoboye kwose kugira ngo yiyegereze inkehwa hamwe na ba ntahonikora. Prof Bogdanor amubonamwo kandi nk'uwuzoshigikira abanyamyuga, umuziki n'imicokama - abe cane nka Shakespeare ha kwishinga gusiganwa ku mafarasi. Ariko Sir Lloyd Dorfman yakoranye n'umwami Charles mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike mw'ishirahamwe ryiwe Prince's Trust, ntabona ko azohava yirengangiza ibibazo nkoramutima nk'ivyerekeye ihindagurika ry'ikirere n'uburimyi bukingira isi (Agriculture biologique/Organic farming). Sir Lloyd ati: "Abifisemwo ubumenyi bwinshi, kandi abikora neza cane. Biragoye kwiyumvira ko yoca abiheba ubwo nyene ku musi azoba abaye Umwami". Havugwa vyinshi ku bijanye n'uko Umwami yoba yipfuza ingoma ya cami "iciriritse". Ibi bisa n'uko yokwitaho kugira ab'ingoma y'ibwami bake bazezwa amabanga, aho Charles na Camilla, umuganwa William na Catherine ari bo boba inkingi. Umusiguzi ku vyerekeye amakuru y'i bwami,  Victoria Murphy, avuga ko n'aho bimeze uko, ubutumwa nyamukuru buzoba gukomeza amahoro n'ituze. Ati: "Ntimwitege ubudasa bunini kandi buteye ubwoba. Azokwinengesera cane". Umwanditsi Robert Hardman na we ati: "Twamye twiyumvira ko Umwamikazi ari umuntu azokwama ari mu bintu biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu vyose, ariko uretse we, uyu mwami yamye aseruka gusumba umuntu uwo ari we wese mu buzima bw'igihugu, gusumba umunyaporitike uwo ari we wese". Umwanditsi akaba n'umuhinga mu vya kahise, Sir Anthony Seldon abona ko Umwami Charles aterwa intege n'uko yabonetse ko afise ukuri ku bibazo nyamukuru, nk'igihe agabisha ku bijanye n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere. Nk'akarorero, mw'ikoraniro ry'i Glasgow ryari ryarekeye ibidukikije mu 2021, Charles yarashimagijwe cane n'abategetsi bakomeye nka Perezida  Joe Biden wa Amerika aho,  nk'uko bivugwa na  Hardman, yavuze ko igihagararo afise kw'isi kizomufasha cane nk'Umwami. Ati: "Ntivyari inkuru gusa. Aba bategetsi babiri baricaranye ahantu, hanyuma biden avuga ati: 'Watumye ibi vyose biba',". Ariko ni igiki witeze kubona muri uno mwami mushasha ? Abamuzi bavuga ko muri we afise agasoni, kandi avuga make. "Umutima wumva" ni kimwe c'ukungene bamudondora. Hariho ikimenyetso nk'umuhungu yahoze yidoga ko bamutyekeza kandi bamukumira kw'ishure. Igihe kimwe yanditse ikete rija muhira ari kw'ishure avuga ingene atuntuzwa mu buraro bw'ishire, avuga ati: "Bama bantera ikandambiri ijoro ryose canke bakankubita n'imisego canke bakanterera hanze, bakankubita cane uko bashoboye kwose". Umugore wiwe Camilla, amuvuga nk'umuntu "atihangana. Ashaka ko ibintu vyose birara bikozwe. Uko niko akora ibintu". Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'imboneshakure kw'isabukuru igira 70 ya Charles, yavuze ko hejuru y'ubwitonzi abantu bamubonamwo, arimwo akantu ko gukina. Camilla ati: "Bamubona nk'umuntu atafyinata, kandi nivyo. Ariko nagomba kwereka abantu ikintu c'ukwiyorosha kiri muri we. Arashira amavi hasi agakina n'abana, akabasomera udukuru wa Harry Potter mbere akaganira nabo". Charles arisanzura kandi akiyorosha iyo ari mu bantu, akiyegereza abantu mu kubatera udukuru dutwenza. Kumbure ibi bizohinduka nk'umwami, ariko igihe yri umuganwa wa Wales, yaritwaye nk'umugenzi wa bose, nka sekuru, kandi ataco yisigarije. Nk'umugabo ari mu myaka ya 70, nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko Umwami azohava ahinduka. Chris Pope yakoranye na  Charles ku kigo Prince's Teaching Institute, asigura uyu mwami mushasha nk'umuntu yama afise akazi kenshi, afise umwete kandi akora cane. Pope ati: "Ni umuntu yitaho cane kazoza keza k'abari imbere. Ibi uzobibonera mu bikorwa vyinshi akora". Mu bikorwa vy'ubugiraneza nk'umuganwa harimwo gukingira iragi no kubungabunga ubuhinga kama - ariko kandi agahimiriza impinduka n'iterambere". Pope ati: "Yama afise umwitwarariko ko akaranga katotakara, ariko ibi ntibisigura ko avuga ko dukwiye gusubira ku vya kera". Inyifato y'uyu Mwami mushasha  isa n'iyishaka gufatira ibi vyose hamwe , ikintu gishobora kuboneka nko kutagira aho ahagaze, gushaka ihinduka mu gihe ashaka kubungabunga akaranga. Rimwe na rimwe, asa n'umuntu yahoze ari umurimyi wo mu kinjana ca 18. Ikindi gihe, akumvikana nk'umuntu ashavuriye ihinduka, ababajwe n'ukungene abantu bamwe bamwe batitaweho kandi bibagiwe. Hari vyinshi azokora yarazwe na nyina wiwe mu gukunda ibikorwa, ariko kandi Umwami Charles  yaratoranye ukwemera n'uburwaneza vya nyina wiwe. Hitan Mehta yarakoranye nawe kuva igihe amufasha gushinga ishirahamwe British Asian Trust  mu 2007. Mehta avuga ati: "Umutima wiwe wuzuye ubugiraneza. Nibaza ko abantu batazi urugero rw'ukungene yitaho abantu. Igihe cose yama ariko aravuga ku vyerekeye isi ashaka gusigira abuzukuru  biwe. Ni ikibazo kimuhagaritse umutima". Ibi bishobora kubonekera ku kungene ahamagarira abantu kugira ico bakoze. Mehta ati:  "Hategerezwa kuba hari nk'isaha zitatu umusi umwe, hari ku wa gatanu mw'ijoro, aho naza numva terefone yiwe akambwira ati: 'Mpejeje kwumva imyuzurira yateye muri Pakistan. None turiko dukora iki'?  Ibi ntibisigura ko ata kintu yari afise akora. Ariko yumvise ikibazo kandi ariko aragikorerako. Ni ukuri ni umuntu yitaho abandi". Avuga kuri se wiwe, umuganwa Harry avuga ati: "Uyu ni umugabo ashobora gufungura ijoro ryitereye, yaheza agaca asubira ku meza kwandika, akavamwo asinzirira kw'ikaye". Charles Philip Arthur George yavukiye ku kirimba ca  Buckingham ku wa 14 z'ukwa 11 mu 1948. Igihe BBC imenyesha ivuka ryiwe, inkuru ntiyari iy'uko Umwamikazi yavyaye umwana w'umuhungu, ahubwo yari iy'uko nyina wiwe "yibarutse umuganwa". Haciye imyaka ine, yaciye aba samuragwa. Mu kiganiro co mu 2005, Charles yavuze ati: "Nisanze navutse mfise iki kibanza. Rero ni ngombwa ko ndagikamisha. Kandi ngakora ico nshoboye cose kugira mfashe". Arongoye amashirahamwe arenga 400, hanyuma mu 1976 yatanguje ishirahamwe ryiwe bwite, Prince's Trust, akoresheje amafaranga yatekerewe avuye mu gisirikare kirwanira mu mazi (Royal Navy). Rimaze gufasha ba ntahonikora bakiri bato bababa 900.000 bava mu bice bimwe bimwe bikenye cane mu gihugu, rikaba kandi ryamutumye ashobora kubona ingorane zitari nke zijanye n'imibereho y'abantu. Imigambi yari afitiye ishirahamwe Prince's Trust kugira rishobore gushikira ico yise "abagoye gushikirwa" ntiyaguye neza abategetsi. Mu 2018, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati ntibwabona ko ari iciyumviro ciza. Vyaragoranye gutangura". Igikorwa ciwe catumye yagirizwa gutoba no kwivanga muri poritike, ibi birego bikaba vyari bishingiye cane cane  ku ciswe "black spider memos" (twogereranya mu kirundi nka Inzandiko zirabura z'igitangurirwa ). Iri zina barifatiye ku nyadiko ya Charles y'igitangurigwa, aya akaba yari amakete Charles yandikira abashikiranganji bari muri reta kuva mu 2004 no kubandanya. Aya makete yinuba inzira reta yakoresha mu guhangana n'ibibazo nk'uburimi, gutunganya ibisagara, inyubako,  indero n'ibindi. Uwahoze ari umushikiranganji yarungikiwe aya makete ya Charles avuga ko atumva ko atewe igitsure cinshi, ariko abona ko umwami mushasha ari umuntu afise ivyiyumviro ntabanduka. Abona ko aje afise ivyiyumviro vyiwe ashaka kubandanya, aho kwemera kwakira ivyiyumviro bidasa n'ivyiwe. Ati: "Si numva ko mbangamiwe. Yarashikiriza ivyiyumviro vyiwe hanyuma ukaronka amakete. Si wa muntu yategeka canke yakara, ni umuntu yubaha". Ku vyo yagirizwa ko yariko aratoba, mu kiganiro yatanze mu 2006,  Charles yavuze ati: "Nimba uko ari ko kwivanga mu bintu, aho rero ndavyishimiye". Ariko aremeza ko yari mu bintu atabona "amaherezo yavyo". Ati: "Iyo ata kintu na kimwe ukoze, ata kintu na kimwe, bazokwidogera. Uhagurutse ukagerageza kugira ico ukoze kugira ngo ufashe, naho nyene barakwidogera". Mu kiganiro cakurikiye, yavuze ko yagerageje kwirinda imigambwe, ariko ko hageze aho bimubera ngombwa ko aterera ijwi hejuru ku vyerekeye "ingene abantu bari babayeho". None abanyagihugu bazoshigikira umwami Charles ku rugero rungana gute? Charles  avuga ati: "Ikintu nk'ingoma ya cami ntigishobora kumara kabiri mu gihe utokwishimikiza ivyiyumviro vy'abanyagihugu. Erega abanyagihugu batagishatse, ntaco bazobona". Nk'uko ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'ikigo YouGov muri Kigarama (12) 2021 kivyerekana, abantu baramukunze cane, aho hafi bibiri vya bitagu vy'abanyagihugu bamubonamwo umuco mwiza. Ariko amatora ngereranyo abandanya amwerekana ko adakunzwe nk'uko nyina wiwe, Umwamikazi Elizabeth II, canke umuhungu wiwe umuganwa William, bakunzwe, rero haracari benshi ategerezwa kwiyegereza. Cane cane, abakiri bato ntibamwiyumvamwo cane. Victoria Murphy avuga ko ibi bishobora kuba vyerekana ingaruka y'amashusho mabi ya Charles mu mareresi no mu biganiro vy'imboneshakure ku vyerekeye umubano wiwe n'umugore wiwe wa mbere , Diana, Umuganwakazi wa Wales, yapfiriye mw'isanganya ry'imodoka mu kwa munani 1997. Aya mashusho afise kuba ari uruvangatirane rw'ay'ukuri hamwe n'amakorano, ariko afise ingaruka zikomeye. Umupfasoni Murphy ati: "Ikintu gitangaje kuva mu myaka mike iheze ni ukungene Diana abandanya agaruka mu biyago vyerekeye umuryango w'i bwami". Mu gihe Charles yariko atera yegereza ingoma, habaye ukugerageza guhindura ivyiyumviro biri mu mitwe y'abantu, nk'uko umwigisha wa kaminuza, Pauline Maclaran, abivuga. Kuva batanguye kumucisha mu dukino dutandukanye nk'akitwa Spitting Image, bukebuke yagiye yerekanwa nk'umunyacubahiro, "umushingantahe" afise ibintu ngirakamaro avuga ku vyerekeye ibidukikije, nk'uko Prof Maclaran abivuga. Kumbure ivyo abanyagihugu bipfuza na vyo nyene si ukuvuga ko vyera. Hanyuma we nk'umukuru w'umuryango w'i bwami, azotegerezwa guhangana n'ikibazo giteye inambu isi ku bivugwa ku Muganwa Harry, na Meghan, umgore wiwe, hamwe n'iimgenderanire yabo n'umuryango w'i bwami. Umwami Charles azohangana n'ibindi bibazo vyo mu muryango, nk'ivyerekeye ikibazo c'uko Umuganwa Andrew ashobora guhabwa amabanga canke ntayahabwe, ni inyuma y'umwumvikano wabaye inyuma y'ibirego vyo gufata ku nguvu vyatanzwe na Virginia Giuffre. Hanze y'Ubwongereza, ikibazo nyamukuru kizoba ugutunganya gushasha imigenderanire igezweho n'ishirahamwe Commonwealth. Nk'umukuru mushasha waryo,  ni gute mu ngendo ziwe mu bihugu vya Commonwealth azoshobora guhangana n'ibibazo vy'umurage ugoye w'ubukoloni canke ibibazo nk'ubucakara? Umwami Charles abaye umukuru w'ibihugu 14 hamwe kandi n'Ubwongereza. Bimwe muri ibi bifise kurondera ubwigenge ariko biri muri Commonwealth, mbere umwami Charles aramaze gusigura neza ko yiteguriye ibiganiro nk'abantu bakuze ku bijanye n'ivyohinduka. Hari ingingo zimaze gufatwa zoroheje inzira y'ingoma yiwe nshasha. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, yaranezerewe cane igihe nyina wiwe yafata ijambo akavuga ko Camilla akwiye kwitwa Umutambukanyi w'umwami, hakwitwa umuganwakazi. Camilla azoba kirumara cane mu gihe Charles atanguye amwe mu mabanga akomeye cane kw'isi, ku myaka y'aho hafi abantu bose baba bakukurutse. Iki ni igihe camye kimurindiriye ubuzima bwiwe bwose. Ku Mwami Charles, ik ini igihe ciwe.

column2: Ntahokatarondererwa: Ornella Uwimana yize ivyo kuvura kuri kaminuza ariko akora intebe mu mapine
column3: Umwigeme Ornella Uwimana yahejeje ivyigwa vy'amagara y'abantu muri kaminuza mu 2020 ubu akaba akora akazi ko gukora intebe mu mapine. Intebe za mbere yazikoze mu 2016 akiri ku ntebe y'ishure, umuvyeyi wiwe aca arazimugurira kugira amutere intege. Agira ati:"Naguze amapine umunani ku bihumbi mirongo ine, hanyuma nca ndayakoramwo intebe. "Mu kuntera intege, umuvyeyi wanje arazishima aca arazingurira azishira kw'ibaraza" Ornella avuga ko akunda kwiyigisha gukora ibintu bitandukanye kuri YouTube. Ahejeje kaminuza mu gisata c'ivy'amagara y'abantu "Sante Publique" mu 2020, ivyo gukora intebe mu mapine yaciye abigira umwuga. Avuga ko abona ko amaze gutera imbere ugereranije n'aho yatanguriye. Agira ati: "Natanguye nkorera muhira ariko ubu narakotesheje ikibanza nkoreramwo ndiha ku kwezi. "Nkoresha abakozi batatu baza buri musi, n'abandi bane baza igihe mba ndabakeneye." Gushika ubu avuga ko yoba ageze ku mutahe wa miliyoni zine z'amarundi. Ornella Uwimana ahanura urwaruka kwubahuka gukora ico ari co cose rubona gishobora kuruteza imbere. Avuga ko hari benshi bagaya akazi canke ntibashiruke umwete wo kugakora. Ati: "Hari abambona ndiko ndahiga amapine bagatangara. Bakanayanyima nkarinda guca ku bafundi b'imodoka "Hari n'abantwenga bambonye ndiko ndatobora amapine kandi baheruka nari nagiye gusigisha inzara. "Ubu ariko batanguye gutahura kuko babona ntanguye gutera imbere. Uburundi buherutse gushinga umugambi wa PAEEJ (Programme d'Autonomisation Economique et d'Emploi des Jeunes Diplômés), werekeye urwaruka ruhejeje amashure kugira rwishingire imigambi yo gukora. Uwo mugambi reta yawuhaye imiriyaridi 48 z'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ariko n'ubu hari abacibaza uruhara nyarwo rwa PAEEJ, mu gihe abandi bafise amakenga ko bashobora gufasha koko urwaruka kwigenga mu butunzi rukareka kuzera inze.

column2: Burundi: Bunyoni na Bazombanza, aba mbere bemejwe muri leta ya Ndayishimiye
column3: Inama nshingamateka y'u Burundi ihejeje kwemezwa Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni mu kibanza c'umushikiranganji wa mbere hamwe na Prosper Bazombanza mu kibanza c'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu. Abo bategetsi bompi bemejwe mu matora yabaye mu mwiherero mu nama idasanzwe y'inama nshingamateka, yo kuri uyu wa kabiri inyuma y'amakete Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yaraye yandikiye inama nshingamateka ayisaba kwemeza abo bategetsi kuri ivyo bibanza. Abashingamateka bakomoka mu rurani Amizero y'Abarundi ubu bahurikiye mu mugambwe CNL ntibitabiriye ico gikorwa, bakavuga ko canyegejwe kandi ko bakimenyeshejwe ku munota wa nyuma mu gihe ngo ari igikorwa gihambaye cane. Eka na Agathon Rwasa, icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'Inama nshingamateka akaba ari nawe arongoye umugambwe CNL, ntiyitabiriye ico gikorwa. Prosper Bazombanza yemejwe ku bashingamateka  91 kuri 94 bari bitavye ivyo bikorwa, babiri bakaba batamwemeje nayo umwe akaba ataco yabivuzeko. Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni nawe akaba yemejwe nk'umushikiranganji wa mbere n'abashingamateka 92 kuri 94. Inyuma y'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu n'umushikiranganji wa mbere hategekanyijwe kuzoca hatangazwa abazaba bagize guverinoma bose. Ico kibanza c'umushikiranganji wa mbere caheruka mu Burundi mu 1998, Pascal Ndimira Firmin akaba ari we mushikiranganji wa mbere yaheruka, ku butegetsi bugira kabiri bwa Petero Buyoya yari yashikiriye ahejeje gutembagaza ubwa Sylvetsre Ntibantunganya ku wa 25/07/1996. Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni w'imyaka 48, yari asanzwe ari umushikiranganji w'umutekano kuva mu 2015. Yavukiye muri komine Kanyosha y'igisagara ca Bujumbura. Yize ishure kaminuza y'u Burundi mu 1994 ariko akaba atayibandanije kuko yaciye yinjira mu barwanyi ba FDD mu 1994 mu ntambara yadutse mu Burundi inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye gushika umuhari CNDD-FDD ushitse ku masezerano yo guhagarika intambara mu 2003. Bwana Bunyoni yarajejwe amabanga atandukanye CNDD-FDD imaze kwinjira muri leta, mu nyuma igatsinda amatora yo mu 2005. 2004-2005, yahawe amabanga y'umugenzuzi w'ibiro bikuru vy'igipolisi gishasha cari gihejejwe gushingwa gisubiriye urwego rw'ikijandarume. Kuva mu 2005 gushika 2007 yagenywe kuba umukuru w'igipolisi c'u Burundi. Kuva 2011 gushika 2014, Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni yagenywe kuba umukuru w'ibiro bijejwe ibibazo vya gisivire (cabinet civil) mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu. Hampande y'ivyo bikorwa, Bwana Bunyoni yajejwe amabanga atandukanye mu vy'umutekano ku rwego mpuzamakungu, mu 2007 yari mu ntumwa za leta mw'ishirahamwe ONU zari zijejwe gutsimbataza amahoro n'umutekano. Muri ico gihe nyene yari arongoye komite y'abakuru b'inzego z'igipolisi muri Afrika y'Ubuseruko (OCCPAE) muri rwa rwego rw'igipolisi mpuzamakungu ( Interpol). Yabaye umushikiranganji w'umutekano incuro zibiri, ubwa mbere kuva mu 2007 gushika 2011, hanyuma kuva mu 2015 gushika ubu. Bwana Bunyoni, umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye muri CNDD-FDD, yagirizwa uruhara mu bikorwa vyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu mu ndyane za politike zadutse mu 2015. Ari mu bafatiwe ibihano na Amerika bijanye n'ivyo ubutegetsi bwa Pierre Nkurunziza bwagirizwa vyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu. Mu 2017 leta y'u Burundi yarikuye muri sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha inyuma y'uko iyi sentare itanguje amatohoza ku vyaha vyakorewe kiremwa muntu mu Burundi kuva mu 2015. Ni umunywanyi w'umugambwe UPRONA, akaba avuka muri komine Rusaka y'intara ya Mwaro. Yahejeje amashure yiwe ya kaminuza mu gisata kijejwe ubufundi bw'ivyuma bikoresha umuyagankuba (Génie Electromécanique) kw'ishure kaminuza y'u Burundi. Mu mabanga yakoze, Bwana Bazombanza w'imyaka 60 yarabaye umwigisha w'ibiharuro, arakora mw'itonorero ry'ikawa SOGESTAL Kirimiro kuva mu 1990 gushika 1992. Yarabaye buramatari w'intara ya Mwaro kuva 2002 gushika 2005, aho yaca agenwa mu gisata kijejwe ubugenduzi bw'amashure y'imyuga mu ntara ya Mwaro kuva 2005 gushika 2010. Kuva 2010 gushika 2014, yakora mu murwi ujejwe ibibazo vy'amatongo gusubiza mu vyabo ababiteshejwe n'intambara (CNTB), imbere y'uko agenwa kuba icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu kuva mu kwa kabiri 2014 gushika 2015 asubiriye Bernard Busokoza yari aherutse kubogozwa n'umukuru w'igihugu w'ico gihe, Petero Nkurunziza. Yahora ari umunyamabanga mukuru w'ikigo kijejwe kugenzura ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe yo gutegekaniriza kazoza (ARCA) amabanga yashinzwe kuva mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2017. Imbere y'aho, yari  arongoye ishirahamwe rijejwe gutekaniriza kazoza abakozi, INSS, amabanga yahawe kuva 2016 gushika 2017. Aje ubwa kabiri muri ico kibanza, ariko mu gihe vyari bimenyerewe ko umukuru w'igihugu agira ivyegera bibiri mw'ibwirizwa rya 2005, ryasubiriwe n'irya 2018, ni we wenyene ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu.

column2: Burundi: Abarongoye Islam bavuga ko ata ngorane ihari hagari ya Islam na reta
column3: Abakuru b'idini rya Islam bavuga ko biyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe na Ndikumana Rashid, umusilamu aherutse kwifatira mu gahanga umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, iterambere rusangi n'umutekano. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ihuriro ry'imisigiti riri kumwe n'ihuriro ry'aba-Imam mu Burundi, bamenyesha ko ivyo Ndikumana yavuze yabivuze ku gatwe kiwe bitega aya mahuriro canke "umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi". Ndikumana arapfunzwe inyuma y'uko yumvikanye ahamagarira umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati n'umutekano, Ndirakobuca Gervais, gusaba ikigongwe, hari mu musigiti wa Madina uri muri zone Buterere mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Umwe mu bakuru b'idini rya Islam mu Burundi yabwiye BBC ko gushika ubu nta kibabuza gusenga uko bamye basenga na mbere. Abakuriye Islam mu Burundi mw'itangazo ryabo, bamenyesha abanywanyi babo ko "ata matati ari hagati y'umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi" na reta y'igihugu. Zuberi Mohamed, Umukuru w'inama ya bose mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi, yabwiye BBC ko bakira nk'abandi bose ivyashikirijwe na Ndirakobuca, kuko "vyaraba bose ntivyaraba aba Islam gusa". Avuga ko ivyo yavuze bitababuza gusenga uko bahora basenga. Ati: "Nta tegeko na rimwe rirasohoka ritubuza gusenga canke ritubuza guhamagarira abantu kuja gusenga. "Twebwe dufata y'uko yariko ashikiriza amakenga yoba afise canke uko abona ibintu". Zuberi avuga ko iyo habaye ingorane hagati ya reta no mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi "hariho inzira bicamwo kugira ngo tuvugane, nk'uko biri mu yandi madini". Abajijwe niba ivyasabwe n'umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano, Rashidi abona ko ata ngorane bishobora gutera. Ati: "Abatovyi mu mpande zose ntibabuze, ariko twebwe turazi ko aba Islam bahagaze neza, kandi ko ata ngorane zihava ziva muri ivyo gushika kuri uno munota nta kibazo kihari hagati ya reta n'aba Islam mu Burundi".

column2: Uwurinda David Cameron yahagaritswe azize kwibagirira imbunda muri WC y'indege
column3: Umupolisi yakora akazi ko kurinda uwahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza, David Cameron, yahagaritswe nyuma yo kwibagirira inkoho muri WC y'indege. Igipolisi c'Ubwongereza cemeje ko uwo mupolisi yakuwe mu kazi kandi akaba ariko aragirwako itohoza nyuma y'aho ivyo yakoze bimenyekaniye. Iyo nkoho bivugwa ko yari yuzuye amasasu, yatowe n'ingenzi hasigaye umwanya muto ngo indege ihagurutse, ayitora iri kumwe na passport ya Bwana Cameron. Indege barimwo y'ikompanyi British Airways yaratebejwe ikiringo c'isaha imwe, kuko umupilote yariko araremesha ingenzi azibwira y'uko abarinda vya hafi abategetsi bemerewe kwinjirana inkoho mu ndege. Bivugwa ko mu nyuma iyo nkoho yaciye ikurwa muri iyo ndege. Iyo nkoho, vyibazwa ko yari iyo mu bwoko 9mm Glock 17 pistol, bivugwa ko yasizwe muri iyo WC n'umupolisi acunga abantu vya hafi wo mu rwego rwa Met's Specialist Protection, akaba yari yayikuye mu rwubati rwayo ariko arihagarika. Passport ya Bwana Camero hamwe n'iy'uwo mupolisi, basanze ziri kumwe n'iyo nkoho, nk'uko bitangwaza n'ikinyamakuru co mu Bwongereza, The Sun. Umuvugizi w'igipolisi c'Ubwongereza yagize ati: "Turazi neza ivyo vyabereye mu ndege yari ije mu Bwongereza itariki zitatu z'ukwa kabiri kandi uwo mupolisi yakuwe mukazi. "Ibi vyabaye twabifashe nk'ibihambaye cane kandi twatanguje itohoza ry'indani." Bwana Cameron yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza ikiringo c'imyaka itandatu gushika mu kwezi kw'indwi 2016, aho yatanga imihoho kubera ivyavuye mu matora ya kamarampaka yo kuva kw'Ubwongereza mw'ishirahamwe rya Buraya.

column2: Tanzania-Covid : Prezida mushasha wa Tanzania asabwa na OMS kurwanya coronavirus
column3: Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS/WHO, umunye Ethiopia Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, yarungitse ubutumwa bwo gukeza umukuru  mushasha wa Tanzania, avuga ko yizeye ko bazokorana mu kurwanya  umugera wa Covid-19. Umukuru wa OMS yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Niteze ko tugiye gukorana kugira dukingire abantu indwara ya Covid-19, turangize ikiza hanyuma Tanzania kibe igihugu c'amagara meza gusumba. Dufashanije." Samia Suluhu Hassan kuri uyu wa gatanu ni ho yarahirira amabanga yo kuba umukuru w'igihugu mushasha wa Tanzania - iminsi ibiri inyuma y'urupfu rwa prezida John Pombe Magufuli. Uwo muhisi yaramenyekanye cane mu makungu muri uyu mwaka uheze ku buryo yitwaye ku kibazo ca coronavirus. Tanzania ntirasubira gutangaza ku mugaragaro amakuru yerekeye ico kiza kuva mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu mwaka uheze, kandi reta yaranse kurondera incanco n'ubwo OMS yagumye isaba ko abanyeTanzania bakingirwa. Ahubwo prezida Magufuli yahamagarira abanyagihugu gusenga no kwiyuka kugira bikingire uwo mugera. Magufuli yarakekeza kandi akamaro k'udufukamunwa, ikintu umwanditsi w'umuganda Charles Onyango-Obbo yavuze kuri Twitter ko kitaciye mu ryahumye Gado mu gicapo ciwe ca politike ca nyuma. Uwo munye Tanzania aba muri Kenya, Godfrey Mwampembwa  azwi cane kw'izina rya  Gado, yandika ibineguro yishimikije ibicapo  (Caricaturiste /cartoonist)   yerekana Magufuli, umukatolika yabigendera, ari ku bw'injiriro bw'ijuru yakiriwe n'umumarayika amubwira ati: "Nagira ndakumenyeshe ko udashobora kwinjira utambaye agafukamunwa!" Havuzwe vyinshi ku magara ya Magufuli imbere y'uko apfa ku wa gatatu, urupfu vyavuzwe ko rwatewe n'ukwunyuka kw'ikibazo c'umutima yari asanganywe. Yari amaze indwi zirenga zibiri ataboneka ahagaragara, abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bakaba bavuze ko yari agwaye Covid-19.

column2: Menya umushakashatsi Mireille Kamariza, yatoye DMN-Tre.
column3: Mireille Kamariza ni umushakashatsi muri kaminuza ya Harvard muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yatoye ubuhinga bworoshe kandi bunyaruka mu gupima ingwara y'igituntu. Yanonosoye ubumenyi mu bijanye n'ibinyabuzima ku rwego rwa doctorat muri kaminuza ya Standford. Akwirikirana cane cane ingwara zandukira, zirimwo malariya, igituntu, na SIDA. Muri kino gihe yongeyeko na coronavirus. Impamvu, Mireille Kamariza yabonye ko ari ingwara muri kazoza nayo nyene izoba ibangamiye ibihugu bikene gusumba ibindi. Yamenyekanye cane kuva mu mwaka wa 2018 aho amariye gutora uburyo bwo gupima igituntu akoresheje umwanya muto n'ibikoresho biciririkiye, bufatiye kw'irangi rya DMN-Tre. Bwabaye ubwa mbere, haboneka uburyo bwo gupima igituntu mu minota itarenga 15, hifashishijwe irangi uyu mushakashatsi yakoreye muri 'laboratoire' ya kaminuza ya Standaford muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu 2018. Aho ni mu gihe uwukekwa ko akirwaye yahora arindirira indwi zitatu mu kuronka inyishu y'ibipimo vyo kwa muganga. Uburyo Doctor Mireille Kamariza yatoye bwo gusuzuma ingwara y'igituntu -DMN-Tre (4-N,N-Dimethylamino-1,8-naphthalimide conjugate of trehalose), buhagaze ku guha ibara ridasanzwe imigera itera iyo ingwara y'igituntu (Mycobacterium tuberculosis), rituma yigaragaza bitagoranye muri rugagamisha (Microscope). Ni uburyo bushobora gutanga inyishu mu minota igera kuri icumi n'itanu, kandi iryo rangi rishobora kubikwa  ku  rugero rusanzwe rw'ubushuhe. Uburyo busanzwe bukoreshwa bwo kuvura igituntu, busaba kubanza gutegura igikororwa umurwayi aba yatanze, mu ntambwe zigera kuri 11, kikamara iminsi 21 muri 'laboratoire' kugirango bashobore gusuzuma ko hari imigera y'igituntu (Mycobacterium tuberculosis) yoba irimwo. Ubu buryo bwa Mireille Kamariza, burorosha kumenya nimba igituntu kigaragaye ku murwayi ari ikigatu (kitumva imiti isanzwe), canke gisanzwe. Ikindi kandi ngo bushobora gufasha kumenya nimba umurwayi ari ku miti iriko iramufasha, ko acandukiza canke atacandukiza. Ibi kandi ngo ntivyari vyoroshe gusuzuma hakoreshejwe uburyo bwari buhasanzwe bwo gupima iyo ngwara, nk'uko abashakashatsi bashigikiye ikoreshwa rya DMN-Tre babivuga. Ku bijanye n'igihe yibaza ubu buryo bworoshe bwo gupima igituntu buzoshikirira ibihugu bibukeneye nk'Uburundi, Dr Mireille Kamariza nta gihe atanga, ariko ngo ariko akora uko ashoboye n'ubwo ubu amaso yose yahindukiriye ikiza ca coronavirus. Uyu mushashatsi yimukiye muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika akiri umwana muto, ntiyibagiye ibibazo yabonye mu Burundi, igihugu ciwe c'amavuko. Avuga ko igituntu catwaye abantu yari azi, harimwo n'incuti, kandi ari ingwara ishobora kuvugwa igakira. Igituntu n'ingwara yandukira cane n'ubwo ishobora kwirindwa canke gukira iyo ivuwe. Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi rimenyesha ko iyo ngwara ifata abantu bagera ku miriyoni icumi buri mwaka, muri abo igahitana umuriyoni n'igice. Aho ni mu gihe abagera ku ca kane ( 25%) c'abatuye isi baba bahuye n'uwo mugera, ariko 5-15% akaba aribo bawugaragaza nk'ingwara. Dr Mireille Kamariza avuga ko ubushakashatsi bwiwe yabuhebeye ingwara zifata cane cane abo mu bihugu bikene, izo ahandi basigaye bita 'ingwara za kahise'. Uretse ingwara y'igituntu, yitaho n'ubushakashatsi ku ngwara za Malariya na SIDA. Hejuru y'izi ngwara, yamaze kwongera mu bushakashatsi bwiwe, ingwara ya Covid-19. Agira ati: "Mu gihe bigaragara ko ibihugu bitunze biriko biratera intambwe mu kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus mu gukwiragiza incanco mu banyagihugu bavyo, muri Afirika n'ibindi bihugu bikenye biraboneka ko bitazokworoha kuronka uburyo bwo kuyirwanya. "Nta nkeka ko muri kazoza na Coronavirus izosigara ari ikibazo muri ivyo bihugu cane cane." Intego ya Dr Mireille Kamariza, ni ukuronkera inyishu ibibazo birangwa mu gice c'abatuye isi kititaweho n'abandi bashakashatsi bakomakomeye. Ngo kuva akiri muto, yamye afise umwete n'ubwira vyo kubaza ibibazo no kubironderera inyishu, n'ubwo kuri bimwe bamubwira ko atazihari. Agira ati: "Naraba hejuru, nabona inyenyeri nkabaza abavyeyi igituma zitonze ukwo, bati nta nyishu zihari, nanje nti kabuki… reka tuzirondere?" Inyuma yo gutora irangi rya DMN-Tre rifasha gupima igituntu bitagoranye, Dr Kamariza yashinze ishirahamwe 'Olilux Biosciences Inc', yifatanije na Dr Carolyn Bertozzi yamubereye nk'umuhetsi (mentor) muri ubu bushakashatsi muri kaminuza ya Stanford. Intumbero ya Olilux Biosciences Inc, n'ukumenyekanisha ubu buryo bushasha bwo gupima igituntu hakoreshejwe irangi rya DMN-Tre, aba bahinga babona buzimbutse, bunyaruka, bushobora gukoreshwa aho ariho hose kw'isi no mu bice vya kure y'imiji n'ibisagara, bifise uburyo buciririkiye cane. Ikoreshwa ry'ubu buryo ngo rishobora kugabanya cane impfu ziturutse ku ngwara y'igituntu, ifatwa nk'iya mbere kw'isi ihitana abantu benshi mu ngwara zandukira, kuko bufasha abaganga gushoka bafata ingingo yo gushira umurwayi ku miti ubwo nyene mu gihe basanze yaranduye. Uyu mushakashatsi amaze gukorana n'umugambi ushigikiwe n'umurwizatunga Bill Gates mukurwanya iyo ngwara y'igituntu. Ku ntambwe amaze kugerako, avuga ko yatewe intege n'abavyeyi, abigisha, incuti n'abagenzi bamubonamwo impano idasanzwe y'umwete n'ubwenge bwo kurondera inyishu z'ibibazo. Ariko rero intambamyi ngo ntizibuze, ahanini akavuga ko zishingiye k'uko abantu bamufata, iyo babonye ivyo akora n'uwo ari. Gufata ko umuntu hari ivyo atoshobora kubera ico ari, ngo bituma benshi bataniyemera, ngo bashobore gukwirikira indoto zabo. Ni ibintu avuga ko atahura kuko nawe yabishiciyemwo, ariko agasaba abakiri bato kudateshwa intege n'ivyo abandi babibazako. Ati: "Kenshi iyo bantumiye kuvuga ijambo, baba biteze umugabo akuze w'umuzungu". Ku bwiwe ngo igikenewe n'umwete wo gukora ubushakashatsi, ntibisaba igitsina, ibara ry'uruhu canke ibindi vyose biranga abantu mu butandukane bwabo. Icifuzo ca Mireille Kamariza ngo ni ukubona abakiri bato bari inyuma yiwe baronka uburyo bwo kwiga bagashika kure. Ikimuraje ishinga ni ukubona abana b'Abarundi  bifuza kunonosora ubushakashatsi batabishobora kiretse barinze kuja mu mahanga.

column2: Big Fizzo yoba yariganye indirimbo ya Diamond Platnumz?
column3: Umuririmvyi rurangiranwa mu Burundi, Desire Mugani, azwi cane kw'izina rya Big Fizzo, avuga ko atiganye indirimbo ikunzwe cane ya Diamond Platnumz wo muri Tanzania. Big Fizzo yatanguye kumenyekana mu Burundi mu myaka 1996 aho yaririmba mu mugwi wavuza injana ya rap witwa N***a Soul. Ico gihe, naho igihugu cari mu bibazo bitoroshe vy'intambara, ari mu baririmvyi bake baremesha ibiteramo bihimbaye mu Burundi. Nyuma y'imyaka irenga mirongo ibiri ari muri uyu mwuga, Fizzo aracari ku rwego rwo hejuru mu muziki ndundi uvuzwa henshi wokwita pop music mu Congereza. Indirimbo ziwe zigezweho ubu nka Konzi, You na Sugua, zirirwa zisamirana ku maradiyo mu Burundi n'ahandi, mu butambiro eka mbere no ku mbuga nka Youtube, aho usanga zinaherekejwe n'amasanamu ahinguye bigezweho. Ariko bamwe mu bakunzi b'umuziki hamwe n'ababikurikiranira hafi, batanguye kwibaza niba Big Fizzo atoba ariko arafata inzira ya hafi mu kwandika indirimbo ziwe. Indirimbo Tetema y'umuririmvyi Diamond Platnumz yaririmbanye na Rayvanny imaze kurabwa kuri Youtube inshuro zirenga imiriyoni 27, kuri ubu ikaba iri mu zirabwa cane z'uwo munyamuzika. Uyumvirije ugaca unumviriza Sugua ya Big Fizzo yaririmbanye na Elly's Boy, Double Jay na Kirikou A-Kili bo mu kigo c'umukizi Bantubwoy, ntiwogenda udakozweko n'ugusa kwazo. Uhereye ku mudiho, ku ntambo co kimwe na hamwe hamwe mu majambo, ufise ugutwi kw'umuziki urashobora kwumva ko harimwo ibija gusa. BBC Gahuza yashatse kumenya ico uwo muririmvyi avuga kuri ukwo gusa kw'izo ndirimbo, ica ivugana nawe aho asanzwe ari mu gihugu c'Ubutariyano. Big Fizzo yatanguye ahakana ko ata ntumbero n'imwe yigeze agira yo kwigana iyo ndirimbo Tetema ya Diamond Platnumz. Yagize ati: "Abantu bavuga ivyo amatwi yabo agomba kuba atumva neza. Ntushobora kuvuga ko indirimbo zisa kubera ko gusa zifise umudiho umwe. "None duce tuvuga ko zouk zose zisa? Canke ko reggae zose zisa? Ku ntambo naho, imiziki myinshi abantu batamba bimwe, none ni kangahe batamba ndombolo mu miziki yo muri Kongo?" Fizzo kandi abandanya avuga ko mu ndirimbo nyinshi abantu bandika bimwe, gusa bigatandukanywa n'umudiho w'indirimbo canke injana. Ati: "None nk'ubu noreka kuririmba ngira nti 'ndagukunda' kuko hari uwundi yabivuze? Ivyo ntibishoboka. Amajambo ategerezwa gusa, ariko uburyo tubiririmba nibwo buzana ubudasa". Iyindi ndirimbo bivugwa ko Big Fizzo yiganye ni indirimo You, aririmba asa n'uwiyama abamuzanako ingorane mu buryo butandukanye. Iyi ndirimbo nayo uyumvirije, hanyuma ugaca wumviriza indirimbo yitwa F*** You y'umuririmvyi Kizz Daniel wo muri Nigeria, uca umengo hahindutse ururimi n'umurindi gusa. Fizzo yagize ati: "Kuri iyi ndirimbo yoyo sinobesha, kuko Kizz Daniel yampaye 'inspiration'. Harimwo vyinshi bisa muri izo ndirimbo zibiri. Wumvirije nko ku gitari hoho uravyumva." Big Fizzo yabandanije avuga ko ari ibintu bisanzwe kwisunga abandi baririmvyi, mu gihe ugerageje ukazanamwo umwihariko wawe. Abaririmvyi basubiramwo indirimbo z'abandi canke bifashisha bimwe mu biri mu ndirimbo z'abandi bariho, kandi si ibintu vya vuba eka mbere na barurangiranwa mu muzi barabikoze. Aha twotanga nk'akarorero ka Michael Jackson ku ndirimbo ya Manu Dibango yitwa Soul Makossa. Umuhisi Michael Jackson yafashe amajambo "ma-mako, ma-ma-sa, mako-mako ssa", ari mu iyo ndirimbo, ayakoresha mu ndirimbo yiwe "Wanna be starting something". Michael Jackson yaremeye ko yitije ayo majambo ayashira mu ndirimbo yiwe, aca yemera kuriha amahera Dibambo bitarinze guca muri sentare. Mu mwaka uheze, vyaramenyekanye ko hatanguye urubanza rwarezwemwo Ed Sheeran ku ndirimbo yiwe "Thinking Out Loud", urubanza rukibandanya. Umuryango wa Ed Townsend, yandikiye hamwe na Marvin Gay indirimbo rurangiranwa "Let's Get it On", wareze Ed Sheeran kwigana iyo ndirimbo ntegerwa yo mu 1973. Gutera imbere kw'ikintu ico ari co cose kuvana n'ubwira abagikora bagishiramwo hamwe n'umwihariko gifise mu kwitandukanya n'ibindi bikorerwa ahandi. Mu gihe vyotangura kwibazwa ko abaririmvyi mu Burundi atakindi bakora atari gukoporora indirimbo z'abandi, kazoza k'umuziki wo mu Burundi koba kageramiwe. Vyoba ari ibintu bitangaje kuko u Burundi bwamye bufise abaririmvyi bandika indirimbo nziza zibereye ugutwi nka ba Canco Amisi, Christophe Matata, Africa Nova, Kidumu eka mbere na Big Fizzo. Mu gutera imbere kw'umuziki ni ngombwa ko urwaruka rugitangura kwumva imuziki mu gihugu kinaka, rwumvishwa umuziki wihariye wo muri ico gihugu. Iki ni igikorwa cega abanyamuziki bo nyene, ariko cane cane amaradiyo ategura ibiganiro vy'urwaruka harimwo umuziki.

column2: Burundi: Inyuma y'indwi imwe ibitungwa bizosubira kubagwa
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu n'umutekano bumenyesha ko ibitungwa bigiye gusubira kubagwa kuva ku musi wa gatatu w'indwi iza. Ivyo vyashikirijwe n'umunyamabanga ntayegayezwa Martin Niteretse mu nama yagiranye n'abarongoye intara, abarongoye uturere mu gipolisi hamwe n'abajejwe uburimyi n'ubworozi mu ntara. Ingingo yo guhagarika kubaga ibitungwa yari yafashwe kubera iyaduka ry'ingwara y'inyonko yo mu kiyaya ca Rift (Fièvre de la vallée du Rift) Kugira ivyo bishoboke ngo ibitungwa vyo kubagwa bitegerezwa kwegeranirizwa hamwe. Agira ati:"Abayangayanga  bakeneye kuzobaga mubatunganirize aho begeraniriza ibitungwa bashaka kuzobaga mu ndwi iza. "Nta nka izobagwa itavuye aho muri ico kibanza. Kuko ntayizova mu muhana ica ija kubagwa ubwo nyene." Ivyo bitungwa kugira bije kubagwa, bitegerezwa kumara imisi indwi biri mu kibanza categekanijwe mu makomine yose, bigenzurwa ko bitagwaye. Martin Niteretse kandi avuga ko ata nyama izova mw'ikomine zija mu yindi. Nta n'inka zirekuriwe kuvanwa mu ntara zija mu yindi, kiretse ngo izijanywe kubagirwa mu gisagara c'ubutunzi ca Bujumbura. Ariko ngo nko mu ntara zitagira inka nyinshi, abayangayanga baho barashobora kuja kuzigura ahandi, ariko abategetsi b'aho baziguze bategerezwa kubaha urupapuro ruziherekeza. Kandi ico gihe zizoca ziherekezwa n'igipolisi kugira ntihagire izururukira mu nzira canke izuririra mu nzira  zitagenzuwe neza. Icipfuzo ngo n'uko mu ndwi iza hatangura kubagwa inka, hamwe n'impene n'intamaba 'bishobotse'. Abadandaza basabwe kandi kudaca bikika mu kiza ngo baduze ibiciro. Ku bijanye n'urucanco, Martin Niteretse yabasavye kuja gutegura abajejwe ako kazi kugira incanco zishitse bace baja ku kivi. Haraheze amezi arenga abiri hatanzwe itegeko ko kizira kikaziririza kubaga inka, impene n'intama, mu ntumbero yo gukumira inyono yo mu kiyaya ca Rift.

column2: Margaret Wambui: Umunya-Kenya afise umudari wa olympic asaba ko haba umugwi wa gatatu w'abanonotsi
column3: Urwego ruraba inkino z'abanonotsi (World Athletics) rukwiye gushiraho umugwi ugira gatatu mu mahiganwa kugirango ruhe amahirwe abafise urugero runini rwa testosterone yo guhiganwa ku nkino bifuza, ivyo vyasabwe n'umugore w'umunya-Kenya, Margaret Wambui yiruka imetero 800. Co kimwe n'abandi banonotsi  bashirwa mu mugwi w'abafise icitwa 'Differences of Sexual Development' canke DSD -Wambui ntashobora guhiganwa ku kirere kiri hagati y'imetero 400 na mile imwe (1.6km) hamwe n'abandi bagore kiretse abanje gufata imiti igabanya iyo nkabuzo canke uwo musemburo ya/wa testosterone. Uwo munya-Kenya yatsindiye umudari wa bronze ku metero 800 mu nkino za Olympic zo mu 2016. Wambui yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Vyoba vyiza bashizeho umugwi ugira gatatu w'abanonotsi bafise testosterone nyinshi - kuko sivyo kubuza abantu gukoresha impano zabo." Urwego rujejwe izo nkino kw'isi , World Athletics, ruvuga ko ata mugambi wo gushiraho uwo mugwi rufise kandi ko ruzobandanya gushira abanonotsi mu migwu ibiri ihasanzwe y'abagabo n'abagore. Iciyumviro c'umugwi ugira  gatatu mu nkino zo kunonora imitsi cari kimaze kuvugwa, ariko Wambui abaye uwa mbere agishigikiye ku mugaragaro. Yavuze  ati: "Twoba aba mbere duhiganywe muri uwo mugwi - twoca duha intege abandi banyegeza ingene baremwe. "Twobereka ko atari amakosa yabo, ko uko ariko baremwe, kandi ko ata kibi bakoze." Uwo munonotsi w'imyaka 25, atarahiganwa kuva mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2019, ntazokwitaba inkino za olympic za Tokyo, mu gihe vyamugoye guhitamwo kwiruka ku metero nke (100-200) canke ku kirere kirekire. Kuva World Athletics ishizeho ingingo zigenga abanonotsi bafise DSD mu 2018, nta n'umwe mu bari batahanye imidari ku metero 800 mu nkino za Rio arasubira kwiruka izo metero mu mahinganwa mpuzamakungu. Mu nkino za 2016, Wambui yabaye uwa gatatu inyuma ya Caster Semenya wo muri Afrika y'Epfo yaronse umudari w'inzahabu n'umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yaronse umudari w'ifeza. Wambui ati: "Birababaje kubona muri abo batatu bose ata n'umwe azoba ahari. ''Baratubujije kubandanya amahiganwa, kuko siko twari twabiteguye. Ndababaye kubona ntazokwitaba Olympic  kubera amategeko ya World Athletics." Ku wa gatatu  Francine Niyonsaba yaronse umwanya usabwa kugira azohiganwe ku metero 5000. Abo batatu bashirwa mu mugwi y'abafise "differences of sexual development" kubera urugero ruruni kurusha urusanzwe ku bagore rw'umusemburo(inkabuzo) wa testosterone. Ku mategeko ya World Athletics yasohotse mu 2018, abanonotsi b'abagore bafise DSD ntibashobora guhiganwa ku birere biri hagati ya metero 400 na mile imwe (1.6km) - kiretse babanje kugabanura urwo rugero rwa testosterone, World Athletics ivuga ko ruha abanonotsi akarusho kadakwiriye ku bandi baba bariko barahiganwa nabo. Urwo rwego ruvuga ko testosterone bimwe mu vyo ituma ariko ishobora kwongereza ubushobozi bwo kutaruha n'inguvu z'imitsi, kandi ko amategeko ajanye n'aba DSD akenewe kugira ''habe ihiganwa ritarenganya kandi riri n'ico rivuze mu murwi w'anbagore". Abanonotsi barashobora  kugabanya urugero rwa testosterone mu gufata iminti canke mu kwibagisha - n'ubwo kwibagisha bidahanurwa cane. Semenya yatwaye umudari w'inzahabu wa Olympic kabiri, ari imbere ku rugamba rwo kurwanya amategeko ajanye n'abafise DSD. N'ubwo amaze gutsindwa kenshi muri sentare za Buraya, aracabandanya urugamba. Mu kwezi kwa kabiri, yajanye urubanza rwiwe muri sentare ya Buraya y'agateka ka zina muntu, avuga ko ingingo yo gusaba abanonotsi ko bahindura imibiri yabo ari ugohonyanga uburenganzira bwa zina muntu. Umugwi w'abuganganira Semenya (w'imyaka 30) , baranakema icitwa urwego rujejwe inkino - gushika ubu rufatwa nk'amashirahamwe yikorera ivyayo - mu nzira yo kurwanya amategeko ya DSD ya World Athletics. Patrick Bracher  , umwe mu bunganizi mu mategeko avuga ati: "Hamwe tworonka ingingo ya sentare ya Buraya ijejwe agateka kja zina muntu ivuga ko inzego mpuzamamakungu z'inkino atari inzego zikorera ivyazo kandi zirengeye amasezerano mpuzamakungu yereyeke agateka ka zina muntu, ico coba ari ikintu gihambaye cane ku nkino muri rusangi." "Inzego mpuamakungu z'inkino zizoca ziba nk'inzego zikora imirimo ijanye n'ama reta - kuko zitunganya ibintu ku rugero mpuzamakungu - ico coba ari ikintu gihambaye ku nkino. "World Athletics izotegerezwa guca ibifatirako kuko bazoca bamenye ko iyo bagiye muri sentare ica imanza z'inkino (urwego rw'amategeko rwa mbere rwisumbuye mu nkino) muri kazoza, amaherezo bazotegerzwa kwisunga ibintu mu buryo bwagutse gusumba: mu yandi majambo, ibibazo vy'agateka ka zina muntu." Hamwe botsindwa,  Bracher avuga ko urugamba rw'amategeko rwa  Semenya ruzoba rurangiye. Bibonwa mu buryo butandukanye Ariko , bitandukanye na Wambui, Semenya  ntashaka ko hazanwa umugwi wa gatatu mu nkino z'ubunonotsi. Bracher avuga ati : " Caster Semenya yavutse, akura, yiga kwiruka, abaho yongera ahiganwa nk'umugore, urubanza rwose rero rukaba ar'urwo uburenganzira bwiwe bwo kubikora." "Bibi gusumba ngaho ni uko ushizeho umugwi nk'uwo, bivuga ko ata muntu n'umwe yoheza ngo yiruke muri uwo mugwi atabanje kwerekana icese ibijanye n'amagara yiwe. Vyoba bisubiye kuba ibindi bipimo bifatiye ku gitsina biciye ku ngingo y'uko umuntu abivuga ubwiwe." Hagati aho World Athletics yarahakanye ko ata mugwi wa gatatu uzoshirwaho. Mw'itangazo yahaye BBC, World  Athletics yavuze iti: " Abanu bamenye ko  abanonotsi bafise DSD bagize 0.7% y'abanonotsi bose b'abagore, gutyo umugwi ugira gatatu ntiwkora ku nkino zitari nke." Gufata ibintu gutyo bisigura ko Wambui - avuga ngo "gufata imiti [igabanura testosterone] ntivyigeze binca mu mutwe" - ntazokwigera ashobora gusubira  guhiganwa ku kirere yifuza. Amaze kuvyiyumvira cane , uwo munonotsi w'imyaka 26, yaciye ahitamwo kugerageza imetero 5000, bivuze ko azomara igihe atasubira guhiganwa kuko azofata umwanya wo kumenyera ico kirere. Avuga ati: "Bizombabaza kuraba inkino za Olympic kuri television kandi nari kuba nashoboye kuzitaba. "Ariko nzoziraba kuko inkino [Sport] zindi mu maraso."

column2: Burundi – Covid: Incanco z’iki niba leta itazihimiriza?...Impari ku ngingo ya reta
column3: Ingingo ya reta y'Uburundi yo kwemera kuronswa incanco za Covid-19 ariko itazohimiriza abantu kwicandagisha irabonwa ugutandukanye mu benegihugu. Bamwe bagaragaza ko bari kumwe na reta y'Uburundi kuri iyi ngingo igihe abandi babona ko ataco bimaze kuba reta yemera kuronswa incanco idafise umugambi kuri zo. Izo ncanco ntizirashika mu Burundi. Abategetsi bajejwe amagara y'abantu bamenyesha ko poritike ya reta ihari kuri iki kiza ari ukugipima, kuvura abakirwaye no guhimiriza abantu kucirinda, ariko ko ivyo kwicandagisha bitarimwo. Reta ariko ubu yugururiye imiryango incanco ishobora kuronswa na Banki y'isi kugira ngo "uwuzoshaka ariwe azokwicandagisha", nk'uko umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu yabivuze. Gushika ubu reta y'Uburundi ntishigikiye ivyo gucandaga Covid nk'uko vyumvikana mu mvugo z'abategetsi, ibi vyongereza amadidane mu benegihugu batari bake ku bushobozi bw'incanco za Covid zemejwe n'abahinga. Ingingo yo kwemera kuronswa incanco ariko reta ntizihimirize abenegihugu benshi bayivuzeko ibitandukanye ku rubuga rwa Facebook rwacu. Bimwe bimwe ni ibi ngaha: Japhet Céle Abafash iy ngingo bubahwe baciye ubwenge. Icambere hari igihe bokwanka bagasanga bahomvye uruncanco rumeze neza. Ku rundi ruhande hari igihe bokwemera bagasanga bemeye ibitwicira ubuzima. Rero ndakunze ukuntu batabaye nk'imbata imenya ko imize ikintu kitarika aruko camaze gushika mu muhogo. Umurundi wese ahari afate kamwe ndaje kuriha kuko kirazira kwigerezako Fabien Ndayizeye Novuga ko biteye isoni kuri Leta Mvyeyi    !Wemere ko bakuzanira urucanco,hanyuma ngo sinzosaba abantu banje kwicandagisha?Quelle irresponsabilité !!!Hari amaleta yemeye neza izo ncanco,kandi n'abakuru b'ibihugu bakaziterwa.Hako basesaguza Banque mondiale ng'izane incanco batazozikoresha,nibazihe abazikeneye bareke kwigenza nk'abariko bakina comédie !!! Stany Barutwanayo Ni vyiza kubanza kuraba uko ziriko zirakora, bongere basuzume neza ko izo batuzaniye arizo bariko baha ab'iwabo. Kuko urazi ko abazungu ata rukundo bafitiye Africa Mubindi Wirabura Urugendo rwa samia suluha hasaan biragaragay ko yaratumw kur mugnzi w ko ategerezw kwemeer icanco bitabay ivy tanzania ikugara frontiere nibivayo vyos. Imana idutabare 666 iratanguy Etienne Nsanzamahoro Kuzaruntera bizabasaba kubanza kumboha naho ubundiho mbona abazungu ivyo bateguye bagira babishikeko, ndashimiye indongozi zacu kuba ruziteza uwushatse none ko bobo batavyiteza ?? Gusa ntaho woshobora gukwepera umuzungu ntanahamwe. Abashatse kubigerageza urabona kobahise basezera isi vyihuse, Kandi bose urabona kobapfuye impfu zimwe bose imitima yarahagaze Magufuri, Peter. column2: Nigeria: Umupasitori atangisha 700$ kugira yereke abantu 'irembo ribashikana mw’ijuru’
column3: Umuvugabutumwa muri Nigeria ari mu yabira inyuma yo kubwira abantu ko azi irembo ribashikana mw'ijuru riri mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'ico gihugu, ariko ko kugira aribereke bategerezwa gutanga amafaranga. Pasitori Ade Abraham yarezwe mu gipolisi n'umwe mu banywanyi biwe avuga ko uyo mu pasitori yamutangishije 310.000 y'amanaira (amafaranga yo muri Nigeria), angana n'amadorari y'abanyamerika 750, kugira ngo bashobore kubona iryo rembo avuga ko riri mu gisagara ca Araromi-Ugbeshi, mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu muvugabutumwa yemereye BBC ko koko yabwiye abantu ivy'iryo rembo, akavuga ko ari "Imana akorera" yarimweretse mu ntumbero yo kuraba aho abanyashengero biwe bageza mu kwemera kwabo, ariko akavuga ko ata muntu n'umwe aramuha amafaranga. Ishirahamwe ry'Abakristu muri Nigeria ryasohoye itangazo ryikurako uyo mupasitori Ade Abraham, igipolisi co mu ntara ya Ekiti naco kikaba cegeranije inzandiko z'abanywanyi b'ishengero ryiwe, kikaba catanguye amatohoza. Ishengero rya Pasitori Ade Abraham ryahora rifise icicaro mu ntara ya Kogi, mu nyuma ryimukira mu ntara ya Kaduna, imbere y'uko ryimukira amaja mu bumanuko n'abanywanyi baryo, mw'ikambi yubatse mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu munyashengero yamureze ku gipolisi yaciye yisubirira muhira iwe i Kaduna kuva ico gihe, ariko umugore wiwe yaranse kumukurikira, akavuga ko "igihe c'umunezero" cari kigiye gushika vuba. Ariko uyu mugabo n'umugore badashaka ko amazina yabo amenyekana babwiye BBC ko babandanya bavugana kuri terefone umusi ku musi. Pasitori Ade, azwi kandi kw'izina rya Noah Abraham (Nowa Aburahamu), aherutse kwerekanwa mw'ireresi yazungurutse cane, aho yariko asaba abasenga Imana gutera akamo incuti zabo ziri mu mahanga gutanga intererano y'amafaranga mu rusengero rwiwe.

column2: Mu mafoto: Umwami Charles ku musi wa mbere atanguye amabanga
column3: Ku wa gatanu mu gatondo, niho Umwami mushasha w'Ubwongereza Charles III yava i Balmoral akaja i Londres /London, inyuma y'urupfu rwa nyina wiwe, Umwamikazi. Muri urwo rugendo ari kumwe n'umutambukanyi wiwe, Camilla Umwami yafashe indege yamuvanye i Aberdeen imujana ku kibuga c'indege ca RAF Northolt imbere y'uko aja gushikiriza ijambo igihugu aciye ku mboneshakure. Ashitse ku kirimba ca Buckingham, yasanganiwe n'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bamwipfuriza kuroranirwa muri  bino bihe bishasha. Ejo ku wa gatanu nyene, abahungu biwe, Abaganwa William na Harry, niho bava i Balmoral. Umwami Charles III yururutse imodoka ku kirimba ca  Buckingham nk'Umwami ku ncuro ya mbere

column2: Itegeko rya Sharia ni iki? Rivuze iki ku bagore bo muri Afghanistan?
column3: Aba Taliban bavuga ko bazotwara Afghanistan hisunzwe ata guhesha ingingo z'amategeko  ya Islam zizwi nk'itegeko rya Sharia. Uwo mugwi washikiriye intsinzi umaze gufata umugwa mukuru Kabul, gutyo urangaza  imyaka hafi 20 y'uruhara rw'ingabo mpuzamakungu zari zirongowe na Amerika uri ico gihugu. Hariko haba iki muri Afghanistan? Mu kiganiro ca mbere n'abamenyeshamakuru inyuma yo gufata Kabul, umuvugizi w'aba Taliban yavuze ko ibibazo bimwe bimwe nk'ivyerekeye ibinyamakuru n'uburenganzira bw'abagore bizokwubahirizwa hisunzwe "itegeko rya Islam", ariko uwo mugwi nturasigura ico ivyo bizoba bivuze mu ngiro canke mu bikorwa. Uwatsinzindiye agashimwe k'amahoro ka Nobel Malala Yousafzai - yarashwe n'aba Taliban afise imyaka 15 ahorwa guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakobwa bwo kuja mu mashure muri Pakistan - yagabishije ko ingene aba Taliban batahura itegeko rya Sharia bishbora kuba akaga ku bakobwa n'abagore muri Afganistan. Yabwiye BBC ati: " Nararonse akaryo ko kuvugana na bamwe mu baharanira uburenganzira muri Afghanistan, barimwo abo mu mashirahamwe y'abagore, nabo barafise ayo makenga ko batazi ico ubuzima bwabo bugiye kuba." "Benshi baribuka ivyariko biraba mu 1996-2001, gutyo bakaba bafise amakenga menshi ku mutekano wabo, uburenganzira bwabo, ugukingirwa [no] gusubira kuja mu mashure." Igijhe aba Taliban baheruka ku butegetsi  abagore ntibari bemerewe gukora akazi canke kuja mw'ishure. Kuva ku myaka umunani, abakobwa bategerezwa kwambara burka, abagore nabo bakaba bari barekuriwe kuja ahabona  ari uko baherekejwe n'umuntu w'umugabo wo mu muryango. Abagore babirenzeko barakubitwa abantu barorera. Ministre w'Ubwongereza ajejwe intwaro yo hagati Madame Priti Patel, avuga ku migambi ya reta yo kwakira impunzi 20.000 z'abanya-Afghanistan mu Bwongereza, yavuze ko atizeye ukwizeza kwatanzwe [n'aba Taliban]. Yabwiye BBC ko uwo mugwi ufise kahise ko gukandamiza abagore, kandi ko "ivyo bitagiye guhinduka buno nyene". Itegeko rya Sharia n'indinganzizo y'amategeko ya Islam. Riva muri Koran, inyandiko shingiro ya Islam, hamwe na fatwa - imanza ziba zaciwe n'inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam. Sharia ubundi risigura  "inzira igaragara, icamwo abantu benshi igana ku mazi". Itegeko rya Sharia rikora nk'igitabo c'ingingo zigenga ukubaho aba Islam bose bategerezwa kwisunga, harimwo amasengesho, kwisonzesha no gufasha abakene. Rigamije gufasha aba-Islam gutahura ingene bategerezwa kwigenza mu kintu icarico cose c'ubuzima bwabo hisunzwe ingene Imana ibishaka. Sharia rishobora guha insiguro icarico cose kijanye n'ubuzima bwa minsi yose  bw'umu-Islam. Nk'akarorero, nk'umu-Islam atazi neza ico yokora aronse ubutumire bw'abo bakorana kugira bajane mu kabare inyuma y'akazi  ashobora kuraba inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam kugira amugire inama maze akore ibijanye n'amategeko y'idini ryabo. Ibindi bice vy'ubuzima bwa minsi yose aho aba-Islam bashobora kubaza inzobere ingene bovyifatamwo n'amategeko agenga umuryango, amafaranga hamwe n'imirimo y'ubugwizatunga. Sharia ishira ivyaha mu migwi mikuru mikuru ibiri: ivyaha vya ''hadd", biba ari ivyaha bikomeye cane bifise n'ibihano bizwi, hamwe n'ivyaja vya ''tazir'' aho igihano gishingwa n'umucamanza. Ivyaha vya ''hadd'' birimwo ukwiba, gushobora guhanishwa guca ikiganza c'uwagiriwe n'ico caha, hamwe n'ubusambanyi bw'abarenze ibigo, bushobora guhanishwa kwicishwa amabuye. Amwe mu mashirahamwe ya Islam avuga ko hari inzitizi  nyisnhi hamwe n'umurundo w'ivyemezo bikenerwa mw'ishirwa mu ngiro ry'ibihano vya hadd. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ryariyamirije kwicisha  amabuye, rivuga ko ari ''iyica rubuzo canke ubundi buryo bwo gufata canke guhana umuntu  bunyamaswa, ata buntu, butesha agaciro ko rero bubujijwe". Si ibihugu vyose vya Islam bishira mu ngiro  ivyo bihano vya hadd  kandi amatohoza amaze kwerekana ko  aba-Islam babona mu buryo butandukanye cane  ibijanye n'ibihano ruhasha. Apostasy, canke uguta ukwemera, n'ikibazo kitavugwako rumwe cane mu ba-Islam kandi abahinga bavuga ko inzobere nyinshi mu vyigwa vya Islam zivuga ko ico caha gihanishwa urupfu. Ariko hari umugwi muto w'incabwenge z'aba Islam cane cane abakorana n'ibihugu vya Buraya, bavuga ko ukuri kw'isi ya none gusigura ko ''igihano'' gikwiye kurekerwa Imana - kandi ko Islam ubwayo itageramiwe n'uguta ukwemera. Na Koroan ubwayo ivuga ko ''ata guhata'' mu bijanye n'idini. Nko ku yandi mategeko yose, Sharia rirazitanye kandi kurishira mu ngiro bihagarara ahanini ku bwiza n'ubumenyi bw'abahinga. Abanyamategeko b'aba-Islam batanga intumbero n'ingingo bashinze. Intumbero ifatwa nk'urubanza rwaciwe yitwa fatwa. Hari amashure atanu  atandukanye y'itegeko rya Sharia. Hari inyigisho zine za Sunni: Hanbali, Maliki, Shafi'i na Hanafi, hamwe rero n'inyigisho imwe ya Shia, yitwa  Shia Jaafari. Izo nyigisho zitanu zitandukanye ku buryo   zisobanura, ijambo ku rindi, inyandiko itegeko rya Sharia rikomokako.

column2: Ukraine: 'ntihagire ikindi mugurira muri Russia kiretse umwavu n’ingano' - niko US igabisha Africa
column3: Uwuserukira Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mw’ishirahamwe ONU  yaragendeye ibihugu vya Afrika, kimwe mu vya mugenza, kwari ukugabisha ko bitohirahira ngo bigurire ikintu kindi mu Burusiya kiretse intete n’umwavu, anagabisha ko bishobora gufatirwa ibihano. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru i Kampala muri Uganda, Linda Thomas-Greenfield yavuze ati:  “Uburusiya bwama buvuga ngo ibihano bwafatiwe ku mfungurwa no ku bindi bifitaniye isano n’uburimyi vyatumye ibiciro biduga mu bihugu bitari bike. [...] Nagomba kumenyesha ko ata bihano twafatiwe ibintu ivyo ari vyo vyose vy’uburimyi biva mu Burusiya. “Uburusiya burashobora gushora hanze ibidandazwa vyabwo vyo mu gisata c’uburimyi, harimwo umwavu n’ingano, kandi n’ibindi bihugu birashobora kubigura”. “Nayo ku bihano vyafatiwe Uburusiya”, niko Linda Thomas-Greenfield abandanya avuga, “nk’akarorero ku bitoro, mu gihe igihugu cofata ingingo yo gukorana n’Uburusiya mu bisata bwafatiwemwo ibihano, aho coba gihonyanze ibi bihano[…].  Aha rero tugabisha ibihugu ko bitohirahira ngo birenge kuri ibi bihano”. Ibihugu hafi vyose vya Afrika bishima kutegamira kuri Ukraine muri ino ntambara yayo n’Uburusiya. Ibi mu bisanzwe bisigurwa n’ukutagirira icizere Uburengero, imyaka vyamaze mu bukoloni, be n’impuhwe z’incabwenge mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika zize mu Burusiya. Aho nyene, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika ni abakiriya bakomeye b’intete za Ukraine, bakaba bahanzwe n’ikibazo c’ubukene bw’imfungurwa kigenda ciyongera. Ni mu gihe ku rubuga, intambara zibandanya ziha inkumbi muri Ukraine. Mu turere tw’intara ya Donetsk tugenzurwa na Ukraine, abasivire batanu baraye bishwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya, nk’uko bivugwa n’umukuru wa gisirikare muri Donetsk Pavel Kirilenko. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Telegram ati: "Kw’igenekerezo rya 5 Myandagaro (5), Abarusiya bishe abasivire batanu ba Donbass. Abandi 14 barakomeretse”. Ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko hari igice kigira kabiri c’imfashanyo Amerika iha Ukraine gifise agaciro k’umuriyaridi umwe cimirije gutangwa. Isoko ryabwiye Reuters ko ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu wa Amerika mu ndwi iza - ari nko ku wa mbere – bizotangaza iyindi mfashanyo ingana n’umuriyaridi w’amadorari y’abanyamerika izorungikirwa Ukraine. Muri ino mfashanyo harimwo ibisasu vya za muzinga zitera ibisasu vyinshi, zizwi nka HIMARS, ibirwanisho vyo gukorora indege vyo mu bwoko bwa NASAMS, hamwe n’ibimodoka ntamenwa vyo m ugisata c’ubuvuzi, bizwi nka 50 M113. Perezida Joe Biden ntaratera igikumu kuri uru rupapuro, bikaba bishoboka ko ibigize iyi mfashanyo, ibi navyo bikaba ari ibitigiri hamwe n’ubwoko bw’ibirwanisho, bishobora guhinduka. Mu gihe Biden yoterako igikumu, iyi yoba ari yo mfashanyo nini cane itangiwe icarimwe ihabwa Ukraine kuva intambara itanguye. Amerika imaze kurungikira Ukraine imfashanyo y’agaciro k’imiriyaridi 8.8 igizwe n’ibirwanisho n’ibindi vya nkenerwa. Maison Blanche/White House yanse kugira ico ishikirije ku vyerekeye iyi mfashanyo yimirije.

column2: Afghanistan -Taliban: Urwamo rw'amasasu rwo kwigina itaha ry'Abanyamerika
column3: Mu gisagara ca Kabul humvikanye urwamo rw'amasasu menshi rwo kwigina ukuva mu gihugu kw'ingabo za nyuma za Amerika mw'ijoro ryakeye - ikiringo caranze irangira ry'imyaka 20 izo ngabo zari zimaze muri ico gihugu. Umunyamakuru wa BBC Lyse Ducet ari i Kabul yakurikiye ingene vyari vyifashe igihe inkuru yamenyekana ko indege ya nyuma y'Abanyamerika ihagurutse, yabwiwe mugenziwe yariko aramubaza ikibiriraraho kuri mboneshakure (television) ati : "Wewe umviriza ibiriko biraba mu kirere hejuru yacu mu gisagara ca Kabul. Niba atari ikimenyamenya [ko abanyamerika bavuye burundu mu gihugu] sinzi icari co. Wewe umviriza urwo rwamo rw'amasasu". Aba Taliban n'ababashigikiye mu gisagara co mu bamuko ca Kandahar biriwe barigina inyuma y'aho ingabo za Amerika ziviriye muri ico gihugu. Kandahar nico gisagara kiza ubugira kabiri mu bunini muri Afghanistan. Ni naco gifatwa nk ''iwabo w'umutima w'aba Taliban". Abantu muri ico gisagara biriwe barazunguka mu mabarabara bazungagiza amabendera y'aba Taliban mu kwigina irangira ry'imyaka 20 ingabo za Amerika zari zimaze muri ico gihugu. ukwigina muri Kandahar Yakejewe kuba yavuye  ku butaka bwa Afghanistan ubwa nyuma Gen Major Chris Donahue niwe yabaye umusirikare wanyuma wa Amerika mu kuva ku butaka bwa Afghanistan. Niwe yuriye ubwa nyuma indege C-17   yatahukanaye ingabo za nyuma za Amerika mw'ijoro ryakeye. Uwo mu komanda wa division y'indege  ya 82 yashimagijwe cane ku mbuga hwaniro. Alex Plitsas yanditse kuri twitter ati: " Ico niko uburungozi busa… yabanje kuraba ko abasirikare bose binjiye mu mutekano". Uwundi akoresha twitter iblondeitall ati: "Niwe akoza ikirenge hasi ubwa mbere, niwe wa nyuma mu kuva ku butaka" Intwazangabo yavyigiye muri kaminuza ya gisirikare ya West Point , Donahue- jenerari w'inyenyeri zibiri - afise uburambe kandi bw'amateka meza mu ngabo za Amerika. Yaranagwanye mu ntambara ya Iraq mu 2003-11. Niwe yatwaye ingabo za Delta Force squadron muri Afghanistan mu gihe cataziriwe ''isugerezwa " mu  2011, hanyuma aba umukuru w'ibikorwa vya gisirikare mu 2019-20. Abategetsi ba Amerika bavuga ko bafatanije n'ibihugu bacuditse , bashoboye kuvana muri Afghanistan abantu bashika ibihumbi 123 imbere y'umunsi ntarengwa wa  31 isaha zitandatu z'ijoro. Ariko haracasigayeyo abanyamahanga benshi, barimwo amajana y'Abongereza n'Abanyamerika bari hagati ya 100 na 250, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi. Ministre w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire Dominic Raab yavuze ko Ubwongereza bukeneye guhangana n''uko ibintu bisigaye vyifashe'' muri Afghanistan hanyuma bakorane n'ibindi bihugu kugira botse igitutu aba Taliban ariko mu buryo bworoheje. Hamaze igihe atawuzi iyo ibintu biva n'iyo bija kuva aba Taliban  bigaruriye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan hakaba hagumye ibibazo vyo kumenya ingene reta nshsaha igiye kuba imeze. Ariko umushikiranganji bwa Pakistan ajejwe  imigenderanire  yavugiye mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ko "reta yumvikanyweko igiye gushingwa mu minsi ya vuba" muri Afghanistan. Aba Taliban bari bavuze ko bari mu biganiro n'imigwi yose kugira bashike ku mwumvikano wo gushinga reta. Ingene uwo mugwi uzotwara igihugu n'ico intwaro yabo izoba ivuze ku bagore, uburenganzira bwa muntu  n'ubwisanzure muri poritike gushika ubu ntibiramenyekana.

column2: HRW isaba UN kubandanya ishinze ijisho ku Burundi ku gateka ka zina muntu
column3: Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu riharanira agateka ka zina muntu, Human Rights Watch (HRW),  ritera akamo akanama ka ONU kajejwe umutekano kubandanya gushinga ijisho ku kungene agateka ka zina muntu kabandanya guhonyangwa mu Burundi. Iryo shirahamwe rivuga riti: "Ibikorwa bibi bijanye n'umutekano hamwe n'inkuru zerekeye ubwicanyi, kunyuruza no guhagarikwa bidakurikije amategeko birabandanya mu Burundi, n'aho hari habonetse icizere c'impinduka inyuma y'amatora ya prezida mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 2020." Mw'itangazo ryo kw'itariki zine z'ukwezi kwa 12, ryashikirijwe n'igihugu ca Afrika y'epfo kirongoye akanama ka ONU kajejwe umutekano muri kino gihe, hafashwe ingingo yo guhagarika ivyegeranyo vy'urutavanako ku Burundi. Ariko bakabandanya kuganira ku kungene ibintu vyifashe muri ico gihugu mu manama agenewe Afrika y'ibiyaga binini n'iyo hagati. Avuga kuri iyo ngingo, Louis Charbonneau ashinzwe imigenderanire ya HRW na ONU agira ati: "Inama zerekeye Uburundi mu kanama ka ONU kajejwe umutekano zisigaye zitumvikanwako na bose kandi ntizibere ku gihe, mu gihe ico gihugu n'abagishigikiye bagerageza kuburizamwo igenzurwa ry'uko ibintu vyifashe. "Mu bisanzwe, ako kanama kazoguma kagenzura nk'uko kahora uko ibintu vyifashe mu Burundi, ariko abarundi benshi, iyo ngingo n'ubutumwa buteye amakenga mu gihe kitoroshe Uburundi burimwo." Gushika ubu reta y'Uburundi nta co iravuga kuri iryo tangazo, ariko yamye ivuga ko ivyo HRW ivuga ata shingiro bifise kandi bifise intumbero ya politike. Reta y'Uburundi yakiranye umunezero udasanzwe iryo jambo ryashikirijwe n'umukuru w'Inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano, ku bijanye no gusaba ko Uburundi bwokurwa kuri urwo rutonde. Umukuru w'igihugu Évariste Ndayishimiye yanditse ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter ati: "Ndashimiye Inama Nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kubona yakirije yompi akamo nayiteye mu nama ya bose." Kubw'iwe, gukura Uburundi ku rutonde rwigwako na ONU bifasha iki gihugu, incuti zaco n'abagenzi kwitaho iterambere n'imibereho myiza y'abenegihugu. Ingingo ya ONU ya 2303, yemejwe mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2016 bivuye ku mutekano wariko urahungabana n'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu, yategeka umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU kuza aragira icegeranyo cerekeye uko ibintu vyifashe mu Burundi buri mezi atatu.

column2: Mu mafoto: Umusi mukuru wa Christmas hirya no hino kw'isi
column3: Abantu hirya no hino kw'isi bariko barahimbaza kimwe mu biringo vyeranda ku kirangamisi c'abakristu.
