column2: Papa Francis yashoboye gusoma imisa ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro inyuma yo kubagwa urura
column3: Papa Francis yashoboye kwiyereka abantu ubwa mbere kuva bamukoze kubera ingorane y'urura runini, haraciye indwi. Mu gihe yaboneka ko ameze neza, uyu mupapa w'imyaka 84 yasomye imisa yo muri ino ndwi ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro  Gemelli i Roma. Abantu baharurwa mu majana bakoraniye hanze y'ibi bitaro, bamwe bakoma akaruru ngo "Viva il Papa!" (Twogereranya na "Papa, ramba"). Vaticano ivuga ko igikorwa co kuvura Papa indwara y'urura runini izwi nka "symptomatic diverticular stenosis" cagenze neza. Papa yabwiye abari aho ati: "Ndanezerewe kubona nshoboye kurangura ibanga ryanje ryo ku wa Mungu n'aho ndi ng'aha". "Narumvise ko mwambaye hafi cane kandi ko mwansengeye. Ndabashimiye n'umutima wanje wose". Ashimira abakozi bo muri ivyo bitaro, yavuze ko "yiboneye ingene ubuvuzi bwiza ari nkenerwa, kandi bose bakaburonka, mu bindi bihugu nk'uko bimeze hano mu Butariyano". Yongerako ati: "Ntidutakaze aya mahirwe. Ni ngombwa ko tuyabungabunga". Bamwe mu bana barwariye muri ivyo bitaro babonetse bari kumwe na Papa ku rubaraza. Ntibiramenyekana ikiringo azomara muri ibi bitaro mu gihe azoba ariko ararwaruka. Indwara ya Diverticular ni indwara itera ibivyimba mu rura runini, bigashobora gutuma rwipfungānya, bigatuma umuntu yuzura inda akanababara mu nda. Francis, yavutse mu  1936 i Buenos Aires, yaratakaje igice c'ihaha ry'iburyo afise imyaka 21. Afise kandi ikibazo co mu matako kimutera ububabare buhera mu gice co hasi c'umugongo bukamanuka mu maguru. Mu 2014, yagiye ahagarika ibikorwa bimwe bimwe kubera ibibazo vyo mu mushishito.

column2: Burundi: Hilaire Manirakiza afasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi'
column3: Hilaire Manirakiza yize bimugoye kubera uburyo aho yagiye arahagarika ubu akaba akora akazi katamenyerewe rwose ko gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro na YouTube kwongereza ababakurikirana (Views). Uwo musore avuga ko yize ivyerekeye ubuhinga bwa none bw'itumatumanako mu mashure yisumbuye, avuga ko yize bimugoye bituma atabandanya kaminuza. Avuga ati:"Nahagaritse imyaka itanu ntiga kubera ubukene, ngaruka kubandanya umwaka w'icenda abo twigana bahejeje. "Narasubiriye ndamara umwaka ntiga banyirukanye kuko nari maze imyaka ibiri ntariha amahera y'ishure." YouTube, iriha abafise 'accounts' bivanye n'igitigiri c'abaraba video bashirako n'igihe bazimarako. Mu Burundi hari benshi bamaze gushinga YouTube channels bashirako videos bafise intumbero yo gukorera ayo mafaranga, vyuzi rero ni wo mukate wabo. Kuri Manirakiza n'abafise ubuhinga nk'ubwiwe n'abo guha vyuzi abo bafise. Ni ubuhinga bushasha bwo kurondera amahera n'aho hari abanebagura uko bukora, hamwe  n'ubwoko bw'amakuru ashirwa kuri izo mbuga mu kurondera vyuzi. Hilaire Manirakiza avuga ko agiheza ishure yaciye aronka akazi ko gufata amasanamu ku mboneshakure yo ku mbuga hwaniro, ariko mu nyuma amasezerano bari bafitaniye aza guhagara. Avuga ko yaciye yigira inama yo kwiga uko yobaho mu gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi' (views). Agira ati:"Abafise imbuga hwaniro bampemba hakurikijwe igikorwa bantumye ico ari co. "Uwo mfashije kuronka nk'ama vyuzi 1000 ku musi, ampa ibihumbi 15 vy'amarundi. "Birantunze kuko kuva bampagaritse ku kazi, inzu nguma ndayiriha uko nahora, gufungura canke kwambara ni kwa kundi." Mu kwezi kumwe amaze atanguye ico gikorwa, Manirakiza Hilaire amaze gufasha abantu barenga cumi kuduza ama vyuzi. N'akazi akorera aho ari ho hose, kuri telefone ngendanwa canke ku nyabwonko, ariko akavuga ko afise umugambi wo kwugurura ibiro vyo gukoreramwo. Ahanura urundi rwaruka kwicara rufise ikintu ruzi gukora ku buryo n'aho bokwirukana mu kazi k'ivyo wigiye, ushobora guca wikorera ivyawe.

column2: Ubufaransa bwemeje amakori ataguye neza Amerika
column3: Inama nshingamateka y'Ubufaransa yemeje integuro y'itegeko rigena amakori acibwa ibigo bikomakomeye nka Google, Facebook na Apple. Guca 3% nk'ikori ku bikorwa vy'ibigo bikoresha itumatumanako bigera ku 30 birwiriyemwo ivyo muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bishobora kuzanira leta y'Ubufaransa miliyoni 400 z'ama euros muri uyu mwaka wonyene. Abashingamateka birengagije akamo ka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zavuga ko ari akarenganyo, kandi ko zigiye kwihora mu kuzoshiraho amakori nk'ayo. Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca Leta w'Ubufaransa Bruno Le Maire yiyamirije impungenge za Amerika, avuga ko ibintu nk'ibi bikwiye gutoregwa umuti mu biganiro. Ubufaransa buvuga ko bikwiye ko ibigo vyifashisha itumatumanako, bitanga amakori aho bikorera aho kuyatanga aho bifise icicaro gikuru, ivyinshi bikaba bibarizwa muri Amerika. Ubufaransa bwananiwe kwumvisha ibindi bihugu gufatira hamwe iyo ngingo mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, bari kwita 'GAFAs' mu majambo avunaguye, n'ukuvuga Google, Apple, Facebook na Amazon. Ubu rero bwahisemwo gutangura bwo nyene guca ayo makori, ariko bukizera ko iyi ngingo yabwo izoba iy'igihe gito. Hari ibiganiro hagati y'ibihugu bitunze kuruta ibindi bigize umugwi G7 hamwe n'ikigo kijejwe kuraba  imigenderanire mu butunzi n'iterambere mu kugabangana amakori avanwa mw'ikoreshwa ry'itumatumanako muri kino gihe rifise ikibanza gikomeye. Gutyo rero hakaboneka umwumvikano uvuye mu nama ugasubirira ingingo nka bene iyi y'Ubufaransa. Ubwongereza bwatangaje umugambi wo gushiraho amakori asa n'aya y'Ubufaransa, ico cemezo kikazoshobora kuja mu bikorwa mu mwaka uza. Espagne yo yakoze umushinge w'itegeko muri uyu mwaka. Umunyamakuru Dave Lee akorera muri Amerika ya ruguru ati 'Ubufaransa burikumiriye'. Ubutegetsi bwa Washington bwamaze kuvuga ko bugiye kwugurura ingingo yitwa 'Section 301', mu nzira yo gutohoza nimba hari aho burenganywa. Ni ingingo yakoreshejwe mbere, nk'inzira yo gushiraho ibiciro bishasha ku bihugu ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwibaza ko biriko biburiramwo mbege. Nimba Ubufaransa bugiye gukura miliyoni amajana z'ama euros mu mifuko y'ibi bihangange vyo muri Amerika, Amerika nayo ishobora kuvuga iti :'kuki tweho tutokura amafranga mu vyo Ubufaransa bukorera iwacu?' Uko niko vyagenze ku Bushinwa,  bigahamba Amerika mu ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora no gukomera muri kazoza. Amakori ku bikorwa vy'itumatumanako, ni ikibazo giteye impungenge ku Bufaransa, kuko bwikumiriye. Ibiganiro vyigeze gutangura hagati y'ibihugu kuri ayo makori vyahavuye biburizwamwo kuko bamwe muri bo batari bashigikiye ayo makori. Aha umuntu yovuga nka Irland yavyungukiyemwo mu guhamagara abashoramitahe bashaka isoko ku mugabane wa Bulaya. Ibindi bihugu nk'Ubwongereza, Espagne na Autriche biracagonanwa gufata iyo nzira. Ico impande zompi zihuriyeko n'uko igihe carenze co kwiyumvira ingene ibigo vyungukira mw'itumatumanako bitozwa amakori. Ubufaransa bushobora kwitega ibintu bibiri. N'uko ibihugu bitera ikirenge mu cabwo bishiraho amategeko yavyo, bigatuma Ubufaransa butaba nyamwigendako. Ikindi n'uko iyo ntambwe Ubufaransa bwateye ishobora gutuma n'ibindi bihugu bibona ko hageze kwumvikana uko bitoza ayo makori biri hamwe. Ivyo vyotuma amafranga ivyo bigo vyahora vyikwegerako ataha mu bigega vy'ibihugu.

column2: Kubera iki Esther Nish yaririmvye indirimwo "Kavorivori"?
column3: Umuririmvyi w'umurundikazi azwi nka Esther Nish yaganiriye na BBC Gahuzamiryango mu kiganiro c'abakenyezi. Kiretse kuvuga ku kuntu yatanguye umuziki hamwe n'aho umushikanye ubu, yanavuze ku ndirimbo yiwe nshasha Kavorivori. Iyo ndirimbo naho irimwo amajambo asanzwe akoreshwa mu bihozo abavyeyi b'abarundikazi baririmbira abana babo, kuri we inafise insiguro yihariye.

column2: Ingabo za Ukraine i Kharkiv ziriko zisubiza inyuma ingabo za Russia
column3: Ingabo za Ukraine mu gisagara kigira kabiri c'iki gihugu zasubije inyuma Aburusiya ku buryo vya muzinga vyabwo bidashobora kuzishikira, nk'uko umunyamakuru wa BBC uriyo abivuga. Muri iyi ntambara, ingabo z'Uburusiya zari zimaze imisi 70 yose zicucagira Kharkiv amabombe y'urutavanako, mu gihe zoba zasubijwe inyuma iki gisagara coba cinjiye mu gahengwe. Agace ka nyuma kabohowe ni ikigwati ca Pytomnyk, nk'uko vyaraye bitangajwe n'igisirikare ca Ukraine. Hagati aho, ingabo z'Uburusiya ntiziriko zirasubira inyuma - nk'uko vyagenze mu micungararo ya Kyiv. Zivugwa ko ziriko ziriyegeranya, aho ingabo zirwanira ku butaka ziva mu mabatayo (bataillons) atari make ziriko zirahamvya abandi. Nayo mu ntara ya Donbas, igisirikare ca Ukraine congeye gutangaza ko casambuye ibiraro vyakoreshwa n'ingabo z'Uburusiya mu kujabuka uruzi ruri mu karere ka Luhansk mu buseruko bw'igihugu ahamaze imisi habera intambara zikomeye. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi wa Ukraine yasohoye amasanamu avugwa ko ari ibifaru vy'Uburusiya n'ibindi bimodoka vyasambuwe mu kigwati ca Bilohorivka, hafi y'igisagara ca Lysychansk kiri mu minwe ya reta ya Ukraine. Umukuru w'akarere ka Luhansk Serhiy Haidai avuga ko Bilohorivka ari "ikirindiro ntamenwa" cari "gihanganye n'igitigiri kinini" c'ingabo z'Uburusiya - nk'uko bimeze i Mariupol. Igisirikare c'Uburusiya ntaco kiravuga kuri ibi bivugwa na Ukraine, bitaremezwa n'uruhande rwigenga. Inyuma y'aho bunaniriwe no gufata umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine, Kyiv, mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw'igihugu mu  ndwi za mbere z'iyi ntambara, Uburusiya bwavuze ko bugiye gushira inguvu zose mu buseruko kugira bwigarurire uturere twa Luhansk hamwe na Donetsk. Gushika ubu, Moscou ntirashobora gushika kuri iyi ntumbero. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi w'Ubwongereza Ben Wallace avuga ko Uburusiya buzova muri iyi ntambara muri Ukraine bwatakaje inguvu ugereranije n'aho bwari bugeze imbere y'igitero cabwo. Avugana n'abanyamakuru i Washington - aho yabonaniye n'umushikiranganji wa Amerika ajejwe kwivuna abansi Lloyd Austin - Wallace yavuze ko Vladimir Putin ari we wenyene "ashobora kumenya iyo azoshikana igihugu". Ati: "Impera n'imperuka ategerezwa kwemera ko yataye umutwe. "Uko vyogenda kwose, reka tuvuge ko Ubusuriya ari igihugu giciriritse gusumba uko cari kimeze imbere y'iki gitero". Wallace avuga kandi ko igisirikare c'Uburusiya "gishaje" kandi ko gishobora kugira ingorane zo gusubira kwiyubaka kubera ibihano ruhasha igihugu cafatiwe. Vyongeye, Wallace avuga ko yemera ko Ubushinwa bugenda butinya ibiriko bikorwa n'Uburusiya, bukabona ko atari vyiza mu bijanye n'ubudandaji. Ati: "Si incuti yo kwizera. Ntushobora kumwizera ngo uherezeko".

column2: Ubuhindi bwategetse Google kuriha irindi hadabu ry’imiliyoni $113
column3: Ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko caciye Google ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 113 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera ibikorwa biteye kubiri n’amategeko ajanye n’ihiganwa mu gisata c’itumatumanako, igihano kigira kabiri mu kiringo kiri munsi y’indwi imwe. Ico kigo cagiriza Google gukoresha ubwiganze ifise mu bubiko bwayo bw’ama Apps (applications)  mu guhatira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje app yayo. Iki kigo gisaba iyi kompanyi rutura y’ubuhinga kutazibira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje ubundi buryo canke baciye mu zindi nzira. Google yavuzeko iriko irihweza ivyo birego. Umuvugizi wa Google avuga ati: “Mu kugumiza ku giciro gito,  vyatumye ubuhinga bwa digital (numérique) bukomera mbere bwugururira imiryango amamiriyoni amajana n’amajana y’Abahindi”. Uyo muvugizi yagize ati: “Tubandanya kwitaho abakoresha n’abahingura ama Apps, tukaba turiko turihweza iyi ngingo kugira ngo turabe intambwe zikurikira”. Muri iki cemezo canditse ku mpapuro 199 casohowe ku wa kabiri, ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko, (Competition Commission of India, CCI) kivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amategeko amwe amwe mu bubiko bwayo bwa Play Store ategeka abahingura ama Apps “gukoresha gusa” ubuhinga bwayo mu gutanga canke kugurisha ama Apps. Ikinyamakuru Reuters kivugako ico kigo kijejwe ubugenzuzi gisaba Google gufata ingingo umunani zikosora ibi bintu mu mezi atatu, harimwo kutazibira abahingura ama Apps gukoresha ubundi buryo bwo kuriha, haba mu kugura ikibanza muri Apps zisanzwe zirimwo canke kugura ama Apps. CCI  ivuga kandi iti: “Google itegerezwa gukorera mu muco iyo ivugana n’abahingura ama Apps kandi igatanga insiguro ku mafaranga basabwa”. Iyi ni ingingo y’incamugongo ya vuba kuri Google isanzwe ihanzwe n’ibirego bituma itakaza icizere mu Buhindi. Mu ndwi iheze iyi kompanyi yatangishijwe ihadabu ry’imiliyoni 161 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera yakoresheje urubuga rwa Android kugira yiganzire isoko. CCI  ivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amasezerano y’agahato ku bakoresha ububiko bwayo kugira ngo imbuga zayo – nka Google Chrome, YouTube, Google Maps  n’izindi – zikoreshwe. Itohoza rijanye na Android ryaratangujwe mu 2019, inyuma y’imyidogo y’abakoresha Telefone zo mu buhinga bwa Android.

column2: USA: Imyiyerekano muri Wisconsin irabandanya inyuma y'aho abapolisi barashe umwirabure
column3: Mu ntara ya Wisconsin muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika hadutse imyiyerekano inyuma y'aho igipolisi kirasiye amasasu menshi umwirabure. Uyo mugabo yarashwe azwi kw'izina rya Jacob Blake, araremvye aho ariko aravurirwa. Ireresi yerekanywe ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana bwana Blake ariko araraswa amasasu mu mugongo igihe yariko agerageza kwinjira mu modoka mu gisagara ca Kenosha. Abategetsi b'ico gisagara bamenyesha ko haciye hafatwa ingingo zo kuguma muhira mu masaha y'ijoro kubera imyiyerekano yadutse inyuma y'ako kabi. Abantu baharurwa mu majana mw'ijoro ryakeye bugarije ibiro vy'igipolisi. Amamodoka yaturiwe mu gihe abari mu myiyerekano nabo bumvikana bakoma induru bavuga bati: "Ntidushobora gusubira inyuma". Mw'itangazo ryo kugabisha abanyagihugu, igipolisi gisaba abacuruza bakora amasaha 24 kuraba ingene bokwugara kubera hashobora kuba ubusuma bukorwa n'abitwaje ibirwanisho. Abapolisi bakoresheje vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi mu kugerageza gushwiragiza amajana n'amajana y'abari mu myiyerekano barenze ku mategeko yo kutava muhira gushika isaha imwe z'igitondo uno munsi ku wa mbere. Buramatari w'intara ya Wisconsin Tony Evers ariyamiriza iraswa rya bwana Brake avugwa ko ata kirwanisho yari afise. Mw'itangazo yasohoye yavuze ati: "N'aho tutararonka amakuru arambuye ku vyabaye, ico tuzi neza ni uko atari umwirabure wa mbere arashwe canke akomerekejwe canke yishwe bunyamaswa kandi ari mu minwe y'abajejwe umutekano mu ntara yacu canke mu gihugu cacu". "Turiyamirije ikoreshwa ry'inguvu z'umurengera rituma ibintu biyangara iyo habaye ikibazo ku birabure wa Wisconsin". Izina rya Jacob Blake ryazungurutse cane ku mbuga hwaniro maze abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi batera igikumu ku rwandiko rusaba ko abapolisi bakoze iryo shano bashirwa imbere y'ubutungane. Igipolisi co mu gisagara ca Kenosha kimenyesha ko "umupolisi yarashe" inyuma y'isaha cumi n'imwe zo ku mugoroba ejo ku wa Mungu. Kivuga kandi ko abapolisi baciye banyarukana Bwana Blake kwa muganga mu gisagara ca Milwaukee. Nta nsiguro catanze ku vyatumye uyo mwirabure araswa. Igisata kijejwe ubutungane mu ntara ya Wisconsin kiriko kirakora amatohoza. Kimenyesha ko abapolisi bakoze ivyo baciye bategekwa kuja mu karuhuko k'igihano. Mw'ireresi yahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro, abapolisi batatu baboneka barabishije iminwa y'inkoho zabo kuri bwana Blake mu gihe yariko aja ku mudoka yiwe. Mu gihe yari yuguruye umuryango agaca yegamira ku modoka, umupolisi umwe aboneka amufashe ishati kandi ariko aramurasa. Iyo reresi yerekana ko harashwe amasasu indwi, mu gihe abari ng'aho bariko bakoma induru. Abapolisi bakoze ivyo ntibamenyekanye amazina. Ben Crump, umunyamategeko aharanira ubutungane kuri bose, yabwiye tereviziyo CNN ko abana b'abahungu batatu ba bwana Blake bari mu modoka igihe yari agiye kwinjiramwo igihe yaraswa. Yanditse ku rubuga rwiwe rwa twitter ati: "Bariboneye ingene umupolisi yarashe se wabo. Ivyo bizobahahamura ubuzima bwabo bwose. Ntidushobora kwemera ko abapolisi bahonyanga amabanga yabo bajejwe yo KUDUKINGIRA". Avuga ko bwana Blake yarashwe igihe yari ahejeje kubanguranya abariko bararwana. Eka n'ababonye ivyabaye babwiye ikinyamakuru ngurukanabumenyi Kenosha News ko Blake yari ahejeje kubanguranya abagore babiri bariko bararwana imbere y'uko igipolisi gishika. Ibi bibaye mu gihe habandanya imishamirano ikomeye muri Amerika ivuye ku bugome bw'igipolisi inyuma y'iyicwa ry'umwirabure George Floyd mu kwa gatanu. Urupfu rwiwe rwatumye haduka imyiyerekano ikomeye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika no mu zindi mpande z'isi,  mw'isekeza ryiswe Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'umwirabure ni kirumara).

column2: France: Cardinali Ricard ari mu basenyeri 11 bagirizwa guhohotera abana
column3: Umu cardinali w’Umufaransa Jean Pierre Ricard yavuzwe izina na Ekleziya Katolika nk’umwe mu basenyeri 11 bagikorera canke bigeze gukorera iryo shengero bagirizwa guhohotera abana Mw'itangazo, uyo mu cardinali yanditse ko yahohoteye  umwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 igihe yari akiri padiri kw'iparuwase haraheze  imyaka mirongo 35,  kandi ko ubu ashobora gukura meza mu mabanga yiwe. H﻿araciye umwaka, umugwi washinzwe utoye ivyemeza ko hari ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abantu bashurashuza abana, bakorera mw'ishengero Katolika ry'Ubufaransa mu myaka irenga mirongo ibiri. Uko   bagirizwa ari 11 bose barashengejwe mu butungane canke bahabwa ibihano na Ekleziya Katolika. I﻿bi vyagiye ahabona mu gihe mu gihe hariko haraba inama y'abepisikopi b'Ubufaransa i Lourdes, mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'Ubufaransa. Musenyeri mukuru Eric de Moulins-Beaufort yabariye abamenyeshamakuru ko muri abo 11 harimwo Musenyeri wa Creteil Michel Santier yagiye mu karuhuko ko muzabukuru mu mwaka uheze inyuma yo kwagirizwa ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina mu myaka  mirongo ibiri iheze. Bamwe bariko bakorwako amatohoza ajanye n'ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina  mu gihe abandi bagirizwa kubinuma. Musenyeri mukuru yasomeye ku mugaragaro ikete rya Cardinali Ricard, aho yavuze ko yitwaye nabi "mu buryo bukwiye guhanwa" ku mwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 kandi ko  mu vy’ukuri imyitwarire yiwe yagize ingaruka mbi kandi  zitazopfa zibagiwe kuri uwo mwana w'umukobwa. Mu gihe ubu ari mu karuhuko k'iza bukuru inyuma y'imyaka 18 ari musenyeri wa Bordeaux, uwo mu cardinali w'imyaka 78 yavuze ko yamusavye ikigongwe kandi asaba n'imbabazi ku bantu bose yababaje. M﻿usenyeri ahari ubu, Jean Paul James, yavuze ko yifatanije umubabaro n'abakorewe icaha, aca asubira gutera akamo uwo ari we wese yoba yarahohotewe muri iyo diyoseze kubivuga. Umukuru w'imana y'abepisikopi yavuze ko kiretse uwo mu Cardinali na Michel Santier, abasenyeri batandatu bagirijwe n'ubutungane canke ishengero kandi ko  umwe aza yaramaze gupfa. Yongeyeko ati:"A﻿bandi bahoze ari abasenyeri bariko baragirwako amatohoza n'ubutungane mu gihe uwundi wa gatatu amaze kwitaba abashikirizamanza." Mu cegeranyo cayo co mu kwezi kwa 10 mu 2021 , akanama kigenga kashizweho na Ekleziya Katolika yo mu Bufaransa kasanze abana ibihumbi 216 barahohotewe kuva mu myaka ya 1950, benshi muri bo bakaba bari abana b’ababahungu bari gahati y’imyaka 10 na 13. Umukuru w'ako kanama yavuze ko hari ivyemezo ko hari abakoze ihoterwa bashika 3.200 kandi ko ivyo vyemezo vyarahawe  abashikirizamanza mu mice 22 aho ingingo zo gukurikiranwa kuri ivyo vyaha zishobora gufatwa. U﻿bufaransa ni kimwe mu bihugu aho ibivugwa ko habaye ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina vyateye vyanyiganyije ishengero ya Ekleziya Katolika. Mu mwaka uheze, Papa Francis yarahinduye amategeko agenga ishengero Katolika kugira ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina, kwiyegereza abana ugamije kubashurashuza, gutunga ama film y’abana bariko barahuza ibitsina hamwe no gukingiranira ikibaba ku caha c'ihohoterwa, ko ari icaha gihanwa n'amategeko ya Vatikano. Mu butumwa yatanze imbere y'uko hatangura iyo nama y'abepisikopi i Lourde, Papa yavuze ko ishengero ryo mu Bufaransa ryaguye mu gahundwe kubera ihohoterwa ryakozwe na bamwe mu bungere baryo. I﻿yo nama yari ifise intumbero yo guteza imbere uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru no gukorera mu muco ku mabi y'ihohoterwa ishengero rifisemwo uruhara.

column2: South Africa yashinguranye iteka Musenyeri Desmond Tutu
column3: Abanya Afrika y'Epfo biriwe mu birori vyo gushingura wa musenyeri Desmond Tutu  yarwanije intwaro y'ivanguramoko ya Afrika y'Epfo, ibirori vyabereye mw'isengero nkuru ya Anglican  i Cape Town. Tutu, yagize uruhara rukomeye mu kurangiza intwaro y'ivanguramoko muri Afrika y'Epfo akanahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel, yapfuye ku wa Mungu afise imyaka 90. Perezida  Ramaphosa wa Afrika y'Epfo ni we yashikirije ijambo rikuru muri ibi birori vyo gushingura uyu musenyeri kuri uyu wa gatandatu, ibirori vyari vyitabiriwe n'abantu 100 gusa kubera amategeko yo kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Ramaphosa  yavuze ko Tutu  ari "umuvyeyi w'imitima w'igihugu cacu gishasha". Kuva yitavye Imana ku wa Mungu uheze, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baragiye kumwunamira kw'isengero  St George's Cathedral,  aho ikiziga ciwe cari. Tutu ni umwe mu bantu bakomeye barwanije cane intwaro y'amacakubiri n'ivanguramoko yashizweho n'inkehwa z'abazungu mw'ikubagurwa bakoreye nyarwinshi b'abirabure, kuva mu 1948 gushika mu 1991. Perezida Ramaphosa yavuze ko Tutu yari "umurwanyi mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ubwigenge, ubutungane, amahoro n'uburenganzira kuri bose. Atari muri Afrika y'Epfo honyene...ariko kandi no kw'isi yose". Ati: "Niba dushaka kumenya akarorero k'umuntu w'igihagararo kidasanzwe, w'imico idasanzwe kandi yitaho abantu, nta nkeka ko ari uyu mugabo turiko turashingura uyu musi". Mu bitabiriye ibi birori kw'ishengero rikuru rya Cape Town harimwo abagenzi, umuryango, abarongoye ishengero n'abanyaporitike. Tutu yari yasavye ashimitse ko mu kumushingura hatoba "ugusesagura canke gukoresha uburyo buhanitse", kandi bagakoresha "isandugu izimbutse ishoboka". Yasavye kandi ko amashurwe yonyene yoba ari mw'isengero yoba "urugori rw'amashure rw'umuryango wiwe", nk'uko bivugwa n'ibigo  Archbishop Tutu IP Trust hamwe na Desmond and Leah Tutu Legacy Foundation. Vyitezwe ko ibisigarira vyiwe bihambwa inyuma ya arutari mw'isengero nkuru St George's Cathedral - isengero nkuru yamaze imyaka 35 arongoye. Mu butumwa yatanze mu buryo bwa videwo, Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasiguye ingene Tutu "yamurikiye isi yose". Avuga ko icubahiro yahaye Tutu ari nk ' "imbeba yunamira inzovu". Umukobwa wa Tutu Mpho yavuze ko urukundo berekanye kuri se wiwe "rwatsimbataje imitima yabo". Ati: "Kubera twamusangiye n'isi, namwe muradusangije igice c'urukundo mwari mumufitiye". Igihe ikiziga ciwe cashirwa ahagaragara muri Cape Town, abantu benshi baraje kumusezera ubwa nyuma. Umugabo umwe, Wally Mdluli, yagenze ibirometero birengo 1000 kuva Bloemfontein gushika Cape Town agenda arasaba ko bamwunguruza kuri gusa (lift)  - aca mu ncuti n'abagenzi asaba ko bomufasha kugira ashobore gukora urugendo rwiwe, mbere akaryama muri station y'igitoro igihe yari ku rugendo. Yabwiye umunyamakuru wa BBC i Cape Tow ati: "Numva nuzuye umunezero inyuma y'aho mboneye isandugu y'ikiziga. Ni nk'uko umengo umutima wiwe uri muri jewe". Tutu yarakoresheje igihagararo ciwe mu kwiyamiriza agahotoro kakorerwa abirabure mu gihugu ciwe, akama avuga ko yabikora kubw'ukwemera atari ku mvo za poritike.

column2: Mason Greenwood: Uyu muyabaga rutahizamu wa Man Utd azoshikana hehe?
column3: "Ntafyinira imbere y'igoli." "Kwinjiza ibitsindo bimuri mu maraso." "Ni icago ku kipe ihura nawe." Abamukeza babaye benshi mu gihe Mason Greenwood yanditse ayandi mateka ku wa kane, mu gukina kwiwe kugitangura. Ku myaka 18 n'iminsi 72, uyu rutahizamu yabaye umukinyi wa Manchester United akiri muto kurusha abandi atsinze ibitsindo bibiri mw'ihiganwa rya Buraya aho United yatsinda 4-0 AZ Alkmaar mw'ihiganwa rya Europa League. Vyabaye ibitsindo vyiwe bigira gatanu na gatandatu mw'ikipe y'abakuze bikaba vyigaragaza ko azoba uwundi rurangiranwa avuye mw'ishure ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Manchester United. Mu vy'ukuri, Greenwood yarigaragaje cane mu bakiri bato, umumenyereza Ole Gunnar Solskjaer akaba yari amaze imyaka 11 amureretse ijisho. Solskjaer yahagaritse gukinira United mu 2007 yagize ati: "Ahubwo ndibuka aho nahura nawe ubwa mbere kuko umuhungu wanje nawe yagirira imyimenyerezo i Chill mu bafise imyaka umunani. Mason yari afise indwi." "Ndamubona ubwa mbere yaraboneka ko arusha abandi kandi twarifotoje hamwe. None ubu ari ngaha. Ibi nivyo dukora. "Namusavye ko twifotoza kuko nari nzi yuko azoba umukinyi. Nibaza ko iyo foto ayifise, canke se niwe ashobora kuba ayifise." None mu gihe yari umukinyi mwiza akiri muto cane uko, urwego ashobora gushikako ni uruhe? 'Ni icago ku bakinyi b'inyuma' - uko abonwa n'abamwegereye muri Man Utd Hari abatangaye igihe Solskjaer yemera ko Alexis Sanchez na Romelu Lukaku bagenda mw'ici riheruka kandi, hako azana abandi bakinyi bazimvye bo kubasubiriza, yashize icizere muri Greenwood. Iyo ngingo yafashe ubu isa nk'iyifise ishingiro, kuko Greenwood ubu amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo vyinshi kurusha ivyo Sanchez yinjije igihe cose yamaze Old Trafford. Solskjaer yagize ati "Twari tuzi ko afise impano". "Ku bwanje, guteza imbere umuntu afise impano nk'izi, nta handi wobikorera hasumvya ngaha (muri United)." Ku bitsindo vyiwe bibiri yinjije ejo, Solskjaer yongeyeko ati: "Birya ni vyo akora. Arabikora mu myimenerezo - kuri we ni ibisanzwe kandi uko asatira igoli niko asumbiriza gukara. Ni icago ku bakinyi b'inyuma." Mugenzi wa Greenwood bakinana, Juan Mata, ntatangara iyo abonye uyu muhungu avyifatamwo neza ku rwego rwo hejuru. Uwo munye Espagne agira ati "Igihe cose iyo akinye, aratsinda." "Turiko turimenyereza, ashobora kudakora ku mupira kenshi ariko arakomeye mu kwinjiza kandi ntafyina imbere y'igoli. Ni umwana mwiza kandi ndahimbawe ku bwiwe." Uwahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United Owen Hargreaves ntakekeranya ko Greenwood ashitse aho yokina ku rwego rwo hejuru mu mupira w'amaguru naho akiri muto. Hargreaves yabariye BT Sport ati: "Ibitsindo yinjiza, sinzi ingene abigenza ariko atera umupira neza cane. Ndakunda kuraba ingene atsinda kuko aravyorosha cane. Ntahatiriza. "Afise uwo arabirako vyiza ari we Marcus Rashford, ico akeneye gusa n'ukumwigirako. Ku myaka yiwe, 18, nibaza ko ari umuntu yaremewe kwinjiza ibitsindo. Azoba rurangiranwa, nta nkeka." Uwahoze ari rutahizamu wa Manchester United Michael Owen avuga ko Greenwood afise ubushobozi bwo kumara imyaka myinshji ari umukinyi akomeye - mu gihe atoreka uku kuduga kwiwe kunyaruka kukamusindisha. "Uraba ko babishoye iyo bakiri bato cane, ariko ubu igikenewe ni guhagarara neza mu mutwe. "Niyabandanya muri ino nzira mw'ikipe nziza imaze kurerura urwaruka rutari rukeyi, urashobora kwizera ko vyose bikwiye. Nta nkeka azomara igihe kinini ari umukinyi akomeye."

column2: Interbank Burundi yagirizwa kurekura amahera $1.500.000 yo gufasha imirwi y'abarwanyi
column3: Ubushikirizamanza bw'Uburundi buragiriza ibanki Interbank Burundi ko yoba ifasha mu buryo bw'amafaranga imirwi ihungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'aho abakozi b'ishami ry'ibanki Trust Merchant Bank riri Uvira muri Kongo bafatanywe amahera angana na 1.500.000 y'amadolari kw'ibarabara Bujumbura-Katumba mu ndwi iheze. Interbank Burundi yamirira kure ivyo yagirizwa. Mu rubanza rw''ikibiriraho rwabaye ejo ku munsi wa gatatu muri sentare y'iyungururizo ya Mukaza i Bujumbura, umushingwamanza yaragirije Interbank ko iriko ihungabanya ubutunzi bw'igihugu mu bikorwa vy'uguhanahana amafaranga y'agaciro na Trust Merchant Bank. Interbank Burundi yagirizwa ko ihonyanga amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu ku biraba ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga y'agaciro mu gihugu. Ubushikirizamanza buvuga ko amakuru bufise yerekana ko amahera yafatiwe mu Gatumba yoba yari agiye gufasha imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho iri mu gihugu ca Kongo, ariko ko ari amakuru bagitohoza. Busaba ko iyo banki yotangishwa ihadabu y'imiliyaridi 44, ikongera igatanga n'indishi y'akababaro ingana n'imiliyaridi 50 z'amafaranga y'amarundi yohabwa leta y'Uburundi. Interbank Burundi irahakana ivyo birego, ikavuga ko igikorwa cayo ari kuba umuhuza hagati y'ibanki Trust Merchant Bank isanzwe iri i Kinshasa n'ishami ryayo riri Uvira. Ivuga ko ari igikorwa yari isanzwe ikora kuva mu mwaka wa 2014. Nayo kuvyo yagirizwa ko ihungabanya ubutunzi bw'igihugu, abunganirizi ba Interbank Burundi muvyo amategeko barabihakana, bakavuga ahubwo ko ivyo bituma igihugu kironka amafaranga y'agaciro. Vyitezwe ko urubanza ruzosomwa mu kiringo kitarenze iminsi cumi.

column2: Burundi - Ingoma: Reta yahagaritse abavuzi b'ingama b'umugwi Amagaba mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu
column3: Ubushikiranganji bujejwe akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, urwaruka, inkino hamwe n'akaranga bwahagaritse abatimbo b'umugwo Amagaba ikiringo c'amezi atandatu bagirizwa kuvuza ingoma bahonyanze amategeko azigenga. Abo bavuzi b'ingama canke abatimbo bagirizwa kurenga kw'itegeko ryo ku wa 20 ukwezi kwa cumi mu 2017 rigena uko ingoma zivuzwa haba mu Burundi canke mu makungu. Mu ngingo y'ubwo bushikiranganji bugira buti: "Twishimikije ko dutegerezwa kugikingira no kubungabunga akaranga k'Uburundi, duhagaritse mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu abavuzi b'ingoma  bo mu mugwi Amagaba mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu. "Abo batimbo bavugije bongera batamba ingoma bahonyanze akaranga k'abarundi." Muri ico kiringo, nta muntu n'umwe wo mri abo batumbo azoba afise uburenganzira bwo kuja mu biteramo vy'akaranga canke kuja mu wundi mugwi canke abantu berekana akaranga k'abarundi. Ku musi wa mbere itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa kabiri mu 2022, igihe hariko harugururwa igiteramo ca Buja Sans Tabou, abavuzi b'ingoma b'wumugwi Amagaba bagaragaye bavuza ingoma bambaye amakoti n'amakaruvati. Iyo nyifato ikaba yarateye impari ku mbuga hwaniro, aho bamwe babitera ivyatsi abandi bavuga ko ari ibisanzwe kuko imico igenda ihindagurika uko imisi igenda irahera. Mw'itangazo Amagaba yasohoye itangazo aho bavuga ko bakiriye nkama ibihano bafatiwe. Bagira bati: "Kubwo abatimbo b'Amagaba, turakiriye nkana igihano ubushikiranganji bwadufatiye kw'ikosa ryadushikiye ryanatirimukije abatari bake n'aho atari yo ntumbero yacu." Inyuma y'umusi umwe igiteramo Buja Sans Tabou gitanguye, ubushikiranganji bujejwe akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, inkino hamwe n'akaranga bwaciye bufata ingingo yo kugihagarika kubera ivyo vyabaye.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Torres, Mbappe, Sanches, Vlahovic, Eriksen, Isco, Benitez
column3: Manchester City iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umusatorizi wa  Fiorentina umunya-Serbia Dusan Vlahovic, 21 amaze kwinjiriza umurwi wiwe n'igihugu ciwe ibitsindo 19 vyose hamwe muri uno mwaka w'inkino. (La Repubblica) Barcelona yagiranye ibiganiro na Manchester City mu buryo bwo kurondera ingene yoronka umusatirizi w'umunya Espagne Ferran Torres, 21, mu kwa mbere. Torres amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo icenda yongera atanga imipira itatu yavuyemwo ibitsindo mu nkino 28 amaze gukinira City muri Premier League. (ESPN) Ariko, umukuru wa Barcelona Joan Laporta avuga ko ikibazo c'ubutunzi kitabemerera kugura umukinyi n'umwe mu gihe ibintu bikimeze uko bimeze.  (Marca) Umukuru wa Everton Bill Kenwright yahamagaje inama yihuta y'abarongoye uyu murwi, aho biteze kwiga ku kibazo ca kazoza k'umumenyereza Rafael Benitez.(Mirror) Liverpool iripfuza kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Lille umunya-Portugal Renato Sanches, 24, asanzwe afise igiciro c'imiliyoni zababa  45 z'amadolari y'abanyamerika.  (Fichajes - in Spanish) Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp yumvikanye avuga ko umukinyi w'inyuma umwongereza Nat Phillips, 24, ashobora kuva muri uyu murwi mu kwa mbere. (Goal) Umusatirizi wa Lille umunya-Canada Jonathan David, 21, ariko arakurikiranirwa hagufi na Arsenal. Aba Gunners basanzwe bariko bararondera umusaturizi wa Everton umwongereza Dominic Calvert-Lewin ariko David  na we nyene ari mu bujuje ibisabwa n'aba Gunners, na rirya ari we amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo vyinshi mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa Ligue 1. (London Evening Standard) Everton iriko irihweza nimba yorondera umusatirizi wa Zenit St Petersburg umunya-Iran Sardar Azmoun, 26, yieze kuba aronderwa n'imirwi ya West Ham, Tottenham na Arsenal. (90min) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Inter Milan umunya-Danemark Christian Eriksen, 29, ari hafi yo kurangiza amasezerano n'uyu murwi wo mu Butaliyano. Eriksen ntarigera asubira mu kibuga kuva ca gihe afatwa n'indwara y'umutima muri rya higanwa ryahuza imirwi nserukirabihugu rya Bulaya, Euro 2020. (Calciomercato) Real Madrid iremeza neza ko izoruhira kuronka umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 22, na rirya amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza. (AS) Hagati aho, Real, iriteguriye kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umunya-Espagne Isco, 29, amaze gutsindira ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya, Uefa Champions League,  incuro zine mu myaka umunani amaze muri uyu murwi.  (90min) Manchester United ishobora kurondera umumenyereza wa New York Red Bulls umunya-Autriche Gerhard Struber kugira ngo abe icegera ca Ralf Rangnick. Bompi barakoranye mu murwi Red Bull Salzburg wo muri Autriche. (Sun) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona umunya-Hollande Frenkie de Jong, 24, ntazova muri uyu murwi mu kwa mbere. De Jong yariko araronderwa n'imirwi itari mike harimwo na  Manchester City. (Sky Sport Italy) Umurwi Wrexham wo muri Pays de Galles uriko uraraba ko wozana umukinyi wo hagati yahoze akina muri Arsenal, West Ham no mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza Jack Wilshere. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 29 nta murwi afise akinira kuva asezeye muri Bournemouth mu mpera z'umwaka w'inkino uheze. (Football Insider)

column2: Kidum nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus
column3: Umuririmvyi Jean Pierre Nimbona, Kidum, nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus. Abajijwe igituma yasohoye  iyi ndirimbo Kidum yagize: "Ni kubera ari ikiza kuri ubu kibangamiye isi yose kandi caduteye umutima uhagaze twese". Umviriza iyo ndirimbo aho hejuru.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya ku wa mbere itariki 05.04.2021: Neymar, Mbappe, Haaland, Messi, Rice, Soucek
column3: Umukinyi w'imbere wa Brezil Neymar, 29, yagiriraniye amasezerano na Paris St-Germain gushika mu 2026 - ubu uwo mugwi wo mu Bufaransa ukaba uriko urita ku rutare mu kugiriranira amasezerano nkayo n'umukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 22.  (Telefoot, via AS). Umukinyi w'imbere wa Borussia Dortmund, Erling Braut Haaland ashobora gutwara uwo mugwi amapawundi imiliyoni 34 kubera uwumuhagarariye Mino Raiola na se wiwe Alf-Inge bakeneye amapawundi imiliyoni 20 za komisiyo ku masezerano yiwe. (RAC1, via Marca) Mu masezerano ya Haaland azorangira muri uyu mwaka, harimwo ko ashobora kuja mu wundi mugwi ku mapawundi imiliyoni 64, ariko ashobora kuva muri uwo mugwi mw'ici riza mu gihe Dortmund itobandanya kuvyifatamwo neza mu nkino za Bundesliga, ntimaje no mu gikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo.  (Sun). Hari urukurukuru rwavuga ko Haaland, 20, ashobora kuja muri Barcelone, ariko umumenyereza w'uwo mugwi Ronald Koeman yavuze ko ingingo iyo ari yo yose yerekeye kugura abakinyi itegerezwa gufatwa na prezida Joan Laporta. (AS). Lionel Messi arindiriye kuraba imigambi ya Laporta ku mugwi Barcelone imbere y'uko afata ingingo yo kuguma muri uwo mugwi canke kuja muri PSG canke Manchester City. (Mundo Deportivo-in Spanish) Angel di Maria yavuze ko yonezerwa akinanye na Messi mu mugwi wa PSG mu gihe uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 33 yoba avuye muri Barcelone. (beIN Sports,via Goal). Umumenyereza wa Leicester, Brendan Rodgers, afise icizere co gusinyisha umukinyi wo hagati Mskoti Callum McGregor,27, wo mu mugwi wa Celtic. (Sun). Umumenyereza wa West Ham, David Moyes, yavuze ko uwo mugwi uzotega amatwi abashaka kugura abakinyi Declan Rice,22, hamwe n'umukinyi wo hagati  Tomas Soucek,26, mw'ici riza. (Mirror Manchester United na Juventus n'imigwi yerekana ko yipfuza cane kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Barcelone umufaransa Ousmane Dembele, 23, ariko Liverpool na PSG na bo baguma bamukurikiranira hagufi. (Mundo Deportivo-in Spanish). Umukinyi wa Espagne ucas Vazquez,29, amasezerano afitaniye na Real Madrid agiye kurangira muri uyu mwaka, ashobora kwerekeza mu migwi ya Manchester United, Chelsea, AC Milan na Bayern Munich.  (ABC-in Spanish) Juventus nta bushobozi bafise bwo kuriha amapawundi imiliyoni 8.5 umugwi wa Athletico Madrid mu ntumbero yo kwongerereza amasezerano umukinyi w'imbere wa Espagne Alvaro Morata y'uwundi mwaka umwe kubera ikibazo c'ubukene bw'amahera. (AS) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Everton na Colombia, Yerry Mina, 26, ashaka kwungururiza mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Butaliyano mw'ici riza, aho imigwi ya Inter Milan na Fiorentina imwipfuza cane. (Sun) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Ole Gunnar Solskjaer yavuze ko umukinyi w'imbere wa Argentine Sergio Aguero, 32, adashobora kuza muri uwo mugwi inyuma yo kurangiza ikiringo ciwe mu bakeba babo ba Manchester City muri uyu mwaka. (Goal)

column2: Vatican: Kardinali Becciu yategetswe gutanga imihoho, ibitari bimenyerewe
column3: Umukardinali yari mu bari bafise amabanga akomeye i Vaticano kwa Papa, Giovanni Angelo Becciu, yatanze imihoho giturumbuka ariko akavuga ko yategetswe na Papa Francis. Avuga ko yiketswe gukoresha umutungo wa Ekleziya yihera benewabo, agahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Kardinali Becciu yari umwe mu begereye cane Papa, akaba yarigeze kuba ajejwe amabanga mu bunyamabanga bwa leta ya Vaticano. Yagiye kugira uruhara mu masezerano yateye impari yo gushora imitahe mu nyubakwa nziza ya Londres mu mafaranga ya Ekleziya. Iki gikorwa kuva ico gihe kiriko kirakorwako amatohoza. Ntibikunze kuboneka aho abantu bo ku rwego rwo hejuru i Vaticano batanga imihoho, kandi na Vaticano nta vyinshi yabivuzeko mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa kane. Ariko uyu mu kardinali w'imyaka 72 yabwiye ikinyamakuru co ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi Domani co mu Butaliyano ko yategetswe gutanga imihoho kuko yiketswe ko yahaye benewabo amafaranga ya Ekleziya. Avuga ati: "Nta n'urufaranga na rumwe jewe nigeze niba. Nta matohoza ndiko ndakorwako, ariko ari nka hamwe bonshira imbere y'ubutungane, nokwisigura". Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru yagiye gushikiriza mu nyuma, uyu mukardinali avuga ko ibogozwa ryiwe ryabaye giturumbuka. Avuga ko na Papa "atari agononokewe" igihe yatangaza iyi nkuru. Ati: "Ni ibisigabwenge. Gushika ejo…niyumvira ko nari umugenzi pfa mpfe wa Papa, intumwa yiwe y'umwizigirwa". "Mu nyumn rero niho Papa yambwira ko atakinyizeye kuko yaronse amakuru yahawe n'abacamanza bamubwira ko nakoze icaha co kunyuruza umutungo". Kardinali Becciu ashimangira ko habaye "ukutumvikana", akongera kandi ati: "Nditeguye gusigurira Papa vyose. Nta caha na kimwe nakoze". Uyu mukardinali Giovanni Angelo Becciu ni umutaliyano yamaze imyaka ya mbere akora mu gisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Vaticano. Papa Francis niwe yamugize umukardinali mu 2018, igihe aherewe amabanga mashasha yo kurongora igisata kijejwe ibijanye n'ubweranda. Yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano avuga ati: "Ni uruhombo kuri jewe, umuryango wanje, abanyagihugu b'igihugu canje. Navyemeye ku bugamburutsi n'urukundo mfitiye Ekleziya na Papa". N'aho mu vyo yagirijwe harimwo ibijanye n'amasezerano ajanye n'inyubakwa ya Londres ivugwa ko yaguzwe mu mutungo wa Ekleziya, Kardinali Becciu wewe siko abibona. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa gatanu, uyu mukardinali yavuze ko Papa yamwagirije ko yakoresheje nabi umutungo wa Ekleziya akawushira mu ma koperative n'urucuruza vya benewabo. Ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano kandi bivuga ko Papa atanezerejwe n'ingene imperezwa yo gufashisha abakene yiswe Peter's Pence yagiye gukoreshwa mu bindi bitari biyigenewe. Kardinali Becciu azobandanya afise iki giti n'aho yatanze imihoho. Hagati aho, nta ruhara azogira mu gutora uwundi mu Papa.

column2: Reggae: Ivyo kumenya kuri The Wailers ubwo uwanyuma muri bo yashengeye
column3: Bunny Wailer niwe yari aramvye cane mu bo bashinze hamwe umugwi The Wailers, abandi babiri, Bob Marley na Peter Tosh barapfuye, uwa mbere muri 1981 ahitanywe na cancer ku myaka 36, uwa kabiri mu 1987 agandaguwe n'abasuma ku myaka 43. Bunny Wailer w'i Kingston, yakuranye na Bob Marley. Bafatanije bararimvye indirimbo zabaye rurangiranwa mu makungu nka Simmer Down na Stir Up, imbere y'uko Wailer afata inzira yo kuririmba ukwa wenyene mu 1974. Ntiyahagaritse gutera imbere kuko yararonse incuro zitatu zose agashinmwe gakomeye cane mu muziki Grammys aranambikwa ikidari ca Jamaica ca Ordre de Merite mu 2017. Yapfuye ku wa kabiri mu gitondo, ariko icateye urupfu rwiwe nticamenyekanye n'ubwo yari mu bitaro kuva agize AVC mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2020. Nta nkeka, abashimagiza uwo muririmvyi bashwaye imbuga hwaniro bakimenya urupfu rwiwe, abanyamuziki nkawe nabo bavuga ko yari "harabaye". Umuririmvyi azwi mu gutamba cane aririmba Shaggy yanditse kuri Facebook ati: "Iki ni kimwe mu bihe bibi muri kahise k'akaranga kacu. Waduteye kwishima mwami. Ruhuka neza." "Oh yemwe, Imana ihezagire Bunny Wailer," uwo nawe n'uwo muri Redd Hot Chili Peppers avuza guitare bass, Flea. Andrew Holness ministre wa mbere wa Jamaica ntiyatanzwe mu gushimagiza uwo muririmvyi, yavuze ko urupfu rwiwe ari "agahombo kanini kuri Jamaica na reggae". Bunny Wailer izina ryiwe ry'ukuri ryari Neville O'Riley Livingston. Yari yavutse ku wa 20/4/1947, amara imyaka yiwe ya mbere mu kigwati ca Nine Miles aho yarezwe na se Thaddeus yacuruza imangazini y'ivyo kurya. Aho niho yahuriye ubwa mbere na Bob Marley, ivyo bitambambuga badatevye baca baba abagenzi bakomeye, bakorana umuziki wabo ubwa mbere bari kumwe kw'ishure ry'intango n'iryisumbuye rya Stepney. Se wa Bob Marley amaze gupfa mu 1955, nyina, Cedella, yaciye abana na se wa Livingston. Abo bahungu bakuze barezwe nk'abavukana na cane cane aho cedella na Thaddeus bavyariye umukobwa, Pearl. Bamaze kwimukira Trenchtown muri Kingston, baciye bahura na Peter Tosh baca bashinga umugwi wo kuririmbira hamwe witwa The Wailing Wailers - kuko, nk'uko Bob Marley yabivuze: "Twatanguye dusemerera." Aho baba harangwa n'ubukene n'ubukozi bw'ikibi. Livingston mu nyuma yibutse ingene yakoze igitari ciwe ca mbere akoresheje "imigano, imirya akuye mu ntsinga z'amatara, n'igikopo kinini cavuyemwo sardines". Ariko umuririmvyi Joe Higgs batazira "the Godfather of Reggae" (umuhagarikizi wa reggae), yaba hafi yaciye ashira abo bahungu mu kwaha kwiwe. Abafashije, baciye  banonosora umuziki wabo, bongeramwo ijwi rya Junior Braithwaite n'abaririmvi basasira Beverly Kelso na Cherry Green imbere y'uko bagabanya izina ry'umugwi wabo ugasigara witwa The Wailers. Mu kwa 12 mu 1963, uwo mugwi wagiye muri Studio One ya Coxsone Dodd gufata amajwi y'indirimbo Simmer Down, indirimbo Bob Marley yari yanditse asaba amahoro mu ma quartiers y'abakene ya Kingston. Iyo ndirimbo ntiyatevye gukundwa, iraduga gushika ku nomero ya mbere muri Jamaica. Baciye bayikurikiza Duppy Conqueror, imbere y'uko basohora  urukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere (album) The Wailing Wailers, mu 1965. Bidatevye mu nyuma y'aho, hari akaciyemwo mu mugwi, aho Bob Marley amariye kurongora akimukira muri Amerika, nawe Livingston akamara umwaka mu munyororo kubera gufatanwa urumogi. Ariko barashoboye gusohora single (urukurikirane rw'indirimbo zitarenga 3) 28 hagati ya 1966 na 1970 imbere y'uko basohora album yabo ya kabiri, Soul Rebels. Izina rikomeye mu makungu barironse imyaka itatu inyuma y'aho kuri Catch A Fire  -indirimbo ya mbere bakoreye inzu yo gusohora indirimbo ya Chris Blackwell, Island Records. The Wailers bari  bamaze igihe baremesha ibiterambo mu Bwongereza bari kumwe na Johnny Nash, mu nyuma babura amafaranga yo kuriha ama tike yo kubasubiza iwabo. Blackwell aca yemera kubaha contrat ya Island, aca abaha ingurane (avance) yo kugura ama tike n'ayo gukora album muri Jamaica. Ariko ntibanezerejwe n'ingene indirimbo zabo zongeye guhingurwa kugira zihabwe akabirya ku bazumva mu makungu. Ariko iyo album ntiyaguzwe cane haba mu Bowngereza canke muri Amerika naho yahavuye ifatwa nk'imwe muri rurangiranwa. Mbere ikinyamakuru Rolling Stone Magazine ubu vuba cayigize iya 140  ku rutonde rwaco rwa albums 500 zirengeye ibihe (albums of all time) gifatiye ku ndirimbo zayo Concrete Jungle na Slave Driver. Ikibanza ciza kw'isoko caciye gikurikira na Burnin' yo mu 1973 ku ndirimbo nka I shot the Sheriff, Small Axe hamwe na Get Up Stand Up. Ariko niyo yabaye album ya nyuma ya The Wailers isohowe n'abatanguye uwo mugwi bari kumwe bose. Ukutumvikana kwari kwatanguye igihe Island yagurisha indirimbo zabo kw'izina rya Bob Marley and The Waliers, hamwe n'ikirangaminsi co kuzunguruka baririmba catumye Livingston amara igihe atari kumwe n'umuryango wiwe. Yaciye agenda mu 1973, avuga ko ubuzima bwo kuzunguruka budahuye n'ukwemera kwiwe kw'umu Rasta - avuga nko kurya indya zihinguwe hamwe no kuririmba mu bibanza bitabereye. Mu nyuma yavuze ko kumenyekana cane ari umwansi wo kwiyumvira ibishasha. "Umuziki uhagaze ku kugira ico ufatiyeko, iyo rero uri ahantu uri epfo na ruguru, aha na hariya, n'umuziki wawe niko uzokwumvikana," niko Livingston yabwiye The Los Angeles Times mu 1986. "Abantu baratwarwa no kuba rurangiranwa kandi ivyo bitandukanye no kuba umwanditsi, umunyamuziki, uwufasha abandi gutunganya umuziki wabo n'uwushira umuziki mu buhinga mwiza." Amaze kuva muri uwo mugwi, yaciye atangura gukora kuri album ya wenyene , Blackheart Man, yarimwo indirimbo zizwi nka Dreamland na Fighting Against Conviction, yiyumviriye igihe yari mw'ibohero. Yabandanije asohora album zakunzwe cane harimwo Rock 'n' Groove yo mu 1981 na Bunny Wailer Sings The Wailers yo mu 1980, aho yasubiyemwo zimwe mu ndirimbo bari bararirimbanye n'abandi mu mugwi. Mu myaka ya 1990 yaronse Grammy award ya album za reggae za mbere nzinza kurusha izindi incuro zitatu, aho hose akaba yagumye akomeza kandi agumya iragi rya Bob Marley na Wailers: iyo mu 1991, Time Will Tell: A Tribute to Bob Marley; iyo mu 1995, Crucial! Roots Classics; n'iyo mu 1997, A Tribute to Bob Marley's 50th Anniversary (guhimbaza imyaka 50 y'isabukuru ya Bob Marley). "Ndanezerezwa no kumenya ko ndiko ndafasha inzira yo gushikana reggae aho igeze. Ndashimishwa no kubigiramwo uruhara'', ivyo yabibwiye Washinton Post mu 2006.

column2: Umwamkazi Elizabeth: Abaganwa William na Harry bahujwe n’urupfu rwa inakuru wabo
column3: Abandika amakuru bashobora kuba bariko bibaza ibintu vyinshi bokwandika ku bijanye “n’aba bantu bavukana bankana urunuka” canke “abavukana bahuriye mu mubabaro”. Kuba abantu babonye abaganwa bavukana, William na Harry, baramukanya n’isinzi ry’abantu bari kumwe kizoba ikintu ntibagirwa kandi kitari citezwe muri ino misi y’umubabaro. Bari kumwe n’abagore babo, Catherine na Meghan, baramukanije n’abantu i Windsor, mu buryo butari bwitezwe mu ndwi iheze, igihe aba basamuragwa basubira mu Bwongereza. Ico gihe havugwa indyane n’ukudacana uwaka hagati y’imiryango ya William na Harry . Bavugwa ko bari mu nzu zegeranye i Windsor, ariko imitima yabo iri kure na kure. Iyi miryango ntiyari bwigere ibonwa iri kumwe ku mugaragaro mu kiringo kirenga imyaka ibiri. Ibi vyose vyagiye guhinduka ku wa kane. Nimba William na Harry ata mugambi wo kubonana bari bafise, bisanze bahuriye hamwe mu buryo ata muntu n’umwe yari avyiteze. Bisa n’uko hari haciye igihe kirekire, ariko inyuma y’aho Umwamikazi, inakuru wabo, vyankiye, igihugu cose kiriko kibaza amakuru y’amagara yiwe, aba bavukanyi vyabaye ngombwa ko bompi bafata ingendo bakaja i Balmoral aho yari arwariye. Imiryango irashobora gucanamwo mu bihe vy’umubabaro. Ivyiyumviro bikaba vyinshi kandi bigahakwa no kuja ahabona. Biroroshe ko impari za kera zivyurwa n’umubabaro. Ariko kandi kubura umukunzi gushobora kugarukana umwumvikano, mukararabira hamwe ibintu hanyuma mugashira ku ruhande ibibatandukanya. Gishobora kuba igihe ciza co gusubirana. Nivyo, ku muntu atabizi, nta n’umwe yomenya ivy’ari vyo akurikiranye imboneshakure yonyene. Mbega uku kwari ukwiyerekana gusa? Boba bari babwiwe ko bategerezwa kunyegeza ibibatandukanya hanyuma bakerekana ubutumwa bwiza? Ibintu ntibigiye kworoha ariko bizoguma hagati y’aba bavukayi.  William na Harry bari bamaze kuba mu bihe bigoye cane bakiri abana, igihe nyina wabo, Umuganwakazi Diana apfa ahitanywe n’isanganya mu 1997. Ku banyagihugu bari babirindiranye igishika, mu ntumbero yo kwerekana ko bifatanije umubabaro n’umuryango w’ibwami, bararyohewe cane babonye William na Catherine, Harry na Meghan, baseruka bari kumwe. N’imiburiburi mu kiringo c’iminota mikeya, ibi bihangange bine vy’ibwami vyarasubiranye. Barifatanije n’abanyagihugu. Nk’uko amakuru ava ibwami abivuga, Umuganwa William niwe yasavye Umuganwa Harry na Meghan ko bojana muri uru rugendo. Nivyo ko iki gihe bagiye hamwe, ariko nta nkeka ko ari kandi igihe co kutumvikana gukomeye. Aba bavukanyi bari hafi yo gufata inzira zitandukanye. Igihe Umwamikazi asandavye, William yaciye aba samuragwa w’ingoma. Azotegerezwa kumenya neza igikorwa kimurindiriye. Ari ku rwego rushasha kandi rukomeye gusumba murumunawe. William ubu ni Umuganwa wa Wales, izina bompi, gushika ejo bakoresha mu guhamagara se wabo. Igihe ingoma y’Umwami Charles III itangazwa ejo ku wa gatandatu, William yari ahagaze neza inyuma y’umwami mushasha, ari we se wabo. Bisa n’uko Umwami hamwe na Camilla, uyu nawe ubu akaba ari Umutambukanyi w’Umwami, hamwe na William na Catherine, ari bo bagiye kuba inkingi y’ingoma. Aba bantu bane nibo bari bakunze kuboneka bari kumwe igihe Charles yaserukira nyina wiwe. Umuganwa Harry wewe yafashe inzira itandukanye, aho we na Meghan n’umuryango wiwe bibera muri California  mu vyabo. Bategerezwa gutangura ubuzima bwabo inyuma y’aho bavavanuriye n’ubuzima bw’ibwami, bakaba batakiri kumwe n’umuryango w’i bwami. Baravugwa cane mu banyagihugu, ariko atari neza igihe cose, bikaba bisa n’uko ibinyamakuru bibakorerako cane.

column2: Amananiza abafise ubumuga bwa 'albinism' babamwo
column3: Amaso yabo siyo gusa abangamirwa. Uko bafatwa mu kibano binunyurwa n'uko umubiri wabo ubangamirwa, cane cane ubu ubushuhe bwiyongera kubera ihinduka ry'ikirere.

column2: Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri UK arasaba imbabazi ku ruhara rw'Ishengero mu bucakara
column3: Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasavye imbabazi inyuma y’aho amatohoza yerekaniye ko ikigega c’imitahe y’Ishengero rya anglicane mu Bwongereza gifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Aya matohoza yakozwe asabwe n’ishami ry’iri shengero, Church Commissioners, rijejwe amatungo yaryo, yerekana ko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 100 iki kigega cashize amafaranga menshi cane mw’ikompanyi yari ijejwe gutwara abantu mu bucakara. Ico kigega cari kizwi mu kinjana ca 18 kw’izina rya Queen Anne’s Bounty, cahavuye gihinduka ikigo c’imitahe ishika ku miriyaridi 10,1 z’amapawundi. Musenyeri mukuru Justin Welby avuga ko yababaye cane kwumva ishengero arongoye rifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Ikigega Queen Anne's Bounty cashinzwe mu 1704 mu ntumbero yo gufasha abakozi b’Imana bari bakenye. Itohoza ku makonte yaco mu 1739 ryerekana ko umutahe  w’amapawundi 204.000 (ubu yababa imiriyoni 443 y’amapawundi nyene) washowe mw’ikompanyi South Sea Company yagurisha abacakara b'abanye-Afrika. South Sea Company yari ifise amasezerano yihariye yo kuvana abacakara muri Afrika ibatwara mu bihugu vyatwarwa na Espagne muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 kuva mu myaka ya 1710. Yatwaye ibihumbi mirongo vy’abacakara, amatohoza akerekana ko hafi 15% yabo bapfiriye mu nzira. Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza ryabandanije rishora imitahe muri South Sea Company gushika mu kinjana ca 19. Uyu musenyeri mukuru avuga ati: “Uru rudandaza rw’agahomerabunwa rwafashe abagabo, abagore n’abana baremwe mw’ishusho y’Imana rubaka agateka kabo n’ubwigenge bwabo. “Birateye isoni kubona hari bamwe mw’Ishengero bashigikiye bikomeye bakegeranya amatungo muri uru rudandaza. “Inzira yonyene yo gukira koko kunywanisha – ari yo Yezu Kristu/Yesu Kristo aduhamagarira gufata – ni uko duhangana n’uku kuri kubabaje hanyuma tugafata ingingo”. Ku ruhande rumwe, Ishengero ry’Ubwongereza ririshimira uruhara ryagize mu guhagarika ubucakara, rigafatira ku ruhara umuvugabutumwa wa Anglicane, William Wilberforce, yagize. Ku rundi ruhande, ni ngombwa ko ryemera ko ryagiye ryungukira mu bucakara. Mu myaka iheze, Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza riherutse gusaba imbabazi ku bakozi baryo batari bake babonetse ko bari bafise abacakara. Ryasavye imbabazi kubera ishami ryaryo rijejwe ubutumwa, The Society for the Propagation of the Gospel (twogereranya mu kirundi tuti “Umuryango wo gukwiragiza Inkuru nziza”), ryari rifise itongo ahitwa Barbados, maze rishira ikimenyetso ku bacakara ryakoresha mu gikiriza cavuga ngo SOCIETY (twogereranya n’ijambo UMURYANGO). Ubu rero, ku matohoza yaryo ryo nyene, ryemeye ko mu kiringo c’imyaka mirongo ikigega caryo cashoye imitahe y’amafaranga hafi yaryo yose – hampande y’ayo ryakoresheje mu kugura amatongo – mw’ikompanyi yari ifise uruhara yiharije rwo gutwara abacakara muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko. Mu gihe abarenga inusu y’abanywanyi b’Ishengero rya Anglicane kw’isi yose bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, iyi nkuru ishobora kutorosha ibintu. Ishengero rya Anglican mu Bwongereza ryatanguje aya matohoza mu ntumbero yo gushira ahabona kahise karyo rikavuga ko hagiye gutumwako umurwi wo kwiga inyishu ikwiriye. Ariko umuvugizi ntazi nimba ibi bisigura ko hagiye kuba ayandi matangazo n’amasengesho, canke nimba hashobora kubamwo n’ibiganiro ku bijanye n’indishi y’akababaro mu buryo bw’amafaranga. Aya matohoza yerekana kandi ko iki kigega cahawe intererano z’abantu bungukiye canke bafitaniye isano n’ubu bucakara bwabaye hagati y’imigabane hamwe n’ibikorwa vy’ubutunzi bwari bushingiye ku burimyi muri uru rudandaza rw’abantu. Uyu musenyeri mukuru yongerako ati: “Ndasabiye abo bose bakozweko n’iyi nkuru kandi nibaza ko dushobora gukorera hamwe tukihweza iyindi nzira twofata”.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Sterling, Vlahovic, Zidane, Pochettino, Rangnick, Perisic
column3: Manchester City igiye kwongereza inguvu kugira ngo ishobore kugumana umukinyi wayo wo ku ruhande, umwongereza Raheem Sterling, 26, mu masezerano ashobora kumara igihe kirekire, ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko ariko araronderwa na Barcelona. (Telegraph - subscription required) Paris St-Germain yagiriraniye ibiganiro na Zinedine Zidane mu gihe yitegurira igenda ry'umumenyereza wayo Mauricio Pochettino ariko araronderwa na Manchester United. (Le Parisien, via Metro) Ralf Rangnick ashobora kuba agiye kumenyereza vy'agateganyo Manchester United, ariko akaba yari yabanje kwanka amasezerano Old Trafford yashaka kumuha, imbere y'uko bumvikana ku yandi mashasha.  (Manchester Evening News) Manchester United yahambije iyindi mirwi itari mike, harimwo na Tottenham hamwe na Newcastle United, mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Fiorentina umunya Serbia Dusan Vlahovic w'imyaka 21. (Mail) Manchester United iracipfuza ko Pochettino ayibera umumenyereza kuva mu ci riza, n'aho yiteze umuzo wa Rangnick. (90 Min) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Lazio Sergej Milinkovic-Savic, 26, ariko araronderwa na Manchester United nk'uwushobora gusubirira umufaransa akina hagati Paul Pogba, 28, kuko amasezerano afitaniye na Old Trafford azorangira mu ci riza. (Fichajes - in Spanish) Barcelona iriko iraraba ko yogura umusatirizi wa Basel umunya Bresil Arthur Cabral, 23, ariko bikazoba ngombwa ko ibanza kugurisha bamwe mu bakinyi kugira ngo ishobore kumugura.  (Goal) Amasezerano umukinyi wo ku ruhande umunya-Croatia Ivan Perisic, 32, afitaniye na Inter Milan arangira mu kwa gatandatu 2022, uyu mukinyi akavuga ati "vyose birashoboka, tuzobiraba mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere", aho yari abajijwe ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe.  (Mediaset Infinity, via Football Italia) Inter Milan irafise ivyizigiro ko umuninyi wayo wo hagati, umunya-Croatia Marcelo Brozovic, 29, azotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha, ni mu gihe ayahari azorangira mu ci riza. (90 Min) Kuri uyu wa gatanu, vyitezwe ko umumenyereza wa AC Milan Stefano Pioli, 56, atera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y'imyaka ibiri iri imbere ari kumwe n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano, Serie A. (Calciomercato, via Football Italia)

column2: Burundi: Kwugara ububare 21h 'birababaje kubura ico ukeneye mu mwanya wipfuza'
column3: Inyuma y'igisagara ca Bujumbura, ubu na Gitega eka no mu ntara ya Muyinga - ihana urubibe n'u Rwanda -  ububare bwose butegerezwa gupfunga isaha zitatu z'ijoro, abanyagihugu bamwe barabishimye abandi bavuga ko ari ihohoterwa. Buramatari w'intara ya Muyinga na musitanteri wa komine Gitega intara ya Gitega ubu nabo nyene batangaje izi ngingo bavuga ko ari izo kubungabunga umutekano. Abo bategetsi bompi batangaza ko "amasaha yo kwugurura ubunywero ku minsi y'ikirimo ari kuva isaha cumi n'imwe z'umuhingamo gushika isaha zitatu z'ijoro". Izo ngingo ziriko zirafatwa mu gihe ubutegetsi bw'u Burundi bubandanya bumenyesha ko igihugu cose kirangwa mwo umutekano. Izo ngingo zifashwe inyuma y'igitero mu ntara ya Cibitoke, abategetsi bavuze ko cagizwe n'abavuye mu Rwanda bateye ikirindiro c'abasirikare bagasubira muri ico gihugu. Abo bategetsi ntibavuga nimba izo ngingo zifitaniye isano n'ico gitero co mu ntara ya Cibitoke. Umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura wewe, Freddy Mbonimpa, avuga ko ata sano rihari, ahubwo izo ngingo zatangajwe bahejeje ukwisuzuma bagasanga harabayeho ukudebukirwa mu gucungera umutekano. Ku biraba ivyo kwugara akabare vyovyo, Bwana Mbonimpa yavuze ko yafashe izo ngingo kubera ko hari abantu bata akazi, bakigira mu kabare aho kuba bari ku kazi. Muri Komine Gitega bamwe bishimira izo ngingo mu gihe abandi babona ko bahotowe. Ntibipfuje gutangazwa amazina yabo. Umunyagihugu umwe avuga ko izo ngingo zari zaratevye, akabona ko zigiye gushira ku murongo ibitari bike, hampande y'umutekano. Agira ati: "Ubu nta muntu azokwiraza ahantu atamvo iboneka ihari, nta n'uwuzoraza umuntu mukinyegero, ahubwo lmana yakoze gukoresha izo ndongozi kugira bagire ico ciyumviro ". Uwundi abona ko gufata izo ngingo bifise imvo, ariko kwugara akabare isaha zitatu hakiri kare cane. Ati: "Ntivyumvikana ukungene isaha zitatu ubunywero bwose buzoba bwugaye. Izo ni ingorane kandi abantu benshi bagiye guherera mu gasho". Eka n'abadandaza inzoga babona ko bagiye kuhahombera, na rirya ngo isaha betegekwako kwugara ariho abakiriya baba batanguye kunywa. Uwundi munyagihigu abona ko abafashe iyo ngingo bibagiye ko hari vyinshi bituma umuntu aja mukabare, atari uko aba agira ate umwanya gusa. Ati: "Murashobora kuba muri no kwi'jambo ryofasha benshi, canke uvuye ahantu. "Ubundi twizera abarongozi bacu ko ingingo badufatira baba babona ko ari zo zikwiriye, ariko si ukuvuga ko bihimbaye kubura ico ufata wari ugikeneye mu mwanya wipfuza".

column2: Jose Mourinho muri Tottenham: Uwusubiriye Mauricio Pochettino yoba ari we abereye?
column3: Jose Mourinho ari mu mayira atamenyereye mu gihe atanguye akazi ko kumenyereza Tottenham Hotspur nyuma y'iyirukanwa rya Mauricio Pochettino. Kuja kwa Mourinho mu kipe nshasha mu bisanzwe bizana icizere kuko ni umuntu yama azana ibikombe, kandi Spurs vyarayankiye kuva yatwara igikombe ca League Cup mu 2008. Ariko ubu hoho siko biri. Ubu asubiriye umumenyereza yari akunzwe cane kandi iyirukanwa ryiwe rikaba ryashavuje abakunzi benshi ba Tottenham, baciye mbere bongera ishavu mu kubaza niba koko uyu munye Portugal abereye gusimbura Pochettino. None Mourinho ni we muntu abereye Spurs? Umuyobozi mukuru wa Tottenham Daniel Levy yakoze ibiri mu vyifuzo vyiwe mu guha akazi Mourinho, uyu nawe akaba yaratangaje ko yigeze gusabwa kuza muri Spurs mu 2007. Ico gihe yavuze ko umuyobozi w'iyo kipe yagerageje no kwemera kuriha indishi zijanye n'amasezerano yari afise y'uko avuye muri Chelsea mu 2006, yari kumara imyaka ibiri adakora muri Premier League. Birakunze aronse umuntu yarondera ariko azobona y'uko - nk'uko vyagendeye abandi - mu gihe Mourinho ashobora kuzana ibikombe banyotewe, ni umuntu kandi azimvye, atwarira hejuru kandi ukugenda kwiwe kwama kuzana amarira. Amarira menshi. Canke hoho Mourinho azovyifatamwo gute mu gihe bizwi ko Levy adapfa kurekura ifaranga? Ni ikintu camye giteza uruhagarara na Pochettino, yakora afise uburyo bukeyi cane ugereranije n'amenyereza bakeba biwe. Spurs nta mukinyi yigeze igura mu masoko abiri y'abakinyi akurikirana, kandi uyu munye Argentine yari yashikirije ko mu ntango z'iri higanwa inyito yiwe yohinduka ntibe umuyobozi ahubwo ikaba umumenyereza mukuru, vyerekana ko ata jambo rinini yari afise hanze y'umukino. Mourinho ntazimbutse guhemba. Kandi ntakoresha abakinyi bagura make. Tottenham yishimiye cane ishure ryayo ry'umupira w'amaguru kandi ikabona abakinyi nka Harri Winks akina hagati nk'ikimenyetso ca kazoza; Mourinho wewe asa nk'uko atanezwe no kubaho kw'ishure ry'umupira. Biragoye kubona ukuntu Levy yorekura amahera imiriyoni £89 kuri Paul Pogba, £75 kuri Romely Lukaku, canke £52 kuri Fred, nk'uko Ed Woodward yabikoze muri Manchester United. Igihe nashikiriza izina Mourinho ku kipe imwe ejo bundi, inyishu baciye bampa ni iyi: "Yoshaka imiriyoni £250 zo kugura abakinyi bashasha imbere y'uko twicara ku meza tukaganira." Spurs na Levy si uko bakora - canke tuvuge ko atariko bakoranye na Pochettino. Nyuma yo gushika muri Southampton mu kwa gatanu 2014, yakoresheje amahera imiriyoni £394 ku bakinyi, ariko agaruza miriyoni £295. Pochettino yari yiteguriye gukora, n'imiburiburi mu gihe c'umwanya muto, mu buryo yahawe kuko yashoboye gushikana ikipe muri zine za mbere inshuro zine yikurikiranya muri Premier League anashikana iyo kipe ku nshuro ya mbere mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Champions League. Ariko Levy arashobora gukebera Mourinho kanini kurusha Pochettino. Iyi kipe ya Tottenham ni kipe ikeneye cane guhindura kandi uyu mumenyereza mushasha akorana gusa n'abakinyi babushitse, kandi bazimvye. Baca umugani ngo ubukwe bwiza bukenera ko impande zose zakira ariko kandi zigatanga. Mu vyerekeye kugura abakinyi, Mourinho yamye ashaka ko ba nyene ikipe batanga nawe akakira - mu gihe, muri ubwo buryo, Levy yamye yiyubara gutanga. Umuyobozi mukuru wa Tottenham arashobora kuba ari mu mwuka wo gutanga ka natsinda yamye ashaka Mourinho, ariko bitwara kwiyumvira cane kugira wemere ko uku gukorana kuzoshoboka hagati y'aba babiri kuko basanzwe ari abantu badatamikwa ijambo. Icivugo ca Tottenham ni iki: "Kwubahuka ni ugukora." Vyanditse hose ku kibuga cabo gishasha ciza cane catwaye umuriyaridi umwe w'amadolari. Mourinho si umunyereza yubahuka, kandi ico ni ikintu gisanzwe kiraje ishinga abafana ba Spurs - naho yavyitwayemwo neza mu gutwara Premier League gatatu, hamwe n'ibikombe nk'ivyo mu bindi bihugu bitatu, co kimwe na Champions League. Ibibonwa nko kunanirwa muri Manchester United birimwo ibigombe vya Carabao Cup hamwe na Europa League mu mwaka wiwe wa mbere. Ubu hari ubudasa. Niko, abafana benshi ba Spurs bari batewe impungenge n'umukenyuro wa Pochettino hamwe n'uko ikipe yari ihagaze, ariko uwo mugabo w'imyaka 47 aracakunzwe cane kubera ivyo yashitseko. Kuza kwa Mourinho ntikwakirijwe gusa amakenga mu bafana benshi, ariko kandi hari n'abavyiyamirije kubera ibintu bibiri. Asubiriye umumenyereza yari umuhuza ku bafana benshi ba Spurs. Mourinho arahangana kandi ntahurizweko. Akeneye kandi kwerekana ko atari umuntu yaheze, umuntu yasizwe n'ibihe ugereranije na Pep Guardiola na Jurgen Klopp. Pochettino yari yegeranye cane n'abafana ba Spurs, bamukundiye uko ameze n'uko yifata. Mourinho ntanezwe no gukundwa canke ibishobisho - intsinzi niyo nyamukuru. Nta kinya agira kandi akora ibifatika - ibi rero bica bidushikana ku mukenyuro wiwe mu gukina. Abafana ba Tottenham bamenyereye umupira unyaruka, ufise umurindi, urimwo gusatira nk'uko Pochettino yakinisha abakinyi. Bahora bakina umupira ubereye ijisho nk'uko bavyerekanye mu makipe akomeye i Buraya. Umukenyuro wa Mourinho usa n'uwanditswe mw'ibuye kandi, ibi ni ivya nkenerwa, vyaramuhiriye - ariko ibi bihushanye na Pochettino. Gukomera, gutegura neza, akazi kakarangu bihagije. Abafana ba Spurs barashobora kwemera ibigiye kuza - ariko none bizomara igihe kingana gute?
